[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D4122}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bi na [#]ya sU tra br-it+ti/_bod skad du/_/'dul ba'i mdo'i 'grel pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gtogs pa nges par theg pa'i tshul
[\[1b.2\]]te/_gtogs pa ni mdo 'og ma kun du'o/_/nges par ni bla na med pa'i theg par gdon mi za bar 'grub pa'o/_/tshul ni lus la gsum/_ngag la bzhi ste tshul bdun po 'di'i nang du 'dul ba'i
[\[1b.3\]]gzhung kun 'dus so/_/dge 'dun thams cad 'dus nas 'di'i tshul du byas te phyag byas thal mo sbyar/_tsog tsog por rgan rabs kyi drung du 'dug nas/_gsol ba gsum dang /_zhu ba dang bzhi'i
[\[1b.4\]]las kyis cig car rab tu byung ba snyen par rdzogs pa mngon par 'thob bo zhes sngon gyi cho ga'o/_/dge 'dun thams cad ces pa ni phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la bya ba ma yin gyi/_mtshams gcig gi nang
[\[1b.5\]]du 'khod pa kun 'du ba la bgyi/_mtshams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_dge 'dun gyi gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bcad pa dang /_chu'am ra ba lta bu rang mtshams su 'dug pa'o/_/'di'i tshul
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]du byas te zhes pa ni shAkya thub pa'i tshul du byas pa ste/_skra dang kha spu bregs chos gos dang lhung bzed la sogs pa gyon zhing blangs pa'o/_/phyag byas zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyis gus par lus
[\[2a.2\]]smad lnga sa la gtugs pa'o/_/de ltar byas pa ni bgegs su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/thal mo sbyar zhes pa ni khu tshur ram bzed pa lta bu ma yin gyi thal mo sbyar ba la bya/_tsog tsog por zhes pa ni skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba'am
[\[2a.3\]]rkang pa bskums pa la sogs pa lta bu ma yin gyi/_rkang pa gshibs la rkub sa la mi reg par 'dug pa la bya'o/_/rgan rabs kyi drung du 'dug nas zhes pa ni khrims rgan zhing btsun pa yon tan dang ldan pa'i drung du bsnyen te 'dug
[\[2a.4\]]pa la bya'o/_/gsol ba gsum dang zhes bya ba ni bdag rab tu 'byung bar dge 'dun rnams kyis thugs rje cher gzigs zhes lan gsum du bzlas te gsol pa'o/_/rab tu 'byung ba nyid kyis gsol ba gdab pa la bya/_zhu
[\[2a.5\]]ba dang bzhi'i las kyis zhes pa ni rigs kyi bu 'di dge 'dun las rab tu 'byung bar 'chal na mkhyen par mdzod cig ces dge slong gang dad pa cig [#]gis gsol ba gsum gyi sngon logs su zhu ba la bya ste bzhi dngos su zad/_bi shu
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]d+has ni bzhi'i khong [#]nas khrims dbog pa lan gsum pa dang bdun du bshad/_cig car shes [#]pa nas thob bo zhes [#]kyi bar du ni tshig lhag ma bzhis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnyis cig car mngon par 'thob par [#]'gyur ba la bya/_sngon gyi cho ga'o [#]zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i tshe na ni kauN+Di n+ya
[\[2b.2\]]la sogs pa snga phyir a shi phal mo che zhugs nas bA rA Na sIr [#]'khor lo bskor tshun chad lo bcu gnyis kyi cho ga ni 'og nas bshad pa 'di yin te sngon gyi cho ga nyung ba ni dus bzang ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong su la yang gnas pa ni der mkhan po dang rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par ro/_/dge slong
[\[2b.3\]]su la yang zhes pa ni dge slong ma dang dge sbyong dang khyim pa ma yin gyi gnas brtan chos lnga dang ldan pa las gang yang rung ste rab tu 'byung ba gar dad par gnas su rung ba la bya/_gnas pa ni zhes pa ni deng sang dus ngan pas mkhan po la gnas dgos pa la bya/_der zhes pa nas rdzogs par ro
[\[2b.4\]]zhes pa'i bar du ni de ltar gnas nas mkhan po las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_mkhan po dang ma bcas par mi rung bar chad dris la kun gtsang na sngon gyi mkhan pos skabs phye shig_/mkhan pos ni 'dri ba'i dge slong la gtod cig ces bya ba yan chad bya ste/_rab
[\[2b.5\]]tu 'byung ba nyid la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i bar chad dris la med na khrims dbog par skabs dbye/_sngon gyi zhes pa ni rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni phyis byed kyi rab tu 'byung ba sngar byed pas de'i mkhan po su byed pa la bya/_skabs dbye ba ni rab tu
[\[2b.6\]]'byung ba'i cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba gyis shig pa rnams la bya/_snga ma ma rdzogs par dge bsnyen dang /_dge sbyong dang dge slong du mi spar/_dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga phog la/_dge sbyong gi khrims 'bogs[#]/_de nas bsnyen par rdzogs par bya/_'di ltar rim pas ma byas par cig
[\[2b.7\]]car bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_skyabs su 'gro ba'i khas len pa'i tshig brtsams nas/_dge bsnyen dang /_dge sbyong du khas len [#]pa'i tshig bya/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o zhes so sor byas nas/_dge bsnyen nam dge sbyong du gzigs shig
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ces rab tu 'byung ba khas len du gzhug_/tshig 'di rnams lan gsum du bzlas [#]dgos pa la bya/_de'i 'og tu khas len pa'i tshul gyis bslab pa brjod do/_/_lhag ma ltar dge sbyong ngam dge bsnyen du khas blangs pas na dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga nyid bya dgos pas
[\[3a.2\]]lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas te zer du gzhug_/tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni dge bsnyen gyi gzugs dang bas blangs nas tshul khrims lnga nyid sems nur ba med pas na brjod du gzhug pa yin no/_/rang gis dge bsnyen du phog ste/_dge 'dun la 'dri ba'i dge slong la gtod cig_/rang gis
[\[3a.3\]]dge bsnyen du phog ste zhes pa ni mkhan po nyid kyis dge bsnyen gyi khrims rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de la phog pa la bya/_dge 'dun la 'dri ba'i dge slong la gtod cig ces pa ni de nas mkhan pos dge slong cig [#]la rab tu 'byung ba bkri ste/_'di rab tu 'byung na nongs sam ma nongs zhes dge
[\[3a.4\]]'dun la 'dris [#]shig par gtad de gtang [#]/_mi gtsang ngam zhes dris la gtsang na 'dri/_'drir gtang [#]ba'i dge slong des slar de'i mkhan po nyid la khyod kyi slob ma 'di la bar chad med dam zhes dris la med ces zer na[#]/_gdod dge 'dun la dri bar bkri/_thams cad 'dus 'khod pa la'am gnas
[\[3a.5\]]gnas su'o/_/dge 'dun la drin [#]ni mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun zad par la dri dgos te mdun [#]nas 'khod pa la dri/_la la zhig ma 'ongs na yang gnas ga la 'dug [#]gnas su dri[#]/_de ste kun gtsang na'o zhes thams cad kyis smros shig_/lhag [#]ma ltar dris pa'i lan du dge 'dun gyis de ste
[\[3a.6\]]gtsang na'o zhes bya ba'i don ni bar chad med cing gtsang na rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshul lo/_/mkhan pos gsol cig dge 'dun la'ang zhus zin rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa dge 'dun gyi nang du yang mkhan po la mkhan por gsol du gzhug_/de ltar bya ba ni sngon yang mkhan po yin mod kyi dge
[\[3a.7\]]'dun la gsol nas mkhan por mngon par bya ba'i phyir gsol/_skra dang kha spu bregs [#]pa na phud gzhag_/de nas [#]skra dang kha spu bregs [#]pa na sems 'gyur gyis dogs pa'i phyir phud gzhag[# ]/phung breg gam zhes dris la btub na de yang ngo /_/de'i 'og tu phud 'di yod pas da rung dge bsnyen
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]yin te 'di bregs na [#]dge sbyong du 'gyur na breg gam mi breg ces dris la brtan zhing sems ma gyur te dge sbyong bya zhes zer na breg khrus bya skra bregs nas khrus bya ba ni gtsang ba'i phyir ro/_/mkhan pos ngur smrig can gyi gos sbyin/_ka sha dang sham thabs dang rngul gzan gsum mkhan po
[\[3b.2\]]nyid kyi yang rung gzhan gyis sbyar kyang rung ste mkhan po'i lag nas sbyin/_rkang pa la phyag byas te blangs[#]/_byin pa'i tshe slob mas mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag byas te blang ba ni gus par bya ba'i tshul lo/_/mkhan pos bskon/_slob mas blangs nas mkhan po rang gis gos bskon te/_bgo
[\[3b.3\]]ba'i thabs kyang bstan/_ma tshor bar mtshan brtag[# ]/ma ning yin nam ma yin pa dang mo'i nang du pho 'jug pho'i nang du mo 'jug pa'i phyir brtag go_/rab tu byung [#]ba 'thob pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_rim du'o[#]/_/dge sbyong gi khrims 'chags [#]pa ni shAkya seng ge'i rjes su 'byung ngo /_/shAkya thub pa'i
[\[3b.4\]]rjes su 'byung ngo /_/shAkya rgyal po'i rjes su 'byung ngo zhes bya bas 'chags te bya ba'i rim ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig gcig byas shing 'di lan cig brjod de/_de lta bu lan gsum du bzlas/_gsol ma thag tu yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar bya ba ni dge 'dun la dris nas mkhan por yang gsol ba'i
[\[3b.5\]]'og dang skabs 'di nyid [#]gang du byas kyang nyes pa med do/_/'di ni las byed pas bya/_dge sbyong 'thob par dge slong la gtad/_mkhan pos nga'i slob ma 'di khrims phog shig ces las kyi slob dpon gang byed pa la gtad/_ci kun gtsang ngam zhes dris la gtsang na 'thob par bya/_de nas las
[\[3b.6\]]kyi slob dpon gyis slar mkhan po la khyod kyi slob ma 'di bar chad med dam dris la gtsang zhes zer na dge sbyong gi khrims dbog_/de ni slob dpon no/_/mdo gong ma ltar las byed pa ni dge slong [#]gi las kyi slob dpon no/_/dge sbyong gi cho ga'i nang du slob dpon lnga glo thor du bshad pa ni mi spro bar
[\[3b.7\]]bsdu ste go sla bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon bzhi yang 'di'i zhar la bshad do/_/gsang ste ston pa dang /_las byed pa dang /_gnas bdag dang /_lhogs shig pa yang ngo /_/gsang ste ston pa dang zhes pa dang gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon ni bar chad 'dri ba'i las byas zin nas gsang ste ston pa'i
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]slob [#]dpon du 'gyur te/_'og nas 'chad/_las byed pa dang zhes pa ni las byed pa'i slob dpon te 'og nas 'chad de khrims rdzogs par byed pa'i gsol ba dang zhu ba dang khrims 'bogs [#]pa'i las byed/_gnas bdag dang zhes pa ni gnas bcas pa'i
[\[4a.2\]]slob dpon te 'og nas 'chad de mkhan po shi'am bral na gnas bcas te dri ba'o/_/lhogs shig pa yang ngo zhes pa ni klog pa'i slob dpon te/_chos dang kha ton slob pa yin te lhag ma gsum ni 'og nas kyang 'chad de so so'i las zin na slob dpon du 'gyur/_don 'grub [#]par gyur na'o/_/
[\[4a.3\]]gsang ste ston pa dang las byed pa dang dge sbyong gi slob dpon gsum ni so so'i las byas nas mjug rdzogs te zin na slob dpon du 'gyur ro/_/las byed pa'i slob dpon ni 'og nas [#]'chad do/_/khas blangs pa mkhan por gsol na de 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po ni slob mas kyang mkhan por
[\[4a.4\]]gsol/_mkhan pos kyang ngas mkhan po bya'o zhes khas blangs pa las mkhan por 'gyur te/_'og ma mdo gnyis kyi 'og nas kyang ji tsam gyis mkhan por gyur pa yang 'chad do/_/gsum bzlas pa'i tha ma'i chas 'grub dge sbyong gi slob dpon dang las byed pa'i slob dpon ni skyabs su
[\[4a.5\]]'gro ba dang dge sbyong du gzigs shig ces lan gsum du bzlas te lan gnyis ni rdzogs tha ma lan cig gi tshig sum cha lus kyang slob dpon du 'gyur te/_tshig lan gsum du bzlas pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_tshig gi [#]sum cha'i mtshams ni 'og nas 'chad/_de 'di lta ste pha rol la
[\[4a.6\]]brjod pa'i tshe dge sbyong ba'i zhe na'o/_/sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pas bdag dge sbyong du gzigs shig ces bya ba'i tshig 'di lan gnyis ni bzlas zin tha ma dge sbyong du zhes pa yan chad sum gnyis ni
[\[4a.7\]]rdzogs/_gzigs shig ces bya ba'i lhag ma lus kyang slob dpon du 'gyur ro/_/tha mas der mkhan por don no/_/mkhan por gsol ba'i tshig lan gsum bzlas pa lan gnyis kyi bar du ni btsun pa bdag gi mkhan por gsol zhes bya/_tha ma lan cig la mkhan po bdag gi
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mkhan por gsol zhes byas pas des mkhan por 'gyur ro/_/gnas bdag gi mtha' ni gnas bcas nas nub gcig gnas pas so/_/gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon ni pha dang bur 'du shes bzhag la gnas bcas [#]pa'i sngags byas nas/_de'i nub mo nyid mtshams gcig gi nang
[\[4b.2\]]du lhan cig tu gnas la zhag lon te skya rengs [#]byung na slob dpon ni pha dang bur 'du shes[#]/_lhogs shig pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig lan gsum klags pas so/_/klog pa'i slob dpon ni gnyis kas slob dpon dang slob mar 'du shes bzhag la zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
[\[4b.3\]]gcig lobs par mkhan pos smras la slob mas bzlas te tsog tsog por 'dug la lan gsum du bzlas na slob dpon du 'gyur/_lhogs shig par ma bsams par brjod na lhogs shig pa ma yin no/_/klog pa'i slob dpon bya bar 'du shes ma bzhag par bslabs pa dang bzlas pa ni ji
[\[4b.4\]]snyed lobs kyang slob dpon du mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag la nye ba'i tshig las gzhan du ma yin/_mkhan pos [#]slob dpon la btsun pa 'am bla ma zhes pa la sogs pa bla dgas gzhan du mi bod kyi/_mkhan po la yang mkhan po zhes [#]slob dpon la yang slob dpon zhes bya/_'di skad gzhan la
[\[4b.5\]]yang ma yin/_mkhan po dang slob dpon ma yin pa la mkhan po dang slob dpon zhes mi bod/_mkhan po dang slob dpon nang yang bsnor te mi bod/_don gyi phyir mtshan nas smos so zhes pa dang bcas te ma smras par mkhan po'i mtshan nas mi smos/_mkhan po'i mtshan nyid nas dbyung
[\[4b.6\]]dgos na [#]yang don gyi phyir mtshan nas smos so zhes sngar ma byas par mkhan po'i mtshan nas mi dbyung ngo /_/dge sbyong 'thob pa'i cho ga'o/_/'di yan chad ni dge sbyong du gzhug pa'i tshul dang cho ga yin no/_/la la zhig na re dge slong gi cho ga ma smos par dge sbyong gi cho ga sngar ci'i phyir bshad
[\[4b.7\]]ces zer ba zhig yod na/_dge sbyong ma byas par dge slong byar mi rung bas sngar dge sbyong du bya dgos pas rim bzhin du tshul bshad pa yin no/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni dge 'dun las so/_/bsnyen par zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa la bya/_rdzogs pa ni zhes pa ni mya ngan
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]las 'das pa nyid la bya/_dge 'dun las so zhes pa ni mur 'dug la sogs pa'i dge 'dun ma yin gyi/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bya'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni dge 'dun dang mkhan po dang slob dpon las thob par 'gyur te/_mdo 'di las dge 'dun
[\[5a.2\]]'ba' zhig las 'thob par 'gyur ba skad zer ba ni dge 'dun [#]dang mkhan po dang slob dpon yang de'i nang nas 'ong bar rig par bya'o/_/mkhan por mngon par gyur nas las byed pa dang /_gsang ste ston pa dge slong las bsko/_/mkhan por mngon par gyur ces bya ba ni mkhan
[\[5a.3\]]po bya ba sngar skad sbyar te/_'thams pa dang /_mkhan po nyid mos pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi nang du 'ongs pas na mngon par gyur ces bya ba dang [#]/_mngon par gyur nas las byed pa dang /_gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon dge 'dun gyi nang nas mkhas pa yon tan dang ldan pa las
[\[5a.4\]]nan gyis mi bsko'i/_dad par bya ba'i phyir gus pa'i tshig gis gsol te gyis shig par bsko/_mkhan por gsol/_dge 'dun gyi nang du yang mkhan por gsol dgos pa ni mdo ltag [#]ma ni mkhan por 'ong bar mngon pa tsam du zad kyi 'di ltar gsol bas ni mkhan por
[\[5a.5\]]gyur par yid ches shing kun shes pa'i phyir gsol dgos so/_/dge sbyong gi mkhan po nyid yin du zin kyang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang las tha dad pa'i phyir gsol dgos so/_/de rang gis chos gos gsum bsngor chug shig[# ]/mkhan por gsol zin nas mkhan po nyid kyis
[\[5a.6\]]chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhan po dang slob ma gnyis ka 'greng la mkhan pos smras shing slob mas bzlas te sngags gdab/_'dug ste btab pa'am/_gzhan gyis de'i tshe btab na mi 'chags so/_/phyis [#]nas ni sus btab kyang rung ngo /_/dge 'dun la lhung bzed kyang nye bar bstan
[\[5a.7\]]cing mches sam ma chung ngam mi dkar ram zhes so/_/lhung bzed ni sngags kyis ma btab pa'i snga rol du dge 'dun la mches sam ma chung ngam mi dkar ram zhes bya zhing mthar gyis sbyar [#]brim/_de ltar ma yin na thams cad kyis lhung bzed bzang ngo zhes smros shig_/mdo ltag ma
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]ltar dris nas mi che mi chung mi dkar na bzang ngo zhes dge 'dun gyis lan gsol cig_/gral dpon gyis [#]brtags te bzang ngo zhe [#]na 'og ma rnams kyis nan tan du ma mthong yang bzang ngo zhes smras na'ang nyes med/_spogs te sus zhes smras la gsang ste ston pa mos par byas te las
[\[5b.2\]]byed pas 'di'i dge 'dun la zhu/_de nas bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa'i mi de chos gos gsum bskon la dge 'dun las byed pa'i sgra mi thos pa tsam du mig rgyang du mthong bar bzhag ste las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis gsang ste ston pa sus bya zhes dge 'dun gyi khrod du zhu/_
[\[5b.3\]]gsang ste ston pa sngar mkhan pos bskos pa des ngas bya'o zhes dad par bya ste smra/_de nas las byed pas gsang ste ston pa bsgo ba'i gsol ba bya/_nyon cig ces nas gsang ba bstan/_de nas gsang ste ston pa spags te bzhag pa'i gnas su song [#]la bar chad kyi chos rnams yod
[\[5b.4\]]dam med drang por smros shig ces sngar bsgo ste bar chad kyi chos dri/_dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang 'di bzhin du dris dang [#]por smros zhes bsgo/_'dug shig sgra ma phyung gi bar du ma 'ong [#]shig ces smras nas dge 'dun la bstan no/_/de nas tshur shog ces ma bos kyi bar du 'dug cig ces
[\[5b.5\]]gsang ste ston pas bsgo la/_de [#]nyid du bzhag ste dge 'dun la bar chad kyi chos rnams gtsang ngo zhes smra/_kun gtsang ngo zhes gsol nas ci mchi zhig gam zhes 'ong ba'i phyir dri'o[#]/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gtsang ngo zhes smras nas tshur dgug gam ji ltar bgyi zhes dge 'dun la zhu/_de ste
[\[5b.6\]]kun gtsang na'o zhes thams cad kyis smros shig_/ltag ma ltar zhus nas bar chad kyi chos rnams gtsang na khug [#]shig ces dge 'dun gyis lan sbyin/_las byed par bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsol du gzhug_/las kyi slob dpon gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[5b.7\]]par bgyid ci gnang [#]zhes dge 'dun la gsol du gzhug ste/_kho nyid kyis mi shes pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis smras shing zlos su gzhug ste/_lan gsum du bya/_dge 'dun la zhus te bar chad dri[#]/_mdo ltag ma ltar gsol ba btab nas dge 'dun cang mi gsung na gnang bar go
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bar byas te las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad dri bar 'tshal lo zhes dge 'dun la zhus la sngar lkog [#]dris pa bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang las byed pas bar chad lan cig dri[#]/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob par bya/_bar chad dris nas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i
[\[6a.2\]]mkhan po la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal lo zhes las byed pas zhu ba lan gsum byas nas khrims las byed pas dbog_/'di ni de ma thag tu grib ma bcal [#]te bsko/_khrims phog ma thag tu nyi ma'i tshod ji tsam yin pa grib ma tshod 'di tsam la khrims thob pa yin no zhes bsnyen par
[\[6a.3\]]rdzogs pa de la bsgo/_grib ma ji ltar gzhal ba ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/phur bu sor bzhi la de dge'o/_/grib ma bcal [#]ba ni shing bu sor bzhis byas na [#]ran cing bde la grib tshod rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dge'i zhes bya'o/_/'di la skyes bu zhes spyad do/_/phur bu sor bzhi pa'i grib
[\[6a.4\]]ma sor bzhi la skyes bu gcig tu brtsi/_grib ma sor gnyis byung na skyes bu phyed ces pa ni[#]/_de las lhag chad du gyur na sor bzhi la bcu gcig gi cha re re la rkang pa zhes ming gdags so/_/nyin mtshan gyi cha snga dro la sogs pa'o/_/nyin par dang mtshan mo dus ji tsam na zhugs pa bsgo
[\[6a.5\]]dgos [#]te/_mtshan mo la dus gsum ste srod dang lnga tshigs dang tho rangs dang /_nyin mo la yang gsum ste snga dro dang gung dang phyi dro gang la rdzogs pa dus bzung [#]ste rdzogs pa la nyin mtshan gyi dus 'di tsam la zhugs so zhes bsgo/_/dus kyang ngo /_/dbyar dgun gyi dus gang yin pa yang bsgo
[\[6a.6\]]dgos te/_dbyar dgun gyi dus nyid ni 'og nas 'chad/_de ni lnga ste dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar dang shi ba'i dbyar dang ring ba'i dbyar te/_de ni lnga ste zhes pa ni dus la rnam pa lnga yod de ston zla tha chungs [#]nya nas mgo bzung ste brtsi'o/_/dgun dang zhes pa ni dgun gyi dus te zla ba bzhi/_dpyid
[\[6a.7\]]dang zhes pa ni dpyid kyi dus te zla ba bzhi/_dbyar dang zhes pa ni dbyar gyi dus te zla ba gcig shi ba'i dbyar dang zhes pa ni shi ba'i dbyar gyi dus te nyin zhag gcig ring ba'i dbyar te zhes pa ni ring ba'i dbyar gyi dus te/_zhag gcig gis ma tshang ba'i zla ba gsum/_thog ma gnyis ni zla ba
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bzhi ston zla tha chungs nya nas dpyid zla ra ba nya'i bar [#]zla ba bzhi ni dgun gyi dus so/_/dpyid zla ra ba nya nas dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i bar du na [#]dpyid kyi dus so/_/thog ma gnyis zhes bya ba ni gong du dus lnga'i gnyer gsod pa la gral thog mar smos pas dgun dang dpyid gnyis zla ba bzhi bzhi'o/_/
[\[6b.2\]]de phan chad zla ba gcig_/dbyar zla 'bring po nya nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar du zla ba gcig ste dbyar gyi dus zhes bya'o/_/de'i 'og ma nyin mtshan no/_/dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bcu drug gi nyin zhag gcig la yun thung ba'i phyir shi ba'i dbyar gyi dus zhes bya'o/_/mtha' ma ni des nyung
[\[6b.3\]]ba'i zla ba gsum mo/_/dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bcu bdun nas ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar zla ba gsum du zhag gcig gis ma tshang ba ni ring ba'i dbyar gyi dus zhes bya'o/_/ston zla tha chungs nya nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar du khrims rdzogs pa ni rim pas rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/ring
[\[6b.4\]]ba'i zla ba gsum la rdzogs pa ni pham ste zhag re zhing rim gyis brtsi'o/_/gnas bsgo[#]/_shing drung dang tshem bu dang slong mo dang sman bkus pa la nam 'tsho'i bar du spyad do zhes kyang bsgo/_de la yid bsring ba'i phyir gos su brtags pa rnams bdun dang kha zas ro brgya pa dang sman zhag bdun
[\[6b.5\]]pa dang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dang khang bu bdun brtsegs dge 'dun gyi'am yon bdag gis [#]sbyar na chog pa tsam spyod cig_/ltung ba'i chos kyang ngo /_/mi tshangs par spyod pa dang rku ba dang mi la gsod pa dang brdzun [#]bzhi byas na rgyud gsum du ltung ste phyis dge slong du mi rung ba'i phyir rings
[\[6b.6\]]bar bsgo/_/dge sbyong gis bya ba rnams kyang ngo /_/mi gshe ba dang mi 'phya ba dang mi smad [#]pa dang mi 'tshog [#]pa dang bzhi phas byas kyang lan mi bya ba yin na phas mi zer bar tshus [#]bya ba rnams lta ci smos/_rdzogs pa yang dag par te re ba'ang brjod cing tshul khrims mnyam par gyur pa dang
[\[6b.7\]]rangs pa [#]bsgo'o/_/rdzogs pa yang dag par te zhes pa ni bdag gi bar chad kyi chos la sogs pa med cing /_slob dpon dang mkhan po yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_yo byad tshang ba la sogs pas khrims yang dag par thob pa dang yang gcig tu na sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom pa 'das pa'i
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]tshul bzhin du rdzogs pas na yang dag par rdzogs zhes bya'o/_/re ba'ang brjod cing zhes pa ni sngon khrims yang dag par rdzogs par 'dod pa dang /_re ba'ang de ring re ba bzhin du thob bo zhes bsgo/_tshul zhes pa nas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni tshul khrims
[\[7a.2\]]mnyam zhing bslab pa mnyam pas na/_lo brgya lon pa'i gnas brtan dang khyod deng rdzogs pa gnyis su mtshungs shing mnyam pas snga ma dag yon tan dang ldan pa bzhin du bslab pa dang bsrung ba la snga ma dang 'dra bar gyis shig_/rangs par bsgo ba ni bsam gtan dang /_brtson
[\[7a.3\]]'grus dang klog pa dang /_bslab pa la sogs pas mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur gyis sgrims shig ces byas pas/_sems rangs par 'gyur ro/_/rangs pa'i tshig 'di skad du brjod pa [#]ni 'og ma'i sU tra dag ni nang du'ang dgos so/_/spyod pas smos pa'i gzugs brnyan yang ngo /_/sngon
[\[7a.4\]]khyim pa'i spyod pa'i tshe pha ma dang phu nu gnyen bshes la sogs pa la spyod cing brten [#]brten pa las de dag dang bral kyang de dag dang 'dra bar mkhan po la ni phar blta/_slob dpon la ni mar blta mkhan po gcig pa dang /_grogs po mtshungs par spyod pa dag ni phu nu dang gnyen bshes la sogs
[\[7a.5\]]pa'i [#]zhes yid bsring ba'i phyir rangs par bsgo/_dul bar gnas par yang ngo /_/bdag lus dang ngag dang yid gsum dul bar bsdom zhing pha rol po dul ba la brten zhing gzhan yang dul bar bya'o/_/dgos pa nan tan du yang ngo /_/dgos pa'i don ni tshul khrims
[\[7a.6\]]yin te/_spyad cing bsgoms la nan tan du bya ste rgyun mi 'chad par dran par bya/_de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang skye mched la mnyan pa dang /_bsams [#]pa dang bsgoms [#]par nan tan du gyis shig ces kyang bsgo/_yang dag par blangs te ma bshad pa'ang kun shes par
[\[7a.7\]]grub par chud do pa yang ngo /_/khrims rdzogs par yang dag par thob pas na/_phas pham pa la sogs pa kha cig ni bshad de thos pa yin lhag ma la sogs pa mang po gzhan da bshad du mi zin te ma thos mod kyi phyis gso sbyin 'chad pa'i tshe yang thos par 'gyur phyis kun bslab cing
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]shes par byar yod pas na/_da bshad pa dang 'dra ste phyis lobs par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo gus par yang bsgo/_sngon yang tshul khrims kyis bsod nams lta bus mi khom pa brgyad spangs pa'i lus 'di lta bu thob pa yin te/_de'ang phas pham pa dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma
[\[7b.2\]]khrims chen po bsrungs pa [#]'ba' zhig gis mi chog gi phra mo la yang gus par srungs shig [#]ces bsgo/_thabs dang bshad pa'i bcas pas sgrubs [#]shig ces pa yang ngo /_/thabs ni bdag gis ci la yang thabs dang ldan par bag bya ba la bya/_bshad pa ni sangs rgyas shes
[\[7b.3\]]rab mchog gis gsungs pa'i chos la bya/_bcas pa ni sangs rgyas kyis chos bshad pa'i [#]la bdag gis bag bya ba dang bcas par spyad pa la bya/_sgrubs [#]shig ces pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs la sogs pa tsam la gnas shing snyems pas mi chog gis [#]mya ngan
[\[7b.4\]]las 'das pa bsgrub dgos so zhes bsgo/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i cho ga'o/_/'di yan chad ni bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i cho ga'o/_/[#]gnas la ma zhugs [#]par gnas pas bya ba mi bya/_u pa de sha 'am gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon la ma zhus par gnas pa'i slob ma [#]
[\[7b.5\]]las ci bya'o cog ma dris par mi bya'o/_/ma dris kyang byar rung ba rnams ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/ma gtogs pa ni bshang gci dang so shing bca' ba dang /_mtshams su gtogs pa'i gtsug lag khang du phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/dri mi dgos pa'i ni phyi rol che chung du 'gro ba dang so
[\[7b.6\]]shing mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste 'cha' ba dang phyi mtshams gcig gi [#]nang gi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ma dris par byas kyang nyes pa med/_gtsug lag khang nas 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i mthar 'gro ba yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang ra bas bskor na ra ba'i phyi sgo nas
[\[7b.7\]]grong dang nags la sogs pas ba sub med na/_'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chad du 'chags [#]pa dang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar 'gro na ma zhus par song yang nyes [#]med/_lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi las dang na ba'i g.yog dang the tshom bsal ba dang /_sdig pa la lta bar gyur pa
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]spang bar nan tan cher byas te/_e ma'o bdag gi [#]bya ba byed du gzhug pa yang ngo /_/lhung bzed dang [#]chos gos kyi las dang zhes pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi lhung bzed btso ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_glan pa dang /_chos gos btso ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_btsem
[\[8a.2\]]pa la sogs pa byos shig ces bsgo na/_slob ma dang nye gnas kyis slar dri mi dgos par bya mi nus na gzhan la byed du bcol kyang nyes med/_na ba'i g.yog dang zhes pa ni mkhan po dang /_slob dpon na ba'i g.yog bdag gis kyang gus par bya mi nus na gzhan la'ang bcol/_
[\[8a.3\]]the tshom bsal ba dang zhes pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon tshul khrims lci yang dang nyams ma nyams kyi phyi nas the tshom za ba la slob ma 'dul ba la mkhas pa zhig na the tshom bsal ba dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzhan la bcol te the tshom bsal kyang nyes pa [#]med/_sdig pa la lta bar
[\[8a.4\]]gyur pa zhes pa ni slob dpon dang mkhan po chos log pa dgu bcu rtsa drug lta bu la lta bar gyur nas[#]/_slob ma ma lta bu la mkhas te log par lta ba las bzlog pa dang /_gzhan ma lta bu shes pa la bcol na nyes med/_spang zhes pa nas ngo zhes pa'i bar du ni mkhan po dang slob
[\[8a.5\]]dpon la slob mas bya ba 'di rnams ni le lo mi bya bar/_e ma'o zhes las byed pa'i rigs [#]par dam pa'i tshul du nan tan cher bya ste/_bdag gis kyang nus mi nus kyis brtsal [#]te bya'o/_/bdag gis ma [#]nus na gzhan [#]la'ang bcol te byed du gzhug go_/la la zhig na re log
[\[8a.6\]]par lta ba dang the tshom za ba la ci'i phyir mkhan por bya zhes zer na thog ma [#]nas ma lobs shing mi shes pa ni ma yin te mi bya'i/_sngon shes shing mkhas pa las lus kyi khams la rlung dang nad la sogs pa dbang po nyams shing mi dran par gyur pa de lta bu la bya'o/_/e ma'o dge 'dun
[\[8a.7\]]gyis de la smad par 'dod pa la smad pa'i las mi byed [#]pa dang /_byas pa 'chags [#]pa yang ngo /_/slob dpon dang mkhan po la chad pa rnam pa bdun 'jug nas 'byung ba lta bu zhig_/dge 'dun gyis gcod [#]par byed na snga nas mkhan po la yang de lta bu'i nyes pa ma byed cig ces
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gros gdab cing dge 'dun la'ang chad pas mi bcad [#]pa'i tshul du thabs su sbyar zhing gsol/_rgyal po'am zhang blon lta bu [#]las chad pas ma bcad [#]cig ces pa ni mi gsol gyi/_dge 'dun la mkhan pos nyes su zin kyang chad pas mi gcad pa [#]dang chad pas bcad na'ang
[\[8b.2\]]mkhan po chad pa byed cing dge 'dun la 'chags su gzhug ste/_e ma'o zhes nan tan cher bya'o/_/mkhan po bskrad de phyi logs na 'phyan par gyur na'ang de ltar ma byed par dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol cig par gros gdab cing ci'i thabs kyis kyang gtsang mar bcos/_ma
[\[8b.3\]]dris kyang nyes med/_chad pa dang rtsa ba'i chad pa dang mgu bar bya ba dang rtsa ba'i mgu ba dang dbyung ba'i phyir bya ba la dbyung ba byin cig [#]ces kyang ngo /_/chad pa dang zhes pa ni dge 'dun gyis lhag ma byung nas zhag tu bcabs pa bzhin du chad pa byed du gzhug pa la bya/_rtsa ba'i chad pa dang
[\[8b.4\]]zhes pa ni lhag ma sngar byung ba'i chad pa ma khor bar lhag ma [#]yang byung ste bcabs pa'i chad pa byung na snga ma'i chad pa spangs [#]la phub la gdod byed du gzhug pa la bya/_mgu bar bya ba dang zhes pa ni lhag [#]ma gcig byung na zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun la mgu ba bya ba tshul gyis bya dgos pa
[\[8b.5\]]la bya/_rtsa ba'i mgu ba dang zhes pa ni lhag ma snga ma'i mgu ba ma zin par lhag ma byung na sngar mgu ba zhag du [#]byas kyang rung spangs [#]la phub ste gzhi nas bslang ste bya dgos so/_/dbyung zhes pa nas ngo zhes pa'i bar du [#]'di lta bu zhig slob dpon dang mkhan po la byung na chad pa dang mgu ba myur
[\[8b.6\]]du byad du gzhug pa dang chad pa byas zin nas dge 'dun la nyes pa dbyung du ci gnang zhes gsol ba myur du gdab pa ma dris kyang nyes med/_des kyang 'di dag byas te 'dri ba ma gtogs so/_/chos gos dang lhung bzed kyi las bya [#]zhes byung ba man chad/_'di yan chad mkhan pos
[\[8b.7\]]kyang slob ma la bya dgos te/_dri ba ni slob mas [#]mkhan po la tshul gyis dri ba yin gyi/_mkhan pos ni slob ma la mi dri'o[#]/_/yang gcig tu na mkhan pos chad pas bcad pa'i tshe slob mas drir mi rung ste/_gzhan la dri bar mkhan pos gtad de drir mi gzhug pa la bya/_bsnyen
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]par rdzogs nas lo bcur ma lon pas mkhan po dang gnas dang gnas med par [#]mi bya/_khrims rdzogs nas lo bcur ma lon gyi bar du bdag gis mkhan po yang mi bya/_gzhan khrims rdzogs pa bdag la gnas 'char yang mi gzhug_/bdag kyang
[\[9a.2\]]gnas ma bcas par mi 'dug_/dge sbyong gi mkhan po yang mi bya/_gzhan lo bcu lon zhing chos lnga dang ldan pa med de phongs [#]na/_bdag tshul khrims ma nyams shing chos lnga dang mi ldan yang slob dpon byar rung ngo /_/mkhan por mi rung ngo /_/mdo bzhin bsdus pa gang
[\[9a.3\]]dang yang mi ldan pas kyang ngo /_/khrims rdzogs nas lo bcu lon du zin kyang 'og nas lnga phrugs su bsdus pa nyi shu gang [#]yang rung ste de gcig dang yang mi ldan na mkhan po dang /_gzhan gnas bcar gzhug pa dang /_bdag gnas med par byar mi rung ngo /_/lnga po gang yang
[\[9a.4\]]rung ste gcig dang ldan la lo bcur lon na ni rung ngo /_/nad g.yog dang /_the tshom bsal ba dang /_lta bar gyur pa spong ba dang /_mi dga' ba'i gnas nas gtang ba bya zhing byed du [#]gzhug nus pa'o/_/nad g.yog dang zhes pa ni snying rje che ba dang yid ring zhing [#]sman dpyad mkhas
[\[9a.5\]]pa la bya/_gzhan la yang nad g.yog byed du bcol nus pa'o/_/the tshom bsal ba dang zhes pa 'dul ba la mkhas te/_khrims lci yang la sogs pa'i the tshom med cing gzhan la'ang the tshom sel ba'o/_/lta bar gyur ba spong ba dang zhes pa ni ma lta bu la mkhas pa ste/_log
[\[9a.6\]]pa drug cu rtsa bzhi lta bu [#]la mi lta ba dang gzhan de lta bu la lta bar gyur pa bzlog [#]nus pa'o/_/mi dga' ba'i gnas nas gtang ba zhes pa ni slob ma mi dga' nas bdag gi phyi na dge ba spyod du mi btub cing mi ldob [#]pa dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug lta bu g.yos na bdag
[\[9a.7\]]gis kyang de rnams la bzlog nus/_gzhan yon tan dang ldan pa la bcol na yi ge springs pa [#]tsam gyis kyang mnyan du btub pa la bya/_byang [#]zhing byed du gzhug nus pa'o zhes pa ni 'di gzhi [#]bdag gis kyang byed du gzhug nus gzhan la yang byed du gzhug nus pa'i steng du lo bcur
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]lon pa dang lngar ldan na gnas brtan slob pa zhes pa tshun chad sngar med pa la tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang bcas par ro/_/'og nas slob pa yang ngo zhes zer ba'i sU [#]tra dgra bcom pa'i rim pa bdun 'chad pa yan chad/_lnga phrugs [#]su ma tshang ba'i rnams la
[\[9b.2\]]mang du thos pa dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang /_gnyis kyis mnan te lnga phrugs su sbyar ro/_/de la mang du thos pa ni sde snod gsum shes shing phyi rol gyi byA ka ra Na dang /_gtar ka la sogs pa'i rgyus shes pa la bya/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni pham pa dang lhag ma rnams ma nyams
[\[9b.3\]]pa ste/_dge slong du chud pa la bya'o/_/sde snod shes pa/_sde snod la gsum ste/_'dul ba dang mdo sde dang [#]ma mo lta bu'o/_/de gsum la mkhas pa ste/_mdo sde'i nang nas 'dul ba 'byung ba ngos zin pa lta bu/_de gsum la 'dzin pa ste kha don du shes pa don 'dzin pa'o/_/de
[\[9b.4\]]gsum la [#]ston nus pa ste bdag kyang shes la pha rol la'ang don chud par nus pa'o/_/de gsum la gsal ba ste byis pa dang 'chad pa lta bu la ma nor bar sbyor nus pa'o/_/de ltar sde snod gsum la 'dzin pa dang mkhas pa dang ston pa dang gsol ba bzhi la so so na gsum gsum
[\[9b.5\]]yod pa'i steng du mang du thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnyis kyis so sor bsnan te lnga phrugs bzhi/_de dag 'chad par nus pa'o/_/mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo lta bu gsum gzhan la don chud pa nyid du ni mi nus kyi 'chad nus pa la bya ste de gsum gyi steng du mang du thos
[\[9b.6\]]pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnyis kyis bsnan te lnga phrugs gcig_/tshul khrims dang sems dang shes rab bslab [#]pa dang ngo /_tshul khrims dang zhes pa ni 'dul ba la lci yang kun shes nas phra mo kha na ma tho ba tsam la yang bag byed cing bsrungs pa [#]la bya'o/_/sems dang
[\[9b.7\]]zhes pa [#]bsam gtan bzhi'i don khong du chud de shes nas bsgom pa la bya/_shes rab dang zhes pa ni zag pa zad par byed pa'i chos shes pa ste/_bden pa bzhi'i don khong du chud nas bsgom pa la bya/_bslab pa dang ngo zhes pa ni 'di gsum gdod slob pa dang goms zin pa la
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]mi bya'i don ma chud nas bsgom pa la bya/_'di gsum gyi steng du mang du thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pas bsnan te/_bslab par yang nus pa'o/_/sU tra ltag ma'i tshul khrims dang sems dang shes rab gsum bdag kyang bsgoms [#]la gzhan
[\[10a.2\]]la yang slob nus pa'i steng du [#]thos pa dang tshul khrims [#]dang ldan pas bsnan te lnga phrugs [#]gcig_/de ltar kun spyod pa dang 'dul ba dang so sor thar pa yang ngo /_/de ltar zhes pa ni lhag ma bdag shes pa dang gzhan [#]la ston pa lnga phrugs [#]gnyis su 'dren pa gzhan [#]du 'di yang gnyis
[\[10a.3\]]su drang ngo /_/kun spyod pa dang zhes pa ni spyod lam bzhir gos bgo [#]ba dang zan bza' ba la sogs pa tshul bzhin du spyod pa la bya/_'dul ba dang zhes pa ni pi bang [#]ka ma gtogs par gzhan kun shes pa la bya/_so sor thar pa yang ngo zhes pa ni pi bang [#]ka'i gtam rgyud tshun chad
[\[10a.4\]]shes pa la bya ste/_'di'i steng du mang du thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pas bsnan te bdag shes pa la gcig gzhan shes pa la lnga phrugs gcig ste gnyis yod do/_/dad pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa dang gtong ba dang shes rab dang ldan pa yang ngo /_/dad pa dang zhes pa ni
[\[10a.5\]]dkon mchog dang las dang 'bras bu dang chos la sogs pa la dad pa ste/_mdor na srog la bab kyang mi rung [#]ba ni dad pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul khrims dang zhes pa ni 'dul ba shes shing [#]'dzin pa la bya'o/_/thos pa dang zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi chos dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
[\[10a.6\]]sde snod gsum dang /_gtar ka dang byA ka ra Na thos shing shes pa'o/_/gtong ba dang zhes pa ni chog shes pas gzhan las mi len pa dang /_lus gang gtsang [#]bdog pa las kyang phri ste gtong ba dang chags pa'i dngos po yang gtong ba'o/_/shes rab dang zhes pa ni chos zab mo dang phra
[\[10a.7\]]mo yang lcigs shing phyis [#]ji ltar 'byung ba snga nas rig pa dang gcig las mang du spro nus pa'o/_/ldan pa yang ngo zhes pa ni chos 'di lnga dang ldan na lnga phrugs gcig tu brtsi ste gnas brtan du chud/_tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang de'i ye shes
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]mthong ba yang ngo /_/tshul khrims dang zhes pa ni 'dul ba 'bum pa shes shing 'dzin par byed pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang zhes pa ni 'du 'dzi mang po dang bral zhing sems rtse gcig tu thub par rgyun du bsgom pa'o/_/shes rab dang zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab
[\[10b.2\]]dang tshig gcig las mang du spro nus pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba dang zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur bar yid ches [#]shes pa'o/_/de'i ye shes mthong ba yang ngo zhes pa ni mnyan pa dang bsam pas dgra bcom pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin zhi
[\[10b.3\]]ba mthong ba'o/_/'di lnga dang ldan na lnga phrugs gcig ste/_gnas brtan du rung ngo /_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang shes rab bcas pa dang ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyis dge ba bya bar sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang
[\[10b.4\]]lus kyis [#]brtsams pa'o/_/shes rab du zhes pa ni rgyu rkyen shes shing gcig las mang du spro nus pa dang /_phyis ci 'byung ba snga nas shes pa'o/_/bcas pa dang ste zhes pa ni brtson 'grus dang shes rab gnyis gcig gi grogs su gcig 'gyur ba la bya ste/_lnga'i [#]yan lag
[\[10b.5\]]gnyis/_dran pa dang ldan pa yang ngo /_/sngan cad bshad cing bslabs pa'i rnams ma brjod par dran pa dang /_da [#]bslabs pa phyis mi brjed pa'o/_/snga ma gnyis dang 'di dang [#]gsum gyi steng du mang du thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnyis kyis bsnan te lnga phrugs gcig
[\[10b.6\]]ste [#]dben pa yang ngo /_/lus dben pa dang sems dben pa dang rnam pa [#]gnyis te/_lus dben pa ni dgon pa na gnas/_sems dben pa ni mya ngan med pa'o/_/'di'i steng du brtson 'grus dang shes rab du [#]bcas pas bsnan pa'i steng du mang du [#]thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa
[\[10b.7\]]gnyis kyis bsnan te lnga phrugs gcig_/sems gcig tu 'dus pa yang ngo /_/mi dge ba la ni mi sems dge ba la sems rtse gcig tu rgyun du sems pa'o/_/de'i steng du yang brtson 'grus dang shes rab dang mang du thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di bzhis bsnan te
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]lnga phrugs gcig slob pa yang ngo /_gang zag bdun la bya ste/_tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang de'i ye shes lnga la spyod cing sbyong ba ste lnga phrugs gcig_/ma rabs slob pa dang mi 'dri ste phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/mi
[\[11a.2\]]slob pa yang ngo /_/dgra bcom pa la bya ste tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang de'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_lnga grub zin pas lnga dang ldan pa yin te lnga phrugs gcig tu brtsi'o/_/'byung ba dang bcas pa dang /_rjes su bcas pa dang /_
[\[11a.3\]]bcad pa dang gnang ba shes pa yang ngo /_/'byung ba dang zhes pa ni yul gang du nyes pa'i gzhi byung ba la bya'o/_/bcas pa dang zhes pa ni dge slong gang gis nyes pa byung ste bcas pa la bya/_rjes su bcas pa dang zhes pa ni mi la mi tshangs par spyod du mi gnang bar bcas pa'i 'og tu
[\[11a.4\]]byol song dang khu ba yang 'byin du mi gnang bar rjes su bcas pa la bya/_bcad pa dang zhes pa ni phas pham pa dang chang lta bu srog la bab kyang btung zhing spyad du mi gnang [#]bar bcad pa la bya/_gnang ba zhes pa ni gdong phyis la sogs pa 'chang du gnang ba ste/_ma bcangs kyang nyes [#]
[\[11a.5\]]med pa la bya/_shes [#]pa yang ngo zhes pa ni 'di lnga lta bu 'bum pa thams cad kyi rgyus shes pa la bya ste lnga phrugs gcig_/bar du gcod pa dang /_mi gcod pa mngon par shes te/_'chang ba dang gnas pa nye bar gnas pa 'dzin par gzhug nus pa dang bcas pa la [#]yang ngo /_/bar du
[\[11a.6\]]gcod pa dang zhes pa ni sdig tu 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa'i rim par 'gyur ba la bar du gcod pa la bya/_mi gcod pa ni sdig tu mi 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa'i rim pa la bar du mi gcod pa la bya/_mngon par shes te zhes pa ni 'di gnyis la gsal bar shes pa la bya ste/_yan lag gnyis
[\[11a.7\]]'chad pa dang zhes pa ni 'di gnyis gzhan la'ang 'chad nus pa dang /_yan lag bzhi ston pa dang zhes pa ni bshad nas pha rol don chud par ston nus pa dang lnga ste lnga phrugs gcig_/gnas shes pa nas ngo zhes pa'i bar du ni bar du gcod pa dang mi gcod pa gnyis bdag shes pa bzhin du
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]slob ma la'ang khong du chud par sten nus pa'i mthu yod pa dang /_bar du gcod pa dang /_mi gcod pa gnyis gsal bar shes pa dang /_yan lag bzhi ste bdag gi slob ma nye gnas su gtang [#]na yang nye gnas kyi slob dpon de bdag gi ngag nyan pa dang lnga phrugs gcig ltung [#]ba dang /_
[\[11b.2\]]mi ltung [#]ba dang /_yang ba dang /_lci ba mngon par shes/_so sor thar pa rgyas par thon pa yang ngo /_/ltung ba dang zhes pa ni byol song chen po bsad pa dang chung ngu bsad pa 'dra bar ltung bar rig pa'o/_/ltung ba ni rgyud gsum du ltung ba'o/_/mi ltung [#]ba dang zhes pa ni tsog tsog
[\[11b.3\]]por 'dug pa dang /_skyil mo krung du 'dug pa la ltung [#]zhes zer ba yod de de [#]yang mi ltung bar rig pa'o/_/yang ba dang zhes pa ni sbom po [#]ltung ba dang nyes byas kyi rim pa shes la/_de so so nyid kyi yang ba gang yin shes pa'o/_/lci ba shes pa ni sbom po dang ltung ba dang nyes byas kyi rim
[\[11b.4\]]pa shes la/_de so so nyid kyi lci ba gang yin shes pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa zhes pa ni 'di bzhi gsal bar shes pa ste yan lag bzhi po zhes pa nas ngo zhes pa'i bar du ni kha ton kyang shes/_don khong du chud pa dang pha rol la 'chad nus pa dang 'di ltar ldan na [#]gnas brtan du
[\[11b.5\]]rung ste lnga phrugs [#]gcig_/rgan po la med na gzhon nu la gnas bca'/_khrims rdzogs nas lo bcu yan chad du lon kyang rung ste/_chos lnga dang mi ldan na lo bcu yan chad lon la/_yon tan lnga dang ldan pa bdag pas rgan pa med na gzhon nu la gnas bca'/_phyag 'ba' zhig
[\[11b.6\]]ma gtogs pa/_sU tra ltag ma ltar rgan po gzhon nu la gnas bcas nas [#]lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal ba ma gtogs par thal mo sbyar te phyag byas la/_gzhan gnas bcas pa slob pa'i [#]tshul bzhin du bya'o/_/spyod cing gnas med par lo lnga lon la/_tha ma'i bsdus
[\[11b.7\]]pa dang ldan na yul rgyu ba spyod do/_khrims rdzogs lo lnga lon la chos lnga dang ldan zhing bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gis [#]tha ma dang ldan na yul gzhan du mi 'gror mi rung ba zhig tu gyur na gnas med par yul rgyur song yang nyes med do/_/yul gang du phyin cing 'dug pa'i gnas de
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]na chos lnga dang ldan pa yod na gnas chos shig_/gzhan gsum rig pa'ang ma yin no/_/chos lnga dang mi ldan zhing lo bcur mi [#]lon na tshe snga ma dang phyi ma dang /_zag pa zad pa gsum shes kyang gnas med pa dang mkhan po dang gzhan gnas 'char mi
[\[12a.2\]]gnang ngo /_/gnas pa la gtogs so/_/'di yan chad gnas brtan gyi tshad dang gnas pa'i cho ga'o/_/khyod mur 'dug pa ma yin nam zhes rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la dri[#]/_la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir 'ongs na rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i mkhan pos khyod mur 'dug
[\[12a.3\]]pa ma yin nam zhes dri'o[#]/_/mur 'dug yin na ni rab tu mi 'byung [#]ma yin na ni rab tu 'byung ste mur 'dug ji lta bu yin pa'i tshad ni 'og nas 'chad/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa [#]dag gis kyang ngo /_/dge sbyong las bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe na dge 'dun gyis kyang khyod mur 'dug
[\[12a.4\]]pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba la sogs pa bar chad kyi chos rnams dri'o[#]/_/dri ba ni gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon bskos nas 'drir gtang ba [#]de nyid dge 'dun kun gyis dris par chud do/_/sems ma rangs pa shAkya dang me [#]pa ral pa can ma gtogs par mur 'dug rab tu 'byung ba
[\[12a.5\]]dang rab tu rdzogs par mi bya/_sems ma rangs pa zhes [#]ni rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_sems ma rangs kyang mur 'dug shAkya'i rigs dang me lha pa ral pa can ni rab tu 'byung du rung ngo /_/shAkya dang zhes pa ni shAkya'i rigs su chud pa ni dgra la phyir mi nur [#]bar dpa' ba dang chang mi 'thung ba
[\[12a.6\]]dang [#]dam pa'i chos nam du yang mi gtong bas chud de brdzun dang g.yo med pas na ma rangs kyang rung ngo /_/me lha pa ral pa can zhes pa ni me lha pa ral pa can ni me lha 'ang rjed [#]la/_ral pa yang yod pa la bya ste/_kho bdag gi lta ba mya ngan las 'das par 'dod la legs nyes kyi rgyu rkyen
[\[12a.7\]]yod par lta bas ma rangs kyang rung ngo /_/ma gtogs par zhes pa ni shAkya dang me lha pa ral pa can gnyis sems ma rangs kyang krid la ma gtogs pa la bya/_mur zhes pa'i bar du ni shAkya dang me lha [#]ral pa can gnyis ma gtogs par mur 'dug gzhan thams cad rab tu dbyung ba
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]dang rab tu rdzogs par mi bya ste/_dbyung du rung mi rung gi bye brag ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/krid ces de dag la mur 'dug dang ma rangs ba la sogs [#]pa mur 'dug gi bar du ma gtogs/_krid ces pa ni bar chad med dam zhes dri ste [#]bar chad yod na mi rung zhes bya ba'i tshig go_/de
[\[12b.2\]]zhes pa nas gtogs zhes pa'i bar du ni sU tra gnyis kyi ltag nas mur [#]'dug ces byung ba dang sU tra ltag [#]ma sems ma rangs pa shAkya dang me lha [#]ral pa can ma gtogs par mur 'dug rnams sems ma rangs kyang rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par byar mi rung ba nyid ma yin
[\[12b.3\]]te[#]/_sems [#]rangs na ni mur 'dug thams cad kyang rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par [#]rung ste/_rangs par bya ba'i thabs dang rangs ma rangs kyi tshad ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/dkon mchog bsngags mur 'dug smad par yang dag par smra ste ma 'khrugs na sems rangs pa'o/_/
[\[12b.4\]]dkon mchog bsngags zhes pa ni sangs rgyas ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis bstod pa'o/_/chos ni dus gsum gyi dge ba dang 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyis bstod pa/_dge 'dun ni gang zag gi rim pa bdun gyis bstod do bstod pa'i tshig ni yon tan ji bzhin du'o/_/[#]mur zhes pa
[\[12b.5\]]nas 'o zhes pa'i bar du ni mur 'dug smad pa ni skra 'bal ba dang khyi'i chos su nyal ba dang [#]mtshon gyi khar 'chi ba dang gcer bur 'greng [#]zhing zan za ba la sogs pa mi bde zhing bzang ba la bde ba dang bzang du 'dzin pa kho na de dag gi chos ci bzhin par drang por smad de 'dzum dang mdangs bzang
[\[12b.6\]]zhing sems ma 'khrugs te dkon mchog bzang ngo zhes zer na rangs par chud do/_/'khrugs shing ngom [#]zum nag la mur 'dug gi chos kyang ngan pa tsam ma yin zhes zer na sems ma rangs pa'o/_/de'i phyir de dang mi ldan pa dge bsnyen gyis [#]mthar bya ste zla ba bzhir zhog shig_/
[\[12b.7\]]mur 'dug rab tu dbyung ba'i phyir sems rangs pa dang mi ldan na thal byung mi bskrad par khrims lnga phog ste zla ba bzhi'i bar du dge 'dun gyi 'dab la bzhag la dge 'dun kun gyis snga phyir res kyis dus gsum du dkon mchog bstod mur 'dug smad par bya'o/_/zla ba bzhi [#]tshun
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]chad rangs ma thag tu bcug kyang nyes med rangs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zla ba bzhir bzhag kyang nyes med/_dge 'dun gyis gnas par las kyis sbyin cig_/dge 'dun gyi 'dab la zla ba bzhir dge bsnyen du bzhag pa dge slong cig gis dge 'dun la
[\[13a.2\]]gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byed de bzhag_/dge 'dun las de'i zas zla ba bzhi'i bar du mur 'dug brtags [#]par bzhag pa de dge 'dun gyis ni zan sbyin no/_/mkhan po las gos [#]mur 'dug pa [#]ma rangs pa de mkhan po gang las rab tu 'byung ba'i mkhan po des gos sbyin no/_/
[\[13a.3\]]las byin pa yang bya/_lo bco lnga rdzogs sam zhes rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir 'ongs pa la dri/_la la zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs na/_khyod lo bco lnga lon nam zhes mkhan po gang yin pas dri'o[#]/_/bco lnga lon kyang bya rog skrod mi nus na mi gnang ngo /_/nyung ste [#]bya rog skrod mi
[\[13a.4\]]nus pa dang nus kyang lo bdun ma lon par rab tu mi dbyung /_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa de lo bco lngar ma lon pa de [#]bya rog skrod mi nus pa dang nus kyang lo bdun ma lon na rab tu mi dbyung [#]/_dge sbyong gcig las lhag par mi gzhag_/mkhan po gcig la dge sbyong gcig las mang
[\[13a.5\]]du gnas bcar mi gzhug_/gcig tu ma yin par rab tu 'byung bar mi 'dod na mang du phyung ste mang ba bsnyen par [#]rdzogs shing /_mi gcig gnyis yan chad gcig rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs te dus gcig tu mkhan po gcig la mi 'jug tu mi rung zhes zer na kun rab tu phyung ste lo nyi shur
[\[13a.6\]]tshang ba'i rnams bsnyen par rdzogs par bya/_de ste ma tshang na gzhan la nye gnas kyi phyir gtong cig_/lhag [#]ma ltar rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa kun lo nyi shur ma tshang na dge slong [#]re re la nye gnas su thong shig_/de'i sa de ma [#]dbrog_/nye gnas su gtad pa'i [#]slob dpon des dge sbyong
[\[13a.7\]]bzhag pa thal byung bdag gi slob mar mi dbrog_/bsnyen par rdzogs par mi ster [#]na mthus khug shig_/dge sbyong lo ma tshangs ste nye gnas su btang ba de lo tshang ste mkhan po gang yin pas khrims rdzogs par byas pa [#]la nye gnas kyi slob dpon mi ster na mkhan pos de mthus phrogs shig krid
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bran/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_khyod bran ma yin nam zhes dris te jo bos ma btang ba lta bu bran yin na rab tu mi dbyung /_khyod kyis gang la yang cung zad sbyin pa mang yang rung nyung yang rung med dam/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_khyod la bu lon chags pa med dam zhes dris te bu lon chags pa med na rab
[\[13b.2\]]tu dbyung chags pa yod kyang srang grangs nyung la/_phyis 'bul bar khas len cing phyir 'khor [#]ba tsam gyi tshod na rab tu dbyung /_pha 'tsho la ma gnang ste de dag gi yul mi ring na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de zhag bdun du 'chol shig_/rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa de pha ma gnyis
[\[13b.3\]]ka'ang ma shi ste yod la rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba'i cha'ang med la pha ma'i yul kyang mi ring na 'dri zhing rmed pa yod dam mi 'ong brtag pa'i phyir zhag bdun du bsdad de ma 'ongs na rab tu dbyung yul ring ba'i tshad ni pha mas dgug par nyams kyis mi lcogs shing mthus mi khugs pa tsam la
[\[13b.4\]]bya'o/_/yul ring yang dge 'dun la ma gsol bar rab tu mi dbyung /_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa de pha ma dag yul ring du zin kyang dge 'dun la ma zhus par rab tu mi dbyung /_rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de dge 'dun gyis zas sbyin pa'i rigs so/_/rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs
[\[13b.5\]]te 'dri ba 'ong ngam mi 'ong zhag bdun du brtag pa'i phyir bzhag pa de rab tu ma byung gi bar du dge 'dun gyis zas sbyin pa'i rigs so/_/zan ma byin yang nyes pa ni med/_krid pha ma dag gis gnang ngam/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la pha ma dag gis gnang ngam zhes dri ste[#]/_ma
[\[13b.6\]]gnang na rab tu mi dbyung [#]/_mthar yul ring po ni ma gtogs/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs ba de'i pha ma yul ring po ni pha ma la dri mi dgos/_khyod nad can ma yin nam zhes 'ongs pa la dri/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la mkhan po gang yin pas khyod nad can ma yin nam zhes dris te
[\[13b.7\]]nad can yin na rab tu mi dbyung /_khyod la nad cung zad kyang med dam zhes kyang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar nad can ma yin nam zhes dris te ma yin zhes zer na brtag par bya ba'i phyir nad cung zad kyang med dam zhes dri ba [#]la bya/_sU tra ltag ma dang 'di gnyis ni rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe mkhan pos
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dri ba la bya/_bye brag tu rab tu rdzogs pas so/_/khrims rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe rdzogs par byed pa'i dge 'dun gyis nad kyi rnam pa mang po'i bar chad dri dgos pa la bya/_nad can rab tu dbyung ba 'am bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_rab tu 'byung bar
[\[14a.2\]]'ongs pa de la nad rnam pa [#]mang po'i bar chad gang yod kyang rung ste/_mkhan po dang dge 'dun gyis rab tu 'byung [#]ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya 'di yan chad mi rung ngo [#]zhes 'byung ba la rab tu phyung na khrims ni 'chags pa ste mkhan po dang dge 'dun nyes byas/_krid smad
[\[14a.3\]]pa tshun chad do/_/'di man chad 'og smad ces 'byung ba yan chad ni rab tu phyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa byas na khrims kyang mi 'chags la mkhan po dang dge 'dun la yang nyes byas yod do/_/'di la chos kyi skye ba med do/_/'og nas 'byung ba 'di rnams lta bu zhig yin [#]zhing
[\[14a.4\]]ma yin te khrims mi 'chags pas rab tu dbyung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_rnam pa 'di lta bu'i tshul la ni mi rung bar bya/_'og nas 'byung ba 'di rnams lta bu zhig yod pa las ma chor te rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par bya [#]na'ang khrims mi 'chags pa
[\[14a.5\]]yin pas dge bsnyen dang dge slong dbyung ngo /_/'phrul pa 'phrul pa ma yin nam zhes dri [#]'phrul pa ni bdag kyang gzhan du 'phrul nus la/_gzhan yang sprul nus pa ste/_'phrul snyems pa'i phyir nga rgyal che bas khrims mi 'chags ma ni[#]/_ma ning ma yin nam zhes dris te yin na
[\[14a.6\]]rab tu mi dbyung /_'di la rnam [#]lnga/_ma ning la rnam lnga yod de 'og nas bshad pa yin/_skyes pa nas dang zla ba phyed pa dang reg nas 'gyur ba dang phrag dog dang nyes byung ba dang ngo /_/skyes pa nas dang zhes pa ni thog ma ma'i mngal tshun [#]chad thal byung ma ning du 'dug pa la bya/_zla ba
[\[14a.7\]]phyed dang zhes pa ni zla ba phyed la pho mtshan du gyur te pho'i 'dod chags 'byung zla ba phyed la mo mtshan du gyur te mo'i 'dod chags 'byung ba'o/_/reg gnas 'gyur ba dang zhes pa ni bud med dang mthang phrad pas 'dod chags 'byung gi nam ma phrad kyi bar du 'dod chags mi 'byung /_phrag
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dog dang zhes pa ni pha rol mi tshangs par spyod pa mthong na gdod 'dod chags 'byung gi/_ma mthong gi bar du mi 'byung ngo /_/nyes [#]byung ba dang ngo zhes pa ni pho mtshan bcad dam nad byung ste rul ba lta bus med par song ba la bya ste ma ning 'di rnam lnga'o/_/tha ma 'di'i nyes byed
[\[14b.2\]]na mi rung bar bya/_ma ning rnam lnga tha ma bshad pa pho mtshan med par 'gyur na ma ning ngo zhes bya ba ni pho mtshan chad nas mo'i 'dod chags byung na khrims phog kyang mi 'chags [#]sngon khrims chags pa yang med par gyur to/_/rkun gnas[#]/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_rkun
[\[14b.3\]]gnas ma yin zhes dri[#]/_rkun gnas nyid ji lta bu [#]yin pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_yin na khrims mi 'chags [#]te dbyung /_yo byad ma byas pa dang rab tu rdzogs par ma chags par shes la/_lan gnyis su dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu las byas na der ro/_/yo byad ma byas pa ni
[\[14b.4\]]rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshe dge 'dun grangs ma tshang ba lo nyi shu ma lon pa mkhan po yon tan dang mi ldan par shes pa dang [#]lhung bzed dang chos gos ma tshang ba dang gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las ma byas pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ste khrims rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe 'di lta bu zhig ma byas
[\[14b.5\]]par dran te/_khrims ma chags par bdag gis shes bzhin du bcabs te ma mthol bar dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu las brgya rtsa gcig las gang yang rung lan gnyis su byas na rkun gnas su gyur/_rkun gnas su 'gyur ba ni khrims ma chags la/_dge slong gi tshul
[\[14b.6\]]dang spyod pa dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad la sogs pa mi dbang bar khrims ma chags pas bcabs te spyad pas rkun gnas su 'gyur ro/_/'di lta bu'ang rab tu mi 'byung /_mur 'dug tu 'dug pa rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_mur 'dug pa ma yin nam zhes mkhan po dang rab tu
[\[14b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun gyis kyang dris la yin na khrims mi 'chags/_khrims rdzogs pa las mur 'dug tu 'jug na'ang /_khrims med par gyur te 'og nas 'chad/_'di rab tu byung ba blangs nas de'i lta bas 'di'i chos gos bor de'i tshul gyis der skya rengs [#]byung na
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]der ro [#]zhes pa nas nam zhes pa'i bar du ni shAkya thub pa'i rjes su dge sbyong gi tshul blangs te bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bya/_'di'i lta bas zhes pa ni mur 'dug gi chos dgu bcu rtsa drug gang yang rung ste lta ba la bya/_'di'i chos gos bor na [#]zhes pa ni dge
[\[15a.2\]]slong gi tshul gyis [#]chos gos bor ba la bya/_de'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni mur 'dug dgu bcu rtsa drug gang yang rung ste thal bas byug pa'am skud pa thogs pa lta bu la bya/_der skya rengs byung na der ro zhes pa ni mur 'dug gi gnas su zhag lon te skya rengs byung na bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[15a.3\]]pa'i khrims med par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ma byas kyang ji ltar rkun po bzhin na yang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar dge slong gi tshul bor nas mur 'dug gi lta ba blangs te mur 'dug gi gnas su zhag ma lon du zin kyang sems mur 'dug gi chos la bltas shing dmigs na rkun gnas
[\[15a.4\]]dang 'dra bar dge 'dun dang las lan gnyis su byas na khrims med par gyur pa yin te/_'di lta bu yang rab tu mi dbyung [#]/_ma bsad pa/_pha bsad pa/_rab tu byung [#]bar 'ongs pa la pha dang ma bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri[#]/_yin na khrims mi 'chags pha ma ni byol song yin
[\[15a.5\]]pha bsad pa la mi bya'i mi'i yin pa bsad pa la bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa bsad pa/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yin nam zhes kyang dris la yin na khrims mi 'chags/_dgra bcom pa ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa la bya ste lhag ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsad pa lta bu la
[\[15a.6\]]bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la dge 'dun bye ba ma yin nam zhes dri ste yin na khrims mi 'chags/_dbyen ni sngon dge slong bya ste 'khor lo'i dbyen byas pa lta bu la bya/_yang dag par gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung
[\[15a.7\]]ba/_rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_yang dag par gshegs pa la ngan [#]sems kyis khrag byung [#]ba ma yin nam zhes dris te yin na khrims mi 'chags/_khrag phyung ba ni shAkya thub pa sprul pa'i gzugs la/_de ba t+ta'i [#]ngan sems kyis rdo 'phangs te khrag phyung ba la bya/_dge
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]slong ma bslus pa/_dge slong ma bslus pa ma yin nam zhes dri ste yin na khrims mi 'chags/_bslus pa ni dge slong ma pham pa ma yin pa la mi tshangs par spyod pas chud do/_/phas pham pa bzhi las [#]gang yang rung ltung ba byung ba'o/_/rab tu 'byung bar 'ongs pa la/_
[\[15b.2\]]phas pham pa ma yin nam zhes dris la pham pa ni sngon dge slong byas la de'i tshe mi tshangs par spyod pa dang rku ba dang gsod pa dang brdzun du smra ba bzhi gang yang rung ba byas pa'o/_/sU tra 'di yan chad lta bu zhig yod na khrims yang [#]mi 'chags/_khrims rdzogs zin pa
[\[15b.3\]]las byung na yang khrims med par song bas bskrad do/_/mtshan ma [#]las bzlog par khas ma blangs pa'i smad pa rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_sngon dge sbyong dang dge slong chad pas bcad pa'i chad [#]pas ma phod de thal byung khrims phul ba zhig slar dge
[\[15b.4\]]sbyong dang [#]dge slong du 'jug ste/_sngon gyi nyes pa gtong ngo zhes mi zer na dge sbyong dang dge slong du mi gzhug_/nyes pa byung nas chad pas bcad pa ni rnam par bdun yod pa las gang yang rung ngo /_bdun ni rtag par thab mo rgol ba [#]dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chad pa mthol
[\[15b.5\]]tshangs byed du mi btub pa dang rigs sun par byed pa dang khyim pa dge bsnyen dge ba spyod pa la log par spyod ces gshe ba dang ltung ba byed pa [#]mthong ngo zhes zer ba dang /_ltung ba byas pa mthol du mi btub pa dang /_phas pham la sogs pa byung yang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur
[\[15b.6\]]ro zhes zer ba dang /_'di bdun byed pa las chad pas bcad pa gang yang rung ngo /_/bshags pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pas so/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par 'ongs pa de/_sngon gyi nyes pa 'dor ro zhes zer na sngon gyi nyes pa'i chad pa dang dbyung ba
[\[15b.7\]]ni khrims rdzogs pa'i las kyi nang du 'dus bas bcad pa dang dbyung ba bya [#]mi dgos so/_/sngon nyes pa byas shing chad pas bcad pa'i dge 'dun nyid la sngon gyi nyes pa mi bya'o zhes 'chags pa dang khrims rdzogs par mi byar mi rung ba ma yin gyi gang gis byas kyang rung ste nyes med
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]do/_/bsnyen par rdzogs te khas ma [#]blangs na yang de ste dge 'dun mdun [#]na smod cig_/sU tra ltag ma ltar rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par 'ongs te sngon gyi nyes pa 'dor ro zhes khas blangs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs par byas zin pa dang /_sngon
[\[16a.2\]]gyi nyes pa mi 'dor [#]zhing khas mi len na yang dge 'dun gyi chad pas chod [#]la smod cig_/chad pa byed du mi btub na sngon gyi bzhin du skrod cig_/ma mthong ngo zhes zer zhing brdzun du na ltung ba'o/_/[#]sU tra ltag ma dag gis [#]nyes pa byas pa ma mthong zhes zer zhing bcabs pa ni brdzun gyi
[\[16a.3\]]ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pa ltag ma bzhin du bya'o/_/sU tra 'og ma 'di man chad ni ming gis smra ba bzhin du ma yin nam zhes dris te yin na rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par mi bya/_khrims ni 'chags te mkhan po dang dge 'dun la nyes byas/_lag rdum rkang rdum lag pa
[\[16a.4\]]mkhrig [#]mar chad pa dang /_rkang pa long [#]bur chad pa/_lag sor rengs [#]pa/_dgug cing brkyang du mi rung ba/_mchu med pa ya mchu dang ma mchu bcad pa'am med pa lta bu/_yan lag ri mo can/_sha bkra dang tsags [#]pa'i ri mo can/_rgan rabs/_lo bdun cu lon pa yan chad la
[\[16a.5\]]bya ste/_bdun cu lon kyang sngon dge bsnyen byed byed la mdo sde dang ma lta bu shes pa ni rung ngo /_/gzhon rabs lo bco lnga man chad bdun yan chad bya rog skrod mi nus pa la bya/_grum po/_grum zhing zhig legs byed pa'o/_/brla rlung nad can brla dang rked pa la sogs
[\[16a.6\]]pa la rlung zhugs te skam [#]pa 'ang zhum pa lta bu nang yod pa/_zhar ba mig ya gcig zhar ba/_'jas pa rkang lag 'jas nas 'jas pa'i tshigs [#]nas sor mo skyes pa'o/_/sgur po 'greng mi nus par sgur ba la bya/_mi'u thung ngo /_/lus thud bar grags pa'o/_/lba ba can
[\[16a.7\]]lkog ma na lba ba chen po yod pa la bya/_lkugs pa smra mi shes pa/_'on pa rna bas mi thos pa'o/_/'phye'o/_/rkang lag 'khums nas 'phye zhing [#]'gro ba'o/_/rkang bam [#]gzhan las 'phags par sbom por gyur pa'o/_/bud med kyis [#]dub pa/_mi tshangs pa [#]spyod spyod pa las
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]chad pa la bya/_khur gyis dub pa/_khur chen po khyer khyer bas chad cing dub pa'o/_/lam gyis dub pa/_lam ring por song song nas lam gyis chad cing dub pa lta bu'i mi dang /_ltag [#]ma rnams yod pa'i mi la bya/_mi 'ju thal byung dang /_kha zas mi 'ju ba [#]dang /_lcags
[\[16b.2\]]su bcug pa las yun rings pas [#]thal byung de 'dra bar song ba dang rkang lag bskum du mi rung [#]bar song ba la bya/_rnge chags pa nad dang kha zas la sogs pas rnge chags te[#]/_spyod mi nus shing gso dka' ba lta bu la bya/_de lta bu'i gzugs kyi mi ni/_ltag ma ltar ming
[\[16b.3\]]gis smos pa lta bu'i gzugs kyi mi la bya/_rab tu spangs so/_/rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya bar spangs pa [#]la bya/_drang srong chen pos/_mur 'dug la sogs pa'i drang srong ma yin gyi/_drang srong chen po ste sangs rgyas la bya/_mdzes pa rab tu
[\[16b.4\]]dbyung /_lus kyi yan lag la skyon med pa ni mdzes pa ste rab tu dbyung ngo /_/kun gtsang bsnyen par rdzogs/_rigs gtsang ba ste rigs ngan ma yin pa dang mtshams med pa la sogs pa bar chad du 'gyur ba'i chos med pas ni [#]tshul khrims gtsang zhes bya'o/_/gsungs
[\[16b.5\]]so bden ming gyis[#]/_bden ming ni mtshan sangs rgyas mi brdzun pas na bden zhes bya ste des gsungs pa'o/_/yang dag sangs rgyas rab mkhyen gyis/_/dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas la mi bya'o[#]/_/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas pas na yang dag rab mkhyen ces
[\[16b.6\]]bya'o/_/bsdu bar gtogs dang rab tu 'byung dang dngos po rdzogs so/_/bsdu bar gtogs pa dang zhes pa ni khrims mi 'chags pa'i bar chad dang lus kyi skyon yod pa rnams ni mi rung med pa rnams ni rung bar bsdu bar [#]bya'o/_/rab tu zhes pa [#]nas so zhes pa'i bar du ni 'og nas
[\[16b.7\]]'byung ba ming gis smos pa bzhin [#]ma yin nam zhes dri ste [#]yin na rab tu mi dbyung krid rgyal po blon po rgyal pos ma gnang ngam yul mi ring na'o/_/rgyal po'i sa rigs su gtogs [#]pa'i nang na blon po'i las sna ma gtogs pa rgyal pos ma gnang par rab tu mi dbyung ste rgyal po'i
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]blon po ma yin nam zhes dri/_rgyal po khams gzhan gyi slob dpon [#]dang yul ring ba ni ma gtogs te dri mi dgos/_krid rkun po'i rgyal mtshan btsugs pa/_rab tu byung [#]ba la rkun po'i rgyal mtshan btsugs pa ma yin nam zhes dri/_rkun po'i rgyal
[\[17a.2\]]mtshan btsugs pa ni grong 'joms pa dang mi rgod byed pa la sogs pa rku bar grags pa'o/_/mnyed pa phyag dar ba sme sha [#]can dang de lta bu rab tu mi dbyung /_mnyed pa zhes pa ni rigs kyis ko lpags la sogs pa mnyed cing tshem drub [#]byed pa'o/_/phyag dar ba zhes pa ni
[\[17a.3\]]rigs kyis phyi rol chu [#]che chung la sogs pa'i phyag dar ro cog byed pa'o/_/sme sha can dang zhes pa ni rigs kyis ba lang dang bya dang sdig bur dang spal lcong la sogs pa 'cha' zhing za ba'o/_/de lta bu rab tu mi dbyung zhes pa ni rigs 'di rnams lta bu ma yin nam zhes rab tu
[\[17a.4\]]'byung bar 'ongs pa la dri ste yin na [#]rab tu mi dbyung /_dpe ni lag rdum la sogs pa'o/_/rtag [#]tu lag rdum la sogs pa bcug na nyes byas so zhes 'byung ba bzhin du ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu zhig las rab tu byung na dge 'dun dang mkhan po la nyes byas/_skra ser
[\[17a.5\]]po seng ge'i [#]skra sngon po dang de lta bu yang ngo /_/skra ser po zhes pa ni skra yung gi kha dog 'dra ba/_seng ge [#]skra dang zhes pa ni seng ge [#]skra 'khyil ba/_skra zhes pa nas ngo zhes pa'i bar ni shing lo'i kha dog 'dra ba/_skra dkar po'i mi dang bal glang [#]gi skra skra med kyang ngo /_/skra dkar po'i mi dang zhes pa
[\[17a.6\]]ni thog ma ma'i mngal nas dkar ba/_ba lang gi skra zhes pa ni srab la bshor ba/_skra med pa [#]kyang ngo zhes pa ni dang po nas byi ba ste ku ba 'dra ba/_mgo shang shong can/_'bar 'bur can/_mgo bo che/_lus kyi rkyen du ma bab par 'phags par che ba/_rab tu sbom pa/_lus gzhan las 'phags par sbom pa
[\[17a.7\]]dang /_zhum pa[#]/_gzhan las 'phags pa'i [#]zhum pa'i lus so/_/bong bu dang phag gi mgo_/de dngos su mjal [#]par bas/_mgo gnyis dang /_mgo gnyis su gyes shing bye ba'o/_/mgo med kyang ngo /_/'phral [#]ba yan chad 'phur re 'dug par mnyam par 'dug pa'o/_/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bal glang [#]rna dang rta rna dang ba dang spre'u rna dang bong bu dang /_phag gi rna ba dang /_rna gcig rna med kyang ngo /_/rna ba dang [#]'di rnams lta bur 'dug pa ma yin nam zhes dri ste yin na rab tu mi dbyung /_mig dmar po/_/mig gi 'bras bu khrag gis yog [#]pa lta bu ste mig dmar
[\[17b.2\]]por 'dug pa'o/_/mig po che dang /_lus kyi rkyen du ma bab par che ba/_mig chung zlum bu [#]'ug mig mching bu'i mig chu bur 'dra ba/_mig gcig pa mig med kyang ngo /_/bal glang [#]gi sna rta'i sna ba lad dang spre'u'i sna bong bu dang phag gi sna sna gcig pa sna med pa yang ngo /_/
[\[17b.3\]]sna 'di rnams ltar 'dug pa las rab tu mi dbyung /_bal glang gi kosko rta'i ko sko [#]ba lang dang spre'u'i kosko[#]/_/bong bu [#]dang phag gi ko sko/_kosko [#]ya gcig pa ko sko [#]med pa yang ko sko [#]'di rnams ltar 'dug pa las rab tu mi dbyung /_bal glang [#]gi so rta'i so ba lang spre'u'i so/_/
[\[17b.4\]]bong bu dang phag gi so so gcig pa so med pa yang ngo /_/so 'di rnams ltar 'dug pa las rab tu mi dbyung /_so gcig pa ces [#]pa ni so bar med par [#]'dug pa dang gcig pu ke re 'dug pa la bya/_mgrin ring [#]/_lus kyi rkyen du ma bab par mgrin pa ring ba/_mgrin med/_
[\[17b.5\]]mgrin pa ror nub pa/_phrag mig phrag pa gnyis na mig yod pa/_rab tu sgur ba'o/_/gnya' ba rab tu sgur ba pho mtshan chad pa pho mtshan chad pa 'am/_khyis zos pa lta bu/_rlig chen/_rkyen du ma bab par rlig pa che ba/_rlig gcig_/'bras bu gcig yod pa rlig pa [#]med
[\[17b.6\]]pa yang ngo /_/rlig pa med pa/_shin tu ring ba/_lus gzhan las 'phags par ring ba/_shin tu thung ngu /_lus dang rkang lag thams cad thung ngu /_skem po zhan te ma yang ngo /_pags pa'i kha dog rnam bzhi pa/_dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po sngon po bzhi khra bor
[\[17b.7\]]'dug kyang rung 'di bzhi so so'i kha dog tu 'dug kyang rung rab tu mi dbyung /_gyol po gal po'ang de bzhin no/_/'di ltar 'dug pa yang rab tu mi dbyung /_rnam pa 'di rnams lta bu dag kyang spangs par der rtogs shig_/ltag tu smos pa 'di rnams lta bu dbyung ba dang bsnyen
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]par rdzogs par mi rung bar spang ste [#]ltag nas lag rdum mi gnang ba bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/rigs dang lus ngan pa las rab tu byung ba ma 'chang shig_/rigs ngan pa ni sme sha can dang phyag dar pa dang mnyed pa la sogs pa la bya/_lus ngan pa
[\[18a.2\]]ni lag rdum la sogs pa'i cha na yod pa la bya ste/_'di lta bu las rab tu phyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhig yod na mkhan pos kyang mi bcang dge 'dun gyis kyang spong [#]ngo /_/gcig ma yin pa mkhan po gcig dang tshig gcig gis [#]gsum man chad bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[18a.3\]]par rung ngo /_/bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba ni gsol ba dang khrims dbog pa'i tshig mkhan po gcig gis smra [#]la nod pa gsum gyis cig car smra ste bzlas kyang khrims mi 'chags pa ma yin te de ltar dbog tu yang rung ngo /_/dus mnyam pa rnams phan tshun du phyag bya ba med
[\[18a.4\]]do/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar mig [#]gsum dus mnyam par khrims nos pa khrims so sor nos kyang dus snga phyi med pa rnams gcig la gcig phyag mi bya'o/_/thob pa ni snga mas so/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar dus mnyam pa gral dang yon len pa na gang sngar 'ongs pa dang gang byin
[\[18a.5\]]par zad do/_/las ni gang 'phyi bar 'ongs pas bya'o/_/sor gnyis las ring bar dgon pa las skra mi gzhag_/dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa skra sor gnyis las ring du mi gzhag [#]par breg 'breg mkhan dkon pa'i phyir ro/_/de tsam du'ang grong pa la [#]mi gnang /_dgon
[\[18a.6\]]pa'i dge slong gi skra tsam du grong gi gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge slong gis skra mi bzhag ste sor phyed dang gnyis man chad la breg ste 'breg mkhan btsal sla ba'i phyir ro/_/chan pas skra breg tu mi rung /_skra breg pa ni spu gris breg ste chan pas breg tu mi rung /_rma'i
[\[18a.7\]]than [#]kor ni ma gtogs/_mgo la rma yod de spu gris breg tu mi bde na rma'i than [#]kor chan pas breg [#]kyang nyes med do/_/phung mi bya/_skra 'breg pa la [#]phud mi gzhag_/gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu mi breg_/lag pa'i mchan [#]khung spu dang rmongs la sogs pa mi breg_/rma'i phyir
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bya ste gzhan gyis mi 'tsho na shes pa'i gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la zhu/_rmongs dang [#]mchan khung lta bur rma yod de thabs dang sman gzhan gyis mi 'tsho'i/_spu breg [#]na 'tsho na so so'i gnas brtan la dri ste breg_/de'i phyir ma yin na rkang pa'i yang mi breg_/rma yod pa'i
[\[18b.2\]]phyir breg pa ma yin na rkang pa'i spu yang mi breg go_/lus gzhan yang mi bya'o/_/lus kyi spu'ang sU tra ltag ma dang 'dra'o/_/sen mo bcad pa spu gri'i kha'am ste'u'i kha ltar ro/_/sen mo bcad pa'i thabs ni de ltar bcad do/_/sen mo'i kha dog mi bsgyur/_sen mo'i
[\[18b.3\]]kha dog rtsis dmar po'am sngon por mi bsgyur/_dri ma phyi bar ni brud cing spyod cig_/sen mo'i bar na dri ma yod pa brud cing 'phyir dbang ngo /_/gos dang skra kha spu mi breg_/lus la chos gos gyon bzhin du skra dang kha spu mi breg_/'chong shig [#]skra bzed pa/_sgrim [#]por
[\[18b.4\]]breg tu mi rung ste skra bzed pas lus g.yogs te breg[# ]/med na rngul gzan dang ngo /_/skra bzed pa med na rngul gzan gyon te breg [#]kyang nyes med/_bting ba la mi bya/_tswa [#]stan yan chad rkon la sogs pa stan bting ba'i steng du skra mi breg_/gag tu [#]dge 'dun gyis sa
[\[18b.5\]]phyag par mi bya/_dge 'dun 'du ba dang spyod cing las byed pa'i sa gang du yang skra mi breg_/khyams la sogs par rgan nam na'am rlung che'am [#]tsha'am char pa bab na 'breg par ro/_/rkyen 'di rnams lta bu zhig byung na khyims [#]la sogs par breg kyang [#]nyes med/_de'i
[\[18b.6\]]phyogs su las bya/_rkyen byung ste khang pa dang khyams su skra breg [#]pa'i sar phyag dar dang chag chag dang maN+Dal la [#]sogs pa'i las bya'o/_/skra lung khung du dor/_breg [#]pa'i skra ni lung khung du dor ro/_/de bzhin du sen mo bcad pa'o/_/skra breg [#]pa'i cho ga bzhin du sen mo bcad pa
[\[18b.7\]]yang de ltar bya'o/_/dge slong ma 'di ltar ma bsrungs par skyes pas 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa'i [#]skra mi breg_/dge slong ma dgra bcom pa ma yin te 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la 'breg [#]mkhan skyes pa zhig byed na srung [#]ma dge slong ma grogs mo zhig zhog shig_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'breg mkhan 'dod chags che ba zhig na srung [#]ma bzhag kyang mi gnang ngo /_/chags pa lta na srung mas [#]'di skad bsgo shig_/'breg [#]mkhan dang dge slong ma nyid 'dod chags langs te chags [#]pa ltar byed na srung [#]ma grogs mos tshig sU tra 'og ma las 'byung
[\[19a.2\]]ba skad bsgo shig_/dran par mngon par zhog shig_/dge slong ma skra 'breg pa la srung [#]mas dran pa nye bar zhog shig ces bsgo/_dran pa ji ltar gzhag [#]pa ni sU tra 'og ma nas 'chad/_ci 'di rnag gi lus 'di la snying po yod dam zhes so/_/skra 'breg [#]mkhan gyi lus mi gtsang
[\[19a.3\]]ba dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa snying po med pa 'di la chags su ci yod rnag dang 'dra bar ltos shig ces srung [#]mas bsgo/_'breg [#]mkhan chags pa ltar byed na yang tshig 'di bzhin du bzlog ste zhib tu bsgo bar byos shig_/ma dang sring mo dang bu mor 'du shes shig ces 'breg [#]
[\[19a.4\]]pa la'o/_/'breg [#]mkhan chags pa ltar byed na ma dang sring mo dang bu mo yin par soms shig ces srung [#]mas bsgo/_dge slong ma chags pa ltar byed na [#]pha dang ming po dang bur soms shig bsgo[#]/_de byas nas khrus bya/_mgo bregs zin nas gtsang ba'i phyir khrus bya'o/_/zla
[\[19a.5\]]ba phyed cing bkru ba dang dus rnam lnga la yang ma gtogs par 'khrur gnang ngo /_/yan lag lnga bkru/_grang ba'i rkyen byung na yan lag lnga [#]bkrus kyang nyes med lnga ni mgo dang rkang lag bzhi ste lnga'o/_/sgren mor mi bkru/_khrus byed pa'i tshe sgren mor mi bkru'o/_/_dge slong
[\[19a.6\]]ma skyes pa'i ngogs su ma yin/_skyes pa'i khrus sa mi mang por 'du bar [#]dge slong mas khrus mi bya/_bud med kyi ngogs su phye mas ma yin/_bud med kyi khrus sar khrur ni dbang ste phye ma bul tog dang sran phye la sogs pas 'khrur [#]mi dbang ste dril cing mnyes na 'dod chags
[\[19a.7\]]ldang [#]ba'i phyir ro/_/sran phye la sogs par bsung gis spags pa'ang brtags pa'o/_/dge slong pha khrus byed pa la ni sran phye [#]bu la tog la sogs pa bsung [#]gis sbags pa'i yang dbang ngo /_/bsung gis spags pa bdag nyid 'dod pa'i phyir sbyar ro/_/de len pa
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]yang ngo /_/phye ma dang phye ma bsung [#]gis spags pa gzhan gyis byin na len du dbang ngo /_/sman gyis spags pa ni nad pa la'o/_/phye ma sman dang bsres pa ni bdag gis sbyar kyang rung gzhan gyis byin kyang rung /_spyod pa dang /_len pa [#]par nad pa dbang
[\[19b.2\]]ngo /_/dge slong mas bud med la phyes mi gtor/_dge slong ma sbom mo mtha' yas kyis bud med skra bzang mo zhig la mgo la phyes gtor ba las mo [#]mi dga' bar gyur te kha phyar [#]btang ba las bcas/_sham thabs kyi kha mdud [#]rgyab ma mdud par skas la mi 'dzeg
[\[19b.3\]]sham thabs kyi kha mdud pa ma bor bar skas 'og nas bltar snang ba la mi 'dzeg [#]skas dang sa skas dang [#]gru skas 'og nas bltar mi snang ba la 'dzeg [#]kyang nyes med/_shing mi gang tsam la 'dzeg cing 'bab [#]pa'i tshe'ang mdud pa dor ro/_/gzhan du de lta ma yin no/_/skas la mi
[\[19b.4\]]'dzeg pa'i spyod lam gzhan du ni sham thabs kyi kha mdud pa dor mi dgos so/_/kham bkab par mi gla la/_glal [#]byung na kha dgab[#]/_sbrid pa'am [#]'bod pa la sogs pa'i tshe yang dgab/_chong shing [#]khrus ras/_sgren mor mi bkru ba'i phyir khrus ras bcangs kyang nyes
[\[19b.5\]]med/_nyi rim la srog [#]chags 'chags so/_/khrus ras lhan pa can dang nyi rim la srog chags 'chags pa'i phyir mi bya/_chos gos gsum pas kyang ngo /_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan pas khrus ras bcangs kyang nyes med/_med na lo mas mdun dang rgyab gnyis g.yogs
[\[19b.6\]]la dben par khrus shig khrus ras med na shing lo la sogs pa btogs zin pa tsam [#]ste/_mdun dang rgyab g.yogs la dben par khrus shig_/srog chags chags [#]pa bsal ba'i phyir bshal lo_/khrus ras la srog chags chags [#]pa mi shi bar bya ba'i phyir chur bshal/_
[\[19b.7\]]gtsug lag khang du ni stor [#]khung du'o/_/gtsug lag khang du khrus byed na stor [#]khung du'o/_/khu ba dag kyang dor ro/_/snod spyad bkrus pa la sogs pa'i khu ba'ang stor [#]khung du dor ro/_/_khrus bya khrus bya ba'i phyir[#]/_gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du khrus byas kyang nyes med/_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]pha gu yang [#]gding /_khrus sa'i [#]gzhir pha gu gding ba ni 'dam mi ldang ba'i phyir ro/_/stor [#]khung gdong /_khrus stor [#]chu mi 'khyil ba'i phyir stor [#]khung gdod/_'bags pa yang bkru/_snod spyad dang khrus sa'i [#]gzhi dri ma dag gis 'bags pa yang bkru
[\[20a.2\]]stor [#]khung du bkrus na mi 'chags so/_/stor [#]khung gi khar bkrus na gzar zhing dri ma mi 'chags pa'i phyir stor [#]khung du bkru bar bshad/_pha gus [#]rkang pa las gzhan lus ngag la mi brud mi phyi/_long bu man chad rkang pa'i dri ma phyi zhing bkru bar ni so phag gis brud kyang nyes med/_
[\[20a.3\]]gzhan lus dag la so phag gis mi brud mi phyi'o/_/de ni dpe ste rnon [#]po la sogs pa zes pa yang ngo /_/phag dum gyis [#]lus mi brud pa [#]mi phyi ba bzhin du sa mu tra'i dbu ba la sogs pa gzhan rtsub cing rnon po ci yang rung ste/_da skye ba dang sha snad [#]pa dang sems drog drog [#]por 'gyur
[\[20a.4\]]ba'i phyir mi brud do/_/nya phyis bkru ba ni mes so/_/nya phyis kyis lus brud pa ni nyes med do/_/nya phyis kyis [#]lus kyi dri ma dang gzhan snum chags pa la sogs pa [#]bkru ba ni me la bsros te phyis na dag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma ni gang du'ang khu tshur dang gos dril ba la sogs
[\[20a.5\]]pa cis kyang mi brud/_dge slong ma ni 'dod chags skye ba'i phyir 'di ltar ming gis smos pa la sogs pa cis kyang mi brud mi phyi ba ni lus kyi yan lag la'o/_/'gyur ba'i chu med par ma gyur par gos mi bgo_/khrus byas nas lus la chu phrum phrum po gos ma rung bar 'gyur
[\[20a.6\]]ba med par ma gyur gyi bar du gos mi bgo_/chongs shig lus phyi ba sU tra ltag ma lta bu lus kyi chu byed par bya ba'i phyir [#]lus phyi ba bcangs kyang nyes med/_med na skad cig tsog tsog por 'dug pa la khrus ras kyis [#]phyi/_lus phyi ba med na skad cig tsog tsog por [#]'dug ste/_khrus
[\[20a.7\]]ras phyed gcu [#]ste lus phyi phyed kyis mdoms kyang g.yogs dgos bya'o/_/bsro gang nang gi [#]cho ga bya ba'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du bsro gang [#]byas kyang nyes med de ji ltar bya ba 'og nas 'chad/_khang zlum bya ba skam sar dge/_/bsro gang ni khang zlum la skam sar
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]brtsigs na dge'o/_/phyi rub nang yangs rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i [#]skar khung dbus su gdod bsro gang gi skar khung ni [#]phyi rol rub la nang kha [#]yangs su bya ste nang yangs pa gzhol [#]por bya ba ni mtsho'i mu dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/skar khung shar du sgo 'phar can la/_zung dang gzer
[\[20b.2\]]gtan [#]dang rked gtan las der gzhug_/skar khung gi rkyen 'di rnams bca' ba ni bsro gang gi'o/_/ra rkang can gyi dbyig pa bcang /_/skar khung gi sgo dbye ba dang gcad [#]pa'i phyir dbyig pa'i mgo ra'i rkang pa 'dra bar byas bcangs kyang nyes med/_sgo re bzhi dang sgo leb dang
[\[20b.3\]]yang mig dang lag zungs bca'/_bsro gang gi sgo'i rkyen 'di rnams kyang bcang [#]bar bya/_chu dron gzhag pa'i phyir nang rim stegs bu'i phreng ba [#]bya/_bsro gang gi nang du chu dang snod spyad la sogs pa gzhag pa'i phyir stegs bu rtsig drung thog dag tu bar chad tsan du bya/_me bud
[\[20b.4\]]pa'i gnas kyi sar pha [#]gu gding /_bsro gang gi nang du me bud pa'i [#]gzhir pha gu yang gding [#]/_me mi 'chi bar g.yogs [#]bsro gang gi me bsror [#]'ong ba'i phyir me mi 'chi bar g.yogs/_de'i phyir [#]lcags kyi thal phyags bcang /_me g.yogs [#]pa'i phyir lcags kyi thal phyags
[\[20b.5\]]bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/me 'bar bzhin du 'jug pa myos pa'i phyir spang /_bsro gang du me bus pa'i me dbal gyis myos par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'bar ba ma zhi ba'i bar du nang du mi 'jug_/me dbal mi 'byung ba'i phyir phye dang yungs mar tsha ba gnyis bsres te mer gdab/_me
[\[20b.6\]]dbal med par bya ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar bya'o/_/dri mi zhim pa med par bya ba'i phyir bog blugs[#]/_sU tra ltag ma ltar byas na dri mi zhim pa med par bya ba'i phyir spos blugs te zhim par [#]bya/_ngar zan bcang bas [#]mig zag pa brtag_/bsro ba'i tshe rdul dang snum [#]la sogs pa mig
[\[20b.7\]]tu zag na ngar zan gyis mi [#]brtag_/skyu ru ra'i 'bras bus kyang ngo /_/mig zag pa brtag pa shing tog a ma la'i chang bus brtag [#]kyang rung ngo /_/der rtswa bam gyi stan to/_/bsro [#]gang gi nang du rtswa bam gyi stan gding /_sa la rtswa gsher pa gding ste rlon pa'am [#]spangs pas so/_/
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]bsro gang gi nang gi 'og gzhir rtswa gding ste me mi mched pa dang lus la mi 'jug pa'i phyir rtswa gsher ba skams na spangs te [#]gding /_g.ya' ba'i phyir lcags kyi g.ya' phrug [#]bya/_bsro gang na sman gyi chog byed pa'i tshe/_lus la g.ya' ba phrug [#]
[\[21a.2\]]pa'i phyir lcags kyi g.ya' phrug [#]bya ste bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/mi gur tha gus thogs shig_/lcags kyi g.ya' phrug gi yu ba'i spu [#]gur la gzungs kyi tha gu gdags/_gtsug lag khang skyong gis dben par zhog shig_/lcags kyi g.ya' phrug [#]gtsug lag khang skyong
[\[21a.3\]]gis ma stor [#]bar dben par gzhag_/bkru ba sbyor [#]ba'i phyir 'di med brtag par gyis shig_/lcags kyi g.ya' phrug [#]snum dang rdul dang dri ma la sogs pa bkru ba'i phyir mer bsreg_/der mi bkru'o/_/bsro gang du khrus mi bya/_gnas de'i phyir bya'o/_/bsro gang du khrus
[\[21a.4\]]mi bya bas na khrus sa gud du bya ste ci ltar bya ba'i thabs 'og nas 'chad/_'khru ba'i gos ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir pha [#]gus bskor ba'i shong bu bya/_'khru ba'i chu ldugs pa'i gos mi gsher ba'i phyir pha [#]gus bskor ba'i shong bu bya ste dbus su mi 'dug tu rung bar bya/_
[\[21a.5\]]der stor [#]khung gdod/_pha gus [#]bskor ba'i shong bu byas pa la chu mi 'khyil ba'i phyir stong [#]khung gdod/_chu tsha na phyi ma rnams la sbron [#]cig_/khrus khang sngar byed pas chu grang dro ji tsam pa phyi ma khrus byed pa rnams la bsgo'o/_/grang mos bsres shing [#]chu tsha na grang mos
[\[21a.6\]]bsres te ran par bya/_'debs pa la sogs pa yang ngo /_/chag chag dang maN+Dal la sogs pa'i chu yang ltag tu bshad pa bzhin du bya/_lci ba dang lci skam dang so shing gyo mo gang bar bzhag_/bsro gang du lci ba gsher ba dang lci skam dang sa 'jam po dang so [#]shing so sor
[\[21a.7\]]gyo mo gang bar bzhag_/bkru ba lus kyi yo byad du spyad pa'i phyir gzhag go_/'on te rmya na snga dro'i zas bya/_bsro gang du nad pa'i cho ga byas pa'i nad pa dang las byed byed pa rnams bkres shing rmya na g.yar tshus [#]zos kyang nyes med/_dbus su 'jug par shom gyis der zhugs
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pas mi shes pa ngo shes pa'i phyir dri/_bsro gang du 'jug pa'i tshe mur 'dug [#]la sogs pa ma dad pa/_bsro gang du 'jug gis ngo mi shes pa rnams la mkhan po gang yin pa dang ci la zhugs pa zhib tu dri/_de'i phyir mi gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong sgo ba gzhag_/bsro gang du
[\[21b.2\]]mur 'dug 'jug tu 'ong ba mi gzhug [#]pa'i phyir dge slong tshul shes sgrin po cig sgo bar gzhag_/ma dad pa der 'jug tu mi gnang ngo /_/dge sbyong man chad mur 'dug yan chad las ma dad pa bsro gang du mi gzhug ste dad pa ni chos dang lus la dad pa dang skad cig dad pa
[\[21b.3\]]tsam ma yin gyi rigs kyi ye nas dad pa la bya'o/_/lhan cig tu spyod pa dang nye gnas kyis de'i las bya'o/_/bsro gang du nad pa'i cho ga byed pa'i g.yog las byed pa ni lhan cig tu spyod pa dang nye gnas kyis bya'o/_/lhan [#]cig tu yod pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon la bya [#]
[\[21b.4\]]nye gnas ni mkhan po dang gzhan gyi slob ma bdag la gnas pa la bya/_gzhon nus zhes gzhan dag gis so/_/lhan cig tu spyod pa dang nye gnas med na bsro gang du cho ga byed pa'i tshe dge slong tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang gzhon pa rnams kyis g.yog las bya'o/_/
