[\[21b.5\]]gnas brtan sha stag tshogs na de'i nang nas gang gzhon pas bya'o/_/bud pa dang /_me dang me mar/_zangs dang /_chu bskol ba dang me mar gyi zangs bu/_yungs mar [#]dang /_lus bsku ba dang me mar gyi mar/_so shing dang lci skam dang sa dang /_so dang lag pa bkru
[\[21b.6\]]bar dgos pa/_phye ma dang /_bul tog gam sran phye la sogs pa/_chu la sogs pa gzhag_/sU tra 'di las 'byung ba dang 'og nas 'byung ba rnams bsro gang du nad g.yog dang las byed pa rnams kyis spog cing [#]las bya'o/_/shing brtag pa dang /_bud pa'i shing dang so
[\[21b.7\]]shing brtag_/dril ba dang /_lus la 'de [#]gus dril ba/_snum dang /_lus la snum gyis bsku/_bkru ba dang /_lus dang snod spyad bkru ba/_phyag pa dang phyag dar/_nyal nyil dor ba la sogs pa'o/_/thal ba dang sa phyags [#]la sogs pa dor ba yang gzhon nu
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]g.yog byed pas bya/_de dag phan tshun du'o/_/mkhan po slob dpon dang rgan rabs rnams bsro gang du cho ga byas zin nas gzhon nu g.yog byed byed pa'i nang nas cho ga byed pa yod na gcig la gcig phan tshun du bya'o/_/khri'u dang /_rtsa bam kyi stan dang
[\[22a.2\]]khri'u dag la bya/_nya phyis bkrus te ji lta bu'i gnas su gzhag_/'di rnams bsro gang du cho ga [#]byas zin nas so so'i gnas/_gnas gar rigs par gzhag go_/snod thams cad kyang tshul de bzhin no/_/yo byad dang snod spyad la sogs pa yang bsro gang gi cho ga zin nas sU tra
[\[22a.3\]]ltag ma bzhin du so so'i gnas gnas su gzhag go_/yo byad thams cad rab tu dben pa dang byi bdar bya'o/_/snod spyad dang yo byad thams cad mi gtor [#]ba'i tshul du bya zhing dben par gzhag pa dang byi bdar bkru ba dang btsem pa dang glan pa la sogs pa gar rigs par gyis
[\[22a.4\]]shig_/der sgra bskyung zhing 'jug_/lus kyi sgra dang kha'i sgra la sogs pa gcom [#]bskyungs te bsro gang du 'jug_/mdzes par ro/_/sngon skyon yod pa la mdzes par byar mi rung gi 'phral du sgo gsum bsdams te 'jug pa la bya/_rab tu bsdams pa'i spyod lam mo/_/spyod
[\[22a.5\]]lam bzhi'i tshul bzhin du bsdams te zon dang bcas par bsro gang du 'jug_/shes bzhin du bya'o/_/me la sa ma yang bya ba dang sgo la mi reg par bya ba la sogs pa dang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ma brjed par dran pa sngon du btang ba la bya/_sro [#]ba'i mdun du mi 'dug_/bsro
[\[22a.6\]]gang na snga na me bsro ba'i mdun du mi 'dug_/blag cher gtang [#]/_khyim pa dang log par spyod pa'i gtam phyal pa mi bya ba dang smra dgos pa'i rnams kyang sgra bskyung ba dang dal bus smra/_bsrings pa'i mi smra ba la dmigs/_bsro gang na 'dug pa'i tshe dge ba'i chos dang bsrings pa'i
[\[22a.7\]]rang bzhin zhi ba'i don la dmigs shing bsam/_mjug tu gsum brgyud [#]mar bklag_/bsro gang gi cho ga zin pa'i mjug tu zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang /_yon bdag dang lha khang gi srung [#]ma dang sems can kun dge bar gyur cig pa dang dkon mchog la bstod
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pa'i bstod pa [#]gcig dang gsum brgyud [#]mar bklags shing 'gro ba'o[#]/_/gos gcig dang las kun mi bya/_las ci [#]byed kyang rung ba char lta bu gcig bu gyon te las mi bya'o/_/bsro gang bya ba man chad 'di yan chad bsro gang gi skabs [#]su bya dgos par bshad mod kyi/_gzhan gang
[\[22b.2\]]du'ang 'di bzhin du spyad cing bya dgos so/_/ma dad pas lus la de dag ma byas shig[# ]/lus la mnye ba dang byug pa [#]dril ba la sogs pa chos dang lus la ma dad pa'i mi byed du mi gzhug 'di dang snga ma la'ang dad pa brtan pa la gsungs so/_/sU tra ltag ma 'di dang gong nas ma dad pa bsro [#]
[\[22b.3\]]gang du mi gzhug zer ba gnyis ma dad pa [#]byed du mi gnang gi dad pa dang brtan pas g.yog gyis shig ces sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs/_seng ge lta bus wa dang 'dra ba lta bu la g.yog mi bya/_tshul khrims dang yon tan dang ldan pa [#]seng ge lta bus tshul khrims ral cing yon tan med
[\[22b.4\]]pa wa lta bu la g.yog mi bya/_shin tu tshul khrims ngan kyang mkhan po dang slob dpon la ni g.yog bya'o/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon ni tshul khrims ngan du zin kyang bdag tshul khrims thob par byed pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pas na g.yog bya dgos so/_/gnas ni mi bca'o
[\[22b.5\]]ma dang pha dang khyim mi nad pa la yang ngo /_/pha ma dang khyim mi nad pa la'ang [#]g.yog bya'o/_/pha ma ni bdag gi lus gsos shing bskyed pa'i drin dang de ltar [#]bskyed pas bdag dge ba'i lus thob pa'i phyir bya khyim mi nad pa la ni snying rje ba'i phyir ro/_/khrus gyir bsogs pa ni bkru bar ro/_/
[\[22b.6\]]bkru ba'i phyir khrus kyi yo byad du bsogs pa dang na ba'i phyir bkru ba'i sman du bsogs pa ni bkru bar brtag [#]pa yin te nyes med de/_'og nas kyang 'chad do/_/rlung 'byin pa rtsa ba dang lo ma dang sdong po dang me tog dang 'bras bu bskol ba des bkru bar bshad do/_/rlung nad la sogs pa
[\[22b.7\]]'byin pa'i sman ni rtsa ba'i cho ga las sman du 'gyur ba dang lo ma dang 'bras bu las sman du 'gyur ro cog bskol bas bkrur rung ngo /_/mi 'khongs pa'i phyir bskus te'o/_/sman gyi khu bas bkrus na sha 'khongs shing rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mar gyis sngar bsku/_'de [#]gus de med par bya/_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]mar gyis bskus pa'i 'og tu 'de [#]gus bskus te dril/_snga ma'i phyir tha ma'i chur snum thigs pa gnyis sam gsum lugs shig_/mar dang lde [#]gus bskus nas sman gyi chus 'khru ba'i tshe sman gyi chu tha ma nas ldugs pa'i nang du sha mi 'khongs pa'i snum
[\[23a.2\]]thigs pa gnyis sam gsum lugs shig_/bkru'o lcags kyi gzhong khung du/_nad pas lus lcags kyi gzhong [#]khung du khrus byas kyang nyes med do/_/chongs shing [#]de nad pas so/_/lcags kyi gzhong khung nad pas bcangs kyang nyes med/_bla gab bya/_drod mi shor ba'i
[\[23a.3\]]phyir gzhong khung gi kha gab bya/_der mjing [#]par sngas gzhug_/lcags kyi gzhong khung du lums byed par nyal ba'i tshe bde ba'i phyir sngas gzhug_/gar bab bab tu rkang pa mi bkru/_phyi rol ma gtogs par [#]gtsug lag khang ngo cog gi 'khor du rkang pa mi bkru'o/_/gar bkru ba
[\[23a.4\]]dang bkru ba'i sa bya ba 'og nas 'chad pa yin no/_/de'i gnas ni wa khar ro/_/rkang pa bkru ba'i sa ni khang thog gi wa khar kyang [#]bkrur rung ngo /_/rkang pa bkru ba'i bya/_wa'i khar chu mi 'gro ba'i phyir skyo ra la sogs pa bya/_gtsug lag khang gi steng shar dang lho'i grar ro/_/khang thog
[\[23a.5\]]gi wa'i [#]kha ni nyi ma des pa'i phyir shar dang lho'i mtshams kyi grar bya/_rus sbal lta bu rtsub po/_/wa'i [#]kha rkang pa gzhag pa'i gzhi rdo ba rtsub po rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra ba bya ste gzhag_/gzhag go kham [#]pa'i chol zangs/_/rkang pa bkru ba'i rkang pa'i chol zangs kyang bya/_bal glang [#]gi rmig
[\[23a.6\]]pa'i mthil [#]lta bu lbog lbog po can/_kham pa'i chol zangs kyi zhabs sa la 'chags pa'i phyir bal glang [#]gi rmig pa dang 'dra ba gor gor bu bya/_dbus su gzugs pa ni ka dam pa'i me tog lta bu la rtsub por ro/_/kham pa'i chol zangs kyi nang rkang pa gzhag pa'i gzhi'i snying po ka dam pa'i
[\[23a.7\]]me tog 'dra ba rkang pa 'chags shing 'dag pa'i phyir rtsub por bya/_bkrus te kha spu ba la gzhag_/rkang pa bkrus nas rkang pa'i chol [#]zangs nyid kyang bkrus te/_khas [#]sbub la gzhag dge 'dun gyi na steng du'o/_/kham pa'i chol zangs dge 'dun gyi yin na gzhan 'khru [#]ba 'ong ba'i phyir
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]khang thog tu gzhag_/gang zag gi na gnas kyi sgo rgyab tu'o/_/kham pa'i chol zangs gang zag gi yin na bdag gi gnas kyi sgo rgyab tu gzhag_/lhung bzed bkru ba la sogs pa/_gtsug lag khang gi phyogs gang du byas pa des chus bsku ba'am byug[# ]/gtsug lag khang gi phyogs
[\[23b.2\]]su lhung bzed dang snod spyad la sogs pa bkrus pa'i sar maN+Dal bya/_mdung rtse'am phyi bar lta bur ro/_/bkru bshal byas pa'i sar maN+Dal bya ba ni dkon mchog gi phyir byas pa ma yin par mngon par bya ba'i phyir mdung rtse'i phyi bar [#]'dra bar bya'o/_/lci bas sam 'jim pas
[\[23b.3\]]so/_/maN+Dal ni lci ba'am 'ji ba'i [#]skyang nul du bya/_dkon mchog gi phyir byug pa ni 'dra bar chad pa med do/_/dkon mchog gi phyir mchod pa'i maN+Dal du bya ba ni gcig tu chad pa med do/_/[#]cir dga' bar byar rung ngo /_/lhung bzed med par rab tu 'byung ba'am [#]bsnyen par
[\[23b.4\]]rdzogs par mi bya/_rab tu 'byung [#]ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe lhung bzed med par byar mi rung /_chung na ma yin che na ma yin dkar na ma yin/_lhung bzed ni tshad las che ba dang chung ba dang tshon gyis ma [#]bskus sam byid pa mi rung che chung gi tshad dang kha dog btso ba'i
[\[23b.5\]]thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_kha'i mtha'i cha nas mtheb mo'i sor gcig gi lhag mar 'bras btsos pa yang yul dbus su gyur 'chang gi spyod pa'i pra ta gnyis man chad tshod ma dang sngor [#]du bcas par shong ba de ni tshad ma'o/_/lhung bzed kyi kha nas mtshon gang man chad du 'bras [#]
[\[23b.6\]]btsos pa rgya gar gyi yul gyi dbus [#]ma gad+ha'i spyod pa'i pra ta gnyis tshod ma dang sngor [#]du bcas par shong ba na lhung bzed chen po'o/_/pra ta gcig tshod ma dang sngor [#]du bcas pa shong ba ni chung ngu'o/_/lhung bzed 'bring po pra ta gnyis man chad gcig yan chad ci tsam shong yang bla/_gyur
[\[23b.7\]]'chang zhes bya ba ni yul na sbyar zhing spyod pa'i bre phul lta bu ste pra ta la bya/_pra ta ni rgya gar gyi srang bcu drug gi lcid kyi 'bras skam shong ba pra ta gcig gi tshad do/_/rgya gar [#]yul gyi srang gcig la bod kyi srang gcig dang zho drug yod de rgya gar yul gyi srang bcu drug la pra ta gcig srang sum cu rtsa
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]gnyis la pra ta do ste lhung bzed chen po'i tshad bod srang nyi shu rtsa brgyad la pra ta gang gi tshad de bdun phul do dang srang gcig dang zho phyed dang drug shong pa ni pra ta chung ngu'i tshad de [#]chen po ni chung ngu do'i tshad do/_/dge slong mas dge slong pha'i chung ngu las mi bcang dge slong
[\[24a.2\]]pha'i lhung bzed chung ngu'i tshad las che ba'i lhung bzed dge slong mas bcad du mi dbang /_/ro nye'i dkyil 'khor des de gzhag par gding /_dge slong ma'i lhung bzed kyi gzhi ni ro nye la gleb [#]ste zlum por byas te [#]lhung bzed zhabs nyid la [#]thal byung glan/_byang chub kyi shing be'i ta'i [#]lo
[\[24a.3\]]ma'am lag mthil 'dra ba'o/_/ro nye glebs pa'i gzugs ni shing bo de'i [#]lo ma 'dra ba'am lag mthil 'dra bar bya'o/_/'di 'dri bar bya ba ni dge slong ma su la nan das lhung bzed kyi gzhi gdu bu lag skor byas pa las bcas tshad kyang de'o/_/che chung gi tshad kyang lag mthil lam
[\[24a.4\]]shing bo de'i [#]'dab ma 'dra bar bya/_de bas brnyas na'ang der 'gyur ro/_/rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/_lhung bzed med na [#]gzhan gyi brnyas [#]kyang rung ngo /_/de bzhin lnga po yong ngo [#]/_/chos gos gsum dang chu tshags dang gding ba lta bu brje ba bzhin du brnyas kyang
[\[24a.5\]]nyes med/_dbyar lhung bzed med par mi bya/_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe yul rgyu ba mi spyod ces te lhung bzed med par kyang [#]mi rung lhung bzed dang 'bral du'ang mi rung ngo /_/yul rgyu bar yang mi spyod/_lhung bzed med par yul rgyu ba mi spyad/_'jigs pa dang bcas na lhung bzed chung ngu
[\[24a.6\]]dang spyod cig_/'jigs pa'i rkyen cig 'byung ngam yod na lhung bzed chen po gud du gtams la chung ngu spyad kyang nyes med/_med kyang rab tu dbyung /_rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe lhung bzed med dam ma rnyed na med par rab tu dbyung du rung ngo /_/langs te lhung bzed 'byung ba'am gzhug
[\[24a.7\]]pa'am skam pa mi bya/_lhung bzed spyad pa'i thabs ni sU tra'i 'di man chad 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bya'o/_/tshod ran par kun du spyod/_lhung bzed slong mo'i tshe dang kha zas bza' bar spyad [#]pa ni ran pa zhes bya/_gcig tu [#]'og nas bshad pa bzhin du spyad pa la ran pa zhes bya'o/_/'dir
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]gzhan 'dor ba dag mi gzhug_/thal ba dang nyal nyil la sogs pa lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste mi dor/_'dis phyag [#]dar mi dor/_sa phyags pa lhung bzed du blugs te mi 'dor/_lhag rol yang mi bya/_shing tog la sogs pa'i kham [#]nas dang tshigs ma mi blugs[#]/_lag
[\[24b.2\]]pa dang gdong gi chu mi blugs/_kha gdong la sogs pa bkru ba'i chu lhung bzed du blugs te mi spyad/_dge sbyong bag med pa'i chos can la 'di mi bkru/_dge sbyong bag med pa la lhung bzed mi gzhag mi bkru'o/_/ba lang gi lci ba bye ma can gyis ma yin/_lhung bzed kyi rtsi lag [#]
[\[24b.3\]]gnod pa'i phyir ba lang gi lci ba bye ba dang 'dres pas mi bkru/_te por gsher bzhin du mi gzhag_/lhung bzed bkrus nas chu ma skams par gsher bzhin du snod du mi gzhug[ #]/phyal bar [#]shin tu bskam [#]par mi bya/_nyi ma'am me'i 'od la brjod [#]de shin tu skams par mi
[\[24b.4\]]gzhag_/rdo'i steng du mi gzhag_/lhung bzed mi gtsang ba'i phyogs su 'ang mi gzhag_/lhung bzed gar bab tu mi gzhag_/lhung bzed de dag tu ring du'ang mi gzhag_/gong ma lta bu zhig tu gzhag tu zin na'ang ring du mi gzhag par myur du blangs[#]/_de'i phyir glo phug bya/_
[\[24b.5\]]lhung bzed gzhag pa'i sa gnas kyi khang bu la glo phug bya/_gtsug lag khang slong ba na khang bur ro/_/glo phug bya ba ni gtsug lag khang slong ba'i tshe nas glo phug bya'o/_/rtsig pa mi brko/_sngar glo phug ma byas pa'i khang bu la phyis rtsig pa mi brko/_dgon pa pas gzeb [#]tu'o/_/
[\[24b.6\]]dgon pa na gnas pa'i lhung bzed kyi gnas ni gzeb tu'o[#]/_/lcug ma'am tha gu las bya'o[#]/_/gzeb bu rgyu lcug ma las [#]byas la/_spun tha gus [#]byas te btags/_lci ba'am 'jibs [#]bsku gzeb bu la lci ba'i skyang nul gyis bsku/_kha gab kyang de'i tshul du'o/_/kha gab kyang
[\[24b.7\]]ltag tu bshad pa bzhin no/_/tha gus [#]shing la dpyangs [#]na dge'o/_/gzeb bu tha gus shing la gdags [#]te sa la mi gzhag_/gzeb bu sa la mi gzhag pa ni sems can 'ong ba'i phyir ro/_/'di gzhan du mi bskur[#]/_gud du 'gro na lhung bzed kyi gzhi gzeb bu [#]khyer te mi 'gro/_
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]snod du bcug [#]ste bskur/_/'gro ba'i tshe lhung bzed nyid kyi snod du bcug ste bskur/_lag pas ma yin/_snod du bcug kyang lag na [#]thogs shing mi bskur/_phrag pa la btags te mchan 'og tu bcug la bskur/_lhung bzed snod du bcug la phrag pa la
[\[25a.2\]]gdags kyang rung se ral kar btags kyang rung mchan 'og tu bcug ste bskur/_lhung bzed dang sman dang bar bur snod so sor gzhag_/lhung bzed kyi snod dang sman gyi snod dang bar bur gyi snod so sor bya/_bar bur ni khab dang snyung dang gri dang rgyus pa dang skud pa dang lhan
[\[25a.3\]]pa la sogs pa'o/_/bcang ngo de dag sman dang bar bur gyi snod bcangs kyang nyes med/_mnyam par [#]phrag pa la 'phyang zhing gzhag par mi bya/_lhung bzed dang sman dang bar bur gyi snod thag pa mnyam par gcig gi steng du gcig rngos par mi bya ste/_ring thung so rnyil [#]du bya'o/_/
[\[25a.4\]]sdug bsngal mi 'dod na yangs par ma yin/_lhung bzed kyi thag pa bde bar 'dod na che ba'am chung ngu ma yin gyi ran par bya/_'khum du 'ong gis bar phying bu gzhug_/lhung bzed kyi thag pa mi 'khum pa'i phyir bar [#]phyir bu gzhag_/gnas pa'i phyir skabs skabs su bya
[\[25a.5\]]rog gi rjes 'dra bar bya/_phying bu phan tshun du mi 'chug pa'i phyir bya rog gi rjes 'dra bar skud pa'i nan du bya/_lhung bzed mig bzhin du bsrung /_lhung bzed kyi rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi mig dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/pags pa bzhin du sbyar ma'o/_/chos [#]gsum la rim gro bya
[\[25a.6\]]ba ni pags pa bzhin du bya'o/_/gos lhag [#]ma rnams kyang ngo /_/gos lhag [#]ma rnams la yang rim gro bya ba chos gos gsum la bya ba bzhin no/_/bcos pa la g.yem par [#]mi bya/_gos dang lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byad thams cad btso ba dang /_bcem pa la
[\[25a.7\]]sogs pa nan tan [#]myur du bsgrub/_/lhung bzed kyi lhan pa'ang nan tan du phyogs dben pa'o/_/lhung bzed lhan pa glan dgos na yang nan tan du dben par gyis shig_/chongs shig dge 'dun gyi las bya ba'i cha byad[#]/_lhung bzed kyi lhan pa gdab pa'i cha byad [#]dge 'dun
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]gyis bcangs kyang nyes med/_bu ga la 'di dag mi dge ste bu ram rgya skyegs [#]spra tshil zho nye tshon mo steng ngo /_/lhung bzed kyi lhan pa'i rgyu ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las byar mi [#]rung ngo /_/dge ba ni shur shur po dang gzer bu dang leb leb po dang chu srin gyi so lta bu dag
[\[25b.2\]]go_/lhan par rung ba ni lcags [#]'di rnams lta bu las gang 'os par [#]glan chu srin gyi so ni 'di 'dra ba'o/_/chu srin gyi so gcig tu na lhung bzed lcags kyi skud pas btsems la tho bas steng nas glebs te [#]bzhag pa la bya/_lcags sam rdo phye yang ngo /_/lcags kyi phye'am rdo
[\[25b.3\]]phyes bu gu chung ngu'am lhan pa'i mig mtshams su glan[#]/_yungs mar rams [#]dang bsnal spra tshil 'dra bar lcags sam rdo ku ru bin [#]das so/_/lcags phye'am rdo phye je zer yungs mar [#]bsres te bsnal te spra tshil 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir lcags kyi gar bu dang rdo ku ru bi na das
[\[25b.4\]]btab [#]cing bsnal/_dron po la glan[#]/_de nas spra tshil 'dra ba des lhung bzed dron po la glan[#]/_gro bas g.yogs la 'ji bas bskus te ran par bsreg glan nas steng du dro bas g.yogs la 'ji bas [#]bskus te skams pa'i tshad du ran par bsreg_/yungs mar gyis [#]ba dang /_
[\[25b.5\]]skams nas yungs mar gyis bskus la 'jam por bya ba'i phyir lcags sam rdo ku ru bin das bdar/_bu ram dang 'ji bas [#]ni kham pa'i la'o/_/kham pa'i lhung bzed la ni lhan pa [#]bu ram dang 'ji bas bsre ste glan/_spyod bzhin na ni zla ba drug gi mthar bsreg_/lhung bzed
[\[25b.6\]]slong ba [#]kha zas za bar spyod na zla ba drug cing bsreg go_/mi spyod cing kha dog ma byid na ma bsregs kyang nyes med do/_/kham pa'i na ni zla ba phyed cing ngo /_/kham pa'i lhung bzed spyod bzhin na zla ba phyed cing bsreg 'on te dbyar na bkru zhing dgos pa'i skabs [#]skabs su bsku bar sbyar
[\[25b.7\]]dbyar lhung bzed btsa' mi zhugs pa'i phyir spyod pa'i skabs su snum gyis nyin re zhing bsku mi spyod na'ang btsa' 'jug tu byed na bkru zhing snum gyis bsku/_bsreg pa 'di ltar ro/_/lhung bzed bsreg pa'i thabs ni 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bya'o/_/de'i phyir sgro [#]mo chongs shig_/lhung bzed
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bsreg pa'i phyir rdza ma bcag pa'i cha spyad dang [#]rdza ma bcangs kyang nyes med/_der grub pa'am/_rdza ma ni lhung bzed bsreg par phyed kar [#]byas kyang rung /_gyo mo las so/_/rdza ma nyid las 'phral la brtol te byas kyang rung ngo /_/rdza ma bcag pa ni
[\[26a.2\]]thal bas bkang ste bcag na dge'o/_/rdza ma nyid las 'phral la bcag pa ni thal bas bkang ste bcag na rung ngo /_/bcang ngo de rdza ma bcag pa'i cha spyad dang rdza ma bcangs kyang nyes med/_du ba mi 'bros par des g.yogs[#]/_lhung bzed bsreg pa'i du ba mi 'bros par bya
[\[26a.3\]]ba'i phyir rdza mas steng nas dgab/_phub ma dang 'ji ba'i skyang nul gyis bsku/_rdza ma'i phyi rol phub ma dang 'jibs bsres te skyang nul byug_/yungs mar gyi tshigs [#]ma 'am ba lang gi lci bas nang bsku/_rdza ma'i nang yungs mar gyi tshigs [#]ma 'am ba lang gi lci ba gang
[\[26a.4\]]'byor pas bsku/_skams par gyur na'o/_/rdza ma la skyang nul du bskus pa skams [#]par gyur nas khas dbub[#]/_/sa'i las kun byas nas phub [#]ma bting ste du ba bzang por 'byung ba'i yungs mar gyi tshigs ma la sogs pa'i [#]rdzas kyis bkram la kha sbu bas [#]ste gzhag_/
[\[26a.5\]]sa rko ba la sogs pa byas zin nas gzhir phub ma bting ste du ba bzang bar bya ba'i phyir yungs mar gyi tshigs [#]ma'am ra ru dang /_tar [#]ga dang khab tseg [#]dang be'u zho 'thung ba'i rtug pa la sogs pas phub ma'i steng du dgram/_lci ba'am sog mas g.yogs te [#]sbar/_/rdza
[\[26a.6\]]ma'i [#]phyi rol du lci brul dang sog [#]phub dang shing lo la sogs pas g.yogs te [#]me bud/_te por grangs nas blangs[#]/_me shi nas te por grangs [#]nas lhung bzed dbyung /_kha dog [#]ma grub kyi bar du bzlas/_ltag ma ltar lan gcig bsregs pas kha dog ma zhen [#]nam kha dog zhe na
[\[26a.7\]]zhen gyi bar du bsreg[# ]/bkrus shing bkrus shing gzhag_/kha dog ma grub ste bslas pa'i tshe lhung bzed bkrus shing bkrus shing [#]gzhag_/than [#]kor du srog chags la snying rje ba'i phyir byug cing dgab/_lhung bzed bsregs pa'i than kor [#]zang zing dang srog chags la 'khri
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]zhing 'ang snying [#]rje ba'i phyir phyag dar dang chag chag bya/_mtshan gyi 'khor du skyes na lo grangs mi shes kyang bsnyen par rdzogs par chad par bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa chung ngur [#]pha mas bor ba lta bu lo grangs mi shes na pho mtshan mo mtshan khor khor yug tu spu
[\[26b.2\]]skyes na lo nyi shu lo [#]lon pa'i thang du bsnyen par rdzogs par byas rung bud med bag ma byas pa ni spu'i tshad du mi bya'i lo bcu gnyis lon pa yan chad bsnyen par rdzogs par rung ngo /_/sgyus brtag[# ]/gsang ba'i spu blta ba ni mi skyengs pa'i phyir sgyu [#]dang thabs kyis brtag cing
[\[26b.3\]]blta thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_ba lang so'am gos gdang mthon po la sogs pa las nor dag dbog par ro/_/mtshan gyi spu sgyus brtag pa ni gos gdang skas la sogs pa la gos dag skyel cing dbog par bcug la 'og nas blta'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par
[\[26b.4\]]'dod pa shing la 'dzeg tu mi gzhug_/dge sbyong zhag lnga drug tshun chad du bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa zhig na shing la 'dzeg tu mi gzhug_/dge sbyong bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa zhig drug sdes shing la me tog thur bcug pa las shing las lhung ste rkang pa chag pa
[\[26b.5\]]las bcas/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du mi mngag[# ]/dge sbyong bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i khar 'bros pa'i phyir mtshams kyi phyi rol dang lam ring por mi mngag[# ]/mig rgyang bskyed de mngon par thal mo sbyar la gzhag_/khrims rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/_mig rgyang du mi snang
[\[26b.6\]]bar mi gzhag gi dge 'dun las byed pa snang zhing sgra mi thos pa tsam du mngon par gzhag_/khyim mi la gnas mi bsgo[#]/_/khyim pa la sngangs shing 'drogs pa'i phyir shing drung ba dang slong mo pa dang tshem bu ba dang /_sman bskus pa bzhi mi bstan/_bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[26b.7\]]ma thag tu mi bsgo bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs ma thag tu sU tra ltag ma'i gnas bzhi bsgo zhing [#]bstan par bya/_gang du yang gnas med par der gso sbyin gyi bar du bsdad pa dang tshul 'jug par mi bya/_gnas brtan shi'am gud [#]du song ngam khyim par bab [#]na
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gnas med par bsdad [#]du mi rung ste gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung ba dang /_tshul du 'jug pa la'ang mi bsdad par gnas brtan tshol du 'gro'o/_/tshul snga mar na ni mi bsrung /_tshul snga mar zhugs zin la gnas brtan med par gyur na yang
[\[27a.2\]]tshul dral te gnas brtan tshol du 'gro'o/_/phyi ma zla ba gnyis las lhag par ro/_/tshul phyi mar zhugs pa las gnas brtan med par gyur na zla ba gnyis kyi bar du tshul bsrungs la gnas brtan tshol du 'gro'o/_/dngos po dang las dang g.yog dag spang bar
[\[27a.3\]]de la khas blangs[#]/_dngos po dang zhes pa ni gnas brtan rnyed de spyan [#]'dren pa'i tshe khang bu bzang ba ste dbul bar khas blangs [#]las dang zhes pa ni gnas brtan dag gi las su mi gzhug pa'o/_/dge 'dun phal mo che zhig gnas gnas pa las gnas brtan med par gyur
[\[27a.4\]]na zad par 'dong mi dgos kyi/_gcig gam gnyis kyis btsal te rnyed na 'di rnams khas blangs [#]la spyan drang /_g.yog dag spang bar de la khas blangs zhes pa ni gnas brtan gyi g.yog cig [#]'ongs na de yang las su mi gzhug pa dang khyim pa la [#]gnas brtan gyi g.yog sbyin
[\[27a.5\]]pa dang /_dge slong gi nang nas gcig bsko [#]bar khas blangs[#]/_med na rgan rabs kyi ltar [#]la'ang dri/_gnas brtan med na tshul snga ma dral te btsal na ma rnyed pa la/_tshul phyi mar zhugs nas yang med par gyur pa dang tshul snga ma dral te song song ba las gnas brtan ma rnyed de tshul
[\[27a.6\]]phyi mar zhugs nas zla ba gnyis kyi bar du 'dug pa'i tshe ni [#]bdag cag 'khod pa'i nang nas rgan pa mkhas pa la dri/_yod kyang [#]nye gnas su ni'o/_/gnas brtan yod du zin kyang gnas brtan nyid la chad pa byung ba'i tshe dang dge sbyong mang du yod na de gnas su bcol te dbye/_
[\[27a.7\]]ma dris kyi bar du de lta bu'i rigs la las mi bya des sam bdag gis so/_/dge sbyong ngo mi shes pa'am gsar du 'ongs pa lta bu la bdag gi mkhan po la ma dris kyi bar du bdag gis kyang kho bo'i las mi bya/_bdag la'ang las byed du mi gzhug go_/mkhan po la dri dgos
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa ni rgyus mi shes pa de yon tan dang ldan nam mi ldan pa dang yon tan dang mi ldan yang bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba lta bu yod na g.yog bya dgos pa'i skabs lta bu mkhan po shes pa'i phyir dri'o/_/nyes med pa ni med de tshol bar zhugs par gnas par rigs par
[\[27b.2\]]gnas med par gnas kyang ngo /_/gnas brtan med pa'i bar du ni gnas bca' ba'i rigs pa'i dge slong rnams gnas brtan tshol gyi bar du ma dris kyang nyes med do/_/ci srid pa [#]bar du ma dris kyang nyes pa med pa ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/zhag lnga zad [#]kyi bar du'o/_/gnas
[\[27b.3\]]brtan [#]med de tshol bar zhugs pa'i tshe/_ma dris kyang nyes med pa ni zhag lnga'i bar du ni gnang ngo /_/[#]de phan chad kyang [#]rnyed kyang nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rnyed pa'am [#]rigs so/_/zhag lnga'i bar du ni kha zas dang nor zas dag rnyed de blangs kyang nyes med de brtags pa'o/_/'ongs ba'i nyi
[\[27b.4\]]ma gnyis sam gsum ngal bsos te gnas zung shig_/gnas brtan spyan drangs pa ni ma yin gyi gud nas gsar du 'ongs pa zhig nas [#]brtag pa'i phyir zhag gsum gyi bar du ngal bso zhing tshul blta ste gnas brtan du rung na gnas bca'/_bdag gnas brtan tshol du song
[\[27b.5\]]song ste rnyed pa'i gnas brtan rgyus mi shes pa zhig na'ang zhag gsum gyi bar du brtag ste gnas gzung /_zhag gcig gi phyir yang ma yin/_gang du yang rung ste bdag kyang rung gnas brtan kyang rung zhag gcig las ring du mi 'dug pa zhig na gnas mi gzung mi rigs pa'i
[\[27b.6\]]phyir ro/_/gnas bcas pa ma rnyed na gzhan la'ang dri/_bdag gi gnas brtan dro'i lam phan chad gcig tu song ste slar 'ongs pa [#]zhig na de'i bar du gnas brtan gzhan su yod pa la dri/_gnas brtan med na bdag cag gi nang na rgan zhing chos mkhas pa la [#]dri'o/_/nyes med
[\[27b.7\]]pa ni las blangs pa las gzhan der 'ongs na ma dris kyang ngo /_/las shig bya bar mkhan po la dris te song song ba las tshul gyis las bya dgos pa zhig 'phral la 'byung ba dang /_dge 'dun dang gsar po [#]rgan pos 'phral la bsgo ba ni mkhan po la ma dris par byas kyang nyes med do/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]gar bab bab kyi gan du ma yin/_gnas brtan du bzung zhing btsal ba ni lo grangs kyi [#]gnas brtan du chud kyang bab bab tu mi bzung [#]ngo /_/ci lta bu las gzung ba 'og nas 'chad/_khrims dang /_gnas brtan brtag pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan nam mi ldan
[\[28a.2\]]pa dang /_shes pa dang /_chos lnga dang ldan nam mi ldan pa dang /_'khor dang /_gnas brtan gyi 'khor snga [#]na yod pa srun nam mi srun pa dang /_skyon yod dam med pa dang /_skyong ba dag_/gnas brtan nyid slob ma la ston cing skyong ngam mi skyong ba dang /_yo byad [#]sbyor ram mi
[\[28a.3\]]sbyor gzhan gnod pa byed skyabs byed dam mi byed pa dang /_dri ba la sogs pas shes par bya ste/_'di rnams lta bu dang ldan nam mi ldan gzhan dag la dris shing brtag ste/_rtogs shing shes par byas nas rung bar rtogs na/_sdom pa bzhin du gzung /_gnas bca' ba
[\[28a.4\]]ni sdom pa bzhin du gnas bca' bsngags lan gsum du bzlas te gzung /_rkang pa gnyis kyis lag pa gnyis kyi steng du mnan la'o/_/gnas bcas pa'i [#]sngags 'debs pa'i tshe gnas brtan gyi rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og nas lag pa gnyis kyis bzung [#]ste/_sngags bya/_
[\[28a.5\]]brtags te sbyin/_gnas brtan gyis kyang slob ma gnas 'char 'jug pa ni g.yo skyon dang tshul la sogs pa ldan nam mi ldan pa ltag tu gnas brtan la brtag pa bzhin du brtag ste gnas 'char gzhug_/pha dang bur 'du shes gzhag_/gnas bca' nas gnas brtan ni pha'i
[\[28a.6\]]gzugs brnyan du blta slob ma ni bu'i gzugs brnyan yin par 'du shes gzhag_/der na mkhan po bas gnas pa ste de bas na der mi gzung /_bdag gi mkhan po la [#]ni thog mar [#]mkhan por gsol te mkhan por gyur pa'i tshe gnas bcas pa yin pas na phyis gnas bca'
[\[28a.7\]]mi dgos so/_/blangs pa'i gnas gzhig pa'i phyir gnyis kas phyal bar gyur na'o/_/gnas bcas pa las gnas zhig par 'gyur ba ni gnas brtan gyis kyang bdag gi slob ma gnas 'char mi gzhug cing yongs [#]btang bar bsams slob mas kyang yongs [#]btang bar bsams [#]
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]na gnas zhig ste med par 'gyur/_gcig gis btang ste gcig gis ma btang na zhig par mi 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po med par 'dus na gar dga' bar tshor cig_/bdag gis [#]mkhan po med la gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon mang po zhig cig car 'dus na gang dga' ba la
[\[28b.2\]]gzhar zhing dri snga dro dang phyi dro re re la dris kyang nyes med do/_/de nyid na de la'o/_/mkhan po dang gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon kun 'dus na mkhan po la dri'o/_/dge sbyong dang rdzogs pa'i mkhan po gnyis tshogs na rdzogs pa'i mkhan po la dri'o_/mkhan po mthong ma thag tu stan
[\[28b.3\]]las 'phags/_mkhan po lam nye ring gang nas 'ong yang rung lan mang du 'gro zhing 'dug kyang rung [#]ste bdag dge ba spyod kyang rung stan las 'phags [#]dge ba spyod pa la ni mkhan pos kyang 'dug ces zer ba'i rigs te zer na 'dug kyang nyes med mkhan po bzhin du slob dpon lnga la yang
[\[28b.4\]]bya'o/_/nyin gcig la lan gsum gnas pa'i gan du gtsug lag khang de na gnas na 'gro'o/_/gtsug lag khang mtshams gcig gi nang na mkhan po dang lhan cig tu gnas na nyin gcig la lan gsum du zhu zhing dri/_lam ring ngam mtshams tha dad na gnas pa ci ltar dri ba ni
[\[28b.5\]]'og nas 'chad/_dgon pa la gnas te rgyang grags tsam na nyin re/_mkhan po dang slob ma gnyis ka dgon pa na gnas te bar rgyang grags tsam gyis chod la dgon pa nyid kyi mtshams bcad pa'i nang yin na nyin re zhing lan re zhus kyang nyes med/_de bzhin du gtsug lag khang gi
[\[28b.6\]]mtshams nang rgyang grags tsam la yang nyin re zhing zhu dgon pa dang gtsug lag khang gi mtshams bcad pa ni gtsug lag khang gi rang mtshams kyis brtsi/_rgyang grags su mi gnang gcig dgon pa la gnas la gcig mtshams kyi nang na gnas na bar mtshams kyis chod pas mi
[\[28b.7\]]gnang /_rgyang grags lnga tsam na zhag lnga drug na'o/_/gtsug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i mtshams gcig gi nang yin na mkhan po dang slob ma'i [#]bar rgyang grags lnga tsam gyis chod kyang zhag lnga drug cing zhus kyang nyes med/_dgon pa dang gtsug lag khang gi mtshams tha dad dam/_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]mtshams med pa ni mi gnang ngo /_/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum na ni gso sbyin gyi tshe'o/_/dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang gi mtshams gang yang rung ste mtshams gcig gi nang na yin na [#]mkhan po dang slob ma'i bar rgyang grags phyed dang gsum tsam gyis
[\[29a.2\]]chod kyang zla ba phyed cing dris kyang nyes med/_gnas bcas pa chad [#]pas bcad par rigs na yang chad pas mi bcad par mi bya/_gnas brtan gyis bdag la gnas pa'i slob ma rnams nyes pa zhig spyod de chad pas bcad pa'i rigs na'ang chad pas bcad par bya'o/_/nyes pa
[\[29a.3\]]byed pa la chad pas cis bcad pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_chad pa ni lnga ste/_chad pas bcad pa [#]rnam lnga yod de lnga ni dmigs kyis 'og nas 'chad pa yin/_mi smra ba dang mi bstan pa dang g.yog dang chos dang kha zas mi spyad/_mi smra [#]zhes pa nas g.yog dang zhes pa'i bar du ni mi smra
[\[29a.4\]]ba dus gsum du zhu ba la bag yod par gyis shig ces lan mi sbyin pa dang mi bstan pa ni chos dang kha dog [#]dang bsam gtan lta bu mi bstan te/_'di gnyis la chad pa gcig rkang pa 'khru ba dang lus nyed pa la sogs pa g.yog byed du mi gzhug pa dang chos dang zhes pa ni las brgya
[\[29a.5\]]rtsa gcig lta bu gang byed kyang rung las su mi gzhug par dbyung /_kha zas mi spyad ces pa ni kha zas dang gos bdag gis kyang mi sbyin slob ma 'bul na'ang mi blang ba dang 'di gnyis la chad pa gcig_/dge ba'i [#]skyabs brtsams pa bcad pa dang gnas dgag pa'o/_/dge ba'i
[\[29a.6\]]skyabs brtsams pa bcad pa zhes pa ni slob ma ce ti rtsig pa dang yi ge klog pa la sogs pa dge ba spyod pa la ma spyod cig ces kun du bcad [#]de spyod du mi gzhug pa dang gnas dgag pa'o zhes pa ni de lam gnas par gud du song shig ces bskrad [#]pa dang chad pa 'di rnam lnga rim bzhin du
[\[29a.7\]]gcig gis ma 'gyur na gcig gis bcad do/_/rigs pa ni ma dad pa dang le lo can dang ngag dka' ba dang bsti stang med pa dang sdig [#]pa'i grogs po can no/_/rigs pa ni zhes pa ni chad pa rnam lngas rim pas bcad par rigs pa ni ming gis smos pa 'di lnga'o/_/ma dad pa dang
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la dad pa khong nas med pa'o/_/le lo can dang zhes pa ni dge ba la mi spyod cing mi dge ba la spyod pa dang za zhing nyal la phyi rol skyel du 'gro ba'o/_/ngag dka' ba dang zhes pa ni dge ba dang las bskos pa la slar 'khyil [#]zhing mang du bzlog [#]pa dang dmod [#]
[\[29b.2\]]mo dang tshig rtsub por smra ba'o/_/bsti stang med pa dang zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum dang mkhan po dang bla ma la bsti stang med cing 'gying ba dang tshul khrims sbom po bsrungs pas chog gi phra mo la bsrungs [#]ci dgos zhes ma gus pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po can no zhes bya ba ni srog
[\[29b.3\]]gcod pa dang rol mo mkhan dang chang 'tshong ba dang /_rkun ma dang 'phyon ma can dang bsten [#]pa dang 'di rnams lnga ste rim bzhin du chad pa lngas bcad do/_/chad pas gcod pa gzhan gyis bsdus na sbom por 'gal/_slob ma chad pa rnam pa lnga gang gis bcad kyang rung ste chad
[\[29b.4\]]pas bcad pa la dge slong gzhan zhig gis kha drangs na kha [#]'dren 'dren pa dbyen gyi sbom por 'gyur[#]/_bsti stang med bzhin na bsgyur ba'i phyir dge slong shes pa la chol cig_/chad pa rnam lngas bcad pa las nyes pa 'chags shing bzod pa gsol du'ang mi 'ong gud du'ang ma song
[\[29b.5\]]ste bar ma dor 'dug pa [#]na dge slong tshul khrims dang chos mkhas shing 'drid cing snying 'ji mkhas pa gcig la gnas brtan gyis chol te/_sngon gyi nyes pa 'or la mkhan po la bzod par gsol te/_shogs la slar chor cig ces gros 'debs su gzhug_/mtshan ma btang ste
[\[29b.6\]]'chags na bzod cig_/slob ma chad pas bcad pa de sngon [#]gyi nyes pa gtong ngo zhes zer zhing bzod pa gsol te 'chags [#]shing 'ong na gnas brtan des bzod pa byin cig_/chad pas bcad pa'i mi rigs na mi bya'o/_/slob ma rtag tu [#]tshul khrims bsdom [#]zhing brtson 'grus che
[\[29b.7\]]la bar 'ga' tsam zhu ba 'phyis pa [#]lta bu chad pas bcad pa mi rigs pa la gnas brtan gyis chad pas mi bcad/_rigs na [#]mi bzod par mi bya/_slob ma chad pas bcad pa la de sngon gyi nyes pa gtong zhing 'chags su 'ong ste bzod par bya ba'i rigs pa la [#]bzod par ma [#]byas na nyes
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]byas/_mi rigs na bzod par mi bya/_slob ma chad pas bcad pa la sngon gyi nyes pa mi gtong zhing 'chags su mi 'ong na bdag gis bkug ste bzod pa gsol mi gzhug_/ma btub na khang bu nas dbyung /_chad pa rnam lnga la sogs pa'i thabs
[\[30a.2\]]bya ste cis kyang ma [#]gyur na slob ma de khang bu nas bskrad [#]phyung ste'o/_/tshags dang ril ba spyi blugs dang chog pa tsam byin te dge sbyong la'o/_/slob ma bskrad [#]pa de dge sbyong zhig na tshags dang ril ba dang gos chog pa tsam byin te btang [#]ngo /_/dge sbyong nyid la rdzas mang po zhig
[\[30a.3\]]yong du zin kyang mi byin [#]par slar 'ong ba'i phyir gtar gzhag go_/phyir ma 'ongs te thal byung gzhag kyang rku sems med kyi 'ong ba'i phyir gtar gzhag pas nyes med do/_/'on te bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa na [#]yo byad lnga dang ngo /_/slob ma bskrad [#]pa de nyi shur lon du nye
[\[30a.4\]]ste bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa zhig na ltag tu dge sbyong la brdzangs pa'i steng du chos gos gsum dang /_gding ba dang lhung bzed lngas bsnan te sbyin no/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang ngo /_/slob ma bskrad [#]pa'i de khrims rdzogs pa zhig yin na sU tra ltag ma bsnyen par
[\[30a.5\]]rdzogs par 'dod pa'i thad du brdzangs te bskrad do/_/seng ge bzhin du mi re bar mi bya/_slob ma bskrad pa la phyis yang [#]slob mar mi bya'o zhes re ba mi bcad [#]seng ge ni ri dwags bsad nas zos pa'i lhag ma phyis bza' ba'i sems med do yod mi za ba dang seng ges [#]thal mos
[\[30a.6\]]bsnun pa la 'chor re ba'i sems med pa bzhin du mi bya/_phangs [#]par 'gyur ba'i bya ba bca' bar mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi 'og khrims bca' ba la/_thams cad zhal tshus bcad pa lta bu kha cig nang du 'gyur ba dang gnas 'dir dge slong su'ang zhig tu mi gzhag pa [#]lta bu rgan
[\[30a.7\]]po dang nad pa shi bar 'gyur ba mi bca'/_lon pas kha su bar 'gyur/_zhag lon pas kha su bar 'gyur te/_kha ma bkrus par bdag la'ang phyag 'tshal du mi gzhug bdag gis kyang gzhan la phyag mi bya/_bca'o so shing /_kha su bar gyur pa so shing 'chos la bkru/_dben
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]par ro/_/kha lag bkru ba ni dben par bkru'o/_/bshang gci bya ba yang ngo /_/bshang ba yang dben par bya/_spyod pa'i shing drung ngam rtsig drung du mi bya/_mi mang po spyod pa'i sa shing drung ngam rtsig drung lta bur bshang gci dang so shing mi bca'/_de'i chad ni sor bcu gnyis
[\[30b.2\]]tsam nas brgyad yan chad do/_/so shing gi tshad ni sor bcu gnyis man chad brgyad yan chad la bya ste thung ngu mi snang ba ni dge slong gcig cig so shing thung ngu bca' bca' ba las sangs rgyas byon nas bor du ma spobs te thal byung mid [#]pa las lkog mar zug ste shi ba las bcas/_
[\[30b.3\]]ring ba ni drug sdes so shing ring po bca' bca' ba las mi sdug cing gzhan la rgya lcag gi thabs su brdeg [#]pa las bcas/_mchil ma mang po la med na bzhi las lhag pa yan chad kyis so/_/bad kan rgyas shing mchil ma mang la so [#]shing dkon te med na sor bzhi yan chad la
[\[30b.4\]]byas kyang nyes med do/_/gnas su na chol zangs kyi steng du dor bar [#]mi rigs pa ma yin no/_/so shing bca' ba dang kha bkru ba gnas kyi nang du byed na chol zangs kyi nang du bkrus kyang nyes med do/_/wa'i [#]khar na'ang dben par mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/so shing bca' ba dang kha
[\[30b.5\]]gdong bkru ba khang thog gi wa khar byas na'ang dben par chud de nyes med do/_/khru [#]gang 'khor ba der 'di lta bu dag kyang gtogs so/_/wa'i kha khru [#]gang 'khor ba tshun chad wa khar chud do/_/de tshun chad du so shing dang kha gdong bkrus kyang nyes med do/_/de'i rjes su lce bzhar [#]kha
[\[30b.6\]]bkrus pa'i rjes su lce bzhar bcang ngo /_/lce bzhar ba ni khab kyi rgyu las so/_/lce bzhar ba'i rgyu ni khab kyi rgyu ste/_lcags dang zangs dang khar [#]ba dang ra gan las byas te bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/de'i phyir so shing gshags pa'ang brtags [#]pa'o/_/lce bzhar ba sU tra ltag
[\[30b.7\]]ma ltar ma bcangs na so shing gshags pas bzhar kyang rung [#]ngo /_/phan tshun du de mi rno bar brud so shing gshags pa gcig [#]la gcig brud de zur rnon pos lce mi gcod pa'i phyir mi rno bas brud cing dal bus bya/_rnon pos lce dang so dang rna ba mi brud/_so dang lce dang rna ba la ci yang
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]rung ste rnon pos zug cing snad pa'i phyir mi brud/_mi dal bar ma yin par de'i sha la mi na bar bya'o/_/so dang rna ba dang lce la brud pa'i tshe snad cing khrag mi 'byung ba'i phyir dal bus ran par brud/_kha'i dri mas 'bags pa'i phyogs ma bkrus sam
[\[31a.2\]]sas [#]ma phyis par lce dang so bkrus pa mi dor/_so shing 'cha' 'cha' ba de la kha'i dri ma dang mchil mas 'bags pa chus ma bkrus sam sas [#]ma phyis par mi dor/_sgra ma byas par mi dor/_so shing dor ba la se gol la ma lud pa'i sgra ma phyung bar mi dor ro[#]/_/'di ni dpe ste
[\[31a.3\]]bshang gci dang mchil ma dang /_snabs dang skyugs pa dang tshad pa dang gzhan yang ngo /_/so shing dor ba la sgra bya ba ni dpe ste de bzhin du 'di rnams dor na'ang se gol dang lud [#]pa'i sgra dbyung /_ming gis dor ba 'di rnams dor ba ma yin pa bong rdog [#]la sogs pa ci dor kyang
[\[31a.4\]]sgra dbyung ngo /_/bkru ba la 'di dag gis kyang 'grub ste go 'dun pa'am lci skam gyis kyang ngo /_/kha 'khru ba la so shing med na 'di rnams kyis bkrur [#]kyang rung ste go 'dun ni glas gang dang rtswa ku shu ri dang spos la sogs pa btags pa'i phye [#]ma la bya'o/_/lus kyi bya ba 'di dag
[\[31a.5\]]byas ma thag tu mchod rten la phyag bya/_ltag tu smos pa kha lag bkru ba la sogs pa lus kyi phyi [#]bdar byas zin nas mchod rten la phyag bya mchod rten med kyang yid kyis dmigs te phyag bya/_gtogs pa na gnas pas nan tan du bya'o/_/lo [#]bcur ma lon la chos lnga dang mi ldan
[\[31a.6\]]gyi bar du bdag gi las su bya bar gtogs pa ni mkhan po dang gnas brtan la g.yog dang rim gro bya ba 'og nas 'byung ba'i las rnams nan tan du bya'o/_/de ma thag tu nad par song ste phyag bya/_nang par kha bkrus nas mchod rten la phyag byas ma thag tu mkhan po la phyag bya/_
[\[31a.7\]]kha ma bkrus na yar lus smad gsum gyis phyag bya/_snyun gsol/_mkhan po thugs bde'am mi bde snyun gsol/_go 'dun chu dang so shing bsnyen/_mkhan po kha gdong 'khu ba la sogs pa'i yo byad 'di rnams bsnyen cing sta gon bya/_tshang mang du blta ste bsnyad/_mkhan po'i
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bshos rgyu dang ci yod pa las tshang mang du sbyor du bcug la zhal ta bya ste/_'di dang 'di sbyar ro zhes mkhan po la bsnyad/_sres pa dbul bar yid la bya zan za ba'i tshe mkhan po gang la sres pa mang du brim zhing bdag gi skal ba'ang mkhan po la dbul bar shes par bya/_lhung
[\[31b.2\]]bzed bkru/_zan za ba'i mdun logs [#]su mkhan po'i lhung bzed dang /_phor gzhong la sogs bkru bshal bya/_'on te bsod snyoms pa zhig na gsil ba yang ngo /_/mkhan po bsod snyoms pa zhig yin te 'khar gsil kha zas dang dri mas 'bags na'ang bkru/_de la de ste
[\[31b.3\]]dgos na tshags kyang ngo /_/mkhan po bsod snyoms la 'gro ste zan slar gnas su mi za 'am[#]/_slar gnas su mi 'khor ba lta bu la chu chags dgos na'ang bkru ste brdzangs[#]/_de'ang de ste na dri/_slob ma'ang slong mo la [#]'gro 'dod na bdag kyang bsod snyoms la mchi ste lhan cig
[\[31b.4\]]'grogs shing mchir rung ngam mi rung zhes dri/_'on te lhan cig tu 'dod na de nyid dang lhan cig tu 'jug_/bsod snyoms la lhan cig 'grogs su gnang ngam mi gnang dri [#]nas/_'grogs su rung ngo zhe na mkhan po dang lhan cig tu 'jug_/nyam nga ba la sogs pa la mdun du 'gro'o/_/
[\[31b.5\]]bsod snyoms la zhugs pa'i lam nyam nga ba'am khyi za [#]ba'am phyugs rdung [#]ba la sogs pa yod pa lta bu la bsel bya ba'i phyir slob mas bag bya ste mdun du 'gro'o/_/bsod pa zhig na de la bsngo/_/bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe khyim pas bdag la kha zas bzang po bsod cing zhim pa
[\[31b.6\]]byin na mkhan po la phul cig ces bsngo/_/ma 'grogs na [#]'khor nas bstan/_ma 'grogs te so sor dong nas slar 'khor na slob mas bdag kha zas ci rnyed [#]pa mkhan po'i spyan sngar brim par bstan/_rab tu bzang po btu ste bstab/_slob mas bdag gis [#]kha zas kyi nang nas
[\[31b.7\]]bzang po bsod cing zhim pa'i rnams mkhan po la bdar/_des kyang thams cad la tshod bzung [#]/_mkhan pos kyang zas bzang po bdar ba la tshad bzung [#]ste ci ran par blang de bzhin du bdag gi phyir slob ma las ci byed do cog la'ang tshod bzung ste ran par byed du gzhug_/chu snod dgang /_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]zan ma zos pa'i mdun du slob mas brtags chu dang btung chu dang phyi rol gyi chu snod gsum so sor dgang /_dus bsnyad bsod snyoms la 'gro ran pa'i nyi tshod dang gdugs tshod bab bam ma bab pa'i nyi tshod la sogs pa mkhan po la bsnyad[#]/_zos nas lhung
[\[32a.2\]]bzed la sogs pa bkru/_zan zos zin nas lhung bzed dang gzhi dang phor gzhong la sogs pa bkru/_'di dag gzhag_/snod spyad la sogs pa bkrus nas so so'i gnas gnas su gzhag pa la 'ang bya/_mchod rten la phyag bya ba'i phyir go 'dun dang chu la sogs pa bsnyen/_
[\[32a.3\]]mkhan po mchod rten la phyag byed cing mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang chu dang spos dang go 'dun la sogs pa bsnyen cing sta gon bya/_rkang pa bkru bar gtogs pa la nan tan du'o/_/nub mo mkhan po rkang pa bkru ba'i yo byad ci dgos pa kun nan tan du bsags[#]/_mal stan
[\[32a.4\]]bca'/_mkhan po'i mal stan la sogs pa sprug ste mal bya/_smad dkris [#]kyang dbul/_mkhan po nyal khar smad dkris [#]dbul sham thabs blang /_smad dkris [#]phul nas sham thabs bdag gis [#]blang /_rkang pa'i chu dang rten ma dang chol zangs bsnyen/_rkang pa bkru [#]ba'i chu dang
[\[32a.5\]]rkang rten gyi shing dang zangs la sogs pa bsnyen te bkru/_lham phyi mkhan po'i lham la rdul dang dri ma yod pa phyi/_slong ba'i byed par ma bsko bar [#]phyags ma thogs pa mthong na rtogs pa nyung ngur [#]ro zhes bya/_dge 'dun gyis mkhan pos phyags [#]pa la sogs par ma bskos par
[\[32a.6\]]mkhan po nyid sa phyags shing [#]'dug na mkhan pos bgyi ba mi rigs kyi bdag gis bgyi'o zhes bya ste las bya/_mkhan po na re nga'i bsod nams kyis bla'o zhes zer na gzhag kyang nyes med/_gos 'drub [#]par ma bskos par khab thogs te 'tshem na yang ngo /_/ltag ma bzhin
[\[32a.7\]]du dge 'dun gyis las byed par ma bskos par gos 'tshem pa la sogs pa'i las byed na'ang bdag gis bya'o zhes las de blang /_brtag pa bya ba dang span spun btogs pa dang [#]me tog dang 'bras bu btogs [#]pa dang so shing la sogs pa [#]yang dge sbyong gis so/_/khar la sogs
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]pa'i gzugs sems can du 'dug pa la sogs pa zhig pa dang span spun ni gtsug lag khang gi 'khor na ldam ldum skyes pa lta bu dang me tog dang shing tog btogs pa la sogs pa dang /_so shing rnga [#]ba la sogs pa ni slob ma dge sbyong gis bya bar gtogs so/_/sgo brdab cing
[\[32b.2\]]nang na gnas pa la go bar bya/_mkhan po la sogs pa su'ang rung ste de'i drung du 'gro la sgo bcad na nang na 'dug pa la go bar bya ba'i phyir sgo brdab/_de dal bus bya/_sgo brdab ba la dal bus brdabs[#]/_rgyun mi bsring /_sgo brdab pa'i rgyun mi bsring /_drag tu mi phul/_sgo dbye
[\[32b.3\]]ba'i phyir [#]drag tu mi phul/_'chang ba yang ngo /_/sgo bcad pa yang dag tu mi bcad/_dal bus shes bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'jug pa sgo [#]skyes la mi reg par ro/_/phyi nang du 'gro ba la shes bzhin du dal bus bya ste sgo'o cog gi sgo skyes la [#]mi reg par bya/_de la rim gro bya'o/_/mkhan po
[\[32b.4\]]la rim gro bkur sti cher bya/_gzhar/_mkhan po la [#]dus gsum phrad pa tsam gyis mi chog gi bsnyen cing gzhar/_de dang mi mdza' ba la ma yin/_mkhan po dang mi mdza' ba la mi gzhar ba ni mkhan po mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de la 'dzem par bya/_mkhan po dang
[\[32b.5\]]slob dpon la/_de'i bya ba la brtson/_mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi phyir las bya ba la ring du mi gzhag par myur du brtson 'grus su bya/_brtsams [#]pa gus shing gsong bor bya/_mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis bsgo ba'i las byed pa la nan tan du bzang por bya ba dang bkru bshal la sogs
[\[32b.6\]]pa dag par bya [#]lta bu dang lus gus pa'i tshul du gsong por bya/_zon dang bla mar bcas pas/_mkhan po dang slob dpon la bag yod pa'i zon dang btsun zhing [#]bla mar bya ba dang bcas par bya/_rje bo lta bu dma' ba'i sems kyis so/_/rje bo tsam du bsams la bdag dma' ba'i tshul
[\[32b.7\]]du bya'o/_/bla ma dang rje bo ni dbang che zhing rag lus pa yin te bdag [#]gi khrims dang chos la sogs pa'i rag mkhan po dang slob dpon la/_jo bo tsam du bsam mo/_/shes bzhin du bdag gi don kyang mi gcad[#]/_shes bzhin du zhes pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]la bya ba ltag tu bshad pa rnams le lo dang brjed par mi btang [#]zhing rtag tu shes bzhin du dran par bya/_bdag gi don kyang mi gcad [#]ces pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon la g.yog byas pas chog pa tsam du mi bya'i bslab pa dang bsgom pa'i don kyang mi gcad [#]par bya/_
[\[33a.2\]]dge ba tshol ba ci 'gyur/_ci yod [#]kyang rung ste bdag dge ba ci ltar spyod ces bsam zhing dgra bcom pa'i rim pa brgyad ci thob tu spyad cing bsgom [#]par bsams/_log [#]byed 'byung ba'i tshe bzlog_/bdag gi mkhan po dang slob dpon log pa la bltas pa'am/_khrims dag 'dral
[\[33a.3\]]bar gyur na slob mas mang po'i khrod du mi bya bar lkog [#]tu khyod la gsol ba'i skabs yod na zhes sngar byas la log pa las bzlog par gros gdab/_dge ba mi 'phel na gzhan la de bya bar gtod cig ces gsol/_slob ma de bdag gi mkhan po 'am slob dpon gyi 'khor na dge 'dun
[\[33a.4\]]gyi las che ba la sogs pa dang [#]dge ba spyod du mi khom ste mi ldog ste gud du song na ldog pa [#]gang yod na gzhan la slobs shig par gtad du ci gnang zhes bdag gi mkhan po la gsol/_chad par shes nas gnas su 'ongs [#]na gtad/_sU tra ltag ma ltar slob ma gsol na mkhan
[\[33a.5\]]pos kyang gud du btang nas [#]lobs pa tsam gyi tshe [#]slob tu btang ba'i rigs na gsol ba bzhin du gtang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang [#]bzlog_/slob ma gud du 'gro bar gsol ba de sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten [#]par 'gro ba zhig yin na mi btang [#]bar gzhag_/dge ba 'phel ba'i
[\[33a.6\]]phyir gtad du zin na'ang sdig pa'i grogs po dang ma bsten cig ces gdams te gtad/_dge bar bsko bar [#]de btab/_mkhan po [#]slob ma la bsod nams su 'gyur ba dge ba spyod du gzhug pa dang /_glegs bam la sogs pa byin/_ltung ba las 'byung ba'i phyir dang /_slob ma la
[\[33a.7\]]lhag ma man chad nyes pa zhig byung na chad pa dang 'chags su gzhug cing dbyung ba mkhan pos bya ba dang /_mthun par 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'grub par nan tan du'o/_/dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad chos gos dang ril ba la sogs pa slob ma la med na mkhan pos sbyar zhing bya'o/_/lhan
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]cig tu spyod [#]pa dang /_bdag gi slob ma la bya/_nye gnas dang /_bdag gi gan du [#]nye gnas su bcol zhing 'dug pa la bya[#]/_mkhan po dang /_bdag gi mkhan po la bya/_slob dpon dang /_bdag gi slob dpon bzhi la bya/_mkhan po gcig pa dang /_bdag dang mkhan po gcig pa
[\[33b.2\]]la[#]/_slob dpon gcig pa dang /_bdag gi grogs po bdag dang slob dpon gcig pa la bya/_'thams [#]pa dang /_bdag dang mdza' ba gtam [#]zlar chud pa la bya/_brtan pa dang /_bdag dang mdza' ba gros kyi zlar chud pa la bya/_'dris pa dang /_bdag dang mdza' ba'i phyir bdag gi
[\[33b.3\]]yon tan brjod pa la bya/_'thad pas bdag dang yid du 'ong ba'i phyir kho bo nor thug [#]thub tu khyer kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/_nad pa'i g.yog bya/_na ba zhig tu gyur na ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi g.yog bya/_snga ma byed pa med na rim gyis so/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar ming gis
[\[33b.4\]]smos pa rnams las rim bzhin du snga ma dag [#]med na phyi ma rim gyis nad g.yog bya/_lhogs shig pa'i slob dpon yang 'dir 'dus so/_/slob dpon lnga la lhogs shig pa'i slob dpon ring mod kyi slob dpon bzhi dang 'dra bar nad g.yog bya bar gtogs so/_/cig car de mi nus na [#]
[\[33b.5\]]gnas pa gang la bcar ba la'o/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon kun 'dus te cig car na la kun gyi nad g.yog nus na kun bya'o/_/mi nus na mkhan po'i nad g.yog bya'o/_/mkhan po med na slob dpon gnas gang la bcar ba la bya/_'di'i tshul du brtsams pa la'ang rab tu byung ba
[\[33b.6\]]bzhin/_dge bsnyen rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa la'ang rung rab tu 'byung bar skra bregs chos gos bskon la khrims ma phog gi bar du nad kyis btab pa lta bu yang de dge slong tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba bzhin du nad g.yog bya zhing gso'o[#]/_/nad pa tshangs pa mtshungs par
[\[33b.7\]]spyod pa la ma g.yel cig nad g.yog gong du smos pa rnams las byed pa med pa zhig na yang dge slong tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas dge slong kun gyis g.yog bya'o/_/g.yog ji ltar bya ba'i thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_de la g.yog med na mtha'i bar du sbyin nad pa mtshungs par
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]spyod pa la nad g.yog med na dge slong gang khrims gzhon pas nad g.yog bya'o/_/des mi chog cing mi nus na gral rim bzhin na [#]gang rgan pa'i mthar thug gi bar du dge 'dun thams cad kyis nad g.yog bya'o/_/nad pa nam 'chi ba 'am [#]sos pa'i mthar
[\[34a.2\]]dge ba gzhan btang ste [#]g.yog bya'o/_/_sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang phyag dar te nad pa'i g.yog byas pas dge 'dun gyis kyang snying rje ba'i phyir g.yog bya bar rab tu rigs so/_/dge 'dun gyi sman la nad pa 'ba' zhig gis spyad par brtags pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi spyi'i sman la
[\[34a.3\]]nad pas ni spyad cing bza' bar rigs te brtags pa'o/_/de ni sngon mi na'ang dge 'dun thams cad la dge slong sman gyi rub ma bas sman ci dgos zhes nang [#]gcig bzhin du 'brim [#]pa las drug sdes grogs cig [#]na ba'i phyir mi [#]na bas kyang sman mang du blangs nas bsgyur cing btsongs
[\[34a.4\]]te spyad pas na nad pa [#]'ba' zhig gis spyad [#]par brtags pa'o [#]zhes bcas/_de med na g.yog gis bslangs[#]/_dge 'dun spyi'i sman med na nad g.yog su byed pas bslangs shing btsal te nad pa gso'o/_/ma rnyed na dge 'dun gyis sbyin/_nad g.yog gis sman bslang du ma rnyed
[\[34a.5\]]na dge 'dun gyi dkor las zong phog ste/_nad g.yog tshol du gzhug_/med na sangs rgyas kyi sku la gsol ba man chad kyang ngo /_/[#]dge 'dun gyi dkor las sman gyi rin sbyin du'ang med na sangs rgyas kyi sku la gsol ba'i rgyan du gtogs pa man chad dkor las kyang sbyin/_skom [#]
[\[34a.6\]]dang gdugs gzugs pa la sogs pa mchod pa de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi las bya/_ltag ma ltar sman btsal te gsos pas ma sos shing nad pa na re bsod nams shig bskyed na thig [#]gi ba snyam zhes zer na/_dkon mchog gsum la gdugs [#]gzugs pa dang dge 'dun la skom brim
[\[34a.7\]]pa la sogs pa'i [#]yo byad dge 'dun gyi dkor las phyung ste spyad do/_/de'i med na sangs rgyas kyi las so ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi dkor med na sangs rgyas kyi dkor las kyang phyung ste spyad do/_/de dag gi blangs pa las ma shi zhing 'byor na sobs shig_/ltag ma rnams ltar sman dang
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bsod nams bskyed de nad pa de sos nas nad pas nad g.yog la dkon mchog dang dge 'dun gyi dkor las bdag gi phyir ji tsam god ces smras [#]la bdag gis 'byor pa ci god pa'i skyin pa sobs shig_/g.yog gis g.yog mi bya bar mi bya/_dge slong nad pa'i g.yog [#]su byed
[\[34b.2\]]pas nad pa la le lo dang g.yel bar mi byed pa'i [#]nad g.yog gis gus shing nan tan du bya/_don dang chos kyi ngag mi bcag_/don dang zhes pa ni dge slong nad pa na re sman dang kha [#]zas 'di lta bu zhig 'dod de byin na ni sos so zhes zer ba dang /_chos kyi dag mi bcag [#]ces pa ni yi
[\[34b.3\]]ge klag pa la sogs pa bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig skyed [#]cig ces zer na'ang nad g.yog gis ngag mi bcag par sbyar zhing bya/_chags pa'i dngos po slong na mi [#]dgag_/nad pa kho bdag gi nor bzang po sdug gu zhig la chags te ga re zhes zer na nad g.yog gis phyung ste bstan cing sbyin
[\[34b.4\]]no/_/mi bshad par mi bya/_nad g.yog gis nad pa la tshad med pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la sogs pa'i chos bshad de rtag tu dran par gyis shig ces bsgo/_nad pas de'i ngag mi bcag_/nad g.yog gis chos bshad pa la nad pas
[\[34b.5\]]kyang bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan cing dran par bya'i [#]ngag mi bcag go_/shi dogs na des dge 'dun gyi mal stan las theg [#]la gang zag gi la zhog shig_/dge slong nad pa de tshabs che ste shir [#]dogs na dge 'dun gyi [#]mal stan gyi steng nas theg la gang zag gi mal stan bting ste de'i steng du spo/_/
[\[34b.6\]]ji ltar spo ba'i thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_byug pa dang bkru ba'i gtam gyi [#]sngon du sgyu [#]yis so/_/nad pa dge 'dun gyi mal stan las theg [#]la gang zag gi mal stan la spo ba ni khyod shir nyer [#]mal 'phos zhes [#]mi bya'i sman dpyad dam lus la bkru ba'am byug pa'i phyir spo ba skad du bya
[\[34b.7\]]ste gang zag gi mal stan la bzhag_/de lta bur chad na nan tan du'o/_/nad pa shir nye ste [#]mi 'tsho bar gyur na yang nad g.yog gis le lo mi bya bar nad g.yog gis nan tan du bsrung zhing blta/_shi ba'i gos ma rung ba byas na des bkru dgos so/_/nad pa shi ba des mal stan dang
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gos la sogs pa ngan skyugs dang kha zas la sogs pas reg na nad g.yog [#]su byed byed pas bkru'o/_/dge 'dun 'du bar gnas brtan thog mar 'gro'o/_/dge 'dun gang du 'du zhing 'dong bar las brgya rtsa gcig pa lta bu gnas brtan nas zhu zhing bya dgos
[\[35a.2\]]pa dang 'khor dang slob ma ston cing [#]bskyang ba la sogs pa bya dgos te med du mi rung bas na 'dong ba'i thog ma la gnas brtan 'gro'o/_/'gro ba'i tshe lus pa la bsdad/_grong du mchod ston la 'dong ste gnas brtan snga [#]la 'khor gser bu dag 'phyi ste lus na gnas brtan gyis
[\[35a.3\]]kyang lus pa la bsdad/_de dag gis kyang de la'o/_/grong du mchod ston la 'dong ba las gnas brtan ni phyi [#]'khor slob ma dag snga ste phyi rol du 'thon na yang slob ma dag gis gnas brtan la [#]bsdad do/_/ma byung na [#]mi ring bar song ste'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar bsdad kyang gnas
[\[35a.4\]]brtan ma byung na mi ring bar 'phags te gnas brtan la bsdad/_grong gi drung du yang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar mi ring bar 'phags te bsdad kyang gnas brtan ma byung na gang du 'gro ba'i grong gi drung der kyang gnas brtan la bsdad do/_/de ste der 'jug khar [#]phyis 'ong na yang
[\[35a.5\]]ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar grong drung na sdod sdod pa las gnas brtan ma byung ste nang du 'dong khar gnas brtan phyis 'ongs pa snang na [#]yang slar bsdad do/_/de sde [#]spyan 'dren pa 'ongs na gnas brtan ma 'ongs kyi bar du'o zhes smros shig_/sU tra ltag ma ltar slar bsdad pa las khyim
[\[35a.6\]]bdag spyan 'dren pa 'ongs te nang du gshegs su gsol zhes zer na yang gnas brtan phyis 'ongs pa [#]snang gis/_gnas brtan ma phyin gyi bar du sdod cing ces bya/_lag chu gtong ba'i tshe na de ste zas bza' bar 'jug pa'i dus yod na yang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma rnams ltar sdod
[\[35a.7\]]sdod pa las gnas brtan ma phyin te grong gi nang du lhags nas lag chu btang ste gdugs tshod yod na yang gnas brtan la bsdad do/_/med de stan la 'dug na bzhag ste'o/_/gnas brtan kyang ma 'ongs la gdugs tshod kyang med na gnas brtan la mi bsdad par gnas
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]brtan gyi go gzhag la 'khod do/_/'dug pa dang phyi rol du'ang brtag_/gnas brtan gyis bdag gi 'khor nang du 'khod pa'i tshe dang ma 'khod pa'i mdun gyi [#]phyi rol tshun chad du tshul bcos pa'i phyir brtag cing blta'o/_/slob ma 'thor tam ma 'thor kyang brtag_/nyes par [#]
[\[35b.2\]]gyon tam nyes par dkris na mdzes pa'i phyir de la brda bya/_sU tra ltag ma ltar brtags te [#]sham thabs tshul ma yin par nyes par dkris sam chos gos mi sdug par gyon na gang nyes par gyon pa la lag brda la sogs pas go bar bya ste 'chos su gzhug_/ma [#]go na gan na 'dug
[\[35b.3\]]pa la bya/_sU tra ltag ma'i brdas ma go na gcig nas gcig tu sbran te nyes par gyon pa'i gan na su 'dug pas 'chos su gzhug[# ]/ma grub na rang gis kyang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma gnyis ltar byas kyang ma grub cing ma 'chos na gang nyes par gyon pa de nyid gnas brtan gyi gan du bkug
[\[35b.4\]]la bdag nyid kyis bcos de nyid kyis gsar bu dag la ma 'chal cig_/gnas brtan gyis 'khor dang gsar bu dag la bzhad gad dang rtsed mo dang cal col [#]mi bya'i btsun pa'i tshul du brjid bya'o/_/gang na de dag gtsug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i tshul gyis bsgo zhing bsgo shig_/
[\[35b.5\]]dgon pa zhig na gnas na'ang gnas brtan gyis bdag gi 'khor rnams dgon pa'i tshul du mi rgod dang rkun po'i dgra thabs dang 'dre gdon gnod par byed pa'i sar mi gnas pa la sogs pa slob ma dang 'khor rnams la bstan cing bsgo'o/_/gtsug lag khang na gnas na'ang 'khor
[\[35b.6\]]dang slob ma rnams la lha khang gi 'khor gyi zhal ta dang /_byi bdar dang lha ris kyi zhing dang dkor la sogs pa'i las bstan cing bsgo/_'ongs pas brtags te gnas pa [#]rnams la mal stan gyi phyir bsgo/_gud nas 'khor dang bcas pa'i dge slong dag cig 'ongs na [#]'ongs
[\[35b.7\]]pa de'i gnas brtan gyis bdag gi 'khor mi du yod pa dang /_mal cha dang gnas khang ci dgos pa brtag ste snga nas 'khod pa'i [#]dge skos dang mal cha rdzi la 'di snyed cig dgos so zhes bsgo/_'gro ba'i sa na/_'khor dang bcas pa'i dge slong dag [#]cig gud du 'dong na las 'di
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]la brtag cing bya ste/_phyogs dang /_yul phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i lam dang sa phyogs ma nor bar bya ba dang /_lam grogs dang /_lam na mi 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir tshong ba lta bu la sogs pa lam grogs bzang po dang /_gnas dang /_gang du 'dong
[\[36a.2\]]ba'i gnas de bde 'am mi bde [#]ya kar ji lta bu yod pa [#]snga nas dri zhing shis [#]par bya ba dang /_mal stan dang /_gnas de na mal stan dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'byor tam mi 'byor pa brtag pa dang /_grogs dag na ba la mi 'dor ram zhes brtag ste 'gro/_tshul [#]'grogs te 'dong pa'i dge
[\[36a.3\]]slong dag grogs dag na na 'dor mi 'dor ba brtag pa dang 'di rnams ltar gnas brtan gyis brtag cing sbyar te 'dong ngo /_/mi ring bar 'phags te thams cad kyi phyi nas gang [#]gis cung zad ma lus sam zhes dran par bya/_sU tra ltag ma ltar 'dong ba gnas nas pa zad du 'phags te
[\[36a.4\]]gnas brtan gyis 'khor rnams kyi lhung bzed dang chu tshags la sogs pa bkur [#]ba'i rdzas dag ma lus sam zhes bskul zhing dran par bya ba'i phyir bsgo'o/_/mi g.yeng ba dang /_sgo drug yul drug la 'bros shing 'phyar bar mi gtang [#]ba dang /_mi khengs par gsar bu dag la
[\[36a.5\]]bsko/_lus bsgyur [#]dang 'gyid ba la sogs pa ma byed cig ces gnas brtan gyis 'khor rnams la bsgo[#]/_grong dag tu 'jug na'ang thams cad kyis thams cad la'o/_/grong du mchod ston lta bu la gnas brtan so so'i 'khor mang po zhig 'dus na gnas brtan rnams kyis
[\[36a.6\]]bdag bdag gis [#]'khor la [#]bcos shing bstan dge slong [#]thams cad kyis kyang gcig la gcig [#]bstan cing bcos pa la bya/_kun shes par ro/_/grong du 'khod pa la ngo mi shes [#]shing mi bde ba'i phyir lo dang dus dang nyi tshod ci la zhugs pa dang mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gang yin
[\[36a.7\]]pa la sogs pa kun gyis [#]shes par bya/_sU tra 'og ma ltar spyod [#]pa shes par bya ba la'ang bya[#]/_spyad pa dang /_'gro nyal 'dug langs bzhir tshul bzhin du spyod pa dang /_spyod pa/_bsod snyoms byed pa'i tshe chang 'tshong ba dang /_stu 'tshong ma dang shan [#]pa'i nang du mi 'gro bar
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bstan pa/_bstan pa dang /_spyad pa dang /_spyod pa gnyis tshul bzhin du zhib tu gnas brtan gyis 'khor la bstan pa la bya/_nye bar ston pa dang [#]/_kha thon slob cing 'bul ba [#]la sogs pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_phung po dang khams dang /_skye
[\[36b.2\]]mched la sogs pa la bya/_kha zas dang /_bdag gi 'khor dang slob ma la sogs pa'i kha zas med na khyim pa yon bdag la sbyor du gzhug pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_gos la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad khyim pa yon bdag sbyor du gzhug pa dang /_na ba'i gsos la
[\[36b.3\]]sogs te/_na ba'i sman btsal zhing bsags pa dang yon bdag sbyor du gzhug pa la sogs pa dang [#]/_dgos pa 'grub [#]par bsdu/_dge 'dun gyi so nam du bya ba shing tog dang tshod rngad dang shing dang snod spyad dang /_gnas khang bcos pa la sogs pa yo byad du dgos so
[\[36b.4\]]cog gnas brtan gyis sbyar zhing bsdu/_dbyar tshul du zhugs pas gtsug lag khang ma bcos pa dag shes par bya ste 'chos su gzhug_/dbyar tshul du zhugs nas tshul gyi tshe gtsug lag khang mi 'dral zhing mi zag pa'i phyir/_gnas brtan gyis yon bdag gam
[\[36b.5\]]bdag gi 'khor 'chos su gzhug_/'chos su gzhug pa ni gnas brtan gyis brtags shing bltas la shes par bya ste 'chos su gzhug go_/'chos na spro bar bya/_tshul gyi tshe gtsug lag khang 'chos pa yon bdag dang bdag gi 'khor slob ma gang byed pa dag la 'di ltar
[\[36b.6\]]'chos na shin tu dge zhing bsod nams che'o zhes spro bar bya'o/_/[#]thams cad kyi [#]'khor du chud pa gtam 'dod pa mthun pa'i chos kyis bstabs shing bsdu/_gnas brtan so so'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i slob ma rnams la slob ma so so ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du/_phung po dang khams
[\[36b.7\]]dang 'du mched dang 'dul ba la sogs pa gang 'dod pa bzhin du/_gnas brtan gyis bshad cing bslab pa [#]la bya/_gcig tu na go sha dang rak+Shi ta dang bar ma lta bu ming mthun pa'i sder gtogs pa so so gcig la gcig chos slob cing bstan par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bya ste slob
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]cing nyan du gzhug pa la bya/_de ni so so dran [#]pa'i tshul gyis dge bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kha rog pa la bag yangs su'o/_/slob ma bsam gtan spyod cing dben pa la dga' na'ang bag yongs su gzhag_/bsam gtan spyod cing dben par 'dug tu
[\[37a.2\]]gsol na'ang bsam gtan gyi lung bshad cing bag yangs su gzhag le lo byed pa'i bag yangs su ni mi gzhag go_/khyim pa 'ongs na zan bgo zhing ngo /_/gtsug lag khang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du khyim pa zhig 'ongs na zan sbyin/_mi byed dam mi 'dod na chos kyi gtam de
[\[37a.3\]]la bya zhing bdag cag la 'di yod do zhes gyis shig_/khyim pa 'ongs pa de dge 'dun gyis zan mi [#]'byor tam mi sbyor [#]ram khyim pa de nyid nang [#]zan mi 'dod ces zer na chos bshad cing bstan la bdag cag la mgron du bya ba chos yod do zhes bya/_'khor can gyis thams cad
[\[37a.4\]]la brtag_/dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyis bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa'i dge slong rnams legs par spyod dam mi spyod pa brtag cing blta don med pa spyod na chad pas bcad/_sU tra ltag ma ltar brtags te/_don med pa dang mi dge ba spyod na chad pas bcad/_der
[\[37a.5\]]'gro ba la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bya/_rigs lnga [#]la sogs pa'i grong du 'gro na bdag tshul bzhin du bya zhing khyim pa yid dang mi 'gal bar spro bar sems bskyed pa'i phyir kho dang thabs mnyam pa dag gis dge ba spyod pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang /_kho nyid kyi chos las
[\[37a.6\]]dge bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan kyang brjod de spro bar bya/_thod rgal ba dang /_gtam gcig mjug ma rdzogs par gtam gcig [#]mgo 'dzugs pa la bya/_phyal ba'i gtam mi bya/_don med pa gtam sgrung lta bu dang khyab [#]la gcig gi rjes nas gcig gis mthud de zad [#]mi shes
[\[37a.7\]]pa lta bu la bya ste/_de lta bu byol song lta bu la bya ste/[# ]'di gnyis lta bu mi bya/_dge sbyong phyi ma sngar mi 'gro/_grong du 'gro na dge sbyong gral dma' ba sngon du mi 'gro/_mi 'dug_/grong du 'gro ba'i grogs su song song bas gtam zer ba'i mdun du song ste bar mi
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gcad[#]/_smra na lan glan/_grogs su song song ba la khyim mi de gtam [#]smra na lan gdab pas mi smra bar sngar kyang mi smra smra na lan mi gdab par yang mi bya bsgrub pa yang ngo /_/'grogs su song song ba de la khyim mi des chos kyi las shig bcol na'ang bsgrub cing
[\[37b.2\]]bya'o/_/gtam gyi bar chad mi gzhug dge slong grong du song song ba dang khyim pa de gnyis gtam zer zhing 'khod pa la 'grogs su song song bas gtam gyi bar chad glo [#]bur gyi gtam mi bya/_chos ma yin pa smra na dgag_/khyim pa dang dge slong de gnyis 'jig rten gyi chos
[\[37b.3\]]don med pa dang log pa'i chos sdig pa smra na grogs su song song bas dgag_/chos shig na rjes su yi rang /_lhag ma de gnyis chos shig tu smra na/_grogs su song song bas bstod [#]cing rjes su yi rang ba bya/_chos kyi phyir grub pa rnyed na blangs[#]/_ltag ma'i dge slong des
[\[37b.4\]]chos bshad pa las khyim pa des yon zhig phul na'ang /_grogs su song song bas blang ngo /_/rigs kyang na mi g.yeng mi khengs [#]'dug par ma yin/_rigs lnga'i grongs la sogs par lhags na dbang po lnga yul la bros te g.yeng ba dang lus sgyur byed cing 'gying ba mi bya zhing
[\[37b.5\]]grong bar du don med par yun ring du mi 'dug_/mig dbab/_grong bar du mig dbab mig phab na/_dbang po gzhan yang mi rgod pa'i phyir ro/_/khyim pa la chos kyi gtam bya/_khyim pa la khyim dang grong bar du chos bshad do cog ci bshad pa dang ci ltar bya ba'i thabs ni
[\[37b.6\]]'og nas 'chad do/_/sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa byas pa'i yon tan dang bsod nams bshad/_'dul ba dang /_dug gsum dang /_nga rgyal med cing thul bar bya ba bshad/_bsdam pa dang /_'dod pa rnam lnga la mi chags pa dang tshul khrims bsdam pa'o/_/tshangs par 'jug
[\[37b.7\]]pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa la sogs pa khrims lnga'i yan lag bshad/_gso sbyin dang /_nyin zhag gcig la khrims bzung [#]ba'i yon tan bshad/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song na bsod nams che bar bshad/_bslab tshig len du
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]de dag gzhug_/ltag ma 'di rnams bshad cing bstan nas gang 'dod pa bzhin du khrims dpog_/rtsom pa thams cad la lhung [#]ba'i sgor gyur pa/_dran par nan tan bya/_ci byed do cog thams cad la nyes par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur sdig yod dam med pa
[\[38a.2\]]nan tan du brtag cing dran pa sngon du btang ste shes par bya/_rag lus pas bsgo pa mi bya bar mi bya/_gnas brtan dang slob dpon la chos dang 'dul ba la sogs pa'i rag lus pa yin te/_slob ma la chos la sogs pa mi bstan par mi bya ba [#]mkhan po la rag las [#]pas
[\[38a.3\]]bsgo ba rnams la slob mas kyang bya zhing mnyan/_'ongs pa la thog mar mdza' ba'i gtam gyis tshur bde bar 'ongs sam zhes bya/_dge slong zhig gud nas 'ongs na mdza' ba'i tshul du bde bar 'ongs sam zhes bya/_gdong gi kha dog mdangs can 'dzum zhing thog mar 'gro'o/_/
[\[38a.4\]]gud nas 'ongs pa'i gan du ngom [#]zum nag par mi bya'i gdong mdangs can du byas la 'dzum zhing bsu/_khro gnyer med par ro/_/bsu ba'i tshe khros pa 'dra bar gdong bsdus te mi 'gro[#]/_/'on te khyim pa zhig na de la chos kyi gtam bya/_khyim pa zhig gud nas 'ongs na yang
[\[38a.5\]]chos bshad pa la sogs pa'i gtam bya zhing bsu'o/_/der [#]mi 'ong na grong drung bas mgu bas [#]ci nus par btsal/_gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun gyi gan du khyim pa dag mi 'ong na [#]grong drung gi gtsug lag khang na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gis khyim bdag la brid cing
[\[38a.6\]]mgu bar byas la ci nas kyang gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun gyi gan du 'khor bar bya/_chu dang stan dag kyang gzhag_/gtsug lag khang du khyim pa dag 'ong ba'i phyir maN+Dal bya ba dang kha lag bkru ba dang khri stan la sogs pa gding par bya/_phyag dar bya mal stan bca' chu
[\[38a.7\]]gzhag_/gtsug lag khang du nar mar bya dgos pa ni 'di rnams te gang gzhon pa nas las bya'o/_/lha khang gi 'khor phyag dar bya dge 'dun 'khod pa'i khri stan gding maN+Dal dang chag chag la sogs pa'i chu gzhag_/brim zan 'jog pa gsar bus bya/_skom brim zhing
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]zan 'jog pa yang dge sbyong yan chad na gzhon pas bya'o/_/dge slong gis byed na'ang sngon du byin len byas te brim/_phyi 'khor dag gam [#]mi mthun par byed na mi dgag_/lha ris kyi 'bangs rtse rgod dang /_ltum pa lta bu srog gcod pa dang chang 'thung ba la sogs pa log pa'i
[\[38b.2\]]chos bdag cag dang mi mthun pa zhig byed na mi dgag par gzhag_/de ste bdag dang gzhan la mi gnod pa'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar log pa'i chos spyod pa gzhag pa yang bdag dang gzhan la mi gnod na mi dgag par gzhag_/'on te de ltar de nus na bcad la chos kyis [#]
[\[38b.3\]]dbyung zhing bsgo/_/rtse rgod dam ltum pa [#]la sogs pa spyod pa bdag cag gis nus shing lcogs na chos bshad cing khrims phog la chos kyi [#]las su bsgo zhing bsod nams bskyed du gzhug_/phyi [#]'khor dag dang 'bye'am 'bros na de'i phyir bcos/_/rtse rgod dang ltum pa la [#]sogs
[\[38b.4\]]pa nyid la nyes pa zhig yod de tshad ma thub ste 'bros sam dge slong dag la mi dga' ste gud du 'gro na ci nas kyang mi 'bros par thabs ci yod pas bcos/_mi nus na gzhan du song shig_/sU tra ltag ma ltar mi 'bros par 'chol [#]ma nus na rtse rgod dang ltum pa mi dga' ba gud du
[\[38b.5\]]'bros su mi gzhug gi dge slong nyid gud du 'gro'o/_/de'i phyir 'thab pa'i mi smra/_rtse rgod mi mthun par byed pa de dag la 'thab [#]mo dang phyis sha glan pa la sogs pa'i tshig mi smra/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba na gnod pa byed na 'di ltar bya ste ci ltar thogs shing /_'gro ba bdag [#]
[\[38b.6\]]gis zin par ro/_/rtse rgod dang ltum pa la sogs pa zhig gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du rkun [#]po zhig byed na shags kyis thub par bya zhing sun dbyung ba'i phyir snga nas rku zhing mi srun no zhes mi gtse'i nam brkus pa'i tshe rdzas dang bcas par mngon sum du zin par bya/_rkun po
[\[38b.7\]]gzhan la'ang 'di 'dra ba'i tshul du bya/_ma lcogs na su la'ang byung rgyal du mi bsnyad [#]par/_rkun po byed pa de rdzas lag nas zin par ma nus shing rku ba ma chod na 'di rku'o mi srun no zhes gzhan la byung rgyal du mi bsnyad kyis [#]ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la bya ste/_rkun po chod par
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]nan tur gyis ches gsol/_gzhon nu dang /_rgyal po shi na 'tshab ma byed pa la bya/_mdza' bo dang /_rgyal po dang mdza' ba la bya ste gnang chen lta bu/_blon po dang /_blon po chen po las la gtogs pa la bya/_dra ma dang blon po'i las la ma gtogs
[\[39a.2\]]pa rigs btsun pa zhang blon dra ma lta bu dang [#]/_rgyal bu dang /_rgyal po'i tshab mar 'ong ba ma yin pa lta bu gzhan la bya/_zhabs [#]'bring ba la sbran te 'khor du gtsang mas thul bar bya/_rgyal po'i zhabs [#]'bring ba nang 'khor lta bu dang /_'di rnams la bya ste brdeg btsog dang [#]
[\[39a.3\]]bsad [#]phyag lta bu'i nan tur gyis ni mi bya'i[#]/_tshig gi nan tur gyis phyin chad mi byed par thul bar bya/_dge slong gi gnas su dge slong ma'o/_/ltag ma [#]bshad pa thams cad dge slong gis bya'o/_/zhes 'byung ba de gzhan du dge slong mas kyang bya'o/_/rab tu 'byung ba thams cad
[\[39a.4\]]du'o/_/ltag tu dge sbyong pha [#]rab tu dbyung ba'i cho ga byed pa bzhin du dge slong ma rab tu 'byin pa'i cho ga thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe ni der [#]gsol ba dang las byed pa la sogs pa las gzhan du'o/_/dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par byed
[\[39a.5\]]pa'i tshe gsol bar [#]byed pa dang khrims 'bogs [#]pa dang zhu ba byed pa ni dge slong gcig gis bya'i/_gzhan chos gos bsngo ba dang grib ma 'chal ba la sogs pa thams cad dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i cho ga bzhin du dge slong ma dag nyid kyis bya'o/_/'og nas cho ga 'byung ba
[\[39a.6\]]thams cad kyang bar chad dri ba'i zla dge slong gcig gis bya/_gzhan ni thams cad dge slong mas bya'o/_/'dir dge 'dun gnyis kyis so/_/dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe na dge 'dun pho dang /_dge 'dun mo sde gnyis kyis bya dgos te yul dbus su dge 'dun pho bcu mo
[\[39a.7\]]bcu gnyis mthar ni dge slong dkon na dge slong lnga dge slong ma drug gis bya'o/_/dge slong ma bar du [#]bzhag ste bar chad smra/_khrims 'bogs pa'i tshe bar chad 'dri ba la dge slong pha bar chad 'dri ba dang khrims rdzogs par 'dod pa dge slong ma gnyis kyi bar du/_dge slong ma mkhas pa gcig
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'dug la gcig la gcig tshig brgyud de dri'o/_/ngo mi tsha bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba bud med kyi rim gzhan no/_/dge slong pha la ni rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen [#]par rdzogs pa'i cho ga gnyis yod na dge slong ma ni de gnyis yod pa'i steng du/_dge slong [#]ma zhes bya ba lhag
[\[39b.2\]]par yod de/_dge slob ma'i cho ga ci [#]ltar byed pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_gnas na der ro/_/dge slob ma'i khrims nod pa'i tshe na'ang [#]mkhan mor lan cig gsol dgos/_dge sbyong ma nas dge slong ma'i bar du ste dus ni lo gnyis kyi bar du spyad/_dge slob mas spyad pa'i skabs ni/_
[\[39b.3\]]dge slong mar bya/_rab tu byung nas dge slob ma'i khrims nod de lo gnyis kyi [#]bar du dge slob ma byas shing spyad la/_de nas bsnyen par rdzogs par bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa [#]las des nyung na skye ba'i dus so/_/bag ma ma byas pa'i dge slong ma lo bco brgyad lon pa[#]/_dge slob
[\[39b.4\]]ma'i khrims phog ste dge slob ma'ang lo gnyis spyad la lo nyi shur kyang tshang bar bya ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par bya/_bag ma byas pa'i dge sbyong ma ni lo bcu lon la dge slob ma'i khrims phog ste/_dge slob ma'ang lo gnyis byas la lo bcu gnyis lon na bsnyen par rdzogs par byar
[\[39b.5\]]rung ngo /_/[#]bag ma byas na lo bcu gnyis yan chad bsnyen par rdzogs par ro/_/dge sbyong ma bag ma byas pa zhig na rgyo myong shing she khyer ba'i phyir lo bcu gnyis lon pa yan chad bsnyen par rdzogs par byar rung ngo /_/sa byin na skye'o/_/dge slob ma'i khrims phog cing byin na dge
[\[39b.6\]]slob mar gyur to/_/lo gnyis su brtsi ba'ang dge slob ma'i khrims thob pa tshun chad du brtsis/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis so/_/dge slong [#]ma'i khrims dbog pa ni dge slob ma'i dge 'dun gyis dbog go_/'bogs pa'i bdun du bar chad kyang lan cig dri slob pa sdom
[\[39b.7\]]pa'o zhes sbyin/_khrims dbog pa'i tshig ni slob pa sdom pa'o zhes brjod ci [#]gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis kyis bya/_de'i 'og tu bslab pa brjod/_dge slob ma'i khrims phog zin [#]nas khrims nyid gang yin pa bstan cing brjod do/_/khrims ni rgyang grags gcig phan chad grogs mo
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]gcig dang 'grogs/_chu rgal na lag pa sbrel skyes pa dang mi reg [#]skyes pa dang khyim gcig tu mi nyal smyan mi bya grogs kyi nyes pa mi 'chab gser dngul la mi reg gsang ba'i spu mi bregs[#]/_sa mi rko byin len ma byas pa'i zas mi bza' rtswa mi gcad [#]pa
[\[40a.2\]]dang dge sbyong gi khrims bcus bsnan te nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas par sdom pa ma thob na bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma yin no/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i mdun du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas sdom pa zhes bya ba gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis kyis cho ga bya
[\[40a.3\]]dgos te bar chad kyang lan cig dris la tshangs par spyod [#]pa'i gnas sdom pa sbyin tshangs par spyod pa'i cho ga 'di ma byas par bsnyen par rdzogs par byas kyang khrims mi 'chags/_sngar gsang ste ston pa'i 'og tu sbyin/_tshangs par spyad pa'i gnas sdom pa sngar gsang ste ston pas bar
[\[40a.4\]]chad dris la sbyin zhing dbog_/dge 'dun gyis so/_/tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas su sdom pa'i cho ga sbyin pa ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis bya'o/_/bar chad dris te'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis tshangs par spyod pa'i cho ga bya ba ni dge 'dun ma nyid kyi gan du'ang lan cig dri/_gsol
[\[40a.5\]]nas so/_/tshangs par spyod pa dge 'dun gyis dbog pa yang khrims nod pas gsol ba byas nas dbog_/chos gos lnga dang ngo /_/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe dge slong ma de la chos gos lnga bsngo/_/gnas la shing drung ma gtogs par ro/_/gnas bzhi la shing drung ma
[\[40a.6\]]gtogs par gnas gsum bsgo/_/ltung ba brgyad dang /_phas pham pa brgyad kyang bsgo ste mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_rku ba dang mi la gsod pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_skyes pas reg ste/_'dod chags langs pa dang /_grogs mo'i pham pa bzhi las gzhan [#]kyang rung bcabs
[\[40a.7\]]pa dang dge slong ma chad pas [#]bcad pa ma chags [#]shig ces gros btab pa dang ngo /_/lci ba'i chos bsgo lci ba'i chos brgyad kyang bsgo ste/_dge 'dun pho med par khrims rdzogs par byas pa dang gso sbyin dge slong la ma dris pa dang /_dge slong dang nye bar tshul du ma zhugs pa dang /_dge
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]slong gi nyes pa la rgol ba dang dge slong khrims [#]par 'thab mo byed pa dang /_dge slong pha khrims rdzogs pa la phyag ma byas pa dang lhag ma'i chad pa/_dge 'dun pho la ma byas par phyung ba dang /_dge 'dun sde gnyis med par tshul nas 'byung ba 'jug pa dang brgyad do/_/ltung ba dang
[\[40b.2\]]dge sbyong gis bya ba'i mtshams su'o/_/lci ba brgyad bsgo ba'i skabs ni phas pham pa brgyad bsgo ba'i 'og tu bsgo/_krid drug_/dge slong mar mi gnang rnam pa drug yod de/_'og nas ming gis bshad pa rnams so/_/'di la chos mi skye'o zhes so/_/mi gnang ba rnam pa 'di drug
[\[40b.3\]]pa ni zhing ma yin pas khrims mi 'chags te dge sbyong dang dge slong ma'i khrims kyang mi dbog khrims phog pa zhig na'ang dbyung /_mtshan gnyis pa/_pho mtshan mo mtshan gnyis ka yod pa/_gle [#]'dams pa stu dang rkub gnyis 'dams te gcig tu gyur pa'o/_/rtag par khrag zag
[\[40b.4\]]pa dang [#]/_rgyun mi 'chad par khrag zag pa'i mo mtshan no/_/khrag med pa/_stu khrag yang mi zag pa ste bcu gnyis man chad la mi zag pa dang lnga bcu yan chad la khrag mi zag pa ni ma gtogs te de la mi bya'o/_/mtshan ma tsam pa/_mo mtshan chung zhing mtshan ma tsam du 'dug pa la
[\[40b.5\]]bya/_mtshan ma tsam du gyur ba'i mtshan ma de las gsungs so/_/sU tra ltag ma mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni gcin 'ong ba'i bu gu yod pa tsam du zad kyi mi tshangs [#]par spyod du mi bzod pa'o/_/sngon rab tu byung ba/_sngon rab tu byung ste khrims phul ba dang 'di rnams lta bu dmigs kyis kyang
[\[40b.6\]]ma yin nam zhes dris la yin na rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_phra mo la sogs pa'i rab tu dbyung ba'i dngos por chud pa'o/_/'dul ba'i sde phran tshegs zhes bya ba'i nang nas rab tu dbyung ba'i cho ga 'byung ste rdzogs so//_//mi ma yin pa'i rgyud
[\[40b.7\]]dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan [#]ni sdom pa'i zhing ma yin no/_/lam rgyud lnga la mi ma gtogs pa'i [#]lha'i rgyud kyang 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la chags shing skyid pa'i phyir khrims mi 'chags byol song yang glen pa'i phyir khrims mi 'chags/_na rag kyang sdug bsngal bas bsgribs pa'i phyir
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]khrims [#]mi 'chags/_'dre yang khro ba'i phyir khrims mi 'chags/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi yang nga dang khyod kyi bya ba med cing bye brag mi 'byed pas khrims mi 'chags/_lam rgyud [#]'di bzhi dang byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi [#]'di ltar khrims mi 'chags pa
[\[41a.2\]]yin pas rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_mtshan lan gsum du gyur na yang yin no/_/skyes pa las bud med kyi mtshan du gyur yang bud med [#]las skyes pa'i mtshan du gyur/_de las yang bud med kyi mtshan du gyur pa lta bu'i mi la ni khrims phog kyang mi
[\[41a.3\]]'chags te de lta bu'i mi la [#]ni rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/_/thog ma dag gis ni mi zhig go_/dge slong zhig las mtshan gyur na'ang thog ma lan gnyis kyi bar du ni khrims med par ma song gi lan gsum du gyur pa'i tha mas [#]khrims med par song ste dge
[\[41a.4\]]slong du mi rung ngo /_/len pa'i tshe na'ang skye'o/_/khrims mi 'bogs pa'i tshe na skyes pa las bud med kyi mtshan du gyur kyang skyes pa'i khrims phog mod kyi bud med kyi khrims thob par [#]'gyur/_bud med las mtshan gyur kyang de bzhin/_mkhan po med kyang der [#]ro/_/mkhan po med par
[\[41a.5\]]dge 'dun dang slob dpon gyis rab tu dbyung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas kyang khrims [#]'chags so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas kyang ngo /_/dge sbyong gi khrims 'bogs pa'i tshe mkhan po dge sbyong nyid dang khyim pas byas kyang 'chags/_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[41a.6\]]pa la ni mkhan po khyim pa dang /_dge sbyong gis byas na rung ba dang mi rung ngo zhes bcas pa med do/_/dge slong ma yin par shes na mi rung ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar dge sbyong gi mkhan po khyim pa dag gis bya ste/_dge sbyong gis [#]khrims nod pa nyid kyi yid la mkhan po dge sbyong dang khyim pa
[\[41a.7\]]yin par shes te khrims mi 'chags so snyam bsam [#]pa dang phyis mi rung bar shes na khrims med cing mi 'chags par 'gyur ro/_/nyid kyis phul na mi rung ngo /_/khrims nod pa'i tshe gang nod pa des nga la mkhan po mi dgos so zhes zer zhing mi 'dod na khrims mi 'chags so/_/de dag
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gi ming ma brjod na mi rung ngo /_/khrims [#]nod pa'i tshe mkhan po dang khrims nod pa nyid kyi ming ma brjod na khrims mi 'chags te/_mkhan po'i ming ma brjod pa ni mi 'chags pa nyid du mi 'gyur/_dbang lus pa dge 'dun gyi na'ang mi rung /_khrims nod pa'i tshe dge 'dun las khrims
[\[41b.2\]]'thob pas na dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i ming ma brjod na'ang khrims mi 'chags/_khyim pa dang mur 'dug gi tshul gyis na mi rung /_ka sha med par mur 'dug dang khyim pa'i rgyun du zhugs te rab tu byung [#]ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i khrims phog na mi
[\[41b.3\]]'chags so/_/gcer pa [#]dang 'khrugs pa dang /_gos med par gcer bu dang sems 'khrugs shing khros pa dang /_gang [#]'cha' ba mi rung /_bud med skyes pa dang nyal lo cog shi ba dang 'di rnams lta bu la khrims phog [#]kyang mi 'chags so/_/skyes pa gong 'cha' ba ni gnang ba dang mi gnang
[\[41b.4\]]bar khrims bcas pa ni [#]med do/_/'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig gis ni [#]bud med dang 'dra'o zhes kyang bshad do/_/spangs par mtshan ma las ldog pa khas ma blangs na mi rung /_nyes pa zhig byung ste chad pas bcad na nyes pa [#]mthong ngo zhes zer zhing chad pa byed du mi btub pa dang chad pas
