[\[41b.5\]]bcad na ngas nyes med kyi chad pa byed du mi 'dod de zhes zer ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyis [#]bar du gcod do zhes gsungs pa'i chos la bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i chad pa ma byas sam/_nyes pa ma mthol bar khrims phul te khyim [#]par song ba las slar khrims nod
[\[41b.6\]]na sngon gyi nyes pa [#]dor ro zhes khas [#]mi len par rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par byas kyang khrims mi 'chags/_snga ma'i rim bzhin ni nyes byas pa tsam mo/_/ltag [#]tu dge bsnyen dang dge sbyong dag bsnyen par rdzogs par [#]rim par phog shig ces rim par 'byung ba bzhin du ma byas
[\[41b.7\]]te/_cig car bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na khrims ni chags [#]te mkhan po dang dge 'dun la nyes byas/_mkhan por mi gsol ba yang ngo /_/mkhan por gsol ba'i tshig mi [#]byas par khrims phog na khrims mi 'chags te/_mkhan po dang dge 'dun la nyes byas/_bar chad ma dris
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]na yang ngo /_/bar chad ma dris par khrims phog na yang mkhan po dang dge 'dun la nyes byas su 'gyur te khrims ni 'chags so/_/med la kha [#]blangs te byin na yang ngo /_/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa [#]de la 'chags med pa lta bu yang med par yod do zhes
[\[42a.2\]]zer ba la khrims phog na khrims ni 'chags te mkhan po dang dge 'dun la nyes byas/_skyes pa bud med lta bu dang bud med skyes pa lta bu ni mtshan tha dad pa ma yin no/_/skyes pa bud med kyi gzugs su 'dug pa ni khrims phog kyang nyes byas mkhan po dang dge 'dun la yod du zad kyi
[\[42a.3\]]khrims ni 'chags so/_/nyes pa yod pa ni bud med skyes pa 'dra ba/_dge slong ma'i khrod na 'dug na bud med kyi khrod nas [#]skyes pa gcig cig [#]g.yog byed cing 'dug ste mi tshangs par spyod pa lta zhes 'phya ba'i phyir ro/_/de lag chad la sogs pa'i nang du gtogs so/_/ltag tu bshad
[\[42a.4\]]pa khrims ni 'chags kyi nyes byas yod do zhes 'byung ba'i sU tra ltag ma [#]gong du lag rdum bcug na nyes byas so zhes zer ba bzhin du khrims ni 'chags kyi mkhan po dang dge 'dun la nyes byas su 'gyur ba la bya/_sdig pa'i mtshan dang tshul tha dad pa gling gzhan las skyes pa yang ngo /_/
[\[42a.5\]]sme ba dang sha mtshan la sogs pa sdig tu 'gyur ba'i mtshan du 'dug pa dang /_mi yin mod kyi rkang lag phyugs su 'dug pa lta bu dang /_shar phyogs dang nub phyogs kyi gling chen po dang gling phran gyi mi dang 'di rnams lta bu dang khrims phog kyang nyes byas so/_/sen mo gcig pa dang /_sor
[\[42a.6\]]mo 'byar te sen mo gcig pa dang sor mo ma 'byar bar sen mo gcig tu 'dug pa/_rkang lag ltebs pa dang /_shog shog lta ba ste bkug nas rgyas btab pa lta bur ltebs pa/_phyed shi ba dang /_gzhogs phyed skams pa dang /_spyi ring ba dang /_spyi bo cog cog [#]por ring por 'dug ba/_skra ra ri
[\[42a.7\]]can dang /_skra tshum bu tshum [#]bu ra ri can du 'dug pa/_mdun dang rgyab sgur ba dang /_mdun 'bur te phyir dgye ba dang rgyab tu 'bur te nang du sgu mi gcig la gnyis kar ldan yang rung gcig dang ldan yang rung ba la bya/_sor mo drug pa dang /_sor mo drug du skyes pa dang /_'byar ba dang /_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]sor mo 'byar ba dang /_med pa dang /_lag mthil 'ba' zhig yod pa/_rdzi ma rung ba can dang /_rdzi ma'i spu nang rim du skyes nas mig la rdung zhing [#]'tshag_/sre mo dang 'ug pa dang /_sre mo'i [#]mig 'dra ba/_'ug pa'i mig 'dra ba/_log [#]pa dang /_mig gi grwa mdun rgyab tu log pa/_
[\[42b.2\]]phrad pa dang /_sna gong du gyur te mig_/'phyang ba dang /_mig gi 'bras bu lhung bar [#]thug par 'phyang ba dang /_mig [#]dmar po dang /_mig gi sprin tshil bu dmar por 'dug pa/_dkyil mig gi mig lta bu dang /_mig la dkar po rim pa gcig nag po rim pa gcig u [#]shud kyi ri mo
[\[42b.3\]]'dra bar 'dug pa/_mig yangs pa/_mig rkyen du ma bab par che ba/_grwa dang /_mig tu/_mdzer [#]pa skyes pa/_'brum bu can dang mig la 'brum bu yod pa la bya/_shu ba can gyi mig dag dang /_mig la shu ba chen po shu bar 'dug pa/_rna ba ser po/_/rna ba'i kha dog ser po yung ba [#]
[\[42b.4\]]'dra ba/_dkar po/_rna ba'i kha dog shog shog 'dra ba/_dmar po/_rna ba'i kha dog khrag 'dra ba/_gce'u lta bu/_rna ba [#]gce'u 'dra ba sbu gu can no/_/g.yan pa/_sha rtag tu g.ya' ba/_shu ba shu/_shu ba re re tsam 'dug pa/_chen po/_shu ba chen por byung ba/_rngo dang /_g.yan pa lta bu/_
[\[42b.5\]]mje rlig pa'i nang du nub pa [#]dang /_rlig pa'i nang na mje 'dug ste mje rlig pas g.yogs pa/_glen pa/_legs nyes kyi bye brag mi phyed pa dang /_lce med thog ma nas ma skyes pa/_rkang lag gcig pa/_rkang lag ya gcig pa/_med pa'o/_/gnyis ka med pa/_skra sngon po/_skra mthing
[\[42b.6\]]gar 'dug pa/_bal glang ba/_bal glang [#]gi mgor 'dug pa/_rta khyi/_rta mgo 'dra ba khyi mgo 'dra ba/_ba lang /_ba lang gi mgo 'dra ba/_gnyan[#]/_lug gi mgo 'dra ba/_ri dwags ri dwags gang yang rung gi mgo 'dra ba/_nya nya'i mgo 'dra ba/_sbrul/_sbrul mgo 'dra ba/_ring
[\[42b.7\]]po/_mgo ltag pa nas 'phral [#]bar mchu ring du 'dug pa/_mgo mang po/_lus gcig la mgo mang du yod pa/_shing tA la'i mgul/_mgul ring ba dang tA la 'dra bar mgul la khram [#]nyer du 'dug pa/_skrangs pas spyod lam chad pa/_lus skrangs te spyod lam bzhir spyod mi
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]nus pa ltag nas sen mo gcig pa zhes bya ba man chad lta bur 'dug pa spyod lam chad [#]pa/_mi na ba 'di dag kyang ngo /_/ltag nas sen mo gcig ces [#]'byung ba man chad lta bur 'dug pa mi nar zin kyang bcug na nyes byas/_na ba de dag kyang der ro/_/sen mo gcig
[\[43a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba man chad kyi gzugs su 'dug la na ba'ang bcug la nyes byas khrims ni 'chags/_ma rung bar [#]ni rkun por ro/_/yul mtha' [#]'khob kyi bye brag mi phyed cing 'dul dka' ba zhig las bcug na'ang ltag tu rkun po'i rgyal mtshan can bcug na nyes byas so zhes 'byung ba
[\[43a.3\]]dang 'dra/_pha bzhin du phar bsam pa'i rgyal pos gnang na yang 'gyur ro/_/pha ma la ma dris kyang rgyal po'i 'bangs su gtogs pa las [#]rgyal pos gnang ste bcug na'ang nyes med do/_/gnang ba dang dri ba dang 'chang ba la gso gso ba yang pha bzhin/_pha ma la dris te gnang ba dang
[\[43a.4\]]pha ma gnyis ka shi ste med pa ni[#]/_bu zhig gzhan gyis gso ste 'chang 'chang gso gso ba zhig yin na/_pha ma la dri ba ma yin gyi 'chang zhing gso gso ba'i mi des gnang na/_bsnyen par rdzogs par rung ste nyes med do/_/mi'i rgyud ma yin pa la ma yin/_pha ma mi'i rgyud ma yin te byol
[\[43a.5\]]song lta zhig yin na dri mi dgos te rab tu phyung yang nyes med mtshams med par yang mi 'gyur/_pha ma med de gso zhing 'chang 'chang ba'i mi dang pha ma byol song yin pa zhig bsad na mtshams med par mi 'gyur/_bskyed pa dag la de'o/_/pha ma bsad na mtshams med par 'gyur na [#]ni pha ma gang
[\[43a.6\]]gi mngal dang khu ba las skyes pa de nyid bsad na mtshams med par 'gyur/_mtshan du gyur kyang ngo /_/bdag gi lus bskyed pa'i pha ma nyid pho mtshan dang /_mo mtshan gyur pa las bsad kyang mtshams med par 'gyur/_de ltar byas na ma bsad pa la sogs pa'i gtso bo/_sU tra ltag ma
[\[43a.7\]]gnyis ltar pha ma ma yin no zhes bshad pa bsad pa'i nang na gtso ste/_mtshams med par 'gyur ba'o/_/bslus pa ni mi tshangs par spyod pas pham pa las myong ba dag na'o/_/dge slong mas [#]bslus na khrims mi 'chags so zhes 'byung ba ni/_dge slong ma phas pham pa ma yin pa la mi tshangs par
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]spyod na dge slong ma bslus pa yin te/_dge slong ma mi 'dod de nan gyis mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_dge slong mas lag pa mer bcug ste dga' bar ma tshor ba lta bu spyod pa yang dge slong ma bslus pa yin no zhes sU tra'i TI ka [#]las 'chad do/_/kha cig na re des ni bslus par mi chud de mi
[\[43b.2\]]tshangs par spyod [#]pa las dga' bar dge slong mas kyang tshor na dge slong ma bslus pa yin no zhes bshad do/_/skyes pa mi tshangs par spyod pa song [#]song ba las/_dge slong ma 'dod chags kyi sems kyis sngar nas [#]pham zin ba [#]mi tshangs par spyod kyang dge slong ma bslus par mi chud do/_/
[\[43b.3\]]dmas pa las skyes par gyur [#]na rab tu dbyung ba dang /_bsnyen par [#]rdzogs par bya ba'i rigs so/_/dge slong ma byed byed pa las khrims phul ba las mtshan gyur pa zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod de 'ongs na dge slong pha'i khrims dpog tu rung ste 'chags/_mi tshangs pa'i phas pham
[\[43b.4\]]pa spyod pa yang ngo /_/dge slong ma la phas pham pa brgyad yod pa las dge slong pha'i phas pham pa bzhi ma gtogs pa lhag ma bzhi las gang yang rung ste spyad pa'i 'og tu mtshan gyur pa zhig [#]bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i khrims nod du 'ongs na yang bsnyen par rdzogs par byar rung ste khrims
[\[43b.5\]]'chags/_gnas pas bud med bsnyen par rdzogs par gtogs so/_/dge slong ma khrims rdzogs [#]par byed na dge 'dun pha gud du ma [#]btsal gyi gang nye zhing gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i phyir nas zhu zhing las byed pa'i de nyid kyi dge 'dun las byas [#]zhing mnod do/_/
[\[43b.6\]]yang gcig tu na khrims nod pa'i mkhan po gud nas gsar du 'ongs pa zhig yod na de la mi bya'i snga na 'khod [#]'khod pa'i nang nas mkhas pa gcig gis mkhan po bya'o/_/'gyur ba'i gtam na zhig_/khrims nod pa zhig khrims phog pa'i las byed bzhin du/_nga [#]khrims mi nod do [#]zhes
[\[43b.7\]]bya ste mnod na khrims mi 'chags/_dris pa mang ba'i rab tu dbyung ba'i dngos por chud pa rdzogs so//_//'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba dgra bcom pa u pA lis [#]dris pa las rab tu 'byung ba'i cho ga 'byung ba'i mdo/_/[#]rang bzhin stor bas byas na slar phul ba ma yin
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]no/_/dge slong 'dre gdon la sogs pas myos [#]shing mi dran par gyur pa dang lus kyi khams la nad zhugs te khong nas dge slong phar mi dran rang bzhin nyams pas khrims 'bul lo zhes kyang phul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/der ma yin no/_/pha rol po [#]sU tra ltag ma ltar
[\[44a.2\]]mi dran zhing myos [#]pa zhig la khrims 'bul lo zhes byas kyang phul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lkugs pa la ma yin no/_/pha rol po lkugs pa [#]smra mi shes pa dang /_'on pa mi thos pa zhig la khrims 'bul lo zhes byas kyang phul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pa'i rgyud la'ang ma yin/_
[\[44a.3\]]lam rgyud lnga la mi ma gtogs par rgyud bzhi gang yang rung ste khrims 'bul lo zhes byas kyang phul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ma go ba la ma yin/_khams gzhan gyi skad mi mthun te brda mi phrad pa dang /_brda phrad kyang sgra bskyungs te smras pas ma go ba lta bu ni khrims 'bul lo zhes [#]kyang phul
[\[44a.4\]]ba ma yin no/_/dben pa la yang ma yin mi med pa dgon pa'i khang stong lta bu dben pa sus kyang ma thos par khrims 'bul lo zhes byas kyang phul ba ma yin no/_/dben par 'du shes su 'ang ma yin/_dgon pa 'am khang stong mi med pa snyam du bsams te khrims 'bul lo zhes byas su [#]
[\[44a.5\]]zin kyang khrims phul bar mi 'gyur sU tra 'di yan chad ltag ma'i rnams slar bzlog ste/_de rnams lta bu ma yin pa la khrims 'bul lo zhes byas na phul [#]bar 'gyur/_slob pa 'bul lo/_/yid la khrims 'bul bar bsams te slob pa 'bul lo zhes byas pa bdag gnas shing
[\[44a.6\]]spyod pa slob pa 'bul ba yin pas phul bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas yin la khrims 'bul bar bsams te sangs rgyas 'bul lo zhes byas nas [#]sangs rgyas la phyogs shing brten pa [#]yin pa'i phyir khrims phul bar 'gyur ro/_/chos zhi ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir zhugs pa [#]
[\[44a.7\]]chos 'bul lo zhes byas na'ang khrims med par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun thog ma bdag dge 'dun las 'thob cing mtshungs par spyod pa'i grogs dge 'dun yin pas de phul na'ang med/_mdo sde bdag thog ma mdo sde'i phyir slob pa [#]dang nyan pa dang spyod cing sgom pa'i phyir khrims blangs pa
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]yin pas mdo sde dbul zhe na med par 'gyur/_'dul ba/_'dul ba'i sde nyid slob pa'i khrims yod pas 'bul lo zhes byas na'ang khrims med par 'gyur ro[#]/_/ma lta bu/_ma lta bu nang du mdo sde dang 'dul ba kun 'dus te mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos nyid yin pas ma lta bu 'bul
[\[44b.2\]]lo zhes byas na khrims med par 'gyur/_slob dpon slob dpon lnga la gnas shing /_chos dang khrims la sogs pa [#]de las slob pa yin pas/_de la 'bul lo zhes byas na khrims med par 'gyur/_mkhan po/_/bdag thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe mkhan po la gnas nas
[\[44b.3\]]khrims nod [#]pa dang /_phyin chad kyang de la [#]gnas shing spyod pa yin pas de 'bul lo zhes byas na'ang med par 'gyur/_khyim gnas su bdag zung shig gam/_bdag khyim par zung shig ces byas na'ang khyim pa la khrims med pa yin pas khrims phul bar 'gyur te/_dge sbyong ngam
[\[44b.4\]]bdag dge sbyong du zang shig ces byas na'ang /_dge sbyong la khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu med pas na[#]/_khrims chen po ni phul bar 'gyur/_dge sbyong gi [#]khrims ni yod/_nyug [#]rum mam/_ma ning rnam pa lnga la mtshan bcad pa la ma rul pa'am ste nyug [#]rum du ltos shig ces byas
[\[44b.5\]]na'ang khrims mi 'chags te med par 'gyur ro/_/ma ning ngam/_ma ning rnam bzhi lta bur ltos shig byas na'ang khrims mi 'chags pa'i phyir phul bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dge slong ma bslus par ltos shig ces byas na'ang dge slong ma bslus pa khrims mi 'chags pa yin pa'i
[\[44b.6\]]phyir khrims mi 'chags par 'gyur te phul bar 'gyur/_bslus pa 'am rkun gnas sam/_bdag rkun gnas su gzigs shig ces byas na'ang rkun gnas su khrims mi 'chags pa'i phyir phul bar 'gyur/_tha dad du gnas pa 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la [#]gzhan log par
[\[44b.7\]]bltas [#]pa de ba ha hi'i [#]chos lta bu ste/_tha dad par ltos shig ces byas na'ang khrims phul bar 'gyur/_mi gnas pa 'am[#]/_tshul khrims dang lta ba dang lhan cig mi gnas pa ste phas pham pa lta bu la bya ste/_mi gnas par ltos shig ces byas na khrims [#]med par 'gyur/_mur 'dug gam
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]mur 'dug tu 'jug pa 'am/_dge slong las mur 'dug tu zhugs te chos gos bor nas skya rengs [#]byung ba 'am/_chos gos bor kyang sems kyis mur 'dug la phyogs na khrims med par song ngo zhes bya ba lta bu ste/_mur 'dug tu 'jug par ltos shig ces byas
[\[45a.2\]]na'ang khrims med par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_ma bsad pa ma bsad par ltos shig ces byas na'ang khrims med par 'gyur/_pha bsad pa'am pha [#]bsad par ltos shig ces byas na'ang [#]khrims med par 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa/_dgra bcom pa bsad par ltos shig ces byas
[\[45a.3\]#]na'ang khrims med par 'gyur/_dge 'dun phye dge 'dun phye bar ltos shig ces byas na'ang khrims med par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par [#]gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung bar ltos shig ces byas na'ang khrims med
[\[45a.4\]]par 'gyur te phul bar chud/_ma bsad pa zhes 'byung ba'i sU tra man chad mtshams med pa yin te/_khrims mi 'chags pas na de lta bur ltos shig ces byas na'ang khrims phul bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/sU tra 'di yan chad khrims phul bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba kun du [#]sU tra kun sems
[\[45a.5\]]kyis 'bul bar bsams na/_sU tra ltag ma'i tshig gang yang rung ste smras na khrims med cing phul bar 'gyur ro/_/chog go bdag ni tshe dang ldan pa dag tshangs pa [#]mtshungs par spyod pa dang [#]gnas pa'i spyod pas chog go_/mi 'dod do zhes byas la sems kyis kyang khrims phul par bsams na khrims
[\[45a.6\]]phul bar 'gyur te/_de la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang na gnas par gcig dang zas dang nor rdzas la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad gcig [#]tu spyod par gnas pa la bya/_spyod pa zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi las brgya rtsa gcig lta bu la mthun par spyod pa la bya'o/_/gnas pa dang spyod pa
[\[45a.7\]]dang gnyis ka chog go zhes smras na'ang phul bar 'gyur/_gnas pa [#]dang spyod pa gcig [#]gis chog go zhes byas na'ang phul bar 'gyur/_phul ba'i cho ga'o//_//[#]mi tshangs par spyod pa'i phas pham pa 'chad do[#]/_/bcug reg dga' bar tshor na'o/_/mi tshangs par spyod pa pham pa'i yan lag drug
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dang ldan na pham ste bcug kyang bcug reg kyang reg dga' bar tshor ba dang yan lag gsum/_'dzag byed do/_/gcin 'dzag pa ste pho mtshan la bya ste/_pho mtshan gyis bcug pa dang yan lag bzhi der [#]ro/_/pho mtshan gyis mo mtshan du bcug pa dang yan lag lnga ma nyams par ro/_/
[\[45b.2\]]mo mtshan dang /_kha dang /_rkub gsum ma snad cing ma nyams par byas pa dang yan lag 'di drug ldan na pham par 'gyur/_yan lag gcig ma tshang na sbom por 'gyur/_kha'am rkub kyi lam du'o/_/kha dang rkub kyi lam du mi tshangs par spyad na yang mo mtshan dang 'dra ste pham mo/_/nyams
[\[45b.3\]]par na sbom po'o/_/mo mtshan dang kha rkub gsum nyams shing snad pa lta bu la mi tshangs par spyad [#]na sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi bzod pa la 'bri/_bud med lo bcu gnyis lon pa man chad rgyor mi bzod ces kyang bya/_kha cig lo mang yang rgyor yang [#]mi bzod pa yang yod/_kha cig lo nyung
[\[45b.4\]]la rgyor bzod pa yang yod[#]/_mdor na gang yang rung ste/_rgyor mi bzod pa'am mi rung ba zhig la mi tshangs par spyod na sbom por 'gyur/_mi 'bri ba ni phas pham par 'gyur te/_sbom por mi 'bri ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba rnams la mi tshangs par [#]spyod na'o/_/mi'i rgyud ma yin pa/_lam rgyud
[\[45b.5\]]lnga la mi ma gtogs pa'i lam rgyud bzhi [#]gang yang rung ste/_sgo gsum las gang du mi tshangs par spyod kyang pham/_pho skyes pa'i sgo [#]gnyis su spyad na yang pham ma ning ma ning [#]rnam lngar bshad pa la gang yang rung sgo gsum du mi tshangs par spyod na pham/_'jug pa/_pho mtshan dkris [#]te
[\[45b.6\]]mi tshangs par spyod [#]na yang pham/_mjug nas dkris [#]pa/_mo mtshan ras lta bus [#]g.yogs/_pho mtshan gyis ras dang bcas te nang du bcug nas spyad pa yang pham/_pho mtshan dang mo mtshan gcig dkris [#]gcig ma dkris [#]par spyad kyang rung gnyis ka dkris [#]te mi tshangs par spyad na'ang pham/_
[\[45b.7\]]shi ba la yang ngo /_/shi ba'i rol sgo gsum gang yang rung ste mi tshangs par spyad [#]na pham/_ma tshor/_gnyid log pa 'am ra ro ba [#]lta bu la mi tshangs par spyod de pha rol ma tshor yang phas pham/_rang bzhin stor bar gyur pa/_smyos shing rang bzhin stor ba la mi tshangs par spyad de pha rol gyis ma tshor
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]yang phas pham/_mi 'dod pa yang chud do/_/pha rol po mi tshangs par spyad par mi btub ste nan gyis mi tshangs par spyad na yang phas pham/_rang gi 'jug gnas su yang ngo /_/bdag gi kha dang rkub tu bdag gi pho mtshan gyis mi tshangs par spyad kyang pham ste/_mtshan ring dang
[\[46a.2\]]rgyab mnyen las bcas/_sngon [#]du phyir bdar te nang du btang bar [#]bsams na yang ngo /_/mo mtshan phyi rol du dkung dkung la khu ba nang du btang ba dang nang du [#]dkung dkung la khu ba phyi rol tu pho ba gnyis gang byas kyang stu 'tshong ma brad dra ka phyi las dge slong sun d+ha ra [#]nan da la 'di lta bur mi tshangs par spyod [#]dang
[\[46a.3\]]phas pham par mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas dge slong des 'di 'dra bar byas pa las bcas/_mi dben par nyin mo logs kyis phab ste mi nyal/_sa mi dben par dge slong gnyid logs kyis phab ste mi nyal/_nyal na nyes byas dge slong gcig cig logs kyis phab ste nyal nyal ba las pho mtshan
[\[46a.4\]]sgren cing 'dug pa la/_bud med sbom mo zhes bya bas mthong nas thal byung mo mtshan du bcug ste spyad pa las bcas dben pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_dben pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_nyin mo nyal du rung ba'i sa dben pa ni rnam pa gsum yod de ming gis 'og nas 'chad pa yin no/_/mtha' bskor te
[\[46a.5\]]sgo bcad cing gnas pa dang /_dben pa'i sa gcig [#]ni ra ba'am khang pa lta bu mtha' bskor cing 'dug pa la sgo gtan pa bcug ste nyal na nyes med/_dge slong srung du bcug pa dang /_dben pa'i sa gcig ngam sad kyi bar du srungs shig ces bsgo ste nyal ba ni nyes med de dben pa gnyis sham
[\[46a.6\]]thabs kyi mtha' ma mdud pa bor ba'o[#]/_/bdag gi sham thabs kyis dam du dkris te mdud pa bor nas nyal na'ang nyes med de dben pa 'di gsum mo[#]/_/phas pham pa'i thog ma [#]ste rnam par 'byed pa'i 'o/_/phas pham pa dang po 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]
[\[46a.7\]]'di man chad las kyi [#]dngos po 'chad pa yan chad 'dul ba gzhan gyi nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo'ang 'chad mod kyi/_gzhi rnam par 'byed pas bzung ste thams cad 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang du 'du'o/_/gang na bud med 'dod pa can gyi der mi 'gro/_bud med 'dod chags che zhing sbyar ba
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]skyes pa mthong na ze ldang ba lta bu'i drung du mi 'gro/_yon bdag cig gis [(]shAkyi'i [,]shAkya'i [)]rigs dge slong bzang po dag cig spyan drangs te 'ongs pa dang yon bdag de'i chung ma dge slong dag gi sha tshugs bzang po las 'dod chags langs te shi ba las bcas/_gang na mi ma yin pas mi bde bar byed pa
[\[46b.2\]]der mi gnas/_dgon pa'am/_shing drung [#]lta bu na gnod sbyin la sogs pa kyal ka byed cing 'ongs pa'i [#]gnas su mi 'dug_/dge slong gcig cig dgon pa na bsam gtan spyod cing 'dug pa la gnod sbyin mo gcig cig bud med du sprul te 'ongs nas lan du mar mi tshangs par
[\[46b.3\]]spyad par sten [#]te/_dge slong ma btub pa dang rgyal po bim bi sa ra'i mthongs su bor ba las bcas/_'dod chags che bas sgre'u chongs shig_/'dod chags che zhing khu ba rtag tu zags [#]pas sgre'u bcang /_dge slong ma mr-i [#]ga ra ta rgyun du zhugs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi gcung dge slong
[\[46b.4\]]sun d+ha ra nan da [#]la sangs rgyas dang nor te phyag byas nas rkang pa las bzung ba dang /_'dod chags langs te khu ba stor nas/_dge slong ma'i mgo steng du ltung [#]ba las bcas/_ra lpags sam sha ba'am byi ba'i yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar sgre'u bya ba'i rgyu ni mi rtsub cing mi na ba'i phyir
[\[46b.5\]]re'u dang she'u dang byi la'i pags pa las sgre'u bya'o/_/dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bsngal bas so/_/sgre'u la khu ba reg pa dri mi zhim pa med par bya ba'i phyir dar phye dang /_a ru ra dang /_las la sogs pa'i phyi ma [#]bsngal bas bsku'o/_/bkru zhing bskam/_sgre'u de skabs
[\[46b.6\]]skabs su bkru zhing bskam mo/_/de'i tshe'i phyir gzhan yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar bkru zhing bskam pa'i tshe sgre'u dgos pa'i phyir 'theb gcig bya/_mang du zags [#]na gding bar bya/_khu ba mang du zags [#]na sgre'u'i nang du phye ma la sogs pa gding /_phye ma'am sas so/_/mdo ltag ma
[\[46b.7\]]ltar sgre'u nang du blugs pa ni phye ma dang sa las blugs so/_/phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bza' ba'i tshe bzhag la khrus byas te'o/_/mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dang zan bza' ba'i tshe sgre'u bzhag ste khrus byas la 'gro'o/_/phra mor gtogs pa'i phas pham pa'i dang po'o/_/'di yan chad ni
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]'dul ba phra mo zhes bya ba'i nang nas mi tshangs par spyod pa phas pham pa 'chad pa'i mdo 'byung ba'o//_//[#]kha'i ni so las 'das pa'o/_/mi tshangs par spyad pa ni so las 'das na [#]pham/_rkub kyi rgyud ni 'dzums pa'i mtshams so/_/rkub tu mi tshangs par spyad na
[\[47a.2\]]'dzums pa'i mtshams 'das na pham/_'dzag byed kyi ni kha shun no/_/mo mtshan du mi tshangs par spyad na phyi rol gyi pags pa dang nang gi sha'i mtshams kyi kha shun 'das na pham/_chud pa ni dkris [#]so/_/pho mtshan ni sgo gsum gyi nang du dkris [#]'das na pham/_phyogs su yang kun snang
[\[47a.3\]]na snang ba'o/_/sgo gsum las nyams pa ni sbrul gyis ni chang du zos kyang nyams par brtsi srin bus ni kha nang [#]du cher zos na nyams par brtsi skrangs pa ni sgo nyid kyi 'khor skrangs na nyams par brtsi/_'di rnams yan chad lta bu zhig la mi tshangs par spyad na sbom por 'gyur chung zad
[\[47a.4\]]snang ba la ni mi bya'o/_/skrangs sam/_sgo gsum las skrangs ba/_rul tam/_sgo [#]gsum las rul cing myags pa'o[#]/_/zhigs sam/_sgo gsum las zhigs pa dang gyes pa dang kham bu kham bur chad pa lta bu la bya/_srog chags kyis zos pa ni nyams pa'o/_/sbrul dang srin bu la sogs pa sems
[\[47a.5\]]can gyis zos pa la bya ste/_'di rnams lta bu la mi tshangs par spyad [#]na sbom por 'gyur/_rked par bcang pa'i gzhug gnas la mi 'bri/_ro lta bu rked par bcad pa'i sgo gsum dag kyang rung ste spyad na pham/_gzhug gnas dbus nas gshegs te sbyar ba'i mtshams su mi mngon na yang ngo /_/
[\[47a.6\]]ro lta bu mo mtshan nas lus chu gshegs [#]su gshegs te slar sbyar nas/_sbyar ba'i mtshams mi mngon pa zhig la mi tshangs par spyad na pham par 'gyur/_mngon na mdo bzhin pa'i rim mo[#]/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gshegs pa'i mtshams mngon pa zhig las mi tshangs par spyad na sbom po/_sbom
[\[47a.7\]]por byed pa ni phag la sogs pa bcos te spu phyi ba'o/_/phag la sogs pa sems can gyi gzugs btso ste spu phyi ba la sogs pa lta bu zhig gi sgo gsum du mi tshangs par spyad na sbom po/_/mgo bcad pa'i khar yang ngo /_/mgo lkog ma lta bur bcad pa'i khar mi tshangs par spyad na sbom
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]po/_'jug pa dang 'jug gnas lus dang so sor bral ba la yang ngo /_/sgo gsum dang pho mtshan lta bu lus dang bral te gud na bcad cing 'dug pa lta bu la 'dod chags kyis bdag gis spyad dam chad cing [#]'dug pa na gcig gi [#]nang du gcig bcug na sbom po/_gzhan yang pha rol gyi dang
[\[47b.2\]]pha rol gyir [#]'jug pa'o/_/gzhan gyi mo mtshan du gzhan gyi pho mtshan bcug pa bdag gis byas na sbom po ste dper phyugs rgal ba lta bu pho mtshan mi chud cing 'dug pa la bdag gis chud par byas pa lta bu'o/_/gzhan yang lus bcad pa'i khung bur ro/_/ro lta bu la bcad cing phug ste
[\[47b.3\]]de'i 'phro dang bu gur mi tshangs par spyad na'ang sbom po/_ma ning gi 'jug gnas phug rdugs su'o/_/ma ning gi mo mtshan gcin 'ong ba'i khung bu tsam yod du zad de mi tshangs par spyad du mi rung ba zhig la spyad na sbom po/_mchu dag la yang ngo /_/mchu dang mchu'i [#]phyi rol du'am 'dod
[\[47b.4\]]chags kyi [#]sems kyis mi tshangs par spyad pa'i phyir pho mtshan gyis reg na sbom po'o[#]/_/mtshams kyi phyir [#]phan chad kyang ngo /_/so'i phyi rol mchu'i nang rol mkhur ba phan chad [#]du 'dod chags kyi sems [#]kyis mi tshangs par spyad na sbom po/_sgre'ur yang ngo /_/sgre'ur 'dod chags kyi sems
[\[47b.5\]]kyis mi tshangs par spyad na sbom po/_/bltab [#]pa dang mi reg par bcug par byas pa yang ngo /_/skra mi nub [#]pa'i phyir pho mtshan rked par bkug nas blta ba ste bcug pa dang mo mtshan la ma reg pa zhig tu bcug ste spyad na sbom po/_/de'i tha mar bshad pa dkris [#]pa zhes pa thams cad kun mi
[\[47b.6\]]rig par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/pho mtshan dkris [#]pa dang mo mtshan la g.yogs te phul ba dang g.yogs pa bcas te nang du song ba gang yang rung bkab pa dang dkris [#]pa gnyis ka bya ste/_bcug kyang rung ste 'di ltar byas shing spyad do cog reg par mi 'gyur zhing phas mi pham par 'gyur ba yang ma
[\[47b.7\]]yin gyi dar [#]lta bu srab mos dkris [#]te reg pa'i drod dang ldan par mi tshangs par spyad pa ni phas pham pa'o/_/gzhan gyis dkris [#]pa ni ma reg par 'jug pa la gsungs so/_/mo mtshan dang pho mtshan dkris [#]shing bkag pa ko lpags sam/_snam bu'am/_phying pa lta bu stug pos byas te reg pa
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]dang mi ldan par mi tshangs par [#]spyad na sbom po/_phas pham pa dang po [#]dris pa'i chud pa'o/_/phas pham pa bzhi'i dang po ste mi tshangs par spyad pa 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//dge slong yin par [#]mi dran pa ni rang bzhin nyams pa'o/_/'dre gdon
[\[48a.2\]]dang rlung nad la sogs pas smyos shing myos te/_dge slong yin par mi dran par mi tshangs par spyod pa [#]ni phas pham par mi 'gyur/_nyams pa ni gnyis te nang dang phyi'o/_/mo mtshan nang nyams shing snad kyang rung gnyis ka snad [#]cing nyams kyang rung ste mi tshangs par spyad na sbom po[#]/_pha rol gyis
[\[48a.3\]]smras nas khas blangs na bslab pa zhig go_/dge slob ma la pha rol po zhig gis mi tshangs par spyod [#]do zhes zer zhing 'ongs pa la mi tshangs par spyad par bya'o zhes khas blangs na/_dge slob ma'i khrims zhig go_/de'ang dbog go_/mdo ltag ma ltar khrims zhig pa de slar dpog
[\[48a.4\]]tu mi rung ngo /_/lo gnyis su bsdad pa ni khrims phyi ma phog pa nas brtsi'o/_/kha cig na re mi tshangs par spyad par khas blangs shing mi tshangs par spyad pa byas pa yang dpog tu rung zhes zer te/_de lta ma yin gyi mi tshangs par ni ma [#]spyad khas ni blangs te bslab pa zhig pa der slar dpog tu
[\[48a.5\]]rung ngo /_/dge slong phas ni sbom po/_dge slong pha la gzhan zhig na re khyod kyi rkub tu mi tshangs par spyad na rung ngam zhes dris te/_rung ngo zhes smras na sbom po/_ma zums par gyur pa la yang ngo /_/mo mtshan che la dngos por [#]ma zums par 'dug pa la mi tshangs par spyod na yang sbom po/_
[\[48a.6\]]gzhug pa'i phyir rmar phul [#]ba yang ngo /_/mo mtshan du gzhug par 'dod pa'i phyir ci 'dra bar 'dug ces lag pas myangs shing mnams na yang sbom po/_'jigs shing ngo tsha bas 'dod chags ma grub pa yang ngo /_/'jigs pa ni gnod sbyin mo zhig bud med du 'khrul [#]te mi tshangs par spyad pa
[\[48a.7\]]dang spyad pa'i tshe 'phrul ma nus nas slar gnod sbyin nyid kyi lus su gyur nas/_dge slong de sdangs te skrag pas dga' bar ma tshor ba las bcas/_ngo tsha ba ni dge slong zhig [#]gis ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang spyad pa'i tshe mas smras pa khyod thog ma yang 'di nas 'ongs na da yang slar der 'jug
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]cing spyod dam zhes byas pa dang /_dge slong de ngo tsha ste dga' bar ma tshor ba las bcas rnam pa 'di gnyis ltar spyad na sbom po/_pho mtshan gas pas khu ba ma grub pa yang ngo /_/mo mtshan chung ngu zhig la spyad de pho mtshan snad cing pags pa ral pa'am/_'chus pa lta bu'am/_pho mtshan gas shing
[\[48b.2\]]snad pa lta bu zhig gis mi tshangs par spyad pa las dga' bar mtshor na yang sbom po/_ma sgren par bcug [#]na yang ngo /_/pho mtshan ma sgren par mo mtshan du bcug na sbom po/_lag pa nas lag par/_rkang pa nas rkang par tshigs nas tshigs su/_mtshan nas mtshan [#]du ma 'byor na yang ngo /_/
[\[48b.3\]]lus che chung zhugs te mo mtshan du mi tshangs par spyad du rung yang /_rkang lag dang tshigs dang /_mtshan [#]la sogs pa 'phags par che chung zhugs pa las mi tshangs par spyad na'ang sbom por 'gyur ro/_/g.yos pa tsam dang ldan pa yang ngo /_/gzhan gyis nad gyis mi tshangs par spyad [#]de dga' bar
[\[48b.4\]]ni ma tshor gyi/_chung [#]zad bag tsam gyi dga' bar tshor na sbom po/_dge slong rdos btab pa zhig gnyid log pa las pho mtshan sgren pa [#]bud med zhig [#]gis mthong ste thal byung mo mtshan du bcug ste steng nas bkud pa dang dge slong phas tshor te nyam chung zhing rngon bas 'phra 'phra ste bag tsam g.yos pa
[\[48b.5\]]las bcas/_shing dang ba so dang /_rdo dang gos kyi gzugs la de la byas nas 'on te mtshan gyi mtshams tsam na yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las bud med kyi gzugs su byas pa las mi tshangs par spyad par brtsal [#]ba dang /_nang na 'dre gdon gnas pas mo mtshan nyi tshe bud med
[\[48b.6\]]kyi dang 'dra ba ma [#]gyur pa zhig la spyad na sbom por 'gyur/_lus kyi yan lag thams cad kyis reg par gyur na rtsa ba'o/_/mdo ltag ma lta bu'i gzugs su byas pa [#]la mi tshangs par [#]spyad pa dang lus kyi yan lag thams cad mi dang 'dra bar gyur na phas pham pa'o/_/_bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[48b.7\]]pas mo mtshan du rkang pa bcug na yang ngo /_/mi tshangs par spyod du song song ba las mo mtshan che bar [#]gyur nas pho mtshan gyis ni ma spyad kyi rkang pa bcug pa las bcas te mi tshangs par spyad pa'i phyir mo mtshan du rkang pa bcug na'ang sbom po/_gzhug gnas kyi phyi rol du pho mtshan gyis reg pa de
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]tsam gyis kyang ngo /_/bud med gcig cig sgren mor khron pa na chu chu [#]bar dgus pa dang /_bar ram sab mo'i rgyab nas dge slong cig gis sab [#]mo la bu gu yod pa'i nang nas/_pho mtshan bcug ste mo mtshan la reg par byas pa las bcas te mo mtshan la pho mtshan
[\[49a.2\]]reg pa tsam gyis kyang sbom po/_bsnyen pa'i phyir gzhan la bsgo na yang ngo /_/mi gzhan la khyod mi tshangs par spyod cig ces bsgo na sbom po/_rang bzhin du sgren pa ni mi 'bri'o/_/pho mtshan yod nas sgren pas mi tshangs par spyad kyang phas pham par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams te spyad kyang
[\[49a.3\]]phas pham pa yin pa ma yin no/_/mdun dang rgyab gnyis gang du brtsal nas de las gzhan du zin na yang ngo /_/mo mtshan du mi tshangs par spyod par [#]bsams te spyod spyod pa las rkub tu song ste 'dod chags grub na yang phas pham mo/_/lam gyi [#]lhag mar yang gzhug go zhe [#]na yang mi 'bri'o/_/
[\[49a.4\]]sgo gsum char du mi tshangs par spyad la sgo tha ma gcig tu 'dod chags grub par bya'o zhes bsams te spyad pa las sgo gnyis su ni ma spyad kyi sgo dang por 'dod chags grub nas gnyis su ma spyad [#]pa'i phyir pham par mi 'gyur ba ma [#]yin te pham mo/_/zhig go zhes bsams na yang ma yin no/_/
[\[49a.5\]]phag cig [#]bcings shing 'dug pa las/_dge slong gis snying rje ba'i phyir thug [#]thub tu btang ba las phag bdag [#]gis dge slong gis btang bar thos nas dge slong khyod ni khrims zhig cing med pa'o zhes bsgo ba dang /_khrims zhig pa ni ma yin mod kyi/_dge slong gis kyang khrims zhig pa yin
[\[49a.6\]]no snyam bsams nas mi tshangs par spyad pa las bcas te phyis mi tshangs par spyod pa'i tshe pham mo/_/nad dbyung ba'i phyir yang mi rung ngo /_/chus bgags [#]pa dang pho mtshan la shu ba byung ba'i nad la/_sman pa na re mi tshangs par spyad na phan no zhes zer te nad la phan pa'i phyir mi tshangs par spyad kyang
[\[49a.7\]]pham/_lam la gzhan du 'du shes sam yid gnyis su'ang ma yin/_snar pho mtshan bcug ste spyad par bsams pa las khar song ste/_'dod chags grub pa dang /_'dod chags ni khar spyad du grub kyi/_'dod chags khar grub bam snar grub gtol med de the tshom za ba lta bu yang
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/lam ma yin pa yang de ltar sbom po'o/_/sgo gsum ma yin par rna ba dang sna la sogs par mi tshangs par spyad na'ang sbom po/_ltung ba med pa [#]rings pas bud med kyi steng du lhung na'o/_/sdangs pa'am rings pa lta bus rdeg [#]'chos te bud med kyi steng du 'gyel ba
[\[49b.2\]]ni nyes med do/_/mi 'dod bzhin du phongs pas mgul nas 'jus na yang ngo /_/bud med 'dre lta bus sngangs te 'jigs pa'i phyir/_dge slong mi 'dod du bzhin [#]mgul nas 'jus na'ang nyes med do/_/mchu dang mchur reg pa yang ngo /_/sgo lta bu la bud med dang dge slong phas byung tshul byung
[\[49b.3\]]ste 'phral la gdong thug tu [#]phrad nas mchu gnyis reg tu zin kyang nyes med/_khyi mo'i mdun du mi gci bar bya/_dge slong gcig cig khyi mo'i mdun du kha bltas te gcin gci ba dang /_pho mtshan la khyi'i snying la sha gzhan zhig snyam ste brgyugs nas khar bcug pa las bcas te/_khyi mo'i
[\[49b.4\]]mdun du [#]nyes byas dgon pa gang du srog la dma' ba der mi gnas/_chu gang du pho mtshan zin gyis dogs pas sgren mor mi 'bog dge slong gcig cig chu rgal ba dang /_chur gnas pa'i sems can zhig gis pho mtshan khar bcug pa dang /_dge slong gi yid la pho mtshan sems can gyi khar song
[\[49b.5\]]gis phas pham mo snyam du the tshom zos pa las phas pham par ni mi 'gyur gyi/_phyin chad pho mtshan zin gyis dogs pa'i chu la ras kyis ma dkris par ma 'bogs shig ces bcas te ras kyis ma dkris par 'bog na nyes byas/_der gru la shes bzhin du rgal[#]/_gru la rgal ba'i tshe'ang gru bub na
[\[49b.6\]]bud med kyis mi zin pa dang rgyal ba'i phyir pho mtshan mi zin par ras kyis dkris ba shes bzhin du bya/_de ltar 'du shes ma bzhag na nyes byas/_ba'i nang du 'gro na yang ngo /_/ba lang gi khrod du 'gro na'ang rdung [#]du 'ong ba'i phyir bag bya ba dang ba lang mi reg par shes bzhin du ma byas na nyes byas/_khron
[\[49b.7\]]pa'i chur brtag pa yang ngo /_/khron pa'i nang na bud med 'gyel zhing 'dug pa sngangs te bdag la 'dzin du 'ongs pa'i [#]phyir snga nas ci yod brtag [#]pa dang gcig tu na bud med khron pa'i kha na 'greng na mo mtshan gyi gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'ong ba mthong na 'dod chags skye ba'i phyir bud med chu chu [#]ba
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]yod na khron par mi brtags [#]par ma byas na nyes byas/_bsod snyoms zas kyi phyir grong du spyad pa grong bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe bud med la mi reg pa la sogs pa shes bzhin du ma byas na nyes byas/_rab tu brtag [#]par bya ste rab tu dbyung /_rab tu dbyung ba [#]zhig
[\[50a.2\]]'ongs na pho yin nam mo yin pa rtogs par bya ste rab tu dbyung /_ma brtags na nyes byas/_gcig pu bla gab med pa na logs mi dbab/_bla gab med pa na [#]grogs med par gnyid ma log kyang logs kyis phab ste mi nyal thal byung gnyid kyis log par 'gyur ba'i phyir te logs kyis phab na
[\[50a.3\]]nyes byas/_sgo ma bcad pa'i khyim du dge slong mas bsam gtan mi bya ba dang yang ngo /_/sgo ma bcad par dge slong ma [#]bsam gtan ma byed cig ma nyal cig skyes pa thug [#]thub tu rgyor yang [#]ngo /_/phas pham pa dang po ste bye brag tu gdon mi za ba'o/_/phas pham pa bzhi'i dang po mi tshangs par
[\[50a.4\]]spyod pa 'dul ba bye brag tu gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo [#]mi tshangs par spyod pa dang po rdzogs so//_//ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa la 'chad de/_'phrog [#]pa dang /_bdag gis 'phrog pa dang [#]brkus pa la'ang rung ste yan lag gcig_/'phrog tu bcug
[\[50a.5\]]pa'o/_/mngon sum du 'phrog tu bcug kyang rung [#]rkur bcug kyang rung ste yan lag gcig_/pho nyas kyang ngo /_/pho nya btang ste rkur bcug kyang rung 'phrog tu bcug kyang rung yan lag gcig_/yan lag bdun du brtsi na ni yan lag gong ma [#]gnyis dang gsum la yan lag gcig tu brtsi'o/_/
[\[50a.6\]]ma byin pa'o/_/bdag gi nor kyang [#]ma yin gzhan gyis kyang ma byin pa la bya ste yan lag gcig_/ma sha ka lnga la sogs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i tshe na'ang dngul zho'i brgyad cha gcig gis pham deng sang [#]dus dang sbyar te/_rgya gar [#]yul gyi ma sha las bod kyi dngul gyi thang du brtsis
[\[50a.7\]]na/_dngul zho'i brgyad cha gcig yod do/_/brgyad cha gcig yan chad brkus na pham ste yan lag gcig_/sangs rgyas kyi tshe pa na rin chung bas lngas pham/_deng sang rin che bas bzhi/_rku sems kyis so/_/rku sems kyis rku ba la bya ste yan lag gcig_/mi'i rgyud kyi [#]bcangs pa la'o/_/lam
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rgyud bzhi ma gtogs par mi'i nor la bya ste yan lag gcig_/yan lag bcur brtsis na ni mdo 'di nyid las mi nor [#]las blangs pa gong nas bshad de yan lag gnyis su brtsi/_yan lag bdun gyis pham par brtsi na yang [#]yan lag 'di gnyis su bgrang ngo /_/der 'du shes pa'o/_/mi'i
[\[50b.2\]]rgyud kyi nor yin par 'du shes pa la yan lag gcig_/nor bdag gi sems kyis kyang ma btang ste bdag gi yin par sems pa yan lag gcig ste/_yan lag 'di bcu dang ldan na pham/_ma tshang na sbom po/_yan lag bdun gyis pham par byas na 'di gnyis la gcig tu brtsi'o/_/bdag
[\[50b.3\]]po las rlag nas sems kyis ma btang [#]na re ba ma chad pa'o/_/gos dang nor rdzas la sogs pa rlung dang chus khyer ba lta bur 'khyams pa la nor bdag gi sems la slar rnyed du re ba'i sems yod pa las brkus na ni pham/_slar rnyed du re ba'i sems med na bdag po med pa'i nor du brtsi'o/_/gson
[\[50b.4\]]mar bsngos pa bdag por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang chos kyi dkor dang lha ma srin la sogs pa'i nor du bsngos shing srung [#]ma yod pa las brkus na pham/_bya dang ri dwags lta bu gson ma la rgyan btags pa las brkus na'ang bdag po mi yin pas pham mo/_/bza' ba'i phyir byin ba ni bsam pa'i
[\[50b.5\]]rgyud med de/_phyugs la chos dang rtswa dang chu la sogs pa sbyin par bsngos pa las brkus pa ni phyugs la bsngos pa'i steng du phyugs kyis zos nas med par 'gyur bas na sbom po/_ma zhugs nas [#]bdag po ma yin te/_ri dwags dang bya dang gcan gzan la sogs pa bshor [#]bar mi btang ba dang
[\[50b.6\]]lings btab pa la sogs pa khongs su ma chud cing dang rum 'byor pa las brkus pa ni bdag po med par brtsi'o/_/ri dwags dang bya dang gcan gzan dag bzung ba'i phyir/_me btang ba la sogs pa'o/_/ri dwags dang bya dang gcan gzan la sogs pa bshor [#]ba'i phyir lings dang me la sogs pa
[\[50b.7\]]dang /_ru 'byor cing khongs su chud pa dang /_khongs su ma chud kyang mnga' lta bu phog ste smas [#]pa snyags ma phyi bzhin 'ongs pa [#]lta bu las brkus na ni bdag po yod par 'gyur te pham mo/_/khongs nas brkus pa yang pham mo/_/ma chud [#]na dngos po can du gzung ngo /_/nor bdag mi'am byol
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]song gang yin gtol med pa'i nor zhig la su'i yin kyang rung gi brku'o zhes bsams pa ni nor bdag mi yin na pham par 'gyur/_phyugs kyi yin na sbom por 'gyur mi yin na slar gzhag go zhes bsams [#]pa ni mi'i yin kyang blangs te slar gzhag na mi pham mo/_/
[\[51a.2\]]rku ba'i tshe gnas dang dus kyi rim [#]gyis so/_/rkus [#]pa'i nor gyi rin thang brtsi ba ni nas 'bras [#]la sogs pa/_dbyar dgun ston dpyid kyi dus kyi rin thang du brtsi/_lho ba la yul dang bod yul lta bu nor rgyu gcig la rin che chung du 'gyur ba yang yul lam gnas de nyid kyi ring [#]thang du brtsi ste tshang
[\[51a.3\]]na pham ste gla rtsi dang kha ra lta bu'o/_/mi 'dod pa rnams ltung ba med/_bum pa'am gdang shing ngam zhwa brkus pa las/_bum pa'i nang na rdzas yod pa gdang shing dang zhwa'i zla la nor 'ongs te mi 'dod de slar bskyal bar byas pa na pham par mi 'gyur ro/_/_zhwa dang gdang shing dang bum pa nyid
[\[51a.4\]]kyis rin thang brtsi'o/_/bdag gir dang gzhan gyi nor rdzas zhig la nor de bdag gi yin par mthong ste spyad pa dang /_re zhig gi dus dang /_grogs po'i rdzas phran tshegs zhig brnya'o zhes ma byas kyang skad cig tsam spyad pa dang /_yid [#]brtan pa'i sems kyis dang /_grogs po yid [#]brtan
[\[51a.5\]]te mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba'i rdzas zhig la thug [#]thub par spyad pa dang /_gzhan la gsol te na'o/_/rdzas thun mong du spyad do zhes sngar 'thams te spyad pa 'phral la brnyas te spyad pa dang 'di rnams lta bu spyad pa na rku sems med na nyes med do/_/gzhan yang rku ba'i sems med na'o/_/
[\[51a.6\]]rku sems med par nor [#]rdzas bzang ngan lta ba'i phyir lag gis gzung [#]ba lta bu dang gzhan zhig gis brku ba'i phyir de 'dra ba zhig long ste/_nga la [#]byin cig ces zer ba la bdag gis rku bar mi shes shing bdag la rku sems med par kho'i kha thabs bzhin du blangs te byin pa la sogs
[\[51a.7\]]pa ni nyes med do/_/snying rje ba'i phyir 'khrul [#]gyis btang na yang ngo /_/a nan ta'i byin [#]da'i bu ston ka'i dus kyi rkun pos brkus pa las maud gal gyis rkun po bu gnyis la snying rje ba'i phyir dmag mi phal mo cher sprul te bsdigs [#]nas/_rkun pos bu slar btang ba dang /_drug sde [#]phas pham
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]par gyur to zhes brgal nas snying rje dang 'phrul gyis byas pas nyes med [#]pa'o zhes bcas/_thams cad du yang sbyor ba'i nyes byas pa'o/_/phas pham pa dang lhag ma dang ltung ba dang bzhi [#]so sor mthol ba dang mang po bslab pa dang /_ltung ba 'di sde lnga thog ma byed cing sbyor ba'i tshe na gang
[\[51b.2\]]yang rung ste nyes byas pa'o/_/de ste rtsa ba'i sde 'dir ni sbom pa'o[#]/_/phas pham pa bzhi las [#]gang yang rung ste thog ma pham par byed cing sbyor ba'i tshe nyes byas kyi thog tu sbom po re re yang yod do/_/sbom por 'gyur ba zhig spyod na'ang thog mar nyes byas pa yod de [#]de'i 'og tu pham pa la
[\[51b.3\]]brtson pas sbom po'o/_/mdo bzhin pa'i yang de bzhin/_bcu gsum dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag mar 'gyur ba zhig spyod na'ang thog ma sbyor ba'i tshe nyes byas su gyur pa'i 'og tu sbom po gcig kyang yod do/_/ma tshang ba [#]brkus na yang ngo /_/mi'i nor las brkus pa las dngul zho'i brgyad cha gcig
[\[51b.4\]]tu ma tshang ba man chad ni brkus te/_blangs kyang sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bdag po med pa'i gter yang ngo /_/nor bdag gis nor gter du spas pa las shi nas/_bus rgyus mi shes pa lta bu dang /_rgyal po'i sa ris kyi nang [#]dkor khung yod pa mngon par ma btod [#]cing /_rgyal pos mi shes pa lta bu
[\[51b.5\]]la brkus na rin thang char yang sbom po'o/_/bdag gi yang ngo /_/dge slong a dzi ta la chos gos bzang po cig yod de/_dge slong cig gis mthong nas brku [#]bar byas pa dang /_a dzi tas tshor te bdag gi chos gos kyi gnas su kho'i chos gos gzhag pa dang /_dge slong des chos gos de brkus
[\[51b.6\]]te gud du bltas na bdag gi chos gos yin par gyur pa las bcas te/_bdag gi rdzas la gzhan gyi nor du bsams te brkus na yang sbom po/_rgyud gzhan gyi yang ngo /_/mi ma gtogs pa lam rgyud bzhi gang yang rung ste nor rdzas brkus na sbom po/_bdag gir ma byas kyang /_bdag
[\[51b.7\]]gi nor du bya ba'i phyir ma brkus kyang 'di rnams ltar byas na sbom po/_sbas sam/_nor chud gzan cing [#]med par bya ba'i phyir sa'i nang la sogs par sbas pa dang /_ma rung bar byas pa dang /_nor rdzas mer bsregs sam/_chu la bskur ram dral bcom pa la sogs pa chud gzan pa
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]dang /_bcings pa/_nor bdag dang mi phrad par bya ba'i phyir gnag rta [#]lta bu bcings shing btags [#]pa lta bu dang /_'phrol ba la sogs pa dang /_gnag rta la sogs pa btags pa las stor cing [#]med par bya ba'i phyir 'phrol te 'khyam du btang ba dang /_phral ba yang
[\[52a.2\]]ngo /_/'di rnams lta bu la sogs pa nor bdag dang nor du phral ba'i phyir chud gzan pa'i phyir byas pa [#]med par byas pa ni sbom po'o/_/nyes byas pa ni snying rje'i sems kyis btang na'o/_/ri dwags dang gcan gzan rnyi dang /_rgya la zin pa dang phyugs la sogs pa bsad par btags shing
[\[52a.3\]]bcings pa la/_ri dwags la sogs pa dang bdag po gnyis ka la snying rje'i phyir thug [#]thub tu btang ba ni nyes byas/_rgya dang rnyi la sogs pa snying rje ba'i sems kyis dral cing [#]btang ba yang [#]nyes byas te/_snying rje la rnam gnyis so/_/bzlog kyang ma byas pa ma yin/_rkun pos dge slong la rku
[\[52a.4\]]ba'i rgyus dris pa la[#]/_dge slong gis skyes pa med do/_/khyi [#]mi za'o zhes bya ste/_rku bar bstan pa'i 'og tu sngar smras pa brdzun bya ste/_rku ba'i mi rigs so zhes slar bzlog kyang sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma reg pa tshun chad sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'o/_/nor rku bar bsams nas nor la ma reg tshun
[\[52a.5\]]chad sbom po la sbyor ba ste nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ben na gom pa re re zhing ngo /_/mkhan po lta bus slob ma la chos gos bskur te phyi bzhin du 'brang du bcug pa las/_slob ma des rku bar bsams te/_ben na gom pa du bor ba re re zhing nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/de'i rgyud na sems can
[\[52a.6\]]so so las so/_/mi gnyis gsum yan chad mang po zhig gi nor la dge slong cig gis brkus na mi de rnams kyi so so'i nor skal las rin thang tshang na ming du yod pa bzhin du nyes byas dang /_sbom po re re yang yod/_phas [#]pham pa ni spyir gcig tu zad de sdig ni mi du yod pa bzhin du phas pham
[\[52a.7\]]pa re re'i sdig yod/_rin thang ma tshang na sbom po dang nyes byas re re yod du zad do/_/phur pa las bkrol ba ni gru la reg pa ma yin no/_/gru brku ba'i phyir nyag thag phur pa las [#]bkrol ba ni gru la reg pa ma yin te/_sbom por mi 'gyur gyi nyes byas pa'o/_/khur gyis rku bar [#]der byed cing brkus par [#]
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]na'o/_/snam bu'am ras sam nor gang yang rung ba las/_mang [#]mo zhig khur du drags [#]te rku ba ni brku bar bsams pa'i phyir nyes byas ni gcig tu zad/_'dra ba'i phyir skyed [#]cing sdud pa la reg pa re re zhing sbom po [#]re re/_drags zin nas 'degs par reg pa'i tshe yang sbom po gcig_/bteg
[\[52b.2\]]ste 'phags na pham par 'gyur/_btogs [#]nas phung por na'o/_/shing tog btogs nas snod du sdud pa'i tshe sdud par reg pa re re la sbom po re re bsdus zin nas bteg par reg pa'i tshe sbom po gcig bteg ste 'phags na [#]pham/_nyes byas ni brku [#]bar bsams pa'i phyir gcig tu
[\[52b.3\]]zad do/_/yal ga bkal te bcad pa ni shing tog dang me tog la sogs pa du yod kyang sbom po/_spying ba ni gnas kyi steng nas nor gyi spyi bo nub na'o/_/chu dang sa lta bu'i nang du nor brku ba'i phyir sbyor ba ni nor gyi spyi bo nub cing mi snang na pham/_chu'i zhabs su nor song ste chu dang pas
[\[52b.4\]]steng nas bltar snang ba ni sbom po ste chu'i 'og gi sa'i nang du spyings te mi snang na pham/_bkur [#]ba'i sems kyis gang 'di nas phyis bkur [#]bar na'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar sbas te bzhag pa'i tshe mi pham gyi phyis blangs te khyer pa'i tshe pham mo zhes klan ka tshol ba'i phyir mdo 'di 'chad de sba ste bzhag
[\[52b.5\]]nas phyis blangs te bkur ro zhes bsams su zin kyang sbas pa'i tshe nor mi snang na pham par 'gyur ro/_/bshal ba ni thog ma'i gzhi'i mtshams las mjug [#]ma 'das na'o/_/nor zhig sa [#]las bshal te rkun gzhi ga la [#]'dug pa'i nor gyi mtha' ma'am mjug ma 'dug pa'i mtshams las
[\[52b.6\]]'das na pham par 'gyur/_de ltar 'gyur ba yang nor 'dug pa'i gzhi la sa'i srubs sam bang rim lta bu'i mtshams med na nor gyi mjug ma'i mtshams 'das na pham/_yog pa'i nang du chud pa ni der ma yin no/_/nor bshal te rku [#]ba'i 'og na mtshams sam sa sgal zhig yod na nor gyi
[\[52b.7\]]mjug [#]ma'i mtshams ma 'das kyang sa sgal de [#]'das pas pham par 'gyur [#]te/_dper na zhing rol gyi steng nas shing rings rku ba lta bu'o/_/de'i gzugs ni/_mtshams 'das na pham par 'gyur ba'i mtshams kyi gzugs ni 'di rnams lta bu gang yang rung ngo /_/'phags pa dang /_sa skra ras
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa lta bu'i bang rim dang /_gas pa dang /_sa gas pa'i ser kha dang /_yi ge dang /_yi ge'i 'bru tshig las gcig gi steng du thal ba dang /_kha dog dang gzhan dang /_kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa las gcig las kha dog gzhan gyi steng [#]du thal ba dang /_mtshams dang /_
[\[53a.2\]]sa shing la sogs pa'i srubs lta bu dang /_rnang sgal lo/_/zhing gi rnang [#]sgal lta bu dang 'di rnams gang yang rung ste bshal ba las mtshams 'das na pham/_srog chags kyi mu ni tha dad dper mngon na rtsib ma la sogs pa las so/_/phyugs lta bu la gos g.yogs sam bkal ba las rku na
[\[53a.3\]]bsnyil tam bshal te/_phyugs ring na rtsib ma'am [#]rul ba dag gi gzugs mngon par snang ba gang yang rung 'das na pham/_phyugs tshon po rus pa mi mngon pa ni lus las 'das shing 'phags na pham/_gding ba bting ba yang gnas bzhin no/_/phying pa'am phyar ba lta bu bting ba'i steng nas
[\[53a.4\]]bshal te rku na sa la bshal ba'i mtshams dang 'dra bar phyar [#]ba'i srubs sam kha dog tha dad pa'i mtshams [#]'das na pham/_btsugs pa yang bzhag pa bzhin no/_/skye [#]shing ngam mda' 'phangs pa lta bu sa la zug pa zhig las rku na phyung ste sa las 'phags na pham mo/_/gyon pa ni phral na'o/_/
[\[53a.5\]]gos sam mgo rgyan dang gdu bu la sogs pa lus la thogs pa zhig las rku na lus las phral te 'phags na pham/_sor gdub lta bu mdzub mo'i tshigs 'ga' tsam 'das nas mi pham gyi mdzub mo las 'das te 'phags na pham/_sho gam ni de'i sa 'das na'o/_/sho gam gyi rgyud du [#]'gro
[\[53a.6\]]ste/_bdag gi nor las sho gam pa dbang bar 'gyur ba zhig mi sbyin par bsams te song ba ni sho gam gcod pa'i sa'am mtshams 'das na pham mo/_/mi ni dus byas te de ste der grub na'o/_/mi rku ba ni dus byas ta dus mal du phrad na pham/_dus la rnam pa [#]gsum ste gos 'di 'dra ba
[\[53a.7\]]zhig gyon nas shog shig ces bya ba lta bu dang /_nyi tshod [#]'di tsam na shog shig byas pa dang /_shing ngam rdo 'di'i drung du shog shig ces bya ba lta bu gang yang rung ngo /_/bya ni de ste de ltar spur na'o/_/bya rku ba ni rku ba'i sa logs su bskrad spur [#]na 'phur te/_'phags ma thag tu pham/_rku ba'i gnas
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]ma yin par logs shig tu 'phur ba ni sbom po/_byol song btags pa las bkrol na'o/_/ri dwags rnyi las zin pa'am phyugs phur pa la btags pa lta bu rku na ma 'phags kyang bla ste bkrol ma thag tu pham mo/_/khyu las sam bzung ba ni mi snang bar gyur na'o/_/phyugs khyu lta
[\[53b.2\]]bu las rku na bcings te bzhag kyang rung bkar te ded kyang rung bzung ste khrid kyang phyugs phal mi snang bar gyur na pham mo/_/sngags kyis bkug pa ni snang na'o/_/sngags byas te rku ba ni sngags kyi mthus nor rang 'ong ba mig sngar snang zhing mthong na pham/_nor 'ong ngam mi 'ong bya ra bas [#]
[\[53b.3\]]btsugs te byar bas mthong na/_dge slong gis ma mthong yang pham/_phyi bzhin du 'gro ba dang /_slob ma lta bu la mkhan po'i rdzas shig bskur te phyi bzhin du 'brang ba las rku ba dang /_skyel ba ni/_nor zhig skyel du btang ba las rku ba dang 'di rnam gnyis ltar rku la 'og nas ming gis
[\[53b.4\]]bshad pa ltar byas na pham par 'gyur te/_ben tam/_rku ba'i tshe ben te 'dug pa dang /_log gam lam las slar log ste song ba dang /_gyu 'am[#]/_lam nas g.yas g.yos su gyu 'am/_zhugs sam/_nags sam khang pa lta bur zhugs pa dang /_'dzegs na de khyer ba sngon [#]bzhin no/_/shing
[\[53b.5\]]ngam brag lta bu la 'dzegs pa de rnams [#]gang ltar byas kyang rung ste/_phyugs khyu las brkus na mi snang na pham pa bzhin du/_'di yang mi snang bar gyur na pham/_gru ni thang dang yur ba dang mtshe'u las kyang ngo /_/gru rku ba ni thang la khur du khyer ba dang yur ba'i chu las drangs pa dang mtsho las
[\[53b.6\]]kyang rung ste thog ma'i gnas mi snang [#]bar gyur na pham mo/_/rgyun gyi rjes su yang ngo /_/chu 'bab pa'i rgyun bzhin du gru drangs te rku ba yang thog ma 'dug 'dug [#]pa'i gnas mi snang bar gyur na pham/_thad kar ni 'gram ngag mi snang na'o/_/mtsho'am chu kha [#]tshon chen po lta bu la gru thad kar
[\[53b.7\]]drangs te rku na pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin kyang thog ma 'dug pa'i sa mi snang na pham/_gzhan ni der phyin na'o/_/chu kha tshon chung ngu las gru drangs te [#]rku na thog ma 'dug 'dug pa'i gnas snang yang pha rol du phyin na pham/_rgyun las bzlog pa ni tshugs [#]'das na'o/_/gru chu 'bab pa'i rgyun
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]las slar bzlog ste gyen du drangs te/_rku na ga las 'dor ba'i gru tshugs 'das pa [#]na pham/_glags pa ma gtogs te bdag gi las kyi mtha' grub par 'dod pa de'i phyir/_zhing gi chu rku ba ni lud dang rmo brko dang yur khugs lta bu bzang du byas te/_nas bzang
[\[54a.2\]]por skyes pa ni ma gtogs par bdag gi zhing gi las bzang du byas shing nas bzang du skyes par grub par 'dod pa'i phyir/_gzhan gyi las kyi mthar chung du btang ngam/_gzhan gyi zhing gi las byas pa la char pa che ba'i tshe gzhan gyi zhing de la bdag zhing gi chu byo ste btang /_bgags
[\[54a.3\]]na'o/_/than pa byung ba'i tshe gzhan gyi zhing gi [#]chu bcad de bdag gi zhing la btang bas/_ston chu de'i yon tan gyis bzang ngan gyi khyad cig zhugs na pham mo/_/shas 'thob pa'i phyir rkun po la rgyus bstan na'o/_/rkun shas 'dod pa'i phyir rkun po la rgyus bstan na sbom po'o [#]zhes
[\[54a.4\]]mdo tshig ltag nas 'chad pa yin mod 'di ni shas 'dod pa'i phyir/_rkun po la rgyus bstan te rkun pos [#]shas byin te ring [#]thang tshang na pham mo/_/sa dang khyim la mu 'khor du bcug cing bsres na'o/_/zhing sa dang khyim sa lta bu rku na bdag gi zhing dang mu bsres te ra ba'am 'obs lta
[\[54a.5\]]bus bskor nas ra ba'am/_'obs lta bu sna phrad de sa de la rin thang brtsis te tshang [#]na'ang pham mo/_/de ste rgyal po'i 'khor du shags bkye ste rgyal na'o/_/zhing sa dang khyim sa lta bu la gzhan zhig dang sa mtshams la mi 'dum mam/_ngo ldog ste rgyal po la shags bkye nas/_dge slong mi
[\[54a.6\]]dbang ba [#]las rgyal pos dge slong dbang ngo zhes bcad na pham/_de bzhin du nor rdzas gang yang rung ngo /_/de ste yul dpon la brtsams pa las pha rol gyis btang na'o/_/zhing sa dang khyim sa la mtshams dang mu'am/_ngo ldog [#]pa yul dpon nam mi dra ma zhig la zhal che bkye ba las/_yul
[\[54a.7\]]dpon yang rung zhal che'i zla yul bdag kyang rung ste dge slong mi dbang mod kyi rtsod dkas kyis thong zhes bsams nas btang ngam/_yul dpon gyis thong zhes zer ba bzhin [#]btang na pham par 'gyur[#]/_nor rdzas gzhan la rtsod pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/_/de ni [#]sbyor ba'o/_/zhing sa lta bu ngo ldog [#]pa yul
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dpon lta bus dge slong mi dbang ba la dbang bar bcad nas yul dag [#]ma rangs te ma btang nas zhal che spos [#]te bkye na grangs [#]du spos pa bzhin du sbom po re re/_dge slong mi dbang [#]la zhal che yang yul bdag dbang ba [#]bcad pa las dge slong gis ma btang ste grangs [#]spos te bkye na grangs [#]du
[\[54b.2\]]spos pa bzhin du sbom po re re'o/_/rku ba'i sems med na sho gam gyi rgyud du nyes pa [#]'byung bar ma dogs shig_/sho gam gyi rgyud yod par mi shes la rku sems kyang med na sho gam du 'gyur ba'i rdzas sho gam gyis 'das kyang nyes med do/_/dge slong rgan po zhig gis/_dge slong gzhon nu rgyus
[\[54b.3\]]mi shes pa zhig la [#]sho gam las bzla ba'i phyir sho gam du 'gyur ba'i nor brkus [#]nas/_sa mtshams 'das pa dang slar blangs nas/_dge slong gzhon nu nor khyer khyer ba dang ci ltar [#]ma tshor gyi pham par gyur snyam/_the tshom zos nas de nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bcas/_nor gang gis
[\[54b.4\]]khyer ba des sbyin/_dge slong la gzhan gyi nor sho gam du 'gyur ba zhig bskur te [#]sho gam pa'i sar 'ongs nas [#]sho gam pa ci dbang ba/_dge slong [#]khyer khyer ba de sbyin no/_/btang ba las gzhan gyi bzlas na brkus pa ma yin/_dge slong la sho gam ma bcad cig par gnang ste btang ba las/_
[\[54b.5\]]dge slong des gzhan gyi nor zhig khyer te sho gam pa ci dbang ba nor bdag sbyin pa'i phyir ma byin na sbom po'o/_/bdag bkur [#]ba'i phyir ma byin na pham pa bdag bkur ba'am/_nor bdag sbyin pa gnyis kar yang ma bsams la sho gam pa ci dbang ba ma byin na [#]nyes byas 'di ni mdo'i TI ka [#]las 'byung /_
[\[54b.6\]]zhal nas gsungs pa las ni gzhan gyi nor sho gam las bzlas te sho gam pa ci dbang ba ma byin na pham mo zhes 'byung bar zad/_bcas pa'i gzhi ni rgyal po 'byi 'byi sa ras/_dge slong la sho gam mi gcad [#]par gnang ba las/_dge slong gcig cig gis 'dron [#]po gzhan gyi nor sho
[\[54b.7\]]gam du 'gyur ba khyer te sho gam pa dbang ba ma yin pa las bcas/_ma btang na gzhan las mi bzla/_dge slong gi nor la sho gam mi gcad [#]par gnang ba med [#]pa la gzhan dbang chen po'am kha drag pa [#]la bdag gi nor sho gam du 'gyur ba de bskur te/_sho gam pa dbang ba ma byin te rin
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]thang tshang na pham/_ma tshor bar 'da' [#]bar 'gyur pa nan tan mi bya bar mi bya/_bdag gi snod kyi nang du gzhan gyis sho gam du 'gyur ba'i nor bcug nas ma tshor bar sho gam las [#]'das par 'gyur ba'i phyir snga nas bsrung zhing tshor bar bya/_tshong pa dang dge slong dag
[\[55a.2\]]cig 'grogs pa dang tshong pas sho gam du 'gyur ba'i rdzas/_dge slong gi snod du ma tshor bar bcug nas sho gam 'das te tshor nas the tshom zos pa las nyes byas gzhan ni med kyi phyin chad tshor bar byos shig ces bcas/_ma tshor na nyes byas/_srung [#]ma dge slong du ma zhog shig_/
[\[55a.3\]]mdo ltag ma ltar sho gam du 'gyur ba'i nor bdag gi snod du gzhan gyis mi bcug par bya ba'i phyir/_bsod snyoms sam gcig la 'gro na/_dge slong gnyis gsum srung [#]mar zhog shig ma bzhag na nyes byas/_de de'i zas sbyis sbyin/_slong [#]mo la dong pa rnams kyis srung [#]mar
[\[55a.4\]]bzhag pa'i zas so so nas 'theb lhag par blangs la phyis [#]sbyin/_des dgag_/srung [#]mar gzhag pa rnams kyis kyang bdag cag gi snod [#]sho gam du 'gyur ba'i rdzas shig 'jug na mi gzhug par dgag_/bcug na bsnyad srung [#]ma rnams kyi mthus ma nus te bdag cag gi snod du nor
[\[55a.5\]]zhig bcug na/_grogs la bcug go zhes bsnyad[#]/_med na mtshan gdab/_srung [#]ma gzhag tu dge slong grangs kyis med na snod kyi kha rgya'am mtshan ma btab ste slong du 'gro'o/_/ma btab na nyes byas/_dris te blangs[#]/_bdag gi rdzas tshong pa la gtams pa zhig slar len na sho
[\[55a.6\]]gam du 'gyur ba'i rdzas ma bcug gam zhes 'dri ste blang /_gzhan gyi rdzas shig bskur na'ang sho gam du 'gyur ba med dam zhes dris te blang /_ma dris na nyes byas/_dbyung bar gzhan ma grub na re zhig_/bdag gi rdzas rgya'am mtshan ma btab pa nyams la [#]dris kyang lan mi ster te/_
[\[55a.7\]]dge sbyong med na dbyung ba'i phyir snod la reg pa dang gser dngul lta bu yod de/_lag gis bzung ste phyung yang nyes med/_chad par bsngos pa las ma byin pa'o/_/sho gam du 'gyur ba'i nor zhig dkon mchog gsum mam pha ma la bsngos pa zhig na'ang /_sho gam pas ma gnang na
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]sho gam pa ci dbang ba sbyin dgos so/_/ma byin na sbom po/_grogs po dang khyim pa lta bu zhig la bsngos te ma byin na'ang sbom po sho gam pas btang bar byas pa'i [#]phyir thabs 'og nas bshad/_de gtong ba'i phyir pha ma dag gi bsngags/_sho gam du 'gyur ba'i nor pha ma dag la bsngos pa
[\[55b.2\]]la sho gam 'dod ces zer na pha ma'i drin che ba'i yon tan bsngags te/_khyod kyis btang ba'i rigs so zhes byas la ma btub na ci dbang ba sbyin dgos/_dkon mchog gi yang ngo /_/sho gam du 'gyur ba'i nor dkon mchog gsum la bsngos pa zhig la ma btang ste sho gam 'dod ces
[\[55b.3\]]zer na/_dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan bsngags te sdig che bar bshad la sho gam bcad pa'i mi rigs so zhes byas la ma btang na sbyin dgos so/_/sbyin pa ni gzhan gyi [#]phyir gcig las bskyi ba'i chos kyis so/_/pha ma dang dkon mchog gnyi ga la so sor bsngos pa zhig las
[\[55b.4\]]sho gam sbyin dgos par gyur [#]na sho gam pa ci dbang ba pha ma'am/_dkon mchog gi nor gcig las bskyi ba'i chos su byas te sbyin no/_/god pa'i kha yo ni phyis bsnyam [#]mo/_/sho gam du 'gyur ba dang bcas te lam du mi 'gro/_bdag gi rdzas sho gam du 'gyur ba zhig khyer te/_
[\[55b.5\]]mi 'gro sho gam du 'gyur ba khyer na rgyang grags re re sho gam du mi [#]'gyur zhing nyes med pa ni ras kyi kha gnyis kha [#]bcad pa'am/_kha dog bsgyur ba [#]las yo byad du gtogs pa lus gang nyi tshe khyer te song ba ni nyes med/_bsgyur ba ni der mi 'gyur te lci ba ni [#]btsir bas kyang ngo /_/dge
[\[55b.6\]]slong gi yo byad du gos kha dog bsgyur ba sho gam du mi 'gyur ba ni lci ba btsir te btsos [#]pa yan chad du kha dog bsgyur ba ni sho gam mi gcod de btsong ba [#]lta bu'i nor kha dog bsgyur te mang du khyer ba ni sho gam du 'gyur ro/_/kha tshar bcad na yang ngo /_/ras lta bu bdag gi yo byad du bya ba'i
[\[55b.7\]]phyir ya tog ma tog gnyis ka'i kha tshar bcad pa yang sho gam du mi 'gyur/_btsong ba'i zong lta bu mang du khyer ba ni sho gam du 'gyur/_ma mthong na de la yid ma brtan cig_/dge slong sho gam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba zhig gis/_dge slong grogs gcig la ras 'di kha tshar chod la kha dog
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bsgyur te rdzongs shig par gtams [#]pa las/_dge sbyong des le lo byas te kha tshar kyang [#]ma bcad/_kha dog kyang ma bsgyur bar snod du bcug nas/_dge slong nor bdag gi [#]yid la btsos grangs [#]snyam ste/_sho gam bas btsal ba dang ma btsos [#]par gyur nas phyin
[\[56a.2\]]chad ma mthong ba la yid ma [#]brtan cig par bcas te bdag gi snod na sho gam du 'gyur ba yod dam med ma bltas na nyes byas/_gzhan gyi 'tsho ba mi gcad[#]/_sho gam pa sho gam gyis 'tsho ba la sho gam mi sbyin pa'i phyir 'dron [#]po bkag pa'am lam bsgyur te mi dgye[#]/_de bzhin
[\[56a.3\]]du rngon pa'am nya [#]ba'am chang 'tshong ba la sogs pas 'tsho ba la [#]nan tur ram mthus 'di ltar ma spyod ces mi dgag dgag [#]na nyes byas/_ma brtan pa la brtan par mi bya/_dge slong gcig la lhung bzed che chung gnyis shig yod pa las/_dge slong de gud du song ba'i 'og tu dge slong
[\[56a.4\]]gcig gis lhung bzed chung ngu de bdag gi lhung bzed kyi nang du shong na nyo zhes bcug ste song ba'i [#]phyir bcug pa dang lhung bzed bdag pos mthong nas brkus so zhes brtan [#]pa las bcas te yid ma brtan pa'i dge slong dang khyim pa'i rdzas la lag mi gzhug thug [#]thub tu'ang mi spyad spyad
[\[56a.5\]]na nyes byas so/_/der 'gyur ba ni 'og ma'i bla ma dag la'o/_/grogs po yid brtan par chud pa ni mdza' bo che chung rnam [#]gsum ste mdza' bo chen po'i gsang ba'i tshig 'bring po la mi bya chung ngu'i tshig chen po la bya/_'bring po'i tshig chen po la bya 'bring po'i tshig chung ngu la mi bya de ltar
[\[56a.6\]]byas na nyes byas so/_/_mdza' bo[#]/_mdza' bo ni 'di rnams te gros mthun pa dang /_yid mthun pa/_tshig [#]gsang ba spobs shing mya ngan langs pa la mthong /_mya ngan med par nus pa dang /_bla ma dran pa/_mkhan po slob dpon dang sdug pa'i phyir rtag tu dran pa dang /_mchod pa/_mdza'
[\[56a.7\]]ba'i phyir kha zas dang gos la sogs pas mchod cing 'dul ba [#]dang /_bsngags [#]pa ste/_mdza' ba'i phyir gcig la gcig yon tan bsngags shing bstod pa dang /_blangs na dga' ba'o/_/mdza' ba'i phyir rdzas la sogs pa thug [#]thub tu spyad na dga' ba dang mdza' bo 'di rnams la gang
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]yang rung gcig la rab 'bring rnam [#]gsum du phye ste/_mdo gong ma bzhin du mdza' bo chung ngu la chen po'i tshig mi bya ba lta bu'o/_/las kyi lag pod dus [#]kyis shig_/dge slong gcig cig la lhung bzed chung ngu zhig bdog pa las dge 'dun gyis las shig tu bskos pa dang /_ma nus te grogs gcig la
[\[56b.2\]]bcol ba dang grogs de lhung bzed bdog pa de glar [#]blangs nas las byas pa las bcas te/_grogs kyis [#]las bcol ba las gla [#]blangs na nyes byas te/_phas bcol na yang las de lag pod [#]du bya/_bsod nams kyi blos kyang ngo /_/dge slong las mi nus [#]pa zhig gis byed par bcol
[\[56b.3\]]na snying rje zhing las mi nus pa la/_bsod nams su 'gyur bar bsams te bcol ba ci nas su bya/_glas ma yin no/_/dge slong rgan po las mi nus pa'am grogs gzhan zhig gis las bcol na'ang /_mdo ltag ma gnyis ltar bsod nams kyi blo dang lag pod du bya'i lhung bzed ltar
[\[56b.4\]]gla mi blang ngo /_/yul skad kyis ni mi bslu'o/_/dge slong ma skad mi mthun pa gnyis shig_/snga phyir dong ba las sngar song ba'i chos gos lhung ste/_phyi mas bdag gi skad du bos te [#]brda ma phrad nas blangs te khyer khyer ba las [#]chos gos bdag mos brkus [#]so zhes brda ba [#]las brda mi phrod
[\[56b.5\]]pa nyes med do zhes bcas/_ltung ba blangs na ring du mi bcang /_mdo ltag ma ltar chos gos ltung [#]ba lta bu blangs te khyer khyer ba ring du mi gzhag par bdag po la sbyin no/_/ring du bzhag [#]na nyes byas/_gtsug lag khang skyong la gtad/_nor rdzas ltung ba [#]zhig rnyed de blangs na gtsug lag
[\[56b.6\]]khang skyong la gtad de su'i yin pa rmed du gzhug_/rab tu byung ba'i ngo shes na dge 'dun la bstan/_nor rdzas rnyed pa de dge slong gi rdzas shig yin par shes na gtsug lag khang skyong gi dge 'dun la bstan te bdag po yod na sbyin no/_/bdag po ma dmigs na rgyu thag la gdags/_
[\[56b.7\]]nor rdzas rnyed pa de bdag [#]po khungs ma phyin te gang yin gtol med na gtsug lag khang du rgya thag [#]bres te/_de la btags la gzhag_/nad pas ma bsgo bar sman mi blangs [#]dge slong ma nad pa zhig la yon bdag dang ba zhig yod de nad pas ma bsgo bar nad g.yog gis yon bdag yungs
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]mar thug [#]thub tu nad pa'i phyir blangs pa las bcas te/_nad pas ma bsgo [#]bar nad g.yog gis blangs na nyes byas/_ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa ste rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa/_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo//_//[#]
[\[57a.2\]]bdag po [#]dang bcas pas gnang ba las brtag pa gzhan du bdag gir mi bya/_tshong pas shing rta chag ste bal bor ba la drug sdes lhar brjed nas yul mi kun gyis kyang nor rdzas la sogs pas mchod pa'i phyir phul ba las drug sdes/_nged kyi lha'i nor yin gyis bskur [#]ro zhes byas te/_
[\[57a.3\]]khyer ba las bcas te nor bdag gi'am [#]lha ma srin gyi [#]khyer cig par bsgo ba ma gtogs par/_lha ma srin gyi [#]nor bdag po mis [#]bsrungs pa las blangs na pham/_tshor ba yod pa'i lha ma srin gyi nor las blang [#]na sbom po/_tshor ba med pa'i lha ma srin las nor blangs na nyes byas so/_/
[\[57a.4\]]bdag gir byas pa las mi dbrog_/bdag gi rdzas rkun pos khyer ba khos slar ma byin par mi dbrog_/brkus te khyer ba las mthong yang rung /_brkus te khyer [#]la ngos zin kyang rung ste/_khos ma byin par ma bskur bar zhog ces byas sam slar blangs na nyes byas/_de la chos bshad de bslangs
[\[57a.5\]]na[#]/_bdag gi rdzas rkun pos khyer ba las kho'i lag na 'dug na brkus pa'i sdig tu 'gyur ba dang /_slar byin nas [#]bsod nams che bar bshad de bslang /_rin phyed tsam gyis kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar byas te ma ster na ci [#]ri ba'i rin [#]phyed tsam gyis kyang bslu'o/_/lhung bzed dang
[\[57a.6\]]chos gos ni rin tshang bas [#]kyang blang ngo /_/lhung bzed dang chos gos lta bu rkun pos khyer te chos bshad kyang slar mi ster na ci ri ba'i rin tshang bas kyang slar blu'o[#]/_/rin tshang bas slar blu [#]dgos pa ni bdag la mkho zhing nyes pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/mi sdug par 'gyur bar dogs [#]pa bor
[\[57a.7\]]ba'o zhes 'gro ba mang pos ma [#]mthong bar mi blang /_phag dang bu ram shing rkun pos khyer ba'i lhag rol la drug sdes blangs nas khyer ba dang /_nor bdag gis zin te yul mi ma dga' ba las bcas te lhag rol de lta bu zhig blangs [#]na'ang /_mi gzhan gyis [#]mthong zhing shes par byas
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]te ma brkus par dbang dag gis shes par blangs[#]/_mang pos ma mthong bar blangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pas bsngos pa ro'i rdzas kyang bdag po med pa ma yin no/_/mi zhig la ba la chags shing 'dug pa las shi ste la ba'i bdag por skyes pa las drug sdes [#]ro las
[\[57b.2\]]la ba blangs te khyer ba dang 'dre des phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/_drug sdes ni rgyal po'i khab tu song 'dre sgo las [#]ma chud de bos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis a nan la bka' stsal te/_la ba byin cig par gtad nas 'dre'i phyi bzhin du skyel bar btang [#]ba las bcas te/_ro'i rdzis [#]'dre gnas
[\[57b.3\]]pa las [#]mi blang /_blangs na nyes byas/_rab tu gtum pa de'i phyi bzhin du [#]'gro'o/_/'dres la ba khyer mi nus pa'i phyir nan tan [#]skyel du btang ste 'dre'i sngon du song na kyal ka byed pa'i phyir [#]phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing 'gro'o/_/khas phub [#]tu nyal la rkang pa nas steng du g.yogs [#]pa yang ngo /_/
[\[57b.4\]]'dre de'i 'dug pa'i gnas su phyin na 'dre mchil mas 'thor lag pas 'jo [#]rkang pa phra ba'i phyir/_khas phub [#]tu bsnyal la la bas rkang pa nas g.yogs [#]de ltar ma byas na nyes byas/_ma smas pa las [#]mi blang /_ro la rma ma byung ngam ma smas [#]na ro langs kyi 'dre yod pa'i phyir rdzas mi blang /_
[\[57b.5\]]ma smas [#]pa las rdzas blangs na nyes byas/_rang gis dbug [#]pa'am/_dbug tu gzhug par mi bya/_ro'i rdzas blang ba'i [#]phyir ro ma smas [#]pa la bdag gis rma dbyung ba'am/_gzhan rma dbyung du mi gzhug_/rma phyung ngam 'byin du bcug na nyes byas[#]/_ngal bsos pa nyid so shing dang
[\[57b.6\]]chu dang /_go 'dun [#]dang lci ba dang sa dag ci bder bya'o[#]/_/dge slong zhig ga zhig nas 'ongs te grogs po snga na 'dug pa na re/_ngal sos [#]shig ces zer na rnam pa 'di lnga spyod cig ma bsgo yang ngal sos [#]shig ces byas pa'i tshig rkyen gyis ci bder spyod cig pa'i nang du chud de/_ma blangs
[\[57b.7\]]ma zhugs par spyod [#]kyang nyes med do/_/gnyen gyis mi 'dod bzhin du dge slong ngam dge sbyong 'phrog na bzung /_rab tu 'byung ba'am bsnyen par rdzogs pa [#]zhig las/_phu nu gnyen bshes kyis mi ster te/_'phrog tu 'ongs na dge slong gis lag pa ya gcig nas bzung /_'phrog
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]tu 'ongs pas lag pa ya gcig bzung ste drangs [#]na dge slong gis gzung ba'i [#]lag pa na zhes zer na btang /_'phrog pas bzung ba'i lag pa na zhes zer na mi gtad/_ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa'i phran tshegs su gtogs pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa'i
[\[58a.2\]]phas pham pa ste/_'dul ba'i sde phran tshegs kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//ka ka [#]ni bzhi la ma sha ka'o/_/dngul zho'i brgyad cha'i thad du brtsi ba ni dngul srang gcig la ge der lnga/_ge der gcig la ka'u ni bzhi/_ka'u ni gcig la pa Na [#]bcu drug_/pa Na [#]gcig la 'gron
[\[58a.3\]]bu brgyad cu/_'gron bu nyi shu la/_ka ka ni gcig_/ka ka ni bcu drug la/_'gron bu sum brgya nyi shu ste/_dngul zho'i brgyad cha gcig yod do/_/'di ltar brtsis na 'gron bu dngul zho brgyad chas pham/_lnga ni gtan [#]par te kA ra ShA pa Na'i [#]bzhi chas so/_/sangs rgyas bzhugs
[\[58a.4\]]pa'i tshe ni kA ra ShA pa Na [#]bzhi cha gcig la ma sha ka lnga yod de/_de la brtsis na dngul zho'i brgyad cha gcig yod de des pham deng sang ni ma sha ka bzhi la dngul zho'i brgyad cha gcig ste/_ma sha ka bzhis [#]pham par 'gyur/_gang na de la ma sha ka [#]nyi shu pa de la gnas pa pa Na'o[#]/_/sangs
[\[58a.5\]]rgyas bzhugs pa'i tshe ma sha [#]ka nyi shu la/_kAr ShA pa Na [#]gcig tu brtsi ba'i tshe/_ma sha ka lngas pham mo zhes tshad btsugs pa bzhin du deng sang yul gang na'ang rung ste/_sngon bzhin du ma bri ba zhig yod na yang de bzhin du brtsi'o/_/rku ba'i tshe gnas dang dus su brtsi zhing bca'/_dge slong
[\[58a.6\]]gis rkun po zhig byas na gnas ga la 'dug pa'i yul thang dang /_dbyar dgun ston dpyid kyi dus na/_pa Na'i [#]rin che chung cir gyur pa bzhin du rin thang brtsi'o/_/ltag nas mdo 'di dang 'dra ba zhig 'byung ba dang gnyis la ltag ma ni nas 'bras lta bu gnas dang dus su brtsi ba la bya/_'di
[\[58a.7\]]ni pa Na nyid gnas dang dus su brtsi ba la bya/[# ]mchog gi mthar gyur pa rin gcod mi nus pa chen po yang ngo /_/nor rin po che rin mi chod pa zhig brkus na yang pham par mi 'gyur ba ma yin te srang grangs mang [#]zhes pham pa'i grangs mang ba ma yin te pham pa ni gcig_/de chung ngu yang 'khyams
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa la yin gyi nang du chud do/_/rin thang ma tshang ba til gyi 'brum bu yan chad brkus kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ba la [#]yin gyi sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gdab tu med pa'i rin po che de'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel yang rin thang gdab tu med par che ste/_brkus na nor bu
[\[58b.2\]]rin po che rin gdab tu med pa brkus pa dang 'dra ste pham par 'gyur/_mchod pa'i phyir na nyes byas pa'o/_/_rku sems med par sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel mchod pa'i phyir khyer na nyes byas/_rku sems kyis khyer na pham/_bris pa ni nyes med do/_/lha'i yi ge dpe [#]brnyar mi ster ba thug [#]thub tu
[\[58b.3\]]blangs te dpe 'dris te slar bskyal ba ni [#]nyes med do/_/lha'i yi ger rku sems kyis [#]thal byung khyer na pham/_chud gsan nas rku na de'i tshe rku ba'i dngos po/_nor phral [#]la bcom dral te brkus na bcom zin pa la ci ri ba'i rin thang gi thang du brtsi/_mdo 'di yan chad ni nor gyi dngos po las
[\[58b.4\]]pham par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ba 'chad pa'o/_/bdag po med pa ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi'o/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi nor lta bu ni bdag gi yin par sems pa med pa'i phyir bdag po med pa'i nor dang 'dra ste ci bder spyad du rung ngo /_/rku sems kyis spyad na sbom po'o/_/de ni bdag gi
[\[58b.5\]]bzhin no[#]/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi nor ni bdag gi nor brkus na sbom por 'gyur ba bzhin du rku sems kyis blangs na sbom po/_de'i tshe [#]bdag nyid bdag po'o/_/dge slong gcig cig lhung bzed la chags te shi ba dang lhung bzed de'i nang du sbrul du skyes so/_/lhung bzed de lta bu zhig brkus na
[\[58b.6\]]sngon gyi dge slong gi nor du [#]mi brtsi'i sbrul gyi yin par brtsi'o/_/lha bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi ci [#]ti'i gdugs dang rgyan la sogs pa phul ba ni brkus na sbom po'o/_/nor rdzas lta bu phul ba brkus na dge 'dun dbang bas pham/_'di yan chad ni
[\[58b.7\]]nor gyi bdag po las pham mi pham 'chad pa/_gnang ste btang ba'o zhes bcad [#]na sbyor ba bzhin/_gos la sogs pa skad cig brnyas pa las yun ring du spyad de zad dam dengs par byas na sbom po/_gcig tu na sems kyis ma btang bar shes la/_nor thun mong yin no zhes te snying mi
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]brtse bar spyad na sbom po/_sman dang sngags kyis sbyin du bcug na yang ngo /_/kho'i sems bsgyur ba'i phyir sngags sam sman byin te bdag la nor sbyin du bcug na sbom po'o/_/pha rol gyi phyir na yang rtsa ba'i brtsams pa'o/_/gzhan gyi nor du bya ba'i phyir
[\[59a.2\]]brkus na yang sbom po/_brtags pa yang ngo /_/mi chus khyer ba phyung ba lta bu khos [#]srog blud [#]ma byin pa la 'di tsam gyis chod [#]cig bdag dbang grang zhes te thug [#]thub tu nor khyer na sbom po/_'dod pa bdams [#]la rku bar 'dod na yang ngo /_/nor mang po zhig 'dug pa la bzang po
[\[59a.3\]]bdams [#]te phyis rku bar bsams nas rkur bla [#]bar spags te bzhag na sbom po nor re re blta zhing theg cing bzhag pa thams cad sbom po re re'o/_/rgyan po dor gyis rgyal par ma gyur gyi bar du na sbyor ba'o/_/skugs btsugs te rgyan po'am cho lo 'gyed pa la rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir
[\[59a.4\]]thabs chung ngu thabs chen por bsnor nas sgyu byas pa ni sbom po/_thabs bsnor cing g.yo du byas pa re re sbom po/_de ni der brkus pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar g.yo byas nas de'i stobs kyis bdag rgyal ba'i ltang ma tshang na pham/_grangs kyi na'ang de'i'o/_/bdag rgyal bar bya
[\[59a.5\]]'dod pa'i phyir rgyan [#]po'i rdo grangs brkus pa dang nor rdzas bgrang ba'i grangs [#]brkus pa ni rku ba'i tshe nyes byas/_shod las bsnan tam phri na de bzhin no/_/bdag rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rtsis [#]byed pa lta bu la shod las bsnan tam phri na de'i tshe nyes byas gnas bsnor te bzhag na rtsis byed
[\[59a.6\]]pa la/_bdag rgyal bar byed pa'i [#]phyir bcu shod dang brgya shod kyi go bsnor na nyes byas/_de dag grub na brkus/_mdo ltag ma gsum ltar g.yo byas te grub nas nor bdag gi lag tu thob na pham mo/_/sbom po re re yang yod do/_/_sde'i nang du brtsis na yang de bzhin no/_/yon bdag
[\[59a.7\]]gis dge 'dun kha gnyis [#]nas spyan drangs te yon kyang so sor phul ba las kha gnyis ka nas skal ba blang ba'i phyir pha rol tshu rol gnyis kar gtogs par g.yo byas nas [#]de'i tshe nyes byas par 'gyur ro/_/sgyus snga mar na phyi mar [#]phyi mar na snga mar yang ngo /_/dge 'dun yon snga phyir
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'god pa la snga ma'i nang du yang /_nga 'di'i nang du gtogs so zhes zer phyi ma'i nang du snga ma las ma thob ste 'dir gtogs so zhes zer zhing /_yon kha gnyis blangs shing [#]sgyu byed pa'i tshe nyes byas/_gang du de thams cad de [#]thog mar byung ba de skal ba'o/_/mdo ltag ma
[\[59b.2\]]gnyis ltar yon kha gnyis su 'god [#]pa la gang nas kyang rung bdag gi skal ba gang sngar thob pa las mi dbang ngo /_/kha gnyis ka las blangs na pham par 'gyur/_mi 'thob pa las thob [#]po zhes zer ba yang ngo /_/tshul du zhugs nas zla ba phyed dang gnyis su ma lon par tshul bral
[\[59b.3\]]ba la yang bla/_tshul gyi tshe gud nas 'ongs te/_zla ba phyed dang gnyis su ma lon pa dge 'dun zas ma gtogs par nor 'god do cog la mi dbang /_zla ba phyed dang gnyis lon pa ni mi gcig gi skal ba phyed dbang /_phyed dang gnyis las lhag pa ni gzhan dang 'dra bar dbang de
[\[59b.4\]]ltar mi thob par shes bzhin du dbang ngo zhes zer zhing 'thob par byed pa'i tshe nyes byas/_ma bsgo par slong ba yang ngo /_/nor bdag gis khyer cig par ma bsgo bar g.yog lta bu'i gan du nor 'di yang byings kyis blang [#]ngo zhes byas na slong ba'i tshe nyes byas thob na pham/_bsnyon
[\[59b.5\]]pa ni brnyas pa dang bskyis pa dang gtams pa ni sbyor ba'o/_/gzhan gyi rdzas las [#]brnyas sam bskyis sam gtams pa las bsdigs [#]pa'i phyir bsnyon te ma sbyin par byas na sbom po/_chad na 'phrogs [#]pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma lta bu'i rdzas shig yang mi sbyin par bsams te bsnyon
[\[59b.6\]]te ma byin [#]na pham pa'o/_/sbas te gtams pa las 'on te bskyod [#]par bcas pa dang phyis kyang ngo /_/bdag la nor gtams [#]pa las gser dngul lta bu zhig ste/_reg tu mi rung ste nor bdag nyid kyis sa 'og tu sbas nas gtams pa la/_dge slong gis phyung ste brkus na 'phags
[\[59b.7\]]ma thag tu pham/_nor bdag gis ltag ma ltar sbas pa las/_stor du 'ong ngo zhes dge slong gis gnas spos te sbas na mi sbyin par bsams nas ma phyung yang pham/_de ste de las snga na bar du yang sbyor ba'o/_/nor bdag nyid kyis nor sbas te gtams pa de gnas gud du ma spos
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]par mi [#]sbyin par bsams pa ni pham par mi 'gyur te nyes byas/_chud gzan par sgyid pa bcad pa dang bsad na yang ngo /_/phyugs lta bu chud gzan pa'i phyir bsad dam sgyid pa bcad na sbom po/_srang grangs mang du ring zin kyang pham par mi 'gyur/_
[\[60a.2\]]ltung bar 'gyur ba ni skabs 'dir mi smos te gud nas 'chad do/_/sbom por byed pa ni mtshams kyi nam mkha' las te sho gam bcag na'o/_/sho gam gyi mtshams su nor rdzas sho gam du 'gyur ba sho gam pa la mi sbyin pa'i phyir mnga' 'am sgyogs lta bu dang /_'jig rten gyi log
[\[60a.3\]]pa'i sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mtshams bzlas pa ni sbom por 'gyur ro/_/nyes [#]med pa ni 'phrul gyis khyer ba'o/_/dgra bcom pa lta bu 'phrul dang ldan pas nam mkha' las rdzas khyer ba ni sho gam gyi nyes par mi 'gyur ro_/mtshams gzhan nas song na yang ngo /_/sho
[\[60a.4\]]gam gyi rgyud las byol ba'i phyir sho gam gyi rgyud du ma gtogs pa sho gam med pa'i lam du song na nyes med/_sprul na nyes byas pa'o/_/'dron [#]po sho gam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba la sho gam pa nyal lam zan za ba'i tshe thar to zhes bstan na nyes byas/_lam gzhan du ston pa yang ngo /_/
[\[60a.5\]]'dron po [#]sho gam gyi rgyud du [#]'gro ba la lam gzhan nas song na sho gam gcad [#]pa med do zhes byas te/_lam gud bstan te btang na nyes byas te[#]/_thabs su smras na chung /_'dron [#]po sho gam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba la yengs ma gtam gyi tshul du sho gam pa zan za ba'i tshe song na thar ces
[\[60a.6\]]byas na nyes byas yang ba'i/_lam ma yin pa yang lam bzhin no/_/sho gam gyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i lam nyid ni ma yin gyi [#]pha rol tshu rol gyi gseb bam [#]sho gam pa'i sa ris su gtogs pa zhig tu song na pham mo/_/tshem bu dang khar na yang snod gzhan bzhin no/_/sho gam du 'gyur ba'i
[\[60a.7\]]nor zhig tshem [#]bu'i gseb bam/_kha'am ltor mid de sho gam gyi rgyud 'das na'ang pham ste snod gzhan du bcug ste khyer ba dang 'dra'o/_/rku ba'i sems med na mthar mi 'grub bo/_/nor zhig rku bar bsams te bzung ba las mi rku bar bsams te ma bteg [#]par btang na
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]nyes byas dang /_sbom po ni yod pham pa ni med/_de'i sbyor ba ni med na yang gyur pa'i tshe na ma byas pa ma yin no/_/rku sems med par nor zhig blangs nas 'phral la rku sems byung ste/_brkus na nyes byas dang sbom po ni med de pham par ni 'gyur ro/_/yi ge la sogs pas kyang
[\[60b.2\]]mi 'dri'o[#]/_/_yi ge dang lag brda lta bus rkus [#]shig par bstan nas des brkus na yang pham/_mthu dang bcad na yang ma brkus pa ma yin/_glar [#]blangs te las byed byas pa las [#]mthu bsnyems te gla ma byin na pham mo/_/gnas dang bcas na'ang mi rung ngo /_/nor nyid bteg
[\[60b.3\]]na pham gyis dogs pa'i phyir gzhi dang bcas te brkus na yang pham/_bsad pa ni brkus pa ma yin no/_/mi'i nor du gtogs pa'i sems can byol song chud gsan [#]pa'i phyir bsad na'ang rin che chung mtshungs te sbom po mi ma yin pa'i nor byol song bsad na'ang ltung ba'o/_/
[\[60b.4\]]phyogs gcig gnas nas ma 'phags na'ang ma yin/_nor rdzas rku ba'i phyir bteg pa ngos gcig ni bteg [#]ngos gcig ni gzhi las ma 'phags kyi bar du na pham par mi 'gyur/_sprugs [#]te lhung na'ang de brkus pa'o/_/ra ba so so la rtsig sgal gcig ste ra ba gcig gi nang nas bza'
[\[60b.5\]]shing skyes te/_yal ga dag [#]gi rtsig sgal 'das te 'dug pa la shing thog rku ba'i phyir shing sprugs te bdag gi ra ba'i nang du lhung ste/_rin thang tshang na pham/_sprugs [#]pa ni phru lu lu tsha ra ra 'ongs na'o/_/chang ngam nas lta bu'i snod rdol te phru lu lu tsa ra ra 'ongs pa mjug ma chad
[\[60b.6\]]kyi bar du bdag gi snod du 'ongs pa rin thang tshang yang mi pham rdzas de mjug rdzogs nas spyir [#]ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar phru [#]lu lur 'ong ba rgyun chad de bdag gi lag tu 'ongs pa na rin thang tshang na pham/_phung po las yang yang len na rku ba tha dad do/_/nas lta bu phung por 'dug pa
[\[60b.7\]]las blangs te brkus nas yang rku sems skyes te blangs pa lta bur rku sems res lan du mar blangs na/_blangs pa de'i so sor rin thang brtsis te tshang na pham/_ma tshang na sbom po/_phung po las yang yang [#]re re phung po gcig ril gyis brku [#]bar bsams te len [#]du ma zhig
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]blangs te so sor rin thang tshang yang mi pham/_phung po zad na pham/_phral ba du ma na so so de'i cha'o/_/mi mang po zhig gi spyi la nor 'dug pa zhig brkus na/_nor bdag tu yod pa so sor ci yod pa bsgos [#]te mi gcig gi [#]skal pa rin thang tshang na pham ma tshang na nor
