[\[61a.2\]]bdag tu yod pa de bzhin du sbom po re re rku ba yang ngo /_/nor bdag gcig gi nor la dge slong mang po zhig gis brkus na/_dge slong du yod pa bgos [#]te gcig gi rin thang tshang na pham/_du ma'i yid dang [#]de der thob na brkus pa'o/_/rkun por 'dod pa'i che lag thabs su so sor ci thob [#]pa
[\[61a.3\]]khyer ro zhes 'thams [#]te brkus na so sor [#]ci thob pa rin brtsis te/_rin thang tshang na pham/_ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa ste dris par gtogs pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa ste/_'phags pa u pA [#]lis dris pa'i 'dul ba'i mdo//_//blangs pa'i sngon logs
[\[61a.4\]]su shi na slar gzhag_/dge 'dun nor 'god pa'i tshe/_dge slong nad pa zhig shi na nad g.yog gis nor bgos nas blangs pa'i sngon logs su/_nad pa dbugs chad pa ni nor skal [#]de dge 'dun dbang ste slar dbul lo/_/khyim pas nor yon phul ba yang de bzhin no/_/bzlog pa [#]ni shi
[\[61a.5\]]ba'i yo byad do/_/nor bgos nas skal ba nad g.yog gis [#]blangs zin pa'i 'og tu shi na shi ba'i yo byad dang shi ba'i nor bgo ba'i [#]nang du gtogs so/_/nor 'god pa'i tshe khyim par babs pa zhig na'ang nor de khyim par babs pa sbyin no/_/dge 'dun spun bzhin pas de'i phyir brkus na'ang bdag
[\[61a.6\]]gir ma byas pa ma yin no/_/dge 'dun pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad gcig tu sbyar ba la de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis/_dge 'dun de rnams kyi phyir gzhan las nor zhig brkus na yang rin thang brtsis te rin thang tshang na bdag kyang der gtogs pas pham/[ #]dge 'dun [#]'tsho ba'i yo byad
[\[61a.7\]]gcig tu sbyar ba de'i dge slong gcig gis dge 'dun de nyid kyi nor las gzhan sbyin pa'i phyir brkus pa ni sbom po/_bdag po tha mi dad na bdag gi bzhin no/_/yon bdag gcig la dge 'dun kha gnyis su 'khod de [#]kha zas kyis mi thub na/_rgyu dag brel brel du 'chugs pa zhig na/_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]nor rdzas gcig las brkus te gcig tu bsnan na sbom po/_mi len par chad de byung nas lhag nas [#]brkus na de'i yan [#]lag tu ma yin no/_/rkun po byed pa zhig tu bdag rkun zlar nan gyis bcug ste rkun po mi bya bar bsams pa las rkun zlas bsad kyis dogs pa'i phyir/_rkun po
[\[61b.2\]]byed pa'i nang du 'drol te/_song nas rku sems kyang med/_nor skal yang ma blangs na nyes med/_shas bdag gir byed par 'dod na mi len pa ma yin no/_/bdag rkun por ni ma song gi_/rkun shas 'dod pa'i phyir gros la gtogs te gzhan gyis brkus pa'i shas blangs na'ang pham/_
[\[61b.3\]]de'i las su gtogs na de ma yin no/_/rkun po byed pa'i las la gtogs te chung ngu bya ra [#]tsam byas kyang rung ste/_rkun shas blangs na yang pham/_lhan cig tu spyod pa dang nye gnas brkus na'ang mi 'byung zhes mi bya'o/_/bdag gi slob ma dang nye gnas kyis brkus pa las slar thug [#]
[\[61b.4\]]thub tu phrogs na [#]pham mo zhes byi shu tas bshad/_nyes byas so zhes byi tsa [#]ya bar mas bshad/_chung ba ni mtshams brtsan no/_/zhing rku ba ni 'di tsam tshun chad brku'o zhes mtshan ma btsugs te brkus pas pham/_nor bdag gis ma btang ste zhal ce 'gyed [#]pa ni ltag ma dang
[\[61b.5\]]'dra'o/_/mtshams ni btsugs pa las bskyod na 'dir ma gtogs pa ma yin no/_/zhing gi mu'am mtshams sam mtshan ma bsgyur te btsugs nas/_de tshun chad la rin thang brtsis te tshang na pham/_mngon par blangs kyang mi snang na brkus pa'o/_/mthong bzhin du brkus
[\[61b.6\]]nas song ba ni nor bdag mi snang bar gyur [#]na pham/_mi stobs kyis gzung [#]na dbang du byas na'o/_/mi mthus bzung ste brkus pa ni slar mi 'bros par gyur na pham/_gcig tu na [#]bdag gis ci byas pa bzhin du nyan cing byed na pham/_bdag ni de ltar ma yin no/_/bdag gzhan
[\[61b.7\]]zhig gis brkus na'ang slar bros te 'ongs pa [#]la nyes med/_gang rku bar byas pa de la 'brel pa ma bsams pa ni mi chud do/_/mi pham par bya ba'i phyir ras ngan pa rin thang ma tshang ba brkus pa [#]las nang nas bzang po zhig byung ste/_slar bskyal na pham pa med de sbom po'o/_/ltag
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]nas kyang mdo 'di 'dra ba zhig 'byung ste gong ma ni gser dang bum pa la bya/_'di na [#]ras bzang ngan lta bu la bya ste bcas pa tha dad tsam du zad do/_/sbom po ni gang gis ci blangs pa de de'i'o zhes bcas pa las gzhan gyir brkus na'o/_/dge slong mang zhing rkun
[\[62a.2\]]por 'dod de[#]/_lag thabs su ci thob pa so sor khyer ro zhes 'thams nas gzhan gyis ni thob bdag gis ni ma thob kyang sbom po zhes byi shu tas bshad/_bdag rkun zlas nan gyis bcug ste/_rku bar mi 'dod na bsad kyis dogs pa'i phyir rkun zlar [#]ni 'gro skal ba ni rkun zla la [#]sbyin no
[\[62a.3\]]zhes bsams te/_rku ba'i khrod du song ste shas ma blangs na sbom po zhes byi tsa ya bar mas bshad/_bdag po dang bcas pa'i dur khrod nas blangs na'o/_/dur khrod kyi ro'i rdzas bdag po yod pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/_rgyal pos 'tsho ba ro'i [#]rdzas la gtad pa dang las byed pa'i phyir/_ro'i
[\[62a.4\]]rdzas la [#]gtad pa dang dpya 'bul ba'i phyir/_ro'i rdzas la gtad pa dang gsad pa'i bshed mar gtad de [#]ro'i rdzas la byin pa'o/_/tha ma gshed ma dbang ba las brkus na sbom po/_gong ma gsum ni pham mo zhes TI ka [#]las bshad/_mkhan po kha cig na re ro rdzas mi gtsang zhing
[\[62a.5\]]'dod pa'i shas chung ba'i phyir sbom po zhes kyang bshad/_rtsa ba dang rngo gu dang sdong po dang lo ma dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu dang skye shing la sogs pa sngags kyis bskams na yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu mi'i nor zhig la chud gsan pa'i phyir sngags btab ste skams
[\[62a.6\]]sam rul [#]bar byas na sbom po/_/'bru'am yal ga so so gcig nas bskams na yang skam [#]pa re re sbom po re re/_rta la kham gyis [#]brid cing sbyin nam bzhon [#]te rku bar 'di ltar rku bar ro zhes nas lus kyis zhon na'o/_/rta brku [#]ba'i phyir rtswas brid de bzhon pa'am bkri ba'am 'di ltar
[\[62a.7\]]spyad do zhes sems kyis brku'o zhes bsams na/_rta la ma reg kyang sbom po/_gru yang ngo /_/gru mig snga na 'dug la lus kyis skya ba'i thabs dang drang ba 'dra bar spyad de 'di ltar byas te brku'o zhes sems la bsams [#]na ma reg kyang sbom po/_de dang 'di dag las kyang ngo /_/
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]gru'i nang du nor 'dug pa dang /_rta la rgyan yod par mig snga na snang ba zhig la 'di ltar brku'o [#]zhes lus kyis sad de brku'o [#]zhes bsams na ma reg kyang sbom po/_pha dang ma dang spun dang sring mo dang mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mchod rten dang dge 'dun la sogs pa'i brtags te sho
[\[62b.2\]]gam du bya ba bzlas na yang ngo /_/'di rnams lta bu zhig las sho gam du 'gyur ba'i rdzas shig khyer khyer ba las sho gam pas ma gnang bar [#]ci dbang ba ma sbyin [#]na sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brnyas pa dang bskyis pa mi sbyin par brtags pa yang ngo /_/nor rdzas shig brnyas sam bskyis pa
[\[62b.3\]]zas mi sbyin no zhes bsams pa'i tshe na sbom po/_lta gnas kyang mdo 'di 'dra ba zhig byas te [#]ltag ma ni nor bdag lan [#]du 'ongs pa'i tshe sbyin no snyam du sems shing bsnyon pa'i phyir nga la med do zhes smras pas sbom po/_gzhan gyi phyir byin pa bgos na yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi phyir
[\[62b.4\]]spyan gzigs bskur ba las/_dge 'dun la ma phul bar bar du bgos te khyer na sbom po/_dge slong gcig gis shing tog a ltu ka zhig dge 'dun la bskur ba las/_dge slong ni shi dge slong [#]dge 'dun la ma phul gyi bar du bskur bskur ba'i dge slong dag gis bgos
[\[62b.5\]]pa las bcas te nor bskur ba'ang de dang 'dra/_bdag po med pa bdag po yod par 'du shes na yang ngo /_/nor stor ba lta bu nor bdag gi sems kyis btang ba zhig las brkus [#]na sbom po/_nor bdag gi sems la nor yod par kyang [#]mi dran stor bar yang mi dran pa zhig las
[\[62b.6\]]brkus na/_thog ma nor bdag gi sems la bdag gi yin par bsams pas phyis mi dran kyang pham bsdus 'bras sran [#]phye nya sha bca' ba la sogs pa mi 'thob pa'i bsod snyoms blangs na yang ngo /_/kha zas [#]'di rnams lta bu las dge 'dun gyi nang nas bdag gi skal ba nyid blangs la
[\[62b.7\]]gung du spyan drangs pa'i zan skal la'ang blangs na'ang sbom po/_las mi 'dod pa'i phyir dge 'dun gyi nang nas byung la [#]zan zla phogs su nos te/_dge 'dun [#]las mi byed na'ang sbom po/_dge 'dun gyi nang du las byed [#]kyang zan zla phogs su nos te zla phogs kyi zan skal bsags pa'i phyir
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]slar dge 'dun la ma phul bar bzhag la [#]mgron du bos pa'i zan skal kyang zos na sbom po/_mi shes par gzhan gyis mi 'thob par blangs na ma yin no/_/bdag gud du gzhan gyis zan byin la mi shes par grogs pos zan skal nos su zin na yang slar phul na
[\[63a.2\]]nyes med do/_/ma bsgo [#]ba na yang ma yin/_dge slong grogs shig gud du zan zar song ste bdag la zan skal ma nod cig ces ma bsgo bar bdag gis skal ba nas grogs zan zos zin par gyur te slar phul na nyes med do/_/nyes byas pa ni ma bos pa'i chos bstan to[#]/_/dge slong mgron
[\[63a.3\]]du ma bos par mchod ston gyi zan zos na nyes byas/_ma bos shing ma byin par thug [#]thub tu zos pa ci'i phyir pham par mi 'gyur zhes zer ba yod do/_/yon bdag gi mig snga [#]na za zhing mi sbyin pa'i sems med pas pham par mi 'gyur/_/brku [#]bar 'gro ba yang ngo /_/rku bar 'gro ba'i tshe nyes byas/_
[\[63a.4\]]gros byed pa'ang de las tha mi dad do/_/rku bar 'gro bar bsams nas rkun zla dang gros byed pa'i tshe yang snga ma [#]bsams pa'i nyes byas su gtogs par zad do/_/bdag po med par rab tu brtag [#]pa bya ste blang /_phyag dar khrod kyi gos blangs pa lta bu la bzang po zhig na/_bdag po gang
[\[63a.5\]]yin bdag po yod dam med zhib tu brtags te blangs [#]ngan pa rnams ni ma [#]brtags kyang nyes med/_lus kyis nyal bar mi bya[#]/_bu lon chags pa lta bu phyir mdun du then cing nyal bar mi bya/_bram ze zhig la dge slong zhig gi [#]bu lon chags te bram ze zhing rmed [#]pa la bdas [#]nas ma ster de zhing
[\[63a.6\]]rmo ba'i rol khar [#]then te nyal ba las bcas/_bya tshang mi gzhig_/gtsug lag khang na bya tshang 'dug pa sgo nga med pa/_dge 'dun gyi [#]las su ma bskos par bshig kyang nyes med/_de ma gtogs par bya tshang bshig na nyes byas/_der ma gnas par dbyar gyi gos kyi [#]shas la
[\[63a.7\]]mi 'jug_/dbyar tshul du ma zhugs pa'i dge 'dun tshul du zhugs pa'i yon dang /_gos 'god pa'i yon [#]du ma gtogs te rku sems kyis nor skal blangs na/_rin thang tshang na pham rku sems med na sbom po/_rkun po las sbyin bdag tu bsams te blangs na ma nyes rkun por grags
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]pa'i mi zhig len na de [#]las nor zhig len na de la sbyin bdag tu bsams te blangs na nyes med/_nor blangs pa de ngos zin na yang rkun po de la khungs phyung na kun gyis shes pa'i phyir bdag gtsang mar 'gyur bas blang du rung /_g.yung ma rgod rkun po'i rgyal mtshan ma thogs pa las
[\[63b.2\]]rdzas mi blangs[#]/_rku mkhas te bu smad lta bus kyang rkun po byas par mi tshor te khrims 'dzin cing sdig chung ngu [#]la yang 'dzem pa ltar byed pa la rku ba'i mi dang 'di rnams gnyis lta bu g.yung ma rgod las rdzas blangs pa ni nyes byas nor de blangs te nor bdag gis ngos zin na g.yung
[\[63b.3\]]ma rgod la khungs phyung du zin kyang yul mis rku bar ma spyad [#]pas/_dge slong gtsang mar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi blang ngo /_/blangs nas mtshon gyis bcad cing kha dog bsgyur la bcang /_rkun por grags pa las nor blangs pa de kha tshar bcad de kha dog bsgyur te bcang /_de ltar
[\[63b.4\]]byas kyang slong na byin cig_/mdo ltag ma ltar rdzas blangs pa kha dog bsgyur te/_bcangs pa de nor bdag gis ngo shes te slar song na sbyin/_ma sbyin na nyes byas/_sgyu mi bya/_las lta bu byed byed pa'i gla mtho byogs [#]pa'i phyir med ces sam/_ma 'byor ces mi sbyin par sgyu mi
[\[63b.5\]]bya/_byas na nyes byas/_sngags kyis btang na ni nyes med/_bdag gi rdzas gzhan gyis brkus nas chos bshad de blangs kyang mi ster na/_sngags byas te sems bsgyur la/_bdag la sbyin du bcug pa ni nyes med do/_/byi bas brkus pa dag gi ni blangs na yang ngo /_/bdag gi nor
[\[63b.6\]]rdzas lta bu byi bas khyer ba las slar phrogs shing blangs pa ni nyes med/_de bzhin du khyi dang bya la sogs pa las [#]phrogs kyang nyes med/_dge slong gzhan gyi don de'i phyir yang ngo /_/dge slong gzhan gyi nor rdzas shig byi ba dang khyi la sogs pas khyer ba blangs shing phrogs pa yang
[\[63b.7\]]slar byin na nyes med/_bdag dang dge slong zhes 'byung bas khyim pa dang /_dge slong la ni nyes yod pa 'dra'o/_/rngon pas ri dwags smas [#]pa gnas su 'ongs te khyer na yang ngo /_/lings mi'am rngon pa lta bus ri dwags smas [#]te bdag cag gi gan du 'ongs pa ni snying rje zhing skyabs [#]bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ri dwags bsnyags pa'i bdag po slar ma byin yang nyes med do[#]/_/de shi na de dag la byin cig_/mdo ltag ma ltar ma byin pa de shi na sha slar byin sha bdag ring zhig tu ma 'ongs na yang bdag cag gis/_sha brkus shing ma zos par shes par bya ba'i phyir rul rul du
[\[64a.2\]]khengs [#]rus mngon par gzhag_/ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa'i bye brag tu [#]gdon mi za ba'o/_/ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa ste/_'dul ba bye brag tu gdon mi za ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_ma byin par len pa'i phas pham pa rdzogs pa'o/_/[#]ma byin par len pa'i phas
[\[64a.3\]]pham pa 'dul ba so so nas 'chad cing 'byung ba'i mdo kun rdzogs so//_//gsod pa'i phas pham pa'o/_/nad pa 'chi bar 'dod pa la de dang mthun pa'i bsnyen pa mi bsnyen/_dge slong nad pa shi yang bla snyam sems pa la 'chi na ci nyes zhes bya ba'i tshig mi bya/_dge slong nad pa zhig
[\[64a.4\]]bkres [#]zhes zer ba la nad g.yog dang sman pa la zas ci sbyin zhes 'dri song ba'i 'og tu/_dge slong gzhan dag gis so so nas zan sna mang du byin te 'grangs nas/_nad g.yog gis sman pas [#]zer ba bzhin du zan g.yos te byin pa dang /_kham gsum tsam zos nas ma yog nas nad [#]
[\[64a.5\]]g.yog mi dga' zhing 'dug pa la/_zan gzhan gyi [#]byin te 'grangs so zhes byas pa dang nad g.yog khros te nga de srid du 'bad 'bad na lto de tsam zhig kyang mi thub na dug zos te shi na ci nyes zhes byas pa dang nad pas [#]dug zos te shi ba las bcas/_de skad byas te shi na pham/_de la mi
[\[64a.6\]]shes pa 'chi ba gogs shig pa ma bsgo bar g.yog tu gzhag_/dge slong nad pa zhig shi yang [#]bla snyam sems te/_nad g.yog gi tsha bo [#]rngon pa spun gnyis shig yod pa 'di ni bdag la gsod du btub snyam bsams te nad g.yog la de gnyis khugs te [#]khyod kyi rogs su nga'i nad
[\[64a.7\]]g.yog byed du chug cig ces bsgo nas nad g.yog gis bkug ste nad pa zer ba bzhin du g.yog gyis shig ces bsgo nas bzhag ste/_nad g.yog dge slong gud du song ba'i 'og tu/_nad pas rngon pa la nga bsad na mtho ris su bde bar 'ong zhes chos bshad nas gsod du bcug nas
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]gsad [#]pa las bcas te/_nad g.yog tu mi blun po de lta bu mi gzhag_/nad g.yog sgrin po gzhag tu spus med na yang blun po la nad pa 'chir ma gzhug [#]cig ces bya ba la sogs pas gtams te gzhag_/thabs gzhan yod na ma yin/_nad g.yog tu bzhag pa mi sgrin po tshig zur
[\[64b.2\]]bye brag phyed cing legs nyes shes pa dang /_thabs mkhas [#]pa ni ma bsgo zhing ma gtams pa nyes med/_'chi ba'i yo byad mi gzhag_/nad pa'i drung du 'geg thag dang mtshon la sogs pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba mi gzhag_/de 'chi ba'i phyir rtsol na g.yog gis zlog [#]shig_/nad pa kho [#]
[\[64b.3\]]bdag 'chi bar rtsol na nad g.yog gis mi lus rnyed dka' ba dang /_bsod nams spyod [#]pa'i lus phangs so zhes yid bsrings la 'chi bar [#]mi gzhug cing dgag_/pha rol gyi don phyir [#]'chi ba ma dad cig_/dge slong pha rol po zhig la lhung bzed dam chos gos bzang po yod pa la/_de
[\[64b.4\]]shi na ngas 'thob pa'i phyir shi yang bla'o zhes dad pa mi skyed [#]de de ltar bsams na nyes byas/_mi bya ba byed pa la sems kyis kyang byed pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya/_pha rol po srog gcod pa dang rdeg [#]pa dang /_srog gcod pa'i thabs [#]byed pa la sogs pa bya ba [#]mi rigs pa yin te/_
[\[64b.5\]]de lta bu zhig byed pa la bdag gis kyang de bzang zhing yi rang ngo zhes mi bya byas na nyes byas so/_/'tsho ba bgags[#]/_srog gcad pa [#]dang /_der sems/_srog bcad [#]par bsams pa dang /_mi'i rgyud na'o/_/mi'i rgyud kyang yin pa dang yan lag 'di gsum dang ldan par mi bsad na pham
[\[64b.6\]]par 'gyur/_lus bdag gi [#]lus dang lus kyi yan lag dang po [#]la sogs pa [#]bsad pa dang /_der gtogs pa/_mtshon cha dang rdo dbyig lag pa na thogs te bsad pa dang /_btang ba/_mtshon cha dang rdo dbyig 'phangs te bsad pa dang /_gzhan la bsgo ba rnams kyang tha mi dad do/_/
[\[64b.7\]]gzhan la bsgo ste gsod du bcug pa dang de rnams ltar bdag gis bsad pa mtshungs te pham mo/_/dug dang /_dug blud de bsad pa dang /_phye ma dang /_dug phye mas lus la bskus [#]te bsad pa dang /_rlubs dang /_rlubs kyi nang du bsad pa dang /_shing dang /_shing dbang du btser
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]te bsad pa dang /_rang bzhin stor te btang ba dang /_thul lta bu byas te smyo [#]ste brag dang chu la sogs pa'i nang du shi bar byas pa dang /_brang skam bar byed pa dang /_sa mda' lta bus bsad pa dang /_sgyogs dang /_sgyogs kyis bsad pa dang /_khog tshe dang /_
[\[65a.2\]]khog tshe lta bus mjug [#]thag gis bzung ste bsad pa dang /_ro slong ba dang /_sngags kyis ro bslangs [#]te ro des gsod du bcug pa dang /_sngags kyi [#]sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang ngo /_/sngags kyis sa [#]lta bu la btab ste sa gtor bas bsad pa dang /_'di rnams lta bu las bsad na gang
[\[65a.3\]]gis bsad kyang rung pham/_phul ba gang ba dang chu lta bu la phul tam [#]mchod du bcug pa yang pham mo/_/chu dang mer bcug pa'o/_/chur bcug gam mer bsregs te bsad pa'ang pham mo/_/grang ba dang tsha bar bzung na yang ngo /_/grang ba lhags pa dang tshad khungs lta bu la bzung
[\[65a.4\]]dam bcings te bzhag nas bsad pa yang pham/_pho nyar btang ba la sogs pa yang ngo /_/gcan gzan za ba'am dgra'i khrod lta bur bsad pa'i phyir bsngags te btang nas shi na yang pham pa'o/_/chung zad du [#]gtogs na yang ngo /_/bsad pa'i phyir bem [#]tol lam khab kyis
[\[65a.5\]]btsugs pa'am yungs 'brus 'phangs [#]te shi na yang pham/_skyes pa dang bud med dang ma ning bsad na'o/_/skyes pa dang bud med dang ma ning gang bsad kyang rung pham mo/_/de'i phyir phyis shi yang ngo /_/gsod pa'i phyir mtshon cha la sogs pas btab ste/_'phral du ni ma shi'i de'i [#]
[\[65a.6\]]zhar gyis phyis shi na yang pham mo[#]/_/bzlog pa las phyis na mtshan ma ma yin/_khyod shi na skyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bsgo ste phyis/_nga 'khrul pa yin te shi ba'i mi rigs so zhes bzlog na shi yang rung /_ma shi yang rung sbom po/_sbom po ni ma'i lto mnye ste mngal na pha ma
[\[65a.7\]]dmigs pa na'o/_/bud med rum na bu yod pa zhig bu bsad pa'i phyir ma'i lto mnyes te ma shi na sbom po/_ma bsad pa'i phyir bu shi na yang sbom po/_gang gsad [#]par byas pa nyid shi na pham/_gsod par 'jug pa de'i mtshan mar mos pa yang ngo /_/gzhan zhig gis mi 'di gsad
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]do zhes dris [#]pa dang /_dge slong gis sod cig ces ma [#]smras kyang gsad [#]par dga' ba'i phyir lus kyis [#]dad pa'i brda byas na sbom po/_khyim bdag u pa se spun gnyis las pho [#]bo tshong la song ba'i 'og tu pho [#]bo'i chung ma la nu bos rgyos nas bur chags te ngo tsha ba'i phyir thar par zhugs
[\[65b.2\]]pa dang /_grogs po sman pa zhig 'ongs te khyod ngo tsha na sman gyis bu med par bya'o zhes byas pa dang /_lus kyis sod [#]cig pa'i brda byas pa [#]las bcas/_khyod kyi [#]ming gis 'chi ba'i yo byad sbyin no zhes [#]na yang ngo /_/mi zhig na re khyod kyi ming nas phyung ste/_khyod na re dug 'di 'thung
[\[65b.3\]]shig ces zer ro zhes bya'o [#]zhes byas pa dang /_gsad [#]par dga' ba'i phyir kha rog 'dug na sbom po/_gzhan phyugs ma yin pa dang /_mi dang byol song gi rgyud ma yin pa na reg pa dang 'dre dang lha'i lam dang gsum gyi rgyud la gang yang rung ste bsad na sbom po/_sprul pa bsad na
[\[65b.4\]]yang ngo /_/sems can gyi gzugs su sprul te sems med pa zhig bsad na nyes byas/_sprul pa sems yod pa zhig bsad na sbom po/_byol song mir sprul pa bsad na'ang sbom po/_mi byol song du sprul pa bsad na sbom po ni med de pham pa'o/_/dri bas ma bsgo
[\[65b.5\]]bar nad pa la sman mi sbyin/_nad pa sman cig sbyin na shes pa'i sman pa la dri ba'i rigs te ma dris shing /_sman pas ma bsgo bar nad pa la sman mi sbyin/_byin na nyes byas ci lta bu la dri ba 'og nas bshad/_sman pa dang /_sman pa nyid dang /_de las rab tu byung ba dang /_sman pa las rab
[\[65b.6\]]tu byung ba dang /_de dang 'grogs po [#]dang /_sman pa dang rtag tu 'grogs 'grogs te sman dpyad shes pa dang /_der dri'o/_/'di rnam [#]gsum lta bu la dris te sman [#]byin pa ni nyes med do/_/nad bu can la yang ngo /_/nad bu can ni rtag tu nad kyis gtses kyi sman dpyad shes pa'i rigs
[\[65b.7\]]te de la dris te nad pa la sman sbyin [#]pa'ang nyes med do/_/dge slong rgan po/_dge slong rgan po ni na rgan pa dang /_rgan [#]po shes rab dang bcas pa rnams la yang ngo /_/khrims rgan po mang du myong zhing shes pa legs nyes kyi bye brag phyed pa dag dris te/_nad pa la [#]sman byin yang nyes
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]med/_gong ma med na 'og ma la yang ngo /_/sman pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las rim bzhin du ltag ma dag med na 'og ma dag la dris te nad pa la sman sbyin/_shi ba'i phyir phan par sman byin na 'bri ba med do/_/mi nad kyis nyon mongs shing 'dug pa la/_shi
[\[66a.2\]]na bde bar 'gyur zhes bsams te shi bar 'ong ba'i sman sbyin par mi bya/_mi de shi na pham/_dge slong ma gcig cig gis mi rgod kyi rkang lag gtubs te/_nyon mongs shing 'dug pa la shi na bde zhing skyid ces 'bras kyi khu ba'i sman zhes bya ba byin te bsad pa las bcas/_
[\[66a.3\]]khur mi thag [#]pa la grogs mi bya/_mi bcu tsam gyis bteg dgos pa'i khur la/_mi brgyad tsam gyis bskur [#]bar rtsol na mi theg cing snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nang du zhugs shing bteg pa'i grogs mi bya/_byas na nyes byas/_bya ba ni de ste de'i rkyen [#]gcig na khyim [#]pa dang sbrel te
[\[66a.4\]]bskos la mnyam du theg cig_/mdo ltag ma ltar mi bcu tsam gyis bskur [#]dgos pa cig la [#]mi brgyad las med de/_mi bskur [#]du mi rung ba'i rkyen gcig byung [#]na khyim pa dang /_dge slong spel la stobs mnyam par bteg cing bskur de ltar ma byas na nyes byas/_gzhag pa
[\[66a.5\]]yang mnyam du gyis shig_/mdo ltag ma ltar mnyam du theg pa'i khur de slar gzhag pa'i tshe na yang stobs mnyam par gyis te [#]pheg tu 'byor [#]bar gyis shig_/de ltar ma byas na nyes byas/_pha gu [#]mi dor pha gu [#]long btags shing skyed [#]pa lta bu la gcig la gcig mi dor pha rol
[\[66a.6\]]po'i lag gis zin nas gtad/_de ltar [#]ma byas na nyes byas grum pa dang gas pa ma bsgo bar de mi gtad/_pha gu [#]grum mam chag ste[#]gas pa zhig na pha gu [#]chag go zhes bya ste pha rol gyi lag tu sbyin/_ma byas na nyes byas/_rkun po la 'jigs pa'i phyir bsdigs mo byos shig_/gtsug
[\[66a.7\]]lag khang du rkun po 'ongs na 'dus te sgra bskyed de lhung bzed dang /_rkun 'di dang yi ge'i po ti la sogs pa long la rgyob ces bsdigs/_gaN+DI [#]la sogs pas [#]ma phog par 'phongs shig_/rkun po la ma phog pa tsam du gaN+DI [#]la sogs pa 'phongs la bsdigs mo gyis shig_/rlung phyogs
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]su sa'am thal bas gang ba'i gyo mos so/_/rkun po 'ongs na rlung ga las langs pa'i phyogs nas thal ba dang /_sa la sogs pas gtor te mig tu song bar bya/_chongs shig 'ur rdo/_/rkun po la bsdigs pa'i phyir 'ur rdo bcangs kyang nyes med/_ngal ba'i dge slong la mi phul/_
[\[66b.2\]]mi pa [#]spad gnyis shig [#]thar bar zhugs pa las 'jo [#]ta ba ni lha khang na [#]gdugs tshod kyi gaN+DI [#]brdung ba mi sleb [#]pa'i phyir pha rgan pa [#]'gro mi phod pa bus phul zhing khrid pa las bub ste shi ba [#]las bcas te de ltar byas na nyes byas/_mgon [#]dang bcas par bya/_dge slong nad pa'am rgan po
[\[66b.3\]]'gro ma phod [#]pa zhig khrid na lus kyi rim gro lus bsti ba dang mnye ba la sogs pa rim gro bya/_ngal sor [#]gzhug_/dge slong nad pa'am rgan po de 'gro mi phod na ngal sor [#]gzhug cing bkri/_snod dag blang /_dge slong nad pa 'gro mi phod pa de'i lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang
[\[66b.4\]]rdzas la sogs pa bdag gis khur[#]/_'on te lhan cig tu gnas su zas dang skom gyi dus su 'gro mi nus na yang ngo /_/nad pa rgan po dang 'grogs te gdong [#]du pha rol gyi gnas su gdugs tshod dag mi slebs na bdag sngar song yang nyes med/_lhung bzed bkru/_bdag sngar
[\[66b.5\]]gnas su 'ongs nas nad pa phyis [#]'ong ba'i lhung bzed dang snod spyad [#]la sogs pa [#]bkru/_gral la gzhag_/rgan po phyis 'ong pa'i gral thabs gar bab pa gzhag_/byin len bya/_zas brims na rgan po phyis 'ong ba'i zan skal mnos te byin len bya/_brtag rgan po phyis 'ong
[\[66b.6\]]ba'i zan skal la shang tse la sogs pa brtag dgos pa yod na'ang brtag_/'on te dus su na khyer te bsu/_rgan po phyis 'ong bas [#]gdugs tshod mi slebs pa tsam gyi tshod na zan skal mnos la gar phrad phrad du bsu/_gsod pa'i phas pham pa ste rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/gsod
[\[66b.7\]]pa'i phas pham pa 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//mi'i rgyud kyi lag pa bcad na sbom po'o/_/mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can gsod [#]sems med par lag pa bcad na sbom po'o/_/de bzhin du rkang pa dang lag pa dang rkang lag gi sor mo
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bcad kyang sbom ste [#]bram ze gcig cig [#]gis drug sde u pa nan da'i [#]slad du rgyug pa gcig bsnun [#]nas/_u pa nan das [#]rgyal po la gsol te bram ze la smras [#]pa dang bsnyon [#]te khungs ma phyin nas bram ze lnga brgya'am gcig ril gyis lag pa bcad pa las bcas/_
[\[67a.2\]]gsod sems med na lag pa bcad pa shi yang sbom po'o/_/span spun du me btang na'o/_/rtsi shing la sogs pa span spun du me btang ste sems can yod par shes bzhin na sems can re re lhung [#]ba re re spyir sbom po gcig_/lha dang 'dre yod par shes te btang na sbom po gnyis
[\[67a.3\]]su 'gyur ro/_/mi yod par shes te btang na pham/_skra can btsongs na yang ngo /_/mi bdag dbang ba btsong bar dga' ste btsongs na'ang sbom po/_gang gis brkus pa rgyal po'i 'khor du btad [#]na yang ngo /_bdag gi rdzas rkun pos khyer ba las rkun po bzung ste nor slar
[\[67a.4\]]dgug pa'i phyir gsad [#]dam mi gsad [#]gtol med par rgyal po la phul na sbom po/_gsod par shes bzhin du rgyal po la phul te bsad na sbom po dang pham pa gnyis ka yod/_gsod pa'i phas pham pa phran tshegs su gtogs pa'o/_/mi la gsod pa'i phas pham pa 'dul
[\[67a.5\]]ba phran tshegs zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//ston par bsgo ba'o/_/gsad [#]pa'i mi zhig bros [#]te yib pa dge slong gis mthong ste/_snyegs ma mi 'ongs nas 'dri na gsad [#]par shes te bsnyad na sbom po/_bstan pa las bzung ste bsad na pham mo/_/dper ma'i
[\[67a.6\]]mngal lo/_/gsod pa'i mi lnga drug gcig bros te yib pa las snyags ma mi 'dri ste/_bdag dang mi mdza' ba gar yib pa bstan pa las gzhan zhig zin te gsad [#]na sbom po/_sbom po ni bdag gsod [#]pa'o/_/dge slong bdag gis bdag bsad na sbom po/_lung du ma
[\[67a.7\]]bstan pa'i sems kyis mi dge bar byas na nyes byas pa'o/_/bsad pa'am rdeg [#]pa'am gzhu ba'i sems med par kha nas byung rgyal du 'u ni gzhus sod rdegs zhes [#]byas na nyes byas/_gsod sems [#]med par rdo bor ba la sogs pa'i khar mi la sogs pa shi'ang nyes byas/_ma
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]dmigs pa'i phyir grub pa [#]mi bya/_gsad [#]sems med par rtsed mo la sogs pa lta bu byas te shi na nyes byas/_tshe rabs su las mi 'byung ngo /_/mi gsad [#]mtshon cha la sogs pas btab ste/_'phral du ma [#]shi ste bdag sngon du shi la mtshon gyis btab pa'i mi de nyid kyi lan
[\[67b.2\]]bon gyis phyis shi na'ang pham pa med de sbom por zad do/_/gsod pa'i phas pham pa dris pa 'dir [#]gtogs pa'o/_/mi la gsod pa'i phas pham pa ste 'dul ba'i sde dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//sbom po ni bdag 'chi ba 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes smra ba ni yid mi
[\[67b.3\]]ches te de ltar grub na'o/_/nad pa tshabs po che sman dpyad bya ba'i phyir longs zhes bslangs pa [#]las nad pa na re nga bslang na 'chi'o zhes zer ba bzhin du bslang na shi yang rung ma shi yang rung sbom po/_dge slong nad pa zhig tshabs che zhing 'dug pa la [#]nad g.yog_/dge slong zhig gis
[\[67b.4\]]sman dpyad bya ba'i phyir bslangs [#]nas nad pa na re bslang na ni gdon mi za bar 'chis zhog shig ces zer ba las ma gnang ste/_bslang ba dang nad pa shi nas nad g.yog pham par gyur snyam the tshom zos te/_sangs rgyas la gsol pa dang /_pham pa ma yin te sbom po'o zhes bcas/_shi
[\[67b.5\]]shig par nad pa la g.yog ma byas na'ang sbom po/_dge slong nad pa la nad g.yog su byed par de ltar gsos kyang ma sos [#]na shir zad mod ces bsams te/_nad g.yog ma byas par bor na shi'ang rung ma shi'ang rung sbom po/_mi 'ju ba'i zas byin na yang ngo /_/mi nad pa rlung nad na ba la
[\[67b.6\]]rlung nad [#]che ba'i kha zas byin pa dang /_tsha ba la drod che ba'i kha zas mi rung bar shes bzhin du gsod sems med par byin kyang sbom po/_dge slong nad pa zhig la nad g.yog gis zan ci bsod [#]ces dris pa dang /_nad pa na re sngun na ba'i che skyur po'i [#]nang du lan tshwa [#]btab ste 'thungs na phan gyis
[\[67b.7\]]byin cig ces zer ba las/_nad de rlung nad yin te skyur po dang lan tshwa [#]mi rung bar byin pa las shi ba'i phyir bcas/_phol mig ma smin par brtol na yang ngo /_/_phol mig [#]'bras lta bu 'og [#]ma byung zhing ma smin par brtol na sbom po/_dge slong gcig cig 'bras byung ste ma [#]
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]smin pa la[#]/_dge slong gcig gis brtol zhes byas pa dang /_ma smin gyis ma brtol zhes zer bzhin du ma gnang ste/_brtol nas shi ba las bcas te ma brtol zhes zer ba brtol ba dang /_bdag gi phol mig ma smin pa brtol [#]pa'ang sbom po/_rlubs su
[\[68a.2\]]'jug pa dang sgo phrag tu 'tshir [#]bas gnod par byed pa la sogs pa yang ngo /_/gsad [#]sems med par rlubs su bcug sgo phrag tu btsir ba la sogs pa rtsed mo'i phyir nyon mongs par byas pa dang /_ched gar nan la bor ba mtshungs te sbom po/_gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi
[\[68a.3\]]bar na dge bsnyen gtum [#]pa zhig 'dug pa las gtsug lag khang gcig gi [#]dge slong la rtag tu shing tog 'bul 'bul ba las dge 'dun lta mtshungs mod ces/_gtsug lag khang gcig gi dge 'dun la yang phul lo[#]/_/de nas yang sngon 'bul 'bul ba'i dge slong la 'bul
[\[68a.4\]]du song song ba las[#]/_dge slong de dag gis khyod lta shing tog gud du 'bul 'bul zhes sgo phrag tu btsir ba las bcas te sbom po/_g.yang du 'dor ba dang 'geg pa la sogs te 'chi ba'i phyir rtsol ba yang ngo /_/bdag 'chi ba'i phyir gad ka dang /_brag ka dang /_mtshon ka [#]dang /_
[\[68a.5\]]chu'i nang du mchang bar brtsal [#]te ma shi ba [#]yang sbom po/_gzhan la'ang de lta bu shi na rung ngo zhes bstan te ma shi na sbom po shi na pham/_na ba'i phyir bab chol du mtshon tam theg bu mi sbyin/_dge slong nad pa'i drung du mtshon cha'am theg bu la sogs pa 'chi ba'i yo byad mi gzhag_/
[\[68a.6\]]gsad [#]sems med kyang gzhag na nyes byas/_shes bzhin du gtogs par bya/_nad pa'i sman dang zas la sogs pa la tshos sam ma tshos pa dang /_sga [#]spod bro'am mi bro ba la sogs pa snga nas shes bzhin du zhal ta bya/_bdag dang dge 'dun gyi las ci [#]byed kyang rung ste nyes par 'gyur ram mi
[\[68a.7\]]'gyur shes bzhin du brtag ste bya/_de ltar ma byas na nyes byas sngags kyi phyir thal mos bsnun na yang ngo /_/nad pa la sngags gdab pa la [#]sogs pa thal mos btab dgos pa zhig yod na yang mi drag par shes bzhin du bya/_shes bzhin du ma byas na nyes byas/_brnangs pa la
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'byung ba'i phyir brdeg pa yang ngo /_/kha zas kyis brnangs te ltag par brdeg dgos na'ang mi drag par ran par shes [#]bzhin du bya/_gsod sems med par shes bzhin du mi [#]byas par shi na yang nyes byas/_sbab tu gtang [#]na de bzhin du rab tu brtags te'o/_/shing dang rdo la sogs
[\[68b.2\]]pa sbab [#]tu btang dgos na yang sems can la sogs pa yod dam med pa brtags te btang ngo /_/ma brtags na nyes byas/_khur chen po la cha [#]nyung ngus brtsal [#]bar mi bya[#]/_bdag gi rdzas lta bu khur chen po [#]lci ba la mi theg bzhin du mi nyung ngus mi bskur [#]spyi bo bkug ste mi 'gro/_spyi bor [#]
[\[68b.3\]]thur du bkug ste lag 'gros mi bya dgu ste spyi bo bkug la'ang mi 'gro lag 'gros ni [#]drug sde gcig rkang pa bkrus pa rdul gyis mi reg par bya ba dang rtsal ngom pa'i phyir lag 'gros byas pa las bcas/_spyi bo bkug pa na/_dge slong gcig spyi bo bkug ste song song ba las lug gis brdung
[\[68b.4\]]ba [#]las bcas/_ma bslabs pas bslabs [#]par mi bsgo'o/_/bdag gtar dpyad la sogs pa ma bslabs shing mi shes par gzhan la 'di ltar thob [#]shig ces kyang mi bsgo bdag nyid kyis kyang mi gdab/_btab cing bcos [#]na nyes byas/_gdab pa 'phen par mi bsgo/_mda'
[\[68b.5\]]dang mdung dang rdo la sogs pa ltad mo lta [#]ba'i phyir yang 'phen du mi gzhug thabs bslab pa'i phyir yang /_'di ltar phongs zhes kyang mi bsgo[#]/_/nad pa mi nus pa las mi bkri/_nad pa 'gro mi nus pa dang /_mi na'ang dal zhing nyal nyal ba'i mi lam du na bar 'gyur ba mi bkri [#]khrid na
[\[68b.6\]]nyes byas/_gsod pa'i phas pham pa ste rnam par gdon mi za'o/_/mi la gnod pa'i phas pham pa ste 'dul ba'i sde rnam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_/gsod pa'i phas pham pa rdzogs so/_/[#]mi la gsod pa'i phas pham pa 'dul ba so so'i nang nas 'byung
[\[68b.7\]]ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//brdzun pa'i phas pham pa la 'chad de/_'du shes sba ste/_bdag gi sems la med de mi shes bzhin pa dang /_'og nas yan lag bzhi 'byung ba dang lnga ldan na [#]brdzun gyi phas pham pa'o/_/bla ma mi'i chos kyi dang /_bla ma mi'i chos la smra ba dang /_
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]ldan pa ldan pa zhes dang /_bdag la bdag gi [#]phyir dang /_smras na'o/_/pha rol brda phrad pa la smras pa dang 'di lnga dang ldan na pham/_mthong ngo /_/bdag gis lha dag mthong ngo /_/bdag kyang mthong ngo /_/lha dag gis kyang bdag mthong ngo /_/sgra thos lha dag gi sgra bdag gis
[\[69a.2\]]thos bdag gi yang thos/_bdag gi sgra yang lha dag gis thos/_nye bar 'gro_/lha dag gi gan du bdag kyang nye bar 'gro_/bdag gan nye bar 'ong /_lha dag kyang bdag gi gan du nye bar 'ong /_lhan cig tu gtam byas/_lha dag dang bdag lhan cig tu gtam byas/_gtam kun byas/_lha dag dang
[\[69a.3\]]lhan cig [#]gtam kun zhib tu rgyus nas bshad/_kun mgu ba lha dag gis kyang bdag mgu bar byas bdag gis kyang lha dag mgu bar byas/_/_rtag tu yang lhan cig tu bdag dang spyod cing zhes smras na der 'gyur/_bdag dang lha dag rtag tu lhan cig tu 'grogs shing spyod do zhes
[\[69a.4\]]smras pa dang tshig gi rim pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang smras kyang rung ste/_mdo 'og ma lha dang klu la sogs pa ming gis smos pa/_gang la yang rung /_de dang 'di ltar smras [#]shing byas so [#]zhes smras na phas pham pa'o/_/lha 'phrul zhing rim par gnas pa dang 'phrul med cing
[\[69a.5\]]sa la gnas pa klu phyugs kyi khams su gtogs mod kyi 'phrul yod cing che ba la bya/_gnod sbyin 'phags skyes po lta bu chen po dang phal la bya/_dri za lnga phud par mi'i dri za dang lha la rol mo byed cing 'khor ba/_mi'am ci lus mi la mgo rta dang sbrul du 'dug pa lto 'phye chen po
[\[69a.6\]]gsus pa che la rkang lag thung la sbom por 'dag [#]pa'i gzugs shig yod pa/_yi dwags 'dre dang /_sha za mi la kyal ka byed pa ded dpon na mthe'u rang lta bu ril bum lus gzugs ril ril po'am zlum po zhig yod pa/_lus srul po dag la dmigs pa'o/_/lus srul po la
[\[69a.7\]]sogs pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste/_mdo ltag ma'i nang nas 'byung ba gcig dang ldan par byas so zhes smras na pham pa'o/_/mur 'dug gi rdzu 'phrul lnga lta bu shes so zhes byas na yang pham pa'o/_/sbom por byed pa ni phyag dar khung na gnas shing chub [#]mar
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]brdzu nus pa zhig yod de [#]mthong zhes byas na'ang sbom po/_mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i 'du shes dang /_'di man chad ni bla ma'i chos la 'chad de mi rtag pa ni nyi shu ste chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal pa dang /_nga med pa dang zas la mi gtsang ba dang rgyud lnga sdug bsngal
[\[69b.2\]]ba dang lnga phung 'dug pa dang mya ngan spangs pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pas khyegs pa dang /_tshe zad [#]pa'i dus [#]shes pa dang /_mi gtsang bar shes pa dang /_rnam par bsngos [#]pa dang /_rnam par rnags [#]pa dang /_rnam par dmar ba dang /_rnam par bam pa dang /_rnam
[\[69b.3\]]par zhigs [#]pa dang /_rnam par zos pa dang /_rus par dkar ba dang /_rus mig 'brel ba dang nyi shu ste/_'di nyi shu gang yang rung mi shes shing med la shes shing ldan no zhes smras na bla ma'i chos [#]smras pa yin te pham mo/_/bsam gtan dang /_'jig rten gyi bsam gtan rtog
[\[69b.4\]]pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang btang snyoms bzhi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan grub po zhes smras pa dang /_mur 'dug gi bsam gtan rtog pa dang bde ba dang /_dga' ba dang btang snyoms bzhi grub po zhes smras na pham mo/_/tshad med pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi ste
[\[69b.5\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms bzhi spyod nus so zhes smras pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'bras bu/_nam mkha' mtha' yas 'du mched stengs dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas 'du mched stengs dang /_cung zad med pa'i 'du
[\[69b.6\]]mched dang /_'du mched med [#]min 'du mched stengs bzhi grub bo zhes smras pa dang /_'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i rim pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang bzhi gang yang rung thob po zhes smras pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang [#]/_drug mngon
[\[69b.7\]]par shes pa ste 'phrul dang 'phrul gyi rna ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_tshe snga ma dran pa dang phyi ma gar skyes pa [#]shes pa dang zag pa zad pa dang /_drug gang yang rung smras pa dang /_mur 'dug gi 'phrul lnga ste zag pa zad pa ma gtogs par ming [#]gong du smos pa dang mthun te
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]smras pa dang /_stsogs [#]pa bla ma'i chos so/_/ltag tu ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste/_gcig dang ldan no zhes smras na pham mo/_/'di rnams ni bla ma'i chos zhes bya ste/_mur 'dug gi zhes smos pa yang bla ma'i chos ni ma yin mod kyi ldan no zhes
[\[70a.2\]]smras na pham mo/_/sbom por byed pa ni nyid kyi mtshan 'dzin pas mya ngan sel ba zhi gnas kyi mtshan zhes bya'o/_/dgon pa [#]bsam gtan byed cing 'dug 'dug pa las sems zhi ste 'dod chags bag la nyal ba la 'dod chags dang bral te mya ngan zag pa zad do snyam bsams na 'dod
[\[70a.3\]]chags dang bral lo zhes smras pa'i 'og tu bud med mthong ba'i rkyen gyis 'dod chags byung ba ni sems la drang por 'dod chags dang bral lo snyam du bsams pas sbom mo/_/mnyen [#]pa lnga brgya thar par zhugs pas mya ngan 'da' ba'i chos mkhan po la lung nos te dben par dong
[\[70a.4\]]nas bsam gtan du bsgoms pas sems zhi ste/_'dod chags bag la nyal ba [#]gcig la gcig gtam du byas te/_'dod chags dang bral lo zhes nas/_slar grong du zhugs pa dang bud med mthong ba dang /_'dod chags bag la nyal ba bslangs [#]nas 'dod chags dang bral
[\[70a.5\]]lo zhes smras pa pham par gyur to snyam du the tshom zos pa las [#]bcas/_de 'dra ba [#]de lta bu'i chos smras na ma smras pa ma yin no/_/bdag dgra bcom pa yin par go bar bya ba'i phyir/_dgra bcom pa dgon pa la gnas na gnod sbyin dang klu la sogs pas mi gtse zhing /_srung [#]ma byas pa bzhin
[\[70a.6\]]du nga la yang de ltar byas zhes smras pa dang /_yon bdag gis [#]dgra bcom pa la stan dang kha zas kyis ji ltar mchod pa bzhin du nga la yang de ltar byas so zhes smras na'ang pham mo/_/'di yod do zhes pha rol la bstan te bdag gi phyir [#]smras na yang ngo /_/bdag la bya ba'i phyir 'di rnams kyi nang
[\[70a.7\]]na dgra bcom pa yod do zhes smras na'ang sbom po/_de bzhin du bla ma'i chos gang yang rung ste ldan pa [#]yod do zhes smras [#]na'ang sbom po/_/nye bar smras na ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma skad du zer ba la gzhan zhig gis de lta bur ldan pa su yin zhes dris nas/_nga yin no zhes smras na pham/_
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]ma dgongs par lung mi bstan/_ma rtogs sam thog tu ma phebs par 'di yin no zhes lung mi bstan [#]bstan na nyes byas/_maud gal bsod snyoms len pa [#]bram ze'i chung ma la bu yod pa zhig gis dris pa/_mngal na bu yod pa 'di pho yin nam mo yin zhes dris pa dang /_maud gal
[\[70b.2\]]gyis phyis cir 'gyur ba ni ma brtags [#]kyi de nyid kyi tshe/_mngal na phor 'dug pa [#]rtogs te pho yin no zhes smras pa dang /_bu mor byung nas drug sdes/_maud gal gyis brdzun byas so zhes brgal nas/_brdzun ma yin te ma dgongs par lung ma ston cig ces bcas/_smra ba ste rnam par
[\[70b.3\]]'byed pa'o/_/brdzun gyi phas pham pa 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//thob pa las bri'o zhes zer na bla ma'i ma smras pa ma yin no[#]/_/bla ma'i chos las [#]gang yang rung ste/_ngas thob pa las nga bris te med do zhes smras na/_bla ma'i chos ni thob pa las
[\[70b.4\]]mi dbri [#]ba yin te/_de skad du smras pa yang pham pa'o/_/bla ma 'dir smrar 'dod pas ming gis [#]don mtshungs pa smras na sbom po/_bla ma'i chos dang ldan pa'o zhes smra bar 'dod pa'i phyir shing tog lag na thogs la/_'bras bu thob ces zer ba dang /_chu 'bab pa'i nang du lag pa
[\[70b.5\]]bcug ste rgyun du zhugs so zhes zer ba dang le lo byed cing /_mi slob pa la dgra bcom pa lobs zin te/_mi slob pa'i tshul du mi slob po zhes zer ba dang gang zag gi rim pa bdun slob pa lta bu'i tshul du bdag yi ge'am/_kha ton slob pa [#]slob dpon smras pa dang 'di rnams gang smras
[\[70b.6\]]kyang rung sbom po/_log pa yang ngo /_/bdag dgra bcom pa yin no zhes smra bar bsams pa las rgyun du zhugs pa'o zhes smras pa yang sbom po/_de bzhin du bla ma'i chos gang yang rung nang nor bar smras pa sbom po/_yid 'phrig [#]bskur ba yang ngo /_/nga dang 'dra na rgyun du zhugs pa
[\[70b.7\]]bsgrub tu rung ngo zhes bdag nor rdzas shig thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bla ma'i chos dang ldan par zung du smras la thob nas ldan pa ma yin no zhes drung [#]por bya bar bsams te khyod kyis nga tsam phod na ni rung ngo zhes smras te 'phrig [#]tu bcug na sbom po/_/phyis yang dag par yang de ma skyes pa
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar smras pa'i 'og tu/_ngas de skad du smras pa ni brdzun te yon tan dang ldan pa [#]ma yin gyi ma 'phrig [#]shig ces smras kyang sbom por mi [#]'gyur ba ma [#]yin no/_/smra ba ste 'bri [#]bar chud pa'o/_/brdzun gyi phas pham pa ste 'dul ba dris pa'i
[\[71a.2\]]nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//sbom po ni btsun pa dgra bcom pa ste gos [#]la sogs pa mchog rigs so/_/brdzun gyi sbom por 'gyur ba ni khyod btsun pa dgra bcom pa yin te gos dang kha zas la sogs pa mchog dbul ba'i rigs so zhes zer ba la dgra bcom pa yin pa ltar
[\[71a.3\]]bya ba'i phyir mi smra bar kha rog ste 'dug na sbom po/_bram ze ste tshangs par spyod pa'i btsun pa'o zhes zer ba la kha rog 'dug pa dang /_sdig pa'i chos spangs pa/[ #]sdig pa'i chos mi dge bcu spangs pa'o zhes zer ba la kha rog ste 'dug pa dang /_btsun pa'i dbang po drug rab tu 'dul
[\[71a.4\]]ba/_mi rtag pa dang mi gtsang ba la bsgoms dbang po drug rab tu dul te yul la mi 'bros pa'o zhes zer ba la kha rog ste 'dug pa dang /_sbas pa dbang [#]po drug zhi ste yul drug la bye brag mi 'byed par 'gog pa'o zhes smra ba [#]la mos pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsrungs pa'o zhes
[\[71a.5\]]bsrungs pa nyon mongs pa dang sdig pa'i chos bsrungs pa'o zhes zer ba la mos te kha rog 'dug pa dang /_sgom [#]pa po'o/_/bzod pa bsgoms shing zag pa zad pa'o zhes zer ba la mos te kha rog 'dug pa dang zhes byas na kha rog ste mos na'o/_/'di rnams kyi ming gis smos pa la gang yang
[\[71a.6\]]rung ste bstod cing smra ba la mos shing [#]kha rog 'dug na sbom po/_smras pa bzhin du yin no zhes smras na ni pham/_de ste btsun pa dgra bcom pa na/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu zhig tu smra ba la de bzhin du byed cing khar [#]smras na sbom por 'gyur ro[#]/_/bdag gi bsod snyoms long [#]/_
[\[71a.7\]]khyod dgra bcom pa yin ni bdag gi bsod snyoms [#]'di long zhes zer ba la kha rog ste blangs pa dang /_khyim du zhugs/_khyod dgra bcom pa yin na nga'i khyim du zhugs zhes zer ba la kha rog [#]ste khyim du zhugs pa dang /_stan la zhugs[#]/_khyod dgra bcom pa yin na stan la 'dug ces
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]zer ba la kha rog ste stan la 'dug pa dang /_lag chu long /_khyod dgra bcom pa yin na chus gtor te/_phog [#]pa'i sems can la yon yod na chu 'di long zhes zer ba la kha rog ste blangs pa dang /_mchod rten [#]long /_khyod dgra bcom pa yin na nga'i mchod rten [#]'di long zhes zer ba
[\[71b.2\]]la kha rog ste blangs pa dang /_tshod ma dang bca' ba zo[#]/_/khyod dgra bcom pa yin na tshod ma dang bca' ba 'di zo zhes zer ba la [#]kha rog ste zos pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ngo /_/khyod dgra bcom pa yin na nga la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes zer ba la khar smras [#]par yi rang ba dang /_byung zhes pa/_
[\[71b.3\]]khyod dgra bcom pa yin na nga'i khyim nas byung [#]zer ba la kha rog ste byung ba dang /_de dag bsgrubs na'o/_/'di rnams las gang yang rung ste dgra bcom pa yin na 'di ltar byos zhes zer ba la kha rog 'dug cing zer ba bzhin du byas na sbom po'o/_/dgra bcom pa bzhin du bla ma'i
[\[71b.4\]]chos gang yang rung ste sbom po'o/_/smra ba'i ste rnam par gdon mi za ba'i 'o/_/brdzun gyi phas pham pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo bla mar smra ba rdzogs so/_/[#]brdzun gyi phas pham pa 'dul ba sde so so'i nang nas 'byung ba rdzogs so/_/[#]phas pham pa rdzogs so/_/
[\[71b.5\]#]phas pham pa bzhi bshad pa rdzogs so//_//dge 'dun lhag ma'i khu ba la 'chad de/_rmi lam ni med pa bzhin no/_/rmi lam na khu ba byung ba ni/_bdag la dbang med cing mthu med de bcos su mi rung ba'i steng du dbyung bar bsams pa'i sems med pas nyes med do/_/de'i 'bras
[\[71b.6\]]bu ni ma byas pa'o/_/rmi lam na khu ba byung ba'i sdig gi 'bras bu'ang med do/_/rmi lam na log pa byas pa'i [#]'bras bu'ang med/_'og nas ming gis smos pa 'di bcu dang ldan na lhag [#]ma phyung ba/_khu ba phyung ba dang /_der 'dod pa dang /_der 'dod pa khu ba 'byin par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[71b.7\]]bdag gi khu ba/_bdag nyid kyi khu ba dang /_thog ma khu ba lus thams cad kyi nang na khyab par 'dug ste/_dper na bu ram shing mngar bas thams cad du khyab pa dang 'dra bar 'dug pa las 'dus te/_'ong bar gzhungs pa'i nang du 'phags pa dang 'di yan chad yan lag_/bde bar [#]
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]'dod chags skyes pa las/_bde bar bya ba'i phyir khu ba phyung ba dang /_rig [#]sngags bya ba'i cho gar dgos pa'i phyir [#]khu ba phyung ba dang /_sa bon mo mtshan gyi nang du blugs te/_bu'i sa bon du bya ba'i phyir khu ba phyung ba dang /_sman bdag na ba la phan
[\[72a.2\]]pa'i phyir khu ba phyung ba dang gzhan na ba'i sman du bya bar khu ba phyung ba dang /_brtag pa'i phyir dang /_gzhon nu dang rgan pos khu ba yod dam med pa dang /_ci 'dra zhes brtag pa'i phyir khu ba phyung ba dang /_kyang bye [#]brag med do/_/'di rnam [#]lnga las gang yang rung ste/_gcig gi
[\[72a.3\]]phyir phyung la yan lag bcu dang ldan na lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/reg pa khu ba dbye [#]ba'i phyir pho mtshan la reg pa dang /_'bad pa khu ba dbyung [#]bar las byed cing 'bad pa/_pho mtshan/_pho mtshan yang yin pa dang /_phyi rol gyi yang ngo /_/bdag gi khu ba gzhan 'byin du bcug pa
[\[72a.4\]]dang bdag nyid kyis phyung ba gang yang rung ste yan lag gcig_/sems can du gtogs pa/_sems can du gtogs pa'i lus gson pa'ang [#]rung shi ba'i ro la'ang rung ste der phyung ba/_de bzhin du 'dug pa la'o/_/sems can gyi gzugs yin par shes pa la bya ste/_lus
[\[72a.5\]]dang yan lag [#]gi sha dang rus par shes pa dang 'di yan chad [#]gong nas bzhi smos pa dang /_yan lag bcur ldan te khu ba phyung na lhag ma/_shin tu ma btsir/_shin tu ma bcangs kyang ngo /_/_khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir bya ste pho mtshan la drag tu ma btsir zhing /_ma bcangs par dal
[\[72a.6\]]gyis byas pa las byung ba yang lhag ma/_dben dang sngon mi tshangs par spyad [#]pa dang khu ba phyung ba ji snyam byed la dben [#]bcas nas bsams te/_'di lta bur 'dod pa'i phyir khu ba phyung ba dang /_zag pa dang khu ba la gnas las 'phags nas zag cing 'byung ba'i tshe ji snyam du byed sad
[\[72a.7\]]pa'i phyir phyung ba dang /_bdo ba med pa'i 'dod chags bdos te/_mi bde ba la phyung bden par [#]'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_bde ba ji snyam byed sad pa'i [#]phyung ba dang /_bde ba myong ba yang ngo /_/'di rnams gang gi phyir yang rung yan lag bcu dang ldan na lhag mar gyur to/_/gce'ur
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]ma zhugs pa las so/_/khu ba dbyung bar brtsal [#]te pho mtshan gyi gce'ur ram rtsar ma zhugs kyang lus kyi [#]gnas las 'phags na lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i tshe btang na zin par byas pa ma yin no/_/khu ba dbyung bar brtsal te khu ba lus kyi gnas las ma 'phags par
[\[72b.2\]]btang na sbom po/_'bri bar byed pa ni bro gar rdung [#]ba dang rab tu gar rdung [#]ba'o/_/khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir bro brdung ba dang bro drag tu brdung ba [#]dang gang byas kyang rung ste khu ba phyung na sbom po'o[#]/_/nam mkha' la rkub bsgul ba'o/_/khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir nam mkha' la bkud de khu ba phyung
[\[72b.3\]]na sbom po/_phyogs gud du reg na'o/_/khu ba dbyung [#]ba'i phyir pho mtshan ma yin pa lus kyi yan lag gzhan brud cing mnyes te khu ba byung na sbom po/_rgyun bzlog pa la bzed [#]na'o/_/khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir chu 'bab pa'i khar [#]pho mtshan bstan te khu ba dbyung ba yang ngo /_/rlung
[\[72b.4\]]khar na yang ngo /_/khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir rlung 'ong ba'i khar pho mtshan bstan te khu ba phyung na sbom po/_dben [#]gyi dga' ba [#]bde ba myong bar grub na'o[#]/_/lus dang ngag gis ni ma spyad kyi sngon mi tshangs par spyad pa'i chung ma'i sha mthang dang mo mtshan yan chad bsams te/_de la 'di
[\[72b.5\]]ltar spyad de khu ba dbyung na zhes dmigs te khu ba byung ba yang sbom po/_gce'ur [#]zhugs na yang ngo /_/khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir ma byas par khu ba lus kyi gnas las 'phags zin pa zhig las phyung na sbom po/_gzhal ba'i phyir chags pa'i sems kyis reg na mi sbyor ba ma yin no/_/
[\[72b.6\]]'dod chags kyi sems kyis pho mtshan ji tsam yod pa bcal [#]ba'i phyir khu ba phyung na sbom po/_bltas na nyes byas pa'o/_/'dod chags kyi sems kyis pho mtshan la bltas na nyes byas/_'bab rgyun dang rlung phyogs su bzed na yang ngo /_/chu 'bab pa'i rgyun dang rlung langs pa'i
[\[72b.7\]]phyogs bzhin du khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir bsdad na khu ba byung yang nyes byas ma byung yang nyes byas/_ltung ba med pa ni [#]de'i phyir ma [#]zhugs par lugs pa/_nyes par mi 'gyur ba ni khu ba dbyung bar ma bsams la 'og nas ming gis smos pa gang yang rung de lta bu'i rkyen gcig gis khu
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]ba byung ba ni nyes med do/_/brla dang bdag gi brla la pho mtshan drud de khu ba byung ba dang /_gos dang gos la [#]pho mtshan drud [#]de khu ba byung ba dang /_gzhan la reg pa dang /_mi gzhan gyis bdag gi lus kyi yan lag gi sha dag la [#]bzung ste khu ba byung ba dang /_
[\[73a.2\]]phrugs pa [#]na'o/_/g.yon [#]pa dang rngo la sogs pa pho mtshan dang yan lag la sogs pa la phrugs pa las/_khu ba phyung ba dang 'di rnams kyi phyir khu ba byung ba ni nyes med do/_/reg pa ma yin par myong na'o/_/khu ba dbyung bar [#]ma bsams 'dod chags kyi sems kyang med par cung
[\[73a.3\]]ma mthong ba dang /_kha zas zhim po zos pa [#]dri bsung zhim po myong ba'i phyir khu ba byung ba ni nyes med do/_/de dran pas na de na yang ngo /_/bud med sngon mthong ba zhig dran pa dang /_kha zas dang dri bsung zhim po zhig sngon myong ba dran pa las khu ba byung ba yang nyes med do/_/'byin pa'i ste
[\[73a.4\]]rnam par 'byed pa'i'o/_/khu ba'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste/_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'di man chad ni lhag ma ltar khrims su bcas pa las/_u pA [#]lis dris te ci tsam lhag ma dang sbom por 'gyur ba'i bye brag phye ba[#]/_'bab ma khad [#]pa'i
[\[73a.5\]]tshe ni 'phags pa'o/_/khu ba dbyung bar brtsal te gzhungs pa'i nang du ma zhugs kyi bar du [#]ni 'phags pa zhes bya ste/_sbom po'o/_/lus kyi gnas las 'phags te gzhungs par zhugs na lhag ma/_bab ma thag pa ni gce'ur zhugs pa'o/_/rmi lam lta bu na khu ba dbyung bar
[\[73a.6\]]'phags pa ni lus kyi gnas las 'phags te/_gzhungs pa'i nang du song ma thag tu gce'ur zhugs pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu zhig las khu ba thal byung phyung na sbom po/_rtsom pa ni mi sbyor ba ma yin no/_/khu ba byung [#]ba'i phyir brtsal te spyad na khu ba lus kyi gnas las ma 'phags
[\[73a.7\]]kyang sbom po/_ma brtsal bar byung nas dga' bar tshor na de bzhin no/_/dang po ni khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir ma byas mod kyi/_rmi lam mam gos la sogs pa la drud [#]de khu ba byung ba la ched kar dbyung ba ni lhag mar gyur na kho rang byung bas stes [#]so zhes rjes su yi rang zhing dga' bar tshor
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]na sbom po/_/pho mtshan btsir kun mnyes na'o/_/'dod chags kyi sems kyis pho mtshan btsir mnyes na khu ba ma byung yang sbom po/_sgren pa de la byugs na yang [#]/_pho mtshan sgren pa la khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir lag pa'i steng du gzhag pa lta bu las khu ba byung na sbom po/_sman
[\[73b.2\]]gyis phyung na yang ngo /_/khu ba ched kar phyung ba [#]lhag ma zhes te sman 'thungs te khu ba [#]phyung na yang sbom po gzhan gyi yang ngo /_/gzhan gyi khu ba bdag gis phyung na sbom po/_'byin pa'i ste dris pa'i'o/_/khu ba 'byin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste/_'dul ba dris pa zhes bya
[\[73b.3\]]ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'di man chad ni pha rol gyi gzhi ji lta bu la khu ba phyung na lhag ma dang sbom por ci [#]tsam gyis 'gyur ba bshad pa/_bam pa ro lta bu bam pa la sogs pa/_rnam par bsngos pa dang rnags [#]pa dang zhigs pa dang rnam par zos pa dang rnam
[\[73b.4\]]par dmar ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang ro las [#]'di rnams lta bur gyur pa dang /_bral ba rus pa dang [#]lhu tshigs so sor bral ba dang /_keng rus rus pa dkar por gyur pa'i keng rus dang /_mgo mgo la khu ba byung ba dang /_rna ba rna ba'i bu gur bcug ste khu ba phyung ba dang /_
[\[73b.5\]]sna sna'i bu gur [#]bcug ste khu ba phyung ba dang /_mgrin pa mgrin par khu ba phyung ba dang /_mgrin pa'i bar dang /_mgrin pa'i sha nyer [#]ba'i bar du khu ba phyung ba dang /_rtsib logs rtsib [#]logs su khu ba phyung ba dang /_rgyab rgyab tu khu ba phyung ba dang /_brang brang du khu ba phyung ba
[\[73b.6\]]dang /_rtsa rtsa'i pags pa drangs pa'i bar du khu ba phyung ba dang /_skra'i bar du lus la chags pa'i skra'i gseb dang /_lan bu'i bar dang /_lag pa lag par khu ba phyung ba dang /_phrag pa phrag par khu ba phyung ba dang /_dpung pa dpung par khu ba phyung ba dang /_mchan
[\[73b.7\]]khung mchan khung du khu ba phyung ba dang /_rked pa rked [#]par khu ba phyung ba dang /_brla brlar khu ba phyung ba dang /_rkang pa rkang par khu ba phyung ba dang /_byin pa [#]byin par khu ba phyung ba dang /_'gab [#]khung du phyung na 'gab [#]khung du khu ba phyung ba dang /_rtsa ba'i ming gis smos pa 'di
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]rnams lta bu gang yang rung ste khu ba dbyung ba'i sems kyis 'di gcig la phyung na yang lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/sbom po ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir 'di gcig la phyung na sbom por 'gyur/_la ba la ba la khu ba phyung
[\[74a.2\]]ba dang /_phying pa phying pa la khu ba phyung ba dang /_dri'u rdog dri'u [#]rdog gi stan la khu ba phyung ba dang /_sngas khab sngas khab la khu ba phyung ba dang /_khri khri la khu ba phyung ba dang /_khri'u khri'u la khu ba phyung ba dang /_khres rtswa bam mam shing bal gyi stan la khu ba phyung ba dang /_khri'u'i bar
[\[74a.3\]]khri'u'i bar du khu ba phyung ba dang /_bum pa bum pa la khu ba phyung ba dang /_bum bu bum bu la khu ba phyung ba dang /_bum pa'i kha bum pa dang bum pa'i khar khu ba phyung ba dang /_bya ma bum bya ma bum du khu ba phyung ba dang /_chol zangs chol zangs [#]la khu ba phyung ba dang /_rdo rdo la khu ba phyung
[\[74a.4\]]ba dang /_skyang nul skyang nul la khu ba phyung ba dang /_skyang nul gyi bar skyang nul gyi rtsig pa las 'phags pa'i bar du khu ba phyung ba dang /_sgo gtan sgo gtan la khu ba phyung ba dang /_sha sna gu [#]la'o/_/ro'i sha dum bur gyur pa brla'am lag pa las [#]gang gi sha yin par mi shes
[\[74a.5\]]par ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la ma gtogs par/_gzhan cing yang rung 'dod chags kyi sems kyis khu ba phyung na sbom po/_rma btsir na yang ngo /_/mi tshangs par spyod pa 'dod pa'i phyir/_pho mtshan dang /_kha dang /_rkub gsum rma yod kyang rung /_rma med kyang rung 'dod chags kyi
[\[74a.6\]]sems kyis btsir tam mnyes na pham pa'i sbom po/_bud med la bya bar brtsams te btsir na yang ngo /_/mi tshangs par spyod par brtsal te mo mtshan btsir tam mnyes te btang na phas pham pa'i sbom po/_kha dang rkub gnyis kyang de dang 'dra/_der mtheb mo bcug na yang ngo /_/mi
[\[74a.7\]]tshangs par spyod 'dod pa'i phyir mo mtshan du mtheb mo bcug na phas pham pa'i sbom po/_'gro ba las byung ba yang ngo /_/mi tshangs par spyod du song song ba las lam du khu ba phyung na phas pham pa'i sbom po/_gnas nas gnas su song na yang ngo /_/khu ba dbyung ba'i phyir phar
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]song tshur [#]song byas te khu ba phyung na'ang sbom po/_log pa yid la byas na yang ngo /_/'dod chags kyi sems langs te khu ba dbyung bar bsams pa las khu ba byung [#]na'ang sbom po/_pho mtshan bzung na yang ngo /_/khu ba dbyung ba'i 'dod chags kyi sems yod de pho mtshan la
[\[74b.2\]]bzung ba las khu ba byung na sbom po/_ltung ba med pa ni sgre'us brud pa [#]na'o/_/khu ba mang du zag [#]pa'i phyir sgre'u btags pa las khu ba dbyung ba'i sems med par sgre'u nang du bcug pa las 'drud de khu ba byung ba ni nyes med do/_/sngon gyi chung mas 'khyud de na yang ngo /_/'dod
[\[74b.3\]]chags dang khu ba dbyung ba'i sems med par sngon gyi chung mas sdug pa'i phyir lus sam mgul nas 'khyud pa las khu ba byung ba'ang dga' bar tshor ba'i sems med na nyes med do/_/rkang pa dang byin pa dang brla dang sor mo la sogs pa bud med kyis bzung na yang ngo /_/lus kyi yan
[\[74b.4\]]lag ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la bud med kyis bzung ste 'dod chags kyi sems med cing khu ba dbyung bar ma bsams par khu ba byung na dga' bar ma tshor zhing dang ba'i sems med na nyes med/_'byin pa'i ste rnam par gdon mi za ba'i'o/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i khu ba 'dul
[\[74b.5\]]ba rnam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo 'byin pa rdzogs so/_/[#]khu ba'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma 'dul ba'i sde so so nas 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//'di man chad dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma 'dzin pa la 'chad/_'di ni bud med las byed do/_/'dzin pa'i
[\[74b.6\]]lhag mar 'gyur ba ni bud med las bzung ba las 'gyur ro/_/dben pa'i 'dug pa dang gnas pa yang ngo /_/dben pa gnyis te sa dben par bud med dang 'dug pa dang /_dge slong ma dang /_'greng pa'i ltung ba gnyis kyang bud med las 'gyur ro/_/_smyan [#]gnas kyang /_smyan [#]
[\[74b.7\]]gnas su 'dug pa dang gab pa gnyis kyi ltung ba yang bud med las 'gyur ro/_/lhan cig nyal ba yang ngo /_/bud med dang khyim gcig na nyal ba yang bud med las 'gyur ro/_/lam du rig pa'i skyes pa med par lhan cig 'gro ba yang ngo /_/lam du rig pa'i skyes pa med
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]par bud med dang 'grogs pa'i ltung ba yang bud med las 'gyur ro/_/mdo [#]bzhin pa gnyis kyang ngo /_/'dzin pa'i 'og nas smye tshig [#]dang kun spyod dang 'byung ba gnyis kyang bud med las lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/khyim ma [#]la chos 'chad pa'i tshe rig pa'i skyes pa
[\[75a.2\]]dang lhan mi cig pa yang ngo /_/khyim ma la rig pa'i skyes pa med par chos bshad pa'ang bud med las ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/lhan cig kyang ma brtags pa la na'o/_/khyim ma la chos 'chad pa'i tshe rig pa'i skyes pa yod du zin kyang /_/khyim ma nyid slar steg pa'am mi rtag pa'am
[\[75a.3\]]mi gtsang [#]ba'i chos bshad pa na'ang rtag cing gtsang [#]la bzang ngo zhes zer ba la chos mi bshad/_de la nyes byas pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar khyim pa steg [#]pa la chos bshad na nyes byas/_gling gzhan nas skyes pa dang /_shar phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyi gling gsum
[\[75a.4\]]gyi mi lam du 'grogs pa dang chos bshad pa'i mi [#]rig pa'i skyes par bzhag na brda phrad kyang smye ba bya ba'i cho ga dang /_brda mi mthun pa'i phyir nyes byas zeg zeg po can 'bri ba'o/_/bud med dang lam du 'gro ba dang chos 'chad pa'i rig pa'i skyes pa gling gzhan gyi mi ma yin zhing
[\[75a.5\]]brda phrad du zin kyang /_rig pa'i skyes pa de nyid steg pa'i chos byed pa zhig na'ang nyes byas te steg pa de la ma bshad de btang na nyes med/_de go bas so/_/khyim ma la 'chad pa'i rig pa'i skyes pa ni go zhing brda phrad pas bya'o/_/rig pa'i skyes pa yengs sam gnyid log pa la chos
[\[75a.6\]]bshad de ma go na nyes byas/_de lta bu'i tshul na gnyis po'i mtshan ma don med do/_/lhag ma dang ltung ba bud med las 'gyur ba bcu ltag [#]nas ming gis smos pa'i rnams/_ma ning mo mtshan che ba zhig la lhag ma zhig byas [#]na yang lhag ma dang [#]dngos su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba zhig [#]byas na
[\[75a.7\]]yang ltung ba dngos su 'gyur ro/_/mo mtshan che ba'i bye brag ni/_pho mtshan dang mo mtshan che chung dang spyad du rung mi rung gis [#]dbye'o/_/che chung med na nu ma dang kha spus bye brag dbye'o/_/'dir phyed du 'gyur ro/_/bud med dang lam du 'gro ba dang chos 'chad pa'i skyes pa'i gor ma ni
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]gzhag na mtshan che chung mtshungs te nyes byas/_tha ma gsum ni legs par smras pa [#]dang nyes par smras pa'i don kun [#]shes pa'o/_/ltag tu lhag ma dang ltung ba bud med las 'gyur ba bcu'i tha ma rgyo tshig dang kun spyod dang /_khyim ma la chos 'chad pa ni bud med brda phrad cing go la
[\[75b.2\]]legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i don kun shes pa la byas na lhag ma dang ltung bar 'gyur[#]/_gzhan ni smye ba bya bar bzod pa la rtsa ba'o/_/lhag ma dang ltung ba bud med las 'gyur ba bcu la mdo ltag ma'i nang du gsum smos pa ma gtogs par/_gzhan bdun ni
[\[75b.3\]]bud med mi tshangs par bya bar bzod pa la byas na lhag ma dang ltung bar 'gyur/_gzhan ni mdo bzhin pa'o/_/lhag ma dang ltung ba bud med las 'byung ba bcu la rgyo tshig dang kun spyod dang /_khyim ma la 'chad pa gsum bud med brda mi phrad pa la byas na sbom po dang nyes byas/_
[\[75b.4\]]'dzin pa la sogs pa bdun ni/_bud med mi tshangs par spyad du mi bzod pa la byas na lhag ma ni sbom por 'gyur/_ltung ba ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ma ning 'di ni mtshan gnyis na med kyi so so'am/_mtshan ma tsam yod pa la bya ste mi bzod pa la bya/_ma ning pha dang ma ning ma dang 'phrul
[\[75b.5\]]pa'ang de bzhin no/_/lhag ma dang ltung ba bud med las 'gyur ba [#]rnams ma ning dang 'phrul pa'i bud med la [#]byas na lhag ma'i [#]sbom po ltung ba ni nyes byas su 'gyur/_spyad [#]du bzod cing brda phrad kyang dga' ba'i cha [#]shas chung ba'i phyir sbom por 'gyur te 'bri'o/_/'di gsum ni skyes
[\[75b.6\]]pa la yang ngo /_/'dzin pa dang rgyo tshig dang [#]kun spyod gsum 'dod chags kyi sems dang [#]bcas pas skyes pa la byas kyang sbom po/_de'i dga' ba myong bar 'dod pa las/_'dod cing chags pa dang /_'on te 'dod chags dang bcas [#]na yang ngo /_/brtul ba dang mdo [#]'og ma las
[\[75b.7\]]yan lag gnyis 'chad pa dang bzhir ldan na lhag ma'o/_/de'i zhes zer ba nas yang ngo zhes zer ba'i phyir [#]'chad/_chags shing brtul te bzung nas dga' bar tshor na lhag ma chags pa med [#]la brtul te bzung na yang sbom po[#]/_brtul ba med la [#]chags te bzung na sbom po/_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]chags pa'ang med brtul ba'ang med par bud med la [#]bzung na nyes byas/[ #]lus la reg pa/_bud med kyi lus la bzung ba[#]/_dga' bar tshor na yang ngo /_/bzung nas dga' bar tshor ba [#]yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan te/_bud med la [#]bzung na 'dzin pa'i
[\[76a.2\]]dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur/_lan bu yang de dang 'dra/_bud med kyi skra'i lan bu las bzung na [#]yang 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma 'gyur/_de la gtogs pa'i gos kyang ngo /_/skra chings dang cod pan las bzung na yang skra dang 'brel cing tshor ba yod pa'i steng du
[\[76a.3\]]dga' ba'i shas che ba'i phyir [#]lhag mar 'gyur/_reg pa dang lag pas bsnams [#]pa dang /_kun du reg pa dang /_lag pas mnyes pa dang /_sprad pa dang brang ngam gdong lta bu bcar zhing sprad pa dang /_bzung ba dang lus kyi yan lag gang yang rung lag gis bzung ba dang /_
[\[76a.4\]]'dren pa dang bzung nas drangs pa dang /_kun 'dren pa dang bzung nas yang dang yang drangs pa dang drangs nas bskor [#]ba dang /_bteg pa dang phang [#]du blangs pa dang gnam du bteg pa dang /_bzhag pa [#]blangs te sar bzhag pa dang /_btsir ba dag la btsir ba'am [#]bcum pa'am
[\[76a.5\]]mnan pa dang bye brag med do/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang [#]rung bud med la byas na [#]lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/[#]rten gyis kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma [#]nas ming gis smos pa gang yang [#]rung bud med kyis dge slong la bya ste yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na lhag mar 'gyur/_
[\[76a.6\]]gos kyis dkris [#]pa la ni mdo [#]bzhin pa'o/_/bud med gos gyon pa'i ste[#]/_steng nas bzung ba ni sbom po/_dar lta bur [#]srab mo las bzung na lhag mar 'gyur/_nyes byas pa ni bri [#]yang tha mi dad do/_/pham pa dang lhag ma las bri ba ni sbom po/_sbom po dang [#]ltung ba las
[\[76a.7\]]bri ba ni nyes byas/_nyes byas las [#]bri ba ni nyes byas su zad do/_/dge slong ma la mi reg_/'dod chags kyi sems med par/_dge slong ma la reg na nyes byas yan lag [#]dang ldan pas/_dge slong ma [#]bzung ba ni lhag mar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bud med
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]la yang ma yin/_bud med la 'dod chags kyi sems med kyang mi reg_/reg na nyes byas/_reg pa ni chus khyer ba las dbyung ba'i phyir dpung pa'am/_skra la ma dang sring mo dang bu mor 'du shes bzhag ste'o/_/bud med chus khyer ba ni ma dang sring mo dang /_bu [#]mor
[\[76b.2\]]'du shes bzhag ste/_chu las dbyung ba'i phyir reg kyang nyes med do/_/bzung [#]ba ni ro smad na mi bzung gi [#]dpung pa'am skra las bzung ste dbyung ngo /_/bye phung la dran pa thob pa'i phyir kha spub tu gzhag_/mdo [#]ltag ma ltar bud med chus khyer ba dbyung ba de [#]lto chus gang ste
[\[76b.3\]]brgyal na chu dbyung zhing [#]sos par bya ba'i phyir [#]bye ma'i steng du kha spub tu gzhag[# ]/khri'u bzhin du bsrung ngo /_/mdo [#]ltag ma ltar bye ma la kha spub ste bzhag pa de'i drung du bdag mi 'dug par mig rgyang gis khyim pa la/_dge 'dun gyis khri stan brnyar byin pa srung [#]ba bzhin
[\[76b.4\]]du byar bya'o/_/ba lang rdzi'am ra lug rdzi la gtams [#]te zas kyi phyir 'gro'o/_/bdag zas kyi dus la bab ste 'gro na'ang bye phung la kha spub ste [#]bzhag pa'i bud med phyugs rdzi ba'am[#]/_su 'dug pa la gtams [#]te ma shi bar byos shig par bsgo la 'gro/_'tsho ba'am [#]
[\[76b.5\]]mi 'tsho ba [#]yang brtag_/chus khyer ba'i bud med de mig rgyang du bsrungs pa [#]la 'tsho'am mi 'tsho yang yang [#]skabs skabs su blta zhing brtag_/nyes med pa ni snying rje'i phyir dag pa'i sems kyis bud med kyis 'khyud pa'o/_/bud med nyid [#]snying rje zhing dag pa'i sems kyis
[\[76b.6\]]bdag la bzung zhing 'khyud pa ni nyes med do/_/bud med rgan po [#]gtsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gis sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas te 'chag tu gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi sku la 'khyud nas a nan gyis 'khyud du ma bcug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar nga'i [#]
[\[76b.7\]]ma byas te/_de'i bag chags las sdug cing dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa yin te/_'dzin du ma bcug na [#]khrag tu skyugs te 'chi yis [#]zhog shig ces byung [#]ba las bcas/_lus kyis reg pa'i [#]ste rnam par 'byed pa'i'o/_/'dzin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma 'dul ba
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung pa'i mdo//_//[#]'jam mnyen dro [#]ba'i bsam pas sbom po'o[#]/_/'dod chags kyi sems med la bud med kyi lus la [#]'jam pa'am mnyen pa'am dro [#]ba'i phyir bsams te sad [#]pa'i phyir bzung ba ni sbom po/_ltung ba med pa ni
[\[77a.2\]]snying rjes sdug bsngal ba las btang na'o/_/bud med la reg kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ba ni bcings pa dang bzung ba dang btags pa dang mer song ba la sogs pa dbyung zhing dgrol ba'i phyir snying rje ba'i [#]sems kyis reg pa ni nyes med do/_/ma dang sring mo dang [#]bu mo de'i 'du shes
[\[77a.3\]]kyis na'o/_/mdo [#]ltag ma ltar bud med nyon mongs pa [#]snying rjes btang [#]ba'i phyir reg pa ni rgan mo la ni mar bsams[#]/_de bas gzhon nu la ni sring mor bsams[#]/_gzhon nu [#]chung ngu la ni bu mor bsams te reg na nyes med do/_/sngon spyod pa la kun dga' bas kyang ngo /_/
[\[77a.4\]]sngon gyi chung ma [#]sdug cing dga' ba'i phyir bzung ste/_dge slong 'dod chags kyi sems ma langs na nyes med/_lus kyi reg pa [#]ste dris pa'i'o/_/'dzin pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]bslang ba dang zan [#]dang skom
[\[77a.5\]]la sogs pas bud med [#]la bya/_sa [#]dang bong ba la sogs [#]bud med kyi dbang por bcug na sbom po'o/_/bud med kyi mo mtshan du ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las gang yang [#]rung reg par 'dod pa'i phyir bcug na sbom po'o[#]/_/chung ma zhig gnyid kyis log ste mo mtshan
[\[77a.6\]]snang ba la drug sdes kha dang de ba sbibs shing bzhugs [#]na bshos gsol zhes zer zhing mo mtshan du zan la sogs pa bcug pa las bcas/_nyes byas pa ni rkang pa'am phrag pa la sogs pas bud med la phul na'o/_/'dod chags kyi sems med kyang bud med kyi khrod
[\[77a.7\]]du [#]lus dang phrag pa dang /_rdog pa la sogs pas phul cing song [#]na nyes byas/_de stan [#]la yang ngo /_/bud med kyi stan la bud med 'dug kyang rung mi 'dug kyang rung 'greng yang rung /_'dod chags kyi sems kyis phul tam reg na nyes byas/_bred [#]de 'gyel ba'i bud med
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bslang [#]na yang ngo /_/bud med steg [#]'chos pa la bslang na 'dod chags kyi sems med kyang nyes byas su 'gyur te/_shi ba'am ldang mi [#]nus pa ma yin pas bslang ba'i [#]skabs su mi 'bab pas nyes byas/_ltung ba med pa ni bud med kyi de la de gsum byas pa'o/_/mdo [#]
[\[77b.2\]]ltag ma gsum bud med kyi [#]bdag la bya ste 'dod chags kyi sems ma langs pa ni nyes med/_bzung ba yang ngo /_/[#]bud med kyis bdag gi lus kyi yan lag las [#]bzung ste 'dod chags ma g.yos na [#]nyes med/_mas 'khyud na yang ngo /_/bdag gi mas sdug pa'i
[\[77b.3\]]phyir lus la [#]'khyud de 'dod chags kyi sems ma langs na nyes med/_bu mo pang du [#]'dug na yang ngo /_/bdag gi bu mo sngon 'grogs 'grogs [#]pa'i dbang gis bdag gi pang par 'dug pa ni nyes med/_'gyel te bud med kyi steng du ltung na yang ngo /_/rengs [#]pa'am
[\[77b.4\]]'jigs pas bdag bud med kyi steng du 'gyel tam steg [#]'chos te reg [#]na'ang nyes med/_lus kyi reg pa ste [#]bye brag tu gdon mi za ba'i'o[#]/_/'dzin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma 'dul ba [#]bye brag tu gdon mi za ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo lus kyi [#]reg pa'o/_/'dzin pa'i dge
[\[77b.5\]]'dun [#]gyi lhag ma 'dul ba sde so so'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//'di man chad smye tshig la 'chad/_smye tshig tu smras/_'dzin pa'i rtsis mgo bzhi'i steng du smye tshig tu smras pa [#]'dis bsnan te lngar ldan na lhag ma'o/_/smye'i don las so/_/smye tshig ni ra rgya rna ru bya'o zhes
[\[77b.6\]]byas pa la bya[#]/_chags pa dang brtul ba dang rgyo'o zhes smras pa dang dga' bar [#]tshor ba dang bud med yin pa dang /_tshig brda phrad pa dang yan lag 'di rnams ldan na smye tshig gi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/TI ka [#]'di ni mdo [#]'di gnyis la [#]spyir 'chad/_gang gis chad par nus na
[\[77b.7\]]des ni bsgo [#]ba'i mtha'o/_/mi tshangs par spyod do zhes bud med la smra ba'i tshe mi tshangs par [#]zhes ni khar byung gi spyod [#]do zhes bya ba khar ma byung yang snga ma phyed byung bas mi tshangs par spyod [#]par bud med kyis go na lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/der chud pa'i don smras na sbyor ba ma yin pa [#]
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]ma yin no/_/mi tshangs par spyod do zhes ni ma smras kyi [#]steg sngags sam zur du smras te bud med kyis mi tshangs par spyad par go yang sbom po/_bstod pa dang /_bud med kyi kha dang rkub dang mo mtshan gsum bzang ngo 'jam mo zhes bstod pa dang [#]/_smad pa dang sgo gsum
[\[78a.2\]]la mnam [#]mo mi sdug go bshul zhes smras pa dang /_gsol ba dang bud med kyi sgo gsum la bslangs [#]pa dang bud med nyid skog [#]tu 'dong zhes bslangs [#]pa/_nye bar gsol pa dang /_bud med dang skyes pa [#]gnyis yong gis lhan cig tu 'dug pa yin na [#]phrad pa'i dus kyang dka' na'o/_/
[\[78a.3\]]gnyis lhan cig 'khod dam zhes byas pa dang /_dris pa dang bud med kyi sgo gas[#]la khyod kyi sgo rnams ci 'dra zhes dris pa dang /_kun dris pa dang bud med la'o/_/bu gnyis lhan cig 'khod na dga' ba'am mi dga' zhes dris pa dang /_bshad pa dang bud med la nga ni khyod la dad cing dga' na
[\[78a.4\]]khyod nga la dga' 'am mi dga' zhes byas pa dang /_mos pa dang khyod dang ngag gnyis nam lhan cig tu 'grogs shing phrad ces smras pa dang /_khros pa dang mo mtshan la dmar mo spun mo gleg mo 'dir mgal du ma chug [#]ces byas pa dang /_phyir smra ba dang ming gis smos pa 'di
[\[78a.5\]]rnams gang yang rung ste/_bud med kyis bdag la slar smras te bdag gis slar lan glan pa dang /_tshig so so la bye brag med do/_/'di rnams gang yang [#]rung ste bdag gis smras [#]sam bud med kyis dris te lan glan zhing rgyo tshig dang ldan par smras na lhag mar 'gyur/_rgyo tshig
[\[78a.6\]]med na gang smras kyang sbom po/_ltung ba med pa ni yul gyi skad kyi dbang gis don gyi phyir bsams na'o/_/bdag gi yul gyi skad du smye tshig tu smra bar ma bsams par don gzhan gyi phyir smras pa las yul gzhan gyi skad du rgyo tshig tu gyur pa ni nyes med do/_/rgya gar yul
[\[78a.7\]]gyi dge slong [#]gcig gis stod phyogs kyi yul ko sa lar phyin te kun de med [#]nas khyim pa khyo shug gnyis shig las [#]kun de bslangs [#]zhes byas pa dang /_yul ko sa la'i skad du kun de la mo mtshan zhes zer te [#]'phyas su byas [#]pa las bcas/_ming 'dra ba'i char gtogs pas
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]kyang ngo /_/don gzhan du smras pa las tshig gi mgo'am mjug [#]smye tshig 'dra bar 'byung ba'ang [#]nyes med de[#]/_smye tshig tu smra ba'i [#]ste/_rnam par 'byed pa'i'o/_/smye tshig tu smra ba'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]sbom
[\[78b.2\]]po ni mdzes so zhes zer na yang ngo /_/bud med kyi sgo gsum la mdzes so bzang [#]ngo zhes smras na sbom po/_/sdig to can no zhes na yang ngo /_/kha dang stu 'dra ba'i [#]sdig to can 'di [#]zhes smras pa dang /_sgo gsum las [#]btsog pa sdig to can 'di zhes smras pa'am [#]sbom po/_khyod kyi rma
[\[78b.3\]]kha mdzes sam sdig to can 'di zhes na [#]yang ngo /_/bud med kyi sgo gsum la mdzes sam/_sdig to can 'di zhes smras pa dang [#]/_sgo gsum la mdzes so bzang ngo [#]zhes smras na yang ngo /_/rgyo tshig dang mi ldan na sbom po/_go shig ces na yang ngo /_/khyod kyi mo mtshan las shes
[\[78b.4\]]nub 'ga' tsam nga la yang byin cig [#]ces smras na yang sbom po/_khyod dang lhan cig go shig ces na yang ngo /_/bud med la khyod kyi khyo 'di snyed [#]bdog na de snyed kyi shas las nga 'ang mo mtshan gyi shas las byin cig ces smras na yang sbom po/_nga dang lhan cig tu nyal ba'am
[\[78b.5\]]tsor [#]cig ces na yang ngo /_/bud med la nga dang lhan cig tu nyal lo zhes byas [#]sam nga la cor [#]cig ces byas na sbom por 'gyur/_smye tshig tu smras pa [#]ste dris pa'i'o/_/rgyo [#]tshig tu smras pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma [#]ste 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]
[\[78b.6\]]'phrul pa [#]sprul pa'i chos can la smras na'ang de lta bu'o/_/'phrul pa'i bud med nam mkha' la 'dug pa las[#]/_dge slong gis rgyo tshig smras na sbom po[#]/_rgyo byin cig ces kye [#]sring mo [#]kho bo la byin/_bud med la dge slong gi rgyo tshig ces [#]bya ba'i tshig nyid du ni ma smras kyi rgya'am
[\[78b.7\]#]rgyu byin zhes smras te/_rgya [#]tshig bud med kyis go yang sbom po/_kye sring mo gang khyod la snang ba de byin/_bud med la mo mtshan bslang [#]ba'i phyir khyod la snang zhing yod pa de nga la byin zhes smras na'ang [#]sbom po/_kye sring mo gang khyod kyi mdun na mo de byin[#]/_bud med la mo
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mtshan bslang [#]pa'i phyir khyod kyi mdun na yod pa de nga la [#]byin zhes smras na yang sbom po/_kye sring mo gang khyod kyi [#]yid du 'ong ba de byin/_bud med la [#]mo mtshan bslang [#]ba'i phyir khyod kyi yid du 'ong ba de nga la [#]byin zhes smras na'ang sbom po/_khyod 'dod
[\[79a.2\]]pa byin cig ces nga la bsgo na khyod ci 'dod [#]smros nga ni sring mo khyod 'dod do/_/khyim bdag mo na re khyod ci 'dod pa byin cig ces nga'i khyim thab zer na [#]khyod ci 'dod ces zer ba la/_dge slong gis nga ni khyod 'dod ces byas [#]na yang sbom po/_kye sring mo chu dang bza' ba dang
[\[79a.3\]]thug pa dang mchod ston bzhin du khyod nga la [#]byin zhes smras na yang ngo /_/khyim bdag mo bud med kyis/_dge slong la kha zas ming gis smos [#]pa 'di rnams gsol zhes zer ba la/_dge slong gis kha zas de bzhin du/_khyod la nga [#]bkres shing skom gyis khyod bdag 'dod do
[\[79a.4\]]zhes smras na'ang sbom po/_bong bu dang khyod 'di byos shig_/bud med la khro ba'i tshig tu bong bu dang rgyo [#]shig ces bya ba'i phyir bong bu dang /_bud [#]med khyod 'di byos shig ces byas na'ang sbom po/_sring mo bsod snyoms [#]ma skyes bu la [#]'dod pa gleng bar spyad pa spyod do/_/dge
[\[79a.5\]]slong ma gdong 'khru ba'am mig rtsis bskus [#]pa la khyod skyes pa 'dod chags slong ba'i phyir byed do zhes byas na'ang sbom po/_mgal [#]dum der chug_/bud med la mo mtshan du mgal [#]du ma chug ces smras na'ang sbom po/_rang bzhin gyi [#]smye tshig tu smra ba la smye tshig tu smra ba/_dge slong
[\[79a.6\]]rtag tu kha ngan smye tshig tu [#]smra ba dar [#]bzhin du zer [#]yang rgyo tshig smras na ni mi 'bri ste mdo ltag [#]ma rnams smras na sbom po/_smye tshig [#]smra ba bye brag tu gdon mi za ba'i'o/_/smye tshig tu [#]smra ba 'dul ba'i [#]bye brag tu gdon mi za ba [#]zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_smye tshig
[\[79a.7\]]smra ba'i'o[#]/_/smye tshig tu smra ba dge 'dun gyi lhag ma 'dul ba sos nas 'byung ba rdzogs so//_//khun spyod la [#]'chad/_smye bas bdag gi g.yog tu brjod na yang ngo /_/bu mo spyod pa'i nang na [#]gtso bo ste [#]nga lta bu/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan [#]yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bdag la
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bstod pa dang rgyo tshig dang ldan par bud med la smras na[#]/_dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/chags pa dang brtul ba dang [#]dga' bar tshor ba dang bud med brda phrad cing legs nyes shes pa dang spyi'i rtsis mgo 'di rnams gang yang [#]rung /_kun spyod kyi lhag ma'i yan lag tu
[\[79b.2\]]gtogs [#]so/_/bstod nas rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig kyang de bzhin no/_/bud med kyis 'di ni spyod pa'i nang na [#]gtso bo ste/_khyod lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan na [#]yon tan dang ldan[#]/_dge ba'i chos dang tshangs par spyod pa'o zhes bstod cing smra ba la/_dge slong dga' nas
[\[79b.3\]]khyod zer ba bzhin du nga yin [#]no zhes smras na/_bud med de skad zer ba rgyo tshig dang ldan na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/_/de la zlos shing smra de na'o[#]/_/bud med de na re 'di ni spyod [#]pa'i na gtso [#]ste khyod lta bu'o/_/[#]dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan [#]yon tan dang ldan[#]/_dge ba'i chos dang tshangs
[\[79b.4\]]par spyod pa'o zhes bstod cing rgyo tshig dang ldan par smra ba la dge slong gis de bzhin du bzlas te smras na yang lhag ma'o/_/des smye tshig gam [#]ma byung na sbyor ba'o/_/dge slong gis smye tshig tu'ang smras/_bdag ces kyang byas na [#]lhag ma bdag gam [#]rgyo tshig gang yang rung gcig ma
[\[79b.5\]]phyung na sbom po/_gnyis ka na ni de'o/_/smye [#]tshig kyang ma phyung bdag ces kyang ma byas par dge slong yon tan dang ldan pa'i g.yog byas na bsod nams che'o zhes byas [#]na nyes byas/_kun spyod bsngags [#]pa'o/_/kun spyod pa bsngags pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma rnam par 'byed pa'i
[\[79b.6\]]nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]smyan gyi lhag ma la [#]'chad de/_sdud pa bud med dang skyes pa gnyis bsdus [#]dang /_gzhan la'o pha rol gzhan gnyis bsdus pa dang /_gzhan gyis bdag dang gzhan du 'du ba [#]la mi bya'i gzhan dang gzhan du bsdus pa dang /_de'i phyir
[\[79b.7\]]bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir [#]dang /_mi mthun pa la mthun par grub pa'i phyir/_khyo shug [#]lta bu sngon 'dus zin pa dang /_sngar mi tshangs par spyod spyod pa ma yin pa ma [#]'dus shing ma phrad pa la [#]gnyis bsdus pa dang /_pho nyar phrin [#]pa bsdu ba'i phyir [#]bdag gis pho nyar phrin [#]byas pa dang /_
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]sprad [#]pa las gnyis bsdu ba'i phyir [#]bud med dam skyes pa gang rung gcig las sprad par bya ba'i cha [#]mnos pa dang /_pha rol du sbron pa mdo ltag ma ltar cha nos nas gang dang bsdu ba'i mi [#]pha rol po de la phrin bskyal ba dang /_der smras nas [#]snga ma la sbron pa/_mdo
[\[80a.2\]]ltag ma ltar phrin bskyal nas de ltar rung ngo zhes zer ba'i lan slar bskyal ba dang yan lag 'di rnams ldan na smyan byed pa'i lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/cha nos te sbran nas des thob pa/_dge slong dang bud med dang skyes pa gsum mngon sum du 'khod de skyes pas/_dge slong la
[\[80a.3\]]bud med 'o ni la nga dang nyal du rung ngam mi rung zhes phrin zer du bcug ste skyes pa'i tshig kyang bud med kyis thos bud med la phrin byas nas rung ngo zhes byas pa'ang skyes pas thos bzhin du rung ba'i lan slar bskyal ba dang /_lhag ma [#]mngon sum du kun thos te lan ring nas ma
[\[80a.4\]]bsdus zhes lhag mar mi 'gyur du ma re [#]shig_/'di dag byed pa ni tha dad du'o/_/smyan bya bar cha mnos [#]shing phrin bskyal ba [#]lan re re la sbom po re rer 'gyur te/_lan brgya zhig bskyal te phrin [#]byas na sbom po brgya'o/_/tha mar byas kyang mi na mi sbyor ba ma yin/_smyan bya ba'i
[\[80a.5\]]phyir phrin [#]byed pa las pho [#]mo gnyis ma 'dus shing ma phrad du zin kyang phrin pa lan re re la sbom po [#]re re yod do/_/'bras bu gcig kyang byed pas zin na byed pa so so la med par mi 'gyur ro/_/chung ma'am mi tshangs par spyod du mi khugs [#]pa'i phyir/_dge slong mang mo [#]zhig la
[\[80a.6\]]phe'u byed par bcol te/_smyan byed du bcug nas 'dus par gyur na yang dge slong kun la lhag ma re rer [#]'gyur ro/_/phan tshun du phrin byed [#]pa'i tshe yang dge slong kun la sbom po re re yod do/_/dge slong mang [#]zhig la phe'ur bcol ba'i nang nas smyan [#]gyi phe'ur par ma btub pa'i
[\[80a.7\]]rnams la nyes med do/_/'dir bdag bzhin [#]du pho nyas kyang bdag smyan gyi phrin pa byed du bcug pa las/_bdag gi [#]yang gzhan zhig la smyan gyi phrin par bcug ste smyan gyi don grub na [#]'dus par gyur na yang lhag ma/_sbyar [#]na bdag po la [#]yang ngo /_/jo bo'am pha ma'am dpon
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]po lta bu khyo shug sdud cig 'tshem [#]pa'i dbang yod pa zhig la/_sdus shig ces byas [#]te 'dus na'ang lhag mar 'gyur/_nyes byas pa ni gzhan la'o/_/sdud cing 'tshem [#]pa'i dbang med pa zhig la de gnyis sdus shig ces byas [#]na bsdu ba'i dbang med pas nyes byas/_ngag
[\[80b.2\]]bzhin du smyan bya ba'i phrin byed pa bzhin ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi [#]don grub par gyur na lhag ma/_yi ge dang yi ge spring ste bsdus pa dang sa la bris te brda phrad [#]nas bsdus pa dang /_lag brda dang lag pas [#]brda byas te bsdus pa dang /_btus pa dang shing ngam rdo 'am sa
