[\[80b.3\]]tshigs 'dir shog shig ces btus te bsdus pa dang /_dus dang /_nyi tshod 'di tsam na shog shig ces byas te bsdus pa dang /_mtshan ma dag kyang ngo /_/gos 'di 'dra ba zhig bsgyur te gyon na 'dir shog shig ces byas te [#]bsdus pa dang 'di rnams gang yang [#]rung 'dus par
[\[80b.4\]]gyur na lhag ma/_stu 'tshong ma [#]la yang mthun pa ma yin/_stu 'tshong ma dang mi tshangs par spyod pa'i smyan byas te bsdus na yang lhag ma ste yong gis/_stu 'tshong ma lta kun dbang gis snyam ste skad cig sprad [#]pas lhag mar mi 'gyur snyam ma re shig_/bzhi tshun chad bdag gi
[\[80b.5\]]ma yin pa sbyar na yang ngo /_/skyes pa dang bud med sngon mi tshangs par spyod pa lan gsum man chad cig phrad zin pa las bsdus te dge slong gis smyan byas na lhag mar 'gyur/_lan gsum na sngar phrad du zin kyang lan bzhi'i [#]tshe dge slong smyan byas te bsdus pa ni sbom po'o[#]/_/
[\[80b.6\]]lan bzhi yan chad sngar phrad zin pa las bsdus na'ang sbom po/_'thabs na zhig pa'o/_/khyim pa khyo shug 'thabs te bye ba las [#]dge slong gis bcug ste slar bsdums [#]na lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/chung ma ji lta bu las bye ste bsdums [#]na lhag mar 'gyur ba'o gnas bshad/_de ste
[\[80b.7\]]de'i dbang gis chung ma ma yin par bsgo ba yang ngo /_/chung ma dang bye ba ni chung ma la rnam pa bdun yod de lag tu chu byin pa dang [#]rin gyis nyos pa dang gnangs [#]su thob pa dang gsum ni khyo la dbang yod pa ste/_khyos btang ba la las bsdums [#]na lhag mar 'gyur/_bdag dang
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]de gnas pa dang 'tsho ba'i phyir gnas pa dang 'tsho ba spyir bsdus te gnas [#]pa dang /_skad cig 'khod pa dang bzhi ni 'thabs ma thag tu bye ba pa yin te de las bsdums [#]na lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/'thabs pa'i tshad ji tsam gyis na bye ba yin pa dang /_ji
[\[81a.2\]]tsam 'thabs pa las bsdums [#]na lhag mar 'gyur ba dang /_sbom por 'gyur ba dang [#]nyes byas su 'gyur ba [#]'og nas bshad/_srog [#]chags bzhin du bud med dang skyes pa gnyis shing bsdus pa du'i smyan byas pa bzhin du ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste re re la lhag
[\[81a.3\]]mar 'gyur/_de'i tshe dang de gnas pa la sogs pa chung ma bzhi [#]ni khyo shugs [#]'thabs pa'i tshe bsdums [#]na lhag ma/_khyo [#]la dbang yod pa'i chung ma gsum gang yang [#]rung ba 'thabs pa'i tshe bsdums [#]na nyes byas gcig_/de ma thag ma dang dad de gnas pa la sogs pa chung ma
[\[81a.4\]]bzhi 'thabs ni zin gyi dang ma las shing so so nas [#]'khod pa la bsdums [#]na lhag ma/_khyo la dbang [#]yod pa'i bud med gsum gang yang rung khyo shug [#]'thabs te dang ma las pa las bsdus na nyes byas gnyis/_'thabs pa rtsa bcad pa dang /_dad de gnas pa la sogs pa'i bud med
[\[81a.5\]]bzhi gang yang rung khyo shug [#]'thabs nas rtsa bcad de bor ba 'phro slar mi 'byor ba bzhin du deng gnyis kyang mi 'dum ste bye'o zhes zer ba la bsdums [#]na lhag ma/_khyo la dbang [#]yod pa'i bud med gang yang rung gsum khyo shug [#]'thabs te rtsa bcad bzhin du [#]mi 'dum mo zhes zer
[\[81a.6\]]ba las bsdums na nyes byas gsum/_rdo gsum bor ba dang /_de gnas pa la sogs pa'i bud med bzhi gang yang rung khyo shug [#]'thabs te rdo gsum phyogs bzhir [#]bor ba bzhin du nged gnyis kyang slar mi 'dum ste bye'o zhes zer ba la bsdums na lhag ma'o/_/khyo [#]la dbang yod pa'i
[\[81a.7\]]chung ma gsum gang [#]yang rung ste khyo shug [#]'thabs te phyogs bzhir rdo bor ba bzhin nga dang gnyis mi 'dum zhes zer ba la bsdums na nyes byas gsum sbom po gcig_/spyod pa btang ba dang /_dang de gnas pa la sogs pa [#]chung ma bzhi gang yang rung ste khyo shug [#]'thabs nas so nam
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]dang spyod pa btang ste so so na 'khod pa las bsdums [#]na lhag ma/_khyo [#]la dbang yod pa'i chung ma [#]gsum gang yang rung 'thabs te spyod pa btang ba las bsdums na [#]nyes byas gsum sbom po gnyis/_chung ma ma yin par bsgo ba dang /_dang de gnas pa la sogs pa'i chung ma
[\[81b.2\]]bzhi gang yang rung 'thabs pa nas mi mang po'i drung du bye ste/_khyo shug [#]ma yin no zhes bsgo ba las bsdums na lhag ma khyo la dbang yod pa'i [#]chung ma gsum gang yang rung chung ma ma yin par bsgo ba las bsdums na nyes byas gsum sbom po gsum lhag ma gcig_/dril
[\[81b.3\]]brdungs pa dag go_/dang de gnas pa la sogs pa'i chung ma bzhi gang yang rung khyo shug [#]'thabs te chung mas [#]mur 'dug gi lha ris su bdag gi lus phul lo zhes byas pa las slar bsdums [#]na lhag ma/_khyo [#]la dbang yod pa'i chung ma gsum gang yang rung 'thabs te bud
[\[81b.4\]]med [#]kyis dril brdungs te mur 'dug gi lha ris su lus phul bas [#]bsdums na nyes byas gsum sbom po gsum lhag ma gnyis TI ka las [#]sbom po bzhir bshad do/_/nyes byas pa ni 'di'i thog ma gsum po/_mdo ltag [#]ma la bye ba'i rim pa rnam pa [#]bdun smos pa la rim bzhin
[\[81b.5\]]du thog ma gsum ni nyes byas/_bar ma gnyis [#]ni sbom po tha ma gnyis ni ltag ma ste khyo la dbang yod pa'i bud med gsum la 'chad de zhib tu ni ming gis smos pa rnams [#]bdun gyi thad ka thad kar bshad pa yin no/_/ci'i phyir na 'di'i khyim mi dbub pa dang gyos po'i khyim du mi gtang /_
[\[81b.6\]]dge slong grong du 'ongs pa dag gis khyim pa'i bus pa'i [#]pha ma ngag bsgo ba bus pa 'di dag ci'i phyir khyim mi dbub [#]ces smras na sbom po bud med khyim thab [#]la song ba zhig slar pha ma'i pang du 'ong zhing 'dug pa la/_dge slong na re 'di ci'i phyir gyos po'i [#]gan du mi gtang zhes byas
[\[81b.7\]]na [#]sbom po/_mi bkri zhes smras na yang ngo /_/bud med khyim thab la btang ba slar pha ma'i pang du 'ongs shing 'dug pa la/_dge slong gis bu mo'i khyim thab dang gyos rgyug [#]gi gan du bu mo 'di mi bkri mi dgug ji bya zhes byas na sbom po/_smyan gyi ste rnam par 'byed pa'i'o/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]smyan gyi dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste/_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]smyan byas te lhag mar mi 'gyur [#]sbom por 'gyur te 'og nas bshad/_sbom po ni mngal gyi dang /_dge slong gi [#]bu mngal na yod pa gnyis la/_gcig
[\[82a.2\]]pho gcig mo yin na khyo shug [#]tu sdus shig ces byas na sbom po/_med pa dang bus mngal na yang med pa la bu gcig pho bu gcig mo zhig yod [#]par gyur na sdus shig ces byas na sbom po/_sdom pa dang /_mur 'dug gi rab tu [#]byung ba mi tshangs par mi spyod pa zhig la khyim ma
[\[82a.3\]]dang 'du shes zhes byas sam sdom pa nang 'du [#]shig ces byas [#]na sbom po/_gzhug gnas med pa dang ma ning pho'i mtshan dang ma ning mo mtshan spyad du mi rung ba zhig nang bsdus sam gzhan dang bsdus na sbom po/_nyos pa dang bran du nyos te rin byin pa las bsdus pa'ang sbom po/_
[\[82a.4\]]'byor pa dang /_sngon lan gsum phrad zin pa dang chung mar nyos te rin byin pa las bsdus na sbom po/_/bdag gir smyan byas pa'o/_/bdag bud med de dang sprod cig ces byas sam bud med de nga'i mi tshangs par spyod pa byas khrid de shog shig ces byas na sbom po/_khas blangs
[\[82a.5\]]pa la [#]bstan na yang ngo /_/bud med dang skyes pa gnyis shig mi tshangs par spyod par dus byas pa las/_dus lam du ma phrad de lam snol nas 'dri ba de la/_dge slong gis [#]mi tshangs par spyod par shes te bstan na sbom po/_'thab mos brkus [#]na yang ngo /_/sngar chung mar byin pa'am
[\[82a.6\]]sngon mi tshangs par spyod spyod pa zhig pha mas bgags [#]te mi ster ba la dge slong gis/_pha ma 'thab mod brjod de bu [#]mo skyes par brkur [#]bcug gam bud med dus mal du btang na sbom po/_bud med che ge mo zhig chung mar nyos shig ces smras na yang ngo /_/dge slong gis skyes pa la
[\[82a.7\]]bud med ming dang snyo ge [#]mo zhig chung mar nyos shig ces bsgo na yang sbom po/_/nyes byas pa ni bud med ces na'o/_/skyes pa chung ma med pa la khyod la chung ma med dam chung ma [#]blangs sam zhes smras na nyes byas/_de [#]thob bam zhes na yang ngo /_/skyes pa chung ma med pa la [#]khyod
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]la las byed pa dang spa brtul byed pa med dam zhes byas na nyes byas/_smyan gyi ste dris pa'i'o[#]/_/smyan gyi dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]sbom po ni sbyin pa las gyur pa [#]bcug pa'o/_/pha mas sngar chung ma byin pa
[\[82b.2\]]la phyis mi ster ba la/_dge slong la pha 'ur bcol te pha bur [#]byas te bsdus na sbom po/_khye'u dang bu mo gnyis shig gi pha ma 'thabs te byas pa khyo shug tu bsdu bar byas nas khye'u gcig gi [#]pha ma shi ba dang bu mo'i pha mas ma ster te khye'us [#]dge slong la phrin par [#]bcol te/_
[\[82b.3\]]dge slong gis bu mo nyid [#]la khyod ni khye'u 'di dbang ba yin na 'gro ba'i rigs so zhes byas nas 'dus pa las bcas/_chos kyi phyir nor gyis mdun du byas te bos na yang ngo /_/bud med dang skyes pa sngon phrad pa zhig las byed de phrad du mi spobs pa las/_dge slong gis mchod
[\[82b.4\]]ston [#]gyi nang du bkug ste sprad na yang sbom po/_bud med dang skyes pa gnyis shig sngon phrad zin pa las 'thabs nas phrad mi spobs pa las/_dge slong gis thabs byas te mchod ston gyi rgyu bud med sbyor du bcug nas skyes pa las mi brnyas te sprad par byas nas mi tshangs par
[\[82b.5\]]spyod du bcug pa las bcas/_gzhan gyi phyir ldan na yang ngo /_/khyim thab byes su song ba'i bud med gcig la mi dra ma zhig chung mar blangs par byas pa las bud med de ma btub nas khyim thab kyang byes su shi mi [#]dra ma des sha nar byas te/_bud med de sman kun dong du [#]bcug
[\[82b.6\]]pa las chung ma de'i mas/_dge slong gcig la spring ste bdag cag ma smad ni khyod mnga' ste [#]khyod kyis bka' ci stsal bar bas so zhes byas nas/_dge slong gis phrin byas te bsdus pa las bcas/_de ltar byas na [#]sbom po/_ma khros par sems can lab gzhan du yang ma yin
[\[82b.7\]]zhes par ma chud pa ma yin no/_/khro sems med par sems can nam rdo [#]shing ci yang rung thal mo dang khu tshur gyis bsnun na nyes byas/_bud med dang skyes pa sngon phrad pa zhig las skyes pas [#]bud med la mi tshangs par spyod du dong zhes byas pa dang /[ #]bud med na re brel gyi [#]dge slong
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]zhig [#]mngags te des khyed kyi rgyab tu khu tshur cig bsnun na shog shig ces byas te bud med kyis dge slong la skyes pa de'i rgyab tu khu tshur cig snun cig ces bsgos nas [#]dge slong gis skyes pa la khu tshur cig bsnun pa dang /_skyes pa na re nged [#]mi tshangs par spyod
[\[83a.2\]]pa'i tha na khyod kyis byas kyi [#]dge'o zhes byas/_'dus pa'i 'og tu dge slong the tshom zos nas phyin [#]chad khro sems med par sems can dang rdo shing la khu tshur gyis brdegs [#]na nyes byas zhes bcas/_smyan gyis ta [#]rnam par gdon mi za ba'i'o/_/smyan gyi dge [#]'dun gyi lhag ma ste
[\[83a.3\]]'dul ba bye brag tu gdon mi za ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_/smyan gyi'o/_/smyan gyi dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ste 'dul ba sde so so'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//khang pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma la [#]'chad/_nyes med pa ni spyod lam bzhi'i snod med pa'o/_/
[\[83a.4\]]khang bu chur gom pa gsum mam lus 'phres na [#]shong ba dang zheng du skyil mo krung bcas na bde blag tu shong ba dang 'phang [#]du 'greng na spyi bo reg tsam byas te brtsigs pa ni nyes med do/_/bsgos pa dang ma bsgos pa'ang tha mi dad do/_/gang zag cig gi phyir khang pa brtsigs la bdag gis rgyu phyung ste sa
[\[83a.5\]]mi gtsang yang glas rtsigs [#]shig ces/_dge slong cig la bcol na lhag ma [#]bcol ba'i dge slong gis kyang mi gtsang bzhin du brtsegs na lhag ma [#]rgyu phog ste lhag mar mi 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du rtsigs shig byas pa las de bzhin du ma byas la [#]rjes su yi rang ste rgyu phyi mas kyang bsnan te byed du
[\[83a.6\]]bcug na lhag ma/_tshul bzhin du rtsig tu bcug pa las nyes par brtsigs te nyes so zhes byas nas rgyu phyi ma yang ma yin par btang na nyes med/_bcol ba yang bdag po bzhin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar rgyu phog ste gzhan rtsig tu bcug pa bdag gis rgyu phyung yang lag dar te ma brtsigs pas
[\[83a.7\]]lhag mar mi 'gyur ro snyam bsams kyang lhag mar 'gyur ro[#]/_/bcol ba'i dge slong des kyang bdag gis brtsigs kyang rgyu gzhan gyi yin pas lhag mar mi 'gyur ro snyam bsams kyang mi phan te lhag mar 'gyur ro[#]/_/smras pa bzhin du ma byas pa la lus dang ngag gis mos pa yang ngo /_/
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]mdo ltag ma'i yang ltag ma'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du khang pa tshul bzhin du rtsigs [#]shig ces bsgo ste rgyu byin pa las bsgo ba bzhin du ma byas te nyes par brtsigs pa la ngag gis de ltar brtsigs kyang rung ngo /_/[#]rjes su yi rang bar smras pa dang lus kyis rjes su yi rang ste las byed pa'i grogs byas pa
[\[83b.2\]]rtsam [#]gyis lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/byas pa la gcig go_/khang pa lhag mar 'gyur ba zhig brtsigs te skabs skabs su bzhag cing brtsigs pa'am rmad bres pa'am thog bor ba lta bu re re la sbom po [#]re rer mi 'gyur gyi sbom po gcig dang zin na lhag mar 'gyur [#]du zad do/_/yan lag ni tha dad du
[\[83b.3\]]mi byed do/_/sa ni [#]gtsang ba dang tshad las 'das pa dang dge 'dun la ma gsol ba la sogs pa yan lag re re la sbom po re rer mi 'gyur gyi yan lag gcig dang ldan pa gzhan dang ma ldan na sbom po/_bslangs pa des bsgo na'o/_/bdag gi phyir khang pa brtsigs pa'i rgyu bdag nyid kyis bslangs
[\[83b.4\]]kyang [#]rung gzhan btang ste slong du bcug kyang rung yan lag gcig_/de'i rnam pas so[#]/_/gser dngul dang shing dang pha gu [#]la sogs pa [#]yan lag gcig_/khang pa'i gzhi bslangs pa la yan lag gcig ste/_yan lag 'di gnyis la gcig tu'ang brtsi/_dngos po mi gtsang na'o/_/khang pa [#]brtsigs
[\[83b.5\]]pa'i sa mi gtsang ba dang /_ma gsol na'o/_/khang pa brtsigs pa dang [#]dge 'dun la ma gsol ba dang /[ #]gnas khang yin pa dang /_byed du bcug na'o/_/bdag gis byed dam gzhan byed du bcug pa dang /_mtha' so khang pa zin par yang byas pa dang /_bslangs pa ma gtogs te de ma [#]thag pa'ang 'di
[\[83b.6\]]bzhin no/_/dge 'dun gyi phyir khang chen brtsigs pa yan lag ltag tu smos pa [#]rnams las mdo bslangs pa dang de'i rnam pa gnyis [#]zhes zer ba gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan kun khang chen gyi yan lag tu gtogs so/_/gcig gi phyir ro/_/bdag gcig pu'i phyir brtsigs kyang rung grogs
[\[83b.7\]]dge slong gcig gi phyir brtsigs kyang rung yan lag gcig_/tshad las 'das pa'o/_/tshad las kyang [#]'das par brtsigs pa dang yan lag dgu dang ldan na bdag gi phyir khang pa brtsigs pa'i lhag mar 'gyur ro[#]/_/ma brtags pa dang rtsod [#]pa dang mi yangs pa ni mi gtsang ba'o/_/ltag na [#]mdo
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]mi gtsang zhes 'byung ba ni ma [#]brtags pa dang rtsod pa dang mi [#]yangs pa gsum ni mi gtsang ba zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar ma brtags pa dang rtsod pa dang mi yangs pa ni mdo 'og ma las 'chad pa yin/_'gro ba phre'u'i tshad dang /_khang pa brtsigs pa'i sa dang [#]sbrul lam sdig sbrul la [#]
[\[84a.2\]]sogs pa'i tshang yod pa ni ma brtags pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i khrims [#]dang mi 'dra ba [#]la sogs pa'i grong dang nye bar brtsigs [#]pa dang /_lha'i grong dang /_mur 'dug gi gnas su nye ba dang /_mur 'dug nyid kyi [#]grong dang nye bar brtsigs pa dang /_shing mi gtsang ba dang /_yul mi
[\[84a.3\]]spyod pa'i grib shing bcad cing mi brtsig [#]pa dang 'di rnams ni rtsod pa zhes bya'o/_/'dom gyi mtha' tshun chad dang /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni khang pa'i rmang [#]la mi gnod na bar 'dom gang tsam gyis bcad nas brtsig_/khang pa la gnod cing dog na 'dom dus bcad kyang mi phan te mi
[\[84a.4\]]yangs pa zhes [#]bya ste/_phyi rol gyi chu [#]bo dang /_'bab chu [#]dang gtsang po la sogs pa'i 'gram du mi brtsig_/gad kha dang gad pa dang [#]grog po la sogs pa'i khar nye bar mi brtsig_/khron pas yog ste khron pa dang rdzing bu dang mtshe'u [#]la sogs pa dang nye bar mi brtsig ste 'di rnams ni mi yangs
[\[84a.5\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/'di rnams ni grangs ji bzhin pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma ma [#]brtags pa rtsod pa dang mi yangs pa zhes 'byung ba la mdo 'dis go rims bzhin du 'chad cing gnyer song ba la bya/_tshad ma'i khru phyed dang do la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'o/_/ltag nas mdo tshad las 'das zhes 'byung ba la
[\[84a.6\]]'chad de/_tshad ni mi 'bring po'i lus la khru phyed dang bzhi yod pa'i khru phyed dang do la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad du [#]brtsi'o/_/de'i mtho bcu gnyis dang bdun te nang rgya'i tshad do/_/khang pa'i chur ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu gnyis/_zheng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bdun gyi
[\[84a.7\]]tshad du rmang gi [#]nang logs nas bcal[#]/_gsol ba ni dge 'dun la gsol te thos na'o/_/ltag na mdo ma gsol na zhes 'byung ba la 'chad de/_gsol ba ni mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun thams cad la las byed pa'i dge slong gcig gis gsol te gnang na brtsigs[#]/_gnang ba ma byin na
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dge 'dun la nyes [#]byas/_mi gtsang na mi gsol/_khang pa brtsig pa'i sa ma brtags pa dang mi yangs pa na khang pa su brtsig [#]pa'i dge slong des mi gsol/_gsol na gsol ba'i tshe nyes byas/_bdag cag gam dge slong dag la bskos te thong la yid ches par gyis shig_/dge slong
[\[84b.2\]]khang pa brtsigs [#]par dge 'dun la [#]gsol na khang pa'i sa dge 'dun gyis [#]blta'o/_/dge 'dun la zad pa [#]ltar nus na yang dge slong [#]khrims la mkhas shing cong [#]rol mi byed pa yid ches shing brtan pa las khang pa'i sa ltar dgye'o/_/gding ba yang de bzhin no/_/gding ba lo drug lon pa sar
[\[84b.3\]]pas brje na/_snying po [#]spyad du bzod dam mi bzod dge 'dun gyis blta ba yang khang sa dge 'dun gyis blta ba dang 'dra'o/_/ltung ba med pa ni byas pa'i rnyed pa dang spyod pa'o/_/khang pa la nyes par mi 'gyur ba ni brtsigs zin pa cig gzhan gyis sbyin pa dang gzhan gyis [#]brtsigs pa'i nang nas [#]
[\[84b.4\]]gnas shing spyod pa ni nyes med do/_/gding ba yang lo drug ma lon zhing spyad du bzod pa las gzhan gyis sar pa zhig byin te bcangs shing spyad kyang nyes med do/_/rnying pa la bcos na yang ngo /_/khang pa rnying pa grum pa dang gas pa dang ral pa bcos pa'ang [#]nyes med/_gding ba'ang de dang 'dra/_khang
[\[84b.5\]]pa'i ste dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/_/khang pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//dge 'dun gyi phyir ro/_/khang chen ni dge 'dun gyi phyir byas pa [#]yan lag gcig tu brtsis te ltag tu bdag gi phyir khang pa brtsigs [#]pa'i yan lag rnams
[\[84b.6\]]kyi steng du 'dis bsnan te sngar ldan na lhag mar 'gyur/_gtsug lag khang gi [#]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/_/khang chen gyi [#]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]brtsams pas na sbyor ba'i'o/_/bdag gis [#]khang pa brtsigs pa lhag mar 'gyur ba
[\[84b.7\]]zhig las zin par ma byas te rked chad du bor na sbom po/_zin na sbom por 'gyur ba las rked chad du bor na nyes byas/_thog ma phub par zin pa yang de bzhin no/_/khang pa brtsigs nas thog ma phub par [#]bor na sbom po thog mi dbub par bsams te thog ma phub par bzhag na sbom po/_du ma'i
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]phyir ba'o/_/phyogs bcu'i [#]dge 'dun gyi phyir yang ma yin mi gcig gi phyir yang ma yin par gnyis yan chad du yang rung ming [#]gis bsngos te/_'di rnams kyi phyir bya'o zhes brtsigs na sbom po/_ma btang ba'o/_/khang pa'i gzhi gzhan gyis ma byin nam ma nyos par
[\[85a.2\]]thug [#]thub tu brtsigs te rku sems dang mi ldan par brtsigs na sbom po/_rku sems dang ldan pa ni pham pa'i skabs su 'chad/_gang zag gis so/_/khang pa'i sa dang rin [#]bdag nyid kyi yin pa las brtsigs na'ang sbom po/_brtsams pa yang ngo /_/gzhan zhig gis khang pa brtsigs te
[\[85a.3\]]lhag mar 'gyur ba zhig 'phro bor te lus pa las dge slong cig gis 'phro brtsigs na sbom po/_nyes byas pa ni gsol ba'i 'og tu zin par ma [#]byas pa'o/_/khang pa [#]brtsigs par dge 'dun la gsol to/_/[#]gnas pa las phyis ma brtsigs par bor na nyes byas/_khang pa'i [#]gtsug
[\[85a.4\]]lag khang dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag mar gtogs pa ste dris pa'i'o/_/_khang pa dang gtsug lag khang gi dge 'dun gyi lhag [#]ma ste 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]rtsa ba med pa'i lhag ma la 'chad de/_dge slong phas pham pa'i kun spyod pa/_dge slong phas pham pa med pa la phas
[\[85a.5\]]pham pa gang kyang rung byas so zhes skur pa dang /_dge slong pham pa yod pa zhig la pham pas skur na'ang lhag mar 'gyur/_ltung ba yang 'dir bdag gi phyogs su yan lag tu ma yin te/_dge slong phas dge slong ma la phas pham par skur ba dang /_dge slong mas dge slong pha la phas pham
[\[85a.6\]]pas skur pa yang /_sde mi mthun pa'i phyir lhag mar mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin te lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/la la brdzun gyis bsgo [#]na'o/_/dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang chos log pa la bltas [#]pa la dge slong tshul khrims la dam zhing log pa la ma bltas pas skur kyang lhag mar
[\[85a.7\]]'gyur/_de bzhin du log pa la bltas [#]pas log pa la ma bltas pa la skur na yang lhag mar 'gyur/_'pho bar 'dod pas so/_/dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang dbral [#]bar bya ba'i phyir byas pa dang /_dge slong phas pham pa med de gtsang ba dang brdzun du
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]skur [#]ba dang /_bdag gis smras te gzhan gyis thos te go ba dang /_yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na rtsa ba med pa la skur [#]na lhag ma/_de rtsa ba [#]gzhan du ma yin no/_/dge slong phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba cig yod pa las pham pa gzhan du ming gis bsnor te skur na yang lhag
[\[85b.2\]]ma/_phas pham pa med pa la brkus pa'i phas pham par skur bar bsam pa [#]las brdzun gyi phas pham pa byas so zhes smras na'ang lhag mar 'gyur/_brjed [#]na med pa'o/_/dge slong phas pham pa yod par sngon shes shes pa las brjed de mi dran pa bzhin du phas pham pa byas so zhes skur na'ang lhag
[\[85b.3\]]ma/_rkyen [#]ma yin pa ni mi brdzun par yang dag pa'i don to/_/phas pham pa [#]yod par mi shes bzhin du skur pa dang phas pham pa yod pa la brjed de skur ba dang phas pham pa yod la ming bsnor te skur pa rnams ni phas pham pa yod de bden kyang bdag gi [#]sems la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang bral zhing
[\[85b.4\]]skur ba gdab par bsam [#]pa'i phyir lhag mar mi 'gyur ba'i rkyen ma yin te lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba med pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/_/rtsa ba med pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]rnam par ma yin pa'i chas skur pa'i lhag ma la
[\[85b.5\]]'chad de/_tshig las gzhan pa la [#]gnas te ngag gis brdzun na'o/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma gnyis shig kyang 'dug pha rol na sha ba rgyo zhing 'khod pa las sha ba rgyo ba'i cha blangs te/_dge slong pho mo gnyis shig 'khod pa la rgyo bo zhes skur ba las bcas te/_dge slong gtsang ma la
[\[85b.6\]]gzhan rkub dang rgyo ba'i cha blangs te skur na lhag ma/_lhag ma [#]rtsa ba med pa rtsis mgo snga ma bzhi'i steng du rnam par ma yin pa'i chas [#]skur pa 'dis bsnan te lngar ldan [#]na lhag ma/_gzhan gyi [#]chas skur ba'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo[#]//_//sbom po ni
[\[85b.7\]]gzhug [#]gnas med pa la skur ba'o/_/dge slong pho mtshan chad pa mi tshangs par spyod du mi rung ba zhig la mi tshangs par spyod do zhes skur na rtsa ba med pa dang rnam par ma yin pa'i cha [#]gang yang rung ste sbom po[#]/_ming ma phyung ba yang ngo /_/dge 'dun nam dge slong mang zhig 'khod pa'i nang
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]du ming nas ma phyung zhing dmigs kyis ma bsngos par 'di'i nang na ni pham pa yod ces smras te 'phrig tu bcug pa ni sbom po/_yang dag par gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen kyang [#]/_yang dag par gshegs pa la ngan sems
[\[86a.2\]]kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas te gsol ba dang zhu ba lan gsum du ma bsgo ba ni sdig gi 'bras bu mtshams med par 'gyur/_ltung ba'i rim pa ni sbom por 'gyur te ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ngo zhes skur ba dang dge 'dun gyi [#]dbyen byas so zhes skur ba ni [#]rtsa ba
[\[86a.3\]]med pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i sbom po[#]/_'phrig du bcug pa ni smra sems tha dad par smras pa la sogs pa ni nyes byas pa'o/_/dge slong mang [#]zhig gi khrod du ldem po [#]ngag tu phas pham pa yang byed pa yod [#]pa lta zhig ces bya ba dang 'dra ba'i tshig zur du smras te/_dge slong du
[\[86a.4\]]'phrig tu bcug pa bzhin du nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba med pa dang bag ste dris pa'i 'o/_/rtsa ba med pa dang bdag gi dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ste 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo'o//_//[#]dbyen gyi lhag ma la 'chad de/_sbom po ni pha rol gyi 'khor las drangs
[\[86a.5\]]pa'o/_/gzhan gyi [#]slob ma dge slong cig gis [#]kha drangs te bdag gi [#]slob mar byas na dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma'i dbyen gyi sbom po/_bzlog pa lta bus mi gtong bar nan tan byed pa lta bu dang mthun no/_/de ba dat+ta [#]lta bur 'khor lo'i dbyen byas te dbyen ma byed ces dge 'dun gyis gsol ba
[\[86a.6\]]dang /_zhu ba'i las kyis [#]lan gsum du bsgos te ma nyan nas dbyen byed pa lta bu las ldog tu ma btub na dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag mar 'gyur/_rjes su phyogs pa dang rigs sun pa dang bka' blo [#]mi bde ba gsum yan lag gsum du bsgos te ma btang na lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/bzlog pa
[\[86a.7\]]bzhin du zhu ba'o/_/'og nas gsol ba'i las gsum gyis bsgo ba lan re la sbom po re rer 'gyur ba bzhin du/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba dbyen la zhugs kyis dge 'dun gyis bsgo ba'i [#]las bya'o zhes zhu ba'i tshe'ang [#]sbom po gcig_/ngag thang cig gis so/_/gsol ba'i las kyi [#]bsgo ba
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]lan gsum dang zhu ba dang bzhi byed pa'i tshe tshig re re la nyes pa re rer [#]mi 'gyur gyi bsgo ba lan re re dang [#]dang zhu ba [#]so so'i tshig mjug rdzogs shing nyes pa so sor sbom por 'gyur/_bslab [#]pa ni so sor ro/_/dbyen dang rjes su phyogs pa dang rigs sun pa dang ngag dka' ba gang yang rung dge
[\[86b.2\]]'dun gyis byed du mi gzhug par zhu ba'i las byed pa'i tshe sbom po gcig zhus nas lan gsum du bsgo [#]ba'i tshe sbom po re re/_bsgo ba dang yang ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gsol ba dang /_zhu ba bzhis bsgo zin nas [#]ma nyan te sgo [#]ba byed pa'i phrin pas bdag gis bsgo ba'i las bgyis
[\[86b.3\]]lags te ma nyan nas dbyen [#]la zhugs so zhes slar dge 'dun la zer ba'i tshe na lhag mar gyur zin nas nyes pa gzhan med do/_/'jug par [#]ni sbyor ba bzhin no/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bsgo ba lan re'i tshe gtong du mi btub cing lhag ma byed [#]par 'jug pa ni sbom po re rer 'gyur ro/_/
[\[86b.4\]]bskrad pa'i dran pa dang brtsad pa ma byas par na de'i 'o/_/rigs sun [#]pa'i chos spyod [#]pa las dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las ma byas par rang dbang dang ldan/_zhe sdang dang ldan/_gti mug dang ldan/_'jigs [#]pa dang ldan no zhes bsu [#]ste smra ba de'i tshe nyes byas/_ngag dka' ba la
[\[86b.5\]]yang gsol ba dang /_zhu bas bsgo ba ma byas par khyod [#]kyang nga la cang ma zer cig nga yang khyed la cang mi zer ro zhes zer ba'i tshe nyes byas/_'di la mi bsgo bar bya/_mdo ltag ma ltar ma bskrad cing ma bsgo bar tshig sngar 'dor te smras pa la dge 'dun gyis lan gsum bsgo mi dgos
[\[86b.6\]#]kyis bskrad do zhes byi shu ta ras shi tas bshad/[# ]rigs sun pa ni sngar ma bskrad par lan gsum du bsgo bar [#]mi bya/_ngag dka' ba ni lan gsum ma bsgo bar bskrad par mi bya'o/_/zhes byi tsa [#]ya bar mas bshad/_'di dag la mdza' ba dang las kyis mi bsgo bar [#]mi bya/_dbyen dang
[\[86b.7\]]rjes su phyogs pa dang rigs sun pa dang ngag dka' ba bzhi la [#]zhugs pa zhig yod na thog mar su dang mdza' ba des de ltar ma byed cig ces gros [#]gdab cing bcos/_gros nyan du ma btub na bskrad par 'gyur te mkhan po dang slob dpon dang yang bral/_dge 'dun gyi nang du yang mi chud do zhes
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bsdigs/_de ltar byas dang nyan du ma btub na dge 'dun gyis 'phrin pa'i dge slong thabs mkhas pa zhig bskos [#]te bsgo/_/'di ltar ma byas na mdza' bo dang dge 'dun la nyes byas/_de'i mthar ma btang na'o/_/dbyen gyi [#]lhag ma ni yang yan lag ming
[\[87a.2\]]gis smos [#]pa 'di rnams dang ldan na lhag mar [#]'gyur ro/_/dbyen la zhugs te dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las bzhis bsgos te ma btang [#]bar 'dzin cing 'dug pa dang /_zhugs pa las so/_/[#]dge 'dun chos so so la blta [#]bar bya ba'i phyir [#]dbye bar yang zhugs pa dang /_
[\[87a.3\]]dbyen/_dbyen yang byas te phye ba dang dge 'dun gyi'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun yang yin la phye ba gnyis ka so sor dge 'dun du yang tshang ba dang yan lag 'di bzhi'i steng du ltag nas bzlog pa lta bus mi gtong bar nan tan byed pas bsnan te lngar [#]ldan na lhag mar 'gyur/_dge
[\[87a.4\]]'dun gyi dbyen te dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma'o/_/dbyen gyi dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//rjes su phyogs pa'i lhag ma la 'chad de/_grogs su nan tan byed pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen du zhugs [#]pa'i dge [#]slong de rjes su phyogs
[\[87a.5\]]te dbyen la zhugs pa'i dge slong de la ci'ang ma zer cig_/dge yang rung sdig kyang rung ste 'dul ba 'dzin pa'o/_/chos dang ldan pa ste [#]de bzhin du byed do zhes zer na lhag mar 'gyur te dbyen gyi rtsis mgo [#]lnga'i steng du 'dis bsnan te [#]drug tu ldan na lhag ma gsol ba dang zhu ba la sogs
[\[87a.6\]]pa bshad pa gzhan ni ltag tu dbyen bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/rjes su phyogs pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma'o/_/rjes su phyogs pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//rigs sun pa'i lhag ma la 'chad de/_bdag bskrad pa'i phyir byed pa'i
[\[87a.7\]]dge 'dun la log pa'i bsam [#]pas 'di lta bur byas so zhes brdzun du smras na'o/_/dge slong rigs sun pa'i chos spyod pa la dge 'dun gyis rigs sun pa'i chos spyad pa nyes kyis deng shig ces smras na bskrad pa las slar dge 'dun la rang dbang can gyi tshe dang ldan pa khyed[#]/_zhe sdang dang ldan/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gti mug dang ldan/_'jigs [#]pa dang ldan no zhes smra zhing skur nas gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhis bsgos te rigs sun cing sdig pa'i chos spyod pa gtong du ma btub na dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag mar 'gyur te/_dbyen gyi yan lag dang 'dra bar lnga dang ldan pa'i steng du 'dis bsnan te/_ldan par byas
[\[87b.2\]]na lhag mar 'gyur[#]/_rigs sun pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag [#]ma'o/_/rigs sun pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste [#]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//ngag dka' ba'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma la 'chad de/_dge slong rnams kyis dge slong gi tshul khrims la
[\[87b.3\]]bskul ba la tshig tu mi 'byed par der rang gis byed na'o/_/dge slong tshul khrims 'dral zhing chu'i [#]nang na srin [#]bu mi rtog par gsod pa la sogs pa khrims 'dral zhing ltung bar gyur pa de mthol [#]tshangs byos sdig pa dang ltung bar 'gyur ba de ma byed cig [#]ces bsgo ba la slar 'khyal
[\[87b.4\]]zhing kho bo la tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci yang ma zer cig_/dge 'ang rung sdig kyang rung bdag kyang [#]cang mi zer ro zhes zer zhing slar lan log pas ldon nam cang mi smra bar 'dug cing ngag dka' bar byed pa la dge 'dun gyis [#]tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong la ngag dka' [#]bar ma byed [#]
[\[87b.5\]]par tshul khrims dang ldan pas bsgo ba bzhin du nyon la mthol [#]tshangs byos zhes gsol [#]ba gsum dang zhu ba dang bzhis [#]bsgo ste ma nyan na lhag mar 'gyur te dbyen gyi rtsis mgo dang 'dra ba lnga'i steng du 'dis bsnan te[#]/_ldan par byas na lhag mar 'gyur [#]te/_ngag dka' ba'i dge 'dun gyi [#]
[\[87b.6\]]lhag ma'o/_/ngag dka' ba'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo dge 'dun gyi lhag ma rdzogs so//_//bcu gsum dge 'dun gyi lhag ma la 'chad pa [#]'dul ba so so'i nang [#]nas 'byung ba'i mdo sde lhag ma la 'chad pa rdzogs so//_//'di
[\[87b.7\]]man chad sum cu spang ba'i ltung ba la [#]'chad de/_spang pa'i 'chang ba la 'chad de/_snga ma med pa'i nyin zhag gi mtha' ma gtogs te med pa'o/_/gos shig rnyed na rnyed pa'i nang bar gyi skya rengs phan chad sngar 'das pa'i zhag rnams ni grangs su mi brtsi'o/_/nam rnyed pa nas mgo btsugs te de
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bzhin du dge slong dang nyal ba dang /_bud med dang nyal ba dang /_zhag bdun pa'i sman dang dbye ba'i chos gos zhag drug pa dang /_gos kha sogs [#]zla ba gcig pa dang g.yul na zhag gnyis gnas pa la sogs pa las/_ltung bar 'gyur ro cog thams cad zhag gi
[\[88a.2\]]mtshams brtsi ba'ang 'di dang 'dra ste skya rengs kyis gcod de[#]/_sbyor ba'i snod gnas/_sbyor ba ni ltung bang sbyor ba/_snod ni zhag bsags nas ltung bar 'gyur ba la bya/_gnas ni bud med dang dge slong khyim gcig na [#]'khod cing gnas pa la bya ste 'chad pa'i spang ba ni zhag bcur sngags ma btab
[\[88a.3\]]na nyes byas/_bcu gcig gi [#]skya rengs byung na ltung ba'o/_/bud med dang nyal ba ni thog ma nyal ba nas nyes byas la zhag lon na ltung ba/_zhag las 'gyur ba gzhan yang de bzhin du 'dra bar go bar bya/_skya rengs dang po'i [#]thog ma 'di'o/_/skya rengs kyis [#]tshad gzung ba skya rengs rnam [#]
[\[88a.4\]]gsum yod de sngo rengs ni dang por 'byung ste/_lho phyogs kyi gling du nyi ma shar nas shing 'dzam bu'i glor bab pa dang 'dzam bu'i gseb [#]nas 'od byung ba 'dzam bu'i lo ma'i 'od kyis sngon por 'byung ste de byung ba'i tshad du brtsi'o[#]/_/dmar rengs ni shing 'dzam bu las nyi ma 'phags pa dang
[\[88a.5\]]'od dmar por byung ba la bya/_ser rengs ni nyi ma nam mkha' la mngon par byung nas 'od ser por byung ba la bya ste/_skya rengs phyi ma gnyis kyis ni mi brtsi'o/_/nyi ma shar nas las su mi rung ngo /_/gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung ba dang tshul du 'jug pa ni zhag dus las kyang skya rengs kyis [#]ni
[\[88a.6\]]tshad mi gzung gi nyi ma shar tshun chad las byar rung ngo /_/spang ba ni bdag gir 'du shes pa gtso ba'o[#]/_/spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba ni rdzas bdag gi lag tu 'ongs shing thob la bdag gi yin par bsams [#]shing shes pa [#]las spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te gos kyi spu [#]ni/_dge slong la
[\[88a.7\]]brtags pa bal dang dar dang zar ma dang du gu la dang ko tam pa dang /_a ba ran ta ka dang ras dang bdun las sngags ma thebs na spang bar 'gyur/_ma brtags pa ni rnga mo re'u ri dwags kyi bal dang mtho ris kyi gos rnams ni sngags mi 'chags[#]/_'di bsngos na med pa'o/_/gos shig gud
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]nas 'ongs te rnyed pa'i mi gzhan zhig sbyin pa dang gzhan du btang bar bsams nas [#]bsngos te bzhag pa ni sngags ma btab kyang nyes med do/_/rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i phyir [#]bsngos na yang de'o/_/gos shig rnyed na gsar du rab tu 'byung ba [#]zhig yod/_de'i gos dang yo byad du bya'o zhes
[\[88b.2\]]bsngos te bzhag pa yang sngags ma btab kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/gos brtags pa yang ngo /_/gos shig rnyed na bdag gi yo byad bcu gsum du bsngo ba'i sngags kyis btab pa dang gos lhag pa'i sngags kyis btab [#]pa dang bdag la mi dgos te slar byin pa dang blangs nas [#]gzhan
[\[88b.3\]]sbyin par bsngos pa dang 'di bzhi gang ltar byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir [#]rgyud ni zhigs [#]pa'o/_/gos shig rnyed de zhag dgu tsam na sngags kyis btab na zhag brgyad kyi bar du sngags [#]kyis ma btab pa zhag de rnams zhigs nyes par mi 'gyur ba'ang bya/_lhag pa'i sngags kyis
[\[88b.4\]]btab na mkhan po [#]yin par bsams [#]pas bdag gis [#]sems pa med de zhigs pa la yang bya/_spang bar gyur te gzhan byin pa'i tshe bdag gi bar sems pa med pas ltung ba byang bar 'gyur ba la'ang [#]bya'o/_/rang bzhin las nyams pa yang ngo /_/gos shig gsar du 'ongs te rnyed na zhag
[\[88b.5\]]brgyad dgu'i bar du sngags kyis ma thebs pa las/_dge slong smyos na zhag du lon kyang rung spang ba'i ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nam dran pa nas zhag bcu tshun chad du sngags gdab/_'di yod pa las gzhan yang 'di lta bu'i dngos po skyes so/_/gos shig rnyed na [#]sngags kyis ma btab
[\[88b.6\]]ste spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur na gos spang bar gyur pa de rnyed tshun chad dgos gzhan rnyed do cog spang bar [#]'gyur ro/_/lhan cig tu skyes pa zhag bdun pa yang ngo /_/zhag bdun pa'i sman du gtogs pa [#]rnams kyang gang yang rung snga ma rnyed pa spangs par [#]gyur na de tshun chad rnyed pa kun kyang spang
[\[88b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs tha dad pa ni ma gtogs so/_/spang ba de'i ltung ba yod bzhin du [#]yo byad tsam yang bdag [#]gir byas pa'o/_/gos rnyed pa sna gcig spang ba'i ltung bar gyur na de rnyed tshun chad gos gzhan ci rnyed pa kun spang dgos pa ni sngags mi 'chags pa lhan pa'am skud pa tsam yan
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]chad kyang spang dgos so/_/de las chung ba'i dum bu ni ma yin no/_/gos shig rnyed na sngags gdab [#]dgos pa ni khru gang 'khor [#]ba yan chad cig [#]las sngags kyis ma btab na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_khru gang man chad la ni sngags kyis gdab mi dgos/_dge 'dun
[\[89a.2\]]gyi yang [#]ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi dkor yang rung ngo /_/mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun gyi dkor yang rung bdag gi chos gos gsum gyi gor brnyas [#]te sngags kyis btab pa las bral na'ang ltung bar 'gyur te phyogs bcu'i ni spang du mi dbang /_mtshams gcig gi spang dgos
[\[89a.3\]]mi bdog [#]pa de ni 'dir gtso bo'o/_/gos shig rnyed de spang ba'i ltung bar gyur pa las gos de rkun pos khyer ram chus khyer ram med par gyur na spang ni mi dgos ltung ba ni mthol [#]dgos so/_/brubs [#]pa bting ba na 'di gsum ni ma yin no/_/tshul nas byung ste brubs [#]pa bting na 'chang ba dang bral [#]ba dang
[\[89a.4\]]'jog pa gsum gyi ltung ba med de gnang ngo /_/'di yan chad ni 'chang ba dang 'bral ba [#]'jog pa gsum gyi rtsis mgo [#]'dra ste 'di yan chad spyir 'chad do/_/bdag gi yod bzhin du zhag bcu 'das na'o/_/bdag gis gos shig rnyed de lhag par [#]'chang na sngags kyis [#]ma btab par zhag
[\[89a.5\]]bcu tshun chad dbang ngo /_bcu las 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi thog ma'o/_/zhag bcu 'das na [#]spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba ni zhag bcu gcig gi skya rengs dang po 'das nas spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/gos la'o/_/'chang ba'i spang ba ni lhag ma'i [#]gos
[\[89a.6\]]kyang yin pa dang /_tshad kyi mtha' ni 'khor [#]gsum yog pa'o/_/gos de khru gang 'khor ba [#]yod kyang rung 'khor gsum yog pa yang rung /_de yan chad dang 'khor gsum yog pa'i [#]lte ba man chad pus [#]mo yan chad mdun dang rgyab yog pa la bya ste 'di ni chos gos smad gsum du
[\[89a.7\]]bsngor rung ba'i tshad/_bsngo bas ma btab na'o/_/gos lhag ma de sngags kyis kyang ma thebs pa dang yan lag 'di lnga dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur[#]/_btab kyang 'das pa dang bcas na'o/_/rnyed pa'i gos shig sngags kyis ma thebs te spang ba'i ltung ba yod bzhin du ltung bar
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gyur pa de tshun chad gos rnyed do cog [#]sngags kyis btab kyang sngags ma chags pa yin te spang [#]dgos so/_/gzhan yod na ma bsngos par bdag gir byas na 'dir ro/_/ltung ba yod bzhin du gos phyis ma rnyed pa zhag [#]ma 'das kyang sngags mi 'chags shing spang bar 'gyur ba ni snga ma'i [#]khrin
[\[89b.2\]]gyi chad pas spang dgos so/_/'chang ba'i spang ba'o/_/'chang ba spang ba'i ltung ba ste/_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang [#]nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]'bral ba'i spang ba la 'chad de/_nyes med pa [#]gding ba dang bral ba na'o/_/chos gos gsum bdag gir bsngos pa [#]las bral
[\[89b.3\]]na ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas gding ba yang bdag gir bsngos pa yin te bral na ltung bar 'gyur bar [#]the tshom za ba'i phyir bshad pa de gding ba dang bral ba ni ltung bar yang mi 'gyur nyes pa yang med do/_/gding ba bzhag ste mi 'gro'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gding ba dang bral
[\[89b.4\]]na nyes med [#]ces te zhag tu thogs [#]pa'i gnas shig tu [#]'gro na gding ba bzhag ste mi 'gro'o/_/bzhag na nyes byas/_de ste de ring phyir 'khor snyam pa [#]med na yang ngo /_/gzhig tu 'gros te zhag tu mi thogs [#]par slar 'khor ba'i gdeng [#]yod pa ni gding ba bzhag ste song yang nyes med do/_/slar
[\[89b.5\]]'khor ba'i gdeng [#]med pa las gding ba bzhag na nyes byas su [#]'gyur ro/_/de ltar song ba las dus ma yin pa grub na der de brnyas [#]te gnos shig_/mdo ltag ma ltar slar 'khor ba'i gdeng [#]yod de gding ba bzhag ste song [#]ba las chu blug [#]gam dgras chod de rkyen [#]cig byung nas slar ma
[\[89b.6\]]'khor na/_dge 'dun dang grogs po dang khyim pa'i mal stan gag la nyal yang rung gding ba med du mi rung ste gzhan cig las brnyos [#]la nyol cig_/dge 'dun dang khyim pa'i mal stan la gding ba med par nyal na nyes byas lci ba/_grogs po'i mal sten [#]la gding ba med par nyal
[\[89b.7\]]na nyes byas yang ba'o/_/ma grub na steng nas dgab pa bzhin [#]blta ba la ring du ma logs shig_/mdo ltag ma ltar slar 'khor ba'i gdeng [#]yod de song song ba las rkyen cig byung ste slar ma 'khor ba las gding ba brnyar [#]yang ma rnyed na chos gos snam [#]bdun la zheng du bzhir bltabs
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]#]te bting la srod dang tho rangs nam gyi sum gnyis kyi [#]bar du bcag pa'am tsog pur [#]'dug la mi nyal bar kha don [#]bya/_nam gyi gung gsum cha la'ang mal stan la mthang [#]gis ma reg pa dang chos gos la mi gzan pa'i tshul du bskum ste nyal/_sbyar ma gzhag
[\[90a.2\]]pa'i mi reg [#]pa'i gnas su dbyar gyi ras chen mi gzhag chos gos sbyar ma gang du bskur [#]dgos par dbyar gyi [#]ras chen yang mi gzhag par bskur/_chos gos [#]gsum gang du gzhag par rigs pa'i sar ras chen bzhag kyang nyes med de gang du bzhag pa dang gang du bskur [#]ba'i
[\[90a.3\]]rigs pa 'og nas 'chad pa yin te mi stor ba'i tshul du gzhag pa la bya/_char pa la yang ma yin/_char pa 'bab bam char pa [#]'bab tu dogs te/_ga [#]zhig tu 'gro na ras chen mi gzhag par bskur[#]/_ma khyer na nyes byas/_chu rgal te 'gro na yang ma yin/_ga zhig tu 'gro ste chu zhig
[\[90a.4\]]rgal na yang chos gos chus mi gsher bar bya ba'i phyir dang slar 'ong na chu brug [#]ste mi thar ba'i bar du char pas non du 'ong ba'i phyir ras chen bskur [#]dgos so/_/'di dag la dogs na ma [#]yin/_ga zhig tu 'gro ste char pa 'bab tu dogs [#]sam chu brug [#]gam chu rgal dgos par dogs
[\[90a.5\]]na'ang ras chen mi gzhag par bskur[#]/_dge slong dang bcas/_dge slong yang yod la/_sgo dang bcas/_khang pa'i [#]sgo dang sgo lcags kyang yod pa/_gnas dang bcas pa/_khang pa [#]yin pa dang 'di gsum du ldan par ni chos gos gtams [#]te bzhag kyang nyes med/_gsum la
[\[90a.6\]]gcig ma tshang bar bzhag na nyes byas yang gsum char yang med par gzhag na nyes byas lci ba/_char pa 'bab bam/_gzhig tu 'gro ste char pa 'bab bam 'bab tu dogs [#]pa'am/[ #]chu rgal te 'gro ba dang /_chu rgal te 'gro dgos sam/_de lta bu med pa dang /_dgra'am gcan
[\[90a.7\]]gzan lta bus gtse ba dang [#]med pa dang /_gnang ba med pa dang /_nad pa dang rgan po lta bu chos gos dang 'bral bar gnang ba dge 'dun gyis ma byin pa dang /_bting [#]ba ma brubs [#]te zla ba lnga'i bar du chos gos dang 'bral bar gnang ba med pa dang /_sbyar ma med par gar yang mi 'gro'o/_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ming gis [#]smos pa 'di [#]lta bu'i rkyen med par chos gos smad gsum bzhag ste gar yang mi 'gro/_'di rnams kyi rkyen yod na ni chos gos bzhag ste song na nyes med do/_/chos gos kyi gnas thob par mi 'gyur na spang ste gzhan la bsngo ba'i cho ga'o/_/ga zhig tu 'gro ste zhag mi lon par
[\[90b.2\]]slar 'khor ba'i gdeng [#]yod de chos gos bzhag ste song song ba las dgras chod dam zam pa chad dam chu brugs [#]te slar ma 'khor na bdag gi [#]chos gos su bsngos pas lus pa de lag na 'dug pa tsam du bsams te grogs po gcig gi gan du dbyung ba'i sngags byas la chos gos smad
[\[90b.3\]]gsum gzhan la brnyas te sngags gdab/_chos gos nyid ma rnyed na'ang /_dge slong gi gos su ming gis [#]btags pa las [#]khyim pa'i rdzas sam snam bu [#]dkar po'am/_ras kha tshar ma bcad pa ci [#]'dra ba yang rung ste sngags 'chags so/_/byin cig_/mi 'bral bar gnang [#]ba ni
[\[90b.4\]]sbyar ma lci ba nad pa [#]dang rgan po dag la'o/_/dge slong nad pa dang rgan po chos gos dang 'bral ba dge 'dun la gsol zhing 'ong na dge 'dun gyis sngar spyad brim ste spyod [#]la chos gos mi theg yang dag na nad pa yang rung rgan po yang rung chos gos dang 'bral ba med par gnang ba byin
[\[90b.5\]]cig_/dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma byin na nyes byas [#]su 'gyur ro/_/bsngos pa las [#]gnang ba ma thob na byed do/_/[#]'bral ba'i spang bar 'gyur ba ni yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan na 'gyur te/_bdag gi chos [#]gos su bsngo ba'i sngags kyis kyang thebs pa dang nad pa dang rgan po la chos gos
[\[90b.6\]]dang 'bral ba med par dge 'dun gyis kyang gnang ba med pa dang /_gding ba brubs [#]pa'i zla ba dang ldan pa [#]'bral bar gnang ba'i [#]yang gnang ba nang du gtogs so/_/phyir [#]dang bcas pa'i gnas las gzhan du gnas na skya rengs byung [#]na'o/_/bdag 'dug pa'i gnas kyi mtshams kyi phyi
[\[90b.7\]]rol du'ang bral ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du bral nas skya rengs yang byung ba dang yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos gos dang bral ba'i spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gnas pa'i mtshams ni 'og nas 'chad pa rnams [#]yin no/_/mtshams byas pa ni gnas kyi mtha'
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]mtshams ni dge 'dun gyis [#]gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis [#]mtshams bcad pa dang ra bas bskor ba dang 'obs dang yur bas bskor ba la sogs pa ni mtshams su gtogs te/_mtshams kyi tshad ci tsam gyis na nang dang phyi rol du 'gyur ba ni 'og nas 'chad/_
[\[91a.2\]]bdag po gcig na nang gi mtshams ni tha dad pa ma yin no/_/khang pa khyer kyang gcig bdag po yang gcig na khang pa mig gcig gi nang du bdag 'dug gam chos gos gzhag pa khang pa mig gcig gi nang du khyim pa dang chos gos sam bdag 'dug kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_nor
[\[91a.3\]]dang lta ba ma bye ba dag kyang ngo /_/bdag po gcig [#]ces bya ba ni mi spun du yod kyang nor yang ma bgos zhing rmo [#]ba dang phyugs 'tsho ba [#]la sogs pa'i las kyang mthun/_sangs rgyas kyi chos sam der [#]tig gi chos gang yang rung lta ba yang mthun pa ni khang pa byin gcig [#]gi mig gcig gi
[\[91a.4\]]nang du spun gcig dang bdag [#]nyal la/_mig gcig gi nang du chos gos dang spun gcig gab [#]kyang rung gcig dang 'dug na mi [#]'bral/_nor ram lta [#]ba gcig bye la [#]gcig ma bye na [#]'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/yal ga dang nye ba'i yal ga ma 'dres na [#]gnas tha dad do/_/shing drung gcig
[\[91a.5\]]la yal ga gcig gi 'og gi [#]thad ka'i sa la bdag nyal la [#]yal ga gcig gi 'og gi sa la chos gos gzhag ste bar 'dom gang las ring ba phan [#]ni 'bral bar 'gyur/_'dom gang tshun chad ni mi 'gyur te shing gi yal ga dang lo ma ma 'dres pa la bya'o/_/shing gi [#]lo ma dang yal ga
[\[91a.6\]]ma 'dres pa [#]la yal ga gcig gi steng du chos gos bzhag la yal ga gcig gi steng du bdag nyal te bar nam mkha' 'dom [#]gang phan chad ni 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes byi shu tas bshad/_drung na spyi'i'o/_/shing drung gcig gi yal ga dang mdor chos gos bzhag la shing gi rtsa ba la
[\[91a.7\]]bdag gi lus kyis reg par nyal na spang ba'i ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa yang ngo /_/shing drung gcig gi yal ga'i yang yal ga la chos gos bkal la shing gi drung du bdag gi lus reg par nyal na'ang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes byi tsa ya [#]bar mas bshad/_
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]shing gi rtsa ba'i yan lag so so'i steng du snang ba la rtsa ba'i steng du chos gos sam bdag nyal la shing kar gcig 'dug na 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhes byi shu tas bshad/_shing gi yal ga dang 'dab ma 'dres pa ni gnas gcig pa'o/_/shing drung mang zhing [#]lo ma kun 'dres par 'dab
[\[91b.2\]]chags su 'dug pa ni bar du rtsig [#]pa'am chus ma chod na shing gi lo ma ma 'dres shing bar chad gang na yod pa tshun chad mtshams gcig[# ]/bla gab lta bu de'i 'og tu zhugs pa na yang ngo /_/shing drung gcig la yal ga bar chad pa [#]med par gcig la [#]gcig 'dres pas khebs par 'dug
[\[91b.3\]]na yal ga'i thog ma'i mtha' kha drang du lo ma las thigs pa ltung tshun chad kho ra khor yug tu mtshams gcig tu brtsi'o/_/shing rta dang gru yang ngo /_/gru dang shing rta'i 'og gi ngos la chos gos bzhag la 'og gi sa la bdag nyal na mi 'bral/_shing rta dang gru'i [#]steng du gur ram/_
[\[91b.4\]]khang par phub pa'i nang ni mtshams gcig tu brtsi/_thog ma phub pa ni mgor [#]chos gos bzhag la 'jug tu bdag nyal na 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa ni yan lag gis yog pa'i mtha'o/_/dgon pa zhig la gnas te thang bu zhig la [#]nyal na bdag gi [#]lus 'phres pa'i
[\[91b.5\]]yan lag gi 'og tu chud pa ni mtshams gcig tu brtsi ste mtshams kyi tshad gang tshun chad 'bral [#]bar mi 'gyur ba ni 'og nas 'chad/_phyir la 'dom gang 'khor [#]ba'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dgon pa'i thang bu la nyal ba ni bdag gi lus 'phres pa'i yan lag gis yog pa'i mtshams
[\[91b.6\]]nas 'dom [#]gang kho ra khor yug tshun chad mtshams gcig tu brtsi ste 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/grong rtsig pas bskor ba nas ci tsam der 'od ma'i shing rta ba lang drug dang ldan pas yog pa'i lam mam bya gag 'bab pa'i gnas so/_/khyim pa'i grong khyer zhig na gnas na phyi ras bskor
[\[91b.7\]]pa'i mtshams nas shing rta sbrel ba'i srog shing 'od mas [#]byas pa ba lang drug gis drangs [#]pa chu'i srid kyi tshad kho ra khor yug tshun chad du chos gos sam bdag 'dug la [#]grong gi nang nor dang lta ba bye [#]yang rung ste khyim gcig gi nang na chos gos dang bdag 'dug kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyi ra'i
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ra ba'i kha nas bya gag 'phur te gang du bab pa'i tshad [#]tshun chad kyang rung ste tshad 'di gnyis gang yang rung ngo /_/sab mas bskor na ra lug gi rdul [#]tam rang bzhin gyis 'dzem pa'i mi bshang ba'i sa'i lam mo/_/sab mas bskor ba'i gnas shig na 'khod na sab ma [#]nas ra
[\[92a.2\]]lug 'dong [#]ba'i rdul gang du bab [#]pa tshun chad dam mi ngo tsha shes pa'i phyi rol che chung 'dong ba'i bshang sa tshun chad gang yang rung mtshams su [#]chud de 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'obs kyis bskor ba ni skas them pa bcu gnyis pa'am phyag dar bor ba'i bong rdo sbom po'i lam mo/_/'obs kyis
[\[92a.3\]]bskor ba'i gnas shig na 'khod na 'obs kyi nang du chos gos las la 'obs nas skas them pa bcu gnyis pa cig [#]thad kar bsnyal la gang du phyin pa tshun chad dang 'obs kyi kha nas phyag dar gyi bong rdo [#]sbom po bor te 'dril ba gar 'dril ba tshun chad du bdag nyal na'ang /_mtshams kyi nang
[\[92a.4\]]du gtogs te 'bral [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnas de'i khyim pa'i grong khyer zhig na gnas na mtshams ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung tshun chad 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_phran tshegs byed pa dang /_khyim pa'i phyag dar khung dang nas 'phyar ba'i phub ma gar phyin pa tshun chad dang
[\[92a.5\]]'chags pa dang /_khyim pa pho mos bu khur du thogs te 'chags pa'i [#]gar phyin pa tshun chad dang /_'dug pa'i rdul byung [#]bas ji tsam du yog pa'o/_/ra ba'am khang ba'i drung du mi 'dug pa'i rdul byung ba gar 'dug pa tshun [#]chad mtshams kyi nang du gtogs te 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[92a.6\]]mtshams med pa'i lam du mi dag dang mi [#]bral bar 'gro na 'dom lnga bcur gcig med pa'o/_/lam du zhugs te 'gro ba ni chos gos sngar song ngam phyi na lus te bar du chu dang grog pos ma chod de/_thang bu mnyam par 'dug na bar du 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chad ni mtshams gcig
[\[92a.7\]]tu brtsis te 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshams gzhan du ma yin/_ltag [#]tu mtshams smos so cog thams cad bar du chu dang rtsig pa la sogs pas ma [#]chod na mtshams [#]ming gis smos pa mi brtsan [#]te chu dang rtsig pa brtsan [#]par bya'o/_/dpung nas rgyang grags kyi mtha' phan chad
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ni tha dad do/_/tshal bu lta bu'ang [#]'dab chags su lo ma dang yal ga 'dzings [#]par sa khyon chen po gcig gi nang gnas te bar du chu dang rtsig pas ma chod na rgyang grags gcig kho ra khor yug tshun chad rang mtshams su gtogs te 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'bral ba'i spang ba ste
[\[92b.2\]]rnam par 'byed pa'i'o/_/'bral ba'i spang ba ltung ba 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//dum bu dum bur kyang bsngos pa med par ma song ngo /_/bdag gi chos gos gsum gang yang rung sngags can du bsngos pa las rnyings te ral zhing dum bur gyur kyang
[\[92b.3\]]sngags 'dab [#]par ma song ste/_de dang bral na'ang spang bar 'gyur/_chos gos gzhan la bsngo na [#]yang dbyung dgos so[#]/_/spang ba mi skye ba [#]ma yin no/_/bdag gi chos gos shig spangs par [#]gyur te spangs zin pa las slar 'ongs te sngags 'debs kyang rung gzhan gyis chos gos spang
[\[92b.4\]]ba'i ltung bar gyur pa zhig bdag gi chos gos su sngags 'debs kyang rung sngags 'chags so/_/dge 'dun gyi yang ngo /_/mtshams gcig pa'i dge 'dun gyi dkor las bdag gi [#]chos gos gsum gang yang rung chos gos kyi gor brnyas na sngags kyang 'chags/_de 'bral bar
[\[92b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge 'dun las [#]brnyas pa'i chos gos sngags 'chags pas na de dang 'bral na'ang spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gnas na gnas gzhan du mi nyams so/_/_dge 'dun gyi gnas su mur 'dug gam khyim pa zhig gis [#]dge 'dun la gsol te khang
[\[92b.6\]]pa brnyas nas khang bu mig gcig gi nang [#]du mur 'dug 'dug gam khyim pa 'dug cing chos gos kyang der lus te mig gcig gi nang na bdag nyal yang 'bral bar mi [#]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mur 'dug gam khyim pa'i gnas las/_dge slong gis [#]brnyas te mig gcig gi nang du
[\[92b.7\]]khyim pa dang /_chos gos 'dug la mig gcig tu bdag nyal yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dang 'di'i chos dang lta ba yang ma chud pa ma yin no/_/sbyin bdag gis [#]khang bu khyer cig [#]brtsigs te phyed mur 'dug la phul phyed dge slong ngam dge 'dun la phul ba lta bu la
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]mur 'dug dbang bar chos gos lus la dge 'dun dbang bar bdag 'dug na'ang 'bral bar 'gyur/_spyi'i phyi [#]sgo yang ma yin pa ma yin no/_/khyim pa'i grong khyer gyi dbus [#]na chos gos sam bdag 'dug la spyi'i phyi [#]sgor chos gos sam/_bdag gcig
[\[93a.2\]]'dug na 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_nor zhes pa ni pha dang /_nor dang lta ba bye [#]na mi spang gnyis shig khang pa khyer cig kyang bu 'dug pa'i khang bur chos gos lus la bdag pha'i khang bur 'dug na [#]spang bar 'gyur/_bu'i yang ma yin no/_/nor yang gcig lta ba yang ma bye na yang [#]spun nam
[\[93a.3\]]phu nur mi 'ong yang [#]'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/spang ba yang der ro/_/dge bsnyen dge 'dun la kha ngan zer ba las [#]kha zas mi bslang ba [#]chad pas bcad pa'i spad spun gzhan la bslangs kyang nyes med do/_/smye gnas kyang ngo /_/smye gnas su 'dug pa dang gab pa [#]gnyis kyang spad spun
[\[93a.4\]]nor dang lta ba bye ba [#]zhig cig car du spun du ma smye ba byed pa zhig la bltas kyang ltung ba gcig nor dang lta ba byed du spyod pa bzhin du ltung ba re re grong gi ra ba ni gtsug lag khang gir mi 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang gi ra ba'i mtshams gcad pa [#]ni khyim ma'i sa la kha brngam du gcod du mi gnang
[\[93a.5\]]ste bar che na yang mtshams sngar smos pa las mi gcad[#]/_bar dog na khyim pa dang phar phyed tshur phyed du gcad [#]par med de ra ba'i rtsig sgal [#]gcig gis chod na rtsig sgal gyis gcod [#]mtshams de las 'das par chos gos dang bral na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_'bral ba'i spang ba'i
[\[93a.6\]]ste dris [#]pa'i'o/_/'bral ba'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba dris pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_/[#]'bral ba'i spang ba'o/_/'bral ba'i spang ba 'dul ba so so'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'jog pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_ma langs pa yang langs pa bzhin te
[\[93a.7\]]langs su re ba yod na ste/_khru gang 'khor ba'o/_/dge slong la chos gos [#]gsum gang yang rung ba cig med la chos gos kyi rgyu zhig rnyed na drubs te bsngos la chong [#]shig_/chos gos su ma langs [#]la gzhan las kyang chos gos kyi rgyu'am bsnan pa zhig 'ong ba yod pa [#]na sngags
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]kyis ma thebs par zla ba gcig tshun chad du bcangs kyang nyes med/_gud nas bsnan pa 'ong ba med na nam rnyed rnyed du kha sogs su mi dbang ste sngags kyis [#]ma thebs te zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_bsngos [#]pa yod na'o/_/chos gos gsum tshad bzhin du chos gos [#]su mi
[\[93b.2\]]langs [#]pa'i gos shig rnyed na mdo ltag ma ltar kha sogs su mi dbang ste spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur gyi zhag bcu ma 'das par sngags kyis gdab/_gzhan du na de zhag [#]sum cu 'das na'o/_/chos gos gsum gang kyang rung ma tshang la gos rnyed pas ma langs te re ba yod pa'i phyir
[\[93b.3\]]kha sogs pa yang zla ba gcig 'das kyi bar du gud nas 'ong zhing rnyed du re ba yang ma thob la kha sogs bdag la yod pa yang sngags kyis ma [#]thebs na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_kha dog la sogs pa mi 'dra ba ni ma langs pa'o/_/gos snon [#]pa gud nas 'ong ba'i [#]re ba yod pa de bdag la kha ma
[\[93b.4\]]langs pa 'chang ba dang kha dog mi mthun pa dang /_rigs tha dad pa zhig ste bdag gi kha ma langs pa [#]ras yin la gud nas 'ong ba snam bu yin pa dang bdag gi [#]kha ma langs pa sngon po yin la gud nas 'ong ba ser po yin pa lta bu ni kha sogs su mi [#]dbang ste zhag bcu 'das te sngags kyis ma thebs
[\[93b.5\]]na [#]spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/dkar po ni [#]kha dog thams cad du'o/_/_bdag la gos kha [#]ma langs pa 'chang ba de dang rnyed du re ba ni rigs gcig ste bdag la yod pa yang ras yin/_gud nas 'ong ba yang ras yin pa gcig kha dog dkar po yin na gcig kha dog ci 'dra ba yang zla ba gcig
[\[93b.6\]]gi bar du sogs [#]su rung ste spang bar 'gyur ro/_/de zhag bcu la sogs par 'bral bar 'byor na'o/_/chos gos kyi rgyu [#]ma langs pa snon pa rnyed du re ba yod na kha sogs su zla ba gcig tu gzhag tu gnang ba las rnyed du re ba de zhag bcu tshun chad du 'ongs na snga ma rnyed pa nas zhag bcu
[\[93b.7\]]tshun chad du sngags thobs shig_/zhag bcu 'das te ma thebs na spang ba'o/_/de bzhin du zhag nyi shu tshun chad du rnyed du re ba 'ongs te [#]sngags kyis ma thebs par zhag nyi shu 'das na'ang spang bar 'gyur [#]zhag sum cu tshun chad du rnyed du re ba 'ongs la sngags kyis ma thebs par zhag sum
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]cu 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyar [#]ma dengs pa'i mtha' ni nyis [#]rim du'o/_/chos gos chen po sar par byed na nyis [#]rim du sbyar du gnang ngo /_/gding [#]ba yang ngo /_/gding ba sar pa byed na yang nyis rim du sbyar du gnang ngo /_/steng [#]nas dgab pa dang 'og tu gnas
[\[94a.2\]]pa ni gcig rim mo/_/chos gos snam bu bdun pa dang lnga pa gnyis ni sar pa byed ni gcig [#]rim las mi gnang ngo /_/_dus su dengs na nyis [#]rim du'o/_/chos gos chen po dang gding ba rnyings pa ni bzhi rim du sbyar du gnang ngo /_/tshal bu lnga pa dang bdun pa gnyis ni rnyings na nyis rim du sbyar
[\[94a.3\]]du gnang ngo /_/rnyings pa'i tshad ni dgun nam dpyid kyi dus gcig bsgos [#]pa tsam gyis rnyings par chud do/_/phyag dar khrod kyi chad pa med do/_/tshem bu pa phyag dar khrod nas bsdus shing glon pa ni rim pa'i grangs chad pa med de dus blon [#]du'ang dbang ngo /_/dengs pa dang srab [#]pa ni lhag mar sbyin pa [#]
[\[94a.4\]]dgos pa tsam du'o/_/chos gos zad cing dengs te bug [#]gam rdol tam ral ba ni ji tsam rdol cing ral ba'i lhan [#]pa ci dgos pa tsam ran par glan no/_/mi dgos par lhag par cher mi glan[#]/_lhag par mi sbyin/_chos gos gsum dang gding ba [#]dang bzhi gsar du byed pa dang rnyings pa [#]sbyor
[\[94a.5\]]du gnang bar lhag tu grangs bcad pa las lhag par mi glan/_lhag par glon [#]pa'i tshe nyes byas/_spang bar [#]yang byed do/_/mdo ltag ma ltar grangs bcad pa las lhag par sbyor du mi gnang ba [#]las sbyar te zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i [#]ltung bar 'gyur/_sngags kyang mi 'chags/_'os
[\[94a.6\]]pa las mi dbral/_chos gos dang gding ba gsar du byed pa dang rnyings pa [#]sbyor du gnang bar grangs bcad pa [#]bzhin du sbyar ba las phyis so sor bral na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du las byas nas sbyar [#]snyam du sems ma bskyed [#]pas so/_/chos gos dang gding ba sbyor du gnang ba grangs bcad
[\[94a.7\]]pa bzhin du sbyar ba de btso ba dang bkru [#]ba la sogs pa'i lam [#]bya ba'i phyir phral te las zin na slar sbyar [#]ro snyam du bsams te phral ba ni nyes med do/_/bab bab tu [#]phral nas sbyar ba tshun chad bcu 'das na spang ba'o/_/mdo ltag ma gnyis [#]ltar chos gos dang gding ba sbyar du gnang ba las
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]phral ba zhag bcu tshun chad [#]slar ma sbyar tam phral ba de so sor sngags kyis ma thebs na spang ba'i ltung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/sbyar ma'i dum bu ni dgu nas nyi shu rtsa lngar te zung ma gtogs so/_/chos gos chen po [#]gsar du byed na tshal bu dgu yan chad nyi shu rtsa lnga man chad du byed du gnang
[\[94b.2\]]ste grangs 'chugs par mi bya bar khang 'khyer du byas te tshal bu bcu gsum dang bco lnga dang bcu dgu dang nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_nyi shu rtsa gsum dang nyi shu rtsa [#]lnga grangs 'di rnams gang du byas kyang rung ngo /_/de phan chad ni tshem bu'o/_/tshal bu nyi shu cha lnga nas [#]mang ba ni tshom bu [#]zhes
[\[94b.3\]]bya ste chos gos chen po'i sngags mi 'chags so/_/tshem bu pa'i chos gos kyi [#]sngags ni 'chags so/_/gsum pa dang po ni [#]leb leb po phyed dang gsum mo/_/chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang bcu gcig pa dang bcu gsum pa gsum ni zheng du 'gro ba'i tshal bu kun [#]tshal bu ring po
[\[94b.4\]]mnyam pa gnyis/_ring po'i phyed tshad gcig dang /_phyed dang gsum du spel cing gtang ngo /_/gnyis pa ni leb leb po phyed dang bzhi'o/_/chos gos tshal bu bco lnga pa dang /_bcu bdun/_bcu dgu pa gsum ni zheng du 'gro ba'i tshal bu mnyam pa ring po gsum/_ring
[\[94b.5\]]po'i phyed tshad gcig ste phyed dang bzhi mgo mjug tu spel cing gtang [#]/_gsum pa ni leb leb po phyed dang lnga'o/_/chos gos tshal bu nyi shu gcig pa dang /_nyi shu gsum pa dang nyi shu lnga pa gsum ni zheng du 'gro ba'i tshal bu ring po bzhi ring po'i phyed tshad [#]gcig ste/_tshal bu phyed
[\[94b.6\]]dang lnga zheng du 'gro ba'i [#]mjug tu bsnor [#]cing spel te gtang /_bdag gi khru gsum dang lnga ni thu [#]bor bsngo'o/_/chos gos gsum la cher byed du gnang ba'i tshad ni bdag nyid kyi khru zheng du ni gsum/_chur ni lngar byed du gnang ngo /_/chung ngu ni khru phyed phyed ma gtogs so/_/chos gos
[\[94b.7\]]gsum chung ngur [#]byed na gnang ba'i tshad ni bdag nyid kyi khru zheng du phyed dang gsum/_chur phyed dang lnga byed du gnang ngo /_/bar ma ni dbu ma'i tshad la'o/_/chos gos gsum 'bring byed na gnang ba'i tshad ni bdag gi khru zheng du gsum man chad khru phyed dang gsum yan chad chur khru phyed
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dang lnga yan chad [#]khru lnga man chad gag tu yang [#]byar rung ngo /_/'og tu gnas pa ni gnyis dang lnga'am gnyis dang bzhi'o/_/chos gos snam bu lnga pa ni bongs [#]te med na zheng khru [#]do la chur khru lnga yang rung /_zheng du khru do la chur khru bzhir byar yang [#]rung ngo /_/'khor
[\[95a.2\]]gsum yog [#]pa yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma tsam du sbyar [#]yang med de phongs na chos gos tshal bu lnga pa/_'khor gsum yog la [#]byas kyang nyes med de sngags kyang 'chags [#]so/_/lus kyi bdun cha las gnyis ni khru'i don to/_/mi'i lus dang lag pa ring thung zhugs [#]te khrus bcal [#]du
[\[95a.3\]]mi mngon na lus la ci yod pa las bdun char bcal [#]te bdun cha gnyis la khru gang du [#]brtsi ste/_khru de chos gos kyi zheng du ni gsum chur ni lnga'i tshad du bcal [#]lo/_/mi 'dus na sprad pa [#]bya'o/_/chos gos la bdag gi khru tshad bzhin du byas kyang mi tsho zhing sbom ste/_chos gos kha mi
[\[95a.4\]]'dus shing mi yog [#]na sna gnyis sgro gus gdags shing sprad pa'am btsems te sprad [#]par bya'o/_/tshad las lhag par mi bya'o/_/zla ba'i spang ba [#]ste/_rnam par 'byed pa'o[#]/_/'jog pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste/_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//nyes byas
[\[95a.5\]]pa ni 'bring [#]ba ste chung ngo /_/khru gang du ma chog pa'i gos dang 'khor gsum ma yog pa yang sngags gdab dgos shing 'chags te sngags ma thebs par zhag 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar ni mi 'gyur gyi nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'khor phyed kyang mi yog pa ni ro [#]med pa'o/_/gos kha ma
[\[95a.6\]]langs pa ni rnyed du re ba yod pa'i phyir gzhog [#]tu gnang ba rnyed du re ba de 'khor [#]gsum yog pa'i phyed man chad tsam zhig rnyed du [#]re ba ni kha sogs su gzhag tu mi gnang [#]ste/_zhag bcu 'das na spang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma brtags pa yang ngo /_/kha sogs su gzhog pa de la rnyed du re ba dge slong
[\[95a.7\]]gis [#]gos su ma brtags pa ri dwags dang rnga ma lta [#]bu zhig yin na gzhog tu mi gnang ste/_zhag bcu [#]'das na spang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma bsngos pa/_chos gos kyi rgyur ma bsngos shing ma [#]brtags pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gag kyang rung sngags kyis ma btab na nyes byas su
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gdong phyis dang /_gdong phyi [#]ba'i ras sam snam bu'i ras ma dang /_tshags dang [#]/_chu tshags dang chu tshags kyi rgyu dang /_gding ba dang /_'og tu gding ba'i stan dang gor [#]bu khru gang du med pa dang /_dre'u rngog [#]la sogs pa yo byad kyi gos rnams kyang ngo /_/dre'u rngog la
[\[95b.2\]]sogs pa sngags ma btab na zhag bcu 'das na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'di rnams [#]lta bu zhig rnyed du re ba yod pa'i phyi phyir [#]kha ma langs pa la sogs pa'i phyir zla ba gcig tu gzhog tu'ang mi dbang yan lag 'di 'chang ba'i yan lag dang 'dra [#]ste de'i steng du rnyed du re ba yod pa'i
[\[95b.3\]]phyir zhag sum cu 'das pas bsnan/_zla [#]ba'i ste dris pa'i'o/_/_'jog pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba 'dul ba dris pa zhes byas pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_/zla ba'i ste spang ba'o/_/'jog pa'i spang ba ltung ba 'dul ba so so nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'khru ba'i spang ba la 'chad do/_/
[\[95b.4\]]sbrum ma gnas dben par ro[#]/_/mnyan du yod pa na [#]dge slong u da'i [#]khu ba stor ba'i sham thabs chung ma dge slong ma 'gum [#]ta la 'khrur bcug nas sham thabs la khu ba chags pa 'gum [#]tas mo mtshan du bcug ste bur chags te [#]bu ku mA ra kA sh+ya pa zhes [#]bya ba dgra bcom pa zhig tu gyur
[\[95b.5\]]pa skyes pa las bcas te dge slong ma 'di lta bu'i tshul du bu ltor zhugs pa dang sngon lto [#]na bu yod pa las byig shur zhugs te sbrum ma ni gzhan gyis 'phyas [#]su mi bya zhing ma mthong bar dben par gzhag ste gso'o/_/dge slong ma 'di la yal bar mi bya/_dge slong ma sbrum ma
[\[95b.6\]]dben par gzhag pa la dge slong ma grogs kyis yal bar mi dor gyi rim gro dang zhal ta [#]bya'o/_/de la zas sbyin/_dge slong ma sbrum ma dben par gzhag pa de la [#]dge slong ma grogs kyis [#]zas dang gos kyang sbyin no/_/gnyen ni pha dang ma dag gi bdun rgyud tshun chad do/_/gos 'khrur
[\[95b.7\]]bcug pa ni dge slong ma gnyen ma yin pa [#]la 'khrur bcol na ltung ste gnyen [#]ni bdun mes dang phyi tshun chad kyi rgyud 'phel ba kun gnyen du chud do/_/de phan chad ni gnyen ma yin pa'o/_/'du shes ni gtso bor byed do/_/spang ba'i ltung bar byed pa [#]ni 'du shes las gyur te gtso bor zhes bya
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]ba'o/_/de ni 'brid do/_/dge slong ma gnyen ma yin par shes bzhin du bkrus pa las ltung ste/_dge slong ma la mi gnyen par na yang ngo /_/dge slong ma gnyen ma yin pa la bcol na ltung ste yan lag gcig_/de ma theg yang ngo /_/de [#]slong ma las gos len pa
[\[96a.2\]]yang gnyen ma yin pa las ltung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi chos gos bsngos pa rnying [#]pa bkru ba'i rigs [#]pa'am/_gding ba dag la la la bkru ba dang btso ba dang 'chag par gsol ba'o/_/bdag gi chos gos gsum pa dang gding ba yang yin pa dang /_bzhi ga yang [#]rung ba
[\[96a.3\]]dang rnying pa yang yin pa dang 'khrur yang bcug pa dang bdag gi yang yin pa dang bsngos pa [#]yang yin pa shes kyang bzhin pa dang byas nas kyang zin pa dang yan lag 'di bcu dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan par 'khrur bcug kyang rung 'chag tu
[\[96a.4\]]bcug kyang rung 'tshed du bcug kyang rung ltung bar 'gyur phyogs byas kyang las byas pa'o/_/gos rnying pa 'khru ba dang 'chag [#]pa dang 'tshed [#]du bcol te pha rol gyis ji [#]tsam las byas na ltung bar 'gyur zhe na/_gos kyi mtha' ma cung zad tsam btsos sam bcag pa yang ril [#]gyis byas
[\[96a.5\]]pa dang 'dra ste spang bar 'gyur ro/_/byas na der byed do/_/'khru ba'i spang bar gyur pa ni btso [#]ba dang 'khru ba dang 'chag pa gsum las bya ste zin na spang bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu'i mthar gcig go_/bdag gis gos rnying pa btsor bcol ba las dge slong mas btso ba'i phyir bkrus
[\[96a.6\]]pa dang btsos [#]zin nas bcag ste [#]byin na btsos pa dang bkrus pa dang bcag [#]pa gsum la nyes pa'i dmigs so sor mi 'gyur gyi spyir [#]ltung ba gcig go_/tshig [#]rnams kyis 'bras bu [#]gcig go_/gos rnying pa 'khrur bcol ba'i tshe 'di khrus shig btsos zin nas tshogs [#]shig ces tshig gi
[\[96a.7\]]rim pa so sor byas te smras la[#]/_las kyang de bzhin du zin par byas na yang spang ba'i ltung ba gcig tu zad de [#]nyes pa'i dmigs so sor mi 'ong ngo /_/'du shes gces pas ji lta bu'i don la rtsa [#]ba'o/_/'du shes kyis gnyen kyang ma yin la/_dge slong ma khrims nyams [#]pa yang ma yin
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]par shes bzhin du 'khrur bcol na spang ba'i ltung ba'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa la yin par bsams te 'khrur bcol ba yang ltung ba'o/_/rtsa bar nye ba [#]ni ci lta bu'i don ma yin no/_/gnyen yin pa la ma yin par bsams te bcol ba ni nyes byas te ltung bar mi 'gyur[#]/_'du shes
[\[96b.2\]]bzhin du the tshom mo/_/gnyen ma yin pa la yin nam ma yin gtol med de 'khrur bcug pa ni ltung ba'o/_/gnyen yin pa la yin nam ma yin gtol med de 'khrur bcug pa ni nyes byas so[#]/_/dge 'dun gyi 'og khrims kyi rjes su bsrung /_dge 'dun gyi 'og khrims kyi [#]ya ka ra
[\[96b.3\]]zhig bcad [#]na de bzhin du dge slong kun gyis bsrung ngo /_/ma bsrungs na nyes byas/_'di man chad skabs ma yin par glo tor [#]du 'chad pa ni ltag tu shes bzhin bshad pa'i zla ba 'di yang shes bzhin du bya ba yin te/_gseb tshags su kha bder bshad do/_/de la 'ongs pas kyang ngo /_/
[\[96b.4\]]snga na dge 'dun gyis kri ya [#]ka ra bcas shing 'dug pa la dge slong gud nas phyis 'ongs pas kyang snga mas bcas pa bzhin du bsrung ngo /_/yod dam med pa [#]shes pa'i phyir des de dris shig_/_mdo ltag ma ltar gud nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis bsrung dgos pa'i phyir gnas gag tu 'ongs kyang
[\[96b.5\]]rung kri ya ka [#]ra ci yod ces dri/_bdag gud du song ste gzhan gyi gnas su zhag lon na dge 'dun phyi mas gsal [#]du kri ya ka ra bcas kyang srid pa'i phyir bdag gis [#]gtsug lag khang du slar 'ongs nas [#]kri ya ka ra ci yod ces dri/_ring po ma thogs par ro/_/gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te kri ya ka
[\[96b.6\]]ra ci yod ces dri ba ni 'ongs ma thag tu dri'o/_/[#]le lo byas te phyis dri bar bsams te dri bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ni dge 'dun gyi las mi 'gal lo/_/dge 'dun gyis 'og khrims bcas pa las sangs rgyas kyis dge slong 'ga' zhig la gnang ba ni nyes med de mnyan du yod
[\[96b.7\]]pa na dbyar tshul du zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi gan du A nan da [#]gso sbyin zhu ba'i dge slong gcig cig las 'gror mi gnang [#]bar 'og khrims bcas pa las dge slong dgon pa pa u pa se na zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi 'og khrims bcas par mi shes te sangs rgyas kyi gan [#]du phyag 'tshal du
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]'ongs pa dang sangs rgyas kyis khyod 'og khrims ma dral tam zhes smras nas 'og khrims bcas pa ma thos te thugs rje cir gzigs zhes gsol nas nyes med par gnang [#]ba las bcas/_lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor [#]bu dang ska rags lhag ma [#]
[\[97a.2\]]gtong ba na dge 'dun gyir gzhag pa'i phyir long shig_/dge 'dun gyi spyir dge slong dag gis lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags la sogs pa bdag cag la [#]lhag ste mi dgos pa'i phyir dge slong yo byad med cing phongs pa ci bder khyer cig ces phul ba ni
[\[97a.3\]]dge 'dun gyis ci bder len du dbang ste blangs kyang nyes med do/_/shAkya'i rigs lnga brgya thar par zhugs pa gnyen phyug po phal mo [#]ches so so nas byin pas yo byad mang zhing phyug par gyur te de la sangs rgyas kyis shAkya'i rigs 'di rnams khyim gcig cig nas byung ste khyim gcig
[\[97a.4\]]tu zhugs par gyur na yo byad dbri bar thabs mdzad nas shAkya'i dge slong gis yo byad lhag pa [#]kun dge 'dun la dbul bar a nan tan [#]la byin pa dang a nan ta ma btub ste yo byad kun dge 'dun gyi khrod du phung por spangs te bor ba la sangs rgyas kyis gzigs nas phongs pa ci bder [#]
[\[97a.5\]]long shig ces bcas te de lta bur dbul ba zhig yod na dge 'dun gyis kyang long shig_/de ltar bzhag pa la phongs pa ci bder long shig/mdo ltag ma ltar dge slong dag gis yo byad lhag pa [#]phongs pa ci bder khyer cig ces dge 'dun spyir [#]spungs te bzhag pa'i phung po la dge slong
[\[97a.6\]]yo byad mi bdog pa rnams dge 'dun nam yon bdag la dri [#]zhing gsol mi dgos te ci bder blangs kyang nyes med do/_/bdag cag la yod na lhag par nyi rim du ni len du mi gnang [#]ngo /_/bkru ba'i spang ba ste rnams par 'byed pa'i mdo[#]/_'khru ba'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam
[\[97a.7\]]par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]bshang gci dang gzag [#]pa dang 'jim pa la sogs pas ma rung bar gyur pa las bkrus pa'ang mi dbri'o/_/bdag gi gos rnying pa'i phyi rol che chung dang bkru bshal gyi stor khung gi chu dang 'jim pa [#]la sogs pa cis reg kyang rung gnyen ma
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]yin pa'i dge slong ma la bcol na yang spang [#]bar 'gyur/_nyes byas pa ni/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gag kyang rung ste gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la bcol na nyes byas/_dre'u rngog dang /_sten dre'u rngog [#]dang phrug stan dang na nam dang sug [#]par dad par thang dag la bya/_khyim pa'i
[\[97b.2\]]gos dang /_gos [#]kha dog ma bsgyur ba dang /_kha tshar ma bcad pa dang /_spu bu can la [#]sogs pa khyim pa'i gos la bya/_sngas [#]dang sngas khab dang khres shing bal can la sogs pa la bya/_brtags pa gos lhag gi sngags kyis brtags pa dang /_gzhan sbyin par brtags pa'i gos la
[\[97b.3\]]bya/_btang bdag gi gos spangs par gyur te spangs zin pa dang gzhan gyi [#]gos spangs par gyur pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dkor dang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gag kyang rung ste 'khrur bcug na nyes byas/_bkru ba'i spang ba ste dri ba'i'o/_/bkru ba'i spang ba'i ltung
[\[97b.4\]]ba 'dul ba [#]dris pa zhes bya ba'i [#]mdo'o/_/bkru ba'i spangs pa'o[#]/_/bkru ba'i spang ba 'dul ba so so nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//len pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_dge slong ma las gos rin po che brje ba'i phyir blang /_dge slong ma la yon bdag gis rin po che chen po zhig phul na
[\[97b.5\]]dge slong pha la gos ngan pa [#]dang brje ba'i phyir dge slong mas gos bzang po long shig//dge bsnyen rab tu bzang po sbyin pa zhes bya bas mnyan [#]du yod par dge slong pho mo sde [#]gnyis la mchod ston byas te yon phul nas dge slong mas gos rin po che [#]chen po len du mi dbang gis gos ngan pa byin
[\[97b.6\]]ces byas pa dang ngan pa byin na nga ming stor [#]ro zhes zer te ngan pa yang [#]ma yin dge slong mas kyang bzang po ma blangs te rab tu bor [#]ba las dge slong pha dang brje ba'i phyir dge slong mas kyang blang du dbang dge slong gis kyang long shig par bcas/_dge slong ma dang lhan cig tu brje bar bya/_dge slong
[\[97b.7\]]mas mdo ltag ma ltar gos rin po che [#]chen po blangs pa [#]len du gnang [#]ba'i phyir bdag la mi gzhag gi dge slong pha'i gos ngan pa dang rjes [#]shig_/dge slong pha yang [#]dge slong ma gos bzang po khyer te ngan pa dang brje bar 'ong na brje bar gyis shig_/mnyam pa'am/_de dga' bar byas te'o/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]mdo ltag ma ltar gos bzang ngan brje ba la dge slong phas kha brngam tu [#]bdag rgyal bar mthus mi bya'i gos bzang po ci ri ba bzhin du ngan pa grangs mang ste rin mnyam pa dang dge slong ma ma dad cing mi dga' ba [#]med par mgu bar byas te brje'o/_/blangs na gnyen yang ma yin
[\[98a.2\]]la dge slong ma yang yin pa dang gos kyang blangs pa dang yan lag gsum/_gsol dge slong ma la gos blangs pa dang gnyen ma yin par shes bzhin pa dang yan lag lnga/_gos blangs pa de gos kyang yin pa dang lag tu'ang thob pa dang yan lag 'di dgu dang ldan na spang bar 'gyur/_
[\[98a.3\]]ltung ba med pa ni dge 'dun gyi phyir gos byin pa'o/_/dge slong mas dge 'dun pho la gos shig yon du phul ba ni blangs kyang nyes med do/_/legs par bshad pa'i phyir bshad ces[#]/_tshul nas 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i tshe dge slong phas chos bsnyad pa dang dge slong ma la dge slong
[\[98a.4\]]phas chos bshad pa la yid ches shing dga' ste de lta bu chos bzang po bshad pa la yon phul [#]lo zhes phul na blangs kyang nyes med/_rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshe dang rlag na'o/_/dge sbyong pho zhig bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe de [#]yo byad du dge slong mas gos byin pa dang gos stor tam gos chus khyer
[\[98a.5\]]ram mes tshig gam phrogs te med pa la sogs pa la dge [#]slong mas gos byin na blangs kyang nyes med do/_/dad pas nor bdun du bzhag nas smras te mi ltos pas [#]song na yang ngo /_/dge slong mas dge slong la nor sbyin par dad de mdun du bzhag nas mi 'dod ces byas kyang ma btub ste nor bor
[\[98a.6\]]nas nor la mi ltos par song na nor de blangs kyang nyes med do/_/gos ma yin pa kha zas lta bu gzhan zhig dge slong phas blangs pa ni nyes byas so/_/len pa'i spang [#]ba ste rnam par [#]'byed pa'i'o/_/len pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//lag
[\[98a.7\]]par thob par gyur na/_dge slong ma las gos blangs pa ni bdag gi lag tu thob na spang bar 'gyur[#]/_lta ba'i spyod yul du gyur pa de ni snga ma'o/_/dge slong ma la gos blangs [#]pa bdag gi lag tu ni ma [#]blangs kyi khyer te 'ongs pa la bdag gi mig gis mthong bar bzhag ste blangs pa yang lag
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]tu blangs pa dang 'dra bar ltung bar 'gyur/_dge slong ma la gos blangs pa de bdag gi [#]lag nyid du ni ma 'ongs kyi phas 'ong ba la mig gis mthong ba'i tshe ni nyes byas so zhes mkhan po snga mas bshad/_sbyor ba ni mi nye ba la khas blangs pa'o/_/dge slong ma la dge slong phas gos blangs pa
[\[98b.2\]]dang gos mi de la yod kyis khyer cig ces zer ram yul 'di na yod kyi [#]blangs te sbyin no zhes zer na de'i tshe nyes byas/_mi 'jigs pa la 'dus pa'i [#]dbang gis ma yin pa'i gos sbyin [#]pa la sogs [#]gtso bo'o/_/dge slong mas gos sbyin [#]na mo'i sems la mi sbyin pa'am 'gyod pa yod de
[\[98b.3\]]sems 'jug cing [#]'jigs pa dang khe dang len [#]'dod pa lta bur [#]sems 'dus pa'i dbang yin par shes pa ni gos blangs na nyes par 'gyur te de lta bu med pas gos byin pa blangs pa na [#]nyes med do/_/khyim pa'am gzhan zhig la 'di lta bu'i sems yod de blangs na'ang bu lon du 'gyur [#]
[\[98b.4\]]te mi gtsang ba zhes bya'o[#]/_/ltung ba med pa ni re zhig gi dus su sems kyis so/_/bdag la gos med de re zhig dge slong ma las brnyas [#]te gyon pa ni nyes med do/_/brjed de rin ma byin pa'o/_/dge slong ma las gos bzang ngan brjes te ngan pa'i [#]mkhan ma phyis sbyin par byas
[\[98b.5\]]pa las brjed de ma byin pa ni nyes med do/_/nam dran pa na sbyin no/_/khyim mi'am gzhan gyi bu lon chags pa brjed na'ang nyes med do/_/len pa'i spang ba ste 'dul ba dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//len pa'i spang ba pa'o[#]/_/len pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba so
[\[98b.6\]]so'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]slong ba'i spang ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa/_lam rgyud bzhi ma gtogs par mi'i rgyud gtogs [#]pa dang /_khyim par gyur pa/_khyim pa'ang yin pa dang /_srog chags khyim pa yin pa de 'tsho zhing srog dang ldan pa dang gnyen ma
[\[98b.7\]]yin pa khyim pa de gnyen yang ma [#]yin pa dang /_ltung byed yan lag ni lnga dang ldan na spang bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/de ma thag pa'i gsum po'o/_/lhag ma [#]dang rin thang so so ba gsum yang mdo ltag ma las 'byung ba yan lag bzhi dang ldan na spang bar 'gyur ro/_/brkus pa dang gos rkun pos
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]khyer ba dang /_rlag pa dang gos rlag ste 'khyam pa dang /_tshig [#]pa dang /_gos mes tshig pa dang /_phrogs [#]pa dang gos rlung gis phrogs pa ste khyer ba dang /_chus khyer ba ma yin pa'i gos so/_/gos chus khyer ba dang rkyen ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang byung
[\[99a.2\]]yang rung ste gcig byung na gos slong du dbang ngo /_/rkyen 'di lnga gag kyang rung med na ltung bar 'gyur te/_'di la yan lag gcig tu brtsis la ltag tu yan lag bzhi'i steng du 'dis bsnan/_slong ba ni nyes byas pa'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la slong ba'i tshe nyes byas/_thob
[\[99a.3\]]na rtsa ba'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la gos bslangs [#]te thob na ltung ba yin te yan lag gcig [#]gos so/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la bslangs te thob pa de gos [#]yin na dang yan lag gnyis/_ma bri na'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la gos bslangs [#]te thob pa de khru
[\[99a.4\]]gang yan chad kyang yin pa dang /_yan lag 'di gsum gyis gong ma lnga'i thog tu bsnan te tshang na spang /_rnam pa gang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams bzhin du bslangs te thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_rin dang [#]'di tsam ri ba zhig bslangs zhes byas te de bzhin thob pa dang /_kha dog dang [#]kha
[\[99a.5\]]dog ser po'am dmar po zhig bslangs zhes byas te de bzhin thob pa dang /_khru bslangs na'o/_/khru tshad [#]mtho tshad 'di tsam zhig bslangs zhes byas te de bzhin thob na spang [#]ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_ltung ba med pa ni gzhan no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar tshad dang kha dog ming gis bsngos te bslangs pa las
[\[99a.6\]]de bas lhag pa'am chung ba zhig byin na ltung bar mi 'gyur te nyes byas so/_/bsngos te bslangs pa las nor gzhan zhig byin pa ni nyes med do/_/lhan pa dang skud pa bslangs pa yang ngo /_/lhan pa dang skud pa tsam gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim bdag la bslangs kyang nyes med do/_/'bri ba'i
[\[99a.7\]]ni rgyu dang spun no/_/gos kyi rgyu ras kyi skud [#]pa dang spun la sogs pa bslangs pa ni ltung bar mi 'gyur te nyes byas/_de'i rgyu yang de bzhin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar rgyu dang spun [#]rgyu bal dang ka ba se bslangs na nyes byas/_slong ba'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]mdo ste [#]spang pa'i ltung ba drug 'das so/_/lhag pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_bsngo ba thams cad med na bslang ba'i [#]rigs so/_/dge slong gi yo byad bcu gsum du bsngos pa thams cad med cing gos phrogs [#]pa la sogs pa'i rkyen byung na gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa la gos slong ba'i yo
[\[99b.2\]]byad bcu gsum ni chos gos gsum sham thabs smad dkris rngul gzan g.yan pa dgab pa ras chen sman zong gi ras bting [#]ba lus phyi ba skra bzed pa khrus ras rngul gzan gyi 'theb dang bcu bzhi la g.yan pa dgab pa dang ras chen ni skabs skabs su dgos pa'i phyir gcig tu brtsi'o/_/spang
[\[99b.3\]]ba'i ltung ba'o/_/yo byad bcu gsum yod la gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa la gos bslangs na spang ba'i [#]ltung bar 'gyur te ming [#]dang khyim pa dang gnyen ma yin pa dang 'tshe [#]ba dang yan lag bzhi'i thog tu 'dis bsnan te lngar ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_khyim pa'i gos dam pa
[\[99b.4\]]khru bcu gnyis bla'i dang [#]gi bdun dang gnyis pa'i ras/_gos rkyen byung ste med na gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa la slong du gnang [#]ba yang khyim pa gos bzang por cha ba'i tshad du slong du dbang ste bzang po cha'i tshad ni steng du gyon pa zheng du khru gsum chur khru bcu gnyis 'og tu gyon pa zheng du
[\[99b.5\]]khru do chur khru bdun te de'i tshad du bslangs na nyes med do/_/dge slong gi dam pa ni ji ltar bshad pa sbyar ma'i rim pa dang sham thabs so/_/gos rkyen byung ste slong du dbang ba dge slong gi gos bzang po'i tshad du bslangs kyang nyes med/_dge slong gi gos dam pa'i tshad ni chos gos chen
