[\[99b.6\]]po gsar du byed na nyi [#]rim du snang ngo zhes 'byung ba bzhin du chos gos chen po nyi rim du sbyar ba'i tshad zheng du khru gsum chur khru lnga pa gcig dang sham thabs zheng du khru do chur khru lnga pa gnyis slong du dbang ste nyes med do/_/zung las slong [#]ba gang gi yang rung ngo /_/mdo ltag ma
[\[99b.7\]]gnyis ltar khyim pa dang dge slong gi tshad rnams gnyis su bshad pa gang yang rung ste bdag gir [#]dga' zhing dad pa cig gi tshad du slong du dbang ngo /_/tshad 'di las lhag pa ni mi bslang ngo /_/lhag [#]tu khyim pa dang dge slong gi gos la slong na gnang bar tshad btsugs pa las lhag par
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bslangs te thob pa spang bar 'gyur ro/_/snga ma'i thob nas ltag mar [#]yang ngo /_/byin pa'i gos tshad du bslangs pa [#]la dge slong gi chos gos tshad dang sbyar na de'i tshad pas chung ste dge slong gi tshad du snon te byin cig ces bslangs te blangs [#]na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur
[\[100a.2\]]ro/_/chos gos dang sham thabs mi langs [#]na chos gos khru phyed dang lnga dang sham thabs 'khor gsum yog par snon [#]te byin cig ces byas pa ni nyes med do/_/dam pa thob na lhag pa sbyin/_dge slong gi gos tshad du langs [#]pa las tshad las lhag par byin na tshad las ci lhag pa chod [#]
[\[100a.3\]]slar byin cig ma byin par khyer na spang ba'i ltung ba'o/_/mi bslang ba [#]la bslangs na nyes byas pa'o/_/gtsos [#]la sogs pa ma brtags pa bslangs pa'i mi rigs pa las bslangs na nyes byas/_yo byad bcu gsum yod bzhin du lhag par slong ba ni [#]nyes byas/_thob na rtsa ba'o/_/mdo
[\[100a.4\]]ltag ma ltar bslangs pa de thob na/_gtsos [#]la sogs pa ma brtags pa thob pa ni nyes byas lci ba/_yod bzhin du lhag par bslangs pa dang /_tshad las 'das par bslangs pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sbyin pa las ma byin na yang ngo /_/gos tshad bzhin du bslangs pa las tshad las lhag par
[\[100a.5\]]byin pa slar bcad de sbyin pa'i rigs pa las ma byin na spang ba'i ltung ba'o/_/bslangs pa'i rigs pa spang ba'o//_//[#]lhag pa'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//rin gyi spang ba la 'chad de/_brtags te dge slong la gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim bdag
[\[100a.6\]]pho'am khyim bdag mo gang yang rung gcig gis gos kyi rin sbyin par brtags te bzhag nas/_ma sbran pa las dge slong la [#]ni gos sbyin pa'i rin spags te bzhag go zhes ma sbran par/_shes nas [#]ni gzhan su yang rung ste gcig las bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin spags te bzhag par
[\[100a.7\]]thos nas/_ma brtags pa [#]dang mthun na'o/_/khyim pa de'i gan du song ste gos kyi rin spags pa dge ba yin gyis [(]pha [,]nga [)#]byin cig ces blangs na'ang gos kyi rkyen med par gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa la bslangs pa dang 'dra ste ltung ba'o/_/yan lag 'di gsum gyi steng du slong ba'i yan lag bzhis
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bsnan te bdun dang ldan na ltung ba/_gzhan yang de bzhin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim bdag pho'am khyim bdag mo gang yang rung gcig [#]gis bsngos te bzhag pa las gzhag par bdag gis kyang mi shes las kyang ma thos par bslangs te thos na ltung ba'o/_/
[\[100b.2\]]brtags pa'i slong ba'i spang ba'o/_/rin gyi [#]spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//so so'i spang ba la [#]'chad de/_mi 'jigs par sbyin pa/_rin gyi spang ba ni khyim thab bam chung ma gcig gi [#]spags pas gcig la bag tsha zhing 'dzem pa yod kyi so so'i [#]
[\[100b.3\]]spang ba nyid ni gnyis kas spags pas gcig la gcig bag tsha zhing 'dzem pa med pa de gnyis kas sbyin par dad pa la bskul te bslangs na yang ltung ngo /_/sbyor ba gcig gis thob pa ni gcig go_/khyim thab dang chung ma gnyis kas so so nas [#]gnyis kas rin phyung ste bsdus nas dge slong gi phyir
[\[100b.4\]]gos kyi rin du spags te bzhag pa las thob na'ang spang bar 'gyur te yan lag mdo 'di gnyis kyis ltag ma rin gyi spang ba'i yan lag rnams kyis bsnan te tshang na spang bar 'gyur/_gzhan bshad pa dang yan lag thams cad ltag ma rin gyi spang ba bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/so so'i
[\[100b.5\]]spang ba'o/_/so so'i [#]spang ba 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//bskur [#]pa'i spang ba la 'chad de/_ma brtags pa'o/_/dge slong la ma brtags pa gser dngul zhig gos kyi rin bskur ba rgyal po'am zhang blon nam bram ze zhig gis dge slong gi phyir gos kyi rin
[\[100b.6\]]du bskur te 'ongs na/_dgag [#]pa gos khyer [#]ba'i mi de la dge slong ni gos kyi rin ma brtags pa len du mi dbang ste gos shig byin na ni len gyi rin ma brtags pa mi [#]len to zhes dgag [#]pa dang /_sngar 'dri ba bstan te rin khyer khyer ba'i mi de na re gos kyi rin ma brtags pa len du mi
[\[100b.7\]]rung na g.yog gam don sgrub tu [#]yod ces 'dri na dge slong gis don bsgrub pa 'di yin no zhes bstan te/_don bsgrub pa la bsgo nas gos kyi rin khyer khyer ba'i mi des dge slong gis bstan pa'i don bsgrub pa'i mi de la gos kyi rin ma brtags pa 'dis gos shig nyos la dge slong de la byin cig ces
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bsgo nas/_pho nyas smras par gyur pa'i phyir/_gos kyi rin khyer khyer ba'i pho nya des slar dge slong gi gan du khyed kyis [#]don bsgrub pa bstan pa'i mi de [#]gos kyi rin bzhag ste rin [#]des gos su nyos la khyod la phul cig ces byas kyis gos der longs shig [#]ces smras
[\[101a.2\]]nas bzhag pa la/_sngar smras nas bskul ba/_dge slong gis don bsgrub pa'i mi de la gos kyis [#]brel to zhes bskul ba'i tshig lan drug las lhag pa dang yan lag ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtog mi nus pa la ni ma bskul ba'o/_/don bsgrub
[\[101a.3\]]pa'i mi de dge slong gis bskul ba gos kyis [#]brel to zhes byas kyang kho ra ro'am gnyid [#]kyis log gam yengs te ma go na bskul bar mi chud de lan drug bskur ba'i grangs su mi brtsi'o/_/ma grub na gnyis su yang ngo /_/don bsgrub pa'i mi de la dge slong gis nga gos kyis brel to
[\[101a.4\]]zhes tshor zhing go bar len gcig [#]bskul nas ma byin na nga gos kyis brel to zhes len [#]gnyis kyi bar du [#]go zhing tshor bar bskul lo/_/gsum du yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar don bsgrub pa'i mi la lan gnyis su bskul kyang gos ma byin na nga gos kyis brel to zhes lan gsum gyi bar du
[\[101a.5\]]go zhing tshor bar bskul lo/_/gsum phan chad ni kha rog ste 'dug go/_/mdo ltag ma rnams ltar lan gsum du tshig tu smras te bskul kyang gos ma byin la lan bzhi'i tshe cang mi smra bar kho'i [#]gan du 'gro'o/_/ci la byin ces 'dri na nga de'i phyir ro zhes bya/_lan bzhir mi smra bar bskul kyang
[\[101a.6\]]gos ma byin na mi smra bar lan lnga drug tu 'gro'o/_/drug las lhag par bskul te thob na spang ba'o/_/ma grub na sbyin bdag la sbran no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gos kyis brel to zhes tshig gis lan gsum bskul/_cang mi smra bar [#]lan gsum ste drug tu bskul nas gos ma byin na dge slong
[\[101a.7\]]des rgyal po'am zhang blon gag gis gos kyi rin bskur ba de'i gan du khyod kyis gos kyi rin bskur ba de nga'i lag tu ma thob kyis shes par byos shig ces pho nya brtags pa'am bdag nyid kyis sbran ma sbran na nyes byas/_gos kyi rin khyer khyer ba'i mi des khyod kyi don bsgrub pa gang
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]yin zhes ma dris par bstan na'ang nyes byas/_rin khyer khyer ba la gos kyi rin ma brtags pa len du mi dbang ngo zhes ma bkag [#]na'ang nyes byas so/_/'di lta bur gyur te btang nas 'bul na gtang [#]ngo zhes smras pa dang /_bdag gis sems gzung [#]bar nan tan bya'o zhes
[\[101b.2\]]khas blangs na longs shig[# ]/mdo ltag ma ltar lan drug tu bskul te gos ma byin nas rgyal po'am zhang blon thog ma nor bskur bskur ba de la dge slong gis slar sbran pa'i 'og tu don bsgrub pa'i mi de gos bzhes su gsol zhes 'bul du 'ongs na ngas nor bdag la slar sbran zin to
[\[101b.3\]]zhes gyis la ma len cig blangs na spang bar 'gyur/_nor bdag la sbran zin gyis mi len to zhes byas kyang don bsgrub pa na re ngas nor bdag gi sems bzung zhing mi dga' ba [#]med pa dang dad cing rung bar bya'o zhes zer na gos blangs kyang nyes med do/_/lhag par bskul tam [#]gnas
[\[101b.4\]]nas khas ma blangs na'o/_/dge slong gis [#]don bsgrub pa la lan drug las lhag par bskul te gos thob bam slar nor bdag la sbran pa'i 'og tu don bsgrub pa na re nor bdag gi sems gzung [#]ngo zhes mi zer bar gos [#]blangs na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gnyis blangs na'o/_/
[\[101b.5\]]lhag par bskul te gos blangs nas lag tu thob pa dang yan lag gsum gsum [#]char yang mi khyim pa na'o/_/nor bdag dang pho nya dang don bsgrub pa gsum char yang mi'i rgyud kyang yin pa dang khyim pa yang [#]yin pa dang yan lag gnyis su brtsi ste yan lag 'di gnyis kyi steng du ltag
[\[101b.6\]]tu smos pa gsum gyis bsnan te lngar tshang na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_ma smras na nyes pa'o/_/gos kyi rin khyer khyer ba'i pho nyas don bsgrub pa la ni rin 'dis gos 'di nyos la ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong 'dir 'ongs dang byin cig ces ni bsgo'i slar dge slong la ma sbran par
[\[101b.7\]]song ba la dge slong gis [#]don bsgrub pa la bskul na nyes byas ma 'gags [#]na'o/_/gos kyi rin cig pho nyas khyer te 'ongs te dge slong la phul na dge slong gis gos kyi rin ma brtags pa mi len to zhes gogs [#]shig_/ma 'gags [#]na nyes byas/_ma dris par ston na'o/_/gos kyi rin
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]khyer khyer ba'i pho nya des khyod kyi don bsgrub pa gang yin zhes ma dris par dge slong gis nga'i don bsgrub pa de yin no zhes pa [#]bstan na nyes byas re ba med nas ma sbran [#]na'o/_/don bsgrub pa la lan drug tu bskul ba ste [#]gos ma thob na slar nor bdag la ma sbran na'ang nyes byas/_
[\[102a.2\]]bskur ba'i spang ba'o/_/bskur ba'i spang ba 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo'o/_/spang ba'i ltung ba [#]bcu phung gcig rdzogs so//_//srin bu'i spong [#]ba la 'chad de/_chongs shig gding ba dang /_stan phying par bcags pa'am shing bal gyi bar tshangs can du byas
[\[102a.3\]]pa bcangs kyang nyes med de cher byed na zheng du khru do dang sor drug chur khru phyed dang lnga/_cog pu pa'i stan chung du byed na chur khru phyed dang gsum zheng du khru do dang sor drug tu bya'o/_/srin bu'i byed du bcug gam byas na'o/_/srin bal la stan sar pa bdag gis byas sam gzhan byed du bcug
[\[102a.4\]]na yang [#]spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te/_gnyen ma yin pa dang khyim [#]pa yin pa dang /_gsar du byas te zin pas spang bar 'gyur te byas zin pa'i ni srin bu'i [#]byas pa dang [#]yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_yan lag 'di bzhi ni 'ba' zhig dang cha'i spang ba'i yan lag
[\[102a.5\]]tu'ang gtogs so/_/thog ma bting ba ni byas zin pa'i mtha' 'o/_/srin bu'i stan byas te zin pa las spang bar gyur te byas zin pa'i tshad ni srin bu khod [#]bsnyams te bting bas zin par gyur [#]to zhes TI ka las 'chad[#]/_'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re kun zin te 'og tu bting na zin pa'i [#]tshad do
[\[102a.6\]]zhes kyang 'chad do/_/'og nas 'ba' zhig dang cha gnyis byung ba yang zin pa'i tshad ni [#]'di dang 'dra'o/_/srin bu'i [#]ltung ba med pa ni byas te thob pa dang spyad pa dang bcos pa la'o/_/ltung bar mi 'gyur ba ni gzhan gyis srin bu'i stan byas te byin pa la blangs pa dang [#]blangs pa de spyad pa dang
[\[102a.7\]]rnying pa las bcos pa ni nyes med do/_/srin bu'i spang ba ste rnam par 'byed pa'o[#]/_/srin bu'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//dbri [#]ba ni nyung dus bsres pa'o/_/srin bal gyi stan gsar du byed pa la phyed yan chad gcig bal dang ka ba ses
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bsres na nyes byas pa'o/_/phyed man chad cig bal dang ka ba ses bsres te srin bal mang na ltung /_rdzas ma rung bar gyur na'o/_/srin bal rul ba'am rnying pa la stan byas nas [#]nyes byas te 'og nas 'ba' zhig dang cha gnyis 'byung ba yang rul pa dang rnyings [#]pa las byas na nyes byas pa'o/_/
[\[102b.2\]]dris pa'o/_/srin bu'i spang ba 'dul ba dris pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//srin bu'i spang [#]ba'o/_/srin bu'i spang ba ste 'dul ba so so'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo/_'ba' zhig pa'i spang ba la 'chad de lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig_/dge slong gis [#]lug gi bal nag po 'ba'
[\[102b.3\]]zhig pas [#]stan sar pa byas na spang ba'i ltung ba ste yan lag dang tshad ni ltag tu srin bu'i bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyis pa'o/_/lug gi bal dkar po'am gro bo las sa [#]nag tu btsos pa ni ma yin gyi rigs kyis nag por 'dug pa la byas nas [#]ltung /_de bzhin du sngon po dang sngo nag
[\[102b.4\]]dang smug po dag kyang ngo /_/lug gi bal rigs kyis nag por 'dug pa la stan sar pa byas na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba bzhin du ming gis smos pa 'di rnams rigs kyis de ltar 'dug pa la stan sar pa byas nas 'ang [#]ltung ba'o/_/yul la la zhig na dkar po dkon na yang bal dkar
[\[102b.5\]]po 'ba' zhig la stan sar pa byas na'ang spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag dang bshad pa kun srin bu dang 'dra'o/_/nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba'o/_/'ba' zhig pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//cha'i spang ba la 'chad de/_
[\[102b.6\]]de dag phyed las lhag na'o/_/dge slong lug bal la stan sar pa byed na phyed lug bal nag po las gzhug_/bzhi cha gcig dkar po las gzhug_/bzhi cha gcig shog bal las gzhug ste de las nag po dang dkar po lhag na spang bar 'gyur/_shog bal lhag par bcug pa ni
[\[102b.7\]]nyes med do/_/'di [#]dkar po dang shog bal du cha mnyam par bsre'o/_/lug gi bal [#]stan sar pa byed na phyed nag po las gzhug_/phyed dkar po dang shog bal las [#]gzhug ste nag po la bzhi cha gnyis dkar po la bzhi cha gcig_/shog bal yang bzhi cha gcig gis thang du bcug
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ste bya'o/_/logs dang rgyab dang gnya' ba nas skyes pa ni snga ma'i'o/_/lug gi rtsib logs dang rgyab dang /_gnya' ba nas bal [#]ba ni 'jam bal yin te dkar po zhes bya'o/_/mgo dang rkang pa dang lto ba'i ni phyi ma'i 'o/_/lug gi mgo dang rkang pa dang lto ba
[\[103a.2\]]nas bal [#]ba ni shog bal zhes bya ste/_'di rnams la gong du bshad pa'i tshul bzhin du bsre'o/_/yan lag dang bshad pa ni kun rtag [#]tu srin bu dang 'ba' zhig ba 'chad pa dang 'dra'o/_/cha gnyis kyi spang ba'o/_/cha 'di [#]spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//
[\[103a.3\]#]drug gi spang ba la 'chad de/_chu dang zheng dang lhag pa bcad do/_/dge slong gis gding ba lo drug tu [#]lon pa zhig rnyings te spyad du mi rung nas dge 'dun la spyad brim [#]du 'ongs nas sar pa byed du gsol na dge 'dun gyis ltos la rnying [#]pa spyad du mi rung na sar pa byed du chug shig[# ]/sar
[\[103a.4\]]pa de chu zheng du lhag na tshad bzhin las lhag pa chod du chug [#]cig_/thung ngam chung na skyed [#]do/_/gding ba de chung ngam [#]thung na ltag [#]tu srin bu'i nang du tshad che chung rnam gnyis bshad pa gang yang rung gag gi tshad du dga' bar skyed [#]cig chad na sbyar [#]ro/_/gding ba rnying pa chad pa zhig ste slar sbyar na
[\[103a.5\]]spyad du rung na sar pa byed par gnang ba mi sbyin par chad pa 'di ltar sbyor te tshems la spyod cig ces bsgo shig gyes sam srab [#]na kha bskang ngo /_/gding ba rnying pa de gyes sam srab mor song ste glan nam spyad du rung ba tsam gyi tshod na'ang sar pa byed par gnang ba mi sbyin par rnying pa lhan pas
[\[103a.6\]]glon la slar sbyor du chug shig_/dka' [#]bar byed na sbyin no/_/gding ba rnying pa de rnyings ches te glan kyang spyad du mi rung na stan sar pa byed par dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin cig_/gnang ba ma thob la/_dge slong gis stan lo drug pa sar pa zhig byas na dge 'dun la ma gsol tam [#]
[\[103a.7\]]gsol kyang gnang ba ma thob pa dang /_gzhan yod dam/_stan lo drug pa snga ma yod bzhin du phyi ma [#]gsar du byas pa dang /_bdag gis 'dod de btang ngam bdag stan sar pa 'dod pa'i phyir rnying pa gud du btang ste sar pa byas pa dang /_lo drug gi rgyud ma 'das par/_gding ba
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]rnying pa lo drug ma lon par sar pa byas pa dang /_gding ba byed na'o/_/yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan par gding ba sar pa byas te zin na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/yod bzhin du brtsams shing bshams [#]na yang ngo /_/stan sar pa gcig bya bar brtsams shing bshams te mgo
[\[103b.2\]]btsugs pa la zin par phyi ma gcig kyang bya bar mgo btsugs te bshams na nyes so/_/bshams te mthar byin na sbyor ba ma lus [#]ltung ba [#]yin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar stan rnam [#]gnyis bya bar mgo btsugs pa las snga ma ni [#]ma zin gyi phyi ma zin na nyes byas so/_/snga ma dang gnyis zin
[\[103b.3\]]na ltung ba'o/_/spang ba ni phyis mgo btsugs shing bshams pa las sngar zin pa de spang ngo /_/rab tu 'byung ba gzhan gyis tha dad do/_/sngon dge slong byed byed pa las slar khrims phul ba las yang slar khrims nos te gding ba sar pa byas pa ni sngon dge slong byed pa'i tshe gding ba byas su zin
[\[103b.4\]]kyang gding ba gnyis byas par mi brtsi'o/_/lo drug gi spang ba'o/_/drug gi spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//mtho gang gi spang ba la 'chad de gding ba rnying pas sar pa'i gding ba la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ma glan par spyad na'o/_/
[\[103b.5\]]bdag gi [#]gding ba bsngos pa rnyings te sar pa byed na rnying pa dbus ni zad cing rtol gyis [#]mtha' mkho ra khor yug tu ma rtol [#]ba las bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bar dra [#]ste gru bzhir sbyar la sar pa sra bar bya ba'i phyir sar pa'i dbus su glon cig/_/rnying pa yod bzhin du sar pa
[\[103b.6\]]byas te rnying pa'i mtha' las bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis ma glan par byas te spyad na spang ba'i ltung ba'o/_/de ste yod na'o/_/gding ba rnying pa yod na sar pa'i dbus su glan gyi rnying pa med na ma glan pa [#]sar pa byas kyang nyes med do/_/de tsam na yang ngo /_/gding ba rnying pa yod ni
[\[103b.7\]]yod de mtha' las bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang du mi 'byung na yang ci yod pa des glan no/_/bcos nus na yang ngo /_/gding ba rnying [#]pa rnyings te btang [#]nas bsdus shing btsems la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'byung na'ang bsdus shing btsems la bde bar gshegs
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa'i mtho gang du kha bskang [#]la/_gding ba sar pa'i dbus su glan/_dum bu bsdus te yang ngo /_/gding ba rnying pa [#]dum bur so sor bral ba zhig na yang dum bu kun mi dor bsdus pa [#]gcig la gcig btsems te sar pa'i dbus su glan/_mtho gang gi
[\[104a.2\]]spang ba'o/_/mtho gang gi spang ba 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//lam gyi spang ba la 'chad de/_/khur tsa yod dam med kyang dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal khyer na'o/_/dge slong gis bal zhig rnyed de khur tsa yod bzhin du
[\[104a.3\]]bdag gis blangs te khyer na thog ma khyer ba'i tshe nyes byas/_dpag tshad gsum dang rgyang grags [#]phyed du phyin na'ang [#]nyes byas gcig_/dpag tshad gsum dang rgyang grags [#]gcig 'das na spang ba'i ltung ba'o/_/lam du zhugs nas rgyang grags nyid [#]kyis so/_/khur tsa yod
[\[104a.4\]]bzhin du bal khyer na dpag tshad gsum dang rgyang grags gcig 'das pas spang bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med dang /_dge slong ma dang lam du 'grogs [#]pa yang rgyang grags gcig 'das na ltung ba'o/_/yang yang gis [#]lam dus kyang rgyang grags gcig 'das na bzar dbang
[\[104a.5\]]ngo /_/phyed ni sbyor ba'i 'o/_/khur tsa yod bzhin du bal dag [#]khyer te dpag tshad [#]dang rgyang grags phyed 'das na nyes byas so/_/bud med dang dge slong ma dang lam du 'grogs pa yang rgyang grags phyed du 'das na nyes byas/_nyes byas pa ni rdzu 'phrul las gzhan gyi thabs kyis nam mkha' las
[\[104a.6\]]blangs pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'phral gyis bal khyer ba ni ma gtogs te 'jig rten gyi rdza 'phral gyis bal khyer ba dang sgyogs la sogs pa lta bus [#]nam mkha' la 'phangs [#]te bal khyer ba ni dpag tshad gsum dang rgyang grags gcig 'das na nyes byas gcig_/de phan chad rgyang
[\[104a.7\]]grags re re 'das shing nyes byas re re'o/_/sprul pas kyang ngo /_/[#]phyugs dang mi la sogs pa zhig gud du sprul te bal bskur ba ni mdo ltag ma bzhin du dpag tshad gsum dang rgyang grags gcig 'das na nyes byas/_nyes med pa ni zhwa dang lham dang rngul gzan bar tshangs can dang
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]rgya cang lcag pod [#]sbu gu can la sogs pa de tsam dag go/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi [#]rgyu bal khyer ba ni nyes med do/_/yang rdul dang rdul phran dang chu'i dang me long gi dang ri bong gi dang ra'i dang ba'i dang bu gu'i dang nyi zer gyi [#]rdul dang sro ma dang shig dang nas dang sor dag ste snga ma
[\[104b.2\]]drug cing phyi ma'o/_/dpag tshad dang rgyang grags brtsi ba'i thabs ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams [#]las brtsis te 'di go rim bzhin du snga ma drug la phyi [#]ma gcig tu brtsi'o/_/sor bzhi phrag drug la khru'o/_/nas drug la sor gcig sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang du brtsi'o/_/phyed [#]dang
[\[104b.3\]]bzhi la mi'o/_/khru de phyed dang bzhi la [#]mi gang du brtsi'o/_/khru bzhi la gzhu'o/_/khru de bzhi la gzhu gang gi [#]tshad du brtsi'o/_/de lnga brgya la rgyang grags so/_/gzhu de lnga brgya la rgyang grags gcig gi tshad du brtsi'o/_/rgyang grags brgyad la dpag tshad gcig tu brtsi'o/_/de'i mtha'
[\[104b.4\]]phan chad ni dgon pa'o/_/dgon par brtsi ba'i tshad ni gtsug lag khang nas rgyang grags gcig phan chad do/_/lus kyis [#]khur mi bskur[#]/_/dge slong gis srang khur dang rgyab khur la sogs pa lus kyis [#]khur mi bskur[#]/_logs dang rgyab dang sta zur dang mgo las kyang ma yin
[\[104b.5\]]no/_/lus kyi yan lag ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang gis kyang khur mi bskur [#]ro/_/'di spyi'i ma yin par ma [#]dogs shig_/dge slong mas kyang khur mi bskur [#]ba 'di bzhin du bsrung ngo /_/dge slong mas bsrung ngo zhes glo tol du bshad pa ni mdo thams cad spyi'i sems yin
[\[104b.6\]]mod kyi dge slong bal khyer ba med de ma gtogs pas bal gyi mjug ma [#]khur mi bskur [#]zhes 'byung ba yang dge slong ma'i khrims su ma gtogs zhes 'dzin gyis dogs pa'i phyir smos so/_/khur phyed las lhag par mi 'degs[#]/_dge slong khur zhig khur dgos na bdag gis
[\[104b.7\]]ci theg pa las phyed man chad [#]khur khyer du dbang ngo /_/khur phyed la sogs pa ste/_khur gcig tu mi chud pa'i phyir dbang ngo /_/bal khyer ba'i spang ba'o/_/bal gyi spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'khru ba la 'chad de/_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]gos rnying pa'i gnas su lug bal lo/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la gos rnying [#]pa 'khrur bcol na spang bar 'gyur ba'i yan lag dang bshad pa bzhin du lug bal 'khrur bcol ba'ang de dang 'dra'o/_/'chag pa rmel ba'o/_/lug bal rmel ba
[\[105a.2\]]dang 'chag pa dang 'khru ba dang 'tshed pa dang 'khal ba 'di [#]rnams gang yang rung ste gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa la bcol na ltung ba ste gos rnying pa'i yan lag dang bshad pa'i steng du 'di bsnan te tshang na spang bar 'gyur/_bal gyi las kyi spang ba'o/_/'khru ba'i [#]spang ba ste 'dul
[\[105a.3\]]ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//gser gyi spang ba la 'chad de/_rin po che bdag gir byas pa'o/_/gser dngul bdag gi yin par shes shing sems pa las spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/mngon sum du der [#]rdzogs pa'o/_/gser
[\[105a.4\]]dngul bdag gi yin par shes te mig sngar yang mthong ba dang yan lag gnyis/_gser dngul mthong ste bdag gi yin par bsam [#]pa'i tshe na nyes byas so[#]/_/bdag gi nam brtags pa'i'o[#]/_/gser dngul yon bdag gi phyir brtags pa'am bdag bcang bar sngags kyis ma
[\[105a.5\]]thebs pa dang yan lag gsum/_reg gam bdag gi lag gis bzung [#]ngam/_reg tu bcug na'o/_/gzhan len du bcug na spang bar 'gyur te yan lag 'di lnga dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji lta bu yang ngo /_/gser dngul la bdag gis snod nas bzung ngam shing
[\[105a.6\]]gis blangs sam thabs ji lta bur reg kyang ltung /_gzhan la long zhes byas sam bcol zhes byas sam khyer zhes [#]byas sam zhog cig ces [#]byas sam thabs ci lta bur reg tu bcug kyang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/zong [#]gi zangs la byas nas [#]nyes byas pa'o/_/dong tshe dang pa ne [#]lta bu zong du
[\[105a.7\]]spyod pa la bdag gis reg gam reg tu bcug na'ang nyes byas/_dngul lam gser dang bsres pa'i zong ste ge dar lta bu la reg na ltung ba'o/_/ltung ba med pa ni gzhan la'o/_/zangs la pa ne [#]lta bur zong du ma byas pa zangs gzhan la reg pa ni nyes med do/_/ro nye dang khar [#]ba dang tshon
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]mo steng dang lcags rnams kyang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la reg na'ang nyes med do/_/dge tshul dag gis kyang ngo /_/[#]dge sbyong pho mos kyang bdag gi [#]gser dngul la reg tu mi dbang /_sbyin bdag bdag por bsngos pa dang don bsgrub pa bdag por khas blangs pa dang bsngos pa
[\[105b.2\]]ni brtags pa'o/_/sbyin bdag por bsngos pa dang zhes pa ni yon bdag rgyal po'am zhang blon lta bu'i phyir kho'i yin par bsams te kho'i phyir bsod nams bskyed pa la sogs par spyad pa'i phyir bcangs pa dang reg pa ni nyes med do/_/bsgrub pa nas dang zhes pa yin
[\[105b.3\]]par [#]du ni khyim pa la bdag gis [#]yon bdag chung ngur bsngo ba'i mi [#]zhig yod na yang de'i phyir bsod nams spel ba la sogs par kho'i yin par bsams shing reg pa dang bcas pa ni nyes med do/_/bsngos pa ni brtags pa'o zhes pa ni bdag gi [#]yo byad bcu gsum lta bu ma tshang ba nyo ba'i
[\[105b.4\]]phyir sngags kyis btab pa yang bcangs shing reg pa nyes med do/_/chos kyi don gyi phyir med pa las gzhan du mi skye/_bdag gi yo byad bcu gsum yod bzhin du yo byad nyo ba'i rin du sngags kyis btab te [#]bzhag pa ni sngags mi 'chags te spang ba'i ltung byed [#]'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog
[\[105b.5\]]gsum gyi phyir spyad par brtags te bzhag pa ni nyes med/_bdag po rim [#]yang zhig pa ma yin no/_/sbyin bdag che chung du bsngos pa lam ring po zhig na 'dug na yang de'i phyir spyad par bsams te [#]gser dngul la reg pa'ang lam ring po'i phyir sbyin bdag tu mi chud pa ma yin te nyes
[\[105b.6\]]med do/_/brtags [#]pa ni bdag gi don gyi phyir ba'i zas so/_/bdag [#]kha zas dang brgyags [#]kyi zong du gser dngul la [#]sngags kyis btab ste bcangs pa'ang nyes med do/_/gzhan la zas kyi phyir tshong byed du bcug gam reg tu bcug kyang nyes med do/_/de bya bar bcol ba'i phyir kAr ShA [#]
[\[105b.7\]]pa Na 'chang ba yang ngo /_/bdag gi zas dang brgyags [#]zong du gzhan la bsgyur bar bcol ba'i phyir kAr ShA [#]pa Na bcangs pa'ang nyes med do/_/dge 'dun dang grogs po la bshos gsol ba'i phyir pa Na [#]bcangs shing reg pa dang yon bdag gi bdag gis zan rin [#]du pa Na phogs [#]pa
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]blangs te bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/lam zong du na rin po che tshun chad bdag gud du lam ring por 'gro ste brgyags [#]su bskur [#]mi theg na brgyags [#]zong gser la dang rin po che tshun chad khyer zhing reg kyang nyes med do/_/me'i phyir shel sgong chongs shig/_/
[\[106a.2\]]dge slong dgon pa pa med [#]dbyung ba'i phyir me'i shel sgong bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/chag [#]ma dang me long bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/me mi phyin pa'i shel sgong bcangs pa ni ltung bar 'gyur/'di mi dben par ma bzhag cig/_/me'i shel sgong mi gtor [#]bar bya ba'i phyir
[\[106a.3\]]dben par bzhag cing gzhan gyis ma mthong bar bya/_ma byin par len pa la mi bstan/_me'i shel sgong rkun po dang mi rgod lta bu la mi bstan/_'di las 'bras bu 'byung ba ni sbyin/_mi rgod dam rkun po me slong na shel sgong ma mthong bar lkog tu phyung [#]la me sbyin no/_/chu'i phyir nor bu
[\[106a.4\]]tsan dra kan ta'o/_/chu 'byung zhing spyad pa'i phyir chu'i shel sgong bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga mtshungs/_chu'i shel sba zhing bsrung ba dang chu dbyung ba gzhan slong ba sbyin pa ni [#]me'i shel la bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/rin po che'i nang du ma chud pa yo byad gnang ba'i rnams
[\[106a.5\]]kyang ngo /_/dge slong gis [#]yo byad du 'chang du gnang ba'i rnams gser dngul dang rin po che las [#]byas te mi bcang /_gser dngul dang rin po che ma yin pa'i snod spyad ni bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/'og nas 'chad do/_/ra gan dang zangs dang khar ba dang shing gi lhung bzed bdag
[\[106a.6\]]gir mi bya/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las snod [#]spyad byas te bcang du mi gnang ngo /_/bdag gir byas pa 'di'am gzhan dag kyang 'ong ste spyad [#]na sman dang snod snyam du spyad [#]do/_/mdo ltag ma'i nang nas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang snod spyad gzhan las byas pa zhig mi bcang
[\[106a.7\]]du 'phangs ste mi bdog [#]na'ang kha zas ni sman yin snod spyad de ni sman gyi snod snyam du bsams te bcangs kyang nyes med/_bsngos pa'i [#]gnyis te lcags dang sa'i'o/_/dge slong gis kha phyis su bcang du gnang zhing brtags pa ni lcags dang khams [#]gnyis lhung bzed du byas te/_
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]kha dog bsgyur ba'o/_/nor bu dang /_nor bur brtsi'o cog la bya/_mu tig dang baiDUr+ya dang /_mching bu la bya/_man shel dang byu ru chen po dang dngul dang gser dang asma gar b+ha dang mu sa la gar b+ha dang lo hi ti ka dang g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'i rin po che la sogs pa'o/_/
[\[106b.2\]]ming gis smos pa'i nor bu dang rin po che 'di rnams las bdag gir [#]byas shing reg gam reg tu bcug na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/'bri ba ni zong du ma yin pa dag kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar rin po che ming gis smos pa la ma gtogs pa rin po che'am nor bu'i gzugs su
[\[106b.3\]]ni 'dug gi zong [#]du ni mi spyod cing mi bsgyur [#]ba la reg na nyes byas/_de ma thag pa yang ngo /_/dngul dang nyo tshang [#]gnyis kyang rin po che ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pa dang 'bral ba dang dum bu dang tshig pa dang /_nor bu dang rin po che las ming gis smos
[\[106b.4\]]pa 'di rnams ltar gyur te spyad du mi rung ba zhig la reg na nyes byas/_sngon mi spyod pa dang mtshan ma ma btab pa dang nor bu dang [#]rin po che dang [#]sngon zong du spyod spyod pa las da [#]mi spyod pa zhig la reg na nyes byas/_gzugs brnyan yang de bzhin no/_/zong gi pa ne'i [#]gzugs 'dra bar
[\[106b.5\]]'dug pa dang sa'am shing la kha dog gzhan gyis bsgyur te gser dngul lta bur 'dug pa'i nor bu la bya/_gser dang dngul gyi spang ba'o/_/gser gyi spang ba'i ltung ba 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//dngul gyi spang ba la 'chad de/_ltung ba ni
[\[106b.6\]]rnyed par 'dod pa'o/_/gser dngul dang gos zas la sogs pa khe spogs dang bun [#]du gtong zhing lhag 'dod pa'i phyir byas pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/pha rol gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa na rtsa ba'o/_/pha rol po gnyen ma yin pa la khyim pa yang yin pa
[\[106b.7\]]la sogs [#]byas na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gsum/_spogs phyin pa yang ngo /_/khe [#]'dod de gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa las spogs kyang phyin pa dang /_yan lag [#]bzhi dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma thag pa yang ngo /_'og nas nyo tshong gi spang ba'i ltung
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ba 'byung ba yang yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/dong tse'am rin po ches tshong byas na'o/_/dong tse'am nor rin po che la sogs pa ci'ang rung ste spogs byas nas khe phyin na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba ni [#]gcig go/_/spogs
[\[107a.2\]]byed par sbyor zhing rtsom pa ni nor lag tu ma thob tshun chad nyes byas te gcig tu zad do/_/dkon mchog gi phyir bshams pa ni yod na kun dga' ba'am [#]dge bsnyen las yod na bcol to/_/dkon mchog gi phyir byed cing spyod na spogs phyin kyang nyes med de[#]/_dge bsnyen tam [#]zhal
[\[107a.3\]]ta pa'am rtse rgod yid brtan [#]pa la bcol te tshong dang spogs byed du gzhug go[#]/_/gta' nyi rim blangs te'o/_dkon mchog gi phyir nor rdzas spogs kyi phyir btang ba [#]de ci ri ba gta' [#]nyi rim blangs la sbyin no/_/dpang dang mdo ltag ma ltar spogs su btang ba [#]de dpang btsugs la/_
[\[107a.4\]]lo dang lo tshigs smos te/_zla ba dang zla ba'i dus bzung la/_/zhag dang tshes grangs brtsi ste/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang gtsug lag khang gang yin pa ming gis smos nas gtsug lag khang 'di gnas brtan ming 'di'o zhes bya ba dang /_gtsug lag khang skyong dang dge 'dun gyi
[\[107a.5\]]gtsug lag khang skyong gang yin pa'i ming yang smos te/_len pa dang /_mi su la spogs su gtang [#]ba'i sde cha dang ming rus bzung la/_nor dang nor spyi dang ci [#]khyer ba'i grangs dang spu rtags smos te/_spogs rnams slar spogs ji tsam dbul ba'i gtan tshigs [#]bzung la/_leb [#]ma la
[\[107a.6\]]bslan/_shog shog la bris te chags [#]rgya dang dpang yig bzung ste bzhag_/'di dag la chud par byos shig_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge 'dun snga ma rnams kyis nor spogs su btang ba las dge 'dun snga ma bzhin du [#]'dod na phyi ma rgyus ma [#]shes pa rnams la mi 'di la nor 'di snyed cig
[\[107a.7\]]spogs su btang ste chags [#]rgya 'di yin gyis ngos shig ces bstan/_dngul 'tshong ba'i spang ba'o/_/dngul 'tshong ba'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'di ni gzhi gcig na 'dug cing bun [#]dang bde dang skyed du gtang ba [#]la bya'o/_/nyo
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]'tshong la 'chad de gzhan gyi [#]gser dngul 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi nor zas dang phyugs zan [#]dang mi la sogs pa yul gzhan du lam ring por tshong spogs byed na spang bar 'gyur/_dge 'dun gyi zas kyi phyir rin gyis nyo na dge 'dun gyis lam [#]sbyin/_khyim pa'am dge bsnyen
[\[107b.2\]]zhig gis dge 'dun bshos gsol ba'i phyir rin du phul te zan gyi rgyu sbyar du gsol zhes zer na bdag cag gis [#]gtsug lag khang gi dge 'dun yang rung dge 'dun gzhan [#]gyi phyir yang rung rin blangs la zan gyi rgyu sbyar ro/_/'on te de nyid du na bye brag yod par ro/_/mdo
[\[107b.3\]]ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gzhan zhig gi phyir zan sbyin par rin phul ba ni ci ri ba tsam gyi rgyu sbyin no/_/bdag cag gis [#]dge 'dun zan sbyin par rgyu phul ba ni bye brag yod par rin las lhag par zas kyi rgyu phyung ste mchod ston rgyas par bya'o/_/nyo'o zad [#]na dge 'dun gyis so/_/dge 'dun
[\[107b.4\]]gyi [#]bshos nar ma'i rgyu [#]zad dam chad par gyur pa'i tshe dge 'dun gyi dkor gser dngul lam yon bdag gcig gis yon du 'phul [#]ba zhig yod na las pa'i dge slong gis btsongs shing spyad kyang nyes med do/_/sar pa yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi [#]bshos kyi rgyu nyo ba ni
[\[107b.5\]]ston nyos na rin chung ba dang srog chags med pa'i phyir ro/_/'on te rnying pa srog chags med na [#]btsong /_dge 'dun gyi nas 'bras gsang gsar tshogs che zhing bshos thub par gyur na snying [#]nad du 'gyur zhing srog chags 'jug pa dang rul bar 'gyur ba'i [#]phyir btsongs kyang nyes med do/_/
[\[107b.6\]]rin mi gdab[#]/_dge slong gi pha rol tshong byed pa'i gzu bo dang rin thang mi bcad/_de ltar byas na nyes byas/_khyim pa spyod pa'i nang du lag pa mi gzhug_/dge slong gis khyim pa'i so nam dang spyod do cog gi nang du gtogs 'dod mi bya ba dang pha rol tshong byed pa la da nyos tshur khyer
[\[107b.7\]]shig ces kha brngam mi bya byas na nyes byas/_khyim pa las nyor gzhug_/dge slong gis [#]chos kyi don du bya ba'i phyir yo byad cig nyos na dge bsnyen dad pa'am khyim pa brtan po la bcol kyang nyes med do/_/ma grub na dge bsnyen tam [#]khyim pa tshong byed pa med dam ma nus na/_
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]lan gsum gyi bar du tshig brjod/_nor bdag gis nor mi ri ba la rin cher btab na dge slong gis ci ri ba bshor te lan gsum du dad pa dris te pha rol dad na [#]tshong byas kyang nyes med dkon mchog gsum ma gtogs par/_dge slong gis [#]dkon mchog gsum gyi yo
[\[108a.2\]]byad du bya ba'i phyir tshong dang khe spogs phyung ba ni nyes med/_gzhan zhig dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du tshong byed pa la bdag gis mgon byas te [#]zer gyis mthong [#]ba'am rgyal bar byas kyang nyes med/_pha rol gyi phyir dag kyang skyed [#]bri mi bya/_dkon mchog gsum ni ma gtogs
[\[108a.3\]]bdag dang gzhan gyi phyir tshong byed na bdag rgyal ba'am pha rol pham par mi bya ste mnyam par bya/_skugs mi gzugs/dge slong gis gdeng med par rgyal 'gyed cing skugs btsugs te nor thob kyang nyes byas shes bzhin du skugs btsugs te nor thob na pham pa'i sbom pa'o[#]/_/dge
[\[108a.4\]]'dun gyis de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi las byed pas sbyin/_dge 'dun gyi dkor gser dngul lam nas 'bras lta bu zhig las spogs byed na bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyir dge 'dun kun 'du [#]mi dgos kyis gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bsgos pa'i dkor [#]bas gar rigs par tshong byas
[\[108a.5\]]kyang nyes med/_rgan po rgan po [#]la ma dris par dge 'dun gyi phyir ba mi btsal[#]/_mdo ltag ma ltar tshong spogs byas pa dge 'dun gyi las ci yang rung te [#]las byas pa'i dge slong gis gnas brtan gsum bzhi yan chad la ma dris par las mi bya/_leb ma la bris te 'grub par de
[\[108a.6\]]la nan tan bya/_dge 'dun gyi dkor las dkor [#]bas khe spogs su btang ba'i [#]rnams khungs su bas par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag dkor pa [#]las 'byung ba'i tshe bdag la skyon med cing gtsang mar bya ba dang snod gang [#]brtsir rung ba'i phyir shog shog la bris te gzhag_/nyo tshong gi spang ba'o/_/[#]
[\[108a.7\]]nyo tshong [#]gi spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//spang ba'i ltung ba bcu phung gnyis rdzogs so//_//lhung bzed la 'chad de/_lhung bzed las so/_/dngos po lhung bzed kyang yin la zhag bcu las 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba dang [#]/_ma
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]bsngos pa las so/_/lhung bzed bsngo ba'i sngags kyis ma thebs pa dang zhag bcu 'das pa las spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te skya rengs [#]dang rtsis mgo ni gong du gos zhag bcu 'das nas [#]spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba dang 'dra/_spang ste rab tu 'byung [#]bar 'dod pa la thob par bya/_
[\[108b.2\]]dge bsnyen tam [#]rab tu 'byung bar 'ong ba la sbyin no zhes bsngos pa'i lhung bzed ni zhag bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/de ltar sbyin par bsngos pa las phyis mi sbyin du mi rung ngo /_/ma brtags pa ni/_lhung bzed bsngor mi rung zhing sngags mi 'chags pa ni ming
[\[108b.3\]]gis smos pa 'di rnams te/_sre bo dang tshon ra rir 'dug pa dang /_dkar po dang dkar po nyid du 'dug pa dang /_lhag pa [#]lhung bzed chen po'i tshad las 'das pa dang /_rnams kyang ngo /_'di rnams lta bu cig [#]zhag bcu 'das par bcangs na'ang spang ba'i ltung bar mi 'gyur te nyes
[\[108b.4\]]byas/_'bri ba ni rjen pa yang ngo /_/lhung bzed sar ba rtsis ma bskus pa [#]bskus kyang lhung bzed chung ngu'i tshad du'ang ma thub pa ni sngags mi 'chags te/_zhag bcu 'das na nyes byas/_nyes med pa ni lhung bzed chung ngu gcig go/_/ku pa tra lta bu chung ngu zhig bsos [#]pa'i lhung
[\[108b.5\]]bzed las lhag par bcangs kyang nyes med/_lhung bzed 'chang ba'i spang ba'o[#]/_/lhung bzed 'chang ba'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'di man chad lhung bzed 'og ma la 'chad de/_rab tu 'dod par mi bya/_dge slong gis
[\[108b.6\]]gzhan gyi nor rdzas bzang po la 'dod cing chags par mi bsam/_yo byad la chags par mi bya/_bdag gi yo byad ming gis smos pa bcu gsum lta bu la sogs pa la chags par mi bya/_gang la zhen pa de mi bcang [#]sngon dge slong cig bdag gi lhung bzed la chags te shi
[\[108b.7\]]nas lhung bzed kyi nang gi [#]sbrul gdug par skyes pa las bcas te bdag gi yo byad gcig la chags na gang la chags pa'i dngos po de gzhan la gtan spang /_lhung bzed kyang med na bslang [#]/_mdo ltag ma ltar bdag la yo byad bcu gsum med na slong du dbang ba bzhin du lhung bzed
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]kyang med na bslangs kyang nyes med/_de yod pa la'o/_/lhung bzed bsngos pa bdag la yod bzhin du gzhan bslangs te rnyed na spang bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/lhan pa bzhi tshun chad der gdab pa'i/_lhung bzed snga ma bsngos shing yod pa lhan pa
[\[109a.2\]]bzhi tshun chad btab ste [#]spyad du bzod pa las lhung bzed gzhan zhig bdag gis btsal te rnyed na spang bar 'gyur/_rigs spyad du bzod na'o/_/gong ma ltar spyad du bzod pa zhig na lhan pa [#]bzhi tshun chad pa yod bzhin du gzhan btsal na spang bar 'gyur/_lhan [#]pa gcig yod la
[\[109a.3\]]spyad du mi bzod na gzhan btsal kyang nyes med de yan lag gnyis/_khyim pa khyim pa'ang yin pa dang yan lag gsum [#]gnyen kyang ma yin pa dang yan lag bzhi tshol zhing slong na'o/_/ming gis smos pa'i yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan par pha rol las btsal zhing bslangs te lag tu
[\[109a.4\]]thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/'og ma de gnyis kyang de bzhin no/_/'og nas 'thag pa'i spang ba 'byung ba gnyis kyi rtsis mgo yang gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim pa la bslangs na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te lhung bzed kyi rtsis mgo dang 'dra'o/_/'thag pa dang sbyin bdag dang gzhan
[\[109a.5\]]no/_/thags 'thag [#]pa'i thag ma'ang [#]khyim pa sbyin bdag rgyu sbyor ba'ang khyim pa ste de gnyis ka'ang gnyen ma yin pa las bslangs shing thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_gcig gnyen yin na nyes byas su 'gyur/_nyes med pa ni gnyen ma yin pa las pha gnyen las na khe dang lhung
[\[109a.6\]]bzed ma gtogs te'o/_/dge slong gis gnyen yin pa la bslad [#]du rung ba gzhan ni gnyen las bslangs kyang nyes med/_bdag la lhung bzed bsngos pa bdog [#]bzhin du slong ba dang gnyen la ltag tu nyo tshong [#]rnam pa gnyis bshad pa khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshong byas na nyes byas su 'gyur/_
[\[109a.7\]]nyes byas pas [#]bdag lhung bzed bsngos pa yod bzhin du gzhan la slong zhing tshol ba'i tshe nyes byas/_de las grub na rtsa ba'o/_/bsngos pa'i lhung bzed yod bzhin du bslangs pa lag tu thob na [#]spang bar 'gyur/_yod par sems la med na 'bri ba'o/_/lhung bzed bsngos pa yod de lhag
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]par gcig bslangs pa las lhung bzed snga ma brang nas rkun pos khyer na phyi ma lag tu thob pa'i tshe nyes byas/_bdag la lhung bzed bsngos pa med par yod do snyam du bsams te gzhan las bslangs te lag tu thob na'ang nyes byas/_bdag gi yo byad du'o/_/bdag gi lhung bzed dngos po [#]yod
[\[109b.2\]]bzhin du bdag ni nor rdzas kyis [#]lhung bzed lhag pa gcig nyos na'ang ma bsngos par zhag bcu 'das na nyes byas/_de dag yod bzhin no[#]/_/bdag la lhung bzed nyo ba'i zong yod bzhin du gnyen ma yin pa las bslangs te lhung bzed lag tu thob na nyes byas/_rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi
[\[109b.3\]]lhung bzed yod bzhin du gnyen ma yin pa las bslangs te bdag gi lag tu [#]ma blangs par pha rol la bzhag na nyes byas bzang po 'dod par brje na'o/_/bdag gi lhung bzed dang yo byad pha rol gyi bzang po la dad de brje na nyes byas/_dge 'dun la spang ngo /_/ltag tu gos la
[\[109b.4\]]sogs pa'i spang ba ni zhag gcig gis 'chad de dge slong gcig la spang ste slar 'ong ba lta bu ma yin gyi lhung bzed spang bar 'gyur ba ni dge 'dun la spangs te thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_du ma na gcig la bsam [#]pa de'o/_/bdag gi lhung bzed bsngos pa yod bzhin du lhung bzed
[\[109b.5\]]drug bdun tsam lhag par bslangs na de'i nang nas gang bzang ba gcig dge 'dun la spang ngo /_/gzhan yang spang ngo /_/lhung bzed bzang po gcig gong ma ltar dge 'dun la spangs pas mi chog gi bsngos pa gcig bzhag la gzhan du yod pa grogs lhung bzed med pa la byin te
[\[109b.6\]]gtan spang ngo /_/'di rab tu 'byung ba la'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar lhung bzed spang ba ni mur 'dug gi tshul du rab tu byung [#]ba la spang ba ma yin gyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul du rab tu 'byung ba la lhung bzed gzhan spang ngo /_/ngan pa 'di la sbyin no/_/dge 'dun gyi nang na tha mar gyur pa'i
[\[109b.7\]]lhung bzed de spang bar 'gyur ba'i dge slong la sbyin/_brims te blang [#]/_lhung bzed lhung bar gyur pa de bskos pa'i dge slong gis gnas brtan man chad la su bzhed pa bzhes shig ces brims te brim pa'i thabs 'og nas 'chad/_bskos pas so/_/lhung bzed 'drim pa'i
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dge slong zhag gcig gi sngon logs su dge 'dun gyis [#]gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bsko'o/_/sang dge 'dun 'dus shing bya na des 'di brjod do/_/dge 'dun gyis las su bskos pa'i dge slong des dge 'dun rnams la sang [#]bdag gis lhung bzed 'drim
[\[110a.2\]]gyis dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shig ces mdo 'og nas 'byung ba skad du bsgo zhing bsnyad/_sang bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa lhung bzed lhan pa med pa brim gyis [#]khyed rnams bdag bdag gi lhung bzed thogs te dge 'dun gyi nang du shog [#]shig ces so/_/las su bskos pa'i dge slong
[\[110a.3\]]gis zhag gcig gi [#]sngon logs su dge 'dun rnams 'dus shig par tshig [#]'di rnams gus par byas te brjod/_'khod pa'i phyir nan tan bya/_lhung bzed 'drim pa'i dge 'dun 'du ba'i sar las pa'i dge slong gis bstan [#]gding ba dang maN+Dal dang byi dor la sogs pa bya zhing gaN+DI [#]brdung ngo /_/
[\[110a.4\]]'dod pa bskyed par brtsams nas 'bul/_las pa'i dge slong des spang ba'i ltung ba byung ba dge 'dun gyi 'dab tu thal mo sbyar te bzhag la lhung bzed 'di su bzhed ces mdo 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig skad du dge 'dun la dad par bya zhing [#]bstan to/_/kye gnas brtan lhung bzed 'di
[\[110a.5\]]las pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed 'drim pa'i tshe gnas brtan [#]nas mgo bzung ste 'jug [#]tu phyin gyi bar du btsun pa tshe [#]dang ldan pa'am so so'i mtshan nas brjod de tshig 'og nas 'byung [#]skad bya/_gsal ba/_tshon gsal zhing gdong pa ltar snang ba lta bu la bya/_tshad ma che chung du ma
[\[110a.6\]]gyur cing bsngor rung ba dang bzang po [#]la bya/_spyad du bzod kyis ma rdol la ma gas pa'i lhung bzed bzang po spyad [#]du bzod pa la bya/_'on te bzhed na bzhes shig ces so/_/gong ma ltar brjod de gnas brtan man chad su bzhed pa bzhes shig ces las pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun
[\[110a.7\]]la gsol/_ci bzhin pa'i yon tan gyis so/_/steng ma ltar brjod pa ni lhung bzed la yon tan med pa la bzang ngo zhes brjod pa ni ma yin gyi lhung bzed nyid kyi yon tan ci bzhin drang por brjod pa la bya/_'dod pas blang /_spang ba'i lhung bzed gnas brtan man chad kyis bdag gi [#]lhung
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]bzed dang brje bar dad na ni brje ba dag gi lhung bzed bzang ste brje bar ma dad dam chog [#]shes pa zhig [#]ste lhung bzed ma brjes kyang nyes med/_blangs pa dang bar du chod pa la mi bslang [#]/_lhung bzed spang ba [#]de sngar gnas brtan gyis mi 'dod ces byas te btang la mi gnyis gsum
[\[110b.2\]]'das te dang 'dod kyis byin cig ces smras na gnas brtan la [#]nyes byas te byi shu tas bshad/_gnas brtan gyis bdag gi lhung bzed pas ngan tam [#]mi 'dod ces byas te btang ba las bdag gi 'og na 'jug [#]pas blangs na dang 'dod kyis slar 'on cig ces [#]blangs na'ang nyes
[\[110b.3\]]byas slong ba'i tshe'ang nyes byas zhes byi tsa ya bar mas bshad/_tshig lan gnyis la mi sbyin 'das na ma yin no/_/mdo gong ma ltar gnas brtan gyis mi 'dod ces byas te btang ba las nga 'dod kyis slar 'on cig ces slong na lan gnyis kyi bar du mi sbyin lan gsum du slong
[\[110b.4\]]ba'i tshe sbyin no/_/ma byin dang nyes ni med de gnas brtan dbang che bas ma byin na gnas brtan dang dge 'dun 'khrug pa'i phyir sbyin no/_/ma btang ma bsngos shig ces 'byung ba la bsgos[#]/_dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed ngan pa dge slong spang ba 'byung ba de la sbyin pa sbyin du'ang mi
[\[110b.5\]]gnang bdag gis [#]bsngo ba'i sngags kyis 'debs su'ang mi gnang ngo zhes dge 'dun gyis bsgo ste bcings pa'i lhung bzed ces bya/_spyod na ma chag gi bar du dal gyis [#]dal gyis so/_/dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed ngan pa dge slong spang ba byung ba la byin pa dge slong des mig bzhin du bsrung
[\[110b.6\]]ste nam spyad du rung gi bar du spyad/_ji ltar spyad pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_'dis gnyis kyang [#]spyad/_dge 'dun gyis byin pa'i lhung bzed ngan pa de dang bdag gis bsngos pa'i lhung bzed gnyis bsod snyoms su 'gro ba la sogs te spyad cing bya'o cog [#]tu gnyis ka spyad/_'di rab
[\[110b.7\]]tu dge ba'i yo byad du gzhug_/dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed ngan pa snod kyang bzang por gzhug gnas kyang brtan pa la gzhag [#]dbyung ba'am gzhug pa'i tshe'ang nan tan du mi snang bar bya/_de la bya ba rab tu chung par ro/_/bsod snyoms blang pa'i tshe dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed ngan
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]par 'o ma dang phye la sogs pa lhung bzed la mi gnod pa'i [#]rnams gzhug_/bkru ba'i tshe'ang dge 'dun gyi [#]lhung bzed sngar 'jam pos bkru zhing phyi/_skyur bo la sogs pa lhung bzed la gnod pa dag ni bdag gis [#]bsngos par gzhug_/der bza' ba mi bya/_
[\[111a.2\]]dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed ngan par kha zas mi bza' bar kha zas bzang po rnams gzhag la bdag gi lhung bzed [#]ngan pa'i nang nas blangs te [#]bza'/_rnam pa 'di rnams ltar bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi lhung bzed ngan pa mi dengs pa dang /_yun ring du thub par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/lhung
[\[111a.3\]]bzed 'tshol [#]ba'i spang ba'o/_/lhung bzed 'tshol ba'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'di man 'chad 'thag pa'i spang ba la 'chad do/_/[#]rin med par slong ba gzhan las 'thag pa yang ngo /_/bdag gis [#]gos kyi rgyu dru bu lta bu
[\[111a.4\]]blangs te bdag nyid kyis bcol kyang rung gzhan la spring ste 'thag tu bcol kyang rung yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te gnyen ma yin pa dang khyim pa ma [#]yin pa dang tha ga pa yin pa dang rin med par bcol ba ste 'di bzhi dang ldan na spang bar 'gyur/_bdag
[\[111a.5\]]gis [#]gla byin te 'thag tu bcug pa ni nyes med/_yan lag 'di bzhi gcig dang mi ldan na nyes byas/_gzhan dang lhan cig tu na mi byed pa ma yin/_dge slong gis gnyen ma yin pa gos [#]'thag tu bcol ba las bdag gi gnyen gyis grogs byas te zin kyang spang ba'i ltung
[\[111a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_'thag pa'i ltung ba'o/_/'thag pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'thag pa'i spang ba 'og ma la 'chad de/_de'i phyir 'thag pa las so/_/dge sbyong dang dge sbyong ma'i phyir 'thag tu bcug pa las spang ba'i
[\[111a.7\]]ltung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi dge slong dang dge slong ma'i phyir 'thag tu bcug pa las spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_bskyed cing 'thag tu gzhug par ram bzang por na'o/_/dge slong gi phyir gnyen ma yin pa'i khyim bdag pos tha ga [#]ma la gos 'thag tu bcol ba las bran mos u
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ba nan ta la khyod kyi phyir nga'i jo bos gos 'thag tu bcol lo [#]zhes bsgo ba dang dge slong gis tha ga ma la gos 'di nga'i phyir gyis gos srid ring ba dang zheng che ba dang /_sdug cing bzang por gyis shig dang bza' ba'am brgyags [#]zong zhig sbyin no zhes byas te bskyed pa las bcas
[\[111b.2\]]te yan lag gcig_/yon bdag kyang gnyen ma yin tha ga [#]pa yang gnyen ma yin na spang bar 'gyur/_gnyis ka gnyen yin na nyes med/_gcig gnyen yin gcig gnyen ma yin na nyes byas/_'on te sbyin bdag gi zad na/_yon bdag gis dge slong gi phyir
[\[111b.3\]]tha ga ma [#]la gos 'thag tu bcol ba las dge slong gis chu dang zheng bskyed cing 'thag tu bcug pa dang rgyu mchog ste yon bdag las lan gnyis lan gsum du tha ga mas blangs te [#]chu dang zheng cher byas pa dang yan lag gnyis/_rin mi ster ba yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar
[\[111b.4\]]tha ga [#]mas chu zheng cher byas te dge slong dang gre sbyar te dge slong gis khyer ba dang bdag mo dag sems 'khrug [#]te tha ga ma gla ma byin pa dang yan lag gsum sbyin bdag gis ma gnang ba de'i phyir byed do/_/sbyin bdag gis dge slong la khyod kyi phyir tha ga [#]ma che ge mo zhig la gos
[\[111b.5\]]bcol gyis ci dga' bar kha chos gyis shig ces bsgo ba las che zhing bzang bar byed du bcug pa ni nyes med de de ltar ma bsgos par [#]bdag rang gis 'og sbyar te che zhing bzang por byas pa las spang bar 'gyur te/_yan lag bzhi grub na rtsa ba'o/_/mdo gong ma bzhi [#]ltar byas
[\[111b.6\]]te gos zin nas lag tu thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag lnga'o[#]/_/sngar de'i phyir nan tan byed pa ni [#]so sor nyes byas pa'o/_/dge slong gis tha ga ma [#]la gos che zhing bzang du gyis shig par bsgo ba lan re la nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma sbran par
[\[111b.7\]]der song na'o/_/dge slong gis tha ga [#]ma la bzang du gyis shig ces [#]khar ni ma smras kyi myur du zin cing bzang bar bya bar re ba'i phyir lus kyis ston pa re re la nyes byas[#]/_byi shu tas ni tha ga [#]ma'i gan du song ste/_gos che chung dang ci ri ba tsam dang bzang ngan ci 'dra ba lta ba'i phyir
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]gzung [#]ba'i tshe nyes byas zhes bshad/_'thag pa bskyed pa'i ltung ba'o/_/gos 'thag pa bskyed pa'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//byin phrog gi spang ba la 'chad de/_dge slong dang phral na/_dge sbyong lta bu gos dang phral ba ni ma gtogs kyi dge slong pho mo
[\[112a.2\]]gos dang phral ba las spang bar gyur te yan lag gcig/_/bdag gi ma yin pa phrogs na/_dge slong u pa nan tas slob ma la g.yog tu bkri bar bya ba'i phyir chos gos byin te phyis phrogs pa las bcas/_bdag gi ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i sde dag las bdag gis [#]chos gos byin pa ma yin pa phrogs na'ang
[\[112a.3\]]spang ba'i yan lag tu gyur na bdag gis byin pa lta ci smos[#]/_mkhan po kha cig na re bdag gis byin pa nyid phrogs na spang ba zhes bshad de yan lag gnyis/_de gos na'o/_/slar phrogs pa de nyid gos yin pa dang yan lag gsum/_'dus pa'am/_dge slong gis lus dang ngag gnyis kas slar phrogs pa dang /_
[\[112a.4\]]tha dad pa'i lus dang ngag gis 'phrog pa'i phyir byas pa'i bskos pa la byed do/_/khas ma smras par lus kyis phrogs kyang rung lus kyis ma byas par tshig nan tur gyis phrogs kyang rung slob ma'am gzhan la 'phrog tu bcug kyang rung ste 'di rnams gang yang rung gcig dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag bzhi/_
[\[112a.5\]]mtha' ni lus dang tha dad du gyur zin na'o/_/dge slong gis gos byin pa de slar phrogs nas lus dang bral na spang ba'i yan lag tu gyur te 'di lnga dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/sbyor ba ni nyes byas pa'o/_/dge slong gis gos 'phrog par shom zhing bzung ba'am 'dren pa'i tshe lan re zhing nyes byas re re/_'di ni phyir sbyin pas
[\[112a.6\]]so/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin te slar phrogs pa spang bar gyur pa de gos gzhan spang ba dang mi 'dra'i gos de su las phrogs [#]pa de nyid la slar gtan spang ngo /_/de ltar ma spangs na spangs par mi chud do/_/'di bdag gi phyir na yan lag ma yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin pa dge slong grogs
[\[112a.7\]]shig 'phrog tu bcug na 'phrog tu [#]'jug pa'i dge slong spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_'phrogs [#]pa'i dge slong ltung bar 'gyur/_dge sbyong zhig 'phrog tu bcug na nyes byas khyim pa zhig 'phrog tu bcug na khyim pa la sdig tu 'gyur/_'di gsum gang gis phrogs kyang rung dge slong 'phrog tu bcug pa ni spang
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_rab tu ma rdzogs pa la ni bskrad pa bzhin no/_/dge slong gis dge sbyong la gos shig byin pa las phrogs na nyes byas te gos na dge sbyong la gtan spang ngo /_/dge slong gis gtsug lag khang nas dge slong bskrad na ltung bar 'gyur/_dge sbyong bskrad na
[\[112b.2\]]nyes byas/_dge sbyong gis dge sbyong bskrad na nyes byas/_dge sbyong gis dge slong la gos byin pa las phrogs na'ang nyes byas/_'phrog pa rnam gsum mo/_/gtar bzung ba dang rtsed mo dang gtan du phrogs pa gsum ste 'og nas 'chad/_bdag gis zhes pa gsal
[\[112b.3\]]ba'i 'phrog pa 'dir 'dus so/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin te g.yog tu bya ba'am las bcol ba'am grogs su bkri ba las ma btub ste gos slar phrogs pa lta bu ni [#]spang bar 'gyur/_ngas sems byed pa ni de'i spags pa'o/_/dge slong gis gos byin pa las
[\[112b.4\]]gtan dbrog pa ni ma yin gyi skad cig mi dga' bar bya ba'i phyir phrogs pa ni nyes byas so/_/gnod pa dang /_dge slong zhig yul rgyur 'gro ba lta bu la lam na mi rgod dam gcan gzan gyis gnod par 'gyur ba tsam las [#]ma btang ba dang /_don med par 'jug pa la/_dge
[\[112b.5\]]slong yul rgyur 'gro ba rten ngan pa dang 'grogs te chos log pa la lta ba'am dge slong gi tshul stor bar 'gyur ba tsam gyi tshod las ma [#]gtang ba dang /_bgegs byas pa'i phyir ltung ba med/_bdag gi slob ma'am dge slong grogs po gong ma rnams gnyis lta bu'i rkyen yod pa lta
[\[112b.6\]]bu mi gtong [#]ba'i phyir gos la sogs pa phrogs te gtar bzung ba ni nyes med dbrog pa'i spang ba'o/_/dbrog pa'i spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'di man chad zhag drug [#]gi spang ba la 'chad de/_bdag gi gnas dang 'dra ba'i gong du
[\[112b.7\]]'jigs pa yod na dgon pa bas chos gos gcig dang [#]/_dge slong dgon pa la gnas pa mi rgod la sogs pa la 'jigs pa'i rkyen yod na chos gos gsum gyi nang nas bzang po gcig khyim pa brtan po'i khyim du gzhog tu gnang ngo /_/bdag gi gnas dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i grong na
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]rnam pa gcig tu na mi stor ba'i khyim pa brtan po [#]la bya/_gcig tu sangs rgyas kyis phan par gsungs [#]pas rkyen byung na khyim pa'i gnas dang dgon pa gnyis 'dra'o zhes gnang ba la bya/_'gro ba [#]des de khyim gyi nang du bzhag [#]ste dgos pa'i phyir zhag drug
[\[113a.2\]]tu'o/_/dge slong dgon pa la 'dug pas mi rgod kyi rkyen yod na chos gos gcig khyim pa'i khyim du bzhag pa zhag drug gi bar du bdag dang bral kyang nyes med rkyen med na zhag bdun gyi skya rengs byung na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_rtag tu rkyen yod na tshul nas byung byung gi bar du
[\[113a.3\]]bral kyang nyes med/_dge slong dgon pa las gud du don gnyer du 'gro ste lam na mi rgod yod de phrogs kyis [#]dogs na chos gos gcig khyim pa'i khyim du bzhag ste zhag drug gi bar du 'gror [#]dbang ngo /_/lam na mi rgod [#]gcig gis chod de rkyen byung na zhag drug 'das kyang nyes med/_'das
[\[113a.4\]]par ni mi dbang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar zhag drug tu song ba las rkyen ma byung na zhag drug [#]las 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_nyes med pa ni [#]bar chad kyi dbang gis ma 'ongs na'o/_/gong ma ltar zhag drug [#]tu song ba las bar chad kyi rkyen mi rgod dam zam pa chad pa'am dgras chod
[\[113a.5\]]pa lta bu'i rkyen byung na zhag drug [#]'das kyang nyes med do/_/'di las phyi rol du zhag drug [#]las brtags te 'das na yan lag ma yin no/_/dge slong tshul du zhugs pa las don gnyer du 'gro ba ni zhag bdun pa'i sngags kyis btab ste song ba las zhag gcig gnyis kyis don bsgrub
[\[113a.6\]]par gyur kyang zhag bdun du gnang zhes zer zhing 'phyan du mi gnang gis don grub ma thag tu slar ma 'ongs na tshul zhig par 'gyur na/_dge slong dgon pa la [#]ni chos gos bzhag ste zhag [#]drug gi bar du don [#]gnyer du 'gro ba ni zhag gcig gis don grub kyang zhag drug tu ma 'ongs kyang nyes
[\[113a.7\]]med do/_/tshul ni [#]tshe'ang don gyi phyir 'gro ba dang lam [#]na 'jigs pa'i dbang dang yan lag 'di gsum dang ldan na zhag drug tu chos gos dang bral kyang nyes med do/_/zhag drug 'bral ba'i spang ba'o/_/zhag drug 'bral ba'i spang ba ste 'dul ba'i dris pa zhes bya ba'i nang nas
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]'byung ba'i mdo//_ras chen gyi spang ba la 'chad de/_bdag tshul du 'jug pa'i nyin mo nas zla ba snga ma'i dang po tshun chad dbyar gyi ras chen btsal tshul snga phyir gang du 'jug kyang rung ste tshul du 'jug pa'i nyin mo nas zla ba gcig tshun chad dbyar gyi ras chen btsal kyang nyes
[\[113b.2\]]med/_bdag gis [#]dbyar 'das nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang /_tshul snga phyi [#]gang du zhugs kyang rung ste tshul nas byung nas zhag bco lnga'i bar du dbyar gyi [#]ras chen bcangs kyang nyes med/_de las snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus su na byed do/_/tshul du 'jug pa'i nyin mo nas zla ba gcig
[\[113b.3\]]gi snga rol du dbyar gyi [#]ras chen 'tshal tam tshul [#]nas zla ba phyed las 'das par bcangs na [#]spang ba'i ltung ba'o [#]zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_tshul du 'jug pa'i nyin mo nas zla ba gcig gi snga rol du ras chen btsal na nyes byas/_tshul nas byung nas zla ba phyed las 'das
[\[113b.4\]]par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung ba'o zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_gzhan du na bcas [#]pa'o/_/dbyar gyi ras chen tshul nas byung ste zla ba phyed kyi bar bcad du gnang ngo /_/de las zhag gcig 'das na'ang spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_sngar btsal na [#]nyes pa'o/_/tshul du
[\[113b.5\]]zhugs pa'i nyin mo nas zla ba gcig gi sngon logs su ras chen btsal na btsal ba'i tshe nyes byas/_yang [#]ba dang lci ba tha dad du mkhan po gnyis [#]bshad/_grub na tha ma'i'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar btsal te lag tu thob na nyes byas lci bar 'gyur [#]ba dang /_ltung bar 'gyur
[\[113b.6\]]ba so sor bshad/_'bri ba ni zad na'o/_/zla ba gcig gi sngon logs su dbyar gyi ras chen btsal te rnying pa [#]ngan pa zhig rnyed na nyes byas yang [#]ba'o/_/ji ltar tshul du zhugs pa de'i rjes su 'gro'o/_/dge slong tshul rnam gnyis gag tu zhugs kyang rung ste cho ga gzhan ni 'dra
[\[113b.7\]]chos gos 'drub [#]cing yon tan bcu ni tshul snga mar zhugs pas 'thob bo/_/dbyar gyi ras chen gyi spang ba'o/_/dbyar gyi ras chen gyi [#]spang ba 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//ring ba'i [#]spang ba la 'chad de/_dbyar gyi phyir rnyed pa ni byed do/_/dge
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]slong dbyar tshul na 'dug pa'i tshe yon bdag yon [#]nar mar 'bul ba las spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te ji ltar 'gyur ba ni 'og nas 'chad de/_tshul gyi tshe las nyes par 'gyur ro/_/dbyar gyi bar du bdag gir byas pa'o/_/dge slong dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i
[\[114a.2\]]tshe yon bdag gis yon nar mar 'bul ba blangs pa las spang bar 'gyur te/_ring ba'i [#]dbang gis ni tha ma'i zhag bcu na rnyed pa ma gtogs so/_/dge slong dbyar tshul na 'dug pa'i tshe yon bdag gis [#]yon nar mar 'bul ba len du mi dbang ba lam ming gis smos pa'i rkyen
[\[114a.3\]]rnams gang yod kyang rung ste blangs kyang nyes med de nad pa bdag gis phul ba dang [#]shi la thug pa zhig rang gi lag nas 'bul ba shi ba'i 'og tu gnyen gyis phul ba dang dmag gam lam ring por 'gro bas phul na'o/_/de 'god pa las kyang ngo /_/mdo steng ma ltar yon phul ba las tshul
[\[114a.4\]]nas ma byung bar so sor bgos na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_ma bgos [#]pa las kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma yang ltag ma [#]ltar yon phul ba las [#]tshul nas byung ba'i nyin mo ma bgos par phyi de nyin skya rengs byung na spang bar 'gyur/_med par sbyin bdag gis smras pa'i dbang na'o/_/mdo
[\[114a.5\]]ltag ma ltar tshul nas byung ma thag tu bgo ba'i rigs pa las yon bdag yon 'bul ba na re kho bo gang [#]zhig tu don gnyer du 'gro ste ma 'ongs kyi bar du ma bgo [#]shig ces zer na yon bdag gi tshig bzhin du ma bgos kyang nyes med/_byung nas de ma thag gi nub mo rub ma pa ma bsngos [#]
[\[114a.6\]]na yang ngo /_/dge 'dun tshul nas byung nas [#]gong ma ltar yon phul ba bgo ba'i rigs pa las yon bdag gi tshig bzhin du bzhag pa la rub ma pa gcig ma bskos par bzhag na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_'di mi bsko ba ma yin/_yon bdag gis [#]gong ma ltar nor phul ba'i rub ma pa
[\[114a.7\]]dge 'dun gyis kyang ma bskos na dge 'dun kun nyes byas/_ring pa'i [#]spang ba'o/_/ring pa'i [#]spang ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//bsngos pa'i spang ba la 'chad de/_dge 'dun nam gang zag gzhan gyis brtags pa'i gos shes pa las bdag
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]gis [#]bsngos te thob na'o/_/yon bdag gcig gis dge 'dun nam gang zag la gos shig sbyin par brtags te 'bul du 'ongs pa la [#]dge slong gcig gis bdag gi [#]yon tan bsngags te khyer na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag lnga ste dge 'dun nam gang zag dag [#]de la sbyin
[\[114b.2\]]par brtags pa dang de la sbyin par [#]bdag gis shes pa dang dngos po gang [#]yin pa dang bdag gis bsngos te thob pa dang yan lag 'di lnga dang ldan par byas na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsngos pa ni nyes byas pa'o/_/yon bdag gis [#]dge 'dun nam gang zag la sbyin par bsngos
[\[114b.3\]]par shes bzhin du bdag gir bsngar [#]ba'i tshe nyes byas gzhan yang 'dir ro/_/yon bdag gis dge 'dun nam gang zag la bsngos pa'i gos dge slong gcig gis de la ma sbyin par dge 'dun nam gang zag 'di la byin [#]cig ces bsgo ba'i tshe nyes byas yang pa/_de'i 'bras bu yang ngo /_/
[\[114b.4\]]mdo ltag ma ltar gzhan la byin cig ces bsgo ba de'i lag tu gos thob na nyes byas lci ba'o/_/gzhan yang ngo /_/yon bdag gis dge 'dun nam gang zag la kha zas zhig 'bul bar bsngos pa las gzhan gyi dge 'dun nam gang zag la byin [#]ces bsgo na nyes byas mi ma yin gyi khang
[\[114b.5\]]pa nyid la bsngos pa'i rdzas la bya/_sems can du mi bgrang ba [#]yang ngo /_/khang bu gcig gi rkyen gcig tu bcug pa [#]la bya/_phral zhing sprad pas [#]so/_/yon bdag gis khang bu brtsigs te khang bu so so'i nang du rkyen mal stan la sogs pa bshams [#]te bsngos pa las khang bu
[\[114b.6\]]gzhan gyi rkyen du bsnor na tshus 'byin tshe nyes byas gcig_/pha rol tu bcug pa'i tshe'ang nyes byas gcig go/_/phyogs gcig gi yang ngo /_/yon bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten gyi ngos gcig la tshon gyis byugs [#]pa'am bcos pa'i rgyu zhig tu rdzas
[\[114b.7\]]bsngos pa phyogs bsnor na tshus po'i tshe nyes byas/_pha rol tu spyod pa'i tshe'ang nyes byas so/_/ltung ba med pa ni btsal nas ma rnyed na lhag ma za ba phyugs la sogs pa'i'o/_/dge slong kha zas bza' ba'i tshe sgo [#]na mi'am phyugs la [#]sbyin par bsngos pa las ma btsal bar
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]gzhan la byin na nyes byas btsal te ma rnyed na gzhan la sbyin [#]pa ni nyes med do/_/brtags pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan dag bslangs nas byin pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gcig la rgyan mang du mnga' ba las/_gtsug lag khang
[\[115a.2\]]de'am gzhan gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la ya te byed pa'i tshe brgyan pa brnyar byin pa la nyes med/_nyes byas pa ni bsngos nas ma byin pa'o/_/gser dngul dang gos lta bu gzhan sbyin par bsngos pa las phyis ma byin na nyes byas/_phyi'i mtshams su song ste dge 'dun phyir
[\[115a.3\]]bsngos pa la'o[#]/_/dge 'dun gyi spyir dbang ba'i nor [#]lta bu las dge slong bzhi yan chad kyis kha brngam bya ste mtshams kyi phyi rol du nged kyang dge 'dun gyis bgos kyang nyes par mi 'gyur zhes bgos na nyes byas/_so sor lag tu thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur zhes byi shu
[\[115a.4\]]tas bshad/_dge slong shi ba'i nor rdzas zhig dge 'dun dbang ba las sngags kyis ma btab [#]par bgos na nyes byas/_mtshams kyi phyi rol tu sngags kyis btab [#]na'ang nyes byas/_phyi rol du bgos pa re re nyes byas re re/_dge 'dun gyis gang zag mtshams kyi phyi rol du
[\[115a.5\]]bgor btang na dge 'dun thams cad nyes byas zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_brel bas 'god pa yang ngo /_/yon bdag gcig gis dge 'dun spyir yon phul ba la de'i nang nas dge slong gnyis gsum zhig gud du don gnyer du song ste de'i 'og tu bgos na nyes byas gud du song
[\[115a.6\]]ba'i dge slong na re ci bder gos la nga'i skal ba byin ces bsgo ste bgos pa na nyes med/_ma bsngos pa yang ngo /_/dge slong shi ba'i nor 'god pa'i tshe sngar sngags kyis ma btab par bgos na nyes byas zhes byi dza ya [#]bar mas bshad/_shi ba'i nor 'god pa'i tshe gnas brtan
[\[115a.7\]]dang tshe lu tha ma la nor sna re zhig ma byin par bgos na nyes byas zhes byi shu tas bshad/_dge 'dun las gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'thob pa thob [#]nas blangs pa'o/_/gtsug lag khang gcig tu yon bdag gis dge 'dun la yon phul ba gtsug lag khang de na dge
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]slong gnyis sam gsum zhig 'dug ste dge 'dun du [#]ma tshang na yon de gang zag de rnams dbang ste sngar ma bsngos par nor rdzas de bgos [#]na nyes byas/_rnam pa gcig tu na dge 'dun nyi shu tsam zhig 'dug pa las gzhan yan man du don gnyer du song [#]ba'i 'og tu yon bdag gis spyir
[\[115b.2\]]phul ba gang zag gnyis sam gsum 'dug pas bgos na nyes byas/_de pham par mi 'gyur ba ni yon bdag gi sems kyis kyang btang dge slong grogs kyis [#]kyang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/'di las gzhan yang skal ba mi gcod do/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spyir phul
[\[115b.3\]]bas dge 'dun yan man du song bas [#]skal ba dbang ngo zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_shi ba'i nor sngags kyis ma btab na phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang /_sngags kyis btab na mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun dbang ste [#]mtshams gcig gi dge slong ni yang skal pa mi gcod [#]do
[\[115b.4\]]zhes byi shu tas bshad/_rku sems kyis na brkus pa bzhin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge 'dun la yon phul ba gang zag la 'god pa'i tshe dge 'dun grogs 'ong bar dogs pa'i phyir/_rku sems kyis [#]bgos na rin thang las pham par 'gyur/_rku sems kyis 'god pa'i tshe
[\[115b.5\]]nor 'ongs bar dge slong pha rol pos mi shes na sbom po/_byung byung du dgra'am gnon pa srog la dman pa'am byi [#]shu'i tshul stor ba ma byung gi bar du gtsug lag khang mi dor/_gtsug lag khang mi gnas par mi bya/_rgyal po'am mi rgod lta bus cung zad gtses pa'i phyir/_
[\[115b.6\]]gtsug lag khang bor te song na nyes byas/_de la 'dod pa dang bcas pa sbyin pa na bcol/_gtsug lag khang gcig [#]na dge 'dun mang zhig yon bdag gi 'tsho ba sbyar ba las yon bdag spyugs sam lam ring bor song ste dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba med na gang zag gang dad pa gcig
[\[115b.7\]]gam gnyis la gtsug lag khang gi yo byad gtad de gzhag_/ma 'ongs na lo bcur gnas/_mdo ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang srung [#]ba'i dge slong yon bdag ma 'ongs na lo bcur gnas shing 'dug shig_/sngar ni bsod snyoms [#]blang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar lo bcur
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gtsug lag khang du bzhag pa'i dge slong de 'tsho ba med na lo lngar ni bsod snyoms bslang [#]ngo /_/de'i dus na sbyin bdag ma byung na gzhan gtsug lag [#]khang gi 'khor dang lhan cig tu'o/_/lo lngar bsdad de yon [#]bdag ma 'ongs nas 'tsho bas mi sbyor [#]na gtsug lag
[\[116a.2\]]khang gang dang nye ba'i dge 'dun dang yon thun mong du bya ste lo lnga'i bar du de las 'tsho bar bya'o/_/rnyed pa gcig la gso sbyin tha dad pa'i las bya'o/_/lo bcur gnas pa'i dge slong lo lngar dge 'dun gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang dang 'tsho ba thun mong du sbyor ba'i tshe 'tsho ba ni
[\[116a.3\]]dge 'dun dang thun mong du bya/_mchod [#]pa dang gso sbyin ni bdag gi gtsug lag khang du byas te ras kyis [#]'tsho ba dang chos kyis 'tsho ba ni gso sbyin byed pa'o/_/gtong na gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du dngos po rnams zhog shig_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge slong
[\[116a.4\]]lo bcur gnas te yon bdag ma 'ongs te gud du 'gro na gtsug lag khang dang nye ba'i dge 'dun la sku gzugs dang yo byad thams cad brtsis te gnas na byin cig_/mdo ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang bor ba las dge 'dun slar 'dus na yo byad gtams pa'i rnams dge 'dun gyi
[\[116a.5\]]yo byad tshang bar slar byin cig_/gnas dag gi nor gnas dag tu ma byin cig_/gtsug lag khang gcig gi rkyen yul gru'am nor rdzas gtsug lag khang de'i rkyen du bsngos pa gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi rkyen du mi bsngo'o zhes byi dza ya bar ma [#]bshad/_gtsug lag khang stong pa'i
[\[116a.6\]]rdzas nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang du gtams pa dge slong slar 'dus na sngon ci gtams pa de nyid slar sbyin gyi bsnor cing mi sbyin no zhes byi shu tas bshad/_de ma rnyed na byin du chugs shig_/yon bdag dang dge 'dun slar 'dus te gtsug lag khang gi yo byad gtams pa [#]
[\[116a.7\]]slar ma bskyal na thog mar gdams [#]pa'i dge slong gis slong la slar phul cig_/khyim bdag gis bsgos pa de las mi 'gal/_yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang so sor rkyen phul ba las nang mi bsnor ston [#]mos 'dres pa tsam ni ma gtogs so/_/bsnor na nyes byas/_ma byin
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]na mthus blang gtsug lag khang gzhan du nor gtams pa ltag ma ltar bslangs te ma ster na mthus phrogs te blangs kyang nyes med/_rnyed na sbyin gtsug lag khang nang mal stan nam snod spyad lta bu gcig la gcig brten pa la byin na nyes med/_nyes med pa ni [#]mchod rten dag
[\[116b.2\]]gir [#]bsngos pa ma grub nas [#]bsngos pa'o/_/bdag gis gdugs sam [#]'phan lta bu mchod rten 'di la 'bul lo zhes bsngos pa las rkyen cig 'byung ste nye 'khor gyi mchod rten gzhan la phul kyang nyes med/_byang chub chen po dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang cho 'phrul chen po dang lha
[\[116b.3\]]las bab [#]pa ma gtogs te gzhan no/_/mchod rten 'di bzhi la yon 'bul bar bsngos pa zhig las mchod rten gzhan la phul na nyes byas/_mchod rten bzhi nang bsnor te phul ba ni nyes med/_bsngos pa'i spong ba'o/_/bsngos pa'i spong [#]ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i
[\[116b.4\]]nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'jog pa'i spang ba la 'chad de/_zhag bdun du bsngos pa las 'das na dge slong la bsgo shig_/sman zhag bdun du btags [#]te bza' ba'i tshe zhag re re lon zhing dge slong grogs po la dbang gzugs/_ma btsugs [#]na nyes byas te zhag bdun
[\[116b.5\]]pa'i sngags kyis btab pas yan lag gcig_/bza' ba'i phyir bcangs na'o/_/sngags btab ste bdag gis bza' ba'i phyir bcangs pa dang yan lag gnyis/_'di'o/_/dngos po kha zas rnam [#]bzhi gang yang rung yin pa dang yan lag gsum/_brgyad kyi skya rengs byung na'o/_/
[\[116b.6\]]kha zas rnam bzhi de zhag brgyad kyi skya rengs byung ba dang yan lag bzhi ste/_yan lag 'di [#]bzhi dang ldan na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/_zhag 'das pa'i zas ma brtags pa zos pa bzhin du 'dir 'di dag kyang gdags so/_/spags pa'i kha zas ma brtags pa zos na ltung bar
[\[116b.7\]]'gyur ba bzhin du sman zhag bdun pa yang zhag 'das na yang spang bar 'gyur/_gang du 'di'i phyir brtags pa de la ltung ba med do/_/mar dang shing mar dang sbrang rtsi dang khaN+Da brtags pa las/_zhag bdun 'das na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba la sbrang rtsi dang khaN+Da ni zhag 'das na
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]spong ngo /_/mar dang shing mar gnyis ni rka lag bsku ba'i phyir bsngos te bzhag na spang mi dgos te ltung ba mthol bas tshangs so/_/brtags pa ni sna'i dang bsku ba bsngos pa'o/_/yon bdag gcig gis mar dang shing mar zhig ci bder spyod cig ces dge slong
[\[117a.2\]]la yon du phul ba las snar blugs pa dang rkang lag bsku ba'i phyir brtags te bzhag pa zhag 'das pa'am lhan cig 'grogs kyang nyes med de[#]/_zhag bdun gyi spang ba'o/_/zhag bdun pa'i spang ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//[#]
[\[117a.3\]]spang ba rdzogs so/_/[#]'di yan chad sum cu spang ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//'di man chad dgu bcu ltung ba la 'chad de/_chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bya/_chos ma yin par rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa rnams la bya/_shes kyang dge 'dun dang mngon sum du chos ma
[\[117a.4\]]yin par brjod na sbom po'i nyes pa'o/_/dge slong gis chos yin pa dang chos ma yin par shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du ma yin pa la [#]yin no zhes smras pa dang yin pa la ma yin zhes smras na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i dbyen gyi sbom por 'gyur/_brdzun la rnam pa lnga ste/_phas pham
[\[117a.5\]]pa'i brdzun dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i brdzun dang sbom po'i brdzun dang btung ba'i brdzun dang nyes byas kyi brdzun te/_sbom po'i brdzun ni mdo 'di nyid yin no[#]/_/gzhan ni 'og nas 'chad/_gso sbyin gyi tshe mi khyod 'di na kun gtsang ngam [#]zhes lan gsum gyi bar du dris na mi gtsang du
[\[117a.6\]]'du shes kyang mi smra bar 'das na nyes byas pa'o/_/gso sbyin gyi tshe so sor thar pa klog pas gud du [#]ltung ba med dam zhes lan gsum du dris na lhag ma man [#]chad nyes byas yan chad kyi ltung ba yod bzhin du ma mthol bar bcabs te [#]so sor thar pa bklags na nyes byas/_'di dag
[\[117a.7\]]kyang mdo gong ma gnyis la bya/_phas pham pa'i phas pham pa'i brdzun la bya/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dge 'dun gyi lhag ma sha ba dang skur ba'i brdzun la bya/_las gzhan pa brdzun gyi rnams ni'o/_/brdzun gong ma bzhi ma gtogs par gzhan shes bzhin du brdzun byas so cog gang
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]byas kyang ltung bar 'gyur/_smra bzhin na yang 'du [#]shes rnyed na ldang ngo /_/brdzun bya bar bsams te dngos po ma yin pa la yin par tshig mgo brtsams pa las rked bcad du bor te ma smras kyang ltung bar 'gyur te dper na kun 'di [#]la gser gyi zhes bya ba lta bu/_mna' [#]mi dor/_dge
[\[117b.2\]]slong gis mna' bor ba 'ba' zhig gi tshig ni bden gyi gzhan smras pa la yid mi ches pa'i phyir nyes byas/_brdzun smra ba'i ltung ba'o/_/brdzun smra ba'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//skyon du smra ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_dge slong ngo /_/dge
[\[117b.3\]]slong la sogs pa ni ma yin gyi dge slong la skyon nas bos na ltung ba ste yan lag gcig_/de ma theg pa'i yang ngo /_/_'og nas 'byung ba phra ma yang dge slong la byas pas ltung bar 'gyur te dge sbyong dang skye [#]bos smras pa ni mi ltung ngo /_/skyon nas skyon kyang yin pa dang yan lag
[\[117b.4\]]gnyis/_'bod par 'dod pa/_skyon nas kyang bos pa dang yan lag gsum ste 'di [#]gsum dang ldan par dge slong la smras shing bos [#]na ltung /_'jam pa'am/_tshig 'jam pos nyon mongs skyon 'di lta bu yod ces smras na'ang ltung /_rtsub po gshe ba'i tshig tu drag por skyon nas
[\[117b.5\]]bos na'ang ltung /_gang ci la yang dam pa ma yin par bsams shing smra na/_dge slong gis pha rol la lus kyi skyon zhar ba'am mdze can la sogs pa'am yid kyi skyon me'am sbrul gdug dang 'dra zhes byas pa dang rigs kyi skyon phyag dar ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu yin no zhes smras
[\[117b.6\]]na ltung /_ming ma yin pa dang ming skyon du 'gyur ba las bos na ltung /_mi dga' ba ma skyes kyang ngo /_/dge slong gi dge 'dun [#]la mdo ltag ma ltar skyon nas bos na khros kyang rung ltung bar 'gyur/_gzhan dge slong [#]dang khyim pa la skyon ltag pa'i [#]ltar smras na nyes byas/_rgyal
[\[117b.7\]]rigs dang bram ze la sogs pa ni nyes byas pa'o/_/dge slong la rgyal rigs lta bu rigs btsun pa ma yin pa la gneng [#]gtsong gi tshul du yin no zhes smras [#]na nyes byas zhes byi shu tas bshad/_khyod rgyal rigs la sogs pa btsun pa'i tshul bor te ci'i phyir na [#]thar par zhugs zhes
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]smras na nyes byas zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad skyon nas 'bod pa'o/_/skyon nas 'bod pa'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//phra ma'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_phra ma 'dod pas che ge mo zhig smra'o zhes smra na'o/_/pha
[\[118a.2\]]rol dge slong gnyis 'thab pa'am dbye bar bya ba'i phyir khyod la 'di skad zer ro zhes [#]zer zhing phan tshun du tshig bskyal na ltung bar 'gyur te dngos phra ma yin pa dang pha rol la smras pa dang yan lag gnyis dge sbyong dang khyim pa gnyis la phra ma byas na nyes byas/_'on te ming
[\[118a.3\]]nas na yang ngo /_/dge sbyong dang khyim pa'i ming ni ma yin gyi dge slong 'di khyod la [#]'di skad zer ro zhes smras na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gsum/_de dge slong na'o/_/pha rol du gnas [#]pa'i dge slong de nyid tshul khrims ma nyams pa la smras te yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na
[\[118a.4\]]ltung /_tshul dang mi ldan pa la [#]ldan par bsams te smras na'ang ltung gzhan la na [#]nyes byas pa'o/_/yan lag 'di bzhi dang mi ldan par smras na nyes byas zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_dge slong 'di 'di skad zer ro zhes ming nas ma phyung bar smras na nyes byas zhes byi shu tas
[\[118a.5\]]bshad/_phra ma'o/_/phra ma'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//spyos [#]pa la 'chad de/_'ab+hid/_shes bzhin du byas na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/dge 'dun gyi [#]yang dag par zhi ba'o/_/dge slong gnyis shig 'thab [#]pa las dge 'dun
[\[118a.6\]]gyis zhi bar byas pa las dge slong gcig gis slar 'thab pa'i rigs so zhes 'thab tu bcug pa las brgya rtsa gcig gang yang rung ste dge 'dun gyis las byas te zhi ba las nyes par 'gyur te yan lag gnyis/_dge slong dag gis glengs pa'o/_/dge slong gnyis chos kyi phyir rtsod pa
[\[118a.7\]]las bdag gis glengs pa las 'gyur te yan lag gsum/_spyos [#]na'o/_/mdo ltag ma'i [#]ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas pa las zhi ba'i mi rigs kyis da rung rtsod pa'i rigs so zhes dge 'dun gyi las spyos [#]te yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na ltung ba'o/_/'khod pas dge 'dun [#]
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]las byed pa'i nang na bdag 'dug ste [#]rgyus shes pa dang /_las byas pa dang bdag gis gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byed byed de rgyus shes pa dang /_dad pa byin pa la rtsa [#]ba'o/_/bdag gis dad pa byin pa dang rtsis mgo 'di rnams dang ldan par gang byas kyang rung ste ltung bar 'gyur/_
[\[118b.2\]]nyes byas pa ni 'ongs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis las byas pa la dge slong zhig phyis 'ongs te las 'di byas pa ma legs so zhes smras na nyes byas/_lta ba la brjod pa yang ngo /_/dge slong gral na 'dug pas dge 'dun gyi [#]las byas pa la mi rung pa skad du tshig 'jong rnyol [#]du smras na'ang
[\[118b.3\]]nyes byas/_de bzhin du [#]gleng bar 'du shes na gleng ba dag kyang ngo /_/dge slong gnyis shig rtsod de ltag tu dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas pa las zhi bar byas pa'i [#]gleng de ni ma bslang gi gleng gzhan zhig gis 'thab par 'gyur ba'i gcugs [#]shig las gleng bslang ste rtsod du bcug pa'ang
[\[118b.4\]]ltung /_dge 'dun gyis las brgya rtsa gcig lta bu gang yang rung ba [#]zhi ba'am chad par byas pa las de nyid spyos [#]kyang rung gzhan du spyos [#]te bsnor kyang rung ltung ngo /_/las kyi 'bras bur gyur pa la de ma yin zhes brjod na phyed do/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong lhag mar gyur pa zhig
[\[118b.5\]]chad par [#]byed du bcug pa zhag bcu tsam byas pa la dge slong cig na re chad par byed pa de la khyod kyis chad pa'i las byas pa 'di ma yin gyis gzhan byed du bcug go zhes spyos [#]pa'i tshe nyes byas/_las brgya rtsa gcig kun de dang 'dra/_spyos pa'o/_/spyos [#]pa'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par
[\[118b.6\]]'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//bud med la chos 'chad pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_chos 'chad pa'o/_/bud med brda phrad pa la chos bshad pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/tshig drug las lhag par ro/_/sgo drug las lhag par bshad na ltung bar 'gyur
[\[118b.7\]]te yan lag gnyis/_lhag par shes na'o/_/bdag gi [#]tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par smras par shes na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gsum dang ldan na ltung ba'o/_/lnga po tshig lnga las brtsams pa'o/_/phung po lnga bshad pa las drug tu rtsom pa'i tshe nyes byas/_drug tu
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]smras na ltung /_sgo drug mi rtag go zhes bshad pa las tshig bdun du rtsom pa'i tshe nyes byas tshig bdun du smras na ltung ba'o/_/mkhas pas ma byas pa ni lan kun dris pa dang /_mdo ltag ma ltar phung po dang skye [#]mched bshad pa las bud med mkhas pas 'di
[\[119a.2\]]yan lag thabs ji lta bu yin zhes des bye brag tu dris pa las yan lag zhib [#]tu bshad kyang nyes med kha don dang [#]bud med kha don [#]'bul ba la kha don [#]mnod pa dang dbog pa'i tshig drug las lhag par smras kyang nyes med/_kun dri ba dang /_sngon chad chos bshad de bud med kyis brjed ba slar
[\[119a.3\]]'dri [#]na tshig drug las lhag par smras te bstan pa'ang [#]nyes med/_nye bar gnas pa byin pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum [#]la skyabs su 'gro ba dang khrims pa'ang [#]tshig drug las lhag par smras kyang nyes med/_kun dri ba dang [#]byin pa'i chags pa'o/_/yon bdag gi [#]dge slong bshos
[\[119a.4\]]gsol ba'i tshe tshig drug las lhag par tshigs bcad smras kyang nyes med/_gnas spangs nas [#]snga ma'i ma yin no/_/bud med la chos 'chad pa tshig bzhi'am lnga tsam man chad smras te sa spos [#]shing bshad pa ni nyes med/_tshig grangs las 'das par smras te sa spos pa ni ltung bar
[\[119a.5\]]'gyur/_'chad pa'o/_/'chad pa'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//klog pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang mnyam pa'am/_'brang bar 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ste/_smras pa chos sam yi ge na'o/_/dge slong gnyis mgrin pa
[\[119a.6\]]bsgril zhing smras pa ni ma gtogs te dge sbyong ngam khyim pa lta bu zhig dang rnam pa 'di rnams gang dang yang rung ste sha lo ka [#]gcig yan chad mid pa bsgril zhing smra na ltung bar 'gyur/_mi 'dod par 'grub pa ma gtogs so/_/kha thon zhu ba la sogs pa dge slong gis smras pa'i rjes
