[\[119a.7\]]bzhin dge sbyong ngam khyim pa zhig lce [#]bde zhing tshig myur bas bdag smras pa'i tshig [#]non te bsgril zhing smras kyang lhan cig smra bar ma dad na nyes [#]med/_mnyan du yod pa na u da'i [#]yi ge phal [#]mo che dang lhan cig tu klag cor [#]cher zer zhing mid pa bsgril ba las bcas/_lhogs shig pa
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]yang bstan te'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge sbyong ngam khyim pa'i tshig myur bar smra ba la nga'i [#]tshig smra ba ma zin par ma smra shig ces lan gnyis gsum du bstan cing bsgo 'ang rang bzhin du gyur te tshig myur nas mnyam du smras pa'ang nyes med/_kha don [#]dang kha don [#]slos pa'i skabs skabs
[\[119b.2\]]su tshig bsgril zhing smras pa'ang nyes med/_slos pa dang kha don [#]'bul ba'i tshe brjed dam nor te bstan par slos pa la [#]bsgril te smras pa nyes med/_kun 'dri ba'o/_/dge sbyong gis dris pa la le'u dang don 'di lta bu yin no zhes bsgo ba la mnyam du slos shing smra ba ni nyes med/_klog
[\[119b.3\]]pa'o/_/klog [#]pa'i ltung ba ste 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//nyes smos la 'chad de bsko'o/_/[#]sdig pa'i dge slong pha dang dge slong ma rigs su bsko'o/_/mnyan du yod pa na dge slong a ri sh+ta dang dge slong ma sa ra la gnyis shug tu 'dus nas rigs sun pa spyod
[\[119b.4\]]pa la yul de'i grong mi na re sha ra man de'i slob ma 'di ltar rigs sun cing mi tshangs par spyod pa la nged dang mi 'dra ba med kyis 'di dag la bsti stang dang bsod snyoms la sogs pa'ang mi sbyin no zhes dam bcas te/_dge slong yon tan dang ldan pa kha cig slong ba la'ang bsod snyoms
[\[119b.5\]]ma ster ba gtam rim pa nas sangs rgyas kyis gsan te dge slong gcig gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las gnyis kyis dge slong pha dang dge slong ma 'di gnyis dang dge 'dun phal cher [#]phyogs mi ste [#]'dra'o zhes rigs su bsgo shig par bsgo ba la bya/_nyon cig tshe dang ldan pa/_bskos
[\[119b.6\]]pa'i dge slong gis khyim pa pho smos la rigs sun pa'i ming nas smos te 'og ma'i tshig bsgo ba la bya/_'gyur ba ni rigs su [#]rigs sun pa dang rab 'byung gnas su rab 'byung gnas sun pa 'di lta ste 'grub pa'i 'bras kyi zhing du ser ba drag po'i 'khor lo bab pa de'i phyir 'bras
[\[119b.7\]]de kha btags pa'i phyir ma rung par bya ba'i phyir mi rigs par chud gzan pa dang 'grub pa'i bu ram shing gi zhing btsod [#]'dra ba zhes bya ba'i nad kyi rigs byung nas de'i phyir bu ram shing de nyid kha gdags pa'i phyir ma rung bar bya ba'i phyir mi rigs par chud gzan pa'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]khyed dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa ma gzhal cig_/dge slong pha 'di dang dge slong ma 'di dag ni 'bru tshig pa bzhin mi skye ba ni chos te 'di'i 'dul ba'o/_/lto shig bcom ldan 'das dang gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis dge slong la'o zhes
[\[120a.2\]]rigs su rigs la bsgo ba smos shig_/mi mos na zhu ba byos shig_/dge slong bskos pa gong du bskor song song ba la dge slong a ri sh+tas khyod sgor 'gro na gsad [#]do zhes bsdigs pa dang grong du 'gro ma nus nas bdag gis rngo mi thogs so [#]zhes dad pa slar phul ba dang sangs rgyas kyis dge
[\[120a.3\]]'dun te [#]lnga la zhu ba byas te khyed rnams thams cad kyis dge slong a ri sh+tas [#]pho mo 'di gnyis dang gzhan dang tha dad par ltos shig par bsgo ba la bya 'ab+hid shes [#]bzhin pa la bya/_mi shes pa'i bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyan na'o/_/dge slong gis dge sbyong dang khyim pa gtam mthos shing
[\[120a.4\]]mi shes pa las[#]/_dge slong 'dis pham pa'am dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag mas byas so zhes [#]byas na ltung ba [#]ste dge sbyong ngam khyim pa de phas pham pa byung bar mi shes par smras pas yan lag gcig bsnyen par ma [#]rdzogs pa dang yan lag gnyis mnyan te [#]thos pa dang yan lag gsum/_bsgo
[\[120a.5\]]na'o/_/nyes pa nyid pha rol la bstan pa dang yan lag bzhi/_phas pham pa dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/_/mdo ltag tu bsgo zhes bya ba [#]ni phas pham pa dang [#]dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma bsgo ba la bya ste yan lag 'di lnga dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur/_bsko ba ma byas pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyis
[\[120a.6\]]grong du nyes pa sbom po smos shig par bsgos [#]pa ni ma gtogs te bdag gis nyes pa sbom po gzhan la smras na ltung /_dge 'dun la ma gsol na'o/_/dge 'dun sde lnga la gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis grong du bsgo shig par bskos pa ni nyes med/_de ltar ma bsgo bar smras pa ni ltung
[\[120a.7\]]bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal sbyin par smra ba'o/_/nyes smos kyi ltung ba ste 'dul ba bdun gyi gtsug lag khang ngam sangs rgyas kyi dri gtsang khang ngam tse ti zhig brtsig [#]na gang gis brtsig [#]cing las byed pa'i dge slong des shing gcod cing rnga ba'i zhal ta byed cing gcod du gzhug par
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]gnang ngo /_/ji lta bya ba'i thabs 'og nas 'chad pa yin no/_/zhag bdun brgyad kyi sngon logs su 'og tu dkyil 'khor dang dri bsung dang me tog dang pog dang me mar dang gtor ma byin la gsum brgyud blangs nas sbyin pa'i bshags pa bya ste gang lha shing 'di la gnas pa de gnas gzhan
[\[120b.2\]]du tshol cig shing 'di mchod rten gyi'am dge 'dun gyi bya bar 'gyur ro zhes shig pa'i tshig gis so/_/shing gang nas rnga ba'i sa der zhag bdun nam brgyad kyi sngon logs nas shing drung du dkyil 'khor dang dri bsung dang me tog dang me mar dang pog spos dang [#]mchod pa me mar dang
[\[120b.3\]]gtor ma la sogs pas mchod cing sbyin no/_/de nas dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i stot+t+ra [#]dang zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang zhi bar bya ba'i smon lam dang gsum brgyud [#]mar bklag go/_/de nas shing de la gnas pa'i lha de la shing byin cig ces pa'i phyir sbyin
[\[120b.4\]]pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yang bya ste lha la khyod gnas gud du song shig shing 'di ni dge 'dun gyi mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang gi shing du bya dgos so zhes bsgo la shing gcod pa'i las mi la shing 'di rnams chod [#]cig ces mi bsgo bar lha khang [#]gi shing du dgos pa na 'di yin no zhes rig pa tsam
[\[120b.5\]]du bya/_shing 'khor gcig nas mang du rnga na mchod pa spyir kha gsum tsam du bya so sor thor bur rnga na mchod pa de bzhin du kha re rer bya/_sngon shing mkhan byed byed pa las rab tu byung ba la gnang zhes bya bas shing bcad pa dang shing la gnas pa'i lhas dge slong gis nga'i gnas phrogs
[\[120b.6\]]so zhes sangs rgyas la gsol nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul gyis shing gi lha gzhan zhig bkug ste lha 'di gnas ma rnyed kyi bar du khyod dang lhan cig tu [#]'dug shig ces bsgo ste/_de nas dge slong rnams bsdus te/_da phyin chad gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten gyi shing gcod na gong ma
[\[120b.7\]]ltar ma [#]byas par ma gcod cig [#]ces bcas/_de ste 'gyur ba me 'byung ngam khrag zag gam yan lag 'gul lam lo ma lhags pa la sogs pa mthong na zhing dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa dang ser sna'i mi bsngags pa dang bsngags pa bcas pa [#]bya/_shing bcad pa'i phyir mdo ltag ma ltar cho
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ga bya ba'i 'og tu bcad par brtsal [#]ba dang shing de la me 'byung ngam khrag zag gam yal ga 'gul lam sgra 'byung ba la sogs pa mtshan ma zhig tu gyur na shing de la gnas pa'i lha gud du ma song ba yin gyis shing 'di dge 'dun gyi'am gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten
[\[121a.2\]]gyi rgyur phul na bsod nams kyi zhing yin te yon che'o zhes chos shod cig_/sbyin gtong [#]ma byas te ser sna byas na sdig che ba'ang bshad/_sbyin gtong [#]byas na bsod nams che ba'i chos kyang bshad de shing bcad dam[#]/_ma zhi mi gtong na mi bcad/_mdo ltag ma ltar chos bshad pa la
[\[121a.3\]]sogs pa byas te bcad na me 'byung ba la sogs pa 'byung zhing ma zhi na ci mi [#]gcod do/_/'bring sems can gyi grong dang sa bon rnam [#]lnga ma rung bar ma gyur par kyang shes bzhin pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/ma rung bar ma gyur na sa bon rnam lnga ste sa bon dang sdong bu'i sa bon dang
[\[121a.4\]]tshigs pa'i sa bon dang me tog gi sa bon dang 'bras bu'i sa bon dang rnam lnga la gag [#]kyang rung ste rul zhing snang ba ma yin pa dang me dang mtshon la sogs pas ma brtags pa la ma rung ba byas na ltung bar 'gyur/_brtags [#]pa ma byas pa'i sa bon dang skye ba tha dad pa/_ma brtags pa'i sa
[\[121a.5\]]bon dang rtsi shing tha dad nas skye ba zhig las bcad dam bshig na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa bran ma rung bar na yang ngo /_/shing gi rtsa ba'i yal ga phre'u [#]dang lo ma'i yal ga phre'u [#]bcad na yang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci lta ci lta bur rtsi shing dang sa bon ci lta bu'i thabs kyis bcad cing
[\[121a.6\]]ma rung bar byas na ltung bar 'gyur/_bsgul bas kyang ngo /_/shing drung pa bsgul [#]cing 'bras bu lhags [#]na'ang ltung ba re re zhing ltung ba re re'o/_/mnan pa rtswa dang 'jib pa dang nyal nyil la sogs pas kyang ngo /_/sa bon dang rtsi shing la sogs pa ma rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo shing gis
[\[121a.7\]]mnan tas [#]'ji ba dang nyal nyil la sogs pas mnan cing ma rung bar byas na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/[#]rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//bla ma mi'i chos kyi ltung ba [#]'chad de/_bden pa'o/_/mi'i bla ma'i chos bdag dang ldan du zin kyang gzhan la smras na ltung bar 'gyur
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]te yan lag gcig_/bden pa ma mthong ba'i bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i gang zag kyang yin la mi'i bla ma'i chos mi shes shing ma mthong ba la smras [#]te yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul mi bstan/_nor
[\[121b.2\]]rdzas la sogs pa phran tshegs 'dod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul [#]dang ldan na [#]yang khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul mi bstan/_khyim pa gcig gis lhung bzed shing mthon pa'i [#]khar btags te mur 'dug dang sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta ba dag gis [#]rdzu 'phrul gyis lhung bzed len nus pa lhung
[\[121b.3\]]bzed thal byung sbyin no zhes byas [#]pa dang mur 'dug gis len ma nus te/_dge slong slin da bad tsa zhes bya bas rdzu 'phrul gyis lhung bzed blangs te khe nas khe [#]'dod pa dang khe'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mi bya bar bcas te byas na nyes byas/_sems can yid g.yo ba dang rkun po nor mi thob par bya
[\[121b.4\]]ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul byas pa [#]nyes med/_dge slong mas ston pa la ma yin/_dge slong ma dgra bcom zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan du zin kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul mi bya/_sangs rgyas lha las babs te gshegs pa'i tshe dge slong ma ut+pal bar snang la rdzu 'phrul gyis
[\[121b.5\]]phyag bya bar bsams nas 'khor lo'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas par sprul pa dang 'khor thams cad rdzu 'phrul de su zhig yin snyam the tshom zos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dge slong ma thugs thub byed byed pas nyes pa las bcas/_bla ma mi'i chos smra ba'o/_/bla ma mi'i chos kyi ltung
[\[121b.6\]]ba rdzogs so//_//brdzun gyi bla ma'i chos su smra ba'i yan lag thams cad 'dir 'dus te 'dir gtogs so//_//mdza' ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_de ste bstan na don gyi zhu ba snga ma'i don du bya/_dge 'dun nor zhig 'god dam gud du [#]gtong na sngar gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas la
[\[121b.7\]]bgo_/dge 'dun gyi las shig byed na'ang sngar gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas te bya'o/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba sngar bya dgos pa ni phyis mi ldog cing mi 'gyur bar brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngar bya'o/_/dad pa byin pa'o/_/gos bgo 'am phar sbyin pa'am [#]sngar dad pa byin la phyis dge 'dun
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]dbang ba gang zag la bsngos so zhes zer na ltung ste yan lag gcig_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi [#]gang zag la zas ma byin pa rnyed na log par bsngo bar dge slong gzhan gyi ming nas ma phyung yang ngo /_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi [#]dkor yang yin [#]pa dang kha zas kyang ma
[\[122a.2\]]yin pa dang dge 'dun dbang ba mdza' ba'i phyir gang zag la bsngos so zhes dge 'dun la brdzun gyis [#]skur pa dang yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur te/_gos gang gis khyer ba'i gang zag gi ming nas phyung yang rung ma phyung yang rung ltung ba'o/_/mi bden pa'i don/_
[\[122a.3\]]mdza' ba'i [#]phyir dge 'dun gyi [#]dbang ba gang zag la byin no zhes brdzun du skur na ltung ngo /_/skur ba'i ltung ba'o/_/mdza' ba'i phyir gos byin no zhes skur ba'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//bgegs kyi ltung ba la 'chad de/_'dul ba dang ldan par smra ba la 'phya zhing rnam par smra ba'o/_/
[\[122a.4\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo 'chad pa la phas pham pa dang dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ma gtogs par ltung ba man chad la 'di lta bu'i tshig chung ngu rtag tu bslas ci [#]dgos zhes zer na ltung ste bco lnga'i gso sbyin gyi tshe yin pa dang 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa dang phra mo dang dris pa dang bye brag tu gdon mi
[\[122a.5\]]za ba dang sde bzhi'i nang nas 'byung ba'i tshig yan pa dang 'di lta bu'i tshig chung ngu ci dgos zhes tshig tu'ang smras pa dang yan lag 'di gsum dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur/_mdo sde'i na nyes byas pa'o/_/[#]mdo sde'i tshig dang mdo sde'i [#]nang nas 'dul ba'i tshig byung ba la 'di lta bu'i tshig chung
[\[122a.6\]]ngu ci dgos zhes [#]smras pa ni nyes byas bgegs so/_/bgegs kyi ltung ba rdzogs te/_dgu bcu'i ltung ba las bcu phung gcig rdzogs so//_//sa bon gyi ltung ba la 'chad de/_dge 'dun dang mchod rten gyi phyir na las sar pa pas shing chod cig dge [#]dor ba la sogs pas kyang ngo /_/
[\[122a.7\]]sa bon ma rung par bya ba'i phyir sa bon dang rtsi shing gi thog tu rdo la sogs pa bor ba dang sa bon nyid gud du bor te ma rung bar gyur [#]na ltung bar 'gyur/_rlung dang tsha ba la bzhag pas kyang [#]ngo /_/sa bon ma rung bar bya ba'i phyir rlung dang tsha ba dang nyi ma dang me la sogs par bzhag cing ma rung
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]bar 'gyur na'ang ltung bar 'gyur/_skam pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yang ngo /_/sa bon ma rung bar bya ba'i phyir gsher ba'i sa bon skam po la bzhag na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/der 'don na'o/_/sa bon ma rung bar bya bar 'dod pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gnyis bdag gam
[\[122b.2\]]gzhan gyis kyang ngo /_/bdag gis sa bon ma rung bar byas kyang rung gzhan byed du bcug kyang rung ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gsum/_ma rung na rtsa ba dag tu'o/_/sa bon ma rung bar ma gyur pa zhig las ma rung bar byas na [#]ltung bar 'gyur te de [#]yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan na ltung
[\[122b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/ma rung ba'i tshad las so/_/sa bon dang rtsi shing ma rung bar bya ba'i phyir brdas [#]sam bsregs na du ma rung ba bzhin du ltung ba re re'o/_/sdong po yang ngo /_/shing sdong po gcig rtsa bar bcad na yan lag re re ltung ba re rer mi 'gyur gyi rtsa ba nas bcad pas ltung ba
[\[122b.4\]]gcig tu zad do/_/nyes byas pa ni sbyor ba dag la'o/_/rtsa [#]shing mang po zhig ral gri'am zor ba thabs gcig gis bcad cing brdas na'ang du bcad pa bzhin du nyes byas re re dang ltung ba re re'o/_/du chad pa bzhin du ltung ba ni re rer 'gyur nyes byas ni spyir thabs gcig byas pas nyes byas
[\[122b.5\]]gcig las med par byi shu [#]tas bshad/_'di las 'dis bsnun na so sor tha dad de dngos po ma yin no/_/shing sdong po gcig bcad par byas na sta re thabs re re la ltung ba re rer [#]mi 'gyur gyi nyes byas re rer 'gyur te chod [#]zin na ltung ba gcig tu zad do/_/phyung na ma thar [#]te bskyed kyang
[\[122b.6\]]ngo /_/rtsi shing la sogs pa gzhon nu phyung ste gud du bskyed kyang ltung ba'o/_/nya lcibs dang chu ldum chu las phyung na der ro/_/chu'i nang na nya lcibs 'dug pa dang chu ldum rtsa ba ma zug pa thang la byung yang rung chu gcig tu spos kyang rung ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyed ni 'bras bu ma bcem par
[\[122b.7\]]med pa'o/_/'bras bu ma bcem par ril med du ltar [#]btang na ltung ba phyed de nyes byas so/_/de ste 'di bcad na dge'o zhes smra'o/_/bskos na'o/_/shing 'di bcad na dge'o zhes zur du smras te gcod du bcug kyang rung shing 'di bcad na khang shing du re bzang zhes kha 'phyan du
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bsams shing smras na'ang nyes byas/_rdzu 'phrul gyis na ma byas pa'o/_/shing zhig gzugs brnyan du sprul te bcad na ni nyes med do/_/de bzhin du sa bon tha dad pa la sa bon du 'du shes na'o/_/nas zhig ma rung bar bya bar bsams la 'bras zhig ma rung bar
[\[123a.2\]]byas na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rtsi shing dang sa bon gag kyang rung gcig cig ma rung bar byas par [#]bsams la gzhan zhig ma rung bar byas na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/shun phrags dang /_shing gi shun phrags shing las ni 'phags kyi rtsa ba cung zad shing la thogs
[\[123a.3\]]pa bkogs pa dang /_gsob dang /_shing rul pa shing ma mo la chags pa'am shing spags [#]shing la yog cing 'dug pa bkogs pa dang /_lo ma skya bo dang shing gi lo ma skya bor gyur pa btogs [#]pa dang /_rgyas pa'i me tog dang /_me tog rgyas zin te lhags la thug pa btogs pa dang /_
[\[123a.4\]]smin pa'i 'bras bu ni/_shing thog smin zin te brul la thug pa btogs [#]pa dang /_phyed shi ba zhes bcad do/_/ming [#]gis smos pa 'di rnams btogs pa [#]phyed shi ba zhes bya ste nyes byas so/_/de dag gi rtsa bar gyur pa rang bzhin las ma gyur na ma yin/_mdo ltag ma'i nang nas ming
[\[123a.5\]]gis smos te bshad pa lta bu ma yin par me tog dang 'bras bu ma rgyas pa dang lo ma skya bor ma gyur pa dang shing las ma 'phags pa dang 'bras bu dang me tog gi rtsa ba dang shing tog dang 'bras bu la mi nye bar shing ma mo la nye bar spyad [#]pa la sogs pa ni ltung ba/_shing tog shing gi
[\[123a.6\]]mtshams su bcad pa ni nyes byas/_phyed ni btab pa'i sa bon gyi kham [#]rtsa ba ma skyes pa/_nas 'bras kyi sa bon btab ste [#]myu gur ni ma gyur sa bon las kyang nyams te rtsa lhogs tsam du 'dug pa la ma rung bar byas na'ang nyes byas/_rde'u sha dang sha mo dang sa bal dang rdza ma dang gos kyi
[\[123a.7\]]rlabs phyed skye ba'i bye brag go/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las [#]gag kyang rung ste ma rung bar byas na nyes byas/_khu ba tshan mo la sogs pa pho ba dang 'chag [#]pa dang yal ga la sogs pa drangs pa dang dkyil 'khor du byug pa de'i sems kyis na ltung ba med do/_/khu ba la sogs pa pho
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]ba dang yan man du 'gro ba'i rdog lam du song ba dang rdo shing la sogs pa drangs pa'i 'og tu song ba dang dkyil 'khor byas pa'i 'og tu sa bon ma rung ba la sogs pa sa bon ma rung ba [#]bya ba'i sems ni med kyi las gzhan byed pa'i zhar la sa bon ma rung bar gyur pa ni nyes med do/_/gcad
[\[123b.2\]#]do 'jag ma la sogs pa dog par gyur te bcings pa la de ma yin pas thar bar mi 'gyur na'o/_/dge slong dag gcig [#]mi rgod kyis bcings nas gsad [#]par byas pa dang mi rgod kyi nang na dge slong gi tshul shes pa gcig yod de dge slong gsad pa [#]mi rigs kyi rtswas [#]bcings te bzhag
[\[123b.3\]]pa dang kho'i khrims kyis rtswa gcad [#]du mi rung ste bcings pa bzhin du 'dug pa'i rigs so zhes zer nas 'jag ma la bcings te bzhag pa dang rgyal po gcig cig [#]ri dwags ba [#]shor du song song nas mthong bas rmongs pa de [#]dge slong ste mi rgod kyis rtswa la [#]bcings te khrims kyis rtswa gcad [#]du mi
[\[123b.4\]]rung bas sdod mod ces smras pa dang rgyal po yang dad pa skyes nas rgyal po nyid kyi lag gis bkrol [#]te gos la sogs pas brdzangs te btang ba las bcas te de lta bu rtswas [#]bcings shing srog la dman pa zhig byung na rtswa [#]bcad kyang nyes med do zhes gnang ngo /_/de gcig ma yin pa gcig gis
[\[123b.5\]]so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge slong mang po [#]zhig bcings na zad par gyis rtswa gcad [#]cing ltung bar bya ba'i mi rigs kyi dge slong gcig gis rtswa [#]chod de bdag khrol la gzhan kun kyang bdag gis rtswa [#]ma chad par grol lo/_/sa bon gyi chos ma yin pa nyes pa mi byed do/_/sa bon du mi rung ba rnams
[\[123b.6\]#]ni ma rung bar byas kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mes reg pa dang btsugs pa mtshon dang sen mo dang ne tso dang rnyings [#]pa dang phyung ba dang bkrums [#]pa dang gshegs pa dang gtubs pa'o zhes brtags pa'o/_/sa bon rnam pa lnga la ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyis reg cing brtags pa ni spyad du rung ste ltung
[\[123b.7\]]ba dang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/sa bon ma yin par gyur gyi bar du btags [#]pa mi bsdad/_mdo gong ma'i nang nas smos pa bzhin du sngar btags [#]zin pa dang snad cing rma byung ba la sogs pa sa bon du mi rung ba rnams kyis btags [#]zin pa yin te gdod btags [#]mi dgos so/_/rlangs pa me ma [#]
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]yin no/_/sa bon la sogs pa rlangs pa tsha ba la gdungs [#]shing reg pa yang mes brtags pa'i nang du chud de phyis brtags [#]mi dgos so/_/yang dag par rtogs [#]pa na mes 'bras bu'i spyi'i gzugs su brtags [#]pa gtso bor byas pa'o/_/nas dang shing tog la sogs pa
[\[124a.2\]]lta bu mang zhig phung por 'dug pa la brtags [#]pa ni 'bru re re nas brtags [#]mi dgos kyi phung po'i spyir mes reg par byugs pas chog go/_/de'i phyogs gcig tu na 'dus pa'i mi 'gyur mi ldang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar spyir ngos gcig tsam mes reg par byas pas mi chog gi phyi rol gyi
[\[124a.3\]]ngos thams cad du mes reg reg tsam byas pas brtags par chud do/_/dge slong gis byas pa yang brtags pa byas pa'o/_/ltag tu sa bon la brtags pa rnam pa lnga [#]bdun smos pa las mes brtags [#]pa ma gtogs par gzhan dge slong gis brtags pa'ang brtags par chud de zos
[\[124a.4\]]kyang nyes med do/_/rtog rtog pa'i dge slong ni chad pa rtsis [#]mgo bzhin du yod do/_/dge slong gis mes brtags pa'i zas zos pa ni brtags par mi chud de nyes byas so/_/sa ma brtags par yang ngo /_/mtshams kyi nang du tshad mang byas pa'am sngags kyis ma btab pa'i tshad mang
[\[124a.5\]]sa ma brtags pa yin te der mes brtags pa ma gtogs par gzhan brtags pa'ang nyes med do/_/mes brtags pa ni dge slong gi gnas su g.yos sos [#]pa dang 'dra'o/_/chu grang mos ma btab par zhag bdun pa dang nam 'tsho'i bar du mi bza'/_zhag bdun pa'i sman bu ram dang
[\[124a.6\]]sbrang rtsi dang mar dang shing mar la sogs pa dang tshe gcig gi sman la sogs pa yang bza' ba'i tshe mi gzhan la chu grang mos rtog tu gzhug go/_/ma brtags par zos sam bdag gis brtags na nyes byas/_ma bslad pa thun gyi bar du [#]mi bza'/_rtsa ba mo dang rgun chu dang bu ram chu la sogs pa
[\[124a.7\]]phyi dro btung du rung ba'i rnams kyang chus blugs te ma brtags par mi btung [#]'thungs na nyes byas/_sa bon skye ba ma rung ba'o/_/sa bon gyi ltung ba ste [#]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mdo//_//'khyal ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_gang zag bcu gnyis dag la byed de/_dge
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]'dun gyis [#]las su bskos pa'i gang zag bcu gnyis kyi [#]las gag kyang rung ma snyoms shing bdag la mnar to zhes brdzun gyis skur cing phyar ka btang ba las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/ma bskos pa la yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyis gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su gsol ba dang
[\[124b.2\]]zhu ba'i las kyis ni ma bskos kyi khas bskos shing gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las gang yang rung byed pa la 'phya na yang ltung ba'o/_/spyod pa 'gags pa yang ngo /_/gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las gang yang rung byed byed pa las byung ba la sngon las byed pa'i tshe bdag la mnar cing ma snyoms te
[\[124b.3\]]mnar to zhes 'phya [#]na yang ltung ba'o/_/'khyal ba'am [#]bdag gi phyir de thos par 'phyar zhing gzhan la bstan na'o/_/'khyal zhing 'phyar ba ni bdag la ma snyoms shing mnar to zhes byas pa dang bdag gis smras pa de gang zag bcu gnyis gang la 'phyar ba des slar yang thos pa dang khos ma
[\[124b.4\]]nyams [#]pa la brdzun du'ang smras pa dang yan lag bzhi/_rtsa ba'i ni bgrang bar ro/_/ltung bar 'gyur ba'i tshad ni dge 'dun gyis de skad ma zer cig ces bsgo ba la ma btang ste dge 'dun gyis khyed tshul khrims dang mi ldan zhing log par spyod pa yin te tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa'i nang du gtogs
[\[124b.5\]]so zhes bsgos [#]te ma btang na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag 'di lnga dang ldan na ltung ba'o/_/gzhan du na nyes byas pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis mi [#]bsgo zhing ma bgrangs kyi bar du phyar cing [#]smras pa dang 'phyar [#]bar ma bsams par 'phyar [#]ba'i tshig tu kha nas byung ba nyes byas/_chung
[\[124b.6\]]zad du dgongs pa yang mi nus pa mi mngag_/gang zag bcu gnyis la 'khyal zhing 'phyar [#]ba'i mi de bcos su mi bzod cing khro gtum can zhig ste slar 'thab mo rgal [#]zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa tsam gyi tshod na de skad ma smra shig ces bsgo ba dang nyes pa'i nang du gtogs par bgrang bar mi bya bar
[\[124b.7\]]bzhag pa la'ang bya/_'phyar [#]ba de la ma smra shig ces bsgor btang [#]ba'i dge slong yang gnyen po thabs mkhas pa ngo zlog phod pa las mngag_/bdag gis de nyid dang 'khon na bdag gis [#]las su mi bsgo/_/gang zag bcu gnyis kyis las su bskos pa gang yang rung ste/_dge slong gzhan
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]las shig bsko na dge slong 'khon [#]yod pa la bdag gis las su mi bsko[#]/_/las su bsko dgos na yang dge slong 'khon [#]med pa las bskor gzhug go/_/'phyar [#]ba'o/_/'khyal zhing 'phyar [#]ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//smra ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_mi bgrang ba ma yin pa
[\[125a.2\]]ni/_ltag ma phyar ba dang 'dra bar bsgo ba'i lan log par ldon pa yang mi bgrang ba ma yin te log par smra ba la de skad ma zer zhes lan gcig bsgo/_/de nas ma btang na khyed [#]tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa 'di rnams kyi nang du gtogs par bgrang [#]zhes bya ste ma btang na ltung ste yan lag gcig_/
[\[125a.3\]]bskul bar zhugs pa'i bka' dang mi smra ba'i log pa can dang smras pa'i gang zag mngon sum du 'khyal ba gzhan la ston cing 'phyar [#]ba'o/_/dge slong grogs kyis nyes par byed cing log par ma byed ces gzhung [#]bzhin du bsgo na slar log par smra yang rung cang mi smra bar then [#]te 'dug kyang rung tshul
[\[125a.4\]]bzhin du byad pa [#]ston pa dge slong la mngon sum du lan log par ldon cing [#]smra na ltung ba'o/_/zhu bas so/_/dge 'dun gyis ma byed cig ces lan gcig sngar bsgo ba dang nyes par gtogs so zhes bgrang ba ni gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bya/_dge slong gis bka' bzlog na'o/_/nyes par
[\[125a.5\]]spyod pa la dge slong tshul bzhin du spyod pas tshul bzhin du [#]bsgo ba la slar lan log par smra ba'am cang mi smra bar then te 'dug ste ngag ma mnyan cing bzlog na ltung ste yan lag gcig_/der 'dod pas so/_/log par spyod pa la [#]de ltar ma byed ces ston cing 'ong ba la lan log par slar bzlog
[\[125a.6\]]par 'dod de smras shing byas pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/gzhan du smra bas so/_/bsgo ba'i lan bzhin du mi smra ba'i kha rog tu 'dug gam lan log par smras pa la yan lag gcig ste yan lag 'di bzhi dang ldan par byas na ltung bar 'gyur nyes byas ni kha rog na'o/_/
[\[125a.7\]]dris pa dang bsgo ba la sogs pa ci yang rung ste lan log par glan par bya ba'i phyir mi smra bar 'dug na nyes byas/_mi dran no zhes kyang ngo /_/gtam dri ba la lan log par glan par bya ba'i phyir dran pa mi [#]dran no zhes byas na nyes byas/_de sdug bsngal bar smras pa ma yin na'o/_/gnyen
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]bshes lta bu shi na drang por smra na mya ngan du 'gyur ba'i phyir [#]ma smras shing lan ma glan nam gtam gzhan du bzlog ste [#]smras na nyes med do/_/de bas na gsad [#]pa mthong ste kun 'dri na skad cig sros skad cig chu 'thung skad cig ngal sos [#]gnam mam sen [#]mo mthong ngo yang dag par na sems can
[\[125b.2\]]nam gsad [#]pa ma mthong ngo zhes smras na ltung ba med do/_/mi bsad pa zhig bros te song la snyegs [#]pa'i mi 'ongs te 'dri na mdo [#]'di las 'byung ba bzhin du ring du thogs par bya ba'i phyir tshig log par smras shing gya gyu byas kyang nyes med do/_/de ltar byas kyang 'dri na sems can la dngos po
[\[125b.3\]]med par bsams te yang dag par na sems can gsad [#]pa'i mi ma mthong ngo zhes kyang nyes med de/_gang du dpang por 'gyur ba der gnas par mi bya kha [#]mchu la sogs pa rtsod cing dpang dang che bzhir bcol zhing 'dzin par 'gyur bar mi 'dug par byol te 'gro/_/gnod pa byed na sgo ma
[\[125b.4\]]bcad par dpang du mi sbyin/_mdo ltag ma ltar byol yang ma thar te dpang dang che bzhir bzung na phyis gnod pa mi bya bar dam bcas la dpang bya/_phyis gnod pa mi bya bar mi [#]btub na kha btsums te 'dug go_/bka' bzlog pa'o/_/smra ba'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//khri stan gyi ltung ba
[\[125b.5\]]la 'chad de/_khri dang khri'u dang sngas dang la ba dang sngas khab dang gru bzhi zhes pa ni mal stan no/_/dge 'dun gyi khri dang khri'u dang sngas la sogs pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams bla re [#]med pa'i nam mkha' la bor ba las ltung bar 'gyur te mal stan dngos dang bla re [#]med pa ste yan lag gnyis/_
[\[125b.6\]]'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu de'i mtshams so/_/khri stan bla re [#]med pa'i nam mkha' la lus te ma brtul [#]bar song na khri stan 'dug pa nas 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las 'das par song na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/bskor ba ni sgo gang [#]nas so/_/'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgur bcal [#]ba ni
[\[125b.7\]]gtsug lag khang phyi ras bskor na [#]gtsug lag khang gi phyi ra'i sgo gang nas bcal [#]lo/_/phyir med na stan ga la 'dug pa'i gnas nas 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la bcal [#]lo/_/de las 'das pa'i phyir brjod [#]de/_'gro'am nang du yang nyal lam/_bsam gtan du zhugs pa la sogs pas
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]lkog tu gyur pa'o/_/bla re [#]med pa'i nam mkha' la dge 'dun gyi khri stan lus la 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'das te song na brjed de gud du song yang rung bsam gtan byed du song yang rung [#]khyim gyi nang du nyal du [#]song yang rung bsam gtan byed du song yang rung ste rtsis mgo
[\[126a.2\]]dang ldan par gyur na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tha dad pa las sngar [#]na sbyor ba'o/_/'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las ma 'das pa dang char gyis ma phog gam rlung gis ma bzlog gam srin bus ma zos par bla gab med pa la lus pa ni nyes byas te skabs 'dir ming smos te nyes byas nyid 'og nas
[\[126a.3\]]'chad/_'das sam srin bu dang rlung dang char gyis ma phog kyang bla re [#]med pa la lus na 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'das na ltung [#]/_gyur na tha ma'o/_/'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'das kyang char dang rlung dang srin bu gang gis kyang rung ste zos shing bzlog na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/
[\[126a.4\]]brtul ba byas sam byed du bcug na de ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi khri stan bdag gis brtul tam gzhan la bcol ba ni ltung bar mi 'gyur/_ma brtul [#]te ma bcol na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig ste[#]/_yan lag re re nas ming gis smos pa kun dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur/_
[\[126a.5\]]dge slong pha la ma bcol na'o/_/brtul du bcol ba ni dge slong ma yin pa dge sbyong ngam khyim pa la bcol bar mi chud de ltung bar 'gyur gyi dge slong la bcol ba ni bcol bar chud de[#]/_dog pa ma rnyed [#]na/_chu'am me'am/_rkun po la sogs pa 'jigs [#]pa'i rkyen byung [#]ste ma brtul bar
[\[126a.6\]]song ba ni nyes med de/_'jigs pa'i rkyen med pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/byed pa bzhin spyod [#]spyod pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi khri stan la bdag spyod spyod de brtul te [#]'gro ba las grogs shig 'ongs na de la spyod cing 'dug shig ces bsgo ste 'gro bas ma bsgo na nyes byas
[\[126a.7\]]phyis [#]na spyod pa'i dge slong gis ma brtul na yan lag dang ldan na ltung /_dge 'dun gyi khri stan la khyim pa zhig spyod cing 'dug ste/_char rlung dang srin bus zos sam nam mkha' la bor ba la de ltar ma byed ces ma bsgo'am/_ma brtul na nyes byas zhes byi shu tas bshad/_gnyis gcig
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]tu 'khod na phyis langs pas bya'o/_/stan gcig la dge slong gnyis spyod spyod pa las gcig phyi na 'dug pa gcig sngar 'gro na snga mas brtul cig ces ma bsgo yang phyi mas ma brtul na ltung ba'o sngar song ba la ni nyes med do/_/de ste mnyam pas na gsar bus so/_/stan gcig
[\[126b.2\]]la mi gnyis lhan cig spyod spyod pa las lhan cig 'dong na dge slong khrims na gang gzhon pas brtul la/_ma brtul na rgan po la nyes byas gzhon nu la ltung ba'o/_/mtshungs pas na nyes byas [#]gnyis kas so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar lhan cig spyod spyod pa gnyis ka spyis bsdu'o/_/ma
[\[126b.3\]]bsdus na gnyis ka ltung ngo /_/ngo tsha med pas phas [#]pham pa byung ba'am tshul khrims la g.yel ba dang tham thom smyon thabs can dang /_'khon pa sngan chad 'thabs shing 'khon yod pa dang /_rgas pa rgan po mal stan brtul mi nus par rgan pa dang /[ #]nad pa mal stan brtul mi nus pa dang /_rab
[\[126b.4\]]tu ma rdzogs pa dge sbyong dang khyim [#]pa dang der na ma bcol ba'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la mal stan brtul du bcol [#]kyang /_bcol bar mi chud de yan lag dang ldan na ltung ba'o/_/gtsug lag khang 'di mal stan lta'am long shig_/bdag gud du 'gro na dge slong grogs la
[\[126b.5\]]mal stan 'di ltos shig ces sam lde mig 'di na yod de long shig ces bsgo ste 'gro'o/_/sgo lcags ma bcug go zhes bcol/_gtsug lag khang ngam [#]sgo ma bcad par 'gro na'ang sgo ma bcad do zhes bsgo ste 'gro'o/_/tha dad pa gsum ste rlung gis bzlog pa dang char pas rim par
[\[126b.6\]]thal ba dang /_srin bus zos pa dang char pas gsher ba dang rlung gis bzlog pa'i tshad ni char pas steng [#]nas 'og tu thal ba dang srin bus bla nas 'og tu thal ba dang rlung gis tha ma bzlog pa tsam gyis ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mal stan mal stan yang yin la dge 'dun gyi de la dge 'dun gyi
[\[126b.7\]]mal stan yang yin la/_bdag bskos gzhan gyis bdag la gding du bcug gam/_bdag gis gzhag gam/_bdag nyid kyis bting ngam/_gzhog tu bcug ste bdag gis gzhan gding du bcug ste/_bla gab med de zhe [#]na byed do/_/bla gab med pa'i nam mkha' la lus te ma
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]brtul na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba ni mjug [#]tu na'o/_/yan lag rnams dang ldan zhing 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'das sam char dag gis gsher bar gyur na ltung ngo /_/sbyor ba ni nyes byas pa'o/_/yan lag ma tshang ngam 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ma 'das pa
[\[127a.2\]]tsam du song ba ni [#]nyes byas so/_/re re shig gzhan gyis non na'o/_/dge 'dun gyi mal stan la spyod spyod pa las grogs gcig 'ongs te phyin na spyod de bdag sngar 'gro na phyi ma la mal [#]stan brtul cig ces bsgo la 'gro'o ma bsgo bar song na nyes byas/_gang zag gis kyang ngo /_/
[\[127a.3\]]gang zag gis mal stan spyod spyod pa las ma brtul tam brtul du ma bcol bar song na nyes byas so/_/'og ma bzhi yang ngo /_/khri stan gyi 'og na gding ba dang bskrad pa dang phyis gnon pa dang gzer med pa bzhi yang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du byas na ltung gi gang zag gi
[\[127a.4\]]gnas la byas na nyes byas[#]/_ma reg pa ni ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi khri gser dngul dang rin po che la sogs pas [#]byas pa zhig skam srad la phyung zhing 'dug ste char bab na reg tu mi rung ba'i phyir ma brtul [#]na nyes med do/_/rkun po'i rkyen lta bu byung na brtul ba'i phyir reg kyang bla ste
[\[127a.5\]]brtul dgos so/_/de ste bsod snyoms kyi phyir bkram ste zhugs nas rlung dang char pa 'ong na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas chug shig_/dge 'dun gyi mal stan bsod snyoms pa zhig spyod cing gding ba las ma brtul bar bdag bsod snyoms la song ste char pa'am rlung la
[\[127a.6\]]sogs pa byung na dge slong su phyi na 'dug cing ma mthong bas sdus [#]shig ma bsdus na nyes byas so/_/zhugs pas kyang nan tan du shog shig_/sU tra ltag ma ltar dge slong bsod snyoms la song bas kyang rlung dang char pa 'ong bar mthong na mal stan brtul ba'i phyir myur du 'ong ngo /_/
[\[127a.7\]]myur du ma 'ongs na sngon gyi ltung ba dang nyes byas kyi [#]steng du yang nyes byas mchis[#]/_de'i phyir ma nyes pa dang 'bri ba med do/_/bsod snyoms pa mal stan ma brtul bar bsod snyoms song ba bsod snyoms kyi phyir song zhes te nyes pa [#]med pa'am/_ltung ba [#]'bri ba ma yin gyi yan lag
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ste brjed nas lan [#]mang du 'das sam phyin te dran pa rnyed na phyis 'di ltar mi bya'o zhes sems bskyed cing khar smros shig_/dge slong mal [#]stan spyod spyod dam bkram pa las ma brtul tam brjed de gud du song nas lam ring mo zhig tu phyin te gdod de
[\[127b.2\]]dran na de ltar brjed pa nyes so zhes yid la bsams shing khar yang brjod/_phyin chad 'di ltar mi bya ba'i sems kyang bskyed do/_/de ltar sems ma bskyed na snga ma ltung ba'i steng du nyes byas kyang yod/_lam mi ring bar dran na slar log ste brtul lo/_/de ste dge slong dang lam du
[\[127b.3\]]phrad na bsdu bar gsol cig_/sU tra ltag ma ltar dge slong gis mal stan ma bsdus par gud du song ste lam ring mo zhig tu phyin te dran pa dang dge slong gzhan zhig dang phrad na bdag gis gsol ba btab ste mal stan ma brtul bar lus kyi phar [#]byir phyin pa dang brtul bar gsol lo zhes gsol
[\[127b.4\]]ba gdab/_khas blangs nas [#]der phyin na bya/_sU tra ltag ma ltar gsol ba btab pa'i dge slong des khas blangs na phyin ma thag tu brtul/_phyin ma thag [#]tu ma brtul te yan lag dang ldan par gyur na khas blangs pa'i dge slong [#]de ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/dogs pa ma rnyed de gnas nas 'gro na
[\[127b.5\]]mal stan brtul/_mi rgod dang rkun po la sogs pa 'jigs pa'i rkyen ma byung bar gnas gud du 'gro na dge 'dun gyi mal stan bdag spyod spyod kyang rung skam [#]bsrad la bting yang rung ba [#]bsdus shing brubs la 'gro/_ma brubs par song na nyes byas/_'di ni bla gab med pa ma yin gyi
[\[127b.6\]]gtsug lag khang gi nang na 'dug pa la bya/_de ste rdul gos na sprug_/dge 'dun gyi mal stan la rdul la sogs pa chags na rub ma pa yang rung su spyod spyod pa yang rung ste sprug [#]brdab ste byi bdar [#]bya/_de nyid la gtad/_sU tra ltag ma ltar byi bdar byas pa'i mal stan de mal stan gyi
[\[127b.7\]]rub ma pa gsar du byed pa su yin pa la rnying gud du [#]'gro na gtad de 'gro/_dge slong dag la bcol bar yang bya/_mal stan gyi rub ma pa rnying yang rung mal stan spyod spyod pa'i dge slong su yang rung ste gnas gzhan [#]zhig tu thal byung 'gro la mal stan gyi rub ma pa gzhi 'dzin med na
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]dge slong dag kyang rung bas sngas [#]shig par bcol te 'gro med na dge tshul la/_sU tra ltag ma ltar ring bar [#]'gro la dge slong med na dge sbyong la sdus [#]shig pa'am phul cig par bcol kyang nyes pa med do/_/de yang na khyim pa dag la'o/_/bdag grogs

[\[128a.4\]]ma ltar lde mig sbas te song ba las lam du dge slong dag dang [#]phrad na lde mig sa tshod 'dir sbas kyis tshol la spyod cig ces bsgo ste 'gro/_de ste khyim par [#]mgron du bos pa las sgo bcad de dong na rtsig pa'am shing [#]du stan sbos la zhugs shig_/dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig dge 'dun
[\[128a.5\]]gyi khri stan lkog dben par khyer te spyod spyod pa las dro khar khri stan slar skyel du song ba las dge 'dun phal kun mgron du 'dong ste sgo bcad cing 'dug na khri stan de gzhan gyis mi mthong bar rtsig [#]pa'am shing drung du sbas la bdag kyang dge 'dun gzhan gyi phyi [#]bzhin mchod ston la 'gro'o/_/

[\[128b.1\]]slar log na g.yog khyim pa'am dge sbyong dag la bskur [#]ro/_/med na khyim pa la bskyal ba'i phyir bcol te 'dong /_dge sbyong dang khyim pa la 'phral du bskur [#]du med na khyim pa dag [#]la bcol te skyol cig par bskos te 'dong ngo /_/bdag gis khyer te 'ong ngo zhes zer na bzhag_/sU tra

[\[129a.1\]]skyugs pa dang ngan skyugs la sogs pas stan la reg na lci skam dang sug pa la sogs go 'dun gyis dag par bkru/_mi 'dag na lan bu dag gcod cig[# ]/khyi'u dra ba dang lan bu'i gseb tu ngan skyugs reg pa 'dag [#]tu mi btub na lan bu dag gcod cig_/khyim pa

[\[129a.5\]]nad 'dri ba'i dge slong 'ong ba'i phyir nad g.yog gis stan gding /_mkhan po'am slob dpon dge ba'i skyabs kyi phyir 'gro na de ste gzhan du dge ba'i skyabs mi 'phel na phyi bzhin du 'gro/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon gtsug lag khang na dge ba spyod du mi ldob ste shing drung ngam chu 'gram la

[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]char gyis na mal stan dag gzhug_/gso sbyin byed pa'am chos 'chad pa la sogs pa bla gab med pa la [#]'khod 'khod pa las char pa 'phral la bab na dge slong kun gyis stan bsdu zhing gnas su bskur [#]ba dang sba/_rang gis lci ste mi nus na rgan rabs dang gsar bur lhan cig tu brje/_sU

[\[129b.3\]]logs shig so sor bcer ro/_/gtsug lag khang gzhan du mal stan dang gos brnya na byin cig_/gtsug lag khang gzhan du mchod ston byas sam dge 'dun mang zhig lhags te mal stan gyis mi chog ste brnya na brnyar sbyin no/_/de ste char pa'am [#]rlung 'bab par mi dogs na'o/_/

[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]ste mi stor bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/mi bzod na ma 'jug shig_/chu dang me'i nang nas dbyung mi nus shing srog la dma' bar gyur na de'i nang du mi 'dug_/mal stan gyi ltung ba'o/_/khri stan gyi ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//bting ba la 'chad de/_grong bar du gding

[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]brtags na srin bu 'jug tu byed dam rnyings [#]na sar pa dang brje/_'jam po snum po'i sa na nyin re'o/_/sa tshan yod cing gsher ba [#]dang 'jam po dul dul por 'jug [#]pa ni srin bu myur du 'jug pa'i phyir nyin re zhing lan re blta'o/_/gzhan du na zla ba phyed cing ngo /_/gseg ma'am bye ma'am sa
[\[130b.2\]]mkhrang po myur du srin bu [#]mi ldang ba ni rtsa'am lo ma bting na zla ba phyed cing blta'o/_/'chag [#]na thag pas [#]bcings pa'i rtswa'i [#]bam po shing la 'phyang zhing bzhag_/dgon pa'i 'chag sar rtswa bting [#]ngam gding dgos na mi 'chag [#]pa'i tshe rtswa [#]bsdus te bcings la btags te bzhag rtswa [#]bam gyi stan
[\[130b.3\]]grogs po dag 'ong ba'i [#]phyir gding dgos pas shing la btags te bzhag_/de ltar shing la btags [#]pa ni mi 'drul ba dang srin bu [#]mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/gyo mor lci ba bzhag_/ba lang gi lci ba srin bu mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir gyo mo [#]dang shing leb dang rdo leb kyi steng du bzhag sngar 'das pa
[\[130b.4\]]song shig ces pa phan chad do/_/rtag [#]tu khri stan gyi bshad pa mgo man chad khas blangs nas der phyin na bya zhes zer ba yan chad yan lag bshad pa kun rtswa bting ngam lo ma bting ba ma brtul bar song na ltung bar 'gyur ba'i yan lag bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/mnyam par spyad na mtshungs par ro/_/
[\[130b.5\]]dge slong gnyis shig rtswa [#]bting ba la lhan cig spyod spyod na gnyis kas bsdus te dor/_dge 'dun gyi ma yin na [#]bdag po la zhus te'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas ma yin pa khyim pa la sogs pa'i khyim du rtswa bting [#]ste spyod spyod pa las dor du mi khom par gud du ring bar [#]'gro na khyim pa nyid
[\[130b.6\]]la rtswa [#]bor cig ces bcol te dor ro zhes khas blangs na ma bor bar song [#]yang nyes med/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni rtsa bting ba'i ltung bar gyur pa ni [#]dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang yin/_sa [#]rdo dang bye [#]ma la sogs pa rtswa [#]bting ba'i gzhi gseg ma dang kham brag dang bye ma la
[\[130b.7\]]sogs pa ma yin pa/_med par nyes par gyur par [#]rung ba'i sa [#]'jam po'am snum pa srin bu ldang bar [#]'gyur ba la bdag gis sam/_rtswa [#]dang lo ma bdag gis bting ngam bskos te byas pa'i gding ba ni byed do/_/gzhan gding du bcug pa las ma brtul na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gding ba'i
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]ltung ba'o/_/rtswa dang lo ma bting ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//skrod pa la 'chad de/_dge slong dang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang las byed do/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong gnas gnas pa las bskrad [#]dam skrod du bcug na khro ba'i
[\[131a.2\]]sems kyis khon gyi phyir ma byas kyang ltung ba'o/_/de ste de na gnod pa'am/_khang pa rdib tu 'ong ba dang chu dang me la sogs pa dbyung ba'i phyir gnas spos pa dang /_dge 'dun 'khrug pa 'byung ste/_dge slong gnas de nas ma [#]phyung na dge 'dun la gnod pa'am 'khrug pa 'byung ste phyung ba
[\[131a.3\]]dang /_mi zhi'am/_ma phyung na dge 'dun 'khrug pa mi zhi ba'i phyir phyung ba dang /_byed par 'dod na ma yin no/_/sman dpyad la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir gnas spos pa dang 'di rnams kyi rkyen ma yin par dge slong bskrad na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/'byung ba'o/_/gtsug lag khang
[\[131a.4\]]nas kyang dge slong phyung na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/gzhan gyis kyang ngo /_/gzhan la dge slong skrod du bcug na'ang ltung bar 'gyur/_/pha rol gyi phyir yang ngo /_/gzhan gyis bdag skrod [#]du bcug gam bdag nyid kyis bskrad kyang rung ltung ste sU tra 'di gnyis la yan lag gcig_/_
[\[131a.5\]]gtsug lag khang yin pa dang yan lag 'di lnga dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dang dge tshul pha dang dge tshul ma dag gis [#]ni nyes byas pa'o/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge sbyong ma dang dag sbyong la dge slong skrod du bcug na dge slong skrod du bcug pa ni ltung ba dge sbyong dag la ni
[\[131a.6\]]nyes byas so/_/'di dag kyang ngo /_/dge slob ma dang dge sbyong ma [#]dang dge sbyong bskrad na nyes byas so/_/rtsed mo na yang ngo /_/snying nas bskrad pa ni ma yin gyi rtsed mo'i phyir bskrad pa ni [#]nyes byas so/_/khyim mi na bsod nams ma yin pa mang ngo /_/khyim mi la dge slong skrod du bcol na dge
[\[131a.7\]]slong ni ltung ba khyim pa la ni ltung ba'i rim pa med de sdig che'o/_/bskrad pa'o/_/bskrad pa'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//phyis gnon gyi ltung ba la 'chad de[#]/_'ab+hid/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong snga na 'dug par yang shes bzhin pa dang yan lag gcig/_/gnas pa gtsug
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]lag khang na snga na [#]gnas shing 'dug pa las [#]bskrad par mnan na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nang [#]gi gnas na'o/_/bdag gis pha rol dge slong yang yin pa mnan cing bskrad na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/dge 'dun
[\[131b.2\]]gyi gtsug lag khang yang yin pa las mnan na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/nan gyis pa ste bskrad cing dbyung ba'i phyir nan gyis mnan na ltung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag gcig_/nad dang 'jigs pa'i dbang gis non pa btang ste'o/_/nad dang 'jigs pa'i rkyen la sogs pa med par
[\[131b.3\]]nan gyis mnan cing bskrad na ltung ste/_yan lag gcig ste/_yan lag [#]'di rnams dang ldan na phyis gnon gyi ltung bar 'gyur/_dpe 'di bzhin te bzlog par 'dod pas dge slong la bzlog pa'o/_/bsgo ba la lan log par smras na ltung bar 'gyur ba bzhin du dge slong la log [#]par gnod
[\[131b.4\]]pa byas na ltung bar 'gyur te u da yis bdag gi slob ma la [#]klan ka btsal nas khyed khang pa'i nang na [#]'khod pa'i mi rigs kyi mkhris pa'i nad rgyas kyi phyi rol na 'khod cig ces lhags pa la bzhag ste gnod par byas pa dang bad kan gyi nad rgyas te tsha ba la 'khod cig ces gnod pa [#]byas pa dang
[\[131b.5\]]dge 'dun rkun pos 'jigs te phyi rol da zar [#]du mi rung ba'i phyir [#]nang du gyo mo bzhag ste bshang ba [#]las gtsug lag khang brtsig go zhes u da yis gyo mo de bor te phyi rol che chung nang du stor ste [#]gnod pa byas pa la sogs pa lta bu dge slong la gnod par byed pa'i phyir log pa'i thabs kyis byas
[\[131b.6\]]na gag kyang rang ste ltung ba'o/_/nan gyis mnan pa'o/_/phyis gnon pa'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//gzer med kyi ltung ba la 'chad de/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng du na byed do/_/dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang yin pa las ltung bar gyur [#]te yan lag gcig/_/bla
[\[131b.7\]]rdzang khang [#]thog tu nyal ba las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/'on te gur [#]khang na ma yin no/_/shing med pa'i sa khang du gur [#]'dra bar phub pa khri'i rtsa bas mi rtol ba'i khang pa la nyal ba ni ltung ba med/_de'i steng rnam par g.yogs pa na yang ngo /_/khang pa gzhan gral bu dang 'ji ba
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]la sogs pas g.yogs shing khri rtsa bas mi phug [#]pa yang ltung bar mi 'gyur/_khri'i rkang pa gzer bu can na yang ngo /_/khri'i rkang pa gzer bu dang khri'u [#]la sogs pas btab cing mi ltung ba la khang thog tu nyal ba'ang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gan rkyal btang ste'o/_/khri
[\[132a.2\]]gzer [#]bu med kyang gan rkyal du bzhag ste steng du nyal yang ltung bar mi 'gyur/_rkang pa'i so sor bzhag na yang ngo /_/khri'i gzer bu med kyang khri'i rkang pa bzhi'i 'og tu so phag gam shing leb la sogs pa bzhag ste rtsa ba mi ltung ba la nyal ba'ang nyes med do/_/sU tra 'di rnams lta
[\[132a.3\]]bu [#]ma yin pa la nyal ba ni ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/mnan pa'o/_/'og na nyal ba la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/_khri la drag [#]tu mnan pa las ltung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag gcig_/'ab+hid [#]do/_/dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang [#]yin par shes te/_'og na mi yod pa las
[\[132a.4\]]ltung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag gcig_/yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan na gzer [#]med kyi ltung ba'o/_/rkang pa gzer bu can la 'dzeg pa'o/_/gzer med pa'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//'debs pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_bdag spyod pa'i phyir sa [#]las gzhan pa'o/_/bdag gis [#]lus kyi
[\[132a.5\]]phyir spyod pa'i chu las gzhan pa chag chag pa dang maN+Dal [#]dang 'ji ba byed pa la sogs pa'i chu srin bu yod par shes bzhin du spyad na ltung bar 'gyur te sems can med la yod par bsams te spyad na nyes byas pa'o/_/sems can yod pa la yod par shes bzhin du [#]spyad na ltung ba'o/_/sems can
[\[132a.6\]]yod la yod dam med the tshom za bzhin du spyad na ltung ba'o/_/sems can med la med par shes bzhin du spyad na nyes med do/_/srog chags dang bcas pa'i dgos pa'o/_/sems can dang bcas par spyod pa rdzogs so//_//rim [#]gnyis 'dod pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_sgo'i re bzhi [#]byas
[\[132a.7\]]te bsgrub[#]/_dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsigs [#]kyang rung gang zag gi phyir brtsigs [#]kyang rung sgo'i re bzhi [#]bca' zhing gzhug_/gtan pa yang ngo /_/sgo'i spyis dang gtan pa [#]la sogs pa'i gnas bcas/_skar khung gdod/_khang pa'i skar khung yang gdod/_gtsug
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]lag khang las byed do/_/gtsug lag khang brtsigs [#]pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/spyod lam bzhi'i snod dang [#]spyod lam bzhi po shong ba man chad ni nyes med spyod lam bzhi las lhag par brtsigs pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/de ste thams cad rdos
[\[132b.2\]]sam [#]so phag gis sam shing gis [#]na ma yin no/_/rdo 'ba' zhig gis sam shing [#]'ba' zhig gis [#]sam so phag 'ba' zhig gis brtsigs pa ni nyin gcig la [#]ji tsam brtsigs kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur te 'ji ba dang pha gu grangs las lhag par brtsigs na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/
[\[132b.3\]]char khab bam g.yogs mas so/_/char khab bam g.yogs ma yod na ni nyes med de[#]/_char khab med par pha gu dang 'ji ba las brtsigs na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/byas sam zin par mthong ste [#]sbyin pa'i bdag po la ma smras na'o/_/khang pa rtsig pa'i yon bdag gud du 'gro
[\[132b.4\]]ste bslar 'ongs pa'i khar zin par byos shig ce'am 'gro khar mthong bar dgos kyis ring du [#]zin par rtsig tu bcug pa ni chu khung dang skur [#]khung la sogs pa ma btod [#]par rim gsum las 'das par brtsigs [#]pa ni ltung bar mi 'gyur te ring par rtsigs [#]shig par ma bsgos par [#]rim gsum las
[\[132b.5\]]'das par brtsigs na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/pha gu rim gsum 'khor ba las 'das par bsgrubs na'o[#]/_/nyin gcig la pha gu rim gsum las lhag par brtsigs na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/gzhan gyis kyang ngo /_/gzhan zhig la brtsigs [#]su bcug ste
[\[132b.6\]]rim gsum las lhag par brtsigs na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i nyi ma la'o/_/pha gu rim gsum las lhag par 'dor ba [#]yang nyi ma gcig la gsum las lhag par bor na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/gzhan du yang 'jim pa med par na'o/_/so phag ma yin pa pha gu tha mal
[\[132b.7\]]pa 'ba' [#]zhig 'ji ba med par brtsigs na'ang ltung bar 'gyur te rim gsum las 'das par brtsigs pa las ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/stor khung ma btod [#]na yang ngo /_/chu 'gro ba'i stor khung ma btod [#]par brtsigs pa ni nyin gcig la pha gu rim gsum las lhag par brtsigs na ltung /
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]stor khung btod [#]na ni rim bzhin du brtsigs kyang nyes med/_rmangs ma brkos par bting na yang ngo /_/rmang gis ma brkos par rmang bting ba [#]rim gsum 'das na [#]ltung ste rmang brkos la stor khung man chad rmang la pha gu rim du bor yang nyes med/_sgo'i kha [#]khyer steng ma
[\[133a.2\]]yang ngo /_/sgo'i kha khyer ma bcug [#]par kha khyer gyi sa nas pha gu rim gsum las 'das par brtsigs na ltung /_kha khyer bcug na rim du brtsigs kyang nyes med do[#]/_/nyes med pa ni snga ma'i thog ma'o/_/chu khung ma btod [#]dam kha khyer ma bcug par rim gsum las 'das te rim bzhi
[\[133a.3\]]bor na ni ltung ba/_rim gsum bor ba phan chad bor ba ni nyes med/_rim bzhin 'dor ba'i [#]tshe nyes byas so/_/gtsug [#]lag khang gi ltung ba'o/_/rim gnyis 'dor ba'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//ma bskos pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_phas pham [#]mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo lta bu 'dzin pa [#]lo
[\[133a.4\]]nyi shu las mi nyung ba grong khyer gyi smra ba dge slong ma dang lus phrad pa bshags pa byas pa dge slong ma la ston par bskos pa'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i gso sbyin gyi tshe rtag tu chos 'chad par dge slong las bsko dgos te dge slong bko [#]ba'i phas pham pa ma byung ba
[\[133a.5\]]mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo lta bu mkhas shing 'dzin pa khrims tshang nas lo nyi shu lon pa yul gyi dbus kyi skad dang ldan zhing dor ba dang lding pa la sogs pa med pa [#]dang dge slong ma dang sngon [#]chad lus ma reg pa dang lus reg kyang bshags pa byas zin pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang ldan na dge
[\[133a.6\]]slong ma la bcu bzhi'am bco lnga'i tshe la chos 'chad par dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang rung ngo /_/'di rnams dang ldan pa'i dge slong des chos 'chad [#]kyang nyes med do/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong ma la chos bshad par bskos kyang bcu bzhi'am bco lnga'i gso sbyin gyi tshe'i dus su rtag tu 'chad
[\[133a.7\]]la dbang gi dus su de [#]ma yin par rtag tu 'chad du mi [#]dbang ngo /_/gso sbyin bco lnga pa'i mtshams kyi nang dge slong ma la chos 'chad pa'i dge slong mas gang [#]bsko ba yang bcu bzhi'am bco lnga'i gso sbyin gyi tshe dge slong mas gsol ba btab na mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]zhu ba'i las kyis 'chad par bsko'o/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol lam [#]bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i tshe ma bskos na bskos par mi chud do/_/mdo sde la sogs pa dang [#]'dzin pa med na so sor [#]thar pa thon pa'o/_/dge slong gi nang na sU tra ltag ma'i ltag ma [#]ltar bshad pa dang ldan pa med na lo nyi shu
[\[133b.2\]]lon pa phas pham pa ma byung dge slong ma dang ma reg skad mi dor ba bzhi dang ldan na dge slong pha dang dge slong ma'i so sor [#]thar pa kha ton du'ang shes shing 'chad nus na bskor rung ngo /_/de yang na phas pham pa bshad sU tra ltag ma ltar nus pa med na yang lo nyi shu lon pa phas pham
[\[133b.3\]]pa med skad mi dor dge slong ma dang reg pa ma yin na dge sbyong ma'i phas pham pa brgyad 'chad nus pa yang bskor rung ngo /_/chos lci ba yang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar phas pham pa 'chad nus pa'ang med na lo nyi shu lon zhing phas pham pa med pa dge slong ma dang ma [#]reg pa dang skad ma [#]dor ba'ang
[\[133b.4\]]dge slong ma'i [#]lci ba brgyad 'chad [#]nus pa'ang bskor rung ngo /_/phyi ma'i ni ci sring mo/_/dge slong ma la chos 'chad par bsko ba rtag [#]tu bshad pa dag dang ldan pa med na sU tra 'di las 'byung ba rnams dang ldan na bskor rung ngo /_/khyed dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'dus sam/_dge slong ma'i dge
[\[133b.5\]]'dun kun 'dus sam zhes zer nus pa dang /_kun gtsang ngam/_khyed la phas pham pa dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma la sogs pa [#]med dam kun gtsang ngam zhes smra [#]nus pa dang mthun nam/_khyed rnams las [#]brgya rtsa gcig la sogs pa gcig tu spyod cing 'du'am [#]zhes zer nus pa dang /_kha na ma tho
[\[133b.6\]]ba med dam khyed la nyes byas la sogs pa kha na ma tho ba med dam zhes zer nus pa dang /_khyed la la la [#]dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag mi 'chad dam/_khyed la dge 'dun gyis [#]gsol ba dang zhu bas bskos pa ma yin pa'i dge 'dun chos 'chad du mi 'ong ngam zhes zer nus pa dang /_khyed
[\[133b.7\]]dge 'dun las gang zag 'chad pa mi 'ong ngam/_dge 'dun gyis [#]chos 'chad par ma bskos pa'i dge slong mi 'ong ngam zhes zer nus pa dang /_khyed la 'chad pa ni dge slong su'ang mi spro ste/_khyed la dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong 'chad du mi spro ste mi btub pa med
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]dam zhes 'dri nus pa la'ang bya/_khyed ni ma rabs rigs dma' ba yin pas na khyed la chos 'chad pa ni dge slong su'ang 'chad du mi spro'o zhes zer nus pa la'ang bya ste 'di rnam gnyis ltar smra nus pa dang /_dge 'dun las khyed bshad cing bstan pa ste/_khyed dge 'dun
[\[134a.2\]]gyis chos bshad cing bstan pa yin na khyed la dge 'dun gyi [#]las chos 'chad cing ston pa mi 'ong pa'am [#]zhes zer nus pa'ang bya/_dge 'dun gyis khyed la chos bshad pa'ang thos par dka' ste res 'ga' 'chad pa yin gyis shes par smra nus pa dang /_sring mo dag bag yod par sgrubs [#]shig
[\[134a.3\]]ces so/_/khyed kyis mnyan pa dang 'chad pa la gzungs su 'dzin cing go ba dang bshad pa bzhin du bag yod par nan tan du sgrubs [#]shig ces bsgo nus pa dang ming gis smos pa'i tshig 'di rnams dang ldan zhing lo nyi shu tshang la phas pham pa med cing dge slong ma dang ma reg la skad mi dor na [#]bskor
[\[134a.4\]]rung ngo /_/bla ma'i chos dang nus pa ma [#]gtogs so/_/dgra bcom pa'i chos thob cing drug mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa ni dge 'dun gyis ma bskos par bshad kyang nyes med de [#]bla ma'i chos dang mi ldan pas dge 'dun gyis ma bskos par dge slong ma la 'chad na ltung bar gyur [#]te yan lag gcig/_
[\[134a.5\]]gcig kyang med par dge slong ma la de bskos pa dang ma bskos kyang ngo /_/rtag [#]tu bshad pa gang dang yang mi ldan par dge 'dun gyis bskos te bshad kyang ltung /_ma bskos par bshad kyang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon bskos pa ni ma bskos pa ma yin no/_/bcu bzhi'am bco lnga'i gso [(]sbyin gyi [,]sbyong gi [)]
[\[134a.6\]]tshe gsol ba dang [#]zhu ba'i las kyis [#]dge slong ma la chos 'chad par bskos pa ni phyis 'chad pa'i tshe'ang sngar dge 'dun gyis bskos zin pas da bsko mi dgos so/_/nyes med pa ni dge 'dun du ma tshang ba las rigs pa las gsol na'o/_/dge 'dun du ma tshang ba zhig las dge 'dun mas
[\[134a.7\]]chos 'chad pa bskor ci gnang zhes gsol na dge 'dun du ma tshang bas gong ma'i yon tan rnams dang ldan nam bskos kyang nyes med do/_/de yang ngo /_/dge slong pha'i dge 'dun ma tshang ba las dge 'dun mas chos bshad par ci gnang zhes gsol kyang nyes med do/_/ma bskos par
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]'chad pa'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dge slong gis ma bskos par chos 'chad pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//nub kyi bar du 'chad pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_'ab+hid nyi ma nub par shes bzhin du 'chad na ltung ba'o/_/nyi ma nub nub tu'o/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma la chos 'chad par [#]
[\[134b.2\]]bskos pa'i dge slong nyi ma nub kyi bar du bsgrub nus [#]par shes te bshad na ltung ba'o/_/nub par ma [#]shes te bshad na ni nyes med nub bam ma nub the tshom za zhing bshad pa ni ltung ba'o/_/nub mo thog thag tu chos nyan cing dge slong ma la chos 'chad pa ni ma gtogs so/_/dge slong ma'i gtsug
[\[134b.3\]]lag khang du dus kyis mi mang po 'dus shing nub mo thog thag tu chos 'chad cing nyan pa ni nyi ma nub cing zhag lon kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des te [#]de'i rnam pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dbyar mo thang ma yin na'o/_/sU tra gong ma ltar nub mo thog thag tu chos 'chad pa ltung ba
[\[134b.4\]]med par [#]bshad pa'ang dge slong pha'i gtsug lag khang dang nye la sgo thad kar 'dug cing mi phal mo che phan tshun du rgyu ba ni ltung bar mi 'gyur te de lta bu ma yin par nyi ma nub nub tu bshad pa ni ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/nub tu 'chad pa'o/_/nub kyi bar du 'chad [#]pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//zas kyi
[\[134b.5\]]phyir ltung ba la 'chad de/_mi 'jigs pa'i phyir dge slong la chos 'dri na zang zing dge slong mas dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma chos 'dri ba la mi 'jigs shing bag mi tsha ba dang 'dri ba spobs par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad pa'i dge slong la [#]dge slong mas spyan gzigs dang yo byad phran tshegs
[\[134b.6\]]dbul [#]lo/_/dge slong nan ta [#]ka dgra bcom pa rtag tu dge slong ma la chos 'chad de dge slong mas yon phran tshegs [#]phul yang mi len btsun zhing dgra bcom pa yin pas dge slong ma chos ma go bar [#]slar 'dri yang 'jigs shing mi spobs pa la mi 'jigs par bya zhing 'dri ba spobs par bya ba'i
[\[134b.7\]]phyir dge slong mas kyang kha zas dang yo byad phran tshegs [#]phul cig ces bcas/_rgya cang [#]dang lan bu dang lcags [#]pod dang dra ba dag go/_/dge slong mas dge slong pha chos 'chad pa la dbul ba ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu dag dbul lo/_/dge slong gis de longs shig[# ]/dge slong mas
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]spyan gzigs dang yo byad phran tshegs [#]dag dbul zhing 'ong na dge slong phas longs shig [#]ci blangs kyang nyes med do/_/dge slong gis yang dag pa ma yin par zang zing chung zad kyi phyir dge slong ma la chos 'chad do [#]zhes smra na'o/_/dge slong gis spyan gzigs dang yo byad
[\[135a.2\]]phran tshegs [#]dge slong ma las blangs pa la snying rje ba'i phyir chos bshad pa ni ma yin gyi yo byad dang kha zas tsam gyi phyir chos 'chad do zhes skur pa'i phyir smras na ltung ba'o/_/kha zas dang yo byad kyi phyir chos 'chad pa yin la/_de'i phyir chos 'chad do zhes bden par smras pa ni nyes med
[\[135a.3\]]do/_/zang zing chung zad la smra ba'o/_/zas kyi phyir chos 'chad do zhes smra ba'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so//_//gos 'tshem pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_'ab+hid[#]/_gnyen ma yin par shes bzhin du btsems na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong mas[#]/_dge slong ma gnyen ma yin
[\[135a.4\]]par shes bzhin du de'i gos btsems na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyen yin pa la ma yin par bsams nas btsems na nyes byas/_gnyen ma [#]yin pa la the tshom du btsems na ltung ba/_gnyen ma yin par shes te btsems na nyes byas/_gos btsem [#]pa/_gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong
[\[135a.5\]]ma'i gos bdag gis btsems te zin par byas na ltung ba'o/_/gos byed pa'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma'i gos btsems pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//gos byin pa'i ltung ba [#]'chad de/_'ab+hid/[# ]gnyen ma yin par shes bzhin la bya/_byin pa'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge
[\[135a.6\]]slong mar shes bzhin du dge slong gis gos byin na ltung ba'o/_/gos ma yin pa byin pa/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma yin pa gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma'i gang zag la gos byin na ltung bar 'gyur te dge 'dun [#]ma la gos dang zas phul ba ni nyes med do/_/de ste phrogs pa dang /_
[\[135a.7\]]dge slong ma gos phrogs sam stor ba'i [#]rkyen byung ba la [#]gos byin pa dang /_bzang por bshad pa dang /_dge slong mas chos bzang po legs par bshad pa'i phyir dge slong gis yon phul ba dang /_rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'am/_dge sbyong ma zhig rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe gos
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]med pa la gos byin pa dang /_brje ba ma yin na'o/_/dge slong ma dang gos bzang po brje ba'i phyir bzang po brjes te ngan pa byin pa dang 'di rnams ma gtogs pa gos byin na ltung ba'o/_/gos sbyin pa'o/_/gnyen ma yin pa'i dge slong ma la gos sbyin [#]pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//grogs kyi
[\[135b.2\]]ltung ba la 'chad de/_'gro ba'i dgos pa'i brtag pa byed pa dang dge tshul pha dang dge tshul ma rnams so/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma gang [#]zhig tu 'gro bar 'grogs te lam du zhugs nas kha zas bskur [#]ba dang brtag pa bya ba dang byin len bya ba'i phyir dge slong phas dge sbyong pha dang g.yog skyes
[\[135b.3\]]pa la sogs pa khrid de kha zas bskur [#]la brtag pa byed du gzhug_/dge slong mas kyang dge sbyong ma dang bud med la sogs pa khrid la zas bskur [#]zhing brtag pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma dag lam phan tshun rigs par ro/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma lam du zhugs
[\[135b.4\]]pa las 'jigs pa'i rkyen byung ste grogs [#]kyang rung g.yog med pa gang [#]zhig tu 'dong [#]na mi 'grogs par rgyang grags tsam gyis bcad de dge slong pho'i rgyags [#]ni mo la bskur [#]ro mo'i rgyags ni [#]phos bskur [#]ro/_/de ltar brjes te khyer na spags [#]pa bteg pa la sogs par mi 'gyur te nyes med do/_/
[\[135b.5\]]phan tshun du byin len kyang ngo /_/g.yog gam dge sbyong med na [#]dge slong pha'i byin len dang dge slong ma'i byin len gcig la gcig byin len du 'gyur ro/_/nad pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa lam du mi dor/_dge slong lam du 'grogs 'grogs pa las grogs la la zhig nad kyis btab
[\[135b.6\]]na sman dpyad dang grogs la sogs pa mi bya bar mi dor ro/_/de bskur[#]/_grogs lam du [#]nad kyis btab pa de bdag [#]cag gnas gang du 'dong bar bskur [#]ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma yang ngo /_/lam du zhugs pa las dge slong ma zhig nad kyis btab na yang dge slong grogs kyis sman dpyad
[\[135b.7\]]dang zhal ta la sogs pa bya zhing bskur ro[#]/_/der phan tshun du [#]grogs bya/_dge slong ma zhig lam du nad kyis btab ste dge slong ma [#]grogs mos bskur [#]zhing grogs byas kyang mi theg na dge slong phas kyang grogs bya zhing bskur [#]ro/_/de bzhin du pho na ste mi nus na dge slong mas kyang grogs bya/_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]mgo dang mjug nas [#]bzung /_sU tra ltag ma ltar grogs bya ba [#]dge slong mo na na phos ni mgo nas bteg grogs mos ni mjug [#]nas bteg go/_/de bzhin du pho na ba'i grogs bya na'ang mos ni mgo nas bteg phos ni mjug nas bteg go/_/nyes med pa ni grong du phyin
[\[136a.2\]]nas song na'o/_/dge slong nad kyis btab pa de lam du grong zhig tu bzhag pa ni nyes med do/_/na ba'i sman dang zas bsogs[#]/_sU tra ltag ma ltar nad pa grong du bzhag pa'i sman dang zas la sogs pa yang ci dgos pa bsogs te [#]bzhag_/mtshungs pa'i gzugs gcig [#]bzhag_/sU tra ltag ma ltar
[\[136a.3\]]nad pa grong du bzhag pa de la nad g.yog gcig kyang bzhag ste dge slong pha yin na ni dge slong pha las gcig bzhag_/mo [#]yin na ni dge slong ma las gcig bzhag[# ]/'jigs pa'i phyir lam grogs su 'dus pa ni ma gtogs te lam dgongs tha mi dad na dge slong ma gcig kyang lam du khyer
[\[136a.4\]]na'o/_/mi rgod dam rkun po'am 'jigs pa'i rkyen gcig [#]byung ste 'phral la lam du 'grogs te 'dus pa ni ma gtogs lam du 'grogs par snga nas dus byas te dge slong pha dang dge slong ma lhan cig dong ba ni ltung ba'o/_/rgyang grags shing so sor ro/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma dus [#]byas
[\[136a.5\]]te lam du 'grogs pa ni rgyang grags re re phyin cing ltung ba re rer 'gyur ro/_/de phyed [#]cing so sor nyes byas so/_/rgyang grags phyed cing nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dang lam du 'grogs pa'i ltung ba'o[#]/_/dge slong ma dang lam du 'grogs pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//gru'i
[\[136a.6\]]ltung ba la 'chad de/_'gram gnyis kar bar chad dang bcas te gros ma byas pa ma gtogs te zung du gru'i nang du'o/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma gnyis gru'i [#]nang du 'grogs na 'gram pha rol na'ang 'jigs tshu rol gyi 'gram na'ang 'jigs pa'i rkyen yod de chu 'gram du 'grogs te dong ba
[\[136a.7\]]'grogs par dus ma byas pa ni ma gtogs te 'grogs par dus byas la 'gram gnyis ka na 'jigs pa'i rkyen med bzhin du dge slong pha dang dge slong ma gnyis gru gcig gi nang du zhugs te dong ba ni ltung ba'o/_/thad kar pha rol du rgal ba las gzhan pa'o/_/chu la rang thad kar
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]brgal [#]ba'i phyir gru gcig gi nang du 'grogs pa ni nyes med/_yon po dang rab kha bzho bor 'dug pa dang /_ngam pa dang chu 'gram ngam pas chod de ngam pa bskor [#]ba'i phyir 'gyus [#]pa dang /_slong spang ba'am/_chu la klong yod pa'i phyir skor ba dang /_ru skya dang skya ba chag ste gru 'byam pa dang [#]/_gdos
[\[136b.2\]]chag gam gdos chag ste gru 'byam pa dang /_dngor [#]'dzin gyi dbang gis de'i phyir zhugs pa las gnas gzhan du na'o/_/mnyan pa khyim lam nye ba'i phyir thad kar stong [#]du ma btub pa dang rkyen 'di rnams ma gtogs par dge slong ma dang chu 'gram du gru gcig gi nang du 'grogs na ltung ba'o/_/
[\[136b.3\]]rtsis mgo yan lag dang bshad pa gzhan ni dge slong ma dang lam du 'grogs pa ltag tu bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/dge slong ma dang lhan cig tu chu rgal ba'o/_/dge slong ma dang gru'i nang du 'grogs pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//dben gyi bud med dang 'dug pa la 'chad de/_bud med gcig pu la
[\[136b.4\]]dben zhing 'gro ba rgyu bar mi 'jug pa'i phyogs g.yogs [#]pa dang bcas pa bar 'dom gang na de dag byed do/_/dge slong dang bud med gnyis po 'gro ba'i lam ka ma yin pa dben pa'i phyogs ra bas bskor [#]ba'am/_sa pa [#]mo'am shing thags kyis bskor ba'am shing khrod dam rtsig pas chod pa'am sa
[\[136b.5\]]sros pa rnams ni dben zhing g.yogs pa zhes bya ste/_'di rnams gang yang rung bar 'dom gang tshun chad du sa la 'dug na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dug na'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar ltung bar 'gyur ba ni dge slong pha dang bud med gnyis ka 'dug pa las ltung bar 'gyur/_'dug pa bzhag
[\[136b.6\]]ma thag tu de'o/_/'dug pa las ltung ba ni rkub sa la 'dug ma thag tu ltung bar gyur to[#]/_/gcig pu 'dug pa'o/_/dge slong pha dang bud med gnyis 'dug pa las ltung bar 'gyur ba rdzogs so//_//bud med dang 'greng na ltung bar 'gyur ba la 'chad de/_dge slong ma'o/_/dge slong pha
[\[136b.7\]]dang dge slong ma gnyis sa dben par gnyis su 'greng na ltung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag dang bshad pa rtag [#]tu bud med dang 'dug pa'i ltung ba dang 'dra'o/_/'greng ba'o/_/dge slong ma dang sa dben par 'greng ba las ltung [#]bar 'gyur te 'greng ma thag tu ltung ngo [#]/_/gcig pu 'greng pa'o//_
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]dge slong ma dang sa dben par 'greng ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//bshams pa'i ltung ba la 'chad do/[ #]'ab+h+rid/_sngar khyim bdag gis ma bos la dge slong mas bshams par shes bzhin du zos pa las ltung ste [#]yan lag gcig_/dge slong mas bshams pa'o/_/
[\[137a.2\]]khyim pa zhig la dge slong mas dge slong 'di yon tan dang ldan pa [#]yin te zas byin pa'i rigs so zhes bshams te sngar khyim bdag gis spyan drang bar ma bsgo bar zos pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/mi bden pa'i yon tan gyis so/_/dge slong yon tan dang ldan pa zhig la bshos
[\[137a.3\]]gsol cig ces byas pa ni mi ltung gis yon tan med pa las yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes brdzun du bstod pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/spyan drangs pa [#]ma byas pa'o/_/sngar khyim bdag gis spyan drangs shing ma bsgo bar dge slong mas bshams pa'i ngor khyim bdag gi khyim du
[\[137a.4\]]zan zos pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/byas kyang lhag par ro/_/khyim bdag gis sngar spyan drangs su zin yang 'phral la dge slong mas bshams te yon tan dang ldan pa 'di la sha kha ra la sogs pa lhag par gsol cig ces bya ste zos na ltung ste yan lag gcig_/bza'
[\[137a.5\]]ba'o/_/dge slong mas bshams pa'ang gos la sogs pa ni ma yin gyi zas bshams pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/nan tan dang grub pas so/_/mi bden pa'i yon tan ni dgra bcom pa'i rim pa brgyad med par [#]brgyad po'i nang nas gang rung bas bstod na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[137a.6\]]de thos pas kyang ngo /_/sde snod gsum la sogs pa dang mang du thos pa yin no zhes brdzun du bstod na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/zos na'o/_/dge slong mas bshams pa'i zas zos pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/de ni mgrin par na'o/_/zos pa'i tshad ni kha nas slar byung
[\[137a.7\]]ba'am lus dang rna ba la sogs pa bskus shing blugs pa la mi bya'i zas mgrin par song nas ltung bar 'gyur/_gzhan gyi phyir ba las na 'bri bar byed do/_/dge slong mas bshams pa'i zas shes bzhin du bdag gis blangs te gzhan la byin na nyes byas so/_/byin cig ces smras nas
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]zas kyi phyir zhugs na'o/_/dge slong pha grong na slong mo byed pa la dge slong mas 'phral la khyim pa [#]bskos te yon tan dang ldan pa 'di la gsol cig ces byas pa de blangs na nyes byas/_spyod pa bshams pa'o/_/dge slong mas bshams pa'i zas zos pa'i ltung ba ste rdzogs so/_/[#]dgu bcu'i
[\[137b.2\]]ltung ba'i bcu phung gcig rdzogs so//_//yang yang gi ltung ba la 'chad de/_zas la spyan drangs pa las grong bar du'ang bdag gir gyis shig_/khyim pa la sogs pas grong du mchod ston la spyan drangs na 'gro zhing zar dbang ste nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma song na'ang nyes med do/_/
[\[137b.3\]]dus shes par byas la 'jug ste dus sngar ni ma yin/_sU tra ltag ma ltar grong bar du spyan drangs na gdugs tshod kyi khar 'dong ba'i [#]dus ran par bya ba'i dus las sngar bdag cag mi 'dong ngo /_/gaN+Di brdungs [#]te'o/_/gdugs tshod kyi khar mchod ston la 'dong ba yang snga phyir mi 'dong ba'i
[\[137b.4\]]gaN+DI [#]brdungs te bsdus la cig car 'dus te lhan cig 'dong ngo /_/bdag gi 'khor der byul[#]/_grong bar du dge 'dun mchod ston la 'dong ba las mkhan po dang slob dpon dang gnas brtan dang mi mthun pa'i sde snod rnams so sor [#]'khor tshul dang ldan nam mi ldan pa blta zhing byul la mi
[\[137b.5\]]mdzes pa yod na mdzes par [#]bcol/_'ongs pa ni gnas brtan gyis so/_/gud nas gsar du dge slong 'ongs pa dag cig [#]yod na'ang gnas brtan gyis yon bdag la zan sbyor du gzhug pa'i [#]zhal ta dang bdag gi 'khor gyi slob ma dang 'dra bar rim gro dang zhal ta bya'o/_/gtol med par
[\[137b.6\]]zan gcad [#]par mi bya/_sman dpyad bya ba'i phyir zan bcad pa ma gtogs te gdeng med pa dang phan med par zan mi bcad [#]na nyes byas/_skom gyi phyir gsol na 'dug shig_/grong bar du mchod ston la spyan drangs pa las zan zos zin na don med par ring du mi 'khod de sbyin bdag na re
[\[137b.7\]]phyi [#]phred rgun chang la sogs pa gsol te gshegs zhes zer ba las bsdad pa dang btung ba la nyes med/_mnyam du'am phyi nas gos kyi [#]rnyed pa dang mi ldan par gnyis po'i spyan 'dren [#]pa thob na'o/_/yon bdag gnyis shig gis mchod ston la so sor lhan cig tu spyan drangs na gnyis
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]ka la 'ong ngo zhes khas blangs na nyes byas/_nyin gcig la snga [#]phyir spyan drangs pa las gnyis ka la khas blangs na nyes byas/_spyan 'dren pa de gnyis ka na re gos shig yon du dbul lo zhes zer ba las gnyis ka la khas blangs na [#]zos na nyes pa med/_spyan 'dren pa snga
[\[138a.2\]]ma la gos yod la spyan 'dren pa phyi ma la gos med par phyi ma'i zan zos pa ni ltung ba'o/_/spyan 'dren pa snga ma la gos med [#]la phyi ma la gos yod de khas blangs nas zos pa ni nyes med do/_/bza' bas so/_/yang yang bca' [#]bas ni bza' ba las ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bca' ba ni rtsa
[\[138a.3\]]ba dang sdong po dang tshigs pa dang me tog dang 'bras bu lnga'i nang du gtogs pa'o/_/bca' ba 'di rnams las lan gnyis zos kyang ltung ba med do/_/lnga'i nang du gtogs pa'o/_/bza' ba ni rnam pa lnga ste 'bras dang khur ba dang sran ma dang phye dang sha dang 'di rnams [#]lnga'i nang du gtogs
[\[138a.4\]]pa las lan gnyis su zos na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba lan gcig bca' ba lan gcig snga phyir lan gnyis zos kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ste gzhan du'ang 'di na'o/_/bza' ba rnam lnga las sngar lan gcig zos zin la phyis gzhan zhig gis spyan drangs te bza' ba rnam lnga
[\[138a.5\]]las zos na ltung /_yon bdag gis bca' ba sbyin pa'i phyir spyan drangs la bca' ba'ang zos bza' ba'ang zos na nyes byas so/_/bza' ba la spyan drangs te bza' ba dang bca' ba gnyis snga phyir zos pa nyes med do [#]bar 'gyur/_/mi na las ma byas lam du ma zhugs pa'o/_/na ba dang
[\[138a.6\]]las byas pa dang lam du zhugs pa'i rkyen med par zan lan gnyis zos na ltung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/'di rnams kyi rkyen byung ste zos pa ni ltung ba med do/_/dgongs pas ni nyes byas pa'o/_/sngar zan zos zin pa'i 'og tu spyan 'dren pa cig 'ongs pa dang ma zos pa'i mdun du sngar spyan drangs pa gcig
[\[138a.7\]]la khas blangs pa las phyis gos med pa las 'gro bar bsam shing khas blangs na de'i tshe nyes byas zos na ltung [#]ba'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar spyan drangs las rnam gnyis su zos na ltung ba'o/_/gos de khru gang khor [#]yug gi mthar gyur [#]na'o/_/gos dang bcas te zos na lan gnyis su
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]zos kyang mi ltung ngo zhes bshad pa'i gos kyi tshad ni khru gang 'khor ba yan chad cig sbyin pa'i phyir zan lan gnyis zos pa ni ltung bar mi 'gyur de las chung ba ni ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/lam ni dpag tshad phyed do/_/lam du zhugs na lan gnyis su zos kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba ni dpag
[\[138b.2\]]tshad phyed de rgyang grags bzhir 'gro ba'am phyin na zar dbang ngo /_/gzhan du yang ngo /_/so sor za ba'i lam la sogs pa dus kyang dpag tshad phyed du 'gro na so sor bzar dbang ste dus su chud de/_'di lam [#]grur 'gro ba yang ngo /_/lam dpag tshad phyed du 'gro ba dus su chud pa ni/_rkang
[\[138b.3\]]pas 'gro ba dang /_grur zhugs pa gnyis ni bzar dbang gi rta dang shing rta la sogs pa la zhon pa ni dpag tshad phyed du phyin kyang dus su mi chud de bzar mi dbang ngo /_/phyag dar re lde tsam mam byug pa ba ko tsam ni las so/_/las byas na yang yang dbang ba ni re lde tsam gyis phyags pa dang maN+Dal ba'i
[\[138b.4\]]ko ba tsam mam ba [#]nyal ba tsam gyi sa phyags pa ni dus su chud de zar dbang ngo /_/phyag dar bya ba ni chag chag sngar btab la phyag go/_maN+Dal ni ba lang gi lci ba'am 'jim pa 'jam pos bya'o/_/de mchod rten nam dge 'dun gyi la'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar sa phyags pa dang maN+Dal bya ba ni dge
[\[138b.5\]]'dun gnas 'dus [#]pa'i gtsug lag khang ngam sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dri gtsang khang du bya'o/_/gzhan du byas pa'i sa ni las su mi chud do/_/na ba'i tshad mi phod na'o/_/na na yang yang zar dbang ba'i tshad ni na ste [#]las byed mi phod par na na yang yang zar dbang ngo /_/nar ma ni spyan
[\[138b.6\]]drangs pa ni [#]ma yin no/_/yon bdag gis lo drug gam tshe gcig tu zan sbyar ba ni spyan drangs pa zhes mi bya ste gzhan zhig gis gud du spyan drangs te khas blangs pa ni nyes med do/_/yon bdag gis zhal tshus dang gro gnyis kar nar mar sbyar te za na'ang las bya dgos so/_/mthong ba tsam yang
[\[138b.7\]]ngo /_/grogs shig g.yar sus za zhing 'dug pa la bdag zas zos zin te [#]song ba mthong nas bdar te zo zhes zer te zos na'ang rung bdag zan zos zin pa las dge slong ma la sogs pa'i gnas su 'ongs te g.yar sus sam bca' ba mi bzar mi rung zhes zer te zos na'ang nyes med do/_/med par
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bslu ba byas na yang ngo /_/sngar rtsed mo'ang brdzun du zan la spyan drangs pa las zan med par gyur te phyis gzhan zhig gis bos te zos na'ang nyes med do/_/de'i phyir dge 'dun yang ngo /_/dge slong gcig cig [#]dgos shing [#]/_gces pa'i phyir dge 'dun du
[\[139a.2\]]langs [#]par spyan drangs na dge slong ming gis dgos [#]pa de dag gi [#]gnas su'ang g.yar sus zos la spyan drangs par yang zan zos na ltung ba'o/_/gzhan ni bdag gis [#]g.yar sus dang nyi rim du zos kyang nyes med de g.yam la song song ba las gzhan du spyan drangs na der song yang nyes
[\[139a.3\]]med do/_/'di gzhan lnga po la byin cig_/kha du ma zhig tu spyan drangs na kun du 'gro zhing bzar mi dbang ba'i phyir dge slong pha dang dge slong ma dang dge sbyong pho mo dang dge slob ma gag kyang rung bdag gi skyin par btang ba ni nyes med do/_/de ni chos so/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar skyin par [#]btang ba
[\[139a.4\]]yang nyes med pa ni rab tu rigs pa'i chos yin pas nyes med do/_/gzhan yang longs shig[#]/_/bdag zan nar mar yon bdag gis zan sbyar bzhin du gzhan zhig gis zan bskyal te byin nam rgyu bskyal te byin na dge slong dang dge 'dun la sbyin pa'i phyir blangs kyang nyes med do zhes bi [#]dza
[\[139a.5\]]ya bar mas bshad/_sU tra ltag ma ltar skyin par btang ba'i dge slong rnam lngas zan blangs shing zos kyang nyes med do zhes bi shu d+has [#]bshad/_mu ge'i tshe na [#]ci tsam spyan 'dren pa 'grub par bdag gir bya'o/_/lo nyes pa dang mu ge byung ba'i tshe ni kha du mar [#]spyan drangs shing zan byin
[\[139a.6\]]pa'i [#]khas blangs shing 'gro'o/_/zos pa yang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar kha [#]du mar spyan drangs shing song ba der zan lan du mar zos kyang nyes med do/_/sbyin pa yang ngo /_/mu ge'i tshe kha mang pa [#]zhig tu spyan drangs te bdag gis mi khyab na dge slong rnam lnga las kha [#]du mar spyan drangs shing skyin
[\[139a.7\]]par [#]bkye ba dang bdag la rgyu lhag [#]pa byin pa ni nyes med do/_/'bul ba mi dad par gyur na kham gnyis gsum yan chad zos la khyim [#]bdag dge slong 'di zas kyis phongs kyi rjes su yi rangs [#]shig 'di la sbyin no zhes dad pa skyed cig_/mu ge'i tshe kha du mar spyan drangs la bdag gi ltor mi shong
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]mi khyab ste grogs rnam lngar [#]skyin par zar bcug pa la sbyin bdag mi dga' bar gyur na bdag gis kham gnyis sam gsum zos la dge slong 'di zas kyis phongs [#]pa yin te 'di la zas sbyin [#]pa ni bsod nams che ste yon tan du [#]'gyur gyis mi dga' bar ma byed par rjes su yi rangs
[\[139b.2\]]par byos shig ces bshad la sbyin bdag dga' bar bya ste bdag gi skyin [#]par dge slong gzhan zas zar bcug la bdag gud du 'gro'o/_/yang yang za ba'o/_/yang yang za ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//'ba' zhig gi ltung ba la 'chad de/_'di chos pa'i ma yin pa/_sangs
[\[139b.3\]]rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa mur 'dug gi chos byed pa 'khod pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/khyim pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa/_gnas kyi sbyin bdag khyim pa yin la sbyin bdag dang bcas par 'dug pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/mur 'dug [#]
[\[139b.4\]]thams cad kyi ma yin pa'i gnas su'o/_/mur 'dug thams cad lam bsdoms [#]kyi mur 'dug ste [#]gcig la bsngos pa las ltung bar 'gyur/_/mi na'am/_dge slong na ba'i rkyen ma byung bar 'dug pa las ltung te [#]yan lag gcig_/sbyin bdag gis spyan [#]drangs na'o/_/mur
[\[139b.5\]]'dug gi gnas der sbyin bdag gis spyan drangs pa ni ltung bar mi 'gyur gyi spyan drangs par song ste 'dug pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/zos nas der zos na rtsa ba'o/_/mur 'dug gi gnas su zan lan gcig zos pas ni ltung bar mi 'gyur gyi zan lan gnyis zos
[\[139b.6\]]na ltung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag 'di drug dang ldan na ltung ba'o/_/gnas nas yang gnas na yang nyes byas pa'o/_/mur 'dug gi gnas su zan ma zos par yang zhag gcig 'dug pa ni nyes med de zan ma zos par zhag gnyis 'dug pa ni nyes byas pa'o/_/de las 'das na
[\[139b.7\]]zhag re [#]nyes byas/_bdag po med na yang ngo /_/mur 'dug gi gnas de'i sbyin bdag khyim pa med pa zhig tu zan lan gnyis zos pa ni nyes byas lci ba/_zan ma zos na zhag gnyis lon pa ni nyes byas yang ba'o/_/'di rab tu byung bas mur 'dug bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]gis [#]yon bdag byas te mur 'dug gi phyir gnas byas pa'i sar zan lan gnyis zos na'ang nyes byas zan ma zos par zhag gnyis lon na'ang nyes byas [#]yang ba'o/_/gnyen gyi yang ngo /_/gnyen khyim pa zhig gis mur 'dug gi [#]gnas byas pa'i sar gnas
[\[140a.2\]]na'ang sU tra ltag ma dang 'dra bar nyes byas so/_/'ba' zhig pa'i spyod pa'o/_/'ba' zhig pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//sbrus pa'i ltung ba la [#]'chad de/_spyan drangs pa'o/_/dge slong bsod snyoms la song song ba las yon bdag dad pas kha zas ci bzhed pa bzhes shig ces
[\[140a.3\]]dus kyis ma bdar ba las ltung ste yan lag gcig ma bcad/_dus kyis ni bdar gyi 'di tsam zhig khyer cig ces [#]thang ma bcad pa las blangs na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/ci bde zhes ma byas pa/_dus kyis ni bdar na ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces ma byas pa las ltung ste
[\[140a.4\]]sU tra ltag ma dang gnyis la yan lag gcig tu brtsi'o/_/khyim bdag gi'o/_/dus kyis bdar ba de khyim bdag kyang yin pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/'bras btsos pa yul dbus su gyur 'chad kyi sra [#]sta phyed dang lnga'i tshad kyi sras [#]sta tshod ma sngor du bcas
[\[140a.5\]]grogs po dang lhan cig pa ni skal ba'i [#]bsod snyoms so/_/khyim bdag gis zas khyer cig ces dus kyis bstabs na 'bras btsos pa tshod ma dang sngor ma gtogs par sra [#]sta phyed dang lnga grogs gzhan la yang sbyin zhing lhan cig bza' ba'i phyir blangs kyang nyes [#]med do/_/sra [#]sta phyed
[\[140a.6\]]dang lnga las lhag par blangs na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/sra [#]sta phyed dang lnga las sra [#]sta do la ni lhung bzed chen po gang sra [#]sta phyed dang do la lhung bzed 'bring po gang /_sra [#]sta gang la lhung bzed chung ngu gang ste lhung bzed che chung gsum gyi tshad du ni len du dbang gi de las lhag pa'i
