[\[159b.3\]]dmag mi rgal [#]bar bshams shing chas te 'dod pa la phyugs la ku re byed cing klan ka btsal ba'i phyir reg pas kyang ltung /_g.yul sprad de 'thab pa la bdag gi gnas nas mthong bar bltas pas kyang ltung ngo /_/ma zhugs par na 'bri [#]ba'o/_/dmag mi 'thab tu 'dong ste go
[\[159b.4\]]cha dang mtshon cha la sogs pa thogs shing ma [#]bshams pa zhig ma [#]bltas na nyes byas/_bal glang [#]dang rta dang bya gag dang 'ur pa dang thi ba dang bud med skyes pa 'thab [#]pa la sogs pa mi bya ba byed du mi gzhug [#]mi blta/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams bdag gis 'thab tu bcug
[\[159b.5\]]ste bltas kyang rung gzhan la 'thab tu bcug ste bltas kyang rung ste nyes byas/_/'di rnams ma gtogs par gzhan 'thab pa la bltas na'ang nyes byas/_dmag gi yan lag myong ba'o/_/dmag shom pa la bltas pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//'tshog pa'i ltung ba la [#]'chad
[\[159b.6\]]de/_sems 'khrugs pas so/_/sems 'khrugs shing khros nas brdegs pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/lus dang lus nyid kyis [#]brdegs kyang ltung /_de las btang ba dang /_lus kyis rdo dbyig la sogs pa 'phangs te btang na'ang ltung /_gtogs pa lus la
[\[159b.7\]]lag [#]cha thogs pas brdegs kyang ltung /_gang su la yang chung ngu na rkang pa'i mthe bos sam[#]/_lus nyid kyis brdegs pa ni rkang pa'i mthe po'am/_mdzub mo'i bem [#]tol tsam yan chad kyis brdeg [#]pa yang ltung ngo /_/yungs kar ram/_lus kyis 'phangs te btsog [#]
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]pa ni yungs kyi [#]'brum bu tsam yan chad kyis brdeg pa yang ltung ngo /_/'jag ma dag gis brdegs pa'o/_/lus la gtogs pa'i lag chas brdegs pa ni rtswa'am phyags [#]mas brdegs pa tsam gyis kyang ltung ngo /_/'di rnams gang gis brdegs
[\[160a.2\]]kyang rung ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/dge slong na'o/_/dge slong brdegs pa las ltung bar [#]'gyur te yan lag gcig_/pha rol la'o/_/dge slong pha rol po brdegs pa par [#]'gyur te yan lag gcig_/'og ma gsum yang ngo /_/gza' [#]dang nyes smos dang
[\[160a.3\]]bde ba'i ltung ba gsum yang pha rol dge slong yin pa las ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/reg na'o/_/brdegs [#]pa pha rol la phog cing reg pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig ste yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan na ltung ba'o/_/bsnun pa so sor ro/_/brdegs pa ni sor mo
[\[160a.4\]]dang 'brum bu dang rtsa nyag ma re re la ltung ba [#]re rer 'gyur ro/_/khu tshur gyis brdegs [#]pa ni ltung ba gcig_/ma phog na nyes byas/_brdeg [#]pa'i phyir bsnun cing 'phangs pa las ma phog pa ni nyes byas te 'bru re nyes byas re re/_gzhan du bsnun na gzhan du ma bsnun kyang ngo /_/
[\[160a.5\]]bdag 'dod chags langs [#]te pho mtshan brdungs sam bcad pa ni nyes byas/_dge slong cig 'dod chags langs te pho mtshan brdungs pa las 'dod chags kyi sems brdungs shig pho mtshan brdungs kyang mi phan no zhes spyos [#]nas phyin chad brdungs [#]na nyes byas zhes bcas/_
[\[160a.6\]]ka ba la bsnun [#]par mi sbyin/_ka ba la thal mos bsnun [#]na sor mo re re nyes byas re rer 'gyur/_drug sdes ka ba la thal mo brdabs te ka ba [#]'gul ba las bcas/_rtsig pa dang sa dang shing dang gzhan la yang ma yin no/_/ka ba la thal mos [#]bsnun na nyes byas su 'gyur
[\[160a.7\]]ba bzhin du rdo shing ci la [#]bsnun kyang nyes byas su 'gyur te khro sems dang yongs pa [#]dang rtsed mo'i phyir bsnun pa ni nyes byas dgos shing don gyi phyir brdabs pa ni nyes med/_bsnun pa'o/_/'tshog pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//gzas pa'i ltung ba la 'chad[#]/_bsnun
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]pa gzas pa/_bsnun pa ltar bsdigs pa'i phyir btsog par gzas pa ni ltung ba ste yan lag dang bshad pa thams cad ltag ma 'chog pa'i ltung ba [#]dang 'dra'o/_/rdzas so sor ro/_/gzas na sor mo dang 'bru dang rtsa nyag ma re re ltung ba [#]re rer 'gyur ro/_/gzas pa'o/_/
[\[160b.2\]]gzas pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//[#]nyes smos la 'chad de/_phas pham pa [#]dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/_/phas pham pa dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcabs [#]pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/ma gtogs [#]pa ni mi bde ba dang dge sbyong dang tshangs par spyod pa'i
[\[160b.3\]]bar chad dang dge 'dun 'khrugs par dogs pa'i dbang du gtogs pa'o/_/ltung bar mi 'gyur ba ni phas pham pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byung ba mthol na bdag la mi bde zhing gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_dge sbyong dang dge slong grogs la dge ba spyod pa'i bar chad du
[\[160b.4\]]'gyur zhing mi bde ba dang dge 'dun 'khrugs par 'gyur du dogs par 'di rnams kyi rkyen lta bu zhig gi phyir ma mthol cing bcabs pa ni nyes med de rkyen 'di rnams med pa las ltung ste yan lag gcig_/sbas pa'o/_/nyes pa de shes bzhin du bcabs pa las ltung bar 'gyur te
[\[160b.5\]]yan lag gcig_/zhag gi mthar na'o/_/zhag gcig gi skya rengs byung ba las ltung bar gyur [#]te yan lag gcig_/yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur te[#]/_sngar ni nyes byas pa'o/_/bcabs par bsams na skya rengs ma byung gi [#]bar du nyes byas/_nyes pa
[\[160b.6\]]gzhan yang ngo /_/ltung ba dang nyes byas la sogs pa gzhan la yod cing byung ba shes te bcabs na nyes byas/_kha na ma tho ba sbed pa'o/_/dge slong gi nyes [#]pa bcabs pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//ltung ba'i bcu ste gcig 'das so/_/bde ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_nad
[\[160b.7\]]kyi [#]gsos kyi phyir ni ma gtogs te/_dge slong na ba la phan pa'i phyir zan bcad pa dang /_sman bya ba'i phyir zan ma byin pa ni nyes med do/_/bsams nas khyim pa'i sbyin bdag gi zas gcod par byed pa'o/_/dge slong la ched kar zan gcad [#]par bsams nas khyim pa'i
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gnas su dge slong la zan ma byin zhing bcad na ltung ba'o/_/nan da dang u pa nan das slob ma dar ma la zas bcad pa las bcas/_zas [#]gcod par byed pa'o/_/zan gcod pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//me'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_seng ge la mi reg_/
[\[161a.2\]]seng ge la reg par mi bya/_seng ge la reg na khros te reg tu mi bzod cing /_gnod par byed pa de bzhin du me la reg tu mi rung ba'i dper smos so/_/ston pa dang chos dang dge 'dun dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa me la reg kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas dang
[\[161a.3\]]chos dang dge 'dun dang dge slong grogs kyi phyir mchod cing bsro bar bsams te reg pa dang bus pa ni nyes med do[#]/_/chos kyi bya ba'i phyir bya bar brtags te lhung bzed btso ba'i las la dus bsngo/_chos kyi phyir bdag gi lus kyi [#]yo byad du chos gos dang lhung bzed
[\[161a.4\]]la sogs pa [#]btso bar sa ma yam bsngos te me la reg pa ni nyes med do/_/ring du bsngo/_/lhung bzed dang chos gos btso ba'i bsams [#]pas sa ma yam gyi dus bsngo ba ni thog ma [#]reg pa na zin gyi bar du gzung [#]ngo snyam du bsam/_rtsed mo me la rtse ba'i phyir bzung na'ang ltung bar
[\[161a.5\]]'gyur te 'og nas 'chad/_mgal ba bskor ba dang zla ba dang nyi ma ltar mgal ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa byed do[#]/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gzugs 'dra bar mgal ba la rtses shing bskor na ltung bar 'gyur/_'di rnams kyi gzugs ma yin yang me la gzhan
[\[161a.6\]]ji ltar rtses kyang ltung ba'o/_/mes so/_/me la reg pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/sa ma yam ma [#]bsngos na'o/_/me la bzung ba'i tshe/_sa ma yam ma bsngos pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/rtse ba dang don med pa'i phyir gzung [#]ba ni sa ma yam bsngos
[\[161a.7\]]kyang mi chud do/_/mi na ba'i dbang gis ma 'dug par reg pa'o/_/bdag mi na par me [#]la reg pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig bdag gis ma bskos na'o/_/bdag gis bzung ngam gzhan 'dzin du bcug pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/yan lag
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]'di rnams dang ldan par byas na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/spar ba dang me cher bud pa'i phyir reg pa dang /_gzhil ba dang me chung bar bya ba'i phyir reg pa dang /_shing la reg pa dang /_mgal ba la reg pa dang /[ #]ma reg par bus kyang rung /_mgal ba ma yin pa'i shing
[\[161b.2\]]mes ma reg par mer [#]bcug pa dang /_'jug pa dang shing mer 'jug pa dang /_'byin par bsko ba/_mgal [#]ba phyir 'byin pa dang /_mdag ma spyur ba dang 'bru ba'o/_/mdag ma spyur zhing spungs pa [#]dang /_mdag ma 'bru ba dang /_'di rnams gag kyang rung byas na ltung bar
[\[161b.3\]]'gyur/_me ma mur ni phyed do/_/thal ba me ma [#]mur can la reg pa ni nyes byas so/_/'bar ba yang ngo /_/me lce la reg pa yang nyes byas/_der shing gis bcug ste phyung na me gzhan du chud do/_/me lce dang me mar [#]mur can la shing bcug ste mer mched pa la reg na ni ltung
[\[161b.4\]]ba'o zhes TI ka [#]las bshad/_mkhan po kha cig na re nyes byas zhes bshad/_skra dang spu dang rus pa dang sen mo dang mchil ma dang snabs dang skyugs pa dang tshad pa dang bal sran dang rgya sran dang shing mar dang /_yungs mar dang sbrang rtsi dang mar rnams ni shing phyed bzhin no/_/
[\[161b.5\]]mang [#]gis smos pa 'di rnams mer bsregs pa ni nyes byas so/_/gzhan la byed cing gzhan bsngos pa bsngos pa phyed do/_/sangs rgyas [#]grogs kyi phyir bsngos te bus pa las gzhan gyi [#]phyir spyad dam grogs lta bu'i phyir bud [#]pa la sa ma yam gyi 'du shes gzhan gyi phyir bsngos pa
[\[161b.6\]]ni nyes byas/_me'i khrims so/_/me la reg pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//dad pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_dge slong gi phyir las 'das pa dad pa byin te slar len pa'i phyir [#]ngag gis so/_/dge slong gi dge [#]'dun gyi las ci byed kyang rung sngar dad pa phul la phyis dad pa mi 'bul lo
[\[161b.7\]]zhes smras shing bzlog pa ni ltung ba'o/_/dad pa slar lan [#]pa'o/_/dad pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//rab tu ma rdzogs pa'i ltung ba [#]la 'chad de/_nyi ma dang zla ba ma yin pa'i snang ba can gyi gnas kyi [#]phyogs su mi nyal/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la [#]nyal ba ni nyes med de me dang me mar
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]dang rin po che dang sman gyi 'od la nyal na nyes byas/_ma gtogs pa ni nad pa dang nad pa'i g.yog gi dbang gis na'o/_/ltung bar mi 'gyur ba ni dge slong nad pa me mar gyis btsa' dgos pa de dang [#]de'i nad g.yog mi mar gyis btsa' dgos pa de dang [#]/_
[\[162a.2\]]'od la nyal ba ni nyes med do/_/'dir 'ga' 'ga' ltung ba'o zhes so/_/me mar gyi 'od la nyal ba 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re ltung ba'o zhes kyang 'chad de ltung ba dgu bcu rtsa [#]gcig tu mi 'byung bas ltung ba ma yin gyi nyes byas so/_/nyal ba ma yin na ni phyed do/_/me mar
[\[162a.3\]]gyi 'od dang dge sbyong dang lhan cig khyim gcig gi nang na tsog pur thum phras su nyal ba ni ltung ba dang nyes byas kyi phyed du 'gyur ro/_/so sor nyin mo la yang ngo /_/nyin par me mar gyi 'od la nyal ba dang mtshan mo 'dra ste nyes byas so/_/mang du g.yogs pa'i bskor ba ba'i khyim
[\[162a.4\]]gyi [#]mtha'o/_/khyim gcig tu nyal na ltung ba'i khyim ni thog kyang gsum gnyis por rtsig pa'ang sum gnyis bskor ba'i nang du dge sbyong [#]dang nyal na ltung bar 'gyur/_der chud pa bzhin pa ni gtogs pa'i sgo'i ngos kyi mtshams kyang khyim du gyur pa na'o/_/khang pa gcig gi [#]
[\[162a.5\]]nang na nyal ba dang 'dra bar khang bu gcig phug [#]na 'dug la sgo na khang pa'am khyams thog phor [#]ba zhig yod na khang bu phug ma'i pha rol tshu rol gyi rtsig pa kha drang du bcad na phug [#]pa tsam gyis khyon tshad [#]kyi nang tsam du byas pa'i phyi rol gyi khang par dge sbyong nyal na phug [#]mar dge
[\[162a.6\]]slong nyal yang ltung bar 'gyur/_rib ma ltag [#]ma yang sgo de'i nang du chud do/_/khang bu yang thog can du 'dug na [#]sgo 'og khang gi nang du byung la gcig tu dge sbyong nyal la gcig tu dge slong nyal ba ni ltung bar 'gyur/_rim pa mang po [#]gcig gi nang du gcig sgo phyung ba ni
[\[162a.7\]]mi [#]brtsi'o/_/mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas tsam phan chad gnas na der so sor 'gyur ro/_/ra mo ches bskor ba'i nang na nyal na 'dom gang phan chad du dge sbyong bsnyal pa ni nyes byas khang mo che zhig nas bdag nyal ba nas [#]bdag gi gnas khang gcig tsam gyi sas
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]bar du bcad de de phan chad dge sbyong bsnyal ba ni nyes med/_phyed pa ni shing gi rtsa ba dang rtsig pa'i ser ga dang ldum rtsa rnams so/_/dge sbyong dang lhan cig tu shing gi lo ma 'dab chags su 'dres shing steng khebs par 'dug pa'i 'og tu nyal lam khang pa'i rtsig pa glo rdol du
[\[162b.2\]]seng song [#]por 'dug ste phan tshun mi rgyur [#]rung ba dang gad pa'i ser ga seng song [#]por 'dug pa'i nang du nyal lam rgun 'bru'i shing [#]lta bu steng 'dzings [#]pa dang ldum phong [#]phung gi khrod du nyal ba ni nyes byas/_sdug po dang bcas par bud med dang lhan cig nyal na'o/_/nags sam rtswa'am
[\[162b.3\]]ldam ldum khrod du bud med dang nye bar nyal na nyes byas su 'gyur te ci tsam tshun chad pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_de'i lam ni bya gag 'phur nas bab [#]pa nang du 'gyur ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar nyes byas su 'gyur ba'i tshad [#]ni bya gag 'phur te bab [#]pa'i lam tshun chad gcig tu
[\[162b.4\]]nyal na nyes byas khang mo zhig du nyal na'ang bya gag 'phur ba'i lam tshun chad ltung ba'o/_/thams cad kyi bar du rgyur yod pa khyim gzhan med par g.yogs na gcig go/_khang pa phyi rgya [#]gcig la nang mig so sor 'dug ste dbus kyi khyams [#]dog pa zhig na sgo med dam [#]
[\[162b.5\]]sgo ma bcad par khang bu nang du dge sbyong [#]nyal la dbus su dge slong [#]nyal na ltung ba'o/_/so so ni bdag gi skal bar gtogs pa'i sgo bcing pas bcings na mtshams kyang ngo /_/khang pa'i phyi rgyag [#]cig la nang tha dad par 'dug na gcig tu dge slong nyal te sgo dam du bcad
[\[162b.6\]]na gzhan du dge sbyong nyal kyang mi ltung /_de bzhin du dge slong gis ltung ba la bsrung na'o/_/bud med kyang dge slong gcig gis res kyis bsrungs la gcig nyal kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag pos bsrungs pa'i bud med na yang ngo /_/bud med khyim thab [#]dang bcas
[\[162b.7\]]par 'dug pa ni khyim gcig na nyal kyang zhag gcig gis ltung bar mi 'gyur te zhag gnyis las 'das [#]na ni rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang nyal ba ni ltung bar brtsi/_rim bla mar na skas phyung na'o/_/bdag yang thog tu nyal na bud med dam dge sbyong 'og khang du bsnyal la skas
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]steng du drangs te nyal kyang nyes med do/_/'bri ba ni khyim ma yin gzhan du gyur na'o/_/khang pa thog phyed bor ba dang phyed bskor ba dang khang bu'i [#]sgo'i phyi rol thog med pa la 'dom gang tshun chad thang ngam dbye la 'dom gang tshun chad du dge sbyong nyal
[\[163a.2\]]na nyes byas/_rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig tu grong na nub gsum du nyal ba'o/_/rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang khyim gcig la nub gnyis las 'das par nub gsum du nyal na ltung ba'o/_/'thas na'o/_/nub gsum gyi mtha' skya rengs byung na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[163a.3\]]phan chad ni nyes byas pa'o/_/zhag gnyis nas gsum gyi skya rengs ma byung gi bar du dge sbyong dang nyal na nyes byas/_nyes med pa ni lam ni [#]ngal te myos pa'o/_/lam ring po nas 'ongs te [#]chad pa ni zhag gsum gyi [#]skya rengs ma byung tshun chad ldang bar bsams te langs pa ni
[\[163a.4\]]nyes med de/_de lta bu'i mthar yang ngo /_/sU tra ltag ma ltar [#]chad pa'i dge slong skya rengs ma byung tshun chad ldang bar byas pa las thal byung gnyid log ste skya rengs byung yang nyes med do[#]/_/ma brtags pa'i dge slong gis bya ba de sgrub pa dang nad g.yog lhan cig tu yang ngo /_/dge slong nad
[\[163a.5\]]pa la sogs pa rtog cing byin len bya ba'i phyir dge sbyong bzhag ste gzhan du bsnyal na gnas med dam nad pa la mi bde na drung du bsnyal na yang nad pa la [#]yang ltung bar mi 'gyur nad g.yog dge slong la yang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dang yang ngo /_/gzhan yang dge
[\[163a.6\]]sbyong dang lhan cig nyal na yang ltung bar [#]mi 'gyur ba yod de 'og nas 'chad do/_/de yod pas so/_/dge slong slob pa'am nye gnas [#]dge sbyong yod pa ni dge sbyong de dang lhan cig nyal yang ltung bar mi 'gyur te 'og nas 'chad do[#]/_/gnas de na sdig pa'i dge slong 'dug
[\[163a.7\]]na'o/_/bdag cag gi gnas na dge sbyong kha 'dren [#]cing 'phrog pa dang dge sbyong gi rkub tu mi tshangs par spyod pa'i dge slong sdig pa spyod pa yod na bdag gi slob ma dge sbyong dang nub gnyis las lhag par nyal kyang nyes med/_bskrad par nan tan byas sam byed pa'o/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bdag cag gi 'khor na sdig pa byas [#]pa'i dge sbyong yod na bdag cag gis kyang bskrad/_bdag gi [#]ma nus na rgyal po'am zhang blon la [#]byas te 'ang bskrad tshul phyi ma'i [#]dus na thog ma'i zla ba gnyis kyi tshe na'o/_/sdig pa byed pa'i dge slong skrod ma nus na tshul phyi mar zhugs kyang
[\[163b.2\]]zla ba gnyis lon nas tshul dral te bdag gi dge sbyong sngon du bcug la bkri'o/_/de las lhag par mi gnas/_tshul phyi mar zhugs nas zla ba gnyis lon na de las ring du mi bsdad [#]par mdo ltag ma ltar 'gro/_ma song na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/snga ma'i tshul ni mi dgos/_sdig
[\[163b.3\]]pa'i dge slong yod na tshul snga mar mi bsrung mi 'jug par bdag gi dge sbyong khrid la 'gro/_phan chad pa'ang mi bsrung /_tshul snga mar zhugs kyang sdig pa'i dge slong yod na zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsrungs shing bsdad mi dgos kyi tshul phyi ma yod pas snga ma dral te dge
[\[163b.4\]]sbyong khrid la song shig[# ]/de lta na mi gnas pa'i dge slong mi gzhag_/bdag cag [#]gi 'khor na [#]sdig pa'i dge slong yod na gzhan gyi dge sbyong nye [#]gnas su'ang mi gzhag_/dge sbyong gsar du rab tu 'byung ba zhig yod na'ang rab tu mi dbyung [#]ngo /_/gnyid ltung [#]ste myos
[\[163b.5\]]na lam du dge sbyong mthun du byas te 'gro'o/_/dge sbyong khrid de song ba las dge sbyong chud cing gnyid kyis myos na dge sbyong phyi bzhin 'brang du mi gzhug gi [#]sngon du bcug la bkri'o/_/de ste bkres na de'i tshe [#]tshul dus pas sngar zas sbyin/_dge sbyong bkres shing 'gro mi
[\[163b.6\]]phod na gdugs tshod la [#]ma bab par zan sbyin no[#]/_/bkres te mi bzod cing zas slong na phyi dro byin kyang nyes med do/_/de ste yang dus la yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar sngar zan byin kyang gdugs tshod kyi tshe'ang zas sbyin no/_/rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'o/_/
[\[163b.7\]]rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//chos la 'chad de/_'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa shes te ci ltar gang bar du gcod pa'i chos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de bsnyen kyang bar du gcod par mi
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]'gyur ro zhes pa [#]la sogs pa dge slong zhig 'di skad ces smras te 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa ni shes te ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos gsungs pa ni de spyad kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro
[\[164a.2\]]zhes zer ba'i dge slong de la dge slong dag gis 'di skad ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod 'di skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa ni shes te/_de ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de spyad kyang bar du
[\[164a.3\]]gcod par mi 'gyur ro [#]zhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das la skur ba ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas dge bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ste du ma'i gzhung las kyang bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi [#]ni bar gcod [#]do zhes gsungs
[\[164a.4\]]te de [#]spyad pas bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis 'di lta bu'i sdig pa la lta [#]ba thong shig ces bsgo [#]ste ma mnyan na [#]ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum bsgo ba'i thabs dang bshad pa ni dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum la 'jug gi bzhi bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/tshig tsam [#]nas
[\[164a.5\]]mi gtong ba'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba las de [#]skad ma zer bar thong shig ces lan gsum du bsgo bar gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas te ma btang na ltung bar 'gyur/_'di smad pa'i phyir de la zhu ba bya/_mdo ltag ma ltar [#]lan
[\[164a.6\]]gsum du bsgo ste ma nyan pa'i dge slong de chos la 'gal zhes [#]nyes pa mi gtong ba'i phyir dge 'dun smad pa'i las byas te bskrad do/_/lta bar zhugs pa mi gtong ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos la bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i ltung
[\[164a.7\]]ba rdzogs so//_//smra ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_'ab+h+rid[#]/_ltag tu bshad pa ltar dge slong bskrad pa [#]shes bzhin du 'grogs pa las ltung bar 'gyur/_de skad zer spangs pa [#]slar ma byas pa'i dge slong las so/_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]bar du gcod pa'i chos gsungs pa
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]las [#]bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la lan gsum bsgo ste/_ma mnyan cing slar ma bshags pa'i dge slong dang bcar zhing 'grogs pa las ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bstan [#]pa byin pa yang ngo /_/dge slong bskrad pa klog pa dang kha don [#]'bul ba la bstan cing bslabs
[\[164b.2\]]na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun 'dril [#]ba dang /_chos dang las byed pa la sogs pa bskrad pa'i dge slong 'dri zhing 'ong ba la bstan na'ang ltung ba'o/_/gnas bca' ba dang /_bskrad pa'i dge slong de bdag la gnas 'char bcug na'ang ltung ba'o/_/bstan pa dang [#]'chad
[\[164b.3\]]pa yang ngo /_/chos dang bsam gtan la sogs pa bstan cing bshad na'ang ltung ba'o/_/lta ba 'chags pa bskrad pa'i dge slong de la khyod nyes pa med de dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa [#]mi rigs na zhes smras na'ang ltung /_zang zing spyod pa'o/_/bskrad pa'i dge slong de bcar
[\[164b.4\]]zhing zas dang gos la sogs pa byin pa'ang ltung bar 'gyur/_g.yog [#]bdag gir byas pa/_bskrad pa'i dge slong de bdag [#]gi g.yog tu las dag byed du bcug na'ang ltung ba'o/_/khyim du lhan cig nyal ba/_bskrad pa'i dge slong de dang khyim gcig gi nang na lhan
[\[164b.5\]]cig nyal na'ang ltung ba'o/_/'thas [#]so/_/khyim gcig [#]gi nang na nyal te skya rengs 'byung na'ang ltung ngo /_/nub mo'o/_/skya rengs 'byung ba'i ni zhag gcig lon pa'i nub mo 'das pa'i skya rengs 'byung na ltung ba'o/_/gzhan yang 'du [#]ba'o/_/bskrad pa'i dge slong
[\[164b.6\]]de dang lhan cig 'grogs kyang rung gtam byas kyang rung ste ci spyad kyang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma gtogs pa ni nad pa dang lta ba dbye ba bya ba'i phyir ro/_/ltung bar mi 'gyur ba ni bskrad pa'i dge slong nad kyis btab ste gso ba dang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes
[\[164b.7\]]zer zhing log pa [#]bltas pa dang bral zhing 'chags su gzhug pa'i phyir bsnyen cing bcar ba ni nyes med do/_/spangs pa dang 'jug pa'o/_/dge slong bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i phyir bskrad pa dang 'grogs pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//dge sbyong gi ltung ba
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]la 'chad de/_tshig de brtsams nas mi gtong ba'i dge sbyong ma rung par bya/_dge sbyong zhig 'di skad zer te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa ni bar du gcod do zhes gsungs pa bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la bar du gcod par 'gyur
[\[165a.2\]]gyis de skad ma zer cig ces dge 'dun gyis bsgo ste ma mnyan cing ma btang [#]na dge sbyong de bskrad do/_/u pa nan da'i slob ma dge sbyong dang dge sbyong gzhan du rtse zhing sdig pa spyad pa dgra bcom pa dang bskur [#]pa las bcas/_sngar zhu ba bzhi'i las kyis [#]khyod ces nas phyis
[\[165a.3\]]ma rung bar khyod do zhes rim gyis zhu ba byed de thong shig 'di lta bu'i gzugs sdig pa la lta bar gyur pa las dang po glag pa bya ste gnyis so zhes so sor de'i mthar dge slong gis bsgo/_mdo ltag ma ltar dge sbyong bskrad pa ni dge 'dun gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byed
[\[165a.4\]]pa mthong bar mi dgug gi [#]pho nyar dge slong cig btang ste bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes smra ba de thong [#]shig ma btang [#]na khyod dge 'dun gyis skrod [#]par byed de gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las [#]lan gcig byas zin to zhes bsgo/_de bzhin du ma btang na bskrad pa'i las gsol
[\[165a.5\]]ba dang zhu ba'i las gnyis byas zin gyis thong shig ces bsgo/_lan gnyis bsgo ste'ang ma gtang na lan gsum gyi [#]bar du bsgo ste ma btang na dge sbyong de bskrad do/_/log na lhag pa mi bya/_mdo [#]ltag ma ltar lan cig lan gnyis lan gsum tshun chad du bsgo ste btang [#]
[\[165a.6\]]na bsgo ba phyi ma yang bya mi dgos bskrad pa yang mi bya'o/_/ma rung ba'i phyir dge sbyong [#]la'o/_/ltag tu bshad pa ltar lan gsum du bsgo ste ma btang [#]nas bskrad pa'i dge sbyong de dang bcar zhing 'grogs pa las ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ltung bar 'gyur ba ni ltag tu dge slong
[\[165a.7\]]bskrad pa dang 'grogs na ltung bar 'gyur bar bshad pa'i tshig kun 'di'i yan lag tu gtogs te de [#]dang 'dra'o/_/ma rung bar bya ba'i bsdus pa'o/_/dge sbyong bskrad pa dang 'grogs pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//kha dog bsgyur [#]ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_sngon po dang /_
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rams kyis btsos pa dang /_btsag dang sa [#]dmar gyis btsos pa yang rung 'dam la btsos pa yang rung /_shun pas shing dang ldum gyi rtsa ba dang shing shun dang me tog dang lo mas btsos pa/_bdag gis gos ma btsos pa las so/_/'di rnams kyis kha dog bsgyur
[\[165b.2\]]cing btsos pa ni gyon cing 'chang du dbang gis kha dog ma bsgyur ba gyon cing 'chang na ltung ba'o/_/mthar ni [#]lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs [#]pa dang gtur bu dang rkang pa'i gos dang lus bcing pa dang bgo ba la sogs pa kun spyod pa'o/_/gos gsar du byas shing sar pa
[\[165b.3\]]zhig gsar du rnyed kyang rung rnying [#]ba zhig nyos sam byin te gsar du rnyed kyang rung chung ngu na lhung bzed kyi kha bcad pa dang ska rags yan chad ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste 'chang ngam gyon na [#]ltung ba'o/_/sde [#]gzhan gyis las na'ang brtag mi dgos/_dge
[\[165b.4\]]slong pha [#]dang dge slong ma dang dge slob ma dge sbyong pho mo dang lnga gang gis btsos kyang rung kha dog bsgyur zin pa mi [#]gdod btso mi dgos te gcig la gcig brtags pa'o/_/khyim pas phrogs na yang ma yin/_dge slong gis gos kha dog [#]bsgyur zin pa las rkun
[\[165b.5\]]pos khyer ram khyim pa zhig gis khyer ba las slar 'ongs te kha dog ma yal na btso mi dgos te brtags pa'o/_/tshon chen po can bgo bar mi bya/_gos tshon chen pos btsos pa ni gang gyon kyang rung ste nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/tshon chen po ni mtshal dang li kru
[\[165b.6\]]dang btsod dang rgya skyegs dang gur gum dang le brgan rtsi dang thing shing [#]dang rma shing dang brgyad do/_/khyim pa'i yang ma yin khyim pa'i gos 'dra ba gyon pa ni ci lta bu gyon kyang nyes byas/_spyad pa'i ni gtsug lag khang gi nang na ngur smrig gis g.yogs [#]na'o/_/khyim pa'i
[\[165b.7\]]gos gyon kyang nyes med pa ni mi gzhan gyis ma mthong bar gtsug lag khang du ni ka shas mi snang bar g.yogs te gyon pa ni nyes med/_lam du brnyas te bgo ba ni spyi'i 'o/_/lam du zhugs pa las dge slong la la zhig gis gos brnyan po [#]rnyed na gcig po go tsher mi bgo
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bar kun gyis [#]spyir spyad do/_/grogs ni dge slong dang dge sbyong gcig na rgan po nas gag tu grub pa'i steng du sbyin/_kun gyis [#]spyir brnyas pa'i gos spyad pa ni dge slong rgan rims [#]nas ci thob thob tu g.yogs shing [#]bskon te dge sbyong yan chad kun thob
[\[166a.2\]]na legs kun mi thob na mjug ma nas du ma thob pa na [#]kha rje che chung du zad de nyes med do/_/ma chad na gyon te 'chag tu mi 'gro/_steng [#]gos spyir brnyar byin pa las bdag gcig pu gyon te 'chag tu mi 'gro[#]/_steng du bcags [#]pa ni spyan drangs nas bsod nams 'dod
[\[166a.3\]]pas sar pa kha tshar ma bcad pa [#]mi rtag pa yid la bzung pas bcom ste'o/_/yon bdag dad pas bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir stan dang yo byad la sogs pa nor rdzas bzang po dang kha tshar ma bcad pa la sogs pas brgyan cing bting ste spyan drangs nas nor rdzas de rnams la
[\[166a.4\]]mi rtag cing 'jig pa yin te mi rtag pa'i rdzas [#]de la spyad pas bsod nams rtag par 'gyur bar yid la bsams te spyad pa ni nyes med do/_/gos ma btsos pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/gos kha dog ma bsgyur ba [#]gyon pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//rin po che'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_reg
[\[166a.5\]]pa dang reg tu bcug na bdag gi ma yin pa'i rin po che yang byed do/_/bdag gi ma yin pa nor bu [#]rin po che rnams dang gser dngul las byed du byas pa la sogs pa la bdag gis bzung ngam gzhan 'dzin du bcug na'ang ltung ngo /_/der gtogs pa yang ngo /_/rin po cher [#]
[\[166a.6\]]gtogs pa bzung na ltung bar 'gyur te rin po cher gtogs pa gang [#]gang yin pa ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i sU tra rnams yin no/_/de dag ni mtshon cha ste g.yul du spyod pa dang rol mo'i yo byad kyis spyad kyang ngo /_/rin po cher gtogs pa ni mtshon cha g.yul du 'thab mo byed
[\[166a.7\]]pa'i spyad dang rol mo'i lag cha la sogs pa la bya ste gang la reg kyang rung [#]ltung bar 'gyur/_dgos pa'i phyir dgos par grub na rtsa ba'o/_/sU tra ltag ma'i nang nas 'byung ba'i mtshon cha dang rol mo'i cha spyad ni ma chad cing ma bral te so so las su spyad du rung ba la
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bzung na ltung ba'o/_/ma grub na nyes byas pa/_mtshon cha dang rol mo'i cha spyad chag gam grugs te [#]spyad du mi rung pa la reg na nyes byas/_ma gtogs pa ni [#]bdag gi bya bar ma zhugs pa nor chud mi gzan pa'i sems kyis [#]gtsug lag khang dang de'i mtshams su gtogs
[\[166b.2\]]pa na'o/_/rin po che dang rin po che la gtogs pa bzung [#]yang nyes pa med pa [#]ni gtsug lag khang gi phyir tshun chad kyi nang ngam ra ba'i phyi rol gtsug lag khang gi mtshams su gtogs pa tshun chad gcig na gzhan gyi nor 'khyam [#]pa zhig 'dug na nor bdag su'i yin na
[\[166b.3\]]slar sbyin pa'i phyir mi stor bar bya bar bsams te bdag gis blangs sam gzhan len du bcug kyang nyes med/_de la mi g.yel bar ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar rdzas blangs pa de nor bdag slar sbyin pa'i phyir ma stor bar [#]nan tan tu [#]bsrung /_zhag bdun nam brgyad du
[\[166b.4\]]de'i mtshams su'o/_/slar sbyin pa'i phyir blangs pa'i nor de [#]nor bdag len du ma 'ongs sam khungs ma phyin na bdag nyid kyi lag tu zhag bdun nam brgyad du chongs shig_/'gro na nyal nyil lam lo ma bsdus pas g.yogs[#]/_rnyed pa'i gzhi de nyid du sbar rung ba
[\[166b.5\]]zhig gam blangs pa las bdag gung du 'gro na sa'am sbur ma la sogs pas g.yogs te gzhan gyis mi rnyed par sbas [#]la 'gro/_rtags [#]la ma phab na nga'i zhes zer yang mi sbyin/_nor rnyed pa de la nor bdag nga yin zhes zer zhing len pa zhig 'ongs na nor mi
[\[166b.6\]]bstan par spu rtags dris te mthun na sbyin spu rtags dang mi mthun na mi sbyin/_ma 'ongs te 'das na dge 'dun gyi mdzod du gzhug_/nor rnyed pa de zhag brgyad kyi bar du bsdad de nor bdag ma 'ongs shing khungs ma phyin na bdag gi lag na mi bcang bar dge 'dun gyi
[\[166b.7\]]mdzod du gzhug go/_zla ba drug gi mtha'i bar du bcad/_sU tra ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bzhag pa las nor bdag ma 'ongs na zla ba drug gi bar du mdzod du bzhag ste bcang /_'das te ma 'ongs na sangs rgyas sam dge 'dun gyis gang du rnyed pa
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]der sbyar/_zla ba drug gi bar du dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bzhag kyang nor bdag ma 'ongs na sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang nye ba zhig na 'dug pa las rnyed na ni sangs rgyas kyi dkor du bya'o/_/dge 'dun dang nye ba zhig nas rnyed de blangs na dge 'dun
[\[167a.2\]]gyi dkor du bya'o/_/mi mkho na btsong la mkho zhing brtan par ro/_/dge 'dun nam sangs rgyas la phul ba'i nor de spyad du mi mkho na phyis nor bdag len du 'ongs na gtan stor bar mi bya ba'i phyir zangs lta bu brtan par 'dug pa'i rdzas su btsong /_de ste bdag po
[\[167a.3\]]'ongs na gnang ba bslang [#]mi 'dod na sbyin/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar btsongs pa las nor bdag 'ongs nas khyod kyi bsod nams su rung ba'i phyir dkon mchog la phul te spu bsgyur ba 'di yin gyis [#]dad pa bskyed cig ces dad pa bskyed du mi btub tu [#]'dod ces zer na slar sbyin/_
[\[167a.4\]]de ste skyed [#]slong na 'di nyid kyang mang bar mi sems sam ji srid du bdag cag [#]gis bsrungs zhes smros shig_/sU tra ltag ma ltar nor spu bsgyur ba slar byin pa las nor gyi skyed dang spyad [#]pa'i gla la [#]sogs pa 'dod ces zer na 'di srid du ngas bsrungs te nor dngos ma stor bar
[\[167a.5\]]byin pa 'di nyid che zhing mang bar mi [#]sems sam zhes shags gdab/_nor bu la sogs pa bdar phug na mkho ba'o/_/nor bu byi bdar byas shing phug pa la reg pa ni ltung ba ma bdar ma phug pa la reg pa ni nyes byas mgul 'khor dang gdu bu dang dpung rgyan dang phreng ba dang
[\[167a.6\]]phreng phyed pa dang gzhug par na'o/_/gser dngul dang nor bu'i mgul 'khor dang gdu bu dang dpung rgyan dang phreng ba dang do shal la sogs pa spyad cing gzhug tu rung ba la bzung ba ni ltung ba[#]/_chag cing chad te spyad du mi rung ba la bzung ba ni nyes byas/_rol mo byin [#]
[\[167a.7\]]na dang be nu dang bal la ri dang ma ha ti dang mu g+ho Sha rnams rgyud dang bcas pa dag go_/rol mo spyad pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni byi bang sha dgas te rgyud dang bcas pa la bzung na ltung ba'o/_/rgyud dang so sor bral ba ni nyes byas/_zer ba [#]gling bu dang /_dung dang bud
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dung dang /_rnga dang rnga bo che ste gzings dang /_bi d+h+ri [#]dang rnga be ri dang /_pa Ta ha dang rnga [#]chung ngu lag pa gnyis kyis [#]brdab pa dang /_mu ra ba rnams so/_/rdzam dang [#]las byas pa'i rnga dang 'di rnams la reg na'ang [#]ltung ngo /_/gzhu rgyud dang bcas na'o/_/gzhu rgyud dang bcas pa la reg na'ang ltung bar
[\[167b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ral gri dang zor ral dang so gcig pa dang mdung dang lag mdung dang e ta dag go_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams spyad du rung ba la reg na'ang ltung /_spyad du mi rung na nyes byas/_mda' dang lcags mda' [#]dang stag mda' mde'u [#]dang bcas

[\[168a.1\]]dge sbyong dang khyim pa med na bdag gi [#]brubs pa nyes med do/_/de brkos [#]te'o/_/ltag tu bshad pa ltar dkon mchog gi dkor brub [#]pa'i gnas med pa [#]dge slong dang khyim pa'ang med na bdag gis sa brkos te spyad kyang nyes med/_med na sbyin/_

[\[169a.1\]]rus sam [#]mgo thod do/_/dge slong gang zag gi rgya ni ming rus mi bri bar mi'i keng rus dag bri'o/_/so mangs kyis skra mi bshad dge slong gis [#]mgo so mangs kyis skra mi bshad/_dper na [#]'di bzhin no/_/so mangs kyis mi bshad [#]pa bzhin du rtsa

[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]mi dogs [#]na khrus byas[#]/_de blang gzhan gyis dri bsung byin te blangs kyang nyes med me tog dang phreng ba yang ngo /_/me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa zhig byin na blangs kyang nyes med/_mchod rten la bsko/_me tog dang dri bsung blangs pa de mchod rten la 'bul [#]lo/_/nyan thos

[\[169b.3\]]su gzhag_/sgo mngon par mi bya/_me tog bzhag pa de gzhan gyis mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir sgo'i thad kar snang bar mi bzhag_/rtsig pa me tog gi phreng ba sgo'i ya rol lam ma [#]rol gyi rtsig pa la gdags [#]phreng ba spyad pa ni khab kyis sam tsher mas btsugs te'o/_/

[\[169b.7\]]gos kyi grwa'am ska rags kyi thog [#]mar bcing /_phrag pa [#]sngags kyi thag bus btags pa las nad thag gi ste ma byang gi bar du ni phrag pa las bkrol la gos kyi grwa'am ska rags kyi thog ma la gdags/_de ste ma yin na ka ba'am rtsig pa'i ser kar gzhug_/phrag pa la
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]btags pa'i thag bu nad sos te mi dgos na ka ba'am rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug_/bro dang glu dang rnga mi spyad/_dge slong gis bro dang glu dang rnga'i sgra la sogs pa mi bya/_drug sdes rol mo mkhan gyi chas su zhugs te rol mo byas pa las bcas/_

[\[170a.6\]]bsrungs la rtsed mo yang byas pa lta bu la sogs pa mi bya/_snod du brim zhing btung ba mi bya/_snod gcig gi nang du hub res mi bya/_de bzhin du zan za ba'i tshe gcig la gcig kha zas dang snod spyad bdar zhing mi bshugs/_me tog gi rgyan mi bcing me tog sna tshogs

[\[170b.1\]]tha [#]mal par 'gro ba'i tshe drag tu mi brgyug_/drag shul dang mchang [#]ba mi bya/_lus kyi drag shul dang mchangs [#]pa la sogs pa mi bya/_brla dang dpung pa dang nywa [#]thabs bzlog shing brje bar mi bya/_phyi tshar [#]dang snga tshar la sogs pa lus kyis bsgyur ba rkang pa gnya' ba'i steng du

[\[170b.3\]]sogs pa la phyis mo mi bya/_bal glang [#]skad dang rta skad dang glang po'i [#]skad dang rma bya dang ko ko [#]la'i skad du mi bya/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi skad mi smra mi dbyung /_kha'i dung 'ba' 'ba' mi bya/_kha nas dung [#]'dra ba zer ba dang 'ba' 'bu blag [#]blug la sogs pa [#]mi bya/_trog trog
[\[170b.4\]]po'i dngos por gtogs pa'o/_/rin po che la reg pa'i ltung ba [#]rdzogs so//_//'khrug [#]pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_dpyid kyi lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang dbyar gyi thog ma'i zla ba'o/_/dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya phan chad zla ba phyed dang gsum ni tsha bas
[\[170b.5\]]na dus la bab te [#]nam bkrus kyang nyes med/_gos med pa'i gnyis po rnyed pa de'i tshul lo/_/yang [#]yang za ba'i rkyen [#]dus ma gtogs par na ba dang lam dang grur zhugs pa dang las dang [#]gzhi'i rkyen gcig byas na'ang 'khrur dbang ste nyes med do/_/rlung gis ma brtul na'o/_/
[\[170b.6\]]rlung gis gos [#]ma bzlog gam rdul gyis lus la ma phog pa las bkrus na ltung bar 'gyur gyi rlung dang rdul gyis phog pa ni bkrus kyang nyes med/_gos kyi grwa 'gul ba de'i mthas so/_/rlung gis phog pa'i tshad ni gos kyi grwa 'gul ba yan chad kyis [#]'khrur dbang /_char
[\[170b.7\]]gyis ma bab/_char gyis bab pa ni 'khrur [#]dbang ste bkrus kyang mi ltung ngo /_/de thigs gnyis ltung na'o/_/char gyis bab pa'i tshad ni thigs pa gnyis sam gsum phog nas 'khrur [#]dbang ngo /_/lus la'o/_/char gyis [#]phog pa ni gos la phog pa la mi bya'i lus la
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]phog pa la 'khrur gnang ngo /_/gzhan yang zhag bco lnga las khrus kyi nyi ma ma yin te tshun chad bkru ba ma yin[#]/_zhag bco lnga ma lon par khrus byas na ltung bar 'gyur/_bco lnga la lan cig khrus byas pa ni nyes med/_blugs par ma zhug [#]pas
[\[171a.2\]]so/_/khrus byed [#]pa ni chu'i nang du zhugs kyang rung bcus te [#]spyi bo nas blugs kyang rung gang ltar bkrus kyang ltung ngo /_/de lte bar phyin na'o/_/bkru ba'i tshad ni spyi bo nas blugs te chu lte bar phyin kyang rung chu'i nang du zhugs te lte bar phyin kyang rung bkrus par chud do/_/tshun
[\[171a.3\]]chad na nyes byas pa'o/_/lte bar ma phyin par bkrus pa ni nyes byas so/_/thams cad du dus su [#]bsngo ba ma bsngos na yang ngo /_/las ci byed do cog la yang bsam pa'ang rung smra ba'ang rung lus kyis byed pa'ang rung sa ma yam ma bsngos par byas na ci byas so cog nyes byas so/_/
[\[171a.4\]]don gyi chur myong ba [#]khrus ma yin/_chu chen po rgal ba la 'bogs kyang rung rkyal pa'ang rung [#]/_lus thams cad gsher ba ni khrus byas par mi chud do [#]nyes med do/_/de bas na rgal ba dang ma tshor bar ltung ba dang brgyal [#]ba la btab pa la [#]ltung ba med/_chu rgal ba dang chu'i
[\[171a.5\]]nang du lhung ba dang brgyal ba'i phyir chus btab pa la sogs pa yang bkrus par mi chud de nyes med do/_/yul asma pa ran da [#]ka na 'di dag med par shes shig_/yul asma pa ran da [#]ka na ko lpags 'chang du gnang ba'i yul [#]na ni rtag par khrus byas kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur
[\[171a.6\]]ro zhes gnang ngo /_/mchog yod na chung ngu'i brtag par mi bya/_char gyis phog na 'khrur gnang ngo zhes byas pa'i [#]phyir ched kar gyis phog par byas te khrus mi bya/_yul mtha' khob tu a shi lngas khrims rdzogs su gnang ba las lnga nyi tshes chog ces te dge 'dun lngas rdzogs
[\[171a.7\]]par mi bya/_dpe bshad pa 'di gnyis dang 'dra bar ci bya'o cog thams cad [#]gnang ba'i tshig la brten te sla chos su sgyu mi bya/_khrus kyi ltung ba'o/_/khrus byed pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so/_/[#]dgu bcu ltung ba'i bcu sde [#]rdzogs so//_//byol song gsod pa'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_bsad
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]pa'i sems kyis byol song la bsad pa'i sems kyis bsad [#]na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/phyugs la bsnun na'o/_/byol song bsad pa'i phyir bsnun kyang bsnun pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/der ram gzhan yang de'i [#]shi na'o/_/bdag gis bsad
[\[171b.2\]]de 'phral la shi yang rung bsad par bsnun pa las 'phral [#]du ma shi'i phyis shi [#]yang rung ste shi na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/yan lag 'di rnams dang ldan pas byol song bsad na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes byas pa ni sems can 'dra la sems can ma yin pa'o/_/sems can gyi
[\[171b.3\]]gzugs su byas pa'am sems can gyi gzugs su ri mo [#]bris pa bshig na nyes byas/_byol song gsod pa'o/_/byol song gsod pa'i [#]ltung ba rdzogs so//_//the tshom la 'chad de/_khyed rab tu ma rdzogs la phas pham pa byung zhes pa la sogs pa dge slong ma yin pa'i phyir the
[\[171b.4\]]tshom skur na'o/_/dge slong la yo byad ma tshang ba [#]la sogs pa khrims mi 'chags pa'i tshig gang byas kyang rung ste khyod khrims ma chags so zhes the tshom skur pa dang phas pham par ma gyur pa la pham par gyur to zhes the tshom skur pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/
[\[171b.5\]]drug sdes bcu bdun sde lo ma tshang bar khrims rdzogs pa dang bus pha phul zhing 'gro ba las shi ba la pham pa dang mtshams med pa yod do zhes the tshom skur pa las bcas/_dge slong na'o/_/the tshom skur pa de dge slong yang yin pa las ltung ste yan lag 'di gnyis dang ldan na
[\[171b.6\]]ltung bar 'gyur/_mi bde ba bskyed pa'i sems kyi [#]na rtsed mos kyang the tshom ma skyes kyang ngo /_/pha rol po dge slong mi bde zhing mi dga' bar bya ba'i phyir khrims ma chags pa la sogs pa yin no zhes smras na ltung ba dge slong ma yin pa dang mi dga' [#]bar bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin
[\[171b.7\]]gyi rtsed mo byas pa ni nyes byas/_gzhan gyis na [#]nyes byas pa'o/_/lhag ma dang ltung ba zhig tu gyur to zhes the tshom skur na nyes byas/_the tshom skur pa'o/_/the tshom skur pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//mdzub mo'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_dge slong na'o/_/dge slong la ga ga
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]tshil byas pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig sor mo dang khu tshur dang gru mo dang phrag pa dang mgo dang logs dang rgyab dang sta zur dang brang dang pus mo dang byin pa dang rkang pa'i mthe bong la sogs pas reg cing ga ga tshil byas na'o/_/ming gis [#]smos
[\[172a.2\]]pa 'di rnams gag kyang rung 'di rnams kyis ga ga tshil byas na ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/seng seng po'i sems kyis so/_/ga ga tshil byed pa la rtse ba'am 'phyar ba'i sems seng seng [#]po byas pa las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig_/yan lag 'di rnams
[\[172a.3\]]dang ldan na ga ga tshil gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rma dang sbrang ma dang mdzer pa dang sme ba dang spu 'khyil ba bstan pa ni ltung ba med do/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste lus la yod pa la bstan cing blta ba'i phyir mdzub mos btsugs pa ni nyes med do/_/ltung
[\[172a.4\]]ba du ma yang gcig go_/ga ga tshil byas pa ni sor mo re re ltung ba re rer mi 'gyur gyi ltung ba gcig tu zad do/_/ga ga tshil gyi ltung ba'o/_/ga ga tshil byed pa'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//dga' ba'i ltung ba la 'chad de/_chu'i yul du bya ba nan tan no/_/chu'i nang du dga'
[\[172a.5\]]zhing rtse ba las ltung bar 'gyur te/_yan lag gcig_/zhugs nas chu'i nang du zhugs pa dang /_nub chu'i nang du lus nub pa dang /_byang [#]nub pa las chu'i steng du [#]byung ba dang /_mtha' pha rol du 'gro ba/_chu la phar rgal tshur rgal byed cing 'gro ba dang /_gyen thur gyi rgyud
[\[172a.6\]]du [#]bab cing /_chu'i rgyud bzhin du 'gro ba dang /_rgyun las log ste 'gro [#]ba dang /_chu rnga dang chu la lag gis brdabs te sgra 'byin pa dang /_sbal ba'i zer ba dang /_chu'i nang du mchu btsugs na sa blag blug zer ba dang /_chus phyar ba dang /_chu la rdo 'phyar [#]byed pa'ang rung chu
[\[172a.7\]]la lag changs kyis gtor kyang rung /_bskor ba dang chu la lag pas bskor ba dang /_rdo rje dang chu la rdo rje thabs su 'phangs [#]kyang rung rdo rje 'dra ba [#]bris kyang rung /_khron pa dang chu la drag tu bskor na [#]dbus su bu gu 'dra ba 'byung [#]ba dang /_mkhyil [#]pa byed pa dang /_chu bskyil pa
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]dang /_'dri ba drangs na rtsa ba'o/_/chu la ri mo bri ba dang [#]shur shur por drangs pa dang 'di rnams gag byas kyang ltung ngo /_/bltubs [#]pa bsnun na nyes byas/_chu la bem rtol [#]bsnun pa ni nyes byas/_rdza ma dang phru ba dang ril ba dang phor bur ro/_/'di rnams kyi nang na chu 'dug
[\[172b.2\]]pa la gong ma'i rim pa ltar rtses na nyes byas/_bu ram khu ba dang tshod ma dang thug pa dang chan khu bsros [#]pa yod pa la yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi khu ba la rtag [#]tu smos pa ltar rtses na nyes byas/_chu ma yin pa la dga' ba yang ngo /_/'o ma la sogs pa la rtses
[\[172b.3\]]na'ang nyes byas/_de bzhin du byed du bcug pa yang 'gyur ro/_/ltag tu smos pa'i rtsed mo rnams gzhan byed du bcug na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/trog trog po'i dga' ba myong bar 'dod pas so/_/chu'i nang du rtse ba'i ltung ba ni rtsed mo'am dga' ba'i sems trog trog pas [#]
[\[172b.4\]]rtses na ltung ngo /_/de bas na sim pa 'dod pa'i phyir zhugs na ltung ba med do/_/rtsed mo'i sems kyis chu la rtses pas ltung bas na 'di ni tsha zhing mi bde ba bsil bar bya ba'i phyir [#]chur zhugs shing bkrus pa ni nyes med/_rkyal slob pas zheng ngam chur 'bad na'o/_/rtse ba'i
[\[172b.5\]]phyir ni [#]ma yin gyi bdag la phan par bya ba'i phyir lkog dben par rkyal slob pa ni nyes med/_bsgrang [#]pa'i phyir dron po la bris na grangs [#]na'o/_/tsha ba la sogs pa bsgrang [#]ba'i phyir thug pa la sogs pa la [#]gzar bu dang kha gzar dang skya bas dkrugs pa ni nyes med/_gsher ba la
[\[172b.6\]]dga' ba'o/_/chu'i nang na dga' zhing brtse [#]ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so//_//lhan cig gi ltung ba la 'chad de/_bud med dang lhan cig tu khyim gcig tu gnyid log pa'o/_/bud med dang lhan cig tu khyim gcig gi nang du lhan cig nyal ba las ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gcig
[\[172b.7\]]nub mo mthas so/_/bud med dang lhan cig_/nyal te zhag gcig gi skya rengs byung nas [#]ltung bar 'gyur te yan lag gnyis dang ldan na ltung bar 'gyur/_snga ma ni nyes byas pa'o/_/bud med dang dang po la nyal nas skya rengs ma byung gi bar du ni nyes byas/_bya gag mo tsam
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]yang 'di byed pa mtha'o/_/bud med ma yin pa gzhan mo dang nyal na bya gag tsam yan chad dang khyim gcig tu zhag lon na nyes byas so/_/mo du yod pa bzhin du nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba'o/_/bud med dang lhan cig

[\[173a.3\]]bsngang bar [#]bya ba'i phyir 'dre la sogs pa'i de 'dra ba zhig 'ong zhes byas kyang rung gzugs nyid 'dre 'dra bar bcos te bsdigs kyang rung dge slong la sngangs shing skrag par byas na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis kyang ngo /_/dge slong de bsngang bar byos shig [#]ces gzhan la
[\[173a.4\]]byed du bcug kyang ltung bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa ma [#]skyes kyang ngo /_/dge slong la 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir bsdigs nas 'jigs shing sngangs par ma gyur kyang ltung ngo /_/rtsa [#]ba ni yid ni [#]mi 'ong na'o/_/ltung bar 'gyur ba ni 'dre la sogs pa gzugs mi sdug pa dang sgra
[\[173a.5\]]mi snyen [#]pa dang dri mi zhim zhing yid du mi 'ong bas [#]bsdigs na ltung bar 'gyur te gang gang yin pa 'og nas 'chad do/_/'di lta ste yi dwags dang [#]sha za ba dang grul bum dang lus srul po'o [#]zhes smras pa dang nag po'i nag po [#]sol ba'i kha dog dum pa tshig pa lta bur na'o/_/yid du mi
[\[173a.6\]]'ong pa ni 'di rnams yin te 'di rnams gang yang rung ba'i gzugs shig yod de 'ong ngo zhes smras na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge dang stag dang gzig dang ko ka dang spyang ki dang b+h+ya sto [#]ri ga'i sgra dag gis so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu zhig 'ong ngo zhes [#]
[\[173a.7\]]byas kyang rung rnams kyi sgra phyung ste bsdigs kyang rung ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bshang gci dang thug po'i spu'i dris so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi dri 'di 'dra ba zhig yod de 'ong ngo zhes bsdigs na'ang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ra gong dang re lde dang ra [#]phyar gyis reg pa
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dag gis so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang 'dra bar rtsub mo zhig 'ang ngo zhes bsdigs kyang ltung ba'o/_/yid du 'ong ba ni nyes byas pa'o/_/lha la sogs pa'i gzugs dang sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong bas bsdigs pa ni nyes byas te 'og nas 'chad/_'di lta ste lha dang klu dang
[\[173b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po smos na'o/_/yid du 'ong ba ni 'di rnams kyi gzugs 'dra ba zhig 'ang [#]ngo zhes smras kyang rung [#]'di rnams kyi gzugs 'dra bar bcos te smras kyang rung nyes byas/_nor bdag tshong dpon dang ded dpon la sogs pa'i gzugs so[#]/_/
[\[173b.3\]]tshang dpon dang nor bdag phyug po lta bu'i mi zhig khyod la gnod pa byed par 'ong ngo [#]zhes bsdigs na nyes byas/_rol mo b+ha na la sogs pa'i sgra dag gis so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi sgra zer ba zhig 'ong ngo zhes smras kyang rung 'di nyid kyi sgra skad du byas te bsdigs kyang
[\[173b.4\]]rung nyes byas/_spos a ka ru dang tsan dan dang gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i bsung dag gis so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi dri 'dra ba zhig 'ong ngo zhes [#]byas kyang rung 'di nyid kyi dris bsdigs kyang rung nyes byas/_dar dang snam bu dang pags pa [#]dang gos a ba shug
[\[173b.5\]]ka dang du gu la dang ko [#]du 'ba' ka [#]rnams dag gis so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ltar 'jam pa zhig 'ong ngo zhes byas kyang rung 'jam po 'di rnams kyis [#]reg par bya ste bsdigs kyang rung nyes byas/_ma gtogs pa ni skyo ba'i phyir ba'o/_/mi sdug cing 'jigs par smras kyang
