[\[212b.7\]]ba brdungs kyang rung ngo /_/glo bur du gcig na nam chog tu'o/_/chu dang me la sogs pa glo bur gcig byung na glo bur nam zhi ba'i bar du 'dod 'dod brdung ngo /_/glo bur zhi ba la phan no/_/bza' bar 'du ba'i phyir na gnyis ka ste/_gaN+Di [#]ka ti dang gaN+Di [#]sbyin no/_/dro kar gdugs
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]tshod la 'du ba la ni gaN+DI [#]che chung gnyis ka brdung ngo /_/skabs su bsdad de'o/_/gaN+DI [#]chung ngu dro kar sngar brdungs nas sku bla'i gzugs bkru/_kha zas brtag pa'i zhal ta byas zin nas gdod gaN+DI [#]chen po brdung ngo /_/tshogs che ste gaN+Di [#]byin pas ma grub
[\[213a.2\]]cing ma go na dung 'bud [#]do/_/dge 'dun mang ste gaN+DI [#]brdungs pas mi thos shing mi 'dus na mi gnyis kyis dung gnyis thabs cig du 'bud [#]do/_/rnga brdung /_dung sbrel ma bus [#]kyang mi 'dus na rnga bo che brdung ngo /_/gaN+DI sa [#]na mi 'gro bar mi bya/_gaN+DI [#]dang rnga brdungs ma thag
[\[213a.3\]]tu 'du ba mi bcad par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro'o/_/ma song na nyes byas/_mi myur bar ma yin/_dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro ba yang le lor byas te ma 'dug par gaN+DI [#]brdungs ma thag tu 'gro'o/_/dgos pa 'byor pa'i dus kyi las na ci bder bya'o/_/bsam gtan du zhugs
[\[213a.4\]]pa'i rnams kyis dus mi rigs pa'i phyir gdugs tshod bab pa dang tho rangs sngar bslang pa dang nam gyi gung la nyal du bzung [#]ba'i tshod la sogs pa las su bskos pa'i bya zhing sbran no zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_gaN+DI brdung ba'i [#]tshe bdag dge ba gzhan zhig rgyun du
[\[213a.5\]]spyod de bar chad du mi rung na ma song yang nyes med do zhes byi shu tas bshad/_sum rgyud byin te'o/_/bsam gtan pa rnams langs te 'dong pa'i tshe sum rgyud bklag[# ]/'di ni ran par sbyin/_sum rgyud bklag [#]pa mi ring bar ran par bya/_sbyin pa las 'chags [#]pa bya/_zas
[\[213a.6\]]zos pa'i 'og tu sbyin bdag la sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa klag[# ]/ran par ro/_/sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ran pa mi ring bar bya/_mel tse ba ni tha ma nas 'gro/_bsam gtan las 'gyes pa'i tshe las su bskos pa'i dge slong des [#]las dang zhal ta
[\[213a.7\]]dag byas nas phyi bzhin du 'gro'o/_/'ong ba na sngon du'o/_bsam gtan la 'du ba'i tshe tha ma na mi 'dug par sngon du song ste las dang zhal ta bya'o/_/'on te de lta bu'i rkyen cig gis lde mig sba ba byas na bstan [#]to/_/las su bskos pa [#]dge slong de rkyen cig gis gud du 'gro na
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]lde mig 'di na yod do zhes grogs la bstan te 'gro'o/_/gso sbyong gi dngos po ste zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong du chud pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong rdzogs so//_//bco lnga'i gso sbyong byed pa la 'chad de/_gso sbyong mngon par bsko[#]/_/dge 'dun gyis
[\[213b.2\]]gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis gso sbyong bya ba'i sa thams cad/_byas pa dang skyes pa zin pa'i dngos por ro/_/de'i phyi rol gyi mtshams ni 'dom dang bcas/_gso sbyong gi khang pa rtsig pa chu dang gad pa la sogs pa yod na bar 'dom gang gis bcad la [#]gtsang
[\[213b.3\]]ba dang yangs pa dang mi rtsed [#]par brtsig go_/dge 'dun dang par ro/_/gso sbyong gi khang pa brtsig pa dge 'dun kun [#]la dad pa dris te gar dad par bya/_las dag kyang de'i gnas so/_/gso sbyong gi khang pa [#]der tshul nas 'byung ba dang tshul du 'jug pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs par byed
[\[213b.4\]]pa la sogs pa'i las kyang der bya'o/_/mtshams bcad/_dge 'dun gnas pa la spyod [#]pa bde ba'i phyir mtshams bcad do/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mthar ro/_/mtshams bcad pa ni bar du chu la sogs pa mtshams gzhan gyis mchod na dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun
[\[213b.5\]]chad du bcad du [#]rung ngo /_/rdo dang rtsig pa dang ka ba dang shing rlon pa dang ra ba dang gad pa dang khre lam dang chu 'thung ba la sogs pa phyogs so sor dmigs par shes pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi drung du kun bsgrags pa ni bstan pa'i mtshan te [#]las bya/_mtshams bcad pa'i mtshan
[\[213b.6\]]ma ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las mtshams btsugs te dge 'dun thams cad 'dus nas kun shes par byas te gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis [#]bcad mtshan ma ni phyogs bzhi re re btsugs pas chog_/gnang ba byas na der chos gos dang mi 'bral mtshams bcad na rgan po
[\[213b.7\]]dang nad pa chos gos mi theg pa dge 'dun gyis chos gos dang mi 'bral bar gnang ba byin na chos gos dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di bya rgan po dang nad pa chos gos dang 'bral ba'i gsol ba gdab ste mi theg_/bden na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba sbyin no/_/thams cad kyi
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]phyir dkyil 'khor bya bar bsko/_snga ma ma [#]btang na nang du bcad pa mi skye/_mtshams snga ma bcad pa ma bkrol bar phyi ma bcad kyang mtshams bcad par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshams btang ngo /_/mtshams gnyis tshig gcig gis bcad pa'am btang du rung
[\[214a.2\]]ngo /_/mtshams gnyis so sor gcod de bar nye na bar du thag pa bres te mtshams gnyis ka thag pas non par byas la/_pha rol tshu rol gnyis kar dge 'dun du langs par 'khod pa la bar du dge slong gcig [#]'dug ste gsol ba dang zhu ba byas na tshig gnyis gis mtshams
[\[214a.3\]]gnyis [#]bcad par 'gyur ro/_/dgrol ba'ang de bzhin du byar rung /_las kyis [#]mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas kyi mtshams rtsig pa'o/_/gsol ba dang [#]zhu bas mtshams ma bcad na gtsug lag khang gi phyir tshun chad mtshams su gtogs pa'o/_/wa'i chu bab pa gang du
[\[214a.4\]]ltung ba yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang gi phyir med pa zhig na khang pa'i wa'i chu phyi rol du ltung ba'i rjes tshun chad mtshams su gtogs so/_/grong gi na mtshams kyi mtha'o/_/grong khyer zhig na gnas na ra ba dang sab ma [#]dang 'obs gsum gang yang rung bar [#]bya gang bab [#]pa la sogs
[\[214a.5\]]pa gong du bshad pa yin no/_/dgon par na phyogs so sor rgyang grags kyi mtha'o/_/dgon pa na [#]gnas te bar mtshams gzhan gyis ma [#]chod na rgyang grags gcig [#]tshun chad rang mtshams su chud do/_/gso sbyong gi dngos po ste gnas su chud pa'o/_/gso sbyong la 'du ba'i
[\[214a.6\]]mtshams gcig na gnas pa kun du [#]dgos pa dang mtshams bcad pa'o/_/[#]dad pa byin na de dag gis 'du ba 'grub po/_/gso sbyong la 'du ba nad pa dang rgan por 'du bar 'ong mi nus te dad pa phul nas [#]'dus pa dang 'dra ste gso sbyong du rung ngo /_/mtshams gcod pa la ma yin/_/
[\[214a.7\]]mtshams gcod pa'i tshe ni nad pa dang rgan po yang dad pa dbul [#]du mi rung ste khyogs la blang [#]ngam dge 'dun nad pa'i gan [#]du dong ste mtshams bcad dgos so/_/slob pa byin pa las des [#]bslang ba'am brtag [#]pa'o/_/mtshams gcod pa la slob pa byin pa las tha dad pa blang [#]
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]na las su'ang rung dad pa phul bar kyang chud do/_/de la dge slong du 'du shes gzhag na'o/_/slob pa byin pa las dad pa blang ba ni thog ma slob pa byin pa la dge slong du 'du shes gzhag pa ni dad pa blang dgos kyi 'du shes ma bzhag pa ni dad pa blang mi dgos so zhes kyang bshad/_
[\[214b.2\]]dad pa len pa'i tshe na dge slong ma yin [#]snyam du bsams na dad pa blang par [#]mi chud de las su mi rung ngo zhes kyang bshad/_mi sbyin [#]no/_/slob pa byin pa zhig dad pa len du 'ongs na dad pa mi sbyin no/_/smyon par gnang ba mi brel ba yin no/_/dge sbyong [#]smyon pa tham thom can las byed pa'i tshe glo
[\[214b.3\]]bur du 'gro ba zhig yod [#]na dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis mi 'du ba dang dad pa mi blang par [#]gnang byin na dad pa ma blangs kyang las su rung ngo /_/kun gtsang ba byin pa [#]ni gcig tu'o/_/dad pa len pa 'ong [#]na dbul ba'i tshig ni bdag bar chad kyi chos kyang gtsang /_dge
[\[214b.4\]]'dun las byed pa la'ang dad do zhes bya/_bdag gtsang ngo zhes ma byas na nyes pa yod pas [#]'phrig cing dogs par 'gyur ro/_/gtsang ngo zhes mi zer na bar chad yod dam zhes dris la yod na mthol du gzhug_/gso sbyong du'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar kun gtsang ngo zhes bya ba'i [#]tshig ni
[\[214b.5\]]gso sbyong gi tshe dad pa dbul [#]ba la dgos so/_/'byung ba na yang ngo /_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe'ang dad pa phul na las su rung ngo /_/de byin pas so/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe dad pa phul ba gcig pus mi chog gi bdag la khrims nyams par mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa yod na
[\[214b.6\]]rgol cig ces skabs dbye ba dang bcas te dad pa dbul [#]lo/_/'di ltar de dag bya'o/_/gso sbyong la kun gtsang ngo zhes dad pa dbul lo/_/'di ltar de dag bya'o/_/gso sbyong la kun gtsang ngo zhes dad pa 'bul ba dang tshul gyi tshe nyes pa yod na rgol cig ces byas nas dad pa 'bul ba'i tshig
[\[214b.7\]]dad pa len pa la bya'o/_/tshul 'di dag mnod/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dad pa 'bul na dad pa len pas kyang de ltar mi gnang gis 'dong zhes mi bya'i zer ba bzhin du dad pa blang ngo /_/sde sder dad pa la sogs pa bskul te las byed na mi rigs [#]pa ma yin no/_/mtshams gcig gi nang du
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gso sbyong la sogs pa dge 'dun so sor byed na gcig la gcig dad pa byin te bskul na so sor byas kyang las su rung ngo /_/tshig mtshungs pa brtsams na bral ba ma yin no/_/dad pa len pas rab tu 'byung ba dang gso sbyong dang tshul nas 'byung [#]ba la sogs pa las mang
[\[215a.2\]]po [#]zhig dad pa gcig [#]car blang du rung ngo /_/gcig gi [#]du ma la blangs pa ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du mi mang mo zhig las dad pa blangs kyang rung ngo /_/chad pa ni 'di brjod nus na'o/_/mdo ltag ma gnyis [#]ltar mang du blang du rung ba ni bdag gis mi brjod cing
[\[215a.3\]]zlos nus pa tshun chad dad pa blang dad pa len pa'i mi nyid kyang tshig gsal zhing smra mkhas pas dad pa blang ngo /_/ci lta ci lta bus kyang 'di'i [#]sbyin pa la mi nus pas kyang grub bo/_/nad pa tshabs po che zhig las dad pa len te dris pa'i lan smra mi nus na yi ge dang mtshan ma dang tshig zur la
[\[215a.4\]]sogs pa ci lta bus kyang dad pa byin par blang ngo /_/[#]chud do/_/lus kyis kyang ngo /_/nad pa des [#]smra mi nus shing [#]dad pa'i brda lus kyi yan lag gis [#]byed na'ang dad pa blangs par chud do/_/ci ltar mi phod na'ang dge 'dun der 'dong ngam [#]de khyogs las bslang /_gso sbyong la sogs pa'i
[\[215a.5\]]las byed pa la nad pa la dad pa blang du nad pa de dbugs ni ma chad kyi lus dang ngag gi brda dang mtshan ma byed mi nus kyang rung dad pa dbul [#]nus kyang mtshams bcad pa'i tshe dad pa phul bas las su mi rung ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyi nang du dad [#]pa khyogs las blangs te las bya'o/_/yang na
[\[215a.6\]]nad pa'i drung du dge 'dun song ste las bya'o/_/de blangs te mi brgyug_/dad pa len pas dad pa blangs te drag tu mi brgyug_/mi drang [#]/_mi mchong dad pa blangs nas drag tu 'ang mi 'gro mchong zhing yang mi 'gro[#]/_/phyi rol du [#]mi rgal/_dad pas [#]blangs nas yur ba dang mtshams la
[\[215a.7\]]sogs pa'i phyi rol du mi 'gro/_phyir las ma yin/_dad pa blangs nas phyi sgo 'das shing yang mi 'gro/_ra ba'i phyi rol nas bos shing yang dad pa mi blang /_nam mkha' la mi 'dug_/dad pa len pa'i tshe gcig nam mkha' la mi 'dug pa la'ang bya/_dad pa blangs nas nam mkha'
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]la mi 'dug pa la'ang bya/_phyi rol du ma yin/_dad pa blangs nas mtshams kyi phyi rol du mi 'gro/_khol bor te rkang rten gzhan la mi 'gro/_/gru skas dang sa [#]skas lta bu la rim pa gcig bor te mi 'gro ba ni dad pa len pa'i mi'o/_/gzhan yang de bzhin khol bor te mi 'gro/_/
[\[215b.2\]]skas ke'i [#]rkang rten las [#]yang ngo /_/sa skas dang gru skas ma yin pa skas tha mal pa thang ma skas la'ang bar du gcig bor te mi 'gro/_dad pa blangs nas 'di ltar mi 'gro/_/lkog [#]ma tsam gyi chu la mi 'jug_/dad pa blangs nas lkog [#]ma tsam nub pa'i chu la mi 'bog_/nyal ba dang
[\[215b.3\]]mnyam par 'jug par mi bya/_dad pa blangs nas nyal ba'am bsam gtan du 'jug par mi bya/_rim gro med pa'ang mi smad pa ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma rnams ltar dad pa blangs nas le lo byas na dge 'dun gyis spyo [#]zhing brgyad do/_/dge slong la smra/_dad pa blangs nas slar
[\[215b.4\]]'bul ba ni dge slong gang la yang rung gcig la dad pa phul bas chog go zhes 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig gis bshad/_dge 'dun la'o/_/gzhan dag kyang ngo /_/dge 'dun spyir dad pa ma phul na mi [#]rung ngo zhes kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig gis bshad do/_/dgongs shig btsun pa
[\[215b.5\]]zhes rim du'o[#]/_/dad pa blangs nas 'bul ba'i tshe na dgongs shig btsun pa zhes smras te gtsang ba dang dad pa la sogs pa'i tshig ma nor bar rim [#]bzhin du smra'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbus su ma phyin par dus 'das sam khyim mir shes par byas na blangs pa ma yin no/_/dad pa len du
[\[215b.6\]]btang bas [#]des dad pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du ma phyin par lam du shi'am khrims phul te khyim par babs na dad pa blangs pa [#]mi chud do/_/phyin na ni blangs pa'o/_/dad pas [#]len len pa'i mi de dge 'dun nang du phyin nas[#]/_dad pa 'bul ba'i tshig ma smras par khrims phul lam
[\[215b.7\]]shi ba ni dad pa blangs par chud do/_/gzhan gyi tshes bco lnga dge slong bzung nas [#]dge slong de thang shig[# ]/dge slong grogs shig gzhan gyis btson du bzung ste mtshams gcig gi nang na [#]'dug kyang rung gud na 'dug kyang rung gso sbyong gi tshe yus [#]bdag la thong shig ces bya/_nged kyis [#]
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'o zhes de la smros shig_/ltag ma ltar thong shig ces bya ba'i tshig ni nged cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa ste tshul gyis [#]gso sbyong bya dgos te mi [#]btang na khyod la sdig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te thong shig [#]ces bya/_
[\[216a.2\]]ma btang na 'di dang kho bo cag lhan cig tu chung zad kyi bya ba zhig yod do zhes snga ma dang bcas te'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar byas kyang ma btang na ltag ma'i tshig kyang smras la dge slong 'di dang nged cag 'tham zhing bya ba zhig yod kyi [#]mi btang du mi rung ngo zhes bya/_de ste yang na dkyil 'khor bya/_
[\[216a.3\]]mdo ltag ma rnams ltar bya ste ma btang na rkyen byung ba'i phyir/_mtshams chen po ma bkrol kyang bla ste mtshams bu chung mig ras kyis bcad [#]la gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las [#]bya mi dgos de'i [#]nang du gso sbyong byar rung ngo /_/phyis kyang de 'thar ba'i [#]phyir nan tan mi bya bar mi bya/_gso sbyong
[\[216a.4\]]gi dus la bab pa'i tshe'ang dge slong btson du bzung ba de la ci'i thabs kyis kyang btson las thar bar nan tan bya'o/_/dogs par gyur na brel to/_/gso sbyong byed pa'i tshe dge slong 'dra ba zhig gud nas 'ong bar mthong bzhin du [#]yang rung dus kyis gud nas gso sbyong byed pa'i phyir 'ong
[\[216a.5\]]bar shes te dogs bzhin du gso sbyong byas na brel cing mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gso sbyong mi bya bar bsdad do/_/so sor 'gyur ba 'dod pa'i yid kyis las byas na sbom por 'gal/_mtshams gcig gi nang na dge 'dun gzhan la dad pa ma dris par bzhi lnga zhig gi [#]ma bsdus
[\[216a.6\]]shing dad pa ma dris kyang bla [#]mod ces bya ste gso sbyong byas na [#]las su yang mi rung la dbyen gyi sbom por 'gal lo/_/the tshom mam chad par brtags na nyes pa mi ldang bar mi byed do/_/mdo ltag ma ltar dad pa ma blangs kyang bla [#]mod ces te gso sbyong byas na sbom por 'gyur ba ni dad pa ma dris na rung
[\[216a.7\]]ngam mi rung gtol med de the tshom za bzhin du byas pa'ang bla/_dad pa ma blangs kyang rung zhes 'chad par bsams te gso sbyong byas kyang rung sbom por 'gyur ro/_/snying nas btsal na gtsang mar byed do/_/gso sbyong byed pa'i tshe mtshams kyi nang na dge slong lus pa yod dam med snying
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]nas btsal cing bos pas ma rnyed de med par rtogs na gso sbyong byas kyang lus [#]su rung ste phyis dge slong yod par gyur kyang bla'o/_/brtag pa tsam ma yin/_snying nas ma btsal gyi le lo byas te 'ol phyi [#]tsam du btsal ba na dge slong yod par gyur na las su mi rung ngo /_/tshol ba dang dgra [# ]
[\[216b.2\]]dang mthon por 'dug ste phyogs su lta ba ni de'o/_/dge slong yod dam med btsal ba ni sgras kyang bos/_/sa mthon po nas kyang lta[#]/_zhib tu'ang btsal te ma rnyed na btsal bar chud de nyes med do/_/gso sbyong gi dngos po ste 'du bar chud pa'o/_/gso sbyong la 'du ba'i cho ga 'chang ba'o/_/
[\[216b.3\]]gso sbyong bya ste bco lnga'i zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pas so/_/gso sbyong bya ba ni tshes bco lnga zhing zla ba phyed na [#]'dug ste so sor thar pa kha ton du [#]'dul ba 'dzin pa gcig gis klag [#]go/_/tshul nas byung nas ni 'di ma grub pa ma yin no/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe ni
[\[216b.4\]]tshul nas 'byung ba nyid so sor thar pa yin pas so sor thar pa bklag mi dgos so/_/gsol ba dang gtsug lag sngar brjed de de [#]nas bshad pa'o/_/so sor thar pa bklag pa ni thog ma stot+t+ra bklag [#]la de nas gsol ba dang zhu ba'i sngags [#]gson cig btsun pa'i [#]dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong
[\[216b.5\]]bcu bzhi'am bco lnga ste zhes zer ba'i le'u bklag_/de'i gzhi bshad par rgyas par brjod de bsgrub so sor thar pa'i gzhi bshad zin nas phas pham pa'i mgo la ma reg par gzhan mdo'i ming smos la smad tra klag [#]na'ang rung ngo zhu ba yang ngo /_/so sor [#]thar pa bzhi [#]'chad pa'i ltag na
[\[216b.6\]]gsol ba dang zhu ba'i sngags 'byung ba rdzogs nas gzhan mdor bklags te smad tra klag tu ni [#]mi rung ngo /_/lhag ma ni thos pa'o zhes bsnyad na'o/_/phas pham pa bzhi'i mjug rdzogs na 'di man chad ni sngon [#]chad thos pa yin no zhes byas te gzhan mdor bklag pa smad tra [#]bklags kyang rung
[\[216b.7\]]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma mjug rdzogs par bklags te [#]man chad [#]mdo smos la 'di man chad sngon chad thos pa yin no zhes byas la smad tra [#]klag kyang rung gnyis mi mngon pa yan chad bklags la 'di man chad sngon [#]chad thos pa yin no zhes bya ste smad tra klag [#]kyang rung ngo /_/sde brtsams pa rdzogs par ro/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]mdo ltag ma rnams ltar so sor [#]thar pa klog pa la tshigs su'ang [#]bcad cing smad tra klag [#]tu rung ba rnam bzhi la gang yang rung ste tshig gcig ma rdzogs par rkang chad du bya ste sngon [#]chad thos pa yin no zhes mdor bklags te smad tra klag [#]tu mi rung ngo /_/tshig bzhir bcad pa
[\[217a.2\]]gang yang rung ste gcig rdzogs nas man chad mdor bklags [#]te smad tra [#]bklag go_/bzhi la reg na thams cad do/_/so sor thar pa bklag pa mdo ltag ma rnams ltar rnam bzhi tshigs su bcad pa 'das nas sum cu spang ba'i ltung ba'i mgo la reg ste chung zad smos nas ni rked du bcad de
[\[217a.3\]]sngon chad thos pa'o zhes mdor klag [#]tu mi rung gi mjug tu thal bar bklag dgos so/_/zla ba phyed 'das pa de'i kun brtag zhag bco lnga 'das nas zla ba phyed kyi tshe so sor thar pa klag [#]pa'i dus na bdag la ltung ba sde lnga las nyes par gyur pa ci yod dran par bsam/_'du bar 'gyur ba'i [#]
[\[217a.4\]]tshe'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar bsam pa'i dus ni [#]so sor thar pa klag [#]pa'i mdun du bsam zhing dran par bya/_tshor ba so sor bya ste thams cad du 'dug go_/mdo ltag ma gnyis bsams [#]nas phas pham pa yod na ni dge 'dun gyi nang du mi 'jug par gud du 'byung ngo /_/lhag [#]ma yod dam
[\[217a.5\]]so sor mthol ba zhig yod na grogs gcig la dpang gtsugs [#]nas brtags te bzhag_/so sor mthol ba dge 'dun gyi grangs tshang ste [#]mthol du rung ba dang ltung ba dang nyes byas las pa mthol tshangs bya'o/_/'dus nas dran pa'am yid gnyis su na drung na mo la bsngo/_dge 'dun 'dus
[\[217a.6\]]zin te so sor thar pa bklags pas bskul bas nyes pa dran na drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gcig la mthol tshangs bya'o/_/las byed pa ni sems la'o/_/so sor thar pa kha ton klog pa nyid klog pa'i tshe nyes pa byas par dran na langs te gzhan la mthol ba'i mi rigs [#]ste bdag nyid kyis [#]yid
[\[217a.7\]]la mthol bas chog go/_/de ste bdag la med la bco lnga la shes na mdza' ba la mthun [#]par nan tan bya/_dge slong gzhan kun khrims ral cing nyes pa yod de dge slong gcig gcig gtsang ste mthol tshangs byed du mi btub na dge slong gtsang ma des thams cad mthol du gzhug par
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]thabs bya ba'i phyir bdag dang gang mdza' ba'i grogs po bdag la mthol tshangs byed du je [#]gzhug go_/mthol tshangs byed du ji ltar gzhug pa'i thabs ni 'og nas bshad pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa gang gis 'di lta bu byas na de cir 'gyur ltung ba lta bu [#]dang bcas pa'o/_/'o na tshe dang
[\[217b.2\]]ldan pas de 'di lta bu [#]dag ma byas sam byas ste [#]de ltar yod na ni tshe dang ldan pa ltung ba dang bcas pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa nga gcig pu ma yin te dge 'dun thams cad kyang don 'di la'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog bdag gi ltung ba chos ji bzhin du byas so[#]/_/dge 'dun thams cad kyis
[\[217b.3\]]ci bya zhes rim gyis mthong ba'i lam du ste lhag ma rnams kyis 'dong na gshegs su [#]gzhug go/_/dge slong nyes pa med pa gtsang ma des mdza' bo nyes pa yod pa de la de nyid kyi nyes pa dmigs nas phyung ste 'di lta bu zhig byas na ltung bar [#]'gyur ram dri'o/_/de ltar dris pa dang nyes pa'i
[\[217b.4\]]dmigs 'dir 'gyur ro zhes zer na khyod la'ang de lta bu yod na mthol cig ces bya/_/de skad byas pa dang mdza' bo na re dge slong gzhan yang de lta bu spyod [#]de mthol ci dgos zhes zer na dge slong gzhan nyes pa byed pa smos ci dgos khyod bdag gi nyes pa mthol cig ces byas te mthol
[\[217b.5\]]du gzhug_/mthol du gzhug pa ni dge slong gzhan kun gyis kyang mthong bar lam kar sa mthon por tsog tsog por gzhag la mthol du bcug dang nyes pa yod pa gzhan 'phrig cing 'dzem pa'i phyir khyod nga kho gnyis ci byed ces 'drir 'ongs te de dris pa dang mdza' bo des drang por
[\[217b.6\]]smras [#]dang gzhan kun zla blta ste/_/gcig la gcig mthol bar 'gyur ro/_/thabs de ltar gnyis gtsang bar gyur pa dang de la thams cad mthol bar bya'o/_/mi 'dod na de la des mi bskul lo/_/thabs ltag tu smos pa ltar bya ste mi dga' bar 'gyur zhing mthol tshangs byed du mi
[\[217b.7\]]btub na mthol tshangs byos zhes drag tu mi bskul lo/_/'on te bco lnga'i tshe de ltung ba mtshungs par [#]dran nam yid gnyis kyis [#]na bdag gis bshags pa'i gnas dag tu gang du yang btang ste 'dzin pa 'byor pa'i phyir ro/_/dge 'dun thams cad la ltung ba 'dra bar yod na gcig la gcig
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]mthol na tshangs par mi 'gyur te ltung ba mtshungs par yod do/_/shes sam ltung ba yod par 'dra'am/_mi 'dra gtol med de/_the tshom yod na/_dge slong gtsang ma [#]logs shig tu mthol dgos te/_dge 'dun ril gyis gud du mthol du 'dong du mi rigs
[\[218a.2\]]kyi/_/dge slong gcig gam gnyis shig dge slong gtsang ma [#]ga la yod par mthol tshangs byed du dgye'o/_/dge slong mthol du bkye [#]ba de slar 'khor na dge slong thams cad kun de la mthol na tshangs par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'byor na bsngo ba gsol bar 'dod par ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar
[\[218a.3\]]gud du dge slong gtsang ma la mthol du dgyer gud na dge slong gtsang ma med na ltung ba spyi'i sngags byas te so sor thar pa klag [#]na'ang tshangs par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi man chad kyis kyang gtsug lag khang gi bya ba [#]brtan par ro/_/dge 'dun du ma tshang bar te [#]dge slong bzhi man chad cig 'khod [#]
[\[218a.4\]]na'ang dge 'dun mang du 'khod pa'i tshul bzhin du gso sbyong bya la reg par bshams te zhal ta bya'o/_/zhal ta dang las bya ba'i thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_stan gding ba yang mi nyams par ro/_/dge 'dun du ma tshang [#]yang dge 'dun mang du 'khod pa bzhin du stan la sogs pa gding ste zhib tu 'og
[\[218a.5\]]nas 'chad chag chag dang phyag dar dang rab tu gzhon nu'i lci ba'i skyang nul byug_/seng ge'i khri dang stan gding /_me mar dang chos bsnyad pa'i sbyin pa bya/_phyogs mthon por 'dug la phyogs bzhir blta/_dge 'dun ma tshangs [#]yang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams tshul bzhin du bya ste dge slong
[\[218a.6\]]gud nas 'ong ngam mi 'ong phyogs bzhir blta zhing bya ra byas la bsdad do/_/dge slong dag mthong na 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rings par rings thabs su sbyin[#]/_ltag ma ltar bsdad pa las dge slong zhig gud nas 'ong ba mthong na tshe dang ldan pa la gor rings sbyin no [#]zhes bya/_de ring dge 'dun gyi
[\[218a.7\]]gso sbyong nam 'byung ba bco lnga'o zhes pa'i tshig gis so/_/rings par shog shig pa'i tshig ni rings par shog shig pa'i [#]dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong la bab pa'am tshul nas byung ba'i dus la bab kyis rings su shog shig ces bya/_bzhir ma tshang bas [#]kyang bsngo ba'o/_/dge slong bzhir ma tshang ste
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gsum man chad cig 'dug na'ang gcig la gcig nyes pa ci yod pa brtags te dpang btsugs [#]te gzhag go_/nam dus kyi bar bsdad/_dge slong bzhir ma tshang ste brtags te gzhag pa dge slong gud nas 'ongs pa skya rengs shar gyi bar du bsdad do/_/ma 'ongs na gdod brtags go_/'ba'
[\[218b.2\]]zhig na 'dug ste'o/_/gso sbyong gi tshe dge slong gzhan med de bdag gcig pur zad na yid la dgra bcom pa bzhugs par bsam ste [#]nyes pa ci yod pa de [#]brtags te gzhag go_/gzhan dang lhan cig na lhag ma dang nye bar ro/_/gso sbyong gi tshe grogs la bsdad de 'ongs nas bsnan te des kyang
[\[218b.3\]]bzhir ma tshang na gcig la gcig brtags te gzhag pa la'ang bya/_dge slong mang du med de gnyis su 'dug na nye bar tsog tsog por phas 'dag tshus [#]'dug ste gcig la gcig brtag go_/gsum na 'khod de'o/_/dge slong bzhir ma tshang ste gsum zhig yod la skya rengs bar du bsdad
[\[218b.4\]]de ma 'ongs na gsum char khri'u'i steng du 'khod de 'dug la brtags te gzhag_/de bzhin du bzhi pa [#]'byung ba yang ngo /_/gso sbyong gi tshe na dge slong bzhi yod na gso sbyong du rung ste so sor thar pa bklag_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe ni dge slong lngar [#]ma tshang na tshul nas 'byung ba'i las su mi
[\[218b.5\]]rung ste gcig la gcig brtag pa ni sang phod kyi tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe grangs tshang bar bya'o zhes bsam/_so sor [#]thar pa'i mdo 'chad pa de'i tshe gnas na med par shes na gso sbyong la mi bsdad do/_/so sor [#]thar pa klog cing cho ga shes pa med na gso sbyong gi dus kyi bar du mi bsdad par
[\[218b.6\]]so sor thar pa kha ton shes pa gang la 'dug pa'i gan du 'gro ba'am btsal te 'jug par bya'o/_/gang na 'di las rgal ba der tshul du mi 'jug go_/so sor thar pa kha ton dang cho ga shes pa med na tshul du zhugs kyang dral dgos pa'i phyir tshul du mi 'jug par tshol du 'gro'o/_/sngon gyi tshul
[\[218b.7\]]du zhugs pa mi bsrung ngo /_/tshul snga mar tshul du zhugs pa las so sor thar pa'i kha ton dang cho ga shes pa shi'am gud du song ngam/_khyim par babs na tshul mi bsrung bar shes pa tshol du 'gro'o/_/phyi ma zla ba gnyis las 'das par ro/_/tshul phyi mar zhugs pa las so sor [#]thar pa
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]shes pa shi'am med par gyur na zla ba gnyis kyi bar du tshul khrims [#]bsrungs la de nas dral te tshul dang cho ga shes pa tshol du 'gro'o/_/dngos po dang las dang 'thob pa dang g.yog 'khor spang ba 'chad pa btsal lo/_/so sor thar pa shes pa med de spyan 'dren na khang bu
[\[219a.2\]]bzang por bsdams [#]te sbyin pa dang dge 'dun gyi las su mi gzhug pa dang dge 'dun gyi zas dang yon la sogs pa skal ba gzhan gyi bzhin du sbyin pa dang /_dge slong dang khyim pa las g.yog sbyin par khas [#]blangs te spyan drang ngo /_/mdo sde 'dzin pa'i [#]'og nas gdugs dang rgyal
[\[219a.3\]]mtshan dang ba dan dag gis bsu/_mdo sde 'dzin pa mkhas pa zhig spyan ma drangs kyang gud nas 'ong bar thos na ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyis bkur sti bya ste mchod cing bsu'o/_/'dul ba dang ma lta bu dag la yang ngo /_/gud nas spyan ma [#]drangs par 'dul ba dang ma lta bu 'dzin pa zhig
[\[219a.4\]]'ong bar thos na'ang mdo sde 'dzin pa bzhin du bsu bar bya'o/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du'o/_/bsu ba'i tshad ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du bsu'o/_/ma nus na rgyang grags lngar ro/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du bsu ma nus na rgyang grags lnga tsam du bsu'o/_/gsum mam
[\[219a.5\]]dpag tshad phyed dam rgyang grags sam rgyang grags phyed dmar ba'am tshig 'jam pos bsu ste lhung bzed dang chos gos blang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar bsu ba ma nus na dpag tshad phyed de rgyang grags bzhir bsu der kyang bsu ma nus na rgyang grags phyed dmar ba'i phyi rol tsam du'ang
[\[219a.6\]]bsu'o/_/bsu ba'i tshe 'dzum zhing mdangs can du byas la bde bar byon tam zhes byas la de ltar smra zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa blang zhing bsu/_khrus bya[#]/_gud nas 'ongs te bsu ba de khrus bya lus dag mnye/_dge 'dun gyis kyang snum thob par ro/_/gud nas
[\[219a.7\]]'ongs te bsu ba de dge 'dun gyis kyang kha zas bzang pos mgron bya zhing lus bsku ba'i snum la sogs pa sbyin/_dngos po la sogs pa spang ba sbyin/_mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma lta bu [#]'dzin pa spyan drangs kyang rung rang 'ongs kyang rung khang bu dang g.yog la sogs pa sbyin te so sor
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]thar pa shes pa spyan drangs pa bzhin du bya'o/_/chos mnyan pa yang ngo /_/mkhan po mkhas pa gud nas 'ongs na bsti stang dang mgu bar bya zhing rtag par 'dug par bya ba'i phyir yi ge gra btsugs pa dang kha don [#]mtshan rangs bya/_bstan pa 'dzin pa la [#]'di ltar dge slong phrag dog
[\[219b.2\]]na chud par ro/_/dge slong mkhas pa la [#]gud nas 'ongs pa la bsu zhing bsti stang byas pa dang mkhas pa gzhan phrag dog langs na phrag dog bya'i mi rigs kyi gcig tu na rim gro gyis shig par sangs rgyas kyi bka'i gzhung las 'byung /_gcig tu na sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i tshig kho la
[\[219b.3\]]yod pas rim gro bya ba'i rigs te de la phrag dog skyes na sdig tu 'gyur gyi [#]ma byed cig ces gros gdab/_gso sbyong nam [#]'byung ba ma byas par de'i nyin mo yod na bdag gi gnas nas mi 'gro/_/gso sbyong la bab pa'i nyin par dang /_tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe gso sbyong dang tshul gyi
[\[219b.4\]]las ma byas par gud du mi 'gro song na nyes byas/_de ste de nyid na rnam par thos pa ni [#]ma yin no/_/rkyen gcig gis mi 'gror mi rung ba [#]la pha rol du 'gro ba'i gnas de na gso sbyong dang tshul nas 'byung ba'i cho ga dang kha ton shes pa yod na ma byas par song yang nyes med do/_/'thab
[\[219b.5\]]mo byed pa dag la mthar zhing dam pa'i tshul can dang phrad do zhes bsams na yang ngo /_/bdag cag 'khod pa na dge slong 'thab mo pa yod de rtag tu 'khrug cing mi 'dum na/_tshul dang ldan zhing mi 'khrug pa'i dge 'dun gyi gan du 'gro bar bsams na gso sbyong ma byas par song yang
[\[219b.6\]]nyes med do/_/dam pa'i tshul can gyi dge slong las 'thab mo [#]byed pa'i dge slong gan du mi 'gro/_/dge slong tshul dang ldan zhing mi 'khrug la 'tsho ba'i yo byad mi bzang pa zhig na yang dge slong 'khrug cing 'thab rtsod pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad bzang zhing 'byor du zin kyang tshul can bor te [#]
[\[219b.7\]]'thab mo can 'khod pa'i gnas su mi 'gro bar tshul can gan na [#]gnas so/_/dge slong dang bcas pa nas dge slong med par ma yin te/_dge slong tshul dang ldan pa dang gnas pa las tshul dang mi ldan pa'i gnas su dge sbyong [#]med pa dang 'dra ste mi 'gro/_/gcig tu na gtsug lag khang dge
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]slong yod pa'i gnas nas dge slong med pa'i gnas gtsug lag khang stong bar mi 'gro ba la'ang bya/_ma lus par ram gzhan rkyen gcig gam lus dang sems bde ba'i dbang gis na ma yin no/_/ltag ma rnams ltar 'gror mi rung ba la dge 'dun thams cad ril
[\[220a.2\]]gyis 'dong ba dang srog la dman zhing dge sbyong gi tshul stong bar 'gyur ba dang sems 'khrugs [#]shing mya ngan du gyur pa dang /_yul grong khyer te lus la [#]nad du gyur te rkyen 'di rnams lta bu zhig byung nas [#]dge slong 'thab mo pa dang gtsug lag khang stong par song yang nyes med do/_/gso
[\[220a.3\]]sbyong dang 'byung ba ma byas pa gnas pa 'gro bar mi btang [#]/_slob ma dang 'khor las [#]gso sbyong dang [#]tshul nas 'byung ba'i las ma byas par gud du 'gro zhes zer na gnas brtan gang byed pas ma dgye shig_/bkye na nyes byas/_de lta bu'i gzugs kyi [#]rkyen dam pa'i tshul can ston pa dang
[\[220a.4\]]ldan pa zhig na gnas che ge mo ba der 'phos shig ces bsgo'o/_/slob ma dang 'khor las gud du mi gtong bar gzhag tu lus dang srog la dma' zhing dge sbyong gi tshul stor ba tsam gyi rkyen cig byung na pha rol gyi gnas de na dge slong tshul dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa dang /_gso sbyong
[\[220a.5\]]byed pa dang mi byed 'dren mar [#]'khod na dge slong [#]tshul dang ldan zhing gso sbyong byed pa dang 'grogs la gso sbyong byos shig_/tshul nas byung ste song shig ces bsgo nas [#]btang yang nyes med do/_/bsgo ba 'di las mi rgal mdo ltag ma ltar mkhan pos bsgo ste btang ba la mkhan pos
[\[220a.6\]]bsgo ba bzhin du slob mas kyang mnyan cing bya'o/_/brtags pa ni phyis 'ong ba'i [#]phyir yang 'di dag bya bar ro/_/gso sbyong gi tshe snga na gzhi na [#]'khod pa'i dge slong gis gso sbyong dang tshul nas byung ba'i las byas zin pa'i 'og tu gud nas dge slong dag cig 'ongs te nged las 'dir bya bar ro [#]ste
[\[220a.7\]]'ongs pa yin na slar las bsla ste bya ra ci gnang zhes zer na slar bsla ste bya ba'i rigs so/_/yang dag par byas pa der 'dug par 'dod na'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar slar bsla ste bya ba'i las su ma rung ngam [#]mthol ba ma tshangs pa'i the tshom yod na slar bsla ste bya ba'i rigs the tshom med kyang gsol
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]na [#]bsla ste bya ba'i rigs slar 'dus te ma byas kyang nyes med do/_/mthun pa'i spyod pa na yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang gi rkyen du gtogs pa'i dge slong las kha cig gud du dong ba'i 'og tu gzhi bas gso sbyong byas zin nas [#]gud du 'dong [#]ba 'khor te gso sbyong bslas par gsol na'ang bzlas pa'i
[\[220b.2\]]rigs dge slong 'dron [#]po snga phyir chad pa las snga mas byas zin te phyi ma ma byas na slar bzlas te bya ba'i rigs so/_/'du ba yang de dag bslang mdo ltag ma rnams ltar slar bslas par gsol te ma btub na dad pa dris te phyis [#]'ongs pa'i rnams nang gso sbyong bya'o/_/ma thob na mtshams kyi
[\[220b.3\]]phyi rol du bya/_mdo ltag ma ltar dad pa ma ster na mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong ste gso sbyong bya'o/_/'grub pa ni byed pa'i tshe 'ongs te lhag [#]ma myong na'o/_/dge slong bzhi la 'khod pas gso sbyong byed de/_so sor [#]thar pa klog pa mjug tu ma phyin tshun chad du slebs [#]na phyis 'ongs pa de rnams kyang
[\[220b.4\]]gso sbyong byas par [#]chud do/_/phyis 'ongs pa rnams gcig la gcig mthol ba ni tshul gyi mtshams kyi phyi rol du mthol zhing brtags la nang du 'gro ba yin no/_/gang yang gnas nas ma song na gdon mi za bar ro/_/dge slong gzhi bas gso sbyong byas zin te gyes la dge slong phyis
[\[220b.5\]]lhags [#]pas gso sbyong byed pa'i gnas su dge slong 'ga' tsam zhig slebs na dge slong snga ma gyes pa kun slar bsdus te gso sbyong gyis shig_/'ongs pa mang na yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar slar 'du ba yang dge slong phyis lhags pa mang na 'du dgos so/_/gzhi ba mang na ma 'dus kyang nyes
[\[220b.6\]]med do/_/dus kyang mang po'i phyir gzhug go_/dge slong gzhi ba dang gud nas 'ongs pa tshes grangs bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i dus mi mthun na mi grangs gang mang pa'i khar dor ro/_/mnyam na gnas pas so/_/tshes grangs mi mthun la mi grangs mnyam na gzhi la yod pa'i dge slong bzhin du
[\[220b.7\]]bya'o/_/gzhi bas [#]gso sbyong byas te phyis dge slong lags [#]na slar 'du ba yang grangs mnyan [#]na gzhi ba brtsan [#]te ma 'dus kyang nyes med do/_/de yang ngo /_/slar 'du dgos pa ni dge slong phyis 'ongs pa grangs mang na snga mas las [#]zin kyang mi phan te 'du dgos so/_/gso sbyong gi tshul du [#]chud
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa'o/_/gso sbyong du chud dam mi [#]chud pa'i cho ga bshad pa'o/_/bsam gtan las mi bslang /_dge slong bsam gtan du bzhugs pa la sdang ba'am bslang bar mi bya bslang na nyes byas/_ston pa med par bsam gtan mi bya/_bsam gtan gyi lung ston pa'i mkhan po
[\[221a.2\]]med par thug thub tu bsam gtan mi bya/_bum bu dang pho long gi sbyar ba yang rigs so/_/bsam gtan byed pa dang gso sbyong byed pa'i tshe yur na bum bu rna ba la btags [#]pa dang pho long gis brdeg pa'ang nyes med de rigs so/_/brtson 'grus mi glod/_dge ba ci spyod kyang rung lus dang
[\[221a.3\]]sems kyis rgyun mi 'chad par bya/_lus na'am rkyen byung yang sems rgyun mi 'chad par bya/_mdo bzhin du 'di yang ngo /_/mdo sde'i nang nas brtson 'grus bya ba bzhin du brtson 'grus cher bskyed dgos te zan gyis 'grangs [#]te snyom na'ang yon bdag gi [#]bsod nams skyed [#]pa'i phyir brtson
[\[221a.4\]]'grus bskyed dgos so/_/ma 'grangs [#]su zin kyang brtson 'grus bskyed dgos te [#]sha zad pags pa bsnyil [#]gyi bar du bsgrim pa la bya/_mdo sde las bsam pa'i rgyud byung ba bzhin du 'og nas 'byung ba dang [#]nyal khar bsam pa la'ang bya/_yan lag dang /_lus rang nyam du mi bya bar
[\[221a.5\]]seng ge thabs su ne ban ltar nyal ba la bya/_sems dang gos kyang mi g.yel bar nyal brtag_/sngon khyim pa dang mi dge ba'i las spyad pa dran par mi bya'i dge ba la rgyun mi 'chad cing nang par sngar ldang bar bsams/_chos gos dang sham thabs dang ske [#]rags la sogs pa 'thor bar mi
[\[221a.6\]]gzhag gi mi sprug cing lta ba la gnas gcig tu gzhag pa la bya/_mi na bar nyin par mi nyal/_mi na bar nyin par nyal na nyes byas/_rked pa na bas pus 'khyud kyi snam bu bcang /_rked pa na bas pus 'khyud bcangs kyang nyes med/_dbang po nang du chud yid phyir ma song bar bcag ste [#]mi
[\[221a.7\]]nur gsal po drang por ro/_/'chag pa'i tshe dbang po drug nang du bsdus te sems yul la ma bros [#]par 'gros dal bar yang mi bya/_drag tu yang mi 'gro/_lus lhod lhod po dang rnyol rnyol por mi bya bar gsal [#]por byas la drang por bcag go_/mi nus na thag bu [#]drang /_'chag pa'i
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]lam drang [#]por 'gror mi nus na thag bu drangs la de'i 'gram chu dag bcag go_/kha ton byed pa'i 'chags [#]sa'i tshad ni khru bcu gnyis/_kha ton byed pa'i 'chag [#]sa'i tshad ni khru bcu gnyis tshun chad du bya'o/_/spong ba'i ni bco brgyad do/_/bsam gtan byed pa'i 'chag sa khru tshad ma bco
[\[221b.2\]]brgyad tshun chad du bcag go_/der thag bu drangs te bya/_'chag sa byed pa'i tshe thag bu la khrus gcal/_de [#]tshad bzhin du sbyar la thag bus bres te drang por bya/_dge slong gis 'dug nas chos bshad/_sangs rgyas zhal bzhugs su zin kyang dge slong gis chos bshad du rung ste sa la 'dug
[\[221b.3\]]la bshad do/_/du ma na gcig gis so/_/mi mang du 'khod kyang chos 'chad pa gnyis su mi bya'i gcig gis bshad do/_/gang sus kyang ngo /_/chos 'chad pa ni gang mkhas pa gcig gis bshad do/_/ma bskos [#]par yang ma yin te/_chos bshad du mi gsol bar bdag gis mdor to/_/
[\[221b.4\]]chos bshad par mi bya/_de ste de'i dngos 'ongs na ni ma yin/_chos bshad du gsol ba dang chos ston byas nas de'i rjes la yon bdag la chos bshad pa ni nyes med do/_/'khor du ma yin/_mi phal mo che 'khod pa la grangs [#]mang du bcad de phung bu phung bur bya ste gcig gi sgra gcig [#]gis thos
[\[221b.5\]]par mi bshad/_'khor phyed du ma yin/_mi phal mo che 'khod pa la gcig gis mgo nas bshad/_gcig gis mjug [#]nas bshad de gcig gis sgra gcig gis [#]thos par mi bya ste mi thos par bshad/_de gnyis kyi [#]gcig tu ma yin/_khri bshams te chos bshad pa gnyis kyis cig
[\[221b.6\]]car lhan cig tu smra zhing bshad par mi bya/_rgan rabs kyis so/_/chos bshad pa ni/rgan rab [#]zhing chos mkhas pa btsun pa rnams kyis bshad/_de ste mang na stan gnyis gsum bzhag ste'o/_/na [#]rgan pa mang la chos 'chad mkhas [#]pa med kyi gral dma' ba'i nang nas [#]chos bshad mkhas
[\[221b.7\]]pa yod na gral spar te gong du gnyis gsum tsam gyi gral gzhag la de'i 'og tu 'chad pa gzhag_/de ste stan med na ma yin no/_/chos 'chad mkhas pa de rgan po gnyis gsum gyi 'og na 'dug na stan spar mi dgos pa la'ang bya[#]/_seng ge'i khri yang ngo /_/chos 'chad mkhas [#]pa de
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]seng ge'i khri bshams te de'i steng du 'chad du bcug na'ang 'dug ste bshad na'ang nyes med/_mchil ma'i chol zangs zhog shig_/chos 'chad pa'i drung du chol zangs [#]mchil ma'i snod bzhag kyang nyes med do[#]/_/der gding ba sbyin/_mchil ma'i snod chol
[\[222a.2\]]zangs kyi nang du 'og ma dag gzhag_/bye ma'am thal bas so/_/chol zangs su bye ma'am sa'am thal ba blugs te gzhag_/dus [#]dus su bkru/_mchil ma ring du bzhag na sems can du gyur pas [#]dus dus su bkru/_nub mo chos bsnyad par [#]bya/_nub mo thog thag tu kha ton bya
[\[222a.3\]]zhing yi ge klag [#]dgos te dus ma yin pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_de ltar klag [#]dgos pa ni ngos bzhi mgon po dang rim pa'i lha gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du dus der 'ong ba'i phyir dad pa dang dga' ba bskyed par bklag go_/tshes brgyad dang nyi shu gsum la mgon po dang lha bran gyi g.yog
[\[222a.4\]]'ong ba'i phyir yi ge bklag_/bcu bzhi dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang nyi shu dgu la mgon po la sogs pa'i du 'ong ba'i phyir yi ge bklag_/bco lnga dang sum cu la mgon po dang lha nyid [#]'ong ba'i phyir yi ge bklag go_/nad pa ni 'di ma byas kyang nyes med do/_/dus drug gi nub mo chos dang [#]kha don klog pa la
[\[222a.5\]]nad pa ni ma 'ongs kyang nyes med/_ma bklag [#]kyang nyes med do/_/bshad pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i tshe khas mi blang bar [#]bya/_nub mo chos kha don klog pa'i res su bskos na sus [#]bskos kyang rung ngag mnyan no/_/mi nus pa la sogs pa bsgo [#]ba la gsol/_kha ton dang klog mi nus pa zhig yin
[\[222a.6\]]te bskos na su bsko ba de la bdag gis ni mi nus na sbyin pa gcig [#]btsal te btang ngo zhes gsol/_'chad pa med na rim gyis 'don cing bshad/_kha don mang du shes pa med dam mang du mi thon na chung zad shes pa kun rim du brje zhing yang bklag go_/mthar na tshigs su bcad pa gcig
[\[222a.7\]]kyang ngo /_/kha don nyung ngu yang mi shes na res kyis tshigs su bcad pa re re tsam yang bklag ste/_nub mo ring du thub cing mtshan zad par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa de lan mang du bzlas so/_/me mar der bya/_nub mo chos kha don klog pa'i phyir me mar bud pa la'ang bya/_mgon
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]po snang yel che bar me mar kha mang du bkram ste bud pa la'ang bya/_zla ba phyed 'dra ba'am rdzing bu 'dra ba'i chos bsnyad pa'i gtam bya ste mthangs [#]su'o/_/chos bshad pa'i dral thabs ni zla ba kham [#]pa 'dra ba'am/_rdzing bu 'dra bar dang rang la ma yin [#]man du 'gro ba'i phyir gral gyi skabs bor te mthangs [#]
[\[222b.2\]]gdong /_bla gab med par chos bsnyad na bla re gdags thang bla gab med pa la chos 'chad na ras la sogs pa'i bla re gdags so/_/rlung ngam char pa na gzhug_/thang la chos 'chad par bla re gdags [#]pa las rlung dang char pa bab na bsdu[#]/_de'i phyir chos bsnyad par mi gtong /_bla re bsdus
[\[222b.3\]]kyang chos 'chad pa gtong [#]du mi rung ste khang pa yod na'ang der 'phos la chos shod cig_/gnas brtan sngar song nas kha rog ste skad cig 'dug na 'dir chos 'chad dam gzhan bsko te dge slong chos smros shig ces so/_/chos 'chad pa'i tshe gnas brtan thog mar song la khri'i steng du skad
[\[222b.4\]]cig mi smra bar 'dug la de nas chos bshad do/_/yang na dge slong chos shes pa la shod cig ces bsko [#]zhing smra'o/_/'chad pa'i tshe nyan te de ste chos na spro bar bya/_chos 'chad pa'i tshe gzhung bzhin du ma nor bar bzang zhing gsal bar 'chad na de la yi rang bar bya ste bstod la spro bar
[\[222b.5\]]bya'o/_/'on te ma yin na bzlog_/chos 'chad pa des 'khrul cing log par bshad dam chos ma yin pa zhig smra na dgag cing bzlog go_/khyim pa [#]der 'ongs na chos kyi gtam bya/_dus drug gi nub mo chos bsnyad pa'i tshe khyim pa la sogs pa nyan cing bltar 'ongs na chos bsnyad cing bstan
[\[222b.6\]]to/_/mur [#]'dug bar du gcod na chad pas rab tu bcad de khros pa dang 'khrugs pas ni mi bstan/_chos 'chad pa'i tshe mur 'dug pa la sogs pa klan ka tshol zhing rgol na 'thab mo dang brdeg btsog mi bya ba'i 'gab zungs dang ltag chod dang shing [#]log gam tshig thub par dag gi chad pas
[\[222b.7\]]bcad de tshig gis thub nas sems grol bar bya'i 'khrugs shing khros par mi bya'o/_/'khor khrid de chad [#]par mi 'go[# ]/chos 'chad pa'i 'phro las gnas brtan gyis bdag gi slob ma khrid de gud du mi 'gro ba la'ang bya/_chos 'chad pa'i tshe mnyan cing 'khod pa las kha drangs [#]te gud
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]du khud par grwa btsugs [#]shang mi bshad pa la'ang bya/_de nyid 'dod na chos kyi sgor gzhug_/gnas brtan don yod de gud du song ba las slob ma chos nyan cing 'khod pa bdag gi phyi bzhin 'ongs [#]na ma 'ong bar khyed cig ces chos nyan du gzud pa la'ang bya/_kho chos mi
[\[223a.2\]]'dod pa la [#]nan gyis mi bshad/_chos mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad du gsol na bshad par bya'o/_/bsti stang dang bcas bdag po dang bcas dma' ba'i sems kyis 'jug_/chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po des kyang nga rgyal mi bya ba'i bdag gi bla na/_sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom pa'i chos
[\[223a.3\]]kyi bdag po bzhugs te de ni mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i gnas yin gyi bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi bran yin pa snyam du bsams te nga [#]bcag pa la'ang [#]bya/_chos nyan pa rnams kyis kyang chos 'chad pa la chos kyi bdag po ston pa yin pa'i phyir bsti stang dang rim gror byas te gus par bya/_
[\[223a.4\]]nan tan du bshad/_chos 'chad pas bshad pa'i tshe le lo mi bya'i gzhung bzhin du ma 'khrul bar nan tan du sems rtse gcig tu bsdus [#]te chos bshad do/_/chos la bsti stang dang bcas te bstan par ro/_/chos 'chad pa'ang des chos btsun zhing lci bar bsti stang skyed [#]cing tshig drag dal ma khyer
[\[223a.5\]]par bstan par bshad do/_/yid mi g.yeng /_chos 'chad pa des 'chad pa'i tshe na sha chang dang gser dngul dang nor rdzas dang sngon khyim pa'i spyod pa la sems ma bros par bsdus te bshad do/_/rigs la grol ba'i tshig gis so/_/chos 'chad pa'i tshe tshig mgo mjug med par 'dres
[\[223a.6\]]par rkyang bar mi bshad kyi tshigs su chod cing [#]bye brag phyed par gsal por bshad do/_/thod rgal du ma yin chos 'chad pas gzhung gcig ma rdzogs par rked nas bcad de gzhung gzhan gyi mgo nas bzung [#]ste mi bshad/_rgyud 'byor ba/_thog ma bsod nams bshad de de nas na rag dang
[\[223a.7\]]mi dge ba bstan/_de nas las kyi 'bras bu dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu rim [#]bzhin bshad do/_/byams pa snying rje ba/_chos 'chad pa'i tshe [#]zhe sdang med par snying rjer byas la khro sems mi bskyed kyi/_byams pa dang snying rje ba'i phyir bla na med par gdon par bsams te bshad do/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]zang zing med pa'i sems kyis so/_/chos bshad pa'ang bkur sti dang khe [#]dang nor rdzas la sogs pa 'dod pa'i phyir zang zing yod pa'i sems kyis chos mi bshad pa la'ang bya/_dga' sred mgu bar bya/_chos mnyan pas kyang chos 'chad pa la sems dang zhing dga' bar bya ba dang bshad pa
[\[223b.2\]]'dis mi chog gi mang du mnyan cing bslab pa'i phyir sred par bya ba dang bshad pa'i chos la rjes su yi rangs shing [#]mgu bar bya'o/_/ma zin kyang don gyi dbang gis na mi bsdad/_chos 'chad pa'i tshe na tshig brjed dam glo'am lud pa lta bu langs nas [#]bsams shing bltas te bsdad la bshad pa la bya/_chos
[\[223b.3\]]'chad pa'i rgyud ma rdzogs par rjes [#]ma 'ongs na mjug rdzogs kyi bar du rjes [#]ma sdod du gzhug pa la bya/_dbyangs kyis chos bshad/_chos bshad pa la sems skye zhing dga' bar gyur na dbyangs snyan pas chos bshad kyang nyes med/_langs nas bye brag tu bya/_chos 'chad 'chad pa
[\[223b.4\]]las zin te 'gro khar chos 'dri ba zhig 'ongs nas 'greng bzhin du chos bshad kyang nyes med pa la'ang bya/_drangs te don gtam du'o/_/gzhung bsdus te 'chad na'ang tshig 'byor par bshad pa la'ang bya/_dbyangs dang tshig la don ci lta bu zhes 'dri na de'i don bshad pa la'ang bya/_dbye
[\[223b.5\]]zhing sbyar/_chos bshad pa des gzhung 'di ltar drangs na 'di dang mthun no/_/'di dang mi mthun no zhes bshad pa la'ang bya[#]/_gzhung gi nang du la las rang bzo [#]bcug pa zhig yod na 'di tshig de phyung ste gzhung bzhin bshad cing bstan pa la'ang bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis nyi ma
[\[223b.6\]]bgrang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis [#]zhag dang nyi ma bgrangs te tshes [#]grangs bzung [#]/_skud pas brgyus pa'i shing bran gyis [#]spo zhing ngo /_/tshes grangs gzung ba'i thabs ni skud pa las [#]shing bu bco lnga brgyus la tshes grangs kyi ming so sor bris te shing sbu gu can gcig gis bar
[\[223b.7\]]gcad [#]byas la zhag gcig lon zhing sbu gu can gyi nang nas shing bu gcig drang /_gtsug lag khang skyong gis der 'ongs shing dge 'dun la zhu/_gtsug lag khang skyong gis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan la tshes grangs dris la dge brtags kyi tshes grangs 'di 'das so zhes dge 'dun
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]la smra/_bye brag gis so/_/gnas brtan gyis tshes grangs ma 'khrul bar bya zhing tshes grangs kyi ming dang zla ba gyen thur bye brag phyed par bya/_zla ba phyed [#]tha dad du'o/_/tshes grangs smos pa'i tshe zla ba yar gyi zhag 'di 'das so zhes bya ba dang /_zla ba mar gyi
[\[224a.2\]]zhag 'di 'das so zhes bya ba ma 'khrul bar bya/_gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa lhogs shig ces dge slong la bsgo ba'i tshig go_/dge brtags klog pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa lhogs shig ces kyang smra
[\[224a.3\]]ste smra ba'i tshig nyid 'og nas zhib tu 'chad/_de ma thag tu'o/_/dge brtags klog pas mdo ltag ma skad du smras pa dang /_dge 'dun rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pa gnyis bklag [#]go_/der yang zla ba phyed kyi [#]tshes gcig ste gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang gtsug lag khang gi lha
[\[224a.4\]]rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa lhogs shig ces so/_/tshigs su bcad pa lhogs shig pa'i tshig [#]ni tshes gcig gam gnyis kyang rung 'das pa yin te gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa tshig 'di go rims bzhin du bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang gi bdag po spyan
[\[224a.5\]]'dren pa'i tshig kyang ste 'di zhes bya ba'i [#]sbyin bdag gis dge slong gi [#]dge 'dun mchod par spyan 'dren gyi [#]de la btsun pa rnams kyis dge ba'i yid kyis thugs rjes gzigs shig ces so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar smras pa'i rjes bzhin du yon bdag su yin pas sang bshos la spyan 'dren gyi [#]
[\[224a.6\]]dge 'dun gyis [#]thugs rjes dgos [#]shig ces mdo 'di'i tshig bzhin du smras [#]zhag nyung ba yang gzhug_/gso sbyong bya ba ni zla ba zhag ma tshang ba'i rnams la tshes bcu bzhi zhing bya'o/_/[#]tshes bcu bzhi zhing bya ba'i zla ba ni dpyid zla 'bring po dang dbyar zla ra ba dang dbyar zla tha chungs dang ston zla 'bring po dang
[\[224a.7\]]dgun zla ra ba dang dgun zla tha chungs drug shi ba'i tshes bcu bzhi'i gso sbyong du bya'o/_/zla ba phyed las 'das pa'i dus la [#]zhag bco lngar mi thub ste bcu bzhi la gso sbyong bya ba ni zla ba drug gong du smos pa yin gyi gzhan thams cad ni bco lnga'i gso sbyong du bya'o/_/zla ba lhag pa'ang [#]bya ste rgyal po'i
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]rjes su 'jug_/rgyal pos zla ba shol 'dums shig tu bsgyur ba [#]brtsis na'ang dge slong gis zhag grangs brtsis pa mi brtsan [#]gyi rgyal pos brtsis pa bzhin du gso sbyong bya/_skar mkhan gyi phyir 'jug cing skar ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su yang ngo /_/skar mkhan gyis brtsis te shol 'dums yod
[\[224b.2\]]pa zhig tu gyur na skar mkhan gyis brtsis [#]bzhin du tshes grangs brtsi zhing gso sbyong bya'o/_/tshes grangs brtsi ba'i [#]phyir dge slong gis skar ma'i rgyud [#]bslabs kyang nyes med pa'ang [#]bya'o/_/ma brtags gso sbyong gi bar du ma bsdad par stong pa zhes mtshams mi bcing /_lha khang stong
[\[224b.3\]]pa dge slong gnas sam mi gnas gtol med par bdag cag gnas par bya ba'i phyir mtshams mi bcad gtsug lag khang stong pa der dge slong gnas sam mi gnas brtags [#]pa ni gso sbyong gi zhag dus kyi bar du bsdad de ma 'ongs na mtshams bcad kyang nyes med/_gso sbyong bar du
[\[224b.4\]]ma bsdad par mtshams bcad na nyes byas/_yan lag ma yin pa ni ma skyes par shes pa'i bcad pa'o/_/gtsug lag khang gi mtshams sngar bcad zin la mtshams bcad dam ma bcad gtol med de mi shes kyang rung bcad par shes bzhin du yang rung ste mtshams sngags kyis ma bkrol lam zhig
[\[224b.5\]]pa ma yin na phyis bcad kyang mtshams bcad par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du nyes byas kyang [#]yod do/_/de med na yang btang ba'o/_/mtshams sngags kyis bkrol ba dang /_dge slong kun gud du dong [#]ste zhag lon pa dang dge slong pha kun mo mtshan du gyur pa dang /_dge slong kun [#]shi ste lha khang stong par
[\[224b.6\]]gyur pa dang /_dge slong kun khrims phul ba dang /_dge slong kun mtshams med pa dang /_phas pham par gyur pa dang /_dge slong kun mur 'dug tu zhugs pa dang /_rnam pa 'di bdun lta bu zhig tu gyur na mtshams zhig pa yin no/_/brtags [#]pa'i gnas kyang ngo /_/tshang mang du
[\[224b.7\]]bsngos te gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas pa'ang gong ma'i rnam pa bdun du smos pa gang yang rung [#]/_gcig ltar gyur na gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las zhig pa yin te phyis bya [#]dgos so/_/ma brtags pa ni mtshams la mtshams bskor ba'o/_/mtshams sngar bcad zin pa la phyis mtshams
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]bcad kyang mtshams mi chags [#]so/_/brtags pa ni 'khor dang dge slong ma'i dbyar mo thang dang khron pa yang ngo /_/mtshams kyi phyi rol kyang rung mtshams snga ma [#]bcad pa'ang rung ste/_'phral la sogs pa [#]dang zhu ba'i las kyis mtshams bu chung ngu bcad la gso sbyong
[\[225a.2\]]byas na'ang rung mtshams bu chung ma [#]byas kyang rung /_dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du 'dong ste dad pa dris la gso sbyong byas kyang rung /_shing gcig 'dug pa'i mtshams kyis du ma bzhi'i mtshams so/_/mtshams gnyis gsum zhig so sor gcod de kun gyi bar na shing ngam rdo
[\[225a.3\]]zhig yod na mtshams de kun gyi mtshams shing ngam [#]rdo de gcig pu la gzugs su rung ngo /_/brtan pa de mtshan ma'o/_/mtshams kyi mtshan ma gzugs pa ni brag gam pha bong ngam zhing lta bu brtan pa las gzugs so/_/'di ltar gyur pa ma yin pa ni 'phrul dang sgyu mas byas pa'o/_/
[\[225a.4\]]mtshams kyi mtshan ma mi brtan pa sprin nam[#]/_na bun nam/_sgyu mar sprul cing 'dug pa lta bu la [#]mtshan mar mi gzugs/_mi brtan [#]pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od la sogs pa'i rlabs so/_/mtshams kyi mtshan ma zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang grib ma lta bu dang chu'i rlabs skyed [#]'brir 'gyur
[\[225a.5\]]ba la mtshan ma [#]mi gzugs/_mtshams kyi chu ni mtshams gzhan dang 'dra'o/_/rdza ma dang zangs kyi nang du chu [#]blugs la de'i nang du chos gos bcug la chos gos de [#]snod la ma reg par skya rengs byung na'ang bral ba'i ltung ba la'ang bya/_mtshams bcad pa'i nang du chu 'bab cing skam pa zhig
[\[225a.6\]]yod na'ang 'bab pa'i tshe ni chu phan chad mtshams gcig tu mi rung skam [#]pa'i tshe ni mtshams su rung ngo /_/bar chad na gcig tu med do/_/mtshams bcad nas mtshams kyi nang du chu 'bab na mtshams bcad pas brtsir mi rung ste chus mtshams su bzung ngo /_/de ste zam pa brtan na ni yul
[\[225a.7\]]bzhin no/_/chu de la zam pa bzang po zhig yod na ni chus chod kyang mtshams gcig pa dang 'dra'o/_/zhig pa las slar byas na rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/chu la zam pa yod pa de zhig ste slar bcos par bsams na zam pa ma thogs kyi bar du zhag gis chod kyang zhig par mi 'gyur te chos gos dang
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]bral bar yang mi 'gyur/_sbyor ba ma btang [#]na yang ngo /_/zam pa bcos par bsams na zhag gis chod kyang rung ba ni zam pa zhig nas mkhar lan mgo zugs te rtsom bzhin na rung gi mkhar lan ma zugs [#]la phyis bcos par sems pa ni mi rung ngo /_/zhag bdun las [#]'das na ma yin no/_/
[\[225b.2\]]bcos par bsams na rung ba ni zhag bdun tshun chad rung gi zhag bdun las 'das na bcos par bsams shing mkhar lan mgo zugs gcig gis [#]rgyun ma chad par byas kyang mi rung ngo /_/nam mkha'i na bar chad du 'gyur ro/_/mtshams kyi mtshan ma nam mkha' la mi rung ste nam
[\[225b.3\]]mkha' la mtshams kyi mtshan ma btsugs kyang mi chud do/_/'di yod kyang mi spyod pa ma chod pa lta ga la zhig_/nam mkha' yod du zin kyang gzung zhing bsngor med na mtshams kyi mtshan ma ci las gzung ste ga la rung /_dbus nas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha'i mtshams
[\[225b.4\]]las lhag par [#]gcod du mi skye'o/_/mtshams bcad pa'i tshad dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni bcad du rung gi dpag tshad phyed [#]dang gsum las ring ba phan chad ni gsol ba dang zhu ba'i sngags kyis mtshams bcad kyang mtshams [#]ma bcad pa dang 'dra ste sngags kyang mi 'chags
[\[225b.5\]]mtshams kyang med do/_/de bzhin du bla dang 'og dang sra ba la bcad pa'ang thang bzhin no/_/lung pa la sul gcong rong zhig tu mtshams gcod na ri gcig nas gcig gi bar nam mkha' la kha drang du mi bcad kyi sa'i gzhi gyen thur ci ltar 'dug pa bzhin du 'dom grangs kyis bcal [#]te
[\[225b.6\]]dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du bcad do/_/mi skye ba ni mi 'bral bar gnang ba las mtshams ma bcad na'o/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis mtshams [#]bcad na rgan po dang nad pa las [#]chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba byin kyang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/bcad pa med na med do/_/
[\[225b.7\]]mtshams bcad de [#]chos gos dang mi 'bral bar gnang ba byin pa las mtshams zhig pa rnam pa bdun gang yang rung /_gcig byung na chos gos dang mi 'bral bar gnang ba byin pa zhig ste bral [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/des na ma yin no/_/dge slong rgan po dang nad pa chos gos dang 'bral bar gnang [#]
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]ba de shi'am khrims phul lam gnang ba [#]slar phrogs kyang mtshams ni zhig par mi 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten dang dri gtsang khang gi bar dang gso sbyong gi dngos por gso sbyong gi tshe phyags[#]/_gso sbyong byed pa'i dus su mchod rten dang dri gtsang khang dang gso sbyong
[\[226a.2\]]byed pa'i sar phyag dar dang maN+Dal dang /_chag chag la sogs pa byas te me tog gis brgyan [#]to/_/dad pa byin pa pa ni dge 'dun la byin pa'o/_/gso sbyong la 'du ba'i tshe brel tam/_na na dge 'dun la dad pa phul nas [#]'dus pa dang 'dra ste las su rung ngo /_/gang sus kyang
[\[226a.3\]]de'i phyir de zhu bar gyis shig_/de mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas na mi sbyin sbyin du mi 'jug_/dad pa len pa las [#]bar du chu'am ra bas chod na dad pa blangs par mi chud pa'i phyir bdag gis kyang dad pa mi 'bul te dad pa len pas kyang 'bul [#]du mi gzhug [#]cing dad pa mi blang [#]/_phul kyang
[\[226a.4\]]dad pa phul bar mi chud/_sbyin du mi gzhug_/mtshams kyi phyi rol nas bdag gis kyang mi len kho bo sbyin du yang mi gzhug_/gcig nas gcig tu ma yin dad pa len du bskos pa'i mi des gzhan la bcol te dad pa len du mi btang /_de ltar byas na dad pa 'bul ba dang dad pa
[\[226a.5\]]len par bskos pa'i dge slong gnyis nyes byas so/_/nyes byas pa ni na ba dang dbang med pa dang gsog [#]dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pa las byin na'o/_/dad pa len par bskos pa des dad pa blangs nas dge 'dun la dad pa dbul ba bdag nyid kyis ma phul bar mi
[\[226a.6\]]gzhan la bcol te dbul du bcug na nyes byas so/_/dad pa gzhan la dbul du bcug kyang nyes med pa ni srog la dma' ba dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ba dang /_bdag la dbang med pa [#]med pa'i rkyen cig byung ste gud du 'gro bar 'gyur te rings na grogs gcig la
[\[226a.7\]]dad pa dbul du bcol kyang nyes med do/_/ma gus pas ma zhus na'o/_/dad pa blangs na blangs kyi ma gus pa'i phyir ma [#]phul yang bla zhes bsams te 'dug pa ni dge 'dun gso sbyong gi las ni rung gi dge slong de nyes byas so/_/nyes med pa ni 'dis 'jigs te phyi'i mtshams nas blangs pa'o/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]dad pas [#]blangs nas 'bul du 'gro ba'i lam na dgra'am gnod par byed pa zhig yod na mtshams kyi phyi rol nas bskos [#]te dge 'dun la dad pa phul yang nyes med do/_/gtsug lag khang skyong gis gso sbyong gi tshul shing [#]'drim pa nas [#]dge slong dgongs shig_/dge slong grangs mang ste [#]
[\[226b.2\]]ngos mi tshol na gtsug lag khang skyong gis gso sbyong gi tshe [#]tshul shing brim [#]la shing bsdus te tshang ngam ma tshang shing mi [#]bgrang ngo /_/rab tu thon pa'i tshig phyed kyang mi 'khrul bar shod cig_/gso sbyong byed pa'i tshe so sor [#]thar pa kha don du klog pa ni tshig cung zad kyang mi 'khrul bar klog
[\[226b.3\]]nus pa gcig gis bklag go_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so/_/so sor [#]thar pa kha don klog pa bskos pa ni las byed pa dge slong gis gnas brtan gral [#]mthon po na 'dug pa me tog brims te byed du gzhug go_/mi nus na gnyis pos kyang ngo /_/gral thog ma pas kha don
[\[226b.4\]]klog mi nus na de'i 'og nas [#]'dug pa la me tog byin te byed du gzhug go_/gsum pos kyang ngo /_/des kyang ma [#]nus na gnyis kyi 'og nas dge slong su 'dug pa la me tog byin te klog tu gzhug go_/des kyang na re mor ro/_/des kyang ma nus na de gsum kha don ci shes pa las
[\[226b.5\]]gcig gi mjug [#]gcig gis mthud de kha don zer du gzhug go_/mi nus na gzhan la bsko/_de [#]gsum gcig gis gcig mthud de byar yang mi nus na 'og na kha thon shes pa su yod pa la me tog byin te byed du gzhug go_/mi btub na dge 'dun gyis so/_/kha thon shes pa de byed
[\[226b.6\]]du mi btub na dge 'dun kun gyis bskos te [#]byed du gzhug go/_brtag pa yang ngo /_/so sor thar pa kha thon shes shing tshig mi 'khrul bar mkhas pa zhig yod na rtag tu de so sor thar pa kha thon byed du gzhug go_/lus na lhag ma gzhan gyis so/_/so sor thar pa mi gcig gis
[\[226b.7\]]kha thon mjug tu ma phyin te lhag ma lus na su shes pa gcig gis brjes te 'phro nas bzung ste bya'o/_/dum bu dum bur bzung ste nam 'byor gyi bar du'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gcig gis mthud de ma nus na mi du mas gcig gi mjug gcig gis mthud de mjug tu phyin phyin du
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]bya'o/_/mi rigs pa ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i gnas mdzes par 'dod de grong dang mi nye bar gso sbyong byed pa'o/_/'jigs sa zhig tu me tog dang gzing ma bzang po'i phyir gtsug lag khang nas byung ste der gso sbyong byas na nyes byas/_mi 'dug par
[\[227a.2\]]'grogs te [#]dong ba na yang bya/_lam du zhugs pa la [#]gso sbyong byar lam grogs dang bral na 'gro zhing lam grogs khyim pa [#]dang 'grogs bzhin du so sor thar pa bklag [#]go_/sgra mi 'dod na mdos so/_/ltag ma ltar klag [#]tu 'jigs pa'i phyir lam grogs gshe na sgra bskyungs te mdo
[\[227a.3\]]tsam bklag go_/de ltar yang na bsngo/_/ltag ma ltar shub [#]bur bklag tu lam grogs gshe na nyes pa ci yod pa grogs la dpang btsugs te brtags [#]la gzhag_/kha na ma tho ba med pa ni dad pa la gtso bo [#]ste dga' bar 'gyur na [#]bsnyad/_dge bsnyen khrims thos kyang phyir mi nur zhing
[\[227a.4\]]mi 'gyur ba dang mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dge 'dun gyi rag lus shing zhal ta byed pa'i dge bsnyen dad pa chen po zhig na gso sbyong gi cho ga dang khrims la sogs pa bstan kyang nyes med do/_/'dug na gso sbyong bya/_khyim pa zhig gso sbyong gi cho ga la lta 'dod de mi bltar mi rung zhes zer te
[\[227a.5\]]'dug na drung na 'dug bzhin du gso sbyong byas kyang nyes med do/_/ring ba zhig na khyim pa 'dug kyang bshad de[#]/_bdag na tshabs che ste shi la thug pa dang mi rgod la sogs pas gsad [#]par bshams te 'chi bar 'gyur zhing dge slong grogs la mthol du mi slebs na khyim pa la bdag gi nyes pa
[\[227a.6\]]ci yod pa tshangs [#]su bya/_de la cho ga bsnyad/_mi rgod la sogs pa mi srun pa zhig gis khrims la [#]ma bstan na gsad [#]do rdeg go zhes zer na khrims bstan kyang nyes med/_rgyal po la yang bsnyad/_rgyal po khrims 'dri na bstan kyang nyes med/_mtha' la phan chad mi skye ba ma yin so sor thar
[\[227a.7\]]pa'i gzhi bklags [#]zin te rkyen cig byung ste rked chad du bzhag ste man chad mjug tu phyin par ma bklag [#]kyang gso sbyong du chud do/_/bshad pa dang de tsam pa dang dus dang [#]chad pa bdag de bzhin du ma blangs na 'dir chos ma yin no/_/rna lam nas 'das na song ba'o[#]/_/ltag nas snga ma gso sbyong
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]zin te gyes pa las phyi mas mjug slebs na slar 'dus shing des byung ba'i tshad ni phyi ma 'ongs nas snga ma gzhan ni gyes kyi dge slong gzhan cig 'ga' zhig gtam tha mal par smras pa'i sgra thos tshun chad cig na 'dug ste slebs na gso sbyong byed pa'i sa nyid las 'phags te gyes kyang [#]slar 'du
[\[227b.2\]]dgos so/_/rnam par 'byed pa la sogs par chud pa'o/_/gso sbyong gi cho ga 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i dngos po'o/_/[#]gso sbyong gi dngos po rdzogs so/_/[#]gso sbyong gi [#]bshad pa'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//dbyar tshul du 'jug_/dbyar zla 'bring
[\[227b.3\]]po nas ston zla 'bring po [#]nya'i bar du yang rung /_dbyar zla tha chungs nya nas ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar du yang rung /_snga phyi gang yang rung la ngal [#]bso ba'i phyir tshul du 'jug go_/zla ba gsum dbyar tshul du 'jug pa'i zla ba gsum gyi bar du bsrung ngo /_/tshes zhag gcig dbyar zla
[\[227b.4\]]'bring po la tshul du 'jug ste de ni tshul snga ma'o/_/dbyar zla 'bring po de ma thag pa/_dbyar zla 'bring [#]po'i tshes bcu drug ces bya ba ni dbyar zla 'bring po nya bri ba zhag gcig la bya'o/_/dbyar zla tha chungs la yang ngo /_/tshul phyi ma ni [#]dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bcu drug la 'jug go_/gtsug
[\[227b.5\]]lag khang brgyan/_tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi ral tshems dang ri mo gso ba dang rgyan [#]la sogs pa gdags shing phyi bdar bya/_zhag bcu'am zla ba phyed na 'gyur [#]ba na'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang brgyan pa ni gtsug lag khang che na zla [#]ba phyed nas brgyan/_
[\[227b.6\]]gtsug lag khang chung na zhag bdun tsam nas brgyan/_zhag bdun nam brgyad du yang gzhan las so/_/tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang brgyan pa ni gzhung kha cig las gtsug lag khang chen zhag brgyad/_chung na zhag bdun man chad brgyan to zhes kyang 'byung ste ltag ma dang gnyis [#]
[\[227b.7\]]gar dga' bar bya'o/_/snga de nyin mal stan bsog_/sang tshul du 'jug pa'i dus la bab na de ring dge 'dun gyi mal stan las so sor brnyas pa dang 'thor ba kun khri yan chad bsdu zhing bsog_/rkang pa'i chol zangs yan chad do/_/tshul du 'jug pa'i zhag gcig gi snga nas mal stan bsdu ba
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ni chol zangs yan chad bsdus te gzhag go_/de len pas bsgo/_/tshul du zhugs pa'i snga de nyi ma la bstan pa nyid 'byung ste gsar gyis brje dgos te gsar dge 'dun gyis gti mug dang rang dbang dang zhe sdang 'jigs pa dang [#]mtho ba sems can dang 'di rnams lta bu
[\[228a.2\]]dang mi ldan zhing med pa las bsko/_/mi nus na du mas so/_/mal [#]stan rdzi bsko [#]ba gcig gis mi chog cing lag gis mi khyab na gnyis [#]gsum yan chad dus chog bar bsko/_/dus [#]byug pa bsung gis te slob mar gyur pa la gos dkar pos g.yogs la [#]bzhag pa tshul shing ste
[\[228a.3\]]rgan rims su bzhag la 'di dang 'di'i gnas 'og khrims te gang khyod kyi nang nas dang ba 'og khrims 'dis gnas 'di rang [#]dbyar tshul du zhugs [#]na des tshul shing long shig_/tshul du 'jug pa'i nyin par tshul shing spos dang gur kum [#]la sogs
[\[228a.4\]]pa bsung gis bskus la slo [#]mar bcug la ras dkar pos g.yogs[#]/_/de'i tshe 'og khrims bsgo ste 'og khrims ni 'dug pa'i 'thab [#]mo mi gleng ba dang ltung ba sde lnga la nongs pa'i dmigs shig yod na'ang mi brgal bar bya ba dang brgal ba zhig yod na'ang tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe [#]rgol
[\[228a.5\]]cig ces bya ba dang tshul 'dir 'jug 'dod na tshul shing long shig ci [#]mi 'dod na ma len cig ces bya ba dang nyes pa spyod pa zhig yod na'ang chad pas [#]mi bcad par dam bca' ba la sogs pa'i 'og khrims bsgo/_de'i 'og tu tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong ma yin pa gzhan gcig [#]
[\[228a.6\]]gis dge 'dun tshul du 'jug ste tshul du 'jug par 'tshal lo zhes gsol zhes gsol ba'i sngags bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong gis tshul shing 'drim mo/_/tshul shing 'drim pa ni rgan rims nas brim [#]mo/_/tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe las go rims 'di
[\[228a.7\]]bzhin du bya ste kha cig ni mdo dmigs kyis 'og nas 'chad pa rnams yin[#]/_khyed kyi nang na 'gas dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun gyi dbus su 'thab mo ma skyed gcig[# ]/tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe 'og khrims su bca' ba'i tshig 'di yang bsgo dgos te tshul na 'khod pa zla ba gsum gyi
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]tshe dge 'dun gyi nang du 'thab mo dang 'khrug lang [#]ma byed cig ces khrims su bca'/_gang khyed cung zad shes na des na smros shig_/mdo ltag ma ltar tshul gyi tshe 'thab mo rgol zhing ma glengs par [#]tshul khrims kyi phyi nas gleng ba [#]zhig yod dam nyes pa brgal ba zhig yod na da gyis shig ces
[\[228b.2\]]kyang bsgo/_/gang gis dbyar gyi dbus su dge 'dun la 'thab mo skyed [#]par gyur na de la dge 'dun gyis phyis brtags [#]par dgongs shig ces dge 'dun la [#]bsgo/_/tshul du zhugs zin nas dge slong la la zhig gis nyes pa zhig [#]byas sam 'thab [#]mo bskyed na'ang chad pas 'phral du
[\[228b.3\]]mi bcad par tshul nas byung nas spangs shing [#]chad pas bcad cing sbyar bar brtags te gzhag go zhes kyang dge slong kun la bsgo zhing 'og khrims su bca'/_len pa dang 'jug pa'i phyir dge 'dun gyis zhu/_tshul shing ma brim pa'i mdun du tshul zhing 'drim [#]par bskos pa'i dge
[\[228b.4\]]slong ma yin pa dge slong las pa gcig gis dge 'dun tshul du 'jug cing tshul shing brim mo zhes gsol ba'i sngags bya/_tshul shing brim/_mdo ltag ma ltar sngags byas zin nas brims nas [#]snga de nyid tshul shing 'drim [#]par bskos pa'i dge slong gis tshul shing brim mo/_/thog
[\[228b.5\]]mar ston pa'i blang /_tshul shing brim [#]pa ni thog mar sangs rgyas kyi tshul shing gcig gzhag_/dgra bcom pa'i tshul shing skal ba gcig gzhag_/gzhan gyis stan phyed bor te'o/_/tshul shing 'drim pa la len pa'i tshe na stan las 'phags te gus par blang ngo /_/slob dpon
[\[228b.6\]]mkhan pos dge sbyong gi'o/_/dge sbyong gi tshul shing ni mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis blang ngo /_/'khod pa yang 'di bzhin te mtha' nas so/_/dge 'dun thams cad la tshul shing brims zin pa'i 'jug [#]tu gtsug lag khang gi srung [#]ma'i lha la tshul shing gcig bsngos [#]te gzhag go_/
[\[228b.7\]]dal gyis gzhag_/tshul shing blangs nas slar gzhag pa'i tshe ma khrol bar dal gyis gzhag_/bgrangs te gnas 'di na dge slong 'di snyed kyi [#]tshul shing blangs so zhes sbra na[#]/_tshul shing brims te bsdus nas tshul shing bgrangs la mi 'di snyed kyis tshul shing blangs te tshul du
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]zhugs so zhes dge 'dun la bsnyad [#]cing smra/_gnas kyi dngos po len du 'jug_/tshul du zhugs pa'i 'og tu khang bu so so'i rkyen la sogs pa dge slong rnams so sor khang bu [#]sbyin zhing bgo[# ]/tha mar sa dang zung nga [#]blangs te mdun du 'dug la/_dad pa thog mar
[\[229a.2\]]bskyed de gnas brtan gyi gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig ste rnyed pa dang bcas gos dang bcas kyis bzhes shig ces yon tan ci bzhin par ro/_/khang bu bgo ba ni khang bu so so'i sgo lcags dang zung nga [#]bsdus te dge 'dun gyi mdun du bsogs pa [#]la sgo lcags 'di ni khang bu 'di'i yin te rkyen
[\[229a.3\]]mang nyung 'di tsam yod do zhes mig re re nas kun gyi rkyen ci yod pa bshad la/_dge slong rgan zhing yon tan dang ldan mi ldan rim bzhin du dbul zhing bsgo'o/_/lhung bzed bzhin du blangs pa la sogs pa'o/_/lhung bzed spang ba ltung bar 'gyur te dge 'dun la brims pa las gral thog ma
[\[229a.4\]]pas mi 'dod ces byas nas thur du thal ba las lan gsum gyi bar du slar slong na slar byin pa bzhin khang bu mi 'dod ces byas pa las slar blangs na lan du bslangs pa bzhin du nyes byas re re ste lan gsum du bslangs pa'i [#]tha ma la sbyin/_ma byin na dge 'dun 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[229a.5\]]bgo [#]bar shes pa [#]la mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi don ma yin par song na gral rim du bgo'o[#]/_/tshul du 'jug cing khang [#]bu 'god par shes bzhin du rang don la gud du song na dge 'dun gyis kyang kho'i skal ba'i khang bu rim bzhin du ma bzhag par bgos [#]kyang nyes med do/_/khang bu lhag
[\[229a.6\]]na ni su mi 'dod [#]pa'i khang bu nang pa la [#]skal ba bzhag go_/dkon mchog gi phyir dge 'dun gyis bskos te [#]btang ba ni khang bu rim bzhin du skal ba sbyin no/_/shing drung dang sngon po dang gsing [#]ma dang sgang la yang ji ltar rgan pa'i rims su bgo[# ]/dge slong lam du zhugs te 'dod pa zhig
[\[229a.7\]]na nas rgan pa'i rnams la grang na ni dro ba'i sa sbyin/_tsha ba zhig na grib ma dang bsil ba'i sar gzhag go_/khang bus mi chog na gnyis la sogs pa ste mthar na gding ba tsam gyis so/_/khang bu bgos [#]te grangs kyis mi chog ste mi mang na khang bu mig gcig la mig [#]gnyis gsum yan chad du
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]shong shong [#]du gzhag go_/de ltar byas kyang mi mang ste mi shong na khang bu'i nang du gding ba bkram ste gding ba du shong ba bzhin du mi yang de snyed du 'khod du gzhug [#]go_/lhung bzed dang ril ba spyi blugs dang go [#]'dun dang so shing gi gnas spags te'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar mi mang ste mi
[\[229b.2\]]shong ba gding ba'i tshad kyi grangs kyis bgos pa la mi de rnams kyi ril ba dang lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byad gzhag pa'i sar gding ba gcig gis mi grangs la [#]ma gtogs par lhag par gzhag_/sgo khang dang skas khang dang khyams dang 'khod pa'i dang khrus khang dag ni mi bgo'o[#]/_/
[\[229b.3\]]ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni dge 'dun gyi spyi'i spyod pa yin pas mi ci [#]ltar mang yang mi bgo [#]bar bzhag go_/mal stan la mtshan mo ma yin/_mal stan bgo [#]ba ni nyin par 'god kyi mtshan mo [#]mi 'god do/_/nad pa gnas pa'i khang bu gzhan la ma yin/_khang bu bgo [#]ba'i tshe
[\[229b.4\]]nad pa 'dug na ni rim du bgo [#]zhing skyo bar mi bya bar nad pa gzhi la gzhag [#]ste gzhan rim par [#]bgo'o/_/de [#]thob par mi 'gyur na mi sbyin par mi bya/_nad pa [#]'dug pa'i khang bu de dge slong yon tan dang ldan pa'i rkyen yin gyi nad pas mi mthol ba zhig yin kyang na ba brtsan [#]pas mi spo
[\[229b.5\]]bar gzhag go_/de dang g.yog tu las byed du mi gzhug_/dge 'dun gyi las kyang dge slong nad pa dang nad g.yog [#]su byed pa mi bsko bar gzhag go_/mdze can dge 'dun gyi mal stan la mi spyad/_dge slong mdze byung ba dge 'dun gyi mal stan dang khang bu la sogs pa la spyod du
[\[229b.6\]]mi gzhug ste kho nyid la gnyer du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/mtha' 'khob kyi gtsug lag khang sbyin/_dge slong mdze can gzhag pa'i gnas ni gtsug lag khang gi mtha' dben pa gar ba gcig [#]tu dge slong gzhan dang mi 'dre bar gzhag go_/gnas pa dang bcas pa dang gzhan [#]dge
[\[229b.7\]]'dun gyi khyams dang bkad sa dang /_sgo gang dang phyi khyams dang 'chag sa [#]dang grib shing gi bar du ma yin/_dge slong mdze can de dge slong gzhan gnas shing spyod pa'i khang bu dang /_spyod pa'i khyams la sogs pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste gnas shing spyod du mi
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]gzhug go_/bshang gci'i gnas su mi gzhug_/mdze can de dge 'dun gyi bshang gci'i sar yang mi 'jug_/'di la snying rjer g.yog sbyin/_dge slong mdze can de la snying rje ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis [#]yon dang zas kyi skal ba dang gos dang khyim pa las g.yog
[\[230a.2\]]gcig [#]kyang sbyin/_dgon pa pa rnams kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos gzhag pa'i phyir rtag tu gnas bsko/_/dge slong dgon pa la [#]'jigs pa'i rkyen yod de gtsug lag khang du rten bca' ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa gzhag pa'i sa kun gyi spyir khang bu mig gcig
[\[230a.3\]]bsngo ste gzhag go_/dbyar tshul du 'jug khar 'ba' [#]zhig 'ong bar gyur na dngos po dang mal stan gzhag_/tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe [#]gud nas dge slong gzhan gnas der tshul du 'jug tu 'ong ba'i phyir khang bu yod na rkyen dang bcas par sta gon byas la gzhag_/tshul gcig pu'ang
[\[230a.4\]]ma yin te/_khang bu yod na dge slong gzhan 'ong ba'i phyir rtag par gzhag go_/tshul du zhugs pa bas mang du lhags na slar bgo_/tshul du zhugs te khang bu dang mal stan bgos zin pa las phyis dge slong mang [#]zhig lhags na tshul du zhugs pa ni mi gcig gi [#]mal stan dang khang bu
[\[230a.5\]]ni slar bsdus la bgo[# ]/tshul 'og mar [#]zhugs na ma yin no/_/tshul phyi mar zhugs nas mal stan dang [#]khang bu bgos zin pa las phyis dge slong dag gcig [#]gud nas lhags na du lhags kyang rung ste slar mi bgo'o[#]/_/chog na gnyis la sogs pa'o/_/mal stan dang khang bu mang la dge slong nyung
[\[230a.6\]]na khang bu dang mal stan phrugs du yang rung ste ci thob thob tu mang du sbyin no/_/gcig gi phyir mal stan mi blang /_dge 'dun 'ang [#]rung ste gnas der zhag gcig las mi thogs pa zhig na zhag gcig gi phyir mal stan [#]khang bu mi mnod do/_/la la na [#]nod pa yod kyang dge 'dun gyis ma byin
[\[230a.7\]]yang nyes med/_rnyed pa 'dod par gtsug lag khang ma yin no/_/yon bdag gis khang pa sbyar ba la khang bu la la ni rkyen dang yo byad mang bar sbyar/_la la nyung ngu sbyar te rkyen mang nyung dang bzang ngan [#]yod pa zhig 'god pa [#]na gnas brtan nam gral mtho bas 'dams [#]te khyer na nyes byas so/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]dge 'dun gyis gang 'dod pa ngoms shig ces bsgo ba ni nyes med/_thams cad spyad mi nyung la khang bu mang ste skal ba mang du thob na lhag par mi gzhag gi thabs 'og nas 'byung ba ltar spyad do/_/la la la snga dro'i klog pa dang kha ton gyi gnas dang 'chag pa las 'ga' bya/_mi gcig
[\[230b.2\]]la khang bu [#]thob na la lar yi ge klog cing kha thon bya/_la lar 'chag pa ste khang bu dang mig re las sna re bya'o/_/la lar gung gi dang mtshan mo'o/_/khang bu mang du thob na kha cig gi nang du nyi ma gung gi tshe las spyad/_la lar mtshan mo'i spyod pa bya/_gzhan lhung bzed dang chos gos
[\[230b.3\]]gzhag pa'i gnas mtshan mo gzhan yang 'di ltar de la rigs so/_/khang bu mang du thob na kha cig gi nang du lhung bzed chos gos gzhag_/kha cig gi nang du nyal mal bya ba la sogs pa mig re nas sna re spyad do/_/de ltar las sna re spyad pa ni yon tan rnam [#]gnyis yod de gcig tu na bdag la
[\[230b.4\]]yang yangs shing bde/_/gcig tu na yon bdag gis [#]yon bskyed cing bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/tshul du zhugs pas gnas kyi dngos po gas pa dang gogs pa slar bcos so/_/tshul du zhugs nas khang bu dgos [#]pas mi chog gi khang bu'i zhig ral dang [#]gas shing gogs pa
[\[230b.5\]]la sogs pa bcos shing glan to/_/tshul du ma zhugs pa'i tshe yang 'di bzhin bya'o/_/dbyar mo thang la yang dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong ma dag gi [#]bcos/_dge slong ma rnams kyang tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dbyar mo thang zhig ral ba dang gas shing gogs par gyur na dge slong pha
[\[230b.6\]]gi [#]dang 'dra bar [#]bdag bdag gis [#]gnas la sgo [#]tshe mi bya bar spyis bcos so/_/'thab [#]mo pa 'jug par mi 'grub pa'i phyir dgun dang dpyid du [#]mal stan blang bar bya/_dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar dus gsum mal stan [#]dang khang bu slar bsdus shing khong mnyam par bgo_/de ltar bya ba ni kho na
[\[230b.7\]]mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/yang gcig tu gud nas dge slong 'thab mo [#]zhig 'ong na 'thab [#]mo pa de bdag gcig [#]gi nang du mi gzhag pa'i phyir mal stan dang khang pa lhag par mi gzhag par bgo_/thams cad bgo_/ltag tu sgo khang la sogs pa mi bgo [#]zhes byung ba yang ma bgos na 'thab [#]
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mo ba 'dug cing then du 'ong gis sgo gang dang khyams la sogs pa kun bgo 'thab [#]'og nas 'chad/_'di lta ste gtsug lag khang gi 'khor yangs [#]kyang ngo /_/lhag ma thams cad bgos shing bya ba ni sgo gang dang snam phyis la sogs pa kun so sor bgos te 'thab [#]
[\[231a.2\]]mo pa 'dug pa'i gnas med par bya/_khyams kyang de bzhin no/_/dge 'dun 'du ba'i khyams kyang dge 'dun 'du bas zhes pa yin te mi bgo 'dra mod kyi 'thab [#]mo pa 'ongs par [#]thos na de yang bgo/_/de song phyin chad de ltar mi 'jug_/'thab pa 'ongs pa'i phyir rtag [#]tu smos pa ltar
[\[231a.3\]]bgos pa las 'thab [#]mo pa slar song ste mi 'ong na spyi la 'dug pa'i khang bu khyams la sogs pa rnams thal byung du bgos [#]te bzhag pa ma yin gyi slar bkrol te spyi la gzhag_/rang bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyir dgag par mi bya/_/dge slong yon tan dang ldan pa zhig 'ongs nas 'thab [#]mo pa
[\[231a.4\]]ltar khang bu mi sbyin pa ma yin gyi tshul bzhin du khang bu'i skal ba gzhag go/_/'gyur ba'i phyir na ma yin pa 'god pa'i tshe bdag gi gnas su bya'ang rung grogs pa'i [#]gnas su bya'ang rung ste song phod [#]nas 'dug pa'i phyir da nas skal ba nod cing sgo lcags bcug nas mthul mnan pa
[\[231a.5\]]lta bur mi bya/_'di dus che ge mo zhig nas [#]bdag zhag gcig gam de'i char mchis so/_/khang bu 'god pa'i skal ba gar bab pa nam 'dug gi bar du thal byung mnod kyi dbyar ni bsel ba [#]'dir 'dug go_/dgun [#]ni dro ba 'dir 'dug go_/zhag lnga zhig 'dir 'dug zhag drug cig
[\[231a.6\]]'dir 'dug go zhes zer zhing gnas gcig tu ma bcad par mnod par mi bya'o/_/'dir slob dpon che ge mo zhig gir 'gyur mkhan po yir 'gyur lhan cig tu spyod pa yin 'di [#]nye gnas kyir 'dir gtam zla bo la sogs pa yir zhes gtsug lag khang la mi bgo/_/khang bu 'god
[\[231a.7\]]pa'i tshe slob dpon mkhan po dang slob ma dang nye gnas dang mdza' bo dang grogs po la sogs pa gang yang rung ste 'ga' zhig na 'dug ste phyir 'ong bar gyur te de'i phyir bdag gis khang bu'i skal ba snga nas mnos te mi gzhag go_/de ltar mnos na nyes byas/_mi mnod/_mdo ltag ma ltar
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bdag gi skal ba'i khang bu rog [#]gcig gis mnos te bzhag cing 'dug na mnod du mi dbang ba las mnos te ma brtags pa yin pas bdag kyang 'dir mi 'dug go/_/khar ba'i rub ma pa bya tshang la thabs kyi phyir bsgo/_/dge slong gcig gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas la khar ba bskur
[\[231b.2\]]te bya tshang 'jig tu gzhug bya tshang ci lta bur gzhig pa ni thabs 'og nas 'chad sgo nga med na gzhig_/bya tshang gzhig pa ni sgo nga med na gzhig go_/dge 'dun gyis ma bsgos par bya tshang bshig pa ni nyes byas pa [#]gong nas 'chad pa yin/_phra mo rnams la mi 'phel bar skud pas
[\[231b.3\]]dkri bung ba dang kha brgyad kyi tshang zhig gtsug lag khang na 'dug na mang du mi 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir skud pas tshang dkris te gzhag na cher mi 'phel zhing gud du 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/mal stan la sogs [#]pa sbyin/_mal [#]bgo ba ni dge sbyong yan chad mnyam par bgo/_/yod na du mar
[\[231b.4\]]yang ngo /_/mal stan grangs du ma yod na phrugs du ma ci thob thob tu bgo/_/khri chen po yang bgo/_/'dug pa'i khri chen po rgyab rten can dang khri chung ngu yang bgo'o[#]/_/gding ba yang ngo /_/yon bdag gis re lde dang stan la sogs pa sbyar ba zhig na'ang ci thob pa tsam du bgo/_/dge 'dun
[\[231b.5\]]gyi g.yogs pa'i mal stan mi gtsang ba [#]dang zag pas chud gzon pa'i dge sbyong su la yang mi sbyin/_dge 'dun gyi mal stan gding ba shing bal dang srin bal dang bal la sogs pa'i bar tshangs can dge slong [#]'og rdzing can [#]mi sbyin no/_/stan tha mal pa rkyang pa ni bkrur rung ba'i phyir sbyin no/_/
[\[231b.6\]]dge slong ma la yang ma yin/_mdo ltag ma ltar [#]dang 'dra bar gding ba bar tshangs can dang [#]dge slong ma'i yang dge sbyong za gu la mi sbyin/_de der gnas par gyur na gtsug lag khang gi mtha' 'khob tu sbyin/_dge slong pho mo dang dge slong pho mo [#]las za gu 'og rdzing can zhig yod na
[\[231b.7\]]gtsug lag khang gi mtha' 'khob khang bu ngan pa zhig tu gzhag go_/mal stan na [#]lhag ma ngan pa las so/_/dge slong pho mo dang dge sbyong [#]pho mo 'og rdzing can la mal stan yang ngan pa las sbyin/_khyed su la'ang dge 'dun gyi mal stan la gding ba med par ma spyod cig_/mal stan
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gyi rub ma pas zla ba phyed phyed cing dge slong rnams la gding ba med pa dang [#]tshas ngan par ma bya shig par bsgo shig_/brtags [#]pa'i gding ba can ma yin/_mal stan gyi rub ma pas [#]gding ba med par ma bya shig ces bsgo ba la gding ba'i mtshan ma tsam du 'og
[\[232a.2\]]ska la sogs pa chung dus gding pa'i skyin [#]par bting ste nyal bar mi bya/dri ma can gyi gding ba ma yin no zhes bsgo [#]shig_/gding ba dri ma can gyi dge 'dun gyi mal stan la gding zhing mi nyal/_zla ba phyed phyed cing brtag_/mal stan gyi rub ma pas gding ba med pa [#]ma bya shig
[\[232a.3\]]ces bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan tam ma mnyan par brtag pa'i phyir zla ba phyed phyed cing sgron ma thogs te nyal khar blta/_dus las 'gal bar spyod na phrogs [#]la zhus te gnas pa na gnas pa'o[#]/_/mal stan rdzis gding ba med pa dang dri ma can dang brtag pa tsam byed cig ces bsgo ba las
