[\[232a.4\]]zla ba phyed cing byul ba'i tshe bsgo ba bzhin du ma byas na dge slong ngam dge sbyong de'i slob dpon la de ltar byed du ma gzhug shig mal stan rdzis bsgo/_/de ltar bsgo ba nas [#]slob dpon na re nga'i ngag mi nyan gyi ci bder byos shig ces zer na mal stan phrogs la drubs te gzhag_/
[\[232a.5\]]gzhan na dge 'dun la'o/_/dge slong rgan po gnas brtan du chud pa yan chad gcig gis mal stan bsgo ba bzhin du tshas ma byas na mal stan tshas ngan te zhes bsgo ste/_nyan du ma btub na dge 'dun la zhus te slar dbrog_/sbyin bdag che ge mo zhig don bsgrub [#]pa che ge mo
[\[232a.6\]]zhig yul gyi grong che ge mo zhig tu song [#]dge 'dun rnams tshul du 'jug go zhes zhu/_tshul du 'jug pa'i tshe ming gis smos pa 'di rnams smos te 'jug go_/tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe sbyin bdag gi ming 'di zhes bya ba dang don sgrub cing zhal ta byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba dang yul gtsug
[\[232a.7\]]lag khang ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas su dge 'dun 'di rnams tshul du 'jug go zhes zhag gcig gi sngon logs su smos te khong du chud par byas la tshul du 'jug_/ma byung ba dang /_nyes pa dang ltar ni ma [#]byung na phyis 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med par mi bya'i brtags [#]te mi 'byung ba [#]
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]rtogs na tshul du 'jug pa la bya/_gsol [#]ba ni the tshom dang /_bdag gi tshul khrims las nyes pa zhig byung na the tshom zos pa dang gzhan zhig gis brgal te [#]the tshom sel ba'i mi yod na tshul du 'jug pa la bya/_gzhan yang sdug bsngal dang /_lus kyi sdug bsngal kha zas dang sdig
[\[232b.2\]]sbur [#]dang sems can gyi [#]gnod par byed pa yod dam med brtags te de lta mi bde yang phyis bde bar gyur na [#]tshul du 'jug pa la bya/_yid mi bde ba dang /_sems 'khrugs shing [#]mi bde bar gyur na'ang tshul du mi 'jug ste ltag ma dang 'dra/_bsrung ba dang /_bdag gi lus la gnod cing gtse [#]
[\[232b.3\]]ba zhig byung na pha skyabs dang ra mda' byed pa yod dam med brtags te med na mi 'jug pa la bya/_nad g.yog tu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa las 'gyur bar re ba dang /_tshul du zhugs na bdag gi grogs [#]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa nad g.yog byed du [#]btub pa dang /_nad g.yog
[\[232b.4\]]yod dam med brtags te med na tshul du mi 'jug yod na tshul du 'jug pa la bya/_gnas dang /_bdag tshul du zhugs na gnas khang yod dam med pa dang /_yod kyang ngan [#]te nyon mongs par 'gyur na tshul du mi 'jug_/yul dang /_yul 'khrug cing dgra dang chom po la sogs pa [#]yod
[\[232b.5\]]dam med brtags te yod na mi 'jug_/zas dang /_gnas de na dge 'dun gyi zas sbyin nam sbyin [#]pa dang /_bslang du rnyed pa brtags te mi rnyed na tshul du mi 'jug_/sman dang /_gnas de na sman yod dam med brtags te sman med na [#]mi 'jug_/sbyin pa brtags te tshul du 'jug go_/
[\[232b.6\]]ming gis smos pa 'di rnams sbyin zhing sbyor ba yod dam med brtags te yod na tshul du 'jug med na mi 'jug_/g.yogs par dge slong gi mdun du'o/_/tshul du 'jug pa ni khang pa thog med par tshul du mi 'jug sngags byed pa'i tshe dge sbyong ngam dge slong ma la sngags mi bya/_bdag gcig
[\[232b.7\]]pu yang sngags mi bya/_dge slong gi gan du sngags byas te khang pa thog yod par 'dug_/gtsug lag khang du mar ma yin/_gtsug lag khang bzhi lnga tsam zhig mtshams 'dab chags su sbrel du rung na mtshams kyi [#]mdor re lde bting la de'i steng du tshul gyis [#]sngags byas ste [#]
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]khang pa kun du gnas par byas na tshul du 'jug [#]par ni 'gyur [#]khang pa de du yod pa bzhin du nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/gang na dge slong dang sgor ma bcas pa ma yin tshul du 'jug pa na khang sgo dang bcas pa la dge slong rogs kyang yod na tshul du 'jug go_/'di
[\[233a.2\]]gnyis gang med kyang rung gcig med par tshul du zhugs na nyes byas so/_/sbyin bdag dang don sgrub pa dang yul grong dang g.yog yod na brjod/_/ltag tu sbyin bdag dang don sgrub [#]pa dang /_yul dang gtsug lag khang gi ming brjod/_ma bskos [#]par mtshams kyi phyi rol du skya
[\[233a.3\]]rengs shar bar mi bya/_tshul du zhugs nas zla ba gsum gyi tshe gnas gzhan gar yang mi 'gro/_/'gro ba zhig tu gyur na'ang sngags kyis ma [#]btab bar song ste skya rengs byung na tshul zhig par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyis btab na zhag bdun tshun chad 'gror rung ngo /_/chos kyi don zhag
[\[233a.4\]]bdun du [#]bsngo/_/zhag bdun du 'gror [#]gnang ba yang chos kyi don 'og nas 'byung ba rnams lta bu zhig gi phyir 'gror ba ni zhag bdun pa'i sngags rung ngo /_/chos kyi don ma yin pa kha zas dang rang nyams kyi phyir 'gro ba ni [#]sngags btab kyang tshul zhig go/_/'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba
[\[233a.5\]]dbul ba dang /_yon bdag dad pa zhig gis zhing dang nor rdzas dang grong khyim zhig dbul [#]te spyan 'dren na zhag bdun pa'i sngags kyis btab na tshul gyi tshe 'gror dbang /_gtsug lag khang slong ba dang /_gtsug lag khang gsar zhig bslangs te zhal bsro ba'i tshe spyan 'dren na tshul gyi
[\[233a.6\]]tshe sngags kyis btab ste 'gror dbang ngo /_/mal stan sbyin pa dang /_yon bdag dad pa zhig gis mal stan dang nor rdzas shig sbyin pa'i phyir spyan 'dren na tshul gyi tshe sngags btab na 'gror rung ngo [#]/_/rtag pa'i bshams [#]pa dang /_dge 'dun nam gtsug lag khang du rtag par zan sbyor
[\[233a.7\]]ba'i phyir spyan 'dren cing 'bod na'ang 'gror rung ngo [#]/_/mchod rten slong ba dang /_tse [#]ti dang sku gzugs la sogs pa zhig byas te zhal bsro zhing spyan dbye ba'i [#]phyir spyan drong [#]na 'gror rung /_srog shing tse [#]ti'i srog shing gzugs par 'dod pa dang /_rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang /_chos
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]kyi rgyal mtshan nam [(]bdan [,]ba dan [)]shing zhig btsugs pa'i phyir mchod rten la 'dod pa dang /_mchod pa bya ba dang /_dkon mchog la yon dbul zhing mchod pa'i phyir 'dod pa ni tshul gyi tshe 'gror [#]rung ste mchod pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba rnams yin no/_/yung ba [#]dang gur gum dang tsan dan gyis [#]chag
[\[233b.2\]]chag 'debs pa dang /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bus mchod pa'i las byed pa las bos pa dang /_klag [#]pa dang /_yi ge kha don dang klog pa zur mi phyin cing mi shes pa'i phyir 'bod pa dang bdag mi shes te klog slob tu 'gro ba dang /_the tshom bsal [#]ba dang /_khrims lci yang dang zhig
[\[233b.3\]]ma zhig pa la sogs pa la the tshom khyer ba'i 'bod pa'ang rung bdag the tshom khyer te mkhan po mkhas pa'i gan [#]du 'drir 'gro ba dang /_/lta bar zhugs pa spong ba dang /_dge slong gcig gis [#]gcig sdig pa la lta bar gyur te de'i phyir sdig pa la lta ba de dang dbral bar bya ba'i bos kyang rung
[\[233b.4\]]bdag rang [#]'gro yang rung ste song ba dang /_rogs gsol zhing 'chags [#]pa dang /_dge slong gcig na re nga'i slob ma nyes par spyod cing log par lta ba [#]ste nga'i ngag ni mi nyan na khyod kyis bsgo zhing mi gdams su mi rung gis shol [#]ces bos te 'gro ba dang /_chad pa la sogs pa bzhi sbyin pa dang /_chad
[\[233b.5\]]pa dang rtsa ba'i chad pa dang mgu ba dang rtsa ba'i mgu ba bzhi las gang yang rung ba byed pa zhig dge 'dun grangs ma tshang ba'i phyir 'bod pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma byung ba zhig [#]dbyung ba'i las byed de dge 'dun nyi shur ma tshang ba'i phyir 'bod pa dang /_nad pa'i yid brtan [#]pa
[\[233b.6\]]dge slong la'o/_/dge slong nad pa zhig sems 'khrugs shing mi dga' ste tshig pa la mdza' ba'i phyir phrad na dga' zhing yi rang bar 'gyur la ngag nyan pa'i phyir bkug ste 'gro ba dang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi phyir sngags kyis btab ste song na tshul zhig par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[233b.7\]]dge slong ma lci ba'i chos kyis mgu bar byed pa sbyin pa yang ngo /_/dge slong ma lci ba'i chos shig shig [#]par 'gyur te mgu bar byed pa'i dge 'dun grangs mi chog pa'i phyir 'bod na tshul gyi tshe sngags btab ste dge slong pha dang dge slong ma gang song yang nyes med do/_/dge slong ma la
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa skyed [#]pa'i sdom pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slob ma tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas sdom pa nod pa'i phyir tshul gyi tshe dge slob ma sngags btab ste song yang nyes med do/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang ngo /_/dge sbyong las khrims rdzogs par byed de dge
[\[234a.2\]]'dun grangs ma tshang ba'i phyir 'bod [#]pa'ang sngags kyis btab ste song na nyes med do/_/der dge sbyong yang ngo /_/khyim pa zhig dge sbyong du rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir 'bod na tshul gyi tshe sngags btab ste song yang nyes med do/_/dge sbyong ma slob pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa dang /_dge sbyong ma zhig
[\[234a.3\]]dge slong ma'i khrims nod pa'i phyir dge slong ma las 'bod na tshul gyi sngags kyis [#]btab ste song yang nyes med do/_/mgo [#]dkri ba dang /_mi gzhon nu zhig thod bcing ba'i dus la bab ste mi mang po zhig bsdus te bkra shis byed pa'i phyir tshul gyi tshe 'bod na'ang sngags kyis btab ste
[\[234a.4\]]song yang nyes med/_rdul bkru ba dang /_bud med bu byung pa'i 'og tu khrus [#]byas te bkra shis pa'i phyir 'bod pa dang /_phung po 'jog pa dang /_bus [#]skra 'dreg 'dreg pa las phud bu [#]'jog pa'i tshe bkra shis pa'i phyir 'bod pa dang /_ral bu 'bog pa dang /_byis pa'i skra ral bur
[\[234a.5\]]'dug 'dug pa las 'dreg pa'i tshe bkra shis kyi phyir 'bod pa dang /_/rna cha'i skyed [#]pa'i khyim pa dang khyim ma la'o/_/rna cha gcig gsar du thogs te bkra shis pa'i phyir 'bod de song ba dang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste khyim bdag po'am [#]mo zhig dge slong pho mo gang yang
[\[234a.6\]]rung tshul gyi tshe sngags kyis btab ste song na tshul mi 'jig la nyes med do/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma ma gtogs par [#]bsnyen par ma [#]rdzogs pa la [#]snga ma yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma byung ste chad pa dang rtsa ba'i chad pa dang /_mgu ba dang rtsa ba'i mgu ba 'di bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi
[\[234a.7\]]lhag ma 'byin pa dang snga ma ma gtogs par lhag nas chos kyi don gyi phyir 'gror rung ngo zhes bya ba man chad tshul gyi tshe sngags kyis btab ste song yang [#]nyes med do zhes 'byung ba thams cad gang yang rung ste khyim pa zhig gis spyan 'dren zhing 'bod na'ang tshul gyi tshe sngags kyis [#]btab ste song
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]na nyes med de tshul mi zhig go/_/khyim pa la bshad par bzod pa'o/_/dge slong la khyim pas nyes pa'i dmigs par skur pa btab na/_dge 'dun gyis lhung bzed kha phub [#]pa las phyis khyim pas bzod par gsol zhing spyan 'dren na'ang tshul gyi tshe sngags btab ste song yang nyes med do/_/
[\[234b.2\]]zas dang sman dang g.yog de dag med la [#]med pas 'tsho mi nus na rgal tshul du zhugs pa las kha zas dang sman dang g.yog la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad med de [#]gud du 'gro dgos pa'i rkyen cig byung na 'tsho ba ga la yod par song yang tshul ni zhig par 'gyur nyes byas ni med do/_/dge sbyong dang
[\[234b.3\]]'tsho ba dang tshangs pa'i bar chad du 'gyur na yang ngo /_/dge slong grogs thams cad tshul khrims la g.yel te srin bu mi rtog cing chu mi 'tshag pa dang spags pa'i kha zas la sogs pa za ba dang btung ba'i sdig pa spyod de bdag gcig pus ni dge 'dun gyi las kun mi nus kyi bdag gi don
[\[234b.4\]]dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dgra bcom pa'i rim pa bzhi la bar du gcod cing sdig par 'gyur ba dang bdag 'tsho ba'i srog la babs [#]pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ba dang rkyen 'di rnams lta bu zhig byung na tshul gyi tshe gud du song na tshul ni zhig nyes byas ni med do/_/mi mthun par
[\[234b.5\]]sems bskyed pa dang /_yul gyi rnams kyis bdag gi [#]sems mi bde zhing sdig pa spong bar [#]'gyur ba zhig na yul gzhan rnams las sems bde zhing dge bar [#]sems bde bar 'gyur ba zhig yod de tshul gyi tshe sang yang tshul ni zhig [#]nyes byas ni med do/_/sdig pa ngag gis brjod cing dge 'dun
[\[234b.6\]]gyi dbyen du 'jug na yang ngo /_/yul gyi rnams las sems 'gyur ba bzhin du kha nas [#]sdig pa smra zhing sdig pa'i grogs byed par 'gyur na yul bde ba gzhan du 'phos kyang nyes med do/_/de dag zhi bar gyur na mi 'gro bar mi bya/_dge slong zhig dbyen la zhugs te bdag gis gros btab
[\[234b.7\]]na dbyen la mi 'jug par nus pa dang dbyen la zhugs zin pa las slar zlog nus pa tsam gyi tshod ni tshul dral te song na zhig nyes byas ni med do/_/ma song na nyes byas so/_/song na mi rgal bar mi bya/_mdo gong ma ltar 'gro ba la zhag bdun gyis slar 'khor ba zhig ste zhag bdun pa'i sngags
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]btab pa las zhag bdun gyi bar du slar ma bzlog shig dbyen ma btang na zhag bdun las 'das par 'dug kyang tshul ni zhig nyes byas ni med/_dbyar gyi gnas su gnas par dam bcas pa mi bca' bar mi bya/_yon bdag gcig gis tshul gyi tshe 'tsho ba sbyar te
[\[235a.2\]]'dug par 'thams pa'ang rung chos sde snod gsum bshad pa'i phyir gsol te 'tsho ba sbyar nas tshul gyi tshe bzhag pa'ang rung 'dug par khas blangs pa las gud du song na nyes byas so/_/gso sbyong gcig pa'i [#]gnas su 'di ldang ba med do/_/dge 'dun tshul tha dad du mtshams so sor
[\[235a.3\]]zhugs la gso sbyong gcig tu 'dus shing byed na gtsug lag khang de gnyis sngags kyis [#]ma thebs par zhag tu gnas kyang tshul zhig par mi 'gyur te nyes med do/_/yod na [#]ni rnyed pa gcig pa'o/_/gtsug lag khang so sor tha dad du zhugs la [#]gso sbyong ni gcig tu mi byed kyi [#]kha zas lhag par
[\[235a.4\]]spyir bsres shing za ba ni gtsug lag khang de gnyis lhag [#]ma ltar gnas su mi rung ste sngags ma thebs na tshul zhig go_/dbyar gyi dngos po'o/_/dbyar tshul du 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad pa'o//_//sde lnga char yang tshul du 'jug par byed pa'o/_/dge slong pho mo dang dge sbyong pho mo dang dge
[\[235a.5\]]slob ma'ang tshul du 'jug dgos so/_/dge sbyong 'ba' zhig ma yin no/_/dge slong dang mkhan po la sogs pa med na dge sbyong 'ba' zhig nyi tshe tshul du 'jug tu mi rung ngo /_/tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs par mi 'gyur na nyes byas grangs med do/_/lor ma lon pa yang ngo /_/mkhan
[\[235a.6\]]po dang gnas brtan med par dge slong lo gcig tu ma lon pa nyi tshe tshul du 'jug par mi bya'o/_/de dag la tshul du zhugs pa mi 'chags pa ma yin no/_/mdo gong ma gnyis ltar bshad pa dge sbyong dang lo ma lon pa tshul du zhugs kyang tshul du ni mi rung ngo /_/mal stan mi blang mi bya/_dge
[\[235a.7\]]slong dang lo ma lon pa tshul du zhugs pas gnas brtan med pa'i phyir mal stan mi bgo ba ma yin te bgos kyang nyes [#]med do/_/sdud pa med kyang ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi mal stan gyi [#]rdzi'am sdud pa dang 'god pa'i mi med par mal stan yod na bdag cig gis bgos kyang nyes med do/_/
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]ma bgos par bsdu ba ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]mal stan rdzir ma bskos par mal stan thug [#]thub tu phyung ste brnyen [#]por mi btang /_ma byung ba la sogs par sde snod 'chang ba dang 'thab mo byed pa yod dam med pa yang der ma chud pa ma yin no/_/ltag tu nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dang the
[\[235b.2\]]tshom skye bar 'gyur pa dang 'thab cing 'khrug pa yod na tshul du mi 'jug go zhes 'byung ba la sde snod gsum shes pa'i mkhan po yod na mya ngan dang the tshom sel cing 'khrug pa zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir tshul du zhugs kyang nyes med do/_/sde snod gsum shes pa med na mya ngan dang the tshom skye zhing
[\[235b.3\]]'khrul bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'phral du bde ba'ang tshul du mi 'jug go/_/tshul du ma zhugs kyang gnas ma btang na gnas pa'o/_/tshul du 'jug pa'i sngags kyis ma btab cing tshul du ma zhugs kyang tshul zla ba gsum gnas gcig na 'dug cing gud du ma song ste zhag ma lon na
[\[235b.4\]]tshul du zhugs pa dang 'dra ste yon tan bcu yang 'thob par 'gyur te 'og nas 'chad/_nam mkha' la tshul du zhugs pa ni mi skye'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can zhig gis nam mkha' la tshul du zhugs te/_zla ba gsum du gnas pa ni tshul du zhugs [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/grur ma yin te ma
[\[235b.5\]]gtogs pa ni sa la brten pa'am bcings sam sa la rten [#]pa brten par bar chad 'byung bar mi shes na'o/_/gru'i nang du [#]tshul du zhugs pa'ang tshul du zhugs par [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/gru sa la brten cing chus 'phags par mi 'gyur ba dang nyag thag shing la btags te mi 'phags pa dang
[\[235b.6\]]nyin par nyag thag bkrol nas yan man du drangs te nang par skya rengs ma byung bar nyag thag slar brtags [#]pa ni tshul du zhugs kyang tshul zhig par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig pa ni de'i [#]lta ba la gnas te chos ma yin pa'i skyabs su song nas skya rengs shar na'o/_/dge slong sems mur 'dug
[\[235b.7\]]gam log par ltas par 'gyur te lus ni dge slong gi tshul du 'dug la [#]sems log pa la dad pa'i phyir log pa la lta ba gzhan mtshams kyi nang du 'jug [#]kyang de dang lhan cig tu de'i gnas su zhag lon te skya rengs byung na tshul zhig par 'gyur/_the tshom gyis ni ma yin no/_/tshul du zhugs
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]la tshul du zhugs sam ma zhugs the tshom za bar gyur na yang tshul zhig bar mi 'gyur te tshul du zhugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtha' gzhan drug tu bsngos pa [#]ni mi ldang ngo /_/tshul gyi zhag bdun gyi sngags kyis btab ste [#]'gror rung ba yin na zhag drug na tshul nas 'byung
[\[236a.2\]]ba'i mdun du zhag bdun pa'i sngags kyis btab ste chos kyi don dang srog la bab pa'i phyir gud du song yang zhag gcig gi skya rengs byung ba na tshul zhig par 'gyur ro/_/zhig pa ni tshul du zhugs nas dgos pa med par de las ma log gam [#]gnas na'o/_/ltag tu chos kyi don la sogs pa'i
[\[236a.3\]]phyir 'gro na zhag bdun gyi [#]sngags kyis btab ste 'gror dbang ngo zhes ming gis smos te bshad pa 'di rnams la chos kyi don la sogs pa pha rol gyi las zin par 'gyur [#]na las zin par thos bzhin du gzhi nas song yang rung lam du thos te slar ma log kyang zhag lon te skya rengs byung na tshul
[\[236a.4\]]zhig pa'o/_/chos kyi don gyi phyir zhag bdun pa'i sngags kyis btab ste song ba las sngar zin na zhag bdun ma lon gyi bar du mi 'gro'o zhes zer zhing 'dug pa ni tshul zhig pa'o/_/de'i mtha' ni zhag bdun tshun chad do/_/chos kyi don gyi phyir 'gror dbang ngo zhes gong du ming gis smos
[\[236a.5\]]pa rnams kyang zhag bdun pa'i sngags kyis btab na rung gi de las zhag mang ba'am [#]sngags kyis btab kyang mi phan te tshul zhig pa'o/_/gnang ba ma thob pa de ni mtha'o/_/gud du 'gro bar dge 'dun las gnang ba thob pa ni chos kyi don gyi phyir na zhag bzhi [#]bcur 'gror gnang ste
[\[236a.6\]]de ni ma gtogs [#]par zhag bdun 'das te brgyad kyi skya rengs byung na tshul zhig par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang nub bzhi bcu'o/_/ngo mtshar gyi rkyen cig byung na dge 'dun gyis zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du 'gror dbang bar gnang ba sbyin no/_/de ltar byin nas [#]phyi ma gnas pa'i tshe zhag
[\[236a.7\]]mang po [#]yang tshul zhig par mi 'gyur ro/_/de sbyin rkyen byung te zhag bzhi bcur 'gror gnang ba rigs na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba sbyin no/_/ma byin na nyes byas so/_/de las lhag par phyi logs su mi gnas sde lnga char yang 'di bzhin no/_/zhag bzhi bcur dge 'dun gyis gnang ste
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]song las zhag bzhi bcu 'das kyang rung don ni sngar grub kyi zhag bzhi bcu ma lon gyi bar du mi 'gro zhes 'khyam [#]zhing 'dug pa ni zhig par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pho mo dge sbyong pho mo dge slob ma lnga char kyang zhag bzhi bcur 'gro ba cho ga mtshungs so/_/'di mtshams kyi nang du
[\[236b.2\]]skye'o/_/zhag bzhi bcu'i sngags mnod pa yang tshul du zhugs pa'i gnas nyid nas nod kyi[#]/_gnas gzhan nas nod [#]na sngags byas par mi chud do/_/dge slong gi mdun du'o/_/zhag bzhi bcu'i sngags mnod pa ni bdag gcig pu ma yin gyi dge slong gcig las mnod do/_/dge sbyong [#]
[\[236b.3\]]dge slong las mnod do/_/ma dogs shig ma chud pa ma yin pa ni/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyang zhag bdun gyi sngags kyis btab ste song yang zhig par mi 'gyur te zhig par 'gyur ba [#]ma dogs shig_/mur 'dug tu lta ba dbye ba'i phyir dang /_mur 'dug gcig la sangs
[\[236b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos bshad pa [#]na mur 'dug gi chos 'dor zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la phyogs par 'gyur ba tsam gyi tshod na tshul gyi tshe [#]sngags btab ste song yang nyes med/_gnyen la bya ba dang /_gnyen la chos bshad pa'i phyir dang na ba'i phyir dang sems dga' ba'i phyir ngo phrad [#]du
[\[236b.5\]]'gro ba [#]dang /_chud pa dang /_bdag kha thon dang klog pa la sogs pa don ma chud cing ma go ba go bar bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang /_lhag par chung ba[#]/_dgra bcom pa'i rim pa lta bu gdon mi za ba dang thob par 'gyur ba'i gdeng yod pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon la nyan du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[236b.6\]]bdag 'dod pa bsal ba'i don du 'gro ba'i phyir de byas na'o/_/ltung ba sde lnga las the tshom du gyur pa zhig na the tshom bsal ba'i phyir mkhan po mkhas pa'i gan du 'gro ba dang 'di rnams kyi phyir 'gro ba yang zhag bdun gyi sngags kyis btab ste song na nyes med do/_/tshul du zhugs te
[\[236b.7\]]'dug pa spang ba mi bya tshul du zhugs pa zla ba gsum gyi tshe dge slong sde lnga las sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba bskrad pa'i rigs pa yang mi bskrad par chad pas mi bcod [#]par brtags te gzhag go_/de bzhin du chad pa phre'u dang spro [#]ba yang mi
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]blang [#]ngo /_/phas pham pa ni bskrad do/_/bzhi la sogs par chud do[#]/_/tshul gyi tshe zan sbyar gyis 'dug shig ces khas blangs te song na nyes byas par 'gyur ba bzhin du lhung bzed sbyin no zhes bya ba [#]las ma byin pa dang chos gos sbyin no zhes byas pa [#]las song ba dang chos
[\[237a.2\]]bshad do zhes khas blang pa las ma song yang nyes byas so/_/dbyar gyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//kha rog pa'i yi dam mi bca'/_mur 'dug gi dka' thub kha rog par 'dug na mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes zer ba lta bu kha rog par 'dug pa'i yi dam mi bca'/_/'di la
[\[237a.3\]]zhugs na grol ba gtsang ma bar na sbom po'i nyes byas pa'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar mi smra ba yang mur 'dug gi dka' thub kyi mi smra bar byas pa lta bu ni dbyen gyi sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gyi na mi smra bar 'dug par bsams [#]pa ni nyes byas so/_/mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pas tshul du
[\[237a.4\]]zhugs [#]pa las dge 'dun gyis dbyung /_tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun kun la khyed kyis bdag la ltung ba sde lnga las gang yang rung nyes par mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa zhig yod na rgol cig ces skabs phye ba'i sngags 'di byas te dbyung ngo /_/dbyar gyi mtha' nyin
[\[237a.5\]]mo'o/_/tshul nas gnas pa ni [#]tshul snga ma dbyar zla 'bring po nya la zhugs pa [#]ni ston zla 'bring po tshes [#]bco lnga 'byung ngo /_/tshul phyi ma dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bcu drug la zhugs pa ni ston zla tha chungs tshes bco lnga la [#]'byung ngo /_/yul zhu ste phyags pa tshun chad zhag 'di tsam na dge 'dun
[\[237a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur gyis khyed zhugs shig_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i zhag bcu gcig tsam gyi sngon logs su nye 'khor gyi yul mi dang lha 'phangs la sogs pa la 'di tsam na dge 'dun tshul nas 'byung gi [#]gtsug lag khang du 'du [#]shig ces bya/_gtsug lag khang brgyan/_tshul nas 'byung ba'i
[\[237a.7\]]tshe gtsug lag khang brgyan/_khang bu rtseg ma glan/_yul bskor ba'i gzugs [#]kyi khang bu sbyar cing bcos/_dri gtsang khang bri/_dri gtsang khang la sogs pa'i ri mo bri mchod rten dag phyi zhing bsang /_sku gzugs dang mchod rten la sogs pa lce te bkru bshal dang phyag bdar
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bya/_seng ge'i stan brgyan/_kha don klog pa'i seng ge'i stan brgyan/[# ]de ring nub mo thams cad du chos bstan [#]par 'gyur gyis der khyer [#]ba byin cig ces nas yul zhu/_mdo ltag ma rnams ni zhag lnga drug gam bdun [#]nas bya ba'i cho ga 'di rnams ni tshul nas 'byung ba'i snga de nyid nas
[\[237b.2\]]sbyar zhing bya'o/_/do mod [#]mtshan rangs kha thon klog cing chos mnyan gyi [#]dge 'dun kun 'dus shig ces bgos te res kyis kha thon byed du gzhug go_/yul mi la sogs pa bsdus te chos nyan du gzhug_/mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa la bskos te tshes bcu bzhi'i nub
[\[237b.3\]]mo thams cad du [#]chos bstan pa sbyin du gzhug_/kha thon klog tu gzhug pa ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma lta [#]bu 'dzin pa la sogs pa las las res [#]kyis nub mo thog thag tu kha thon tu gzhug go/_/gzhan du yang de dag las kyi tshun chad du chos gdon mi za ba'i gtam gyis nub mo
[\[237b.4\]]bzla'o/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo ni dge skos [#]'ba' zhig mi nyal gyi [#]dge slong gzhan res kha don klog cing chos bsnyad pa tsam gyis chog gi gzhan ni gnyis [#]kyis mi thub na nyal kyang nyes med/_tshes bcu [#]lnga'i nub mo ni thams cad nyal du mi gnang ste chos bsnyad cing [#]
[\[237b.5\]]'chad pa'i rjes la tshul nas 'byung ngo /_/skya rengs byung bas mchod pa tshun chad 'byung ba las so/_/tshes bco lnga'i nub mo bcu drug gi skya rengs ma byung tshun chad du tshul nas 'byung bar bya'o/_/skya rengs byung na las su mi rung ngo /_/'byin pa'i dge slong bsko/_tshul nas 'byin pa'i [#]
[\[237b.6\]]dge slong sngags 'debs pa su dad pa las bsgo[#]/_/gcig gis mi nus na du mas kyang ngo /_/sngags 'debs pa'i dge slong gcig gis mi chog na du chog par bsko/_/phreng las cha char bgos pa yang rigs so/_/sngags 'debs pa'i dge slong mang du
[\[237b.7\]]bskos nas [#]phreng ba pos [#]re re tshan tshan du bskos pa la sngags gdab po zhes skal [#]skal du bsgo/_/de [#]'jag ma'ang brim mo/_/sngags 'debs pa'i dge slong gis sngar dge 'dun la rtswa [#]'jag ma brim mo/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyis dge 'dun la zhu/_
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe rtswa 'jag ma rims zin nas dge slong su'ang rung las pa gcig gis dge 'dun tshul nas 'byung bar bya'o zhes zhu ba'i sngags bya/_dge slong so sor tshul nas 'byung ba'i bar du mdun du 'dug go/_/mdo ltag ma ltar sngags byas pa'i
[\[238a.2\]]'og tu dge slong sngags 'debs pa so so mdun mdun du 'dug la rtswa'i tor to las bzung ste sngags bya'o/_/so sor sngags shes na rang rang gis bya ste sngags pa dbang du gzhag go_/de las 'byung bas smra ba lan gsum du'o/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i sngags bya ba ni lan gsum
[\[238a.3\]]du bzlas so/_/gnyis ni de tsam du/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gang yang rung ste rkyen cig byung na sngags lan gnyis btab pas kyang tshul nas 'byung [#]par 'gyur to/_/nad pa nad glo bur cig byung ba dang /_myos pa dang sems stor [#]te mi dran par gyur pa dang /_mal stan gyur pa/_
[\[238a.4\]]mal stan zhig bla gab med pa la lus te char gyis ma rung bar gyur pa'am[#]/_dus 'da' ba'am/_skya rengs byung du nye ste sngags rdzogs par byar mi khom pa dang /_glo bur du byung bar gyur na'o/_/chu dang me la sogs pa 'phral du glo bur du rkyen cig byung ba dang 'di rnams gang byung
[\[238a.5\]]yang rung ste sngags lan gnyis btab kyang rung /_de tsam gyis gcig go_/sngags 'debs pa'i tshe rkyen cig byung ste lan gnyis su zlos su yang ma khom na lan gcig gis kyang tshul nas byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phreng zad nas de dag phan tshun du'o/_/dge 'dun kun la sngags kyis
[\[238a.6\]]btab zin nas mjug tu sngags 'debs pa na nang gcig gi mdun du gcig 'dug ste sngags bya'o/_/med na gzhan las [#]yang rung /_sngags 'debs pa gcig tu zad de 'debs pa'i grogs med na dge slong su yang rung gcig gi drung du 'dug ste 'byung ba'i sngags bya'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[238a.7\]]thams cad byung ngo zhes de skad du dge 'dun la bya'o/_/kun sngags btab zin nas las byed pa'i dge slong gcig gis dge 'dun thams cad tshul nas byung bar gyur to zhes dge 'dun gyi nang du smra'o[#]/_/dge bar byung ngo /_/shin tu byung ngo zhes thams cad kyis brjod/_/mdo ltag ma ltar
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]dge slong gcig gis brjod ma thag tu dge 'dun thams cad kyis dge bar byung ngo zhes brjod do/_/gang ci yang khab yan chad bdag gi dngos po 'byung bar gang gis brtsams te de bzung nas [#]dge 'dun las de thob bo/_/btsun pa bdag gis 'di lta bu gzugs kyi dngos pos dbyar
[\[238b.2\]]gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byung ngo zhes so/_/dge 'dun tshul nas byung zin nas dge 'dun la yon 'bul ba'i 'os ci yod kyang rung ste dge 'dun la dngos po 'di 'bul na 'os sam rigs sam zhes smras te kha thon du byed byed pa des 'bul [#]lo/_/dge slong gzhan gyis kyang
[\[238b.3\]]yon gyi [#]'os yod na thams cad kyis dbul lo/_/yon phul zhing dngos po 'di bzhes pa'i rigs sam 'os sam zhes smras te dge 'dun kun kha rog 'khod na bzhes par gnang ba yin te phul cig_/de nas dge sbyong dbyung ngo /_/dge slong rnams tshul nas byung zin pa'i 'og tu dge
[\[238b.4\]]sbyong rnams la dbyung ba'i sngags bya'o/_/de nas dge slong ma'o/_/dge sbyong tshul nas byung zin nas dge sbyong ma rnams sngags byas te tshul nas dbyung ngo /_/byung ba bzhin du bsngos te song ba tshun chad de dag dbyung ba dang lhan cig byas na'o/_/tshul nas byung ba'i khar slebs su re ste
[\[238b.5\]]zhag bdun pa'i sngags kyis btab ste gud du song song ba las zhag grangs 'khrul te song song ba'i gnas de na dge 'dun tshul nas 'byung zhing 'khod na thal byung tshul nas 'byung ba de ni [#]nang du zhugs te byung yang tshul nas byung bar chud [#]do/_/de ltar tshul nas byung ste slar song song ba las
[\[238b.6\]]bdag nyid kyi dge 'dun tshul nas byung [#]ba yang slebs na de'i nang du na bdag tshul nas 'byung mi dgos so/_/bud med dang gyur pa ni ma yin/_dge slong bud med kyi mdun du tshul nas 'byung ba dang dge slong ma'i mdun du tshul nas 'byung [#]ba'i byung bar mi chud do/_/dge slong ma'ang dge
[\[238b.7\]]slong ma grogs kyi mdun du tshul nas byung bar mi chud kyi dge slong gi mdun du gnyis kas rtsa [#]las bzung ste sngags bya'o/_/gnas par mi nus na gang bskrad [#]pa'i dge slong la bya ste 'dus nas dbyung ba'o/_/dge slong ma dge slong pha'i mdun du tshul nas 'byung ba'i sngags byed byed pa
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]las dge slong de mo mtshan du gyur na tshul nas 'byung bar mi chud de gzhan gcig gi mdun du sngags bya'o/_/dbyar gyi bar [#]bya bar 'gro na phyung ste'o/_/dge slong la rkyen cig byung ste tshul nas 'byung ba'i zhag dus su sdod [#]du mi khom na dge 'dun la
[\[239a.2\]]gsol te tshul nas 'byung ba'i sngags byas te song na byung bar chud do/_/dngos po dang gang zag dang gnyis [#]ka gzhag ste na yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma [#]zhig byung ba dang spang ba ltung ba 'phral la mthol du mi bde ba ni brtags te bzhag pa yin pas skabs dbye ba la ma gtogs te gzhan
[\[239a.3\]]nyes par mthong ba dang dogs pa dang thos pa ci yod pa rgol cig ces bya ste skabs dbye'o/_/'di la khas blang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar gsol ba la dge 'dun gyis kho'i sems bsrung zhing dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de ltar rung ngo zhes bya'o/_/bzhag pa yang tha ma ma yin pa las bskos te'o/_/
[\[239a.4\]]tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe phas pham pa ni ma gtogs te gzhan ltung ba sde lnga las skabs phye [#]ba yin gyis rgol cig ces zer na phas pham pa brtags [#]cing gzhag tu mi gnang ste bskrad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag 'di'i phyir ni 'dus shing tshogs [#]pa yin te de lta mod kyi tshe dang ldan pa'i
[\[239a.5\]]dngos po dang gang zag kyang gzhag par ro/_/ltag nas 'byung ba dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang spang ba'i ltung ba 'phral du mthol du mi bde ste brtags te gzhag pa ma gtogs par gzhan ltung ba sde lnga las rgol cig par skabs 'byed cing 'ong zhing gsol du 'ong ste ltung ba dang lhag
[\[239a.6\]]ma brtag cing dbang 'jug [#]pa lags na dge 'dun gyis mkhyen par bgyir ci [#]gnang zhes zer na dge 'dun gyis kyang deng 'dus pa khyod kyi don dang dbang du bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa ma yin mod kyi khyed nyes pa gzhan la skabs phye zhing dmigs kyis phye ba 'phral du mthol du mi bde ste dpang
[\[239a.7\]]du mkhyen par bya bar gsol/_dge 'dun gyis mkhyen par bya zhing gang zag de tshul nas dbyung [#]ngo /_/de ltar [#]tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir ni gso sbyong chos rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir ni dbyung ba'o zhes bcom ldan 'das gsungs kyis 'on te 'dod na dbyung ngo
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]zhes so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar lhag ma dang ltung ba brtags te dge 'dun gyis mkhyen par byas nas tshul nas dbyung ba ni rnam pa gcig tu na nyes pa yod pa'i mi de nyid ltung ba sde lnga las nyes pa tshangs shing byang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_gang zag de nyid [#]
[\[239b.2\]]don du 'gyur ba dang nyes pa brtags te gzhag [#]na dge 'dun tshul nas 'byung ba'i las su rung ba'i phyir chos rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi don yang yin pas don 'di rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir dge 'dun gyis shes par gyis la brtag pa [#]rtogs te tshul byung cig [#]ces zhal
[\[239b.3\]]nas gsungs so/_/gang zag gzhag pa dang don gyir ma yin no zhes so/_/don gzhag pa dang gang zag kyang ngo /_/gzhag par ram mi [#]gzhag pa'i phyir khas blangs pa las bsnyon na khas blangs pa zhig ma yin no/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe dge slong lhag ma dang ltung ba yod de 'phral
[\[239b.4\]]du mthol du mi bde bar dge 'dun la mkhyen par bya ste brtags te bzhag pa'i 'og tu phyis bsnyon te mthol tshangs dang chad pa byed du mi btub na kho bsnyon te med cing ma mthong mi shes [#]zer ba mi brtsan [#]gyi thog ma dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen par byas pa brtsan [#]gyis dge 'dun thams cad
[\[239b.5\]]kyis mthol du gzhug cing mthol tshangs dang chad pa byed du gzhug go_/ci ltar byed du gzhug pa'i thabs 'og nas 'chad/_'di skad kyi tshul du cung zad kyang med cing [#]smra ba ni 'di'am sngon gyi [#]brdzun no/_/mdo ltar ma ltar dge 'dun gyis lhag ma dang spang pa'i ltung ba yod de dge 'dun
[\[239b.6\]]la brtags te gzhag la/_bsnyon pa 'di [#]dge slong de sngar dge 'dun la brtags te gzhag la phyis bsnyon [#]pa'i brdzun gyis ltung ba gcig dang 'phral du bris [#]pa na bsnyon pa'i ltung ba gcig dang gnyis yod de thog ma rtogs [#]pa'i tshe dge slong su su 'dug 'dug pa kun bsdus te mngon sum
[\[239b.7\]]du rmas la shags kyis thub par byas la chad pas bcad do/_/chad pa byed du ma btub na bskrad do/_/de ste thab mo pa'i dge slong dag 'ong bar tshul du zhugs pa thos nas [#]gso sbyong gnyis sam gsum 'das na dbyung ngo /_/dge 'dun tshul nas 'byung ba'i dge slong pha ma rungs pa
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]dag cig grogs gcig ste tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe ltung ba sde lnga las rgol cig phar [#]skabs 'byed pa'i rigs kyi [#]de'i khar skur pa [#]btab la bskur te dkrug [#]go zhes zer ba gcig thos na [#]'byung ba'i zhag dus las zla ba gcig gcig sngar [#]bsdums te 'byung ngo /_/de
[\[240a.2\]]ltar bsdums kyang thab mo pa de 'ong zhing slebs [#]par 'gyur na zla ba phyed [#]dang gnyis kyis kyang sngar bsdums te 'byung ngo /_/de ltar byas kyang myur du 'ong na [#]tshul zla ba gcig bsrungs bas chog gi [#]zla ba gcig gis bsdums [#]te byung yang tshul du chud de de ltar sngar byung yang bsrung ba ni zla ba gsum thang bzhin du bsrung
[\[240a.3\]]ngo /_/yon tan yang 'thob bo/_/de ltar byas na phyis 'thab mo pa 'ongs su zin kyang skabs mi 'byed pas klan ka mi rnyed do/_/mi grub na dkyil 'khor lnga'am drug bsngo/_/mdo ltag ma ltar bslabs bsdums su [#]zhag dus med de tshul nas 'byung kar 'thab [#]mo ba'i dge slong 'ong bar thos na dge 'dun
[\[240a.4\]]myur du 'dus la/_mtshams chen po khrol la mtshams bu chung lnga'am drug 'phral la [#]bcad do/_/mtshams bu [#]chung ci bya ba na [#]'og nas 'chad/_tshig 'jam po dang bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos dang bsti [#]stang dang khang bu dang lnga [#]khang dang khang bu brtseg [#]ma bsngo/_ltag ma ltar mtshams
[\[240a.5\]]bu chung bcad zin nas 'thab [#]mo pa 'ong ba la bsu zhing tshig 'jam po la [#]gtam bya zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa tshul bzhin du blangs pa gnas khang khyams la sogs pa yang bsngo zhing sbyin no/_/khrus dang snum thob par bya/_'thab [#]mo pa 'ongs pa la khrus bya zhing lus ma nyid pa la
[\[240a.6\]]sogs pa bya/_lus bsku ba'i snum dang kha zas kyang sbyin/_chos snyan [#]pa sbyin pa bdag gi [#]bsu bar bya/_'thab [#]mo ba 'ongs pa de dang chos bsnyad cing gtam la sogs pa bya ste/_dum zhing mgu ba'i tshul du bya/_ma grub na bdag cag gi gso sbyong dkyil 'khor du bya/_mdo ltag ma
[\[240a.7\]]rnams ltar byas te bzhag pa las gud du 'dod du ma btub na mdo gsum gyi ltag nas mtshams bu chung bcad de gzhag par bshad pa'i mtshams bu chung bcad [#]de so sor dge slong lnga lnga'am drug drug tu yod pa dong ste 'thab [#]mo pa las dad pa'ang blangs te gso sbyong bya'o/_/khyed de
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ring dbyung [#]ba ma yin nam zhes zer na tshe dang ldan pa sdod cig khyod ni 'ong ba ste don 'di ni gnas pa'o zhes sgo shig[# ]/mdo ltag ma ltar gso sbyong byed pa 'thab [#]mo pa na re dus kyis tshul nas dbyung [#]ba yin na ci'i [#]phyir gso sbyong byed ces 'dri na khyed cig [#]gsar du 'ongs pa yin te rgyus mi shes kyi[#]/_las
[\[240b.2\]]ji ltar bya ba dge sbyong [#]gzhi la 'khod pa shes te dri mi dgos kyi[#]/_zas dang khang bu la sogs pa ci 'dod pa nged la nos la [#]ci dgos pa la sogs pa long la 'dug shig ces bsgo/_'das na dbyung ngo /_/thabs gong ma rnams ltar byas nas slar 'dong nas slar mi ldog pa tsam gyi tshod na 'dus
[\[240b.3\]]te tshul nas 'byung ngo /_/thab [#]mo pa dong nas tshul [#]mi 'byung ste tshul yang zhig pa yin no/_/'byung [#]ba'i dngos po 'khon [#]pa bshags pa ma byas par mi dbyung ngo /_/tshul nas 'byung ba ni gcig [#]la gcig skabs phye ste rgol du bcug la 'khon [#]bshags te tshul nas 'byung ngo /_/de'i dus ni
[\[240b.4\]]nyi ma bcu'am zla ba phyed na 'byung ba na'o/_/'khon [#]bshags shing bzod pa gsol ba ni zhag bcu tsam gyi mdun nas gcig la gcig bzod par gsol zhing mgu bar bya'o/_/bdun nam [#]brgyad do zhes gzhan dag las so/_/'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re zhag bdun nam [#]brgyad kyi snga logs su
[\[240b.5\]]'khon [#]bshags kyang nyes med/_'dus par ma yin no/_/dge slong bdag dang 'khon [#]yod pa zhig [#]na mi mang po'i khrod du mi bya'i lkog tu kho gcig pu la bzod par gsol lo/_/'dus pa'i spyir yang spyi'i bzod pa gsol/_des kyang ma bzod par ma yin no/_/'khon [#]yod pa la mdo
[\[240b.6\]]ltag ma ltar bzod pa gsol zhing 'og nas [#]dge slong des kyang bzod par bya'o/_/mgu ba ma byas kyi bar du tshogs pa thams cad kyis kyang de'i tshe mi bya'o/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i zhag bcu'i mdun nas gcig la gcig 'khon [#]bshags shing bzod pa ma gsol na tshul nas 'byung bar
[\[240b.7\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa gsol ba ni gzhon rims kyis rgan [#]rims la gsol gzhon nu la yus [#]yod na rgan pos kyang gzhon nu la gsol/_khros pas [#]yang ma bzod par ma yin/_dge slong gzhan gyis bdag la nyes pa la sogs pa byas te phyis mthol tshangs byed cing bzod pa la [#]
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gsol du 'ongs na bzod pa byin cig_/ltag tu mdo 'di 'dra ba cig byung [#]ba ni tshul gyi tshe'o/_/'di ni nam yang rung ste 'dra [#]bar bya ba la bya'o/_/dge slong dang dge slong ma gnas kyi phyi rol du ma yin/_dge slong mas dge slong pha la bzod pa gsol ba ni gar bab bab tu
[\[241a.2\]]lam kha la sogs par bzod pa gsol ba ma yin dbyar mo thang du bkug ste bzod pa gsol ba ma yin gyi/_dge slong pha'i gtsug lag khang du song la bzod par gsol lo[#]/_/rkang pa la yang mi gtugs/_dge slong mas dge slong pha la bzod pa gsol ba ni rkang pa nas bzung la
[\[241a.3\]]bzod pa mi gsol gyi/_'dom gang tsam du 'dug la dgus [#]te bzod pa bgyir ci gnang zhes gsol lo/_/bzod pa [#]bgyi 'tshal te 'gro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gsol te bzod par gnang na gdong dpral [#]ba gtugs te phyag bya/_'di 'chags na bsti stang med par mi 'gro_/mdo
[\[241a.4\]]ltag ma gnyis ltar dge slong ma [#]bzod pa gsol du 'ongs na dge slong gis kyang bzod pa gsol du mi gzhug [#]pa'am bdag byol te 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/mi bsgom gsol te gshegs pa la sngon du shes pas so/_/dge slong grogs la bzod pa gsol du song song ba las/_ma btub na de dang
[\[241a.5\]]su mdza' ba'i gan du song la/_bzod par byos shig ces gros 'debs su bcug la [#]de nas bzod pa gsol/_ma dad na thabs btsal mi bsgrub par mi bya/_mdo ltag ma ltar thabs bya ste/_yang bzod par ma btub na/_sngon kho la gnod pa dang nyes pa byas pa ci yod pa brtags te/_nyes
[\[241a.6\]]pa zhig yod na de yang dmigs nas bshags des [#]bzod par gsol lo/_/ring por ma thogs pa'o[#]/_/nyes pa byas shing 'khon pa zhig yod na lo'am zla bar gzhag pa ma yin gyi/_myur du mthol zhing bzod par gsol lo/_/khros ma thag tu ma yin te bsdad/_myur du bzod pa
[\[241a.7\]]gsol ba yang 'phral du 'khrug [#]pa ma zhi ba la mi gsol gyi zhi nas gsol lo/_/'chags pa'i tshe mi bzod par mi bya/_gcig la gcig 'chags shing bzod pa gsol ba'i tshe/_sems las 'khon [#]ma btang zhing /_khas bzod cing 'jam por bya ba ma yin gyi/_sems kyis kyang
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bzod par byas te gsol lo/_/phran tsheg su chud pa'o/_/dbyung ba'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//drug pa gding /_tshul nas byung ba [#]drub gding ste/_chos gos smad gsum slob pa'i [#]nang du bting la gzhag pa la bya'o/_/ci ltar gsum la de bzhin drubs pa [#]bting na yang yang bza' yang
[\[241b.2\]]nyes med de sde sder za ba dang ma gtogs par grong du 'jug pa dang /_gos slong ba dang lhag ma dang rnyed pa yang spyi'o/_/drubs [#]pa bting ba'i tshe zla ba lnga'i bar du 'chad pa dang 'bral ba dang 'jog pa dang yang yang dang zas bzang po dang sde zan dang gos gnyen ma yin par slong ba [#]dang
[\[241b.3\]]dus ma yin par grong du 'gro ba dang /_'di brgyad ni tshul du zhugs pa'i yon tan yin te bsrung mi dgos so/_/lhag ma dang rnyed pa dang spyi'o zhes 'byung ba ni mdo 'og ma rnam [#]ltar gyur na yon tan ni mi thob kyi tshul du zhugs pa rnams spyi'o/_/nor rdzas dang yon skal las 'thob pa
[\[241b.4\]]la bya ste/_dmigs dmigs nas 'og nas zhib tu 'chad pa yin no/_/'di mi skye ba ni/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams yon tan dang rnyed pa'i skal ba thob pa'ang yod/_mi 'thob pa'ang yod do/_/lon ma lon pa dang /_tshul du [#]ma zhugs kyi zla ba gsum gyi bar du [#]bsrungs pa dang /
[\[241b.5\]]dbyar [#]chad pa dang /_tshul du zhugs pa las tshul dral te song pa las so/_/dbyar phyi ma dang /_tshul phyi mar zhugs pa dang /_gnas gzhan du gnas pa'o/_/gtsug lag khang gzhan na tshul srung srung ba dang 'di rnams ni rnyed pa'i yon skal las mi dbang ba yang yod/_gang thob
[\[241b.6\]]gang mi thob pa ni 'og nas 'chad/_gnas gzhan du 'phos pa la yang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa bar du gcod do zhes zer ba la chad [#]pas bcad pa la sogs pa chad pa rnam bdun gyis bcad pa dang /_slob pa byin pa dang dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma byung ste chad pa yod pa dang
[\[241b.7\]]'di rnams ni tshul du zhugs te gding ba drubs kyang yon tan bcu mi thob pa dang yon tan de gang mi thob pa 'og nas 'chad/_de thob nas ni log go_/snga nas chad pas bcad cing spangs [#]pa ni ma yin gyi gding ba drubs zin nas nyes pa med cing chad pa rnam bdun la sogs
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]pas [#]bcad pa ni de nyi [#]tshe nas yon tan bcu mi thob ste med par gyur to/_/tha ma ma yin pa dge sbyong dang gnas gzhan du gnas pas kyang gnas pa'i skal ba 'thob [#]bo/_/mdo gnyis kyi ltag nas lo ma lon pa dang dbyar chad pa dang dbyar phyi ma dang gnas gzhan
[\[242a.2\]]gnas pa bzhi la/_tha ma gnas gzhan du gnas pa ma gtogs par gsum gyi steng du mdo 'di gcig gi ltag ma'i nang nas slob pa byin pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma 'byung ba'i chad pa yod pa dang gsum gyis kyang bsnan [#]te dge sbyong dang 'di rnams ni tshul
[\[242a.3\]]gyi yon tan ni mi thob kyi rnyed pa'i skal ba thob bo/_/gnas gzhan du gnas pa ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni tshul gyi yon tan dang rnyed pa'i yon skal gnyis ka mi 'thob bo/_/spang ba [#]ma yin no/_/mdo gnyis kyi ltag [#]nas slob pa byin pa dang dge 'dun gyi ltag [#]ma yod pa gnyis ni
[\[242a.4\]]bshad zin te ma gtogs kyi chad pa rnam bdun gyis bcad cing bskrad pa zhes 'byung ba yang tshul gyi yon tan dang rnyed pa'i yon skal gnyis ka mi thob bo[#]/_/der 'gyur ba bzhin du chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su ltung zhing bya'o/_/dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las dge slong kha cig chos
[\[242a.5\]]log pa la bltas shing mi dge ba la phyogs ni [#]tshul gyi yon tan dang rnyed pa'i yon skal gnyis ka las mi dbang ngo /_/de bzhin du dge slong 'ga' zhig gis tshul gyi tshe sems log pa la phyogs shing phyi rol gyi tshul dge slong ltar bsrungs nas log par lta ba'i grogs kyi gan du zhag lon pa
[\[242a.6\]]yang tshul gyi yon tan dang rnyed pa'i yon skal gnyis ka mi dbang ngo /_/rtsa ba'i dus dang /_tshul thog mar dang po zhugs tshun chad nas/_dbyung ba'i mtha' dang /_tshul nas byung ste gding ba drubs [#]pa yan chad kyi bar du/_dbyar gyi phyir ba dang /_dbyar zla ba gsum gyi tshe yon dang
[\[242a.7\]]chos gos rnyed pa las gding ba'i chos gos su byas kyang rung /_gding ba'i nyin par gyi mthar gtogs pa gos kyi rnyed par gtogs pa'i chos gos gsum mo/_/gding ba 'drub pa'i nyin par su'ang rung ste yon bdag gcig gis gding ba'i chos gos phul na de de las gding ba'i
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]chos byas kyang rung ste rnyed pa 'di rnams gnyis las gang yang rung ste chos gos che chung gsum sbyar la gding ba drub par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gding ba'i chos gos mdo ltag ma ltar rnyed pa med na dge 'dun gyi spyi'i dkor las phyung ste chos gos gsum bya'o/_/ma bsubs pa [#]
[\[242b.2\]]dang /_chos gos spu can dang bsrubs [#]shing phur pa lta bu dang /_kham khum med pa dang /_ras sang seng du 'dug cing thags bzang ngan du 'dug pa dang /_ma mug [#]pa dang /_rul cing mug [#]pa'i ras snyi ba dang /_srab mo ma yin pa dang /_seng ras [#]srab mo dang ming gis smos pa
[\[242b.3\]]'di rnams las chos gos gsum mi bya'o/_/kha dog can ma yin pa ma yin no/_/gding ba'i chos gos kha dog ma bsgyur ba dang /_tshon ma brtags pa las mi bya/_ma spyad pa sra ba/_ras sngon spyod spyod pa rnying pa ma yin pa sra ba la gding ba'i chos [#]su bya'o/_/gsar yang snon rnying [#]can
[\[242b.4\]]snyi ba las mi bya/_go 'dun dang /_rgyu spun rigs tha dad de go 'dun du byas pa dang ras ma sna tshogs su bsdus te byas pa dang /_lhan pa can dang /_mtshon [#]gyis khra bor btags pa phur ma can dang /_shing lo dang sems can gyi gzugs su btags pa dang /_bsul ba dang /_ras kyi spun
[\[242b.5\]]phra [#]sbom du byas te btags pa dang /_bskor ba las ma yin no/_/ras kyi mtha' ma rigs gzhan gyis byas te bskor cing btags pa dang 'di rnams lta bu'i rgyu las gding ba'i chos gos gsum du mi bya/_spang bar dang /_sngon spang bar 'gyur ba'i [#]chos gos dang /_ma
[\[242b.6\]]btags [#]pa dang /_spang ba ltung ba yod pa'i khrims kyi rdzas phyis 'ongs pa'ang spang dgos par 'gyur ba'i ris [#]song ste slar 'ongs pa ma yin pa las so/_/sngon ro la bsngos shing g.yogs pa'i ras 'di rnams las gding ba'i chos gos su mi bya/_dras [#]drubs pa ltag tu smos pa lta bu ni ma
[\[242b.7\]]yin gyi ras bzang po gtsang ma tshul bzhin du dras shing drubs [#]pa las gding ba'i chos gos bya'o/_/zin pa/_ras brtags shing bkrus la [#]btsos te dras shing drubs zin pa la bya'o/_/lnga pa/_chur [#]khru lnga zheng du khru gsum yod pa las bya'o/_/lhag ma yang ngo /_/khru gsum dang lnga las
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]lhag kyang gding ba'i chos gos su rung ngo /_/sngon ma bting ba/_sngon drubs shing bting ba'i chos gos ma yin pa las bya/_bting ste'o/_/chos gos drubs pa ni slob ma'i nang du btab [#]ste bting la gzhag go_/du ma yang ngo /_/yon bdag so so nas phrugs mang po zhig
[\[243a.2\]]phul na du phul ba bzhin du blangs te zad par blangs te gding ngo /_/de ci tsam par gding ngo /_/chos gos sum phrugs mang po zhig bting na phrugs rer [#]dge slong re re srung [#]mar gzhag go_/chos gos gzhan bsngo ba'ang 'di bzhin te de bas na phyung ste bsngo/_gding ba drub pa'i tshe dge slong so so'i chos
[\[243a.3\]]gos rnying pa'i sngags phyung la gding ba drub pa'i chos gos drubs te de la sngags gdab pa [#]ni mi dgos so/_/'dus pa la ma gnas pas dad par bya/_gding ba drub pa'i chos gos dge slong gang shom shing zhal ta byed pa des rnyed cing zin ma thag tu bdag gi lag na zhag lon par mi
[\[243a.4\]]gzhag gi dge 'dun la 'di rung ngam mi rung zhes spyad brim zhing bstan par bya'o/_/mtshams kyi nang du bsko/_/chos gos drub par gding ba ni mtshams kyi [#]phyi rol du mi bya'i/_mtshams kyi nang du gding ba'i las bya zhing drub bo/_/gding ba yang ngo /_/chos gos drub par gding ba'i
[\[243a.5\]]dge slong srung ma gcig [#]su dad pa las gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bsko/_/gang la de [#]la gsol bas de ltar sbyin gding ba drubs pa'i srung [#]ma'i dge slong bsko ba ni gos [#]lnga dang ldan zhing zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'jigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa mkhas shing tshul dang ldan la tshul
[\[243a.6\]]du yang zhugs shing srung [#]ma'i yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa'i skal ba yang thob pa las bsko/_/gding ba mi drub pa'i sngon logs nas bsko/_/bkru ba dang drub pa dang btso ba des sngon du bya/_gding ba drub pa'i srung [#]mar bskos pa'i dge slong des las su bya ba ni drub pa'i chos gos rgyu zhig yod
[\[243a.7\]]na dge 'dun bsdus la bkru btso btsem pa'i zhal ta bya [#]ste gding ba 'drub pa'i tshe zin par bya/_gnyis sam gsum du nan tan du bya/_gding ba drub pa'i chos gos bkru ba dang btso ba dang btsem pa la sogs pa le lo mi bya bar nan tan bya/_zin pa zhig drub [#]na bdag gis [#]khab kham
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]gnyis gsum drub/_gding [#]ba drub pa'i chos gos btsos shing drubs zin pa zhig nyos kyang rung gzhan gyis yon du phul kyang rung ste rnyed na drubs pa'i srung mar [#]bskos pa'i dge slong des skung pa kham gnyis sam gsum drub cing btsem dgos so[#]/_/blangs pa dang bdag gis byas
[\[243b.2\]]pa/_gding ba'i chos gos thog ma rnyed de len pa'i tshe na srung ba'i [#]dge slong du bskos pa des dge 'dun gyi drub par bya'o snyam du bsams te blang [#]/_zin pa dang gding ba dang /_chos gos btsos shing drubs [#]zin nas gding ba'i tshe'ang dge 'dun gyir bya'o snyam [#]du bsams/_gding ba dang
[\[243b.3\]]bting ba'i rim bzhin du sems bskyed/_gding ba'i chos gos bting zin kyang srung [#]ba'i dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gding ba bting zin to snyam du bsam/_thog ma dri [#]ba yang ma skyes ba [#]ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma las gding ba bya ba la bsam pa'i rgyud gsum yod pa dang po gnyis
[\[243b.4\]]ma bsams [#]na gang zag de la nyes byas te gding bar ni chud do/_/tha ma dge 'dun gyi gding ba bting zin to snyam ma bsams na gding ba drubs par mi chud do/_/tshe dang ldan pa [#]sang kho bo drubs pa gding gi [#]tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag bdag [#]gi chos gos sngags byung [#]shig ces 'dus
[\[243b.5\]]pa la zhu/_gding ba drub pa'i zhag gcig gis snga logs su chos gos srung [#]pa'i dge slong des dge 'dun thams cad la ngas drubs [#]pa gding gi [#]so so'i chos gos sngags phyung [#]shig ces bsgo/_/'du bar chud na nan tan bya/_gding ba drub [#]pa'i nang par pog spos la sogs pa
[\[243b.6\]]mchod pa'i yo byad dang gtsug lag khang brgyan cing phyi bdar bya/_spos dang me tog gi [#]mchod pa dang rab tu zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs te gzhong pa zhabs can gyi steng du bzhag la [#]gcig gi steng du du ma blangs te bla ma 'grengs la gding [#]ba sgrub bo/_/gding bar drub pa'i chos gos la
[\[243b.7\]]me tog dang pog spos la sogs pa dri zhim pos bdug cing mchod de slo ma'am gzhong pa zhabs can gyi nang du chos gos sum phrugs su gding [#]ba kun gting ste gcig gi thog tu gcig bzhag la gding ba srung [#]ba'i dge slong gi lag tu khyer te 'grengs [#]la dge 'dun kun la mthar gyis bstan
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]te gding bar rung ngam mi rung mnyes sam ma mnyes zhes bya/_zhag gcig la'o/_/gding ba drub pa ni nyin zhag gcig tshun chad du drub pa las bya'o/_/ston zla tha chungs kyi'o/_/nyin zhag gcig tshun chad gding ba [#]ston zla tha chung tshes bcu drug gi nyin zhag gcig
[\[244a.2\]]tshun chad la bya/_tshig gsum mo/_/gding ba'i sngags bya ba ni tshig lan gsum du bzlas so/_/tshig [#]gsum du bzlas dgos pa ni mdo 'og ma gnyis ka'i sngags la bya/_gding ngo zhes so/_/dge 'dun gyi spyir chos gos srung [#]pa'i dge slong gis btsos kyi [#]lag na khyer te bdag gis dge
[\[244a.3\]]'dun gyi chos gos drub par bgyi'o [#]zhes lan gsum [#]brjod do/_/dge slong so so'i mdun du 'dug ste gding ngo zhes bya'o/_/de nas dge slong chos gos 'drub pa'i dge slong gis chos gos lag na khyer te dge slong so so'i mdun du 'dug la gsol cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis
[\[244a.4\]]gding ba bya'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags lan gsum du bzlas te bya'o/_/dge bar bting ngo shin tu bting ngo /_/so so'i mdun du sngags byed pa'i tshe rim gyis dge slong gral na 'dug pa des dge bar bting ngo shin tu bting ngo zhes bya/_gang 'di rnyed pa'i yon tan de dag gi'o zhes bya'o/_/
[\[244a.5\]]mi gcig gis sngags zin cing rjes la rnyed pa'i yon tan bdag cag gi'o zhes smra/_yon tan ni rnam pa bcu thob pa la bya/_rnyed pa ni gding ba drub [#]pa'i zla ba lnga'i tshe yon du rnyed do cog dge 'dun de rnams kyi spyir bsdu ba la bya/_myong ba bzhin du de'i rjes su yi rang pa'o/_/gding ba drub pa'i tshe dge
[\[244a.6\]]slong la la zhig gnyid log nas [#]dge 'dun gyis bslangs te nyal nyal ba des rjes su yi rang zhing dang ngo zhes smras na dge 'dun gyi las su'ang rung ba kho [#]nyid kyi skal ba'i sngags kyang lan gsum du bya'o/_/mngon par gyur pas so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gnyid log pa yang dge 'dun gyi gral
[\[244a.7\]]na log pa la bya'i lkog na bdag gi lkog na gnyid log pa ma yin no/_/dus dus su bskam/_du ba dang rdul [#]gyi khyim du mi gzhag_/gding ba drubs zin nas srung [#]ba'i mi des dus dus su chos gos bla re yod pa'i 'og tu ser bu la bar bar bskam bsrad [#]nyi mas ma phog par chos gos
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bkram la ser bu la brkyang ste bskam pa la bya/_sprug gding ba'i chos gos de sprug cing phyi bdar bya/_du ba dang rdul [#]can gyi khyim du drubs [#]ba'i chos gos mi gzhag_/rgyal po yir ma yin/_rgyal po'i khyim du chos gos drubs pa de mi gzhag mi bskur [#]de las mi 'bral/_gos drubs
[\[244b.2\]]pa mtshams kyi nang du bzhag la srung [#]ba'i dge slong mtshams kyi phyi rol du zhag tu song la bral bar mi bya/_byas na nyes byas/_blangs te gzhan du mi 'gro/_/gding ba drubs [#]pa'i chos gos de mtshams kyi phyi rol du khyer la mi 'gro song ste mtshams 'das na drubs pa zhig par 'gyur
[\[244b.3\]]ro/_/mi gtsang ba'i gnas su mi 'jug_/gding ba drubs [#]pa'i chos gos khyer te bshang sa dang mi gtsang bar mi bya/_bla gab med par mi 'jug_/gding ba drubs pa'i chos gos khyer la bla gab med pa'i sar mi 'jug[# ]/dbyung ba rnam [#]gnyis te/_gding ba drubs nas dbyung
[\[244b.4\]]ba rnam gnyis te bdag gis phyung ba dang gzhan gyis phyung ba'o/_/ci lta bu yin pa 'og nas 'chad/_bdag dang bcol bas 'jug pa'o/_/bdag [#]gis phyung ba ni gding ba drubs pa las gud du song ste phyung ba'o/_/gzhan la bcol te phyung ba ni dge 'dun gyis [#]drubs pa tshul
[\[244b.5\]]bzhin du phyung ba ste 'og nas 'chad/_bdag gis [#]'jug pa ni drub [#]pa dang mtshams gzhan du phyin na'o/_/drubs pa bdag gis byung [#]zhes bya ba ni gding ba drubs te gzhag pa'i mtshams de las phyi rol tu drubs pa'i chos gos dang bcas te phyung na zhag ma lon kyang drubs pas zhig
[\[244b.6\]]go/_/drubs pa [#]zhig kyang 'bral ba'i spang ba'i ltung bar ni mi 'gyur gyi zhag bcu 'das te sngags kyis ma thebs na 'chad pa'i spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsngos pa med pa'i mtshams su skya rengs shar na'o/_/mtshams kyi nang na tshul du zhugs shing drubs pa bting ba'i dge slong
[\[244b.7\]]gcig kyang med par zad par mtshams kyi phyi rol du byung la chos gos nang du lus na drubs pa [#]bting pa'i dge slong du yod kyang drubs pa zhig par 'gyur ro/_/drubs pa bting ba'i dge slong las gcig yod na ni zhig par mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'gor [#]gyi nang du bcad na'o/_/gding ba drubs pa las
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]gzhig tu 'gro bar bsams te song na gding ba drubs pa zhig pa yin te yon tan rnam pa [#]bcu mi dbang ngo /_/de ltar song ba drubs pa 'jig pa rnam pa drug yod de 'og nas 'chad do/_/de la 'di'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar song ba'i dge slong de nyid 'jig gi dge slong
[\[245a.2\]]gzhan mi 'jig go_/mtshams 'das nas 'di mi [#]'grub bo/_/yon tan lta zhig ma thob kyang rung gi [#]drubs pa la 'byin pa'i tshe slar mi 'khor te thal byung 'gro bar bsams pa ni song ste gtsug lag khang gi mtshams 'das na drubs pa zhig par gyur to/_/mi ldog pa'i sems kyis
[\[245a.3\]]'gro bar na'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar song ste drubs pa 'jig pa yang slar mi ldog par bsams te song na drubs [#]pa zhig par gyur te drug yod pa'i gcig 'di yin no/_/'di phyi rol du mtshams skyes na yang ngo /_/mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug 'dug pa las 'bral ba [#]la thal byung 'gro
[\[245a.4\]]ba'i sems shig skyes te song na zhig par 'gyur ro/_/drug tu brtsi ba la gnyis/_gos bya'o zhes pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyang med na de bzhin no/_/mdo ltag ma gnyis ltar song ba chos gos sam chos gos kyi rgyu zhig byin kyang rung nyos kyang rung ste/_len du 'gro bar bsams
[\[245a.5\]]pa ni drubs pa bsrung bar bsam [#]kyang rung dral [#]bar bsams kyang rung drubs pa zhig [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/bya bar yod par las chad na yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar chos gos kyi phyir song song ba las mtshams kyi phyi rol nas chos gos mi dgos par bsams te gzhan gyi
[\[245a.6\]]phyi rol [#]song ba ni de ma thag tu drubs pa zhig go/_/slar ldog kyang ngo /_/chos gos kyi phyir song song ste drubs [#]pa dral bar bsams pa las lam nas slar log pa ni slar mtshams su phyin na zhig_/gsum du byed na'ang gnas 'di bzhin bsam [#]pa chad pa brtsams pa stong [#]zin na'o/_/
[\[245a.7\]]drubs [#]pa bting ba'i tshe chos gos kyi phyir song song ba las chos gos ma zin par rgyur thob ste bdag gi [#]lag nas stor na drubs pa zhig ste gcig_/chos gos ma byin nam med de don ma [#]grub na'ang zhig ste rnam pa gnyis/_chos gos zhig tu rnyed de thob nas lus la gyon na'ang drubs
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]pa zhig ste gsum/_'di gsum de ma thag tu drubs pa zhig par 'gyur ro/_/drug tu brtsi ba la gong ma gnyis kyi steng du 'di gsum gyis bsnan te lnga/_dbyung ba la yid gnyis kyang bcad pa bzhin no/_/drubs pa bting [#]ba'i tshe gud du song ste drubs [#]pa dral lam mi dral ba dang chos
[\[245b.2\]]gos kyi phyir 'gro'am mi 'gro the tshom za bzhin du song ba ni mtshams 'das ma thag tu drubs pa zhig par 'gyur ro/_/[#]drubs pa bdag gis phyung ba ni 'di dang drug_/las gzhan gyi bya ba mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun drubs pa 'byin pa ni dge 'dun dang chos gos su bcas [#]par
[\[245b.3\]]mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong ba dang chos gos bzhag ste dge 'dun zad par mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong pa dang rnam gnyis ni drubs pa phyung bar ni 'gyur mod kyi/_dge 'dun la nyes byas su 'gyur bas de ltar mi bya'i mtshams kyi nang du gsol ba dang zhu bas drubs [#]par dbyung ngo /_/
[\[245b.4\]]'di ni gzhan la bcol te drubs [#]pa sgyu ma [#]phyung ba zhes bya'o/_/dpyid zla ra ba'i dus la'o/_/gding ba drubs pa'i [#]dbyung ba ni dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la bya'o/_/mdo bzhin pa'o/_/dpyid zla ra ba'i nya ni [#]lo snga ma'am phyi ma la mi bya'i tshul nas byung ba'i drubs [#]pa zla ba lngar bsrungs ba'i rjes bzhin
[\[245b.5\]]pa'i dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la bya'o/_/bcom pa'i phyir na tshun chad du yang ngo /_/drubs [#]pa bting ba'i tshe dge slong kha cig rkun po'am chom po phyung [#]ste gos med pa'i rkyen byung ste drubs [#]pa dus las sngar phyung ste gos dgos pa na nyes med do/_/'dir ma myong ba ni thos kyi bar du yon
[\[245b.6\]]tan rjes su 'jug go_/mdo ltag ma ltar dge slong kha cig gis gding ba drubs pa phyung la dge slong gud du dong ba kha cig gis drubs pa phyung bar ma tshor zhing ma thos na gos sngags kyis ma thebs pa la sogs pa yod na yon tan bcu'i nyes pa thob kyi bar du med do/_/rgyun med
[\[245b.7\]]na'o/_/drubs [#]pa phyung bar thos kyang bdag gi chos gos ma zin te 'tshem pa la sogs pa las rgyun ma chad par byed pa ni zin gyi bar du sngags ma thebs kyang nyes med do/_/rgyun chad kyi bar du/_drubs [#]pa phyung bar thos nas chos gos kyi rgyu zhig lag tu thob ste stor [#]ba rnyed du re ba
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]las bye brag phye ste ma rnyed pa dang chos gos rnyed nas sngags kyis ma btab pa ni nyes byas par 'gyur ro/_/ma phyung gi bar du thams cad kyis de'i dus kyi bar du mi bgo/_/chom [#]po rkun po la sogs pa'i rkyen byung ste gos med par ma gyur gyi par du gding ba
[\[246a.2\]]'byin pa'i dus las sngar gding ba phyung [#]zhing rnyed pa'i yon la sogs pa bgo [#]bar mi bya'o/_/drubs [#]pa'i dngos po'o/_/ci ltar byung nas gding /_drubs [#]pa gding ba'i dus ni rgyal po dang skar mkhan kyis shol bor byas [#]kyang de brtsan [#]par mi bya'i zla grangs dang zhag grangs rim bzhin du
[\[246a.3\]]brtsis te drub [#]bo/_/tshul du 'jug pa ni skar mkhan gyis [#]shol bor ba bzhin du bya'o/_/gso sbyong dang mi nye ba ma yin/_gding ba drubs [#]pa ni tshul nas byung ba nyid gso sbyong byas pa yin pas tshul nas byung nas zhag gcig lon te gding ba drub bo/_/dge slong 'thab [#]mo pa 'ong
[\[246a.4\]]par thos nas zhag dus las sngar tshul nas byung ba ni gding ba de'i rjes la mi drubs [#]kyi dus bzhin du ston zla 'bring po tshes bco lnga la [#]gso sbyong yang byas la bcu drug la gding ba drub par bya'o/_/dbyung ba na yang ngo /_/gding ba dbyung ba yang gso sbyong byas pa'i 'og tu gding ba
[\[246a.5\]]dbyung ngo /_/de nyid kyi nyi ma la'o[#]/_/gso sbyong byas nas gding ba dbyung ba ni dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes bco lnga la snga dro gso sbyong byas la phyi dro gding ba dbyung ngo /_/yang gso sbyong byas na byung ba bzhin/_tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe na gso [#]sbyong mi dgos te tshul nas byung ba nyid gso sbyong byas pa
[\[246a.6\]]yin no/_/de la tshul nas byung ba dang drubs pa gding [#]ba'i las byas zin pa'i 'og tu gud nas dge slong dag gcig [#]'ongs te zhag grangs 'khrul gyi [#]gdod bya dgos so zhes zer na dge slong phyis 'ongs pa grangs mang na de brtsan [#]par bya dgos te tshul nas 'byung ba dang drubs [#]pa gding
[\[246a.7\]]ba gdod blas te bya dgos so/_/bting nas byed na de tha dad du grub bo/_/bting ba drubs zin pa'i 'og tu dge slong kha cig log pa la bstan [#]na yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa'i yon skal ni dbang ste 'og nas kyang 'chad/_drubs [#]pa dbyung ba ni dge ba la phyogs pa'i dge slong gos sngar
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]phyung la de'i 'og tu mi dge ba la bltas pa dbyung ngo /_/gcig gis phyung gcig gis ma phyung na [#]phyung bar mi chud do/_/chos su smra ba de dag gis gding ngo /_/gding ba ma drubs pa'i mdun du dge slong kha cig log pa la bltas nas [#]dge ba la phyogs pa'i dge slong nyi tshes gding ba drub
[\[246b.2\]]po/_yon tan dang rnyed pa'i yon skal mi dge ba la phyogs pas mi thob bo/_/de byed na'ang gnas de dag gis rnyed pa ni de dag gis rims [#]so/_/mdo ltag ma'i ltag ma la 'chad do/_/dge bar lta ba [#]mthun zhing gding ba drub [#]pa las de'i 'og tu kha cig mi dge ba la phyogs pa
[\[246b.3\]]zhig yod na gding ba gcig tu drubs pa'i phyir yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa'i yon skal mi dge ba la phyogs pa'ang dbang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun gyi rkyen gtan du phul zhing rgyun du sbyong ba las mi dbang ngo /_/spangs pa rang bzhin pa'i gnas su [#]skye ba ma yin no/_/dge
[\[246b.4\]]slong ma'i gnas su thon te chad pas bcad pa dang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro [#]zhes zer ba la sogs pa ni thal byung bskrad pa ni ma yin gyi mtshams kyi nang mtha' 'khob gcig tu 'khod pa las chad [#]pa dang med pa dang chad pas bcad pa de gnyis ka dge 'dun
[\[246b.5\]]du longs pa zhig ste gding ba so so drubs pa'ang chad pa yod pa rnams kyis [#]yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa mi 'thob bo/_/bsam pa [#]bzhag nas gding ba'o/_/gding ba drub [#]pa'i tshe gding ba drub [#]par yang 'dod la yon tan bcu'ang 'dod de dad par byas nas [#]gding ba drubs pa ni gding ba drubs
[\[246b.6\]]pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dad pa byin pa'i dbang gis lhan cig bya ba ltag ma nas byas par 'gyur ro/_/gding ba 'drub [#]pa'i tshe dad pa phul na 'dus pa dang 'dra ste las su yang rung yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa'i skal ba'ang dbang ngo /_/de las 'phral na phyung ba'o/_/gding ba drub pa'i tshe
[\[246b.7\]]na yon tan bcu'ang ci rung gis mi dgos/_/gding ba drub pa'ang [#]mi dgos snyam du sems shing gdod drub pa ni gang zag de nyid drubs [#]par mi chud de drubs [#]pa phyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na dad pa ma byin pa nyal lam bsam gtan du zhugs shing 'dug na gding ba'am dbyung ba
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]mi skye ste brnyan tshun chad du'o/_/gding [#]ba 'drub pa la dad pa ma byin par bsam gtan du zhugs sam gnyid [#]log pa las sngags byed pa'i go rims su [#]babs te bslang ba dang gding ba drub pa la dad pa ni gding ba drubs [#]pa thob bo/_/gding ba drub pa dang yon
[\[247a.2\]]tan ci dgos zhes ma dad pa'i sems skyes nas drubs [#]pa bdag gis byung ba zhes bya ste/_drubs [#]par mi chud do/_/gnas pa bzhin du mtshams gcig tu gding ste gnas gzhan du gnas na'o/_/mtshams chen po dpag tshad phyed dang [#]gsum tshun chad kyis bskor [#]ba'i nang gtsug
[\[247a.3\]]lag khang so sor 'dug pa mang mo [#]zhig yod de gding ba 'drub pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang de kun gyi gding ba gtsug lag khang gcig tu drubs na drubs par chud de nyes med do/_/gding ba'i tshe gnas de bzhin no/_/gtsug lag khang mang mo [#]zhig so so na 'dug la so so'i mtshams
[\[247a.4\]]bcad pa med kyang [#]rung yod kyang rung [#]gding ba 'drub pa'i tshe mtshams bkrol te spyi'i mtshams gcig tu bcad la drubs pa'ang nyes med do/_/gang du bting nas mtshams byas kyang gnas so/_/mtshams gcig gi nang nas [#]gtsug lag khang so sor 'dug pa zhig gding ba
[\[247a.5\]]gcig tu drubs pa'i 'og tu spyi'i mtshams chen po bkrol te mtshams bu chung so sor bcad na'ang yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa'i yon skal med par ma gyur te kun gyis thob bo/_/mtshams so sor de bzhin du dbyung ba ni sos so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gding ba so sor drubs pa'i 'og
[\[247a.6\]]tu mtshams bu chung so sor bcad pa drubs 'byin pa ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re drubs pa'i chos gos de mtshams bu chung so so'i steng du khyer la drubs dbyung ngo zhes zer ba [#]kha cig ni kun 'dus te gang du drubs pa'i gnas der gding ngo zhes zer ro/_/byed [#]na phyogs so
[\[247a.7\]]sor ro/_/tshul yang gcig tu zhugs drubs pa yang gcig tu bting [#]ba las gcig log par bltas te dge ba la phyogs pa dang so sor gyur na'ang yon tan bcu dang rnyed pa'i yon skal yod do/_/ma bting bas bting ba phyung na yang ma phyung ba ma yin no/_/drubs pa byin [#]pa'i khar dge
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]slong gzhi la 'khod pa gud du dong ba'i 'og tu drub [#]pa bting ba'i dge slong la ma gtogs pa'i dge slong dag cig gud nas 'ongs te drubs pa phyung na'ang las su rung ste dge slong bzhi [#]pa kun kyang drubs pa byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi skye ba dag gis ni khams [#]bskang ba ma yin no/_/ma
[\[247b.2\]]bting bas phyung na'ang ma yin no/_/drub pa gding ba'i tshe na dge 'dun du longs pas 'drub [#]la drubs pa [#]'byin pa'i tshe na dge slong kha cig shi'am khrims phul [#]lam gud du dong ste dge 'dun du ma longs [#]na dge slong gud nas bkug la dge 'dun du longs par byas la drub par dbyung
[\[247b.3\]]ngo /_/nyes med pa ni bting ba drubs nas sbyar ma med par grong du 'jug pa la sogs te mngon sum du 'dug pas [#]yang ngo /_/drubs pa [#]bting ba'i tshe yon tan bcu thob pa la ltag ya gir [#]brgyad smos zin te/_grong du chos gos chen po med par 'gro ba dang /_khyim pa'i drung du chos gos
[\[247b.4\]]chen po med par 'gro ba dang 'di gnyis kyis bsnan te bcur brtsi'o/_/drubs pa'i dngos po ste dris par chud pa'o/_/drubs pa'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//mtshon gyis ma btab par gos mi spyad chos gos gsum dang yo byad [#]bcu gsum dang gos lhag ma [#]la sogs pa ni
[\[247b.5\]]gos zhes bya ste khab dang gri la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis ma bcad cing ma dras par mi bgo mi spyad [#]do/_/dras shing btsems pa'i chos gos bsngo[#]/_chos gos chen po dang gding ba ni mtshon gyis ma bcad na bsngo ba mi 'chags te ji ltar dra zhing btsem pa 'og nas 'chad do/_/dum bur
[\[247b.6\]]dras [#]pa lhag ma dang mnyam par ste dbu ma las gzhan pa de dang der gtags [#]pa'i 'dab ma'i ngos dang mtha' skor yang ngo /_/chos gos dras shing btsem pa'i thabs ni 'di ltar bya ste/_mdor na chos gos [#]nyid la bltas na brda phrad par 'gyur ro/_/nang du gnas pa dang bla gab dang
[\[247b.7\]]sbyar ma yang ngo /_/chos gos snam bu lnga pa dang bdun pa gnyis ni mtshon gyis ma bcad kyang [#]rung chos gos chen po ni ma bcad na mi rung ste sngags mi 'chags so/_/gnyis ni sngags ni 'chags te nyes byas so/_/bar tshangs can dang rngul gzan yang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma'i nang
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]nas chos gos gsum bshad pa ni dge slong dbang ba yin de'i steng du rngul gzan dang bar tshangs can gnyis kyis bsnan te lnga ni dge slong ma'i chos gos su dbang ngo /_/gang de'i rnam pas dge slong ma'i'o/_/dge slong pha'i chos gos gsum bshad pa bzhin
[\[248a.2\]]du dge slong mas kyang dra zhing btsem mo/_/bar tshangs can dang rdul gzan ni ma dras kyang rung /_brnyas pa byung ba yod na yang ngo /_/chos gos med dam rkun pos khyer bar gyur na gzhan las brnyas te bdag gis sngags kyis btab na'ang rung ngo /_/skya rengs 'byung bar 'di dag
[\[248a.3\]]dang bral bar mi bya'o/_/chos gos rkun pos khyer ram mes tshig na skya rengs ma byung tshun chad du gzhan la brnyas te sngags kyis thobs [#]shig_/sngags kyang [#]ma thebs te skya rengs byung na nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/gzhan ma 'byor na ma bcos pa la bsngos kyang skye'o/_/chos gos rkun
[\[248a.4\]]pos khyer ram mes tshig pa'i rkyen byung [#]ste chos gos med cing ma rnyed na ma dras shing ma drubs pa la sngags btab kyang 'chags so/_/ma dras kyang ngo /_/rkyen byung ste chos gos ma rnyed na gsum char snam bur byas shing ma dras pa la sngags btab kyang 'chags so/_/'on te 'grub na
[\[248a.5\]]bres pa 'di sbyin/_chos gos rkyen byung ste ma rnyed na tshal bu gud nas steng du glan pa'ang sngags 'chags so/_/khyim pa'i rnam pa yang ngo /_/chos gos rkyen byung nas mi rnyed par gyur te mi [#]rnyed na khyim pa'i gos shig la sngags btab na 'chags so/_/phying pa dang la ba dang be'u ras dang
[\[248a.6\]]snam bu sbom po dang srab mo ma dras par bre [#]ba byin te btsems na yang ngo /_/chos gos rkun pos khyer ram mes tshig pa'i rkyen cig byung ste ma rnyed na ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la snam bu [#]gun nas byos te btsems te sngags btab na'ang 'chags so/_/mal stan mi gtsang pas [#]reg
[\[248a.7\]]par gyur na de ma thag tu bkru'o/_/mal stan dge 'dun gyi'am rung gang zag gi yang rung bshang gci la sogs pa mi gtsang bas reg na mod la bkru ma bkrus na nyes byas/_g.yogs ma'i yin pa'i khri dang khri'u la de'i ma yin pa'i [#]gding ba dang 'dug pa'i bar du bgo ba'i nang du ma
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]yin par dge 'dun gyi de dag mi spyad/_dge 'dun gyi khri dang khri'u shal rtsub pa rtsub cing tsha ba'i phyir ma smos kyang gding ba byed par 'gyur bas de ni ma gtegs [#]kyi dge 'dun gyi mal stan la gding ba'am 'dab mas ma g.yogs par mthang gis reg pa [#]bting zhing spyad na nyes byas/_
[\[248b.2\]]bris pa rab tu ma zhig pa thams cad la yang ngo /_/stan dang gos ri mo can khra bor 'dug pa la ri mo med par ma gyur tam gzhan gyis ma g.yogs par spyad na nyes byas/_brtags par gyur pa'am dri ma can gyis ma yin/_gding ba mtshan ma tsam du chung ngus byas pa dang dri ma dang
[\[248b.3\]]snum can la sogs pas gding ba byas na nyes byas/_gding ba bcang /_gding ba bcang [#]kyang nyes med/_stug na rim [#]gcig kyang rigs so/_/gding ba stug po la byas na gcig rim du byas kyang rung ngo /_/srab na nyis [#]rim du bya'o/_/gding ba srab mo zhig na nyis [#]rim du byos
[\[248b.4\]]shig ri mo dang nye ba'i ri mo ma brtags pa'o/_/za bu [#]dang phrug stan dang ri mo can la gding ba byas na nyes byas/_gding [#]ba la 'dab [#]ma'i ngos bya/_gding ba la tshal bu [#]byas na gding bar mi chud de nyes byas/_'og tu sum cha'i steng du'o/_/tshal bu bya ba ni chur gsum cha sum gnyis
[\[248b.5\]]su bcad de srubs gdod/_dum bu gcig pa la mi bsngo/_gding ba srubs ma btod [#]par thang pa la byas na sngags mi 'chags/_g.yan pa dgab [#]de yod pas bcangs/_g.yan pa yod pas g.yan pa dgab pa bcangs kyang nyes med/_nyi ma lnga drug cing 'di bkru'o/_/
[\[248b.6\]]g.yan pa dgab pa'i ras nyi ma lnga drug cing bkru'o/_/[#]brtags pa ni srin [#]bal gyi dang sha na [#]ka dang gsho ma ka'i yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni dge slong gis [#]gos su brtags kyang nyes med/_rgyu spun [#]med pa dang gso [#]ma'i ma yin/_gso ma'i ras dang mtho ris kyi gos ni
[\[248b.7\]]ma brtags pa ste mi spyad do/_/skra'i dang sgren mo'am 'ug pa'i sgro zhes yi dam bcas [#]pa yang ngo /_/skra'i gos gyon pa dang sgren mor 'dug pa dang sgro las gos byas pa dang 'di rnams gyon cing byed na nyes byas so/_/'di sbom pa'o/_/lhag [#]ma gsum ltar byed cing mur 'dug gi dka'
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]thub spyod na sbom/_'di las gzhan spyod pa yang ngo /_/skra'i gos gyon pa dang gcer bur 'dug pa dang bya sgro'i gos [#]byas pa la [#]mur 'dug gi dka' thub spyod pa la ni mi sems kyi 'da' [#]skad cig tsam byas pa ni nyes byas/_skra btog pa dang /_bdag gi [#]skra
[\[249a.2\]]lag gis 'bal [#]ba dang /_'dab ma'i snam bu dang /_shing lo'i 'dab ma las gos byas pa dang /_ri dwags kyi pags pa dang /_pags pa'o cog las gos byas te gyon pa dang /_bla dang 'og tu bcas pa/_gos 'og tu gcig [#]gyon steng du gcig gyon pa chog par sems pa dang /_di ri ta dang /_
[\[249a.3\]]thod kar dang 'gro ba'i gos gyon pa dang /_yan lag spu can dang /_lag 'brag dang zhu lbug [#]ge lta bu sbu'u can dang /_thams cad sngon pos bgo ba dang /_gos thams cad sngon por gyon pa dang de bzhin ser po'am dmar po 'ba' zhig la byas na nyes byas so/_/kha tshar ring po dang kha tshar
[\[249a.4\]]blas pa dang ral ga dang gtsug tor dang mgo dkris pa dang rnga mo'i gos dang phyar ba dang [#]mur 'dug gi rgyal mtshan dang yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams mur 'dug dka' thub bya ba'i sems yod na'ang sbom po'o/_/dka' thub bya ba'i sems med par bgos na nyes byas/_su la
[\[249a.5\]]sa'i 'dab mar cog pa dang me mar gyi ras tsam yang mnyam par bgo'o/_/yon bdag gis yon phul na zar ma'i 'dab ma tsam mam me mar gyi ras tsam yin na de [#]mnyam par bgo_/la ba dang de lta na ni btsongs te'o/_/la ba la sogs pa zhig phul pa ni btsongs te rin bgo'o/_/
[\[249a.6\]]dras te ma yin no/_/la ba dras na rdzas su mi rung ba'i phyir btsongs te bgo_/rnyed pa bgo bar bya ba rnam lnga ste/_yon zhig rnyed na bgo ba la thabs rnam lnga yod de 'og nas 'chad/_de ring rnyed pa bgos de la khyed 'du bar gyis shig ces dge 'dun la brjod/_gtsug lag khang
[\[249a.7\]]sbyong [#]gis de ring spyi'i yon bgos gshegs shig ces bgos/_rnam pa gcig gaN+DI brdungs pa dang gaN+DI [#]brdungs pa la bgo ba dang /_tshul shing brim [#]pa dang /_zad par tshul shing brims te tshul shing la bgrangs pa [#]dang /_bgrang ba yang ngo /_/grangs nyid du khas bgrangs te
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]bgo ba dang /_so so'i skal ba brim [#]pa yang ngo /_/gong du ming gis smos pa ltar bgrangs nas bgrang du [#]yod pa dang nor du [#]sbyar te skal ba so sor mnyam par bgo_/byed pa'i tshe mtha' tshun chad 'ongs na'ang dbang ngo /_/yon lhag [#]ma rnam lnga ltar 'god pa'i tshe dge slong zhig
[\[249b.2\]]gud nas 'ongs [#]na skal ba dbang ngo /_/dge slong sum gnyis tsam nor lag tu thob lhag ma 'god cing 'khod pa la dge slong gcig gud nas 'ongs na thams cad slar bsdus [#]te bgo zin nas ma yin no/_/nor bgos zin pa'i 'og tu 'ongs pa'i skal ba mi 'thob bo/_/rnyed
[\[249b.3\]]pa chung yang 'di [#]bzhin no/_/yon chung ngu zhig rnyed kyang dge slong phyis 'ongs pa dbang ngo /_/thob pa byed par gtogs pa song yang mi'i [#]rigs pa ma yin no/_/yon bdag gis rtag tu dge slong so sor thang bcad de 'bul ba las dge slong tshul bsrungs pa zhig gud du song bar
[\[249b.4\]]gyur na'ang de'i skal ba thang bzhin du dbang ngo /_/de bas na 'gro na longs shig [#]ces bsgo'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar skal ba dbang ba las gud du 'gro na'ang bdag mi 'dod de dge 'dun la phul kyang nyes med/_'dod na'ang mkhan po dang [#]grogs po la len par bcol te zhog shig_/dam [#]
[\[249b.5\]]bcas pa las ma blangs na'ang sbyin du gzhug[# ]/mdo ltag ma ltar nor len du bcol ba las khas blangs pa las phyis ma blangs na skal ba ci dbang ba'am skyin [#]pa de la dbab bo[#]/_/dong tse lnga yan chad thob pa chung ngu las so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar skyin [#]pa blang pa ni pa na [#]lnga yan chad
[\[249b.6\]]kyi rin ni blang gi lnga las nyung ba man chad kyi rin ni mi cog [#]go_/ma smras par mi blang /_dge slong grogs kyis long shig ma smras par mi blang mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis [#]blang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis ni slob ma'i yon skal long shig ces ma bsgo'ang blang /_snying
[\[249b.7\]]gcugs pa'i gnas kyi [#]phyir kyang ngo /_/grogs po mdza' bo dang mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi ni skal pa long shig par ma bsgo bar blangs kyang nyes med do/_/bdag gi phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/mkhan po'ang rung slob ma'ang rung mi dge ba dang log pa la bltas
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]pa'i skal ba mi mnod do/_/mal stan kyang de bzhin du'o/_/mkhan po slob dpon gyi [#]mal stan ma bsgo bar blangs kyang nyes med/_slob dpon dang mdza' bo'ang de bzhin no/_/zas kyang ngo /_/mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mdza' bo'i zan skal mnod kyang
[\[250a.2\]]nyes med do/_/gzhan gyi phyir len na pha rol po chud par bya'o/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mdza' bo'i yon skal dang mal cha dang zas nod pa'i tshe gzhan la shes par dpang btsugs [#]te mnod do/_/mi 'thob pa las gtogs zhes ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi nang du ma gtogs
[\[250a.3\]]shing zan skal mi thob [#]par 'thob po zhes zer zhing mnod na nyes byas/_za ba'i tshe sbom po/_dris pa [#]rin thang tshang la rku sems dang ldan na pham mo/_/rigs pa ni gcig pa [#]la 'thob pa rab tu mang yang ma btsud pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/gtsug lag khang gcig na dge slong gcig pu
[\[250a.4\]]'dug pa las yon bdag dad pas yon mang zhig [#]phul na dge slong gcig pu des khyer yang nyes med/_mi rigs pa ni chos ma yin pa'i skyabs su ltung [#]ste bye ba dge 'dun gyis [#]'thob pa las so/_/dge slong sems log pa la bltas shing phyogs te/_tshul dge ba 'dra bar bsrung
[\[250a.5\]]zhing 'dug pa ni dge 'dun gyi yon las mi 'thob bo/_/ring du gnas na de'i tshe gnas thob [#]la'o/_/dge slong tshul du zhugs pa ni tshul dral [#]kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga phan chad cig lon na yon skal 'thob bo/_/dri'am log gam shi yang ngo /_/tshul du zhugs pa la khrims phul yang rung
[\[250a.6\]]khrims phul ba las slar byig gshur zhugs kyang rung [#]shi ste nor skal byin cig ces khas [#]chems bzhag kyang rung ste tshul zhag bzhi bcu [#]lnga bsrungs na skal ba [#]'thob bo/_/'thab [#]pa ji ltar bsngos pa'i tshul bzhin du'o/_/yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun la sogs pa
[\[250a.7\]]ming gis so sor bsngos te phul na bsngos pa bzhin du gzhi gzhan du [#]mi spyod do/_/'thob pa yang ngo /_/dge 'dun grangs las ma gtogs par gud nas 'ongs pa zhig yod na gsol thang dang zan thang bcad de phul ba las khong thog tu dad pa byin na'ang nyes med/_slong ba'i grong bsgos
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]kyang nyes med do/_/rgyas par 'grub [#]pa yang ngo /_/mtshams gcig gi nang na dge 'dun mang zhing gnas pa las kha cig chos log pa la phyogs pas gong sde [#]gnyis su bcad de so sor bsod snyoms dang yon len par bsngos pa las chos ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i grong nas spyir yon
[\[250b.2\]]'bul du 'ongs nas [#]chos ma yin pa la phyogs [#]dbang chos la phyogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/_dge 'dun gyi phyir chad pa [#]las kyi mtshams kyis [#]gcod do/_/de bzhin du 'dir gcig pa la sogs pa'o/_/gtsug lag khang gcig gi nang na dge slong mang zhig gnas gnas pa las gzhan
[\[250b.3\]]thams cad gtsug lag khang btang ste yan man du 'dong pa'i 'og tu gtsug lag khang der dge 'dun spyir yon zhig phul na gtsug lag khang de na gnas pa'i dge slong de su yod pa dbang ngo /_/chos kyi rnyed [#]pa de'i smra ba dag gi skal ba yang ngo /_/d+harma la yon zhig phul na d+harma klog
[\[250b.4\]]klog pa'i dge slong dbang ngo /_/'di'i mtha' ni zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar d+harma klog klog pa'i yon dbang ba'i dge slong ni zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi kha thon du klog cing 'dzin nus pas kyang d+harma
[\[250b.5\]]la phul ba'i yon blangs kyang nyes med do/_/shi ba'i yo byad la mi rigs pa ni mtshan tha dad pa dang gzhan 'god pa'o/_/mtshams gcig gi nang gi dge 'dun las dge slong gcig [#]shi na de'i yo byad dang nor mtshams tha dad pa'i [#]dge slong ma dang de ba dat+ta'i sde lta bu dang de rnams ni
[\[250b.6\]]mi dbang gi [#]mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun nyi tshe dbang ngo /_/spangs pa yang de bzhin no/_/ltag ma'i ltar dge slong shi ba'i nor las mtshams gcig gi nang nas dge slong 'ga' zhig bskrad na des kyang shi ba'i nor la mi dbang ngo /_/mi 'khor kyang ngo /_/mtshan ma las sems
[\[250b.7\]]ma log kyang ngo [#]/_/mtshams gcig gi [#]nang na dge slong gnyis sam gsum zhig 'khod 'khod pa las kun shi ste med na dge slong gcig cig [#]lus shing bsnams kun gyi nor ma shi [#]dge slong ma shi ba gcig pu de dbang ngo /_/zad par shi na gtsug lag khang de'i nye 'khor na dge
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]slong spangs [#]pa 'ba' zhig 'dug pa de'i yid la snga ma'i mtshan ma btang na dbang ngo /_/mtshan ma ma btang na de'i nye 'khor na'ang dge slong ma su yod pa dbang ngo /_/de'i blang ba yod pa la ni tha dad pa ma yin no/_/spangs pa'i dge slong zhig shi na de'i yo byad dang
[\[251a.2\]]nor ni dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/dge 'dun de'i nang na chad pa gzhan zhig yod na des ni mi 'thob bo/_/bye ba dang ni tha dad do/_/dge 'dun zhig la [#]dge mi dge sde gnyis su bcad de'i nang nas 'ga' zhig dge ba la phyogs pa las shi na dge ba'i dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/mi dge ba shi
[\[251a.3\]]na mi dge ba'i dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/rab tu byung ba tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa las gzhan mi dbang ngo /_/dge slong gi rab tu byung ba'i nang nas 'ga' zhig shi na de'i nor dang yo byad mur 'dug dang rgyal po ma gtogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/gsol bas [#]bsngos
[\[251a.4\]]te thob pa la ma yin no/_/dge slong shi ba'i nor la [#]dge 'dun gyi gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyi [#]sngags kyis rtog pa las dge slong 'ga' zhig mtshams kyi phyi rol du song na mi dbang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi las shig la song na brtag pa ma slebs kyang dbang ngo /_/gsol ba dang zhu
[\[251a.5\]]ba'i las dge slong 'gron [#]pos kyang dbang ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma yang ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma zhes bya ba ni [#]mdo 'og nas 'chad pa yin no/_/de las 'ga' tsam dge 'dun las rgan po dang gsar bu byin na'o zhes der gsungs so/_/dge slong shi ba'i nor las gnas brtan gcig
[\[251a.6\]]dang tse lu tha ma na 'dug pa gcig dang gnyis la sman tam [#]nor chung shas yan chad ci'ang rung ste sna re zhig byin na mtshams des chod pas na phyi nas 'ong ba [#]mi dbang ngo /_/gang nas bsngo ba yod pa de'i mtshams kyi nang du bsngos pa'o/_/dge slong gcig cig gi nor gtsug lag khang
[\[251a.7\]]gzhan zhig na gtams te bzhag pa las dge slong de shi bar gyur na dge slong de gnas [#]gnas pa'i dge slong mi dbang gi nor gang na gzhag gzhag pa'i dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis brtags na gos 'dug 'dug [#]pa'i dge 'dun de rnams dbang ngo /_/'di [#]shi ba'i
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]gnas su zhes pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/ltag ma ltar dge slong shi ba'i nor dge 'dun grogs po na re nor bzhag pa'i mtshams mi brtsan [#]gyi dge slong nyid nged kyi mtshams su shi ba yin gyis nor nged dbang gis byin cig ces zer zhing len du mi dbang ngo /_/mtshams kyi bar na 'dug pa lus
