[\[251b.2\]]la chags pa'am gzhan yang ji snyed du chud pa de gtogs so/_/gtsug lag khang du ma zhig gi bar na [#]dge slong gcig shi na gtsug lag khang dang nye ba'i dge 'dun dge slong shi ba de'i nor dbang ngo /_/nye ring med na lus gang ni mgo gang logs su lta ba'i dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/lus
[\[251b.3\]]dang bral bar 'dug pa'i nor ni ro nas gtsug lag khang gi phyogs na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun de dbang ngo /_/gtams pa la na de'i yo byad gang na'ang rung ste der chud do/_/dge slong shi ba'i nor khyim pa la gtams pa zhig yod na khyim pa de dang gang gi dge 'dun dang phrad cing zin pa de'i
[\[251b.4\]]dge slong dbang ba la'ang bya/_khyim pa de dang dge 'dun [#]du nye ba'i dge 'dun dbang pa la'ang bya/_gtams pas dngos po gzhan du gzhag pa bsngo'o/_/dge slong shi ba'i rdzas khyim pa la gtams pa las khyim pa de lha khang du 'ongs kyang rung bkug kyang rung ste mngon sum du 'phrad [#]de
[\[251b.5\]]bsgom na nor bgo ba'i sngags [#]byas pa yin te dge 'dun gzhan mi dbang ngo /_/bskur ba las byin pas ma spangs [#]na de'i yin no/_/dge slong gcig la nor zhig bskur pa las nor 'ongs te mi 'dod ces ma byas par dge slong de shi na nor de shi ba'i phyogs kyi dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/spangs
[\[251b.6\]]na bskur ba'i'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar nor [#]bskur te 'ongs pa las mi 'dod ces bya ba'i [#]'og tu shi na thog ma bskur bskur ba'i [#]dge slong de dbang ngo /_/des spangs [#]kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar mi 'dod ces byas te slar bskur ba las thog ma bskur bskur ba'i [#]dge slong de'ang mi 'dod ces
[\[251b.7\]]zer na de brtsan [#]te dge slong de dbang ngo /_/phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes te gcig pos bsngos te mi skye'o/_/dge slong shi ba'i nor la 'god pa la mtshams kyi nang de [#]dge slong kun la dad pa ma dris shing ma bsdus par dge slong kha cig gis khyad par bgo ba'i sngags byas pa
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bgo ba'i [#]sngags byas par mi chud de mi rung ngo /_/dbyung ba dang nan tan dang chos gos bstan pa dang sbyin pa'i gshegs pa ma byas par mi bsngo'o/_/dge slong shi ba'i ro [#]sgor ma phyung ngam ma bsregs sam ma sbas sam chur ma
[\[252a.2\]]bskur ba'i shi ba'i nor mi bgo_/shi ba'i ro sbas zin nas bgo ba'i sngags byas te gdod shi ba'i nor bgo'o/_/lhung bzed dang chos gos khyim gnas kyi khyim du na khyim bdag gang [#]gis byin pa dbang ngo /_/lhung bzed dang chos gos khyim pa la gtams pa las dge slong
[\[252a.3\]]shi ste khyim pa des khyer te 'ongs na [#]dge slong su dang 'phrad [#]pa blangs te khyer yang nyes med do/_/gtams shing 'dug pa thos na [#]bdag gis blangs te khyer yang nyes med do/_/de ste rigs na'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar khyer kyang [#]nyes med pa ni dge slong ma dang chad pa yod pa'i dge
[\[252a.4\]]slong ni mi dbang ste blang bar mi rigs so/_/phongs te des so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar blangs kyang nyes med pa ni dge slong phongs shing mi bdog pas blangs shing khyer yang nyes med do/_/mi ster ba la blangs pas so/_/dge slong shi ba'i nor khyim pa la gtams shing 'dug pa las
[\[252a.5\]]dge slong phongs pas [#]blangs te byin na ni nyes med do/_/mi ster bzhin du mthus blangs na nyes byas/_rim gyis [#]na thog ma'i'o/_/shi ba'i nor gtams shing 'dug pa len du dbang ba dge slong ma zhig len du 'ongs te kha 'dom na kha gang snga ba dbang ngo /_/med dam ma bsngos par bor na [#]song ba'i'o/_/dge
[\[252a.6\]]slong shi ba'i nor khyim pa la gtams shing 'dug pa khyim pas bor zhing 'dug pa la dge slong gis mthong na bdag phongs [#]na bdag gis [#]khyer cig_/ma phongs na ma len cig_/dge 'dun spyir dbul bar bsams te blangs pa ni nyes med do/_/de bzhin rims su'o/_/mdo
[\[252a.7\]]ltag ma ltar dge slong shi ba'i nor la dge slong phongs pa mang zhing 'dod de len na gang mgyogs pa dbang ngo /_/nor chags par gyur na de la btang ba shi ba'i yo byad las de'i tshad du sbyin/_dge slong shi ba de la gzhan gyi bu lon chags pa zhig yod na shi ba'i nor las ci chags pa byin
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]la lhag ma las bgo_/bgos kyang ngo /_/shi ba'i nor bgos zin pa'i 'og tu shi ba la bu lon chags te ded [#]du 'ongs na yang bgos pa kun slar bsdus te ci chags pa sbyin no/_/gang de dang lhan cig tu 'thams pa de la sbyin na ma blang /_dge slong shi ba de dang khyim pa zhig tu 'thams [#]te khyim
[\[252b.2\]]pa'i nor ni sngar blangs kyi rin ma byin pa zhig yod na'ang 'thams pa'i tshig bzhin du rin bcal zhing sbyin no/_/rin bcal du med na'ang kho'i nor dngos slar sbyin no/_/des ni ma yin no/_/dge slong shi ba da [#]las shig byed du bcug ste slas sbyin par byas pa zhig yod na'ang shi ba dang
[\[252b.3\]]'thams pa bzhin du gla sbyin nor dngos kyang blang ngo /_/'di tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la chags [#]par mi 'gyur[#]/_dge slong shi ba la gzhan gyi bu lon zhig chags te shi ba'i nor kun bcal [#]kyang ma 'khor [#]ba ni ma 'khor [#]du zad tshangs par [#]byin kyang nyes med do/_/dkon mchog
[\[252b.4\]]gi blangs te yod na de ji rnyed [#]pa de rnyed las sar [#]pa las bsnyams te bgo_/dge slong shi ba de la gzhan zhig gis zong phog ste las byed du bcug pa las ma byas sam rkyen chad du lus na yang shi ba'i nor las ci chog pa spangs te gzhag pa la lhag ma bgo_/nad pa'i g.yog dang
[\[252b.5\]]bcas na de 'thob pa'i yo byad drug la mi bsngo/_/dge slong shi ba'i nad g.yog byed byed pa ni shi ba'i [#]nor bgo ba'i skal ba la [#]ma gtogs par chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed dang chu tshags dang gding ba drug dbang ngo /_/rab dang 'bring dang mtha' mar bcas pa'o/_/dge slong shi
[\[252b.6\]]ba [#]de la chos gos dang lhung bzed dang gding ba mang po zhig yod na thams cad bzang po las mi dbang ste bzang ngan spel la pham rgyal med par drug sbyin no/_/du ma na de'i spyi'o/_/nad g.yog mang po zhig yod na'ang grangs mang du lhag par mi dbang gi drug las spyir bgo'o/_/
[\[252b.7\]]nad pa shi nas de'i phyir song na sbyin/_nad pa shi ba'i tshe nad g.yog rang don la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'phyan du song na yo byad drug dang shi ba'i nor skal la mi dbang ngo /_/nad pa'i don la song ba ni dbang ngo /_/'di la shi ba'i nor mi rigs so/_/de nad g.yog dge slong ma dang dge
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]slong chad pa bcad pa zhig byed [#]byed pa ni yo byad drug las mi dbang ngo /_/gzhan tshul du zhugs pa la ma [#]yin no/_/dge slong gtsug lag khang gzhan du tshul du zhugs pa zhig gis nad g.yog byas na'ang yo byad drug dang shi ba'i nor skal dbang ngo /_/'di
[\[253a.2\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad la'ang rigs so/_/nad g.yog dge slong zhig byed byed na'ang shi ba'i nor skal la thang dge slong gi [#]thang bzhin du dbang /_yo byad drug kyang dbang ngo /_/nad pas byin cig ces smras pa la [#]phrin ji ltar smras pa ltar bya'o/_/dge slong shi ba des kha chems
[\[253a.3\]]bzhag ste nor byin cig ces smras pa zhig yod pa las nad g.yog la sogs pas ma byin na nor 'god pa'i tshe smras la kha chems bzhin du so sor sbyin no/_/dbang med pa ni shi ba na 'di la shi ba dag gi nor sgrubs shig ce [#]na'o/_/nad pa'i kha chems la nga shi na mi 'di nor 'di
[\[253a.4\]]tsam zhig byin cig ces [#]zer ba ni kha chems mi btsan te spyir bgo'o/_/kha chems ltag nas byung ba ni ma shi'ang sbyin par chad pa la bya/_'di ni shi na gdod byin [#]gyi ma shi na mi sbyin par byas pa la bya/_dbang ba ni khyim pa'i'o/_/khyim pa zhig shi ba'i nor dge 'dun dang dge slong
[\[253a.5\]]la phul cig ces kha chems gzhag pa ni blangs kyang nyes med do/_/phul nas khyim pa shi na khye'u dang chung ma ni ci bder bya/_khyim pas nad pa'i kha chems kyis skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa mi phul ba ni bkol [#]du btang ngo /_/ba lang dang rta dang rnga mo dang bong bu dang dre'u dang
[\[253a.6\]]go cha dag rgyal po la phul[#]/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams yon du phul ba ni rgyal po la sbyin no/_/mtshon cha ni mi sbyin no/_/gsum la dbyig dang gser dang gzhan dang byas pa dang ma byas pa'o/_/rin po che dag kyang ngo /_/dbyig dang gser dang [#]dngul la sogs pa rin po che phul ba
[\[253a.7\]]ni sum cha gcig sangs rgyas la dbul/_sum cha gcig chos la dbul/_sum cha gcig dge 'dun la dbul lo/_/rgyal po ma byin na pham par yang 'gyur ro/_/'on te gzhan yod dam de'i cha las lhag kyang ngam de ste ma yin kyang de bzhin du sangs rgyas la ni mu tig dag go/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]khyim pas nor [#]phul ba de la nor gzhan dang mu tig 'dres sam mu tig 'ba' zhig yod kyang rung ste rin thang brtsis [#]te mu tig rnams ni sangs rgyas la dbul lo/_/ma phul na sbom por kyang 'gyur ro/_/tshon chen po yang ngo /_/tshon chen po brgyad du gtogs pa zhig phul
[\[253b.2\]]na'ang dge slong gis spyad du mi rung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la dbul lo/_/btags te dri [#]gtsang khang skyang nul byug_/sangs rgyas la mu tig dang tshon chen po phul na bsres te btags la sangs rgyas kyi dri gtsang khang gi ri mo dang skyang nul du byug_/de las gzhan sangs rgyas kyi ni
[\[253b.3\]]gzugs dang dri gtsang khang dang mchod rten gyi yo byad du bsgo[#]/_/nor bu rin po che la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas [#]kyi sku gzugs kyi rgyan nam [#]btsongs la gzugs dang mchod rten du brtsig[# ]/chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig bri ba dang seng ge'i khri'o/_/chos kyi skal bar phul ba rnams ni
[\[253b.4\]]chos kyi yi ge bri ba dang yi ge klag [#]pa'i khri la sogs pa bya/_theg pa ni gzugs la'o/_/khyogs dang shing rta la sogs pa phul ba'i yul bskor ba'i gzugs bzhag pa'i phyir sku gzugs la dbul lo/_/rgyal mtshan la de'i 'od ma dang yu ba dag de la rigs pa'o/_/shing ring
[\[253b.5\]]po dang 'od ma phul ba ni 'phen [#]shing dang rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba bya'o/_/gzhan dang lag cha dag ni dge 'dun la'o/_/shing thung ngu dang lag cha la sogs pa ni dge 'dun la dbul te spyi ltar spyad pa'i thabs ni 'og nas 'chad/_'khar gsil dang khab dang mtshon du byas te de dag
[\[253b.6\]]brim [#]lcags sam/_mtshon cha ni khab dang 'khar gsil dang gri la sogs pa bya ste dge 'dun la brim[#]/_gzhan dge 'dun gyi ni gzhag pa dang mchod rten [#]dang bgo ba ci rigs pa'o[#]/_/dge 'dun la phul ba'i nor la kha cig ni gzhag kha cig ni so sor bgo_/kha cig ni mchod
[\[253b.7\]]rten [#]dang 'di rnams gsum du sbyar te/_gang bzhag cing bgo ba ni 'og nas 'chad/_zhing dang khyim dang tshong dus dang /_mal stan dang mgar pa'i dang lcags kyi dang skra 'dreg gi dang /_rdza mkhan gyi dang /_shing mkhan gyi dang /_re lde mkhan dag gi yo byad dang bran mo dang
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]las byed pa dang /_mi lhag ma [#]dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_ra lug dang /_sman dang /_sangs rgyas kyis [#]bstan pa'i glegs bam dang /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni dge 'dun gyi spyir spyad cing bkol ba yin pas mi bgo bar gzhag go_/
[\[254a.2\]]myur du brim [#]par ma bsgrub [#]pa ni snga mar rigs so/_/khyim pa de gud du bu lon chags te [#]dpang rgya phul nas dpang rgya 'di dos shig ces zer na'ang blangs te bzhag pa la bya/_ras yug chen dang re'u ras dang lham bol med dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_yungs mar gyi
[\[254a.3\]]'brag dang /_bum bu dang ril ba spyi lugs dang /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni 'phral du dgos te spyad pa la [#]bya/_gzhan gyi glegs bam dang /_mur 'dug gi yi ge tar ka dang byA ka ra Na [#]la bya/_yi ge dang /_sman dpyad kyi yi ge la'ang bya bu lon 'phral du khugs [#]pa'i dpang
[\[254a.4\]]rgya'ang [#]bya/_kha dog dag ni gos btsos pa'i tshon rtsi la bya/_gnyis su'o/_/gsum gyir ni 'bras dang nas dang /_til dang bal sran dang dam pa ma yin pa 'bras dag ni zas dang skom du'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni mchod ston du bya zhing spyad do/_/gos kyi dngos po'o//_//
[\[254a.5\]]leb leb po dang leb leb [#]po'i phyed du mnyam par bya/_chos gos kyi tshal bu ring thung du 'dug pa la [#]ring po'i phyed kyi tshad du thung du bya'o/_/bcal [#]ba'i phyir chag shing bcang /_ka sha drub pa'i tshal bu bcal [#]ba'i phyir chag shing bcangs kyang nyes med do[#]/_/'dab
[\[254a.6\]]ma'i dngos po yang [#]ngo /_/tshal bu snol ma chur 'gro ba dang zheng du 'gro ba dang tha ma bskor [#]ba zheng tshad che chung ma khyer bar mnyam par bya/_de tsam du chag shing bcang /_tshal bu'i zheng tshad kyi chag shing yang bcang /_'di'i mtha' ni rab tu chen sor bzhi'o/_/tshal bu'i sne snol
[\[254a.7\]]du 'gro ba dang mtha' bskor ba'i zheng tshad ni sor bzhir bya'o/_/bya rog gi mtho yang ngo /_/tshal bu'i zheng tshad bya rog gi rkang pa'i tshad du byas kyang rung /_chung ngu ni phyed dang gsum pa'am mthe bo'i [#]ngos so/_/tshal bu chung ngu phyed dang gsum dang tshon gang du byas kyang
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]nyes med de zheng tshad/_sa la gos mi gding /_chos gos 'tshem [#]pa'i tshe gzhi med par mi gding /_gding ba de'i phyir bya/_chos gos sa la mi gzhag pa'i phyir gding ba bya/_shing gi'am smyig [#]ma'i las gru bzhir ro/_/gding ba bya ba [#]ni shing ngam smyig ma las gseg [#]bya/_
[\[254b.2\]]re lde dang spar las [#]byas kyang rung /_byas pa bcings pa'i [#]phyir srad bu'i skabs kyi phyir de bu gu zhes so/_/chos kyi 'og tu gding ba gru bzhi la tha ma gru bzhir bu gu phug ste brgyangs la btsems kyang nyes med do/_/chos gos ci tsam par ro/_/chos gos kyi 'og tu gding ba
[\[254b.3\]]bya ba'i tshad ni chos gos ji tsam pa dang mnyam par bya/_mtshon gyis dra/_chos gos dra ba ni mtshon gyis dras kyang nyes med de bcang /_gri bcangs kyang nyes med/_bya rog gi mchu lta bu'am bya gag gi sgro lta bur ro/_/gri'i gzugs ni 'di lta bu la bya/_lcags las gzhan
[\[254b.4\]]ma yin/_gri'i rgyu ni lcags las [#]bya/_yu ba tshon [#]gyis byugs pa ri mo dang nye ba'i ri mo can ma yin/_gri yu ba [#]ri mo can du mi bya/_sor drug gi tshad las lhag pa ma yin/_gri'i lcags nyi tshe ba [#]la sor drug las ring bar mi bya/_brgyad phan chad las ma yin no/_/'dul ba 'dzin pa
[\[254b.5\]]kha cig na re gri'i lcags las [#]sor brgyad tsam du bya'o zhes zer te gang ltar byas kyang nyes med/_sor bzhi dang chung na dgos pa yang med/_gri'i lcags sor bzhi man chad du byas na spyad du mi mkho ba'i phyir mi bya/_ba lang gi lci bas byugs par btsem/_chos gos 'tshem pa'i tshe
[\[254b.6\]]sa'i gzhi ba lang gi lci bas byugs pa'i steng du bya/_lci ba med na btab byugs te'o/_/sa snga [#]nas bskus pa med na 'phral la byugs te btsem/_de btsem/_chos gos dge slong gis btsems kyang nyes med/_khab kyis kyang ngo /_/chos gos btsem pa ni khab kyis bya'o/_/de
[\[254b.7\]]bcang /_khab bcangs kyang nyes med/_ra gan dang zangs dang khar [#]ba dang lcags kyis te [#]gzhan ma yin no/_/khab bya ba'i rgyu ni 'di rnams las bya'o/_/zangs sam lcags rnon po zhes gzhan la'o[#]/_/'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re zangs dang lcags gnyis las khab bya zhes zer
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]te gang las byas kyang nyes med/_de'i snod sbu [#]bu'am chang ba bcang ba/_khab ral ni phying bu dang ras ma dang smyig ma las [#]bya/_'di g.yel ba dang dge sbyong la dbang du mi bya/_khab ral dang dge sbyong dang dge slong khrims la g.yel ba la chud za bar gyur pa'i [#]
[\[255a.2\]]phyir mi gzhag_/sbrang rtsi'i tshigs [#]mas byugs te khab kyi lcags btsas mi khyer ba'i phyir ras ma bzhag dbyar ra da la spra tshil gyis bskus [#]la de'i nang du khab dril na mi stor cing btsa' mi 'jug go/_/mi snyil ba'i phyir chos gos la sgro gu gdags/_chos gos mi snyil ba'i phyir
[\[255a.3\]]sgro gu[#]/_sgrog mkhar btags te'o/_/chos gos sgrog mkhar gdab/_mdud pa yang ngo /_/sgro gu mdud pa can du bya/_btso blag [#]pas btsos kyang rung ma btsos kyang rung mi bkru/_chos gos kha dog bsgyur kyang rung drag tu 'drub [#]pa'i phyir btso blag mkhan mi bcol/_de bzhin
[\[255a.4\]]du bdag gis kyang ma yin no/_/chos gos bdag gis kyang mi brdung /_de'i gding bar ma yin/_/btso [#]blag mkhan gyi ras brdung ba'i spyad kyi steng du mi gzhag_/shing leb la ma yin/[# ]shing leb kyi steng du yang chos gos bkru zhing mi brdung tshon mkhan gyi shing leb la bya/_
[\[255a.5\]]rdza 'jam por bkrus te chu 'debs dal gyis so/_/chos gos bkru ba ni chu 'jam tsam gyi nang du dal gyis dge slong nyid kyis bkru lag pa dag gis bzlog[# ]/'khru ba'i tshe lag pas dal gyis bkru/_mi nus na rkang pas so/_/lag pas bkru mi nus na rkang pas bkrus kyang nyes med/_
[\[255a.6\]]de ltar bkru [#]na khyim bdag gis kyang btags [#]so/_/lag pas bkrus [#]na chos gos khyim pa 'khrur bcug kyang nyes med/_gzhan du spyod na de bsrung /_khyim pa chos gos 'khrur gzhug pa ni bdag gis spyan byas la mngon sum du 'khrur gzhug gi lkog tu 'khrur ma [#]btang /_
[\[255a.7\]]rab tu dag rab tu btsems rab tu btsos pa'i phyag dar kud pa blang /_tshem bu phyag dar kud pa las sdud cing gos su byed na rab tu bkrus shing btsos la btsems la gos bya/_mi gtsang bas reg pa'i gos ma yin/_tshem bu bsdu ba ni stu khrag dang gcin rkyag [#]la sogs
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]pas reg pa'i rdzas blangs shing mi spyad/_skab [#]pa mdzes pa'i phyir bskus te kha dog nyi grib la'o[#]/_/chos gos 'tshed pa ni tshon gyis btsos la bar 'ga' nyi ma la gzhag_/bar 'ga' grib ma la bzhag na kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro/_/ma byas kyang nyes med/_gos med
[\[255b.2\]]par btso/_tshon rtsi sngar btsos la de nas gos [#]btso/_/gsum gyi bar du ni mchog tu'o/_/tshon rtsi btso ba ni lan gsum gyi bar du bldabs [#]te btsos pa'i khu ba ni mchog go_/de bas na mang pa'i phyir na gsum blang /_ltag tu lan gsum du btso ba ni khu ba mang du bya ba'i
[\[255b.3\]]phyir te bzang ngan rab gsum du dbyung ngo /_/phyir zhing 'bri/_lan gsum du btsos pa dang po ni bzang po bar ma ni 'bring po tha ma ni ngan to/_/de bas na so sor gzhag go_/tshon bzang ngan ni [#]rnam gsum mi bsre bar so sor gzhag go_/de ni snga ma'o la sogs par bri/_tshon
[\[255b.4\]]bzang ngan [#]rnam gsum nor cing 'khrul te mi bde ba'i phyir snod la kha byang bri/_snga ma ni thog mar bsko[#]/_/'tshed pa'i tshe na tshon dang por phyung [#]ba'i khu ba ni bzang pos thog mar btso/_/chos gos dang bcag tshon gyi nang du chos gos bcug pa'i tshe ra ri ma khyer bar legs par
[\[255b.5\]]bcag_/de bas na blangs te leb leb po la de tsam gyi thang gis sbyin/_ras ci tsam yod pa las tshon gyi khu [#]ba ran par bya'i mang [#]nyung du mi bya'o/_/gsher ba gzag go_/tshon gyi khu ba mang [#]na zag par 'gyur/_rab tu bskams na 'bri'o/_/tshon gyi khu ba nyung [#]na kha dog mi
[\[255b.6\]]'gyur zhing skam por 'gyur ro/_/de bas na ran par bya'o/_/mdo ltag ma rnams ltar ches na mi dge ba'i phyir ran par bya/_dgon pa'i la bskams na dge bres pa la'o/_/chos gos bskam [#]pa ni thag bu bres la bskam mo/_/mtha' btags [#]te gzugs so/_/chos gos
[\[255b.7\]]thag bu la brgyangs pa ni shing bu kha brag 'dzin du gzhug [#]go_/mi thub na rtswa bting ste'o/_/shing bu kha brag gis mi thub cing 'chor na rtswa dang lo ma bkram la de'i steng du skam du ma'i phyogs su tshon 'gro ba'i phyir yang yang du bzlog_/thag bu brgyangs te skam pa de tshon rtsi phyogs
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gcig tu 'gro ba'i phyir yang thog ma [#]dang ma thog bsnor/_gsar [#]pa la tshon gsar [#]pas de bzhin du dge'o/_/chos gos gsar [#]pa zhig 'tshed [#]na tshon rtsis gsar [#]du bldabs pas btsos na [#]dge_/rnying pa la rnying [#]pas so/_/chos gos rnying pa na
[\[256a.2\]]tshon rtsi rnying pas btso/_/gsar pa ni [#]nyi ma la bskam/_gos gsar [#]pa zhig btsos na nyi ma la bskam/_rnying pa ni grib ma la'o/_/chos gos rnying pa ni grib ma la bskam/_chu thang gis mi 'bri [#]ba'i phyir sbyin/_chos gos tshon gyi nang du lan du btsos pa bzhin du chur bkru/_gzhan
[\[256a.3\]]gyi nyin mo la'o/_/btsos nas chur [#]gzhug pa ni bar zhag gis bcad la bkru/_phyi'i khyams sam 'chag [#]sar btso ba'i las mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi 'chag [#]sa dang khyams la sogs par chos gos btso ba'i las mi bya/_gtsug lag khang du ma yin/_gtsug lag
[\[256a.4\]]khang gi nang du gos btso ba'i las mi bya/_de'i steng du bya/_gos 'tshed pa gtsug lag khang gi [#]yang thog tu chos gos btso ba'i las byas kyang rung /_bshang khang gi 'khor du ma yin/_bshang gci'i sar chos gos kyi las mi bya/_de'i phyogs su byug [#]pa sbyin/_chos
[\[256a.5\]]gos 'tshed pa'i las gar byed pa'i sar rdul mi 'go ba'i phyir 'ji ba dang lci bas bsku zhing byug_/de ste rdo rjes [#]byugs pa na bkru_/'og gzhi skyang nul bzang po 'tsher ba [#]zhig na chus bkru bas chog go_/de ste brtsams pa las rlung ngam char bab pa 'ong [#]na khyams su bya/_
[\[256a.6\]]chos gos [#]btso bar bsams shing mgo btsugs pa las rlung dang char pa la sogs pa [#]byung na khyams su btso blag byas [#]kyang rung byas nas de'i phyogs su byug pa bya/_khyams su btso blags [#]byas zin pa'i 'og tu maN+Dal bya/_lci [#]ba'am sas so/_/maN+Dal bya ba ni lci ba'am
[\[256a.7\]]sas [#]byug cing bsku/_brtag pa ma byas par bcag pa dang bzlas pa'i chos gos spyad par mi bya/_chos gos brdungs shing gnigs pa kha dog 'tsher ba ni ma btags [#]pa yin te spyad cing bgo bar mi bya/_byug [#]pa gogs na de btags [#]pa'o/_/chos gos kha dog 'tsher
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]ba byed cing med par byas na btags [#]pa yin te bgos kyang nyes med do/_/chus brlan na'o/_/kha dog 'tsher bar byas na chus brlan par byas na [#]nyes par 'gyur ro/_/ba mo la sbags pa sla [#]ba'i sa lag pas ma nyes te gogs [#]na'o/_/kha dog 'tsher ba ba mo'am zil ba la
[\[256b.2\]]gor la bsrubs [#]na med par 'gyur ro/_/sham thabs bgos nas steng du lus bcing /_lus la sham thabs bgo ba la steng du ska rags kyis bcing /_shur bu'am rgya cang [#]ngam lcag pod dam dra bas bcing /_sham thabs kyi ska rags kyi rgyu ni 'di rnams so/_/mi brgyan
[\[256b.3\]]pa ma yin pa ni pho sum pa dang nang du rub pa dang zur gsum [#]dang gser gyi srad bu'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi ska rags mi bcing /_ri mo yang de bzhin no/_/ska rags ri mo can gyis mi bcing mi bting [#]pa'i sa la mi gzhag_/chos gos gyon la stan [#]med par sa la
[\[256b.4\]]mi 'dug_/gding ba med par gzhag par yang mi bya/_mi gtsang ba'i phyogs su ma yin/_sa mi gtsang bar chos gos gzhag par mi bya stan mi gtsang ba la'ang mi gzhag mi 'dug_/thabs yod na khur lci ba mi bskya chos [#]gos gzan du bor zhing mi bskya/_gzhan
[\[256b.5\]]spyad [#]par mi spyad/_chos gos dang [#]sham thabs la sogs pa go bsnor cing mi bgo_/bshang gci bya ba dang mi gtsang ba phyag pa'i las su bla gos bgos te mi bya/_bshang gci byed pa dang sa phyag pa la sogs pa'i las byed par chos gos snam bdun pa gyon te mi
[\[256b.6\]]spyad[#]/_'di la mi nyal/_chos gos snam bdun pa'i 'og tu yang mi gding gyon bzhin du yang mi nyal/_bsod snyoms len pa spyod pa dang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dang dge 'dun la [#]'du ba dang chos mnyan pa'i cha mnod [#]pa myong ba las gzhan byed pa la sbyar mas ma yin/_ming
[\[256b.7\]]gis smos pa 'di rnams byed par chos gos chen po bgo ba'i las gzhan byed par mi bgo_/'di rnams la grong bar du ma gyon na nyes med do/_/'di'i steng du 'dug gam 'dug tu mi gzhug chos gos chen po 'di'i steng du [#]bdag kyang mi 'dug gzhan kyang mi gzhag_/'di
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]la mi gnad[#]/_chos gos chen po blta ba ste [#]lus sam lag pas mnan par mi bya/_bcug ste su la yang mi bsko/_/chos gos chen po'i nang du lan tshwa [#]dang me tog la sogs pa ci'ang rung ste bdag gis kyang mi blugs gzhan blugs su yang mi gzhug[# ]/
[\[257a.2\]]lus kyi reg par yang mi spyad lag pa ma gtogs par lus kyis reg par mi bya/_mchan khung g.yas pa'i dugs kyis 'di ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos gos lag pa g.yas pa'i mchan khung dang [#]dugs dang rngul gyis ma rung bar byed de thabs 'og nas 'chad/_de
[\[257a.3\]]mi 'gyur bar de'i phyogs su de la gos sbyin/_mchan khung g.yas pa'i thad kar dugs kyis ma rung bar [#]'gyur ba'i phyir dugs gzan [#]gud nas glan/_khru phyed dang do dang mtho gang ngo /_/rngul gzan gud nas glan pa'i tshad ni zheng du mtho gang chur khru phyed dang ngo /_/
[\[257a.4\]]ngos gnyis su nan bus mnan/_rngul gzan glan pa'i dus su [#]nan bus mnan/_dus dus su 'di bkru/_rngul gzan glan pa de dus dus su [#]bkru/_btso ba yang ngo /_/rngul gzan de bkrus nas btso/_/glang btsag gis [#]de de bzhin du'o/_/btso ba ni glang btsag gis [#]btsos kyang
[\[257a.5\]]rung ngo /_/gdong phyis bcang /_gdong phyis bcangs kyang nyes med/_lus zag na lus la phyi ba [#]yang ngo /_/dge slong sdig po che dugs dang rngul che ba lus kyi [#]phyi ba bcangs kyang nyes med/_chos gos de'i nang du de bgo'o/_/rngul che ba dang shu ba dang rnag khrag yod na chos
[\[257a.6\]]gos kyi 'og tu rnag gzan [#]bgo_/chags na gro'i [#]chu'am tshig pa chu dang bsres te byugs la dal bu dal bus [#]dgog_/rnag gzan [#]dang lus su 'byar na nas kyi phye dang so phag btags [#]pa'i phye chu dang sbyar te bkrus la dal bus dgog go[# ]/rnag dang khrag la yang ngo /_/rnag dang khrag la
[\[257a.7\]]rnag gzan [#]'byar na dgog pa'i thabs gong ma ltar bya/_dus dus su gding [#]bkru bskam btso/_de [#]glang btsag gis na dge_/rnag gzan [#]btso ba na shu ba la phan pa'i phyir glang [#]btsag gis bskus na dge_/gar bab bab tu [#]gos mi gzhag_/gos lhag ma [#]la sogs
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa gar bab bab tu mi gzhag gi bltab cing nan tan [#]bya/_de'i phyir gdang bca'/_gos dgal [#]ba'i phyir gdang bca'/_lung bu yang de'i phyir ro/_/gdang [#]shing gzhug pa'i gnas rtsig pa la bu gu gtod de shing sbu bu [#]can gzhug_/gtsug lag khang byed pa na'o/_/
[\[257b.2\]]gdang shing [#]bu gu gdod pa thog ma gtsug lag khang brtsig pa nas bya/_bu gu mi bya/_gdang shing gis 'phral bu gu mi gdod/_gtsug lag khang ni dpe ste khang bu yang de bzhin no/_/gdang shing gi [#]bya ba dang bu gu mi brko gtsug lag khang bzhin du gang zag gi khyim bu [#]
[\[257b.3\]]yang mi brko zhing thog ma nas gdod/_lcug ma dang thag bus 'di 'grub bo/_/gdang shing gi skyin par lcug ma'am thag bu btags [#]kyang rung ngo /_/tshang thur gyis gos blangs na dge'o/_/chos gos kyi snod tshang thur gyi nang du bcug na dge_/'di bya/_tshang thur byas
[\[257b.4\]]kyang nyes med/_gsum dang phyed dang dor sbyar te btsem/_tshang thur gyi tshad ni chur khru gsum zheng khru phyed dang do bya/_kha dbus su gdod/_sgrog bu sbyin/_tshang thur gyi kha mi bya ba'i phyir sgrog bu bya srad bus so/_/sgrog pa'i rgyu srad bu las [#]bya/_gzhan gyis bcing /_tshang
[\[257b.5\]]thur gyi kha gcad [#]pa'i phyir sgro gu gcig gi mig tu gcig bcug ste lu gu rgyud du btsem/_bcad [#]pa ni steng du bca'/_chos gos rtag tu dbyung /_dgos na tshang thur gyi kha logs su gzhug_/sang [#]'gro na bla ma la gsol te gnang na 'gro/_/dge slong gnas bca'
[\[257b.6\]]ba zhig gud du 'gro na gnas brtan la sang 'gro'o zhes zhu/_gnas mi bca' ba zhig na'ang grogs la 'gro'o zhes shes par bya/_bdag gi gnas su chag chag la sogs pa byas te'o/_/dge slong gud du 'gro na bdag 'dug 'dug pa'i gnas phyag dar dang chag chag
[\[257b.7\]]la sogs pa byas te 'gro/_lam du 'gro bas chos kyi gtam mam bsrings [#]pa'i mi smra bas so/_/lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe gtam cal [#]col mi smra ba'i [#]chos kyi gtam mam chos kyi don la bsam/_ngal bso ba'i gnas nas zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]bklags te'o/_/lam na ngal bso ba las langs pa'i tshe zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bklags [#]te 'gro/_/chu bcu ba na [#]yang ngo /_/chu bcu ba'i tshe'ang zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bshad/_de'i chu gang gi ba de'i phyir ro/_/chu bcu ba'i tshe
[\[258a.2\]]tshigs su bcad pa bklags pa [#]ni khron pa'am yur [#]ba 'dren 'dren pa'i mi de nyid kyi phyir bsngo/_/'bab chu'i rgyal po la bsngo[#]/_gzhan lha la yang ngo /_/chu'i lha la tshigs su bcad pa gcig bklags/_gnas su gsum [#]rgyud do/_/lam du zhag lon na nang par gsum [#]rgyud bklags
[\[258a.3\]]te 'gro/_dgon pa pa'i bcang /_dgon pa bas chu bcu ba'i srad bu bcangs kyang nyes med/_de'i tshad ni khru brgya lnga bcu nas brgya yan chad do/_/chu bcu ba'i thag bu'i tshad ni khru brgya lnga bcu man chad brgya yan chad du bya'o/_/yul gyi rnams las so zhes gzhan las so/_/'dul
[\[258a.4\]]ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re chu bcu ba'i thag bu khron pa ring thung tshad bzhin du bcangs pas chog go zhes kyang bshad/_khron pa ma yin pa'i chu dkon na 'di med par yul rgyu ba mi spyad/_'bab chu med de khron pa 'ba' zhig yod na thag bu bcad dgos kyi khron pa med kyi 'bab [#]chu yod pa'i [#]
[\[258a.5\]]yul du ni thag bu bcangs kyang [#]nyes med/_lam pas chos gos sprugs [#]la khrus byas pa'am rkang lag bkru ba dang chu blangs nas/_lam du zhugs te song song ba las gtsug lag khang zhig tu 'gro na chos gos la sogs pa sprugs lus kyi dri ma yod na khrus byas la khrus ma nus
[\[258a.6\]]na'ang yan lag lnga bkrus te maN+Dal bya ba'i chu dag blangs te btags [#]la lham phyi ste lham la rdul med par chus phyis ste[#]/_chos gos gsum bgo ste/_gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe chos gos gsum [#]bgo ste/_zhi ba'i spyod yul gyis gtsug lag khang du 'jug_/mgo sgyur
[\[258a.7\]]dang lag brgyangs mi bya bar gtsug lag khang du 'gro/_rgan po bzhi la phyag 'tshal te 'greng /_gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas lo grangs ma dris kyi bar du dge slong pa'i [#]dge 'dun du langs [#]pa la phyag byas te 'greng la bsdad/_gsang [#]ba'i phyogs su sgra bskyungs [#]te mdzes shing
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rab tu bsdam [#]pa'i spyod pas so/_/'grengs te [#]'dug pa ni kun gyis mthong zhing gsal ba'i phyogs su sgra bskyungs la mdzes shing tshul bsdams te gtogs 'dod dang shes 'dod mi bya bar 'dug go_/rgyus [#]dang bcas pas ngal bso/_/mi shes par ngal mi bso/_gud nas
[\[258b.2\]]dge slong zhig 'ongs na 'dug pas mkhan po dang slob dpon la sogs pa'i rgyus shes shing ngo shes na ngal sor gzhug_/rgyus dang ngo mi shes na ngal sor mi gzhug_/mu gcig pa yang ngo /_/mur 'dug ngo shes shing g.yo mi byed pa zhig 'ongs na'ang ngal sor gzhug_/sgo gcad/_
[\[258b.3\]]slong na mi sbyin/_dge slong ngo mi shes pa zhig gud nas 'ongs pa zhig yod na thug [#]thub byed pa'i phyi sgo chod cig ces gdams/_gud nas 'ongs pa [#]kha su'ang srid kyis nga na re byin cig ces zer zhing 'ongs [#]na'ang ma sbyin cig ces bsgo/_/blangs nas zo cig ces bsgo [#]nas/_gud nas
[\[258b.4\]]'ongs pa'i dge slong de rdzas dag las thug [#]thub tu spyod na ma spyod par zhog shig ces bsgo/_/khas blangs te yal bar btang nas stor na/_grogs la [#]sgo chod cig rdzas dag slong na [#]ma sbyin cig ces gtams te bzhag nas khas blangs pa las stor bar gyur na dge slong khas len
[\[258b.5\]]pa la skyin pa dbab bo/_/yid brtan pa'i gnas brtan 'di dag gi grogs po zhes pa la sogs pa bstan nas sbyin du gzhug_/tshig lhag [#]ma skad du grogs la gtams te gud nas 'ongs pa thug [#]thub byed cing rku yang srid kyis sgo chod cig_/rdzas dag len du ma gzhug cig ces bsgo ba
[\[258b.6\]]las grogs de na re mi 'di'i rgyus ngas shes te thug [#]thub la sogs pa mi byed kyi yid rton [#]cig ces zer te/_bdag gud du song ba'i 'og tu rdzas shig stor na dge slong grogs de la skyin [#]pa dbab bo/_/mngon rtags kyi gnas gzhan gyis mi rig pa'i bye brag gi thabs kyis so/_/
[\[258b.7\]]dge slong gud nas 'ongs shing rgyus mi shes pa bdag gi grogs pos nor 'di byin gyis long zhig ces zer zhing dan rtags kyi tshig [#]khyer zhing len du 'ongs na bdag dang gnyis su 'khod pa'i dan rtags shig_/khyer te 'ongs na ni byin kyang nyes med/_gzhan zhig dang gsum
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'khod [#]pa'i dan rtags shig khyer te 'ongs pa ni mi sbyin no/_/byin pa las lhung na yang ngo /_/rdzas shig phar byin pa las zin tam zhes ma [#]dris par bar du lhung ste chag na skyin [#]pa bdag la 'bab po/_/de ste ma bzung bar gtams [#]na'o/_/rdzas phar byin te zin tam
[\[259a.2\]]zhes dris pa las zin to zhes zer ba'i 'og tu shor te chag na skyin [#]pa pha rol po la 'bab [#]bo/_/'di la bag med par ma gyur tam zhes 'dri ba la bya/_snod spyad dam rdzas mi gzhan gyi lag tu sbyin na zin tam ma zin ces dris la sbyin ma dris par byin te btang na nyes byas/_brnyas pa la
[\[259a.3\]]sogs pa dag gis ma rung bar [#]gyur na bkru ba la sogs pas sems mi rangs na rin sbyin/_nor zhig brnyas te spyod spyod pa las slar byin na ngan skyugs kyis reg gam kha dog la sogs pa nyams te/_ma 'dod na bcos shing byi dor byas la sbyin no/_/bcos te byin kyang ma 'dod na nor
[\[259a.4\]]de ci ri ba rin du byas te sbyin no/_/lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs/_dge slong ngo shes pa yon tan dang ldan pa zhig 'ongs na bsu zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos bdag gis blang /_stan gding /_bsu nas [#]stan bting ste gzhag_/rkang pa bkru bar spyan drangs[#]/_gud nas 'ongs pa'i dge
[\[259a.5\]]slong rkang pa bkru zhing mdongs gsol [#]bya/_chus so/_/mi skom mam zhes dris la chu blugs[#]/_phyag bya/_lo grangs dris te rgan na phyag bya/_bde bar spyad dam zhes dri/_lam na nyon mongs pa med dam zhes nad dri [#]ci nus par mgu bar bya/_gud nas 'ongs pa la lus mnye ba dang mar gyis bsku
[\[259a.6\]]ba la sogs pas mgu bar bya/_mal stan tshul bzhin du byin[#]/_gud nas 'ongs pa rim pa ji tsam du chud pa bzhin mal [#]stan yang sbyin/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan [#]du 'gro_/gud nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong de gnas brtan gyi gan [#]du song la phyag bya'o/_/des de la gnas long
[\[259a.7\]]shig ces bsgo/_gnas brtan gyis kyang pha rol po 'ongs pa gnas btsal dgos pa zhig na gnas brtan gyis yon tan ldan pa 'di la gnas chos shig ces bsgo/_de ste rgan na mal stan [#]'di la byin gcig [#]ces bsgo/_gud nas 'ongs pa gnas bca' mi dgos pa zhig
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]na'ang mal stan tshul bzhin byin cig ces bsgo/_/ma brtags par mal [#]stan mi brnya gud nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis kyang gzhi la mal [#]stan yod dam med dam [#]ma brtags par mal stan mi brnya yod na gdod brnya/_chos gos kyi tha ma ma rung bar gyur na mtha' bskor ba'i thabs/_
[\[259b.2\]]chos gos kyi tha ma zegs sam ma rung bar gyur na mtha' bskor gyis glan/_de smyung kham gyis [#]sbyar/_mtha' bskor gyis sbyar ba ni btso zhing bkru ba la bde ba'i phyir skabs su gzungs gdab pa tsam du btsem/_ro'i gos 'chad na bla gab med pa dang shing gi steng du zhag bdun
[\[259b.3\]]brgyad dam lnga drug tu'ang gzhan las de bkrus nas kun dge slong dur khrod pa'i ro'i rdzas kyi bdag po yod dam med [#]brtags la med na blangs te shing ngam rtsig pa'i khar zhag bdun nam brgyad du gzhag la ro'i dri mi zhim pa med par gyur na bkrus te gos su bya'o/_/dur khrod
[\[259b.4\]]pa ma yin par [#]ro'i rdzas blangs pa ni len du mi dbang ste blangs na nyes byas so/_/gtsug lag khang dang grong du 'jug par spyan drangs pa las bdag dur khrod pa'o zhes smra ba ni ma btang bar spyod cig ce na bdag dur khrod pa'o zhes nas spyad/_dge slong dur khrod pa gtsug
[\[259b.5\]]lag khang dang khyim du mi 'gro'o/_/'gro na'ang sgo na bsdad do/_/bsdad pa las [#]spyan 'dren cing 'bod [#]pa na'ang dur khrod pa yin no zhes smros shig_/de skad smras pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa btsun pa khrod [#]btsog pa med nang [#]du bzhud stan la bzhugs zhes zer na nang du song zhing
[\[259b.6\]]stan la 'dug kyang nyes med do/_/de skad mi zer bar nang du [#]'gro zhing stan la 'dug par mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi mal stan la mi spyad/_dur khrod pa'i dge 'dun gyi stan la gzhag cing spyod du bcug na'ang mi spyad/_mchod rten las 'dom gyis mtha' spang [#]/_dge slong dur
[\[259b.7\]]khrod pas mchod rten la ma reg cing 'dom gang tsam nas bskor/_sbrang yab bcang /_sbrang ma [#]za na dge slong gis sbrang yab bcangs kyang nyes pa med do/_/[#]bal dang shan dang shing bal dang ras ma dang lo ma lhab [#]lhub pa'o/_/sbrang yab btsang ba'i rgyu bal las [#]skud par bkal ba
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dang shing gi lo ma g.yag rnga 'dra ba dang shing bal las [#]skud par bkal ba dang ras dang snam bu'i ras ma dang shing gi lo ma shad shad por 'dug pa dang /_'di rnams kyis [#]bya'o/_/ba lang dang rta dang ba lang gi spu'i [#]ma yin/_sbrang yab rta dang g.yag rnga la
[\[260a.2\]]sogs pa spu [#]byas pa'i sbrang yab mi bya/_gang zag gis [#]yu ba thams cad tshon rtsis ma yin/_sbrang yab dang seg cang [#]gi yu ba ri mo can mi bya/_ri mo med kyang kha dog 'tsher ba la'ang mi bya/_ri mo dang ri mo nyes pas [#]ma yin/_ci'ang rung ste ri mo can gyi rdzas mi spyad/_
[\[260a.3\]]sbrang bu'i khang bu yang ngo /_/sbrang ma za na ras kyi khang bu dbub/_steng bu [#]ras bting ste'o/_/khang bu'i steng du ras gding /_rgyug pa la bcings te'o/_/khang bu'i ras rgyug pa la bcing /_khru bzhi dang gnyis so/_/ras khang gi tshad ni zheng khru bzhir bya/_mtha' snam
[\[260a.4\]]bus bskor/_ras kyi khang pa'i glo'ang [#]ras kyis bskor cing g.yogs so[#]/_/khru bcu gnyis kyis so/_/khang bu'i glo ras kyis bskor ba ni chur khru bcu gnyis su bya'o/_/mnan pa dang bcas so/_/de mal stan gyi 'og tu mnan/_khang bu glor bskor ba'i ras kyi mtha' ma mal
[\[260a.5\]]'og tu chud par mnan/_sgo'i sgo yol bya/_ras khang gi sgo bcad pa'i phyir ras sne snol du gtang [#]bar bya/_tsha na rngul yab kyis thabs so/_/yul tsha na bsil yab kyis g.yabs kyang nyes med/_rngul yab bcang /_bsil yab bcangs kyang nyes med/_re lde mkhan gyis byas
[\[260a.6\]]pa la'ang ta la'i [#]'dab ma lta bu'o/_/bsil yab ni ta la'i [#]'dab ma'am smyug ma la gdags [#]par bya/_ri mo dang ri mo nyes pas [#]ma yin/_bsil yab ri mo can mi bya/_dge 'dun gyis na gzhan yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyis ni ri mo can spyad cing bcangs na [#]nyes med do/_/rtsid
[\[260a.7\]]pa'i rngul yab nor bu can byung na mchod rten la dbul/_rtsid pa'i rngul yab nor bu dang gser dngul gyis brgyan pa zhig rnyed na mchod rten la dbul lo/_/nyan thos kyi yang ngo /_/sbrang yab rgyan can nyan thos kyi mchod rten la phul na'ang nyes med/_chongs [#]shig_/be'u ras
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]dang sngas gru bzhi yang ngo /_/be'u ras dang sngas [#]bar tshangs can gang zag gis bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/bu dang chung ma rnyed na sbyin bdag gi dbang gis nan tan bya/_yon bdag bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir bu dang chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul na khos ci ltar bsngos
[\[260b.2\]]te phul ba bzhin du nan tan du spyad/_de ste slu bar gyur [#]na de ci tsam du 'dod [#]pa'i rin gyis so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar bu dang chung ma phul ba las slar slu [#]zhes zer na dge 'dun gyis rin thang mi bcad kyi kho bo [#]kha thabs bzhin du slu [#]sbyin/_yang phul yang [#]brtags pa'o/_/yon du phul
[\[260b.3\]]zin pa las bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i phyir slar ma bslus kyang lan du mar bslus [#]shing 'bul lo zhes zer zhing 'bul na'ang [#]mi rung ba med do/_/de ste shing phul ba'i rgyan dus mchod kyi tshe brgyan pa'i phyir gzhag_/bza' shing dang grib shing la dge 'dun 'du zhing spyod pa'i
[\[260b.4\]]phyir brgyan pa rgyan du phul na'ang phyis 'du ba'i tshe brgyan pa'i phyir gzhan du mi spyad [#]do/_/de steng [#]khang bu brtsig pa la ni [#]'bri ba'i phyir ro/_/khang bu'i rgyan dang rtsig pa'i ri mo bri ba'i phyir bsngos te phul na'ang gzhan du mi spyad pa de nyid du spyad do/_/de ste ma yin te ka ban las sar [#]par
[\[260b.5\]]ro/_/ka ba la bsngos te phul na'ang ka ba'i ri mo dang rnying pa brje ba'i phyir spyad do/_/sa la'o/_/sa la bsngos te phul na'ang gzhan du mi spyad de 'og nas 'chad do/_/me'i gnas su na 'bud pa bya/_me bud pa'i phyir phul na shing dang me mar la sogs par spyad do/_/snum 'thob [#]pa yang ngo /_/
[\[260b.6\]]me bud pa'i phyir phul ba las mi dgos sam lhag na khur ba la sogs par yang bya'o/_/lus bsku bar yang bya/_nad pa'i gnas su brtags par sman dang yo byad do/_/nad pa rnams la bsngos te phul na'ang rtsi sman du sbyar te sbyin no/_/zas kyi gnas su zas bya'o/_/tshang mang gi
[\[260b.7\]]gnas su phul ba'i rnams ni zas su bya zhing spyad do/_/skom gyir skom gyi gnas su'o/_/grung tshad du phul ba'i rnams ni skom du btung zhing spyad do/_/bsro gang gi gnas su bsro gang ngo /_/bsro gang du phul ba'i rnams ni bsro gang me bud pa la sogs pa sman dpyad du spyad
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]do/_/snum 'thob pa yang ngo /_/gong ma ltar bsro gang la yon phul ba me 'bud par mi dgos na dge 'dun gyi snum dang kha zas bsod pa'i rgyur bya/_snum 'thob pa'i gnas su zlum por yo byad kyi gnas so/_/dgun me 'bud pa'i khyim khang zlum du
[\[261a.2\]]yon phul ba ni shing dang lus dang rkang pa bsku [#]ba'i snum du bya/_dbyar yon du phul te me 'bud [#]mi dgos na lus la byug pa dang bshos kyi rgyur bya/_skyes pa'i rabs bri [#]ba yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi bkad sar yon phul te bkad pa'i [#]yo byad du spyad cing dgos pa [#]spyad kyang
[\[261a.3\]]lhag yod na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba dang bdud btul ba la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud bri/_phyi khyams dang 'chag sa dang sgo phugs dang khyams [#]su bgo_/phyi rol gyi khyams [#]dang sgo phugs dang 'chags sa [#]la sogs pa la bsngos te phul ba ni dge 'dun spyi'i [#]bgo_/
[\[261a.4\]]dbus kyang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang gi dbus kyi mthongs [#]su phul ba yang spyir bgo_/phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyir 'di gzhag go zhes kyang gzhan [#]las so/_/sgo phugs dang dbus kyi mthongs su phul ba la sogs pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la
[\[261a.5\]]bsngos te zhog shig ces kyang bshad do/_/dkon mchog gi phyir slong ba ni brtags [#]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir slong ba ni nyes med do/_/brjod pa yang ngo /_/dkon mchog gsum po la yon bdag yon 'bul ba'i tshe[#]/_yon bdag sems bskyed pa'i phyi stod
[\[261a.6\]]tra [#]bskyed kyang nyes med[#]/_blangs te'o/_/stod tra [#]bya ba ni sngar mi bya'i len pa'i tshe bya/_mthong ba'i phyir 'khor lo bya/_stod tra [#]bya ba ni dga' bar bya ba'i phyir kun gyis mthong bar sa mthon por 'dug ste bya'o/_/tsha'am rlung ngam char pa'i gnod pas mi reg pa'i phyir khang bu
[\[261a.7\]]brtsegs pa sgo bzhi [#]pa bya/_stod tra [#]klog pas mthon por bya ba ni shing rta'i steng du khang bu shing khang phub la sgo bzhir btod [#]de de'i nang nas bklag_/mchod pa zin nas 'khor lo dbyung /_stod tra'i [#]kha don la sogs pa zin nas khang bu so sor bshig ste sbas la gzhag_/snod du
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sbed pas 'thob pa sba/_stod tra klog pas [#]khang bu nas byed pa'i tshe yon [#]phal cher phul na de rnams bsdu zhing brtul ba [#]sdud pa'i dge slong ni gzhan gcig bsko[#]/_/ston pa mchod pa ni [#]gnyis su ma dgos [#]par sbyin par dge slong ma'i [#]dge 'dun ma gtogs so/_/ltag ma ltar
[\[261b.2\]]stod tra byed cing mchod pa'i tshe na yon bdag gis dge slong pho mo'i spyir phul ba ni bgo_/dge slong 'ba' zhig la bsngos te phul ba ni dge slong ma mi dbang ngo /_/'dir gcig pa [#]las 'khor lo so sor btsugs pa na sbom por nyes pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar dge slong gis 'khor
[\[261b.3\]]lo'i gnod pa dang brjed par bya ba [#]dang yon bdag gis yon mang du phul te dge slong mas yon skal blangs te ma ster ba dang bsdu la nan das de'i nyin mo dge slong gis mchod pa 'dra ba cig phyung ste yon tan thob pa las dge slong la snyoms pa ltar gyur te [#]de ltar byed na
[\[261b.4\]]dge slong ma dbyen gyi sbom por 'gyur/_snod [#]'gyed pas bgo_/stod tra [#]byas pa'i phyir yon phul ba'i rnams so sor bgo ba ni yon phul ba sdud par bskos pa'i dge slong des bya'o/_/'di bsko'o/_/stod tra [#]klog pa'i tshe yon 'bul ba sdud pa dang so sor 'god pa'i dge
[\[261b.5\]]slong gcig bsko/_/btsong ba'i rigs pa btsong g.yu dang rta lta bu zhig phul te bgor mi bde ba ni btsongs te rin bgo_/dge 'dun gnas par ro/_/btsong ba ni dge 'dun gyi nang du rin thang dris te gang gis rin cher btab pa de la btsong bskyed/_dge 'dun la mthar
[\[261b.6\]]gyis dris te gang gis cher btab pa la btsong /_des 'di la gdug [#]par gtogs pa'i nan tan bya/_nor 'god par bskos pa'i dge slong des nor 'god cing dge 'dun 'du ba'i sar chag chag phyag dar la sogs pa bya/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis rin bya/_nor
[\[261b.7\]]rin gcod pa'i phyir dge 'dun la ston pa'i tshe thog mar gnas brtan gyis rin thang gcad do[#]/_/ran par ro/_/gnas brtan gyis nor rin thang bcad pa na srang gcig ri ba zho drug ri ba tsam du gdab po/_/de'i phyir de la mi bstabs gnas brtan gyis rin bcad pa las cher
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]'bebs pa gzhan ma byung na gnas brtan mi nyor mi gnong [#]par ni mi bya'o/_/chad par bya ste slar 'phel bar mi 'gyur na dbyung nor btsong ba ni rin 'debs pa'i phyir brtan [#]pa las rin gang gis cher btab pa de las bzlas te dris kyang gzhan cher [#]'debs pa
[\[262a.2\]]med na de nyid la nyor gzhug go_/mi btsong mi [#]spel/_bdag nyor mi 'dod pa las rin bskyed pa'i phyir rin thang cher mi gdab/_bud med la ma yin/_bud med ni spyad [#]brim zhing rin thang mi gcad/_rin [#]ma blangs par mi spyad/_dge 'dun las nor nyo bar blangs pa
[\[262a.3\]]las rin ma phul gyi bar du spyad par mi bya/_bcos par yang ngo /_/dge 'dun la nor nyo ba'i phyir blangs pa las rin ma phul gyi bar du mi spyad[#]/_kha dog bsgyur ba'am bcos legs mi bya/_len pa mang na du la sogs pa'i sder bgo_/yon bdag gis yon mang mo zhig phul
[\[262a.4\]]te 'god na bgo sla ba'i phyir dge slong yod pa las bcu phung du bcad [#]de so sor bcu sder byin la 'god du gzhug sder byin pa las ma bgos par 'ga' zhig shi na de'i tshe cha sder gtogs so/_/mdo ltag ma ltar bcu zhig bgo gcig tu nor skal byin pa la bcu sde [#]de'i nang nas
[\[262a.5\]]'ga' zhig shi na de'i skal ba bcu sde der gtogs pa'i rnams kyis bgos kyang nyes med/_rigs pa ni mya ngan las [#]'da' ba'i bsam pas rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa la gos stong phrag brgya dang khang pha brtsegs ma lnga [#]brgya'o/_/mya ngan las [#]'da' ba'i phyir dad cing mos te
[\[262a.6\]]rab tu byung ba'i dge slong yon tan dang tshul khrims dang ldan pas ni gos bzang po sna grangs stong phrag brgya dang zas zhim bzang pa [#]ro sna brgya dang khang pa brtsegs [#]ma lnga brgya la sogs pa bzang po dang mang po ci spyad kyang rung ste yon tan dang ldan pas zhu bar 'gyur bas spyod du dbang ste
[\[262a.7\]]brtags pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi nor kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar yon tan dang ldan pas ni dge 'dun gyi nor dang zas la spyad kyang brtags pa'o/_/mi slob pa'i bar du'o/_/mya ngan las 'das par sems bskyed cing tshul khrims dang ldan pas ni dgra bcom pa man chad gang
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]zag rim pa bdun gyis nor las spyad [#]kyang brtags pa'o/_/ma rabs kyang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar spyad kyang brtags pa ni gang zag ma rabs yin kyang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar sems bskyed pa [#]ni spyod par brtags pa'o/_/tshul khrims log pa
[\[262b.2\]]las ni ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi zas dang gos kyi shas kyi skal ba la phas pham pa bzhi byung ba ni mi dbang ngo /_/phas pham pa bzhi'i tshul khrims phra mo nyams kyang shas kyi skal ba ni dbang ngo /_/phas pham pa dang khyim pa dge 'dun la [#]'khor zhing yon phul ba ni dge 'dun gyis za
[\[262b.3\]]zhing spyod du bcug pa ni dbang ngo /_/bu lon du 'gyur ba ni le lo can gyi blangs te btso ba'o/_/tshul khrims ma nyams su zin kyang le lo che zhing dge ba spyod pa'i shas chung na yon bdag gi nor rdzas la spyad pa mi zhu ste bu lon du 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa las rigs pa
[\[262b.4\]]ni mtshams gcig pa'i gang zag gi gtsug lag khang na sde pa de'i rnyed pa la spyod pa yang ngo /_/tshul khrims dang ldan pas ni dge 'dun gyi zan skal yang zos la yon bdag gzhan zhig gis zan khyer te 'ongs te byin na yang zos kyang nyes med do/_/gcig zos na gcig [#]
[\[262b.5\]]bsags su ni mi dbang ngo /_/khang bu bsngos pa yang ngo /_/yon bdag gis khang [#]bu'i rkyen du khang bu de na su 'dug pa lo gcig cing rtag tu gser lta bu 'bul ba zhig yod na'ang de'ang blangs la dge 'dun spyi'i yon skal blangs kyang nyes med do/_/'di la res kyis bsgo/_/khang
[\[262b.6\]]bu'i rkyen rtag tu srang grangs 'bul ba zhig yod na khang bu de rtag tu dge slong gcig pu mi gzhag gi res kyis dge 'dun kun 'khod do/_/dge slong gcig gis mngan rnogs su theg ste rku sems dang ldan na pham/_lhung bzed dang /_lhung bzed chung ngu dang phur [#]bu dang bum
[\[262b.7\]]pa dang kyo ba tang [#]dang gri dang khab dang sen reg [#]dang gzar ba dang sol ba bsdu ba dang sta re dang sla nga dang kha phyis dang /_lcags kyi snod bgo_/yon bdag gis ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dge 'dun la phul na dge 'dun so sor bgo_/sa'i snod dag tu lhung bzed chung
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ngu dang bum bu dang blugs [#]ma dang chab stong dang ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snod dag kyang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu zhig yon bdag gis phul na'ang dge 'dun so sor bgo_/rin po che'i khri la sogs pa mthar lcags kyang ngo /_/rin po che'i khri
[\[263a.2\]]man chad lcags kyi khri yan chad gcig phul na btsongs la rin la bgo_/brje/_mdo ltag ma ltar khri yon du phul ba rin du brjes la bgo_/shing gi ni ma yin no/_/shing gi khri che sra [#]shig phul na mi bgo bar spyi la gzhag_/tshon sna lnga las gzhan dag kyang ngo /_/tshon
[\[263a.3\]]chen po sna bdun phul na mtshal [#]dang li gru [#]dang nu med gsum ni bgo'i gzhan sna lnga'i ri mo bri ba'i phyir bzhag go/_/ma bcos pa yang ngo /_/tshon chen po sna bdun las btsos pa zhig na [#]mi bgo_/ma bcos pa ni bgo_/bcos pa btsor rung ba ni bgo_/btsos pa'i khu ba dge 'dun
[\[263a.4\]]gyi [#]gos btsor rung ba yod na [#]phyir gzhag go/_/gzhan dge 'dun gyi'o/_/ltag ma ltar spyi'i btso bar bzhag pa ni dge 'dun gyi spyi'i phyir bzhag go/_/mi btso/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu zhig yon phul ba ni bgo zhing btso bar mi bya/_kun dga' dang /_skyed shing
[\[263a.5\]]dang ldum ra phul ba dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_gtsug lag khang gi [#]khang pa phul ba dang /_de'i dngos po dang /_gtsug lag khang gi 'khor gyi sa dang /_mal stan dag go[#]/_/khri dang khri'u dang mal stan dang 'di rnams bgo bar mi bya/_dbang du mi bya/_mdo ltag ma ltar ming gis
[\[263a.6\]]smos pa 'di rnams spyir bzhag pa las bu lon chags pa la sogs pa'i gta' 'og tu mi bzhag_/mi bsngo ba yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang la sogs pa spyir bzhag pa las dge slong gang zag bdag gi nor du mi bsngo mi bskur [#]pa dag la zas dang [#]gos bstan par bya/_ma dag la gos dang
[\[263a.7\]]zas las [#]sbyin/_de ste gos dang lhung bzed lhag pa med na bslang /_pha ma la sbyin du chos gos dang lhung bzed tsam las mi bdog na [#]gzhan las bslangs te byin kyang nyes med/_ma grub na zas thob pa de las phyed sbyin pha ma la sbyin par bslang [#]du'ang ma rnyed na bdag gi zas dang gos kyi
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]skal ba ci thob pa las phyed pha ma la sbyin par bya/_phra mo la sogs par chud pa ste gos kyi dngos po'o//_//bye brag dbye bar shes pa'i phyir gos la gdab gos la mtshan ma mngon par gdab/_sangs rgyas dang nan da [#]'dra zhing bong mnyam ste ngo [#]mi shes par gyur te sangs rgyas su
[\[263b.2\]]'dzin pa'i phyir bcas/_de la gdab pa sbyin [#]snag tsha'i thig le zhes so/_/gos ngo mi shes shing nor gyis dogs pa'i phyir snag tsha'i thig le chos gos kyi grwar snag tsha'i thig le gdab/_spyad pa yang ngo /_/chos gos skam la lci ste thag bu la mi 'chags te thag bus mtha' la
[\[263b.3\]]brgyus te srad bu la gdags/_tshar tshar gyi kha chag bya/_ras kha tshar [#]bcad la chag [#]bya ste bgo zhing spyad do/_/sbyar ma ma yin pa dag zhig gcad [#]par ma chad do/_/chos gos chen po ma gtogs par snam bu bdun pa dang lnga pa gnyis ni snam bur ma dras shing ma btsems [#]pa la
[\[263b.4\]]bsngos kyang 'chags so/_/de lta bu'i rkyen med na ma bcad par grong dang khyim du 'jug pa dang 'dug pa ma yin/_char pa la sogs pa bab pa'i rkyen ma byung bar grong khyer [#]du chos gos chen po med par 'dug par mi bya/_de bzhin du mur 'dug gi gnas su'o/_/chos gos
[\[263b.5\]]chen po med par mur 'dug gi gnas su mi 'gro/_/yod na 'dug par ma yin/_rkyen byung yang chos gos chen po med par mur 'dug dang bcas pa'i gnas su 'gro ba'am 'dug par mi bya/_spu can chos gos gsum du mi bsngo/_la ba dang be'u ras la sogs pa spu can
[\[263b.6\]]la chos gos gsum gyi rgyus [#]mi bsngo/_/de bgos te mchod ston [#]du mi spyad/_zan za ba dang mchod ston byed pa'i tshe la ba dang pags pa la sogs pa spu can mi bgo_/srab mo ni bdag gir bya/_sde ras sam ras srab mo ni chos gos su bsngor [#]mi rung gi gos lhag par spyad cing
[\[263b.7\]]bgos kyang nyes med srab mo ni rgyu 'og nas 'byung /_'di ni rnam pa [#]bzhi ste bal gyi dang zar ma'i dang du gu la/_'i [#]dang shing bal gyi'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gos lhag tu bsngos shing spyad kyang nyes med de seng ras dang srab mor byas pa la bya/_gzhan yang snam bu'i
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rnam pa yang ba spu thung ba la sogs pa dag go/_/gzhan snam bu la spu thung ngur byas pa'i rnams ni chos gos su mi rung gi gos lhag gi [#]sngags kyis btab pa la spyad do/_/ba la [#]yang ngo /_/la ba yang gos lhag gi sngags kyis btab ste spyad kyang rung ngo /_/
[\[264a.2\]]'tsho las gzhan du na de'i phyir log tu bgo bar mi spyad/_phrug dang be'u ras la sogs pa lus la rtsub cing g.ya' [#]dang shig za na bzlog ste bgos kyang nyes med de[#]/_de bgos te mi bcag_/mdo ltag ma ltar shig za ba la sogs pa'i rkyen byung yang bcag pa'i tshe bzlog te [#]mi
[\[264a.3\]]bgo_/bsrings pa'i la ba dang me tog can gyi snam bu dang dre'u rngog khra khra bo gang zag gis bdag gir byas te mi spyad/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dge slong gang zag gis spyad cing bcang bar mi bya/_'chags sar dre'u rngog bting na khas blangs/_khyim pa bsod nams
[\[264a.4\]]'dod pas 'chags sar dri'u [#]rngog bting na de'i steng du bcag kyang nyes med/_rtag tu rgyun gcig tu mi bcag_/dre'u rngog de'i steng du 'chags pa'i [#]rgyun gcig tu mi bcag_/nus na bcos/_dre'u rngog de rdol lam ral na bcos/_btsem [#]pa gzhung bu glan pa sbyin/_dre'u rngog
[\[264a.5\]]ral na gzhung bu gzhug cing glan[#]/_mi nus na ba lang gi lci [#]ba dang 'ji bas sbyar te 'chag par byug_/dre'u rngog rnyings te 'drub cing btsem du mi rung na 'ji ba dang lci ba [#]bsres te 'chag [#]sa'i skyang nul du [#]byas kyang rung 'chag [#]sar dre'u rngog bting la de'i steng du 'ji bas
[\[264a.6\]]g.yogs la bcags na yon bdag la bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i phyir spyad du rung /_de bzhin du bcangs te sbyin bdag la brten te'o/_/dge slong gi gos su ma btags pa [#]dre'u rngog dang khra bo la sogs pa ni sbyin bdag khyim pa la bsngos [#]te bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/sham
[\[264a.7\]]thabs nang logs ma dang rngul zan dang 'theb [#]bcang /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyis 'theb re re bcangs kyang nyes med/_yo byad kyis kyang ngo /_/sman zong du zas sam gos bcangs kyang nyes med/_'di ni dkar po'am kha tshar dang bcas kyang ma nyes so/_/sman zong gi rdzas
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bcang ba ni ras dkar po dang kha tshar ma bcad kyang nyes med/_rin gyi tshad ni srang 'ga' tsam ci rin [#]par bcang /_dge 'dun gyi yang ma yin/_dge 'dun spyi'i [#]gos lhag na [#]kha tshar ma bcad dam kha dog ma bsgyur bar bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/gnang ba'i gos der bsngos
[\[264b.2\]]te bcangs/_yo byad bcu gsum 'chang du gnang ba ni bdag 'chang [#]ba'i sngags kyis bsngos la bcang /_gzhan brtags te du ma'ang bcang /_yo byad bcu gsum la ma gtogs par gos lhag cing 'chang na lhag pa'i sngags kyis brtags te bcangs kyang nyes med/_
[\[264b.3\]]sems mi brtan pa la mi brtag_/gos lhag ma brtag [#]pa ni mkhan po dang slob dpon kla klo can tshul khrims la dam zhing kla klo med cing brtan pa la brtag_/rab tu ma rdzogs pa la ma yin/_gos brtag [#]pa'i sngags bya ba ni khyim pa dang dge slong la mi brtag go/_/mngon
[\[264b.4\]]sum du ma yin/_mkhan po dang slob dpon la gos brtag pa yang mthong zhing shes pa dang thos par mi bya'i lkog tu grogs gcig gi gam du brtag_/mthong ba dang thos par sngags btab na nyes byas/_yul gzhan du 'dug pa la brtags na mi 'jig_/mkhan po'am
[\[264b.5\]]slob dpon nam gos su brtags pa'i mi de gud na 'dug gam yul gzhan du song na'ang zhig par mi 'gyur/_zhig pa ni 'phos na'o/_/gos brtags pa'i mi de shi'am khrims phul na brtags pa'i sngags med par 'gyur ro/_/shes na'o/_/[(]khrim [,]khrims [)#]phul lam shi bar ma
[\[264b.6\]]shes kyi bar du sngags 'chags so/_/'di'i bdag po ni brtags pa'o/_/gos sngags kyis 'debs pa'i tshe pha rol gyi yin [#]par bsams shing brtags mod kyi bdag spyod cing 'chang du dbang ngo /_/btang ba bdag gir mi bya/_gos spang ba lhug pa [#]byin pa las pha rol pos thal
[\[264b.7\]]byung mi bskur[#]/_dge slong la gtad/_gos spang la ltung [#]ba byung ba dge slong tshul shes pa gcig [#]la sbyin/_dge 'dun gyi la ma yin/_gos spangs pa ni [#]dge 'dun la mi sbyin gyi dge slong gang zag gcig la sbyin/_blun po la ma yin/_dge slong gang la spang ba'ang blun
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]zhing tshul mi shes pa [#]mi sbyin gyi zin po tshul shes pa la spang /_mi ster bslang [#]/_gos spangs pa las [#]pha rol po [#]des ma byin na mthol ba gsos kyi 'og tu bdag gos kyis brel to zhes bslang [#]/_mthu yis blang /_gos spangs pa bdag gis bslangs kyang ma
[\[265a.2\]]ster na grogs po bzlog la dbrog go/_/gos la bsung gis reg na bkrus te spyad/_bdag gi [#]gos la sogs pa bsung [#]gis reg na ma brtags [#]pa'i phyir spu bkru/_phye ma na sprug_/bsung gi [#]phye mas reg na sprug_/snum gyis na dag par ro/_/gos la snum gyis reg na bkru/_
[\[265a.3\]]char pa bab na bla gab med pa la dge 'dun gyi ma yin/_char pa bab pa'i khrod du dge 'dun gyi gos gyon te mi 'gro/_bkru ba dang 'tshed pa dang lhung bzed kyi las dang shing gshags [#]pa la sogs pa'i byed par ma yin/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las byed pa'i tshe dge 'dun
[\[265a.4\]]gyi gos gyon te mi bya/_bzhag pa las lhan cig na'o zhes ma smras na gzhan med kyang sbyin te yang dag par bgrang /_mi gsum gyis bdag la rdzas zhig gtams te nged gsum ma tshogs kyi bar du ma sbyin cig ces zer ba las gcig gam gnyis len du 'ongs na'ang mi
[\[265a.5\]]sbyin no/_/nged gsum ma tshogs kyi bar du ma [#]sbyin cig ces mi zer bar gtams pa ni gcig gam gnyis len du 'ongs te sbyin kyang nyes med/_gzhog pa dang ma 'grogs par ma yin/_nor gzhog pa'i tshe nor bdag dang 'grogs pa ma yin pa zhig len du 'ongs te dan rtags
[\[265a.6\]]yod kyang mi [#]sbyin/_gnyen dang bdag gi khyim ma yin pa smyon pa las mi blang /_mi smyon pa zhig gis kho bdag gi khyim dang pha ma'i khyim nas blangs te bdag la byin na blangs kyang nyes med/_bu bskrad pa las blangs/_pha mas bu bskrad pa las bu des pha ma'i khyim nas nor zhig
[\[265a.7\]]blangs te byin na'ang [#]blangs kyang nyes med/_dur khrod nas slar bzlog pa las yang ngo /_/dur khrod kyi ro'i rdzas zhig blangs te bdag la byin na blangs kyang nyes med/_de slar [#]slong na sbyin/_mdo ltag ma ltar ro'i rdzas byin pa slar 'dod ces zer na'ang byin cig_/slar 'thom [#]na'ang
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]blangs[#]/_mdo ltag [#]ma ltar slar [#]slong ste byin pa las yang slar 'bul na ma khro bar long zhig_/mchod rten gyi dkor/_mchod rten la phul ba'i dkor rnams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo zhing spyad par mi bya'o/_/rtswa [#]dang bu ram shing dag las/_rtswa [#]ba dang 'bras bu la sogs pa bcad
[\[265b.2\]]pa [#]zhig dge 'dun la phul na bgos shing so sor sbyin no/_/gzhan zas kyi phyir bsngos pa/_bca' ba la ma gtogs pa mar dang bag phye la sogs pa phul ba ni mi bgo bar g.yos su byas te spyir brim mo/_/nye bar 'tsho ba dang nad pa la brtags pa bdag gir bya ba'i phyir bgo/_/
[\[265b.3\]]mal cha dang khri stan la sogs pa dang sman la sogs pa phul ba ni spyis spyad dgos pa'i phyir mi bgo bar gzhag go/_/dbyar gyi mtshams rnyed na 'jug_/dbyar tshul du zhugs pas ni tshul gyi yon [#]skal gyi nang du 'jug cing blang /_ma zhugs na mi blang /_dbyar chad pa la yang
[\[265b.4\]]mi rigs pa [#]ma yin/_dbyar tshul dral ba [#]ni zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du tshul bsrungs pa ni yon skal dbang ngo /_/bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsrungs pa ni phyed dbang ngo /_/bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi bsrungs pa ni mi dbang ngo /_/bskrad pa ni ma yin/_dge slong chad pas bcad de bskrad pa ni
[\[265b.5\]]tshul gyis [#]yon skal mi dbang ngo /_/rdzas kyis non par dbyar gnas pa la cha gcig go/_/gtsug lag khang mang po zhig kun gyi mtshams su re lde lta bus mnan te tshul du zhugs pa ni gtsug lag khang kun gyi yon skal mi dbang gi gtsug lag khang re re nas kyang cha re re dbang ste
[\[265b.6\]]ci ltar dbang ba 'og nas 'chad der bdag gis [#]bgrangs te ma non pa'i skal ba'o/_/gtsug lag khang gcig nas cha re re dbang ba ni gtsug lag khang du yod pa'i grangs las gtsug lag khang de gcig gi dge slong mi gcig gi skal ba ci thob pa las lha khang lnga yod na ni mi gcig
[\[265b.7\]]gi skal ba'i lnga cha gcig [#]sbyin no/_/drug yod na'ang drug cha re re sbyin no/_/[#]gzhan du du mar tshul du zhugs na ring du gnas pa [#]der chos so/_/ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang du ma zhig gi mtshams su mnan te tshul du zhugs pa las gtsug lag khang du zan za ba gcig tu zan gyi
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]phyir yang 'dug rnyed pa'i yon che ba gcig tu yang yon 'dod pa'i phyir gnas pa [#]na gang du ring du gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang de'i yon skal la [#]dbang ngo /_/dge sbyong [#]pha dang dge sbyong ma'i rnyed pa ni sum cha ma [#]gtogs pa las so/_/gtsug lag khang du
[\[266a.2\]]rtag par nar mar yon 'bul ba zhig las 'god pa ni dge slong pha dang [#]dge slong mas gsum thob na [#]dge sbyong pha dang dge sbyong ma gnyis sbyin no/_/yon bdag gis 'phral du [#]phul ba ni dge slong dang mnyam par sbyin no/_/zas ni mnyam mo/_/dge 'dun sbyin spyir zas lta bu
[\[266a.3\]]zhig yon du phul ba las 'god pa ni dge slong dang dge sbyong mnyam par bgo/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa dang dge slong ma yang ngo /_/dge sbyong lo nyi shu tshang ba dang dge slong lo gnyis spyad zin te/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa rung ba zhig na yon la sogs pa bgo'o/_/[#]cog mnyam
[\[266a.4\]]par bya/_dge slong dang dge slong mar na cha blang ba ni dge 'dun gyis ma yin te gang zag tu'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun spyir yon zhig phul ba las 'god pa ni dge 'dun sde [#]mnyam par mi bgo'i grangs su bgo/_/ma bsngos par mchod ston gyi rjes su rnyed pa la dge slong mas
[\[266a.5\]]kyang zos na ma gtogs pa ma yin no/_/dge 'dun spyan drangs te dge slong bshos gsol zin pa'i rjes la dge slong mas slebs na dge slong phyis shos [#]mi dbang ba ma yin te [#]dge slong dang mnyam par dbang ngo /_/stan dang chu dang bsod snyoms la dge slong dge slong ma bas [#]thu bo ma
[\[266a.6\]]yin pa ma yin no/_/dge slong gsar du khrims rdzogs na [#]dge slong ma rdzogs nas lo nyi shu lon kyang stan dang lag chu 'drim pa dge slong las sngar brim mo/_/dge slong ma 'khod [#]na rgan rims nas stan dor/_/dge slong ma 'ba' zhig spyan drangs te bshos gsol ba'i tshe phyis
[\[266a.7\]]dge slong pha 'ong gis dogs [#]pa'i phyir dge slong pha'i stan gong du gnyis gsum tsam [#]gzhag dge slong pha de dag gis sbyin pa las 'chags pa byed mi nus na dge slong ma dag gis so/_/gtsug lag khang du yon bdag gis dge slong pha dang [#]dge slong ma bshos gsol ba'i 'og tu
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]tshigs bcad dge slong phas klog mi nus na dge slong ma mkhas pas [#]kyang rung /_zas 'drim pa mngon par 'dug na zas snyoms par brims shig ces dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis thog mar bsgo[#]/_dge 'dun bshos gsol ba'i tshe phyag tshang dang thong ngan gyis 'byor
[\[266b.2\]]tshogs zhes smras na gnas brtan gyis snyoms par brims shig ces bsgo/_/'khor du bltas te mang la zas nyung na ci 'byor du'o zhes thog mar ro/_/gtsug lag khang ngam yon bdag gi gnas su dge 'dun bshos gsol ba'i tshe gnas brtan gyis dge slong grangs
[\[266b.3\]]las lhag par 'ongs na yon bdag la sbran nas dge slong bshos bshugs te thams cad thob par bya ba'i [#]phyir brims shig ces bsgo/_/gzhan du na [#]ci nus pas so/_/dge slong grangs bcad de bshos sbyar ba las de'i nang nas kha cig gud du spyan drangs te dong nas zas
[\[266b.4\]]lhag par gyur na dge 'dun khong rtag tu bcing ba der [#]brims zhes gnas brtan gyis bsgo/_/sam pra ta zhes rgan rims la ma brjod pa'i sngon rol du mi blang /_bshos 'drim [#]pa'i tshe thong ngan gyi 'byor tshogs zhes ma smras par bshos blangs na gnas brtan la 'byor nyes
[\[266b.5\]]byas pa'i phyir gnas brtan gyis thod ngan las 'byor tshogs zhes smros shig ces bsgo/_/[#]zas sta gon byas te spyan drangs pa las gzhan 'ongs te de la sbran/_yon bdag gcig gis grangs bcad de spyan drangs pa las yan man [#]nas dge slong lhag ma [#]zhig 'ongs na/_yon
[\[266b.6\]]bdag la dge slong 'di snyed cig 'ongs so zhes gnas brtan gyis bsgo/_chos gos gsum byin cig ces dge slong la mi bskyur/_dge slong na ba la dge slong grogs kyis chos gos gsum bsngos pa khyod sang ngam nam shi tol [#]med na chos gos dge 'dun la dbul ba'i
[\[266b.7\]]rigs so zhes mi bsgo/_bdag ma [#]shi na zhag re nyes byas re rer 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]blangs na 'di sos na slar sbyin no zhes yid de dag [#]las gzhan du ma [#]yin/_mdo ltag ma ltar dge slong nad pas chos gos bsngos pa dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dge 'dun gyis
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]kyang kho sos na gos 'di slar sbyin no snyam du bsams te blangs na gos [#]slar sbyin/_shi nas bla 'og tu bca' bar ro/_/dge slong shi na 'og tu gding ba'i ras yug gcig dang steng du g.yogs [#]pa'i ras yug gcig gis g.yogs la dor/_'bring po ltag ma
[\[267a.2\]]ltar ro la g.yogs pa'i gos ni bzang po yang ma yin te 'bring po g.yog_/ltag ma ni ma yin no/_/dge slong phyug po shi na dge slong grogs kyis gos bzang po mang po zhig gis g.yogs te dor zhes zer na'ang ci ran par dkris te dor ro/_/dri ba [#]dang bcas pa phran tshegs
[\[267a.3\]]la sogs par chud pa ste gos kyi dngos po'o/_/dris pa dang phran tshegs la sogs pa'i nang nas 'byung ba ste gos kyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//gos kyi dngos po'o/_/'di man chad pags [#]pa'i dngos po la 'chad de/_yul dbus ma'i mtshams ni/_yul gyi dbus ni sangs rgyas snga
[\[267a.4\]]rabs kyang gnas de nas 'das phyis 'da' bar 'gyur ba'ang ma hA [#]bo de nas 'das pas na rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te yul gyi dbus [#]bya ste/_gang tshun chad dbus su brtsi ba 'og nas [#]'chad/_shar phyogs kyi mtshams nas pun [#]tra brta na'i mdun gyi tshal bu [#]'da' ka zhes bya'o/_/pun
[\[267a.5\]]tra brtan [#]zhes bya ba'i mtshams tshun chad dbus su brtsi/_pun tra brtan [#]zhes bya ba nyid ni mtha' 'khob [#]tu brtsi/_de'i mdun na tshal [#]bu 'da' ka zhes bya ba tshun chad yul gyi dbus su brtsi ste[#]/_lho phyogs kyi ni sha ra ba ti zhes bya ba'i chu bo de'o/_/lho phyogs kyi mtshams ni sha ra ba ti gtsang
[\[267a.6\]]po chen po [#]tshun chad yul gyi dbus su brtsi/_nub phyogs kyi ni bram ze'i grong tu na dang u pa tu na'o/_/nub phyogs kyi [#]bram ze spun gnyis tu na dang u pa tu na dang gnyis kyi grong khyer tshun chad yul gyi dbus su brtsi/_byang phyogs kyi ni [#]u shi ra'i ri'o/_/byang phyogs kyi ni u shi ra
[\[267a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i yul de na rtsa [#]man ma zhim po zhig skye ba'i yul de tshun chad dbus su brtsi/_mtha' 'khob tu lham [#]bol med bcang /_lhag ma'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshams phan chad ni lham bol med gyon du [#]dbang /_mal stan sba [#]ba'i phyir yang ngo /_/yul gyi dbus na mal stan la rdul
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]mi gos par bya ba'i phyir lham bol med bcangs kyang nyes med/_tshig [#]rim mo/_/ltag ma ltar dbus su lham gyon du dbang ba ni chig [#]rim du bya/_lhan pa sbyin pas bcos lham rdol na lhan pa glan/_rim pa gzhan du mi bya/_rting pa'am brang pa gang du rdol bar glan gyi cher ni mi glan
[\[267b.2\]]no/_/khyim pas gom pa bdun tsam du spyod spyod na rim mang po yang ngo /_/lham mthil [#]rim pa bdun tsam du stug po'ang [#]khyim pas gom pa drug bdun tsam bgos pas rnyings par [#]chud de gyon du dbang /_brtags pa tsam gyi phyir de'i dbang gis sbyar bar blangs ni [#]ma brtags
[\[267b.3\]]par blangs pa ma yin no/_/bdag la lham sar pa ko ba rim pa mang po can yod na rim pa gcig gtogs pas brtags [#]par chud yang gcig tu na [#]khyim pa la gom pa drug bdun tsam gyon du'ang brtags par chud de gyon du dbang /_ri mo dang nye ba'i ri mo ma yin pa[#]/_lham
[\[267b.4\]]mda' tshon gyis bris pa'i ri mo can gyon du mi dbang /_lug ru lta bur ma yin/_lham gyi bol la ste 'dzom gyi gong ras 'dra bas brgyan pa'i lham mi dbang /_shu ba ta dang ka ri bya'i [#]lo ma lta bu ma yin/_lham gyi bol la shing bo de'i lo ma dang 'dra ba dang gong nan tan gyi ri
[\[267b.5\]]mo 'dra brta bag [#]tu 'dug pas brgyan pa'i lham [#]mi bgo/_/gser dngul gyis spras pa ma yin/_gser dngul dang rin po ches brgyan pa'i lham mi [#]bgo/_/tsi gi tsi ki ma yin/_'di skad ces zer ba'i lham mi bgo/_/ki ni ki nir ma yin/_'di skad sgra 'byung ba'i lham mi
[\[267b.6\]]bgo/_/khi ni khi nir ma yin/_'di skad du zer ba'i lham mi bgo/_/dzi ni dzi nir ma yin/_de skad zer ba la sogs pa'i lham gyon na nyes byas/_gzhan yan trog trog por skye ba ma yin/_lham sgrog [#]por 'gyur ba'i lham mi bgo/_/zhing du bres pa ma brtags pa ma yin/_lham
[\[267b.7\]]gyi bol 'bring [#]bus chu zheng du bres pa bgo dbang de [#]mdun dang rting bar rim pa can bcang /_lham sor mo'i steng g.yogs pa dang rting pa ko [#]ba 'khyud pa ni bya rgod kyi phung po la 'dzeg pa'i tshe gyen bu la 'gro ba'i tshe mi 'byin pa dang thur bu la mi snad pa'i phyir bcangs kyang nyes med/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]la la'i chu las skyes pa'i yang ngo /_/sprul yan man du song ba'i mchil ma dang kha chus sam rtswa [#]la reg pa la rkang pa la reg na gdug par 'gyur ba'i phyir bol [#]can gyi lham bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/lham yu rdum yang ngo /_/lham yu rdum gyon du dbang
[\[268a.2\]]ngo /_/chab brom du 'gyur ba'i yul du zhwa dang yu rings kyang ngo /_/yul lhag [#]pa che ste chab brom yod pa'i yul du zhwa dang lham yu rings bgor gnang ngo /_/dge slong ma yul gyi dbus su na na zhwa dang lham dbang ngo /_/mtha' 'khob chab brom yod pa'i yul du ni zhwa dang lham gyon du dbang /_
[\[268a.3\]]mchod pa'i drung du lham bgos te mi spyad/_dkon mchog gsum dang mkhan po dang slob dpon lnga la phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i tshe gan [#]du lham gyon te mi 'gro/_/seng ge dang stag dang gzig dang ba glang [#]cang shes kyi yan lag las cung zad kyang lus la mi thogs/_ming
[\[268a.4\]]gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi [#]pags pa dang so dang rus pa dang sder mo la sogs pa lus la bgo ba'am lham la brgyan par mi bya/_ba glang [#]phal dang rta ma rung ba [#]dang de las gzhan ri dwags khra bo dag kyang chud do/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyang mdo steng ma dang 'dra bar bgo ba dang spyad
[\[268a.5\]]cing gdags par mi bya/_lham mi sprug_/lham rdul can la la brdabs pa'am nang mi drud mi brdab/_ras ma la chus brlan te 'di la rdul dbyung ba'i phyir bcangs [#]ltag ma ltar rdul can mi brdeb par ras [#]ma la chus brlan te lham phyi zhing 'dar [#]ba'i phyir ras ma des [#]phyis kyang
[\[268a.6\]]dgos [#]pa'i phyir sbas [#]te gzhag_/de btsem/_lham ral na btsem ste thabs 'og nas 'chad/_mi mdzes pa'i dngos po byed na phyogs dben par ro/_/lham btsem pa mi mang pos mi mthong [#]ba'i phyir lkog dben par ro/_/de'i phyir bsnyung [#]bu dang gla [#]rgyun bcangs yan man yul
[\[268a.7\]]rgyu [#]ba'am gnas na 'dug pa'ang [#]rung lham ral na btsem pa'i phyir gla [#]rgyun dang bsnyung [#]bu bcang bzo gri ma yin/_bzo gri ltag [#]dgye dge slong gis mi bcang /_shing lham mi gon[#]/_dge slong shing lham gyon du mi gnang ste gnang ba'i skabs 'og nas 'chad/_grong [#]mi gtsang ba'i
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gnas las gzhan du'o/_/grong bar du 'dam yod par grong du zhag lon pa la khyim pas mal stan bsrung [#]ba'i phyir lham gyon cig ces bgo ba dang /_bshang sa che chung du 'gro ba'i tshe gyon du dbang /_smyig ma'i lo ma dang mun dza dang si ri dang 'dar ba las ma yin/_ming gis smos pa 'di
[\[268b.2\]]rnams kyi rgyu las lham [#]byas te mi bgo/_/skud pa'i yang ngo /_/rtswa [#]las skud par bkal ba'i lham [#]mi bgo/_/trag yod na ma yin no/_/trag can gyis gong ma ming gis smos pa rnams kyis rtswa las lham [#]byas te gyon du gnang ba ni trag can gyi [#]cho ga bya ba'i phyir dro bar rkang pa dang bcas te gzhug [#]pa'i phyir
[\[268b.3\]]gnang ngo /_/grong du gzhan med na pags pa la 'dug[# ]/grong du spyan drangs [#]te pags pa stan du bting na stan gzhan med dam zhes smros [#]te stan gzhan med ces zer na pags stan la 'dug kyang nyes med do/_/der yang de la 'di lta bu'i rkyen yang mi 'dug [#]gtsug lag khang na ni rkyen yod kyang pags stan
[\[268b.4\]]la 'dug pa'am nyal du [#]dbang /_mig gi phyir dom lpags bcang /_mig la phan pa'i phyir dom lpags bcangs kyang nyes med/_rkang pa'i gnas su gding /_ltag ma ltar bcang ba ni stan dang rkang pa phyi bar bya/_sangs rgyas kyi ni dri gtsang khang gi sgor [#]ro/_/sangs rgyas la dom
[\[268b.5\]]lpags yon du phul na dri gtsang khang gi sgor bzhag ste yan man du dong ba'i mig la phan pa'i rkang pa phyis te 'gro_/lham bol med bgo_/dom lpags kyi lham mig la phan pa'i phyir bgos kyang nyes med/_rlung gis ni [#]'dug cing nyal/_rlung nad can dom lpags kyi steng nyal lam
[\[268b.6\]]'dug kyang phan pa'i phyir dbang ngo /_/mkhyen pas brtags pa [#]thams cad la 'di mkho/_dom lpags kyi steng na 'dug na mkhyen pas brtags pa bad kan byung bar phan pa'i phyir bcang /_spus reg na phan par shes par bya/_ltag [#]ma ltar dom lpags bcangs pa ni sha la reg pa
[\[268b.7\]]ni ma yin gyi spu la reg pa ni phan/_lham bol med rim pa mang po na [#]yang ngo /_/lham bol med ko [#]ba rim pa mang du byas kyang rkang pa 'byar ba'i rim gcig_/dom lpags spu yang bstan te byas na rim pa mang yang nyes med/_mdo 'og ma'i ti ka'o[#]/_/du ma'i steng du gcig bzhag
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]na yang ngo /_/dom lpags 'ba' zhig las lham rim pa mang po zhig byas te gyon kyang nyes med do/_/mdo [#]steng ma'i ti ka'o/_/a sma ba ran+da [#]ka las gzhan du mi bcang /_yul a sma ba ran+da [#]ka zhes bya ba ni stag gzig la sogs pa ma gtogs par gzhan thams
[\[269a.2\]]cad pags [#]pa bcang du dbang ngo /_/seng ge la sogs pa'i yang ma yin/_yul a sma pa ran+da [#]ka na seng ge dang stag dang gzig gi pags pa gyon du mi dbang /_rgyus pa dang rus pa dang so dang sha dang tshil dag kyang gang gi pags pa ma brtags pa de'i'o/_/ltag ma ltar pags pa
[\[269a.3\]]bcad du mi gnang ba rnams kyi ming gis smos pa 'di rnams mi bcang /_rkyal pa bcang /_rkyal pa bcangs kyang nyes med/_ngur smrig gam sngon por yang ngo /_/rkyal pa'i kha dog 'di 'dra bar bya/_ri mo dang ri mor nye ba ma yin/_rkyal pa ri mo can mi bcang /_rkyal mi shes pa thams
[\[269a.4\]]cad ma sbyangs par chu zab mor mi 'jug_/bdag rkyal mi shes par gru'am gzings sam shing leb lta bu'i thabs ma sbyar bar chu chen por mi 'jug_/dben pa'i phyogs su rkyal bslab[#]/_dge slong dben par rkyal slobs [#]shig_/gting zab la glang po ma gtogs te ba las mi
[\[269a.5\]]'jug chu chen po la ba'am glang bu ma gtogs par glang po [#]chen po'i mjug ma la 'jus te 'gro ba'i [#]mjug ma la 'jus na nyes byas/_glang bu la 'jus na stobs chung ba'i phyir/_'ju ba ni ba glang [#]dang rta dang ma he dang g.yag las so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ma yin pa'i
[\[269a.6\]]mjug ma la mi 'ju/_pags pa'i dngos po'o//_//[#]'di man chad sman dpyad [#]la 'chad de/_sman spyad/_dge slong nad pas sman bza' bar spyad pa dang dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir spyad do[#]/_/'di la rnam pa bzhi ste/_zas kyi sman rnam pa [#]bzhi la skad cig pa dang phyi
[\[269a.7\]]dro ba dang zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig pa'o/_/skad cig pa ni skya rengs byung nas dro'i bar du'o/_/thun gyi skya rengs byung nas nyi ma nub kyi bar du'o/_/zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig pa ni dngos su zad do/_/nad pa la [#]dang po ma yin pa'o/_/skad cig pa'i zas ni na ba dang mi na ba dang [#]
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]mi na ba 'dra ste bzar rung [#]ste nad pas zas zhag tu bzhag ni mi dbang /_gzhan gsum ni nad pas bcangs kyang nyes med/_tsho tsa dang mo tsa ta ko la dang ka shud ta'i dang u dum bA ra [#]dang pa ru [#]sha ka dang rgun 'brum dang kha zu ra'i chu ni thams cad la'o/_/ming gis [#]smos pa 'di rnams
[\[269b.2\]]kyi 'bras bu'i khu ba btsags [#]te na ba'ang rung mi na'ang rung [#]btsags te 'thung ngu dbang ngo /_/snga dro'ang 'thung ngu dbang ngo /_/de bzhin du 'bras bu'i tsha dang [#]/_tshwa dang zho khu dang tshur khu dang rtswa ba [#]mo dag go[#]/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams btsags te na'ang rung mi na'ang rung phyi dro'ang 'thung ngu
[\[269b.3\]]dbang ngo /_/'di rnams chus brtags [#]dgos so/_/chu [#]dbye snam bur btsags te dang ba bzhin snang ba shar ba [#]de'i kha dog lta bu'o/_/mdo ltag ma'i btung ba rnams tshags su btsags te dad par byas la bzhin snang la chus brtags la btung du dbang ngo /_/de'i phyir
[\[269b.4\]]sngon du bsnyen [#]par rdzogs par reg pa [#]mi rigs te mtshan mtshungs pas na'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar btung ba rnam pa bcu gsum snga dro dge slong bdag gis btsir zhing btsags na btung du rung /_phyi dro ni byin len byas kyang dge slong gis btsir zhing btsags kyang 'thung ngu
[\[269b.5\]]mi dbang gi/_/dge sbyong ngam khyim pa zhig gis btsir btsags la chus brtags te byin len byas nas 'thungs pa ni nyes med/_a ru ra la sogs pa lnga yang ngo /_/a ru ra dang re'u ra dang a ma li dang /_pi pi ling dang na le sham dang lnga ni dge slong na'ang rung snga dro'ang rung [#]
[\[269b.6\]]zar dbang ngo /_/bu ram yang ngo /_/bu ram dang kha ra phyi dro'ang bzar rung /_bu ram dang kha ra chus byas te btung du'ang dbang /_'di bsngos pa las bza' [#]ba nad pa bzhin pa ni lam pa dang rdzas 'tsho dang las sar pa pa yang ngo /_/sman zhag bdun du bsngos te bzhag pa nad pa bdag
[\[269b.7\]]kyang bza' grogs [#]po gzhan yang bzar rung ba bzhin du lam ring po nas ngal chad de 'ongs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi mal stan rdzi la sogs pa dang gtsug lag khang gsar du brtsig par bsko [#]ba'i dge slong dang 'di rnams bzar dbang ngo /_/zan bcad pas dus ma yin pa'i 'di
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]bza'/_dge slong dro yol te zan ma zos pa'ang /_sman zhag bdun pa bzar [#]rung /_skom ni thun du'o/_/phyi dro btung du dbang ba rnams nang par nas nyi ma nub kyi bar du btung du rung ba [#]las bya/_dang po'o/_/thun btung ba'i skom de rnyog ma can ma yin pa
[\[270a.2\]]dang ba la bya/_der ma reg pa'i rdzas te 'o na te [#]dus kyi ni bsnyen [#]par ma rdzogs pas mnye zhing snam bur btsag_/ltag tu phyi dro btung ba rnam pa brgyad snga dro dge slong gis byin len blangs te snga dro bdag gis mnyes te btung du rung ba dang phyi dro dge slong gis mnye zhing btsag tu mi rung zhing
[\[270a.3\]]dge slong gis btsags shing [#]byin len bya ba de bzhin du rnam pa brgyad po 'di la [#]ma gtogs par sho gam la sogs pa gzhan yang brtsi/_'og 'di dang 'dra[#]/_bal po se'u dang pi zang [#]su ra ga la sogs pa'i rdzas gzhan yang 'dir ro/_/'di rnams kyang ltag tu brgyad ming gis
[\[270a.4\]]smos pa'i brtsi [#]'og dang 'dra ste/_phyi dro dge slong gis btsag cing las byar mi rung ste dge sbyong gis bya/_dus kyir na thun gyi mthar ro/_/lag [#]tu rnam brgyad dang bal po se'u la sogs pa dro zos nas dmar thag ma chad tshun chad du [#]dge sbyong gis [#]mnyes btsags te ngo snad na dge
[\[270a.5\]]slong 'thung du dbang ngo /_/dmar thag gi mtshams 'das te 'thung du mi dbang ngo [#]/_/gzhan yang de'o/_/zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig gi sngags kyis brtags pa las skom du byas na'ang dmar thag ma chad tshun chad 'thung du rung /_de ma gyur na steng gang du gyur na'ang der ro zhes
[\[270a.6\]]'ga' las so/_/skom du btung ba nyug por [#]sbyar ba las skyur por gyur pa dang /_dang bar [#]byas pa las rnyog ma can du 'gyur ba thun ma 'das kyang btung du rung ngo zhes 'og nas 'chad/_'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re skom btung ba'i rnams la da ltar ra mi ro'ang de'u re ra ro bar
[\[270a.7\]]'gyur ba dang da ltar dang yang de'u re rnyog ma can du 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar mngar kyang de'u re skyur por 'gyur bas [#]btung du mi rung zhes bshad/_de mi bzang ste dus las 'das par gnas [#]na ni mi skye ba thob de yang 'ong ba na phal gyis mi chud pa'i phyir mi bsngos par 'thob
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pas so[#]/_/ltag tu mngar po las skyur por gyur pa dwangs pa [#]las rnyog por 'gyur ba [#]dang ra mi ro ba las ra ro bar gyur na thun pa [#]'das kyang btung du mi rung ngo zhes 'byung ba de'i gzhung btsan par byas te gzung [#]gi ltag tu mkhan po'i tshig phyis 'gyur [#]zhes zer ba mi btsan te de'i
[\[270b.2\]]tshig mi gzung [#]ngo /_/'dir ro zhugs pa'i phyir phye ba'i skom [#]bu ram shing dang rgun 'brum la sogs pa chu ma blugs kyang khu ba rang 'byung bas thun ma 'das tshun chad btsags te 'thung du rung phye ma'i skom yang btung du rung ste gang yin pa ni sga [#]dang pi pi ling la sogs pa bur mar byas te
[\[270b.3\]]glum gyi rlangs [#]pa la bdugs [#]te ro yod pa dang [#]chu dang bsres te thun gyi bar du btung du dbang /_so bi ra'i [#]yang dang ngo /_/so [#]bi ra gang yin pa ni 'og nas 'chad de[#]/_so bi ras brlan pa'i khu ba'ang btung du rung /_'di ni 'bras bu la sogs pa'i sman brnyan nas skyur na'o/_/so bi
[\[270b.4\]]ra zhes bya ba ni chu ba ti da [#]ma ti la sogs pa 'bras bu dang me tog las skyur ba gang yang rung ste chu bar sbyar na thun gyi bar du btung du rung ngo /_/'di man chad ni skad cig ma dang thun gyi bar du chu las bshad/_mar dang yungs mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bu ram ni zhag bdun pa'i/_ming
[\[270b.5\]]gis smos pa 'di rnams ni zhag bdun pa'i sman no/_/khaN+Da [#]dang bu ram dang sha kha ra la sogs [#]thams cad kyang bu ram du chud do/_/'di rnams kyang sman bu ram zhes bya ba'i nang du gtogs te zhag bdun du 'chang du dbang ngo /_/mdo yang mar du chud do/_/mtho ris kyi khams
[\[270b.6\]]na 'dug pa zhig ste 'di yang mar du gtogs te zhag bdun pa'o/_/yungs mar du tshil las bzhus [#]te btsags pa'ang chud do/_/tshil dang chu gnyis bsres [#]te bskol nas chu ni skams tshil gyi khu ba lus pa tshegs kyis btsags nas zhag bdun pa'i mar gyi gor [#]bcad du rung /_
[\[270b.7\]]nya dang sbal pa dang dom dang phag pa'i'o/_/'di rnams kyi tshil btsags pa'ang mar gyi gor zhag bdun par bcang /_'di rnams [#]ni nad pa mang po la mkho bas so/_/mdo ltag ma'i tshil rnams nad pa la dgos pa'i phyir bcangs kyang nyes med/_sos nas nad pa'i phyir 'di
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]rnams las slong na sbyin no/_/tshil 'di rnams nad pa'i yo byad [#]du byas te gsos [#]nas lhag na nad pa gzhan la sbyin [#]kyang nyes med/_med na nad kyi gsos pa la'o/_/bdag nad sos nas tshil gyi sman dge slong nad pa med na/_dge 'dun gyi sman khang du rub [#]pa
[\[271a.2\]]la gtad do/_/gdus pa dang bskul ba yang ngo /_/'bras bu dang me tog la sogs pa lta bu lcags kyi gzhong /_kun du nad kyi cho ga bya ba dang /_mig nag por bsku ba'i rtsi'ang nad sos nas [#]dge slong nad pa la byin/_grogs nad pa med na sman khang du dbul/_'di yan chad zhag
[\[271a.3\]]bdun pa'i sman bshad pa[#]/_nam 'tsho bar du ba ni rtsa ba dang sdong bu [#]dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di lnga tshe gcig gi bar du bcang du rung ba'i sman yin te nad pas brtags te bcang du rung gnang ste 'og nas ming gis smos pa rnams yin zas kyi don
[\[271a.4\]]du mi chog pa las so/_/mdo ltag ma lta bur rnam pa [#]lnga zas kyi gor mi chog pa ni tshe gcig gi [#]bar du bcang du gnang ngo /_/'di lta ste mu sta dang ha ri bra dang shu ba dag dang sge'u gsher dang bong [#]nga'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni rtsa ba'i sman yin no/_/[#]tsan dan dang rtsi byi ka dang
