[\[271a.5\]]thang shing dang skyer pa [#]'di rnams ni sdong bu'i [#]sman te tshe gcig tu bcang du rung ngo /_/ba sha ka dang ko sha ta [#]gi dang pa to la dang nim pa dang 'dab ma bdun pa'i lo ma'o/_/ming gis smos pa [#]'di rnams ni lo ma'i sman yin te nad pas tshe gcig tu bcangs [#]kyang nyes med/_me tog ni [#]
[\[271a.6\]]ba sha ka'i dang nim pa'i dang 'da' ka'i dang na ga'i pad ta mo'i snying po dang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni me tog gi sman yin te nad pas tshe gcig tu bcang ngo /_/a ru ra'i dang am la'i [#]dang byi byi ta ka'i dang na le sham dang pi pi ling ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams
[\[271a.7\]]ni 'bras bu'i sman yin te nad pas tshe gcig tu bcang du rung ngo /_/dza tu dza tu [#]zhes bya ba ni sman spyi'i ming yin te 'og nas 'byung ba'i rnams so/_/'di lta ste shing kun dang sar bra ra sa dang rgya skyegs dang pra tshil dang sta [#]pa ka ra'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi sman kyang
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]tshe gcig tu bcang du dbang ngo /_/dza [#]tu ni 'di yan chad do/_/thal ba'o/_/'di yang 'og nas 'byung ba rnams kyi spyi'i ming ste 'og nas 'chad/_'di lta ste til dang ba la sha dang sa rdzi ka dang nas dang gra ma dang ba sha ka dang thal ba'i thal ba'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams
[\[271b.2\]]kyi thal ba'ang sman du 'gyur te tshe gcig tu 'chang du gnang thal ba'i sman 'di yan chad do/_/lan tshwa'o/_/'di'ang 'og nas 'byung ba'i spyi'i ming ngo /_/'di lta ste sen ta pa dang lan tshwa nag po dang byi lnga dang /_rgya mtsho mching rnams kyi dang ro [#]ma kha'i'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di
[\[271b.3\]]rnams kyang tshe gcig gi sman du bcang ngo /_/'dus pa'o/_/'di'ang 'og nas 'byung ba rnams kyi spyi'i ming /_'di lta ste a pra [#]dang nim pa dang ko sham pa dang shi ri sha dang 'dzam bu dag go/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi lo ma'ang sman du rung ste tshe gcig tu bcang du gnang
[\[271b.4\]]ngo /_/mchog [#]gi bar du sbyin/_sman steng ma rnams kyi lo ma gdus pa'i khu ba nam sros kyi bar du lan dus bkrus kyang rung ngo /_/bkrus te yang ngo /_/ltag ma'i sman gyis bkrus pa'i 'og tu yang chu tha mal pas kyang bkru/_ma reg par bkru pa gcig go/_/ltag ma ltar 'dus
[\[271b.5\]]pa'i sman gyis bkru ba nad kha cig la bsrub [#]cing mnye ste sman gyi chus bkrus na'ang phan/_gcig tu nad pa kha cig la ma [#]mnyes par spyi bo nas blugs na'ang phan/_'di ltar 'dus pa sbyin/_ltag ma lta bu sman gdus pas rngo dang g.yan pa la sogs pa la phan pa'i phyir rtag
[\[271b.6\]]par bkru/_zas thal ba dang blangs na ma blangs pa ma yin no[#]/_/zas ngan pa'i sman ches bya ba yang 'og nas 'chad pa rnams yin no/_/'di dag nam 'tsho ba'i bar du'o/_/'og nas 'byung ba'i sman de'ang tshe gcig tu bcang du gnang ngo /_/der gsungs pa ni yang bshad pa
[\[271b.7\]]dang bcings pa dang [#]bshangs te nu mas 'tsho ba'i'o/_/sman du bsrungs [#]pa ni be'u nu ma 'thung ba'i gcin dang lci [#]ba ni dug la phan pa'i phyir bcang du gnang ngo /_/'di ni dug la phan no/_/ltag ma'i be'u'i lci ba dang [#]gcin dug 'thungs ma thag tu de [#]'thungs na slar skyug [#]pa'i phyir bcang ngo /_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]thal ba dang shing kan tsan dang ka pyi ta la dang /_a shwa ta [#]dang u dum bA ra dang n+ya gro d+ha [#]dag kyang ngo [#]/_/ming gis smos pa 'di [#]rnams kyi thal ba dag kyang dug la phan pa'i phyir [#]tshe gcig tu bcangs kyang nyes med/_de la'o/_/ltag ma'i thal ba rnams dug 'thungs ma
[\[272a.2\]]thag tu 'thung [#]na 'tsho ba'i phyir bcang ngo /_/sa sor bzhi'i 'og gi sa la dge'o/_/bshang [#]gci la sogs pas ma 'babs [#]pa'i sa gtsang ma zab tu sor bzhi brkos [#]pa'i 'og man chad kyi sa dug la phan pa'i phyir bcangs kyang nyes med/_'di dad pa'i dge bsnyen las blangs/_mdo ltag
[\[272a.3\]]ma'i be'u'i bshang gci dang sa'i sman ni dad pa'i dge bsnyen phyir mi nur ba las blang /_len du gzhug_/byin len bya/_ltag ma'i sman dad pa'i dge bsnyen las byin len byas te blang /_sha rlon pa'i sman kyang ngo /_/dge slong na na sman du dad pa'i dge bsnyen gyis 'bul na len du dbang
[\[272a.4\]]ngo /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen med na dge slong na ba shas mi gsor mi rung na ma dad pa las kyang blang /_sha 'tshong dag kyang thams cad blang /_dge slong nad pa sha'i sman gyis mi gsor mi rung bar gyur na dge bsnyen dad pa sha 'tshong la nyor btang ste nyos la zos [#]kyang nyes med/_'di dgos
[\[272a.5\]]so/_/bdag na ba'i sman du sha dgos na ltag ma ltar nye ba'ang mi rigs [#]pa ma yin te rigs so/_/de ste dus ma yin par [#]mkho na ba lang rgan pa'i bshang ba [#]las nas kyis bya ba'i sman de'i phyir bya ste gzhan mi bza'/_glang [#]rgan nas zar bcug ste ma choms pa lci [#]ba'i nang nas btus te phyir
[\[272a.6\]]btab [#]la nad pa phyi dro zan nam thug pa byas te bza' zhing btung du gnang ngo /_/'di [#]lta bu'i sman nad pas bza' mi nus na than dang thug pa gzhan 'thung du'ang dbang ngo /_/de za nus na gzhan mi bza'/_de ste skyon snam bur btsags te gzhan du ma yin/_ba glang [#]gi lto nas byung ba'i
[\[272a.7\]]nas de brngos de [#]btags la skyo mar byas nas snam bus btsags pa'i khu ba nad pa la blud/_des ma ngoms sam ma 'drangs na skyo ma nyid kyang blud/_de ste sha'i sman ko kas bshangs pa'i [#]gzhan du ma yin/_nad pa'i sman du sman pas sha btsos pa'i [#]khu ba 'thungs na phan par
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bsgo na phyi dro sha khu 'thungs kyang nyes med/_sha khus snying ma tshim na sha gzhan zos [#]kyang nyes med/_dred mo'am 'phar [#]bas phyugs kyi sha zos pa de bzhin thal byung byung ba bzar rung ngo zhes sman pas phan par bsgo na zos kyang nyes med/_de ma sos na sman gzhan kyang bya/_de ste khu ba
[\[272b.2\]]ni [#]gos kyis btsags pa'i [#]gzhan du ma yin/_nad pa la phan pa'i phyir sha khu [#]snam bur btsags te 'thungs kyang nyes med/_sha khus ma sos na sman gzhan gyis gso ba'i phyir sbyin/_gzhan dang bcas na chos yod pa'o/_/zhag bdun pa'i sman dang thun gyi sman 'dres na
[\[272b.3\]]gnyis ka dor ram gcig dor ba bye brag 'og nas 'chad/_de bas na sngon du brtags pa dang lhan cig tu 'jug go_/skad cig ma dang thun gyi sman 'dres na skad cig ma'i dbang du bya/_thun gyi sman dang zhag bdun pa 'dres na thun gyi dbang du bya/_zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig
[\[272b.4\]]pa 'dres na zhag bdun pa btsan no/_/gzugs ma gyur na snga ma'i gzugs ma yin no/_/mdo ltag ma ltar 'dres na dbyer rung [#]na snga ma ltar mi btsan gyi [#]phye shig_/de ste'ang 'dres te dbyer yang [#]ma rung na snga ma dang 'dra bar bya/_de bas na gzhan la so sor byas pa de la
[\[272b.5\]]bdag gir brtags pas brtags na mi 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar sman 'dres pa bdag gi [#]so sor dbye nus nas phye la thun dang zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig pa'i sngags kyis so sor btab ste rim par bcang zhing bza'/_phye dang 'bras bu bu ram zlum po
[\[272b.6\]]gzhag pa bdag tsam gyis bkrus na grangs su'o/_/'bras sam phye'i nang du bu ram gzhag pa dbyar bu ram zhus te kha zas dang 'dres na 'bras sam phye bsal te lhag ma bu ram gyi nang phye dang 'bras cung zad cig ma mthong ste khong du las pa'ang phyi dro thun gyi bar du bzar rung
[\[272b.7\]]ngo /_/bu ram du gtogs pa'ang bu ram du chud do/_/bu ram btsir te bu ram du gyur pa las dbyar zhus te slar bu ram ling du byar mi rung pa las phye cung zad cig gis bsres te bskol nas slar bu ram ling du phyes gzungs byas pa dang /_de lta bu yang phyi dro thun gyi bar du
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bzar rung ngo /_/bsngos pa la sogs pa mi skye'o/_/zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig pa dang thun lta bu'i sman ni so so'i brtags [#]pas brtags na thun gyi ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nad pa'i phyir bza' phyir bsngos shig mdo ltag ma ltar zhag bdun pa dang
[\[273a.2\]]tshe gcig tu gnang ba ni nad pa dbang ngo /_/bdag gi [#]dus kyi mtha' pa'i bar du'o/_/thun gyir bsngos pa zhag bdun par bsngor mi rung zhag bdun pa'i [#]tshe gcig par mi bsngo/_/nad par mi bza'/_thun dang zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig gi sman brtags pa ni snga dro [#]brtags te
[\[273a.3\]]gzhag go/_/byin blangs pa'o/_/brtags pa [#]rnams byin len ma byas par mi brtag go/_/byin len [#]ma blangs pa dang 'dres pa bsrung /_byin len blangs pa ni byin len byas pa [#]dang ma byas pa mi bsre'i byin len byas la sngags gdab bo/_/de bas na lag bsnyal/_byin len
[\[273a.4\]]bya ba lag pa dri ma can gyis mi blang blangs pa dang bdag gi lag tu byin len ma byas par sa la bzhag ste [#]sngags kyis btab pa dang /_spogs [#]pa dang /_spags pa dang /_byin len ma byas pa dang /_byin len ma byas par bdag nyid kyis blangs sngags btab pa dang /_nang du bsrubs [#]
[\[273a.5\]]shing /_mtshams kyi [#]nang du dge slong dang zhag lon pa'i zas dang /_btsos pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang nas [#]btsos pa'i kha zas dang /_bsngos pa mi [#]skye'o/_/ming gis smos [#]pa 'di rnams thun dang zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig pa'i sngags kyis gdab tu mi rung /_btsog [#]pa
[\[273a.6\]]ni bro dang ba las log na'o/_/spags pa ste thun gyi btung bar sbyar la [#]nyug po las skyur por gyur pa dang /_dang ba [#]las rnyog ma can kyang thun ma 'das kyang zos na spags [#]par 'gyur/_bsngos pa 'og ma dang lhan cig tu mi spyad thun du bsngos pa dang zhag bdun pa
[\[273a.7\]]dang lhan cig bsres te mi spyad kyis sman gyi rim pa'i dper ro/_/thun dang zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig par bsngos pa ma gtogs par mig gi sman dang rna ba dang snar ldugs pa ni snga dro'am rung phyi dro'am [#]nam yang bskur rung ngo /_/byug pa bya'o/_/lhag ma lta bu'i sman mig na
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]na [#]sman byug go/_/sman gyi phyir ma yin na ma yin/_ltag ma ltar sman gyis bsku ba mig na na bsku'i [#]mi na bar mi bsku'o/_/'di'i snod du thub pa'o/_/ltag [#]ma'i mig sman zangs dang khar [#]ba'i nang du blugs na g.ya' 'ong ba'i phyir rwa [#]dang g.ya' med par blug go/_/khu ba [#]byug na
[\[273b.2\]]gab tshe'i'o/_/mig la sogs pa'i sman khu ba rnams ni sba'i gab [#]tshe nang du blugs [#]rdo gu byug [#]na sgye'u 'o/_/sman rdo gu rnams ni snod sgye'u [#]nang du blugs/_me tog dang /_me mar gyi du ba mig la phan pa dang /_btsos pa dang /_sman sna tshogs las btsos te mig sman du 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[273b.3\]]phye ma'i byug par ni bu gu'i sman phye ma dang rnam pa 'di gsum gyi snod ni smyig ma'i dum bur [#]blugs te gzhag_/thur ma bcang /_sman mig la byug [#]pa'i rnams lag pas byugs na'o/_/mi gze ba'i phyir lcags kyi thur ma mde'u rdal ma 'dra bas byug_/lcags dang zangs dang ming
[\[273b.4\]]bu mi las dge/_/thur ma'i rgyu ni lcags dang zangs la dge ste ming bu [#]mi zhes bya ba la yul gyi zangs sbrang bu dang lcags mnyen po la byas [#]na bzang ngo /_/bcang ba nad pas sman gzhan pa'i phyir snod kha mangs so/_/dge slong nad pas sman sna tshogs gzhag pa'i phyir ras gnyis
[\[273b.5\]]sbyar la thad kar skud pas btsems [#]te kha mang por 'dug pa'i nang du sman so sor gzhag_/der mi grub na bcer ba'am thum [#]por gzhag sman mang ste ltag ma ltar snod du gzhug [#]tu mi rung na phyi ma rnams ni so sor phur mar bya/_rdog [#]rdog po dang chen po'i rnams so sor
[\[273b.6\]]gzhag pa phur mar byas la gnam la gdags pa'am bcer te bzhag_/mi rul ba'i phyir dus dus [#]su bskam zhing bzhag_/sman mi rul pa dang rlan par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dus dus su bskam/_nyi grib la'o/_/sman bskam pa bar bar nyi ma la bskam zhing grib ma la bsrad[#]/_
[\[273b.7\]]nyi ma 'ba' zhig la bskams na mthu 'bri ba'i phyir/_bskams [#]na mthu 'bri'o/_/nyi ma 'ba' zhig la bskam [#]na'ang nad la mi phan pa'i phyir[#]/_grib ma 'ba' zhig la bskams na'ang nad la mi phan pa'i phyir snga ma ltar bskam par bya[#]/_ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'bab na
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]bdag gis brtul[#]/_sman skam du bcug pa las mes tshig gam sha byung ba la sogs pa rkyen gcig byung ngam char pa bab na dge slong bdag gis brtul [#]kyang spags pa'i kha zas su mi 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par [#]rdzogs pa med na'o/_/ltag ma ltar brtul
[\[274a.2\]]ba'ang dge sbyong dang khyim pa med na gdod bdag gis brtul [#]lo/_/sman gyi phor bu bcang /_dge slong lhung [#]bzed gcig las bcang du mi gnang na sangs rgyas kyis [#]phan par gsungs te sman btung ba'i phor bu zangs dang khar [#]ba las byas pa bcang /_sman gyi gzar bu yang ngo /_/
[\[274a.3\]]sman dkrug cing bsngo ba dang bcu ba lag [#]pa tsha bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir lcags sam zangs las gzar bu byas te bcang /_brnangs pas [#]phyi bzhin phor bu bcang /_zan bza' ba'i tshe brnangs par gyur na chus 'phul [#]bar bya ba'i phyir phor bu'i nang chus bkang ste gam du gzhag_/
[\[274a.4\]]nad pa [#]lan tshwa'o/_/nad pa'i bad kan la phan pa'i phyir tsha rdog zlum por bdar te mid/_bad kan gyi steng du 'phog [#]na bad kan slar byung bar phan te rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa [#]ma rnyed na tha mal pa bcang /_'di gzhag pa'i sbu bu [#]dge'o/_/lan tshwa'i [#]sman gzhag pa'i snod las byas te der
[\[274a.5\]]gzhug[# ]/gci bas btsos pa'o/_/ltag ma'i sman gyi [#]snod las byas pa khrag dang mi gtsang bas reg pa bkru ba'i phyir zangs kyi nang du ba lang gi gci ba dang bsres te btsos na 'dag par 'gyur ro/_/med na nyes mi 'byung ba'i phyir kha gab bya/_ltag ma'i sman gyi snod la rdul [#]
[\[274a.6\]]mi 'ong ba'i phyir kha gab bya/_'di lta bu las so/_/kha gab kyi rgyu ni rwa [#]las bya ste bkru ba ni snga ma dang 'dra ste bsung [#]gis kun du spags pa'i sa'o/_/bshang ba dang kha lag bkru ba sa rang las bsung [#]byung ba de lta bus bkrus kyang mi rigs pa ma yin te [#]bkrus kyang gnang 'chad du'ang gnang /_
[\[274a.7\]]chu bsro ba'i phyir lcags kyi thu lum mo/_/lcags kyi thu lum bsregs te chur bcug na chu dron por 'gyur ba'i phyir bcangs kyang nyes med do/_/thams cad [#]la mkho/_lcags kyi thu lum ni nad pa dang mi na ba gnyi ga la [#]bcang du gnang ngo /_/de byung ba'i de la lcags thag gis [#]
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gdags/_lcags kyi thu lum mer bsregs te de la slar dbyung du lag pa mi tsha ba'i phyir lcags thag phre'us [#]btags la dbyung sreg [#]pa'i tshe 'ji ba gsher bas gnan[#]/_thu lum bsregs [#]pa'i lcags 'ji bas g.yogs la thu lum bsreg[# ]/zas kyis reg pa sreg [#]na gnas
[\[274b.2\]]med do/_/lcags kyi thu lum zas kyis reg pa dge slong nad pa [#]zhig chu dron por btung dgos par gyur na zas kyis 'bags pa'i chu bsres te 'thungs kyang nyes med [#]pa ni chu bsres pa'i tshe spags pa yang [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/brtags pa ni [#]sngar bsro/_/brtags [#]pa'i chu dang phyi rol
[\[274b.3\]]che chung gi chu bsro na/_lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pas brtags pa'i chu 'thung ba sngar bsro/_/phyis spyad pa'i'o/_/[#]phyi rol che chung gi chu phyis bsro[#]/_/sngar bsro na lcags kyi thu lum mi bcang ba'i phyir ro/_/mas gso ba'i 'chang [#]nad pa la sman pas phan par rkub nas gyen du
[\[274b.4\]]gce'u gtsugs po'i [#]nang du mar blugs te glo brdzang ba bzhin du de ltar byas kyang rung ngo /_/gzhan gyis bslang nus pa las 'di byas na sbom po'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar sman bya ba yang [#]gzhan cis kyang gso ma nus na gdod ltag ma'i [#]sman thabs su bya/_de la mi tshangs par bya
[\[274b.5\]]ba'am dga' bar 'dod pa'i phyir gce'u bcug cing byed na phas [#]pham pa'i sbom po'o/_/zangs sam khar ba'i sbu [#]gu ni dge ba'i lcags na yin no/_/steng ma'i rkub tu gzhug pa'i sbu [#]gu'i rgyu ni zangs sam/_lcags mnyen po las [#]byas te srid sor bzhi bcu la rkub kyi nang du sor bzhi bcu
[\[274b.6\]]la phyi rol du sor brgyad bzhag ste/_srang [#]du 'gro ba dang phyi rol na 'dug pa'i mtshams su kun de'i mgo 'dra bar bya/_de bzhin du mtshon gyis gso ba'o/_/nad pa'i sman ni byas kyang ma sos na gtar ga [#]bya/_sman gyis [#]gsor rung ba la gtar ga [#]byas na phas pham pa'i sbom por 'gyur ro[#]/_/
[\[274b.7\]]'di ni gtar ga [#]gdab pa las gdod la gzhan mi bya/_gtar ga [#]gdod la bya na rtsa ga la 'dug pa'i steng du byas pa ni nyes med do/_/rtsa med par [#]byas na phas pham pa'i sbom po'o/_/lus la ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis ka sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du byas kyang [#]nyes med do/_/mkhren
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]pa las bcad par [#]mi bya/_dge slong mkhren pas btags te gzhan [#]byung ba sman pa na re bcad na phan no zhes zer kyang sman pa'i ngag mi nyan te mi bcad do/_/mtshon gzhan gang gis kyang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar mtshon gyis mi bcad pa bzhin du mtshon ma yin pa rgyus
[\[275a.2\]]pa dang rta rnga dang so la sogs pas mi [#]gcad do/_/sman dang sngags kyis gso[#]/_/sman dang sngags kyi cho ga bya zhing gso/_/gtum pos/_gzhan 'byung ba la sogs te nad thams cad bdag dang 'khon [#]yod pa'i sman pa gsor mi gzhug_/gso ba'i phyir nub mo za ba mi rigs
[\[275a.3\]]pa ma yin/_dge slong nad pa la sman pas phan par bsgo na phyi dro bza' ba dang bca' ba zos kyang nyes med/_'di la byin len ma byas pas rtseg [#]pa ma brtags par ma [#]dogs shig_/dge slong nad pa ni na ba'i rkyen gyis byin len ma byas pa dang spags pa'ang zos kyang nyes med do/_/
[\[275a.4\]]gso ba'i phyir dril ba'i du ba btung /_dge slong glo dang cham pa na ba la gyo mo'i nang du ba mar dang phye gnyis bsres te de'i du ba btang ngo /_/spu bus [#]'di sbyar ro/_/du ba [#]btung ba ni du ba 'byung bar gyo mo brtol [#]ba'i nang du sbu bu [#]bcug la sbu bu [#]de'i khar bcug la du ba btung ngo /_/lcags
[\[275a.5\]]kyis bya/_ltag ma ltar btung ba'i sbu bu [#]ni lcags las byas te [#]lcags med na smyig ma las [#]byas kyang nyes med do/_/sor bcu gnyis na dge ste mi rno mi rtsub par ro/_/ltag ma ltar du ba rngub pa'i sbu bu [#]sor bcu gnyis man chad brgyad yan chad gang byas kyang rung ste rtse mo mi rno ba
[\[275a.6\]]dang thag thug med par [#]bya/_snod mar ram yungs mar gyis bskus shing gzhag_/du ba rngub [#]pa'i lcags kyi sbu bu btsas [#]mi 'khyer ba'i phyir mar gyis bskus la phyis bdag na'am dge slong grogs na ba'i phyir mi dor bar sba/_ba lang gi so'am [#]gos kyi gdang de la gzhag_/du ba
[\[275a.7\]]rngub pa'i sbu bu sgye'ur bcug la ba lang so'i gos kyi gdang ngam gos kyi gdang gang yang rung ba la gdags/_bkru ba'i phyir mer gzhug[# ]/du ba rngub [#]pa'i lcags kyi sbu bu [#]chus mi 'dag gi mer bsregs na 'dag go/_/sna'i las bya/_mtshul pa subs pa dang klad pa na ba'i phyir
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]sman pa na re chu nas sman 'thung zhig ces zer na 'thungs kyang nyes med/_'di ni sna'i bya bar [#]'gyur ro/_/sna'i nang du sman blugs pa ni lcags las bye'u [#]'dra bar byas la/_chu [#]la gce'u gnyis 'dzag par byas la/_sna bu ga gnyis kyi nang du sman blugs/_bcu gnyis pa mi rno ba
[\[275b.2\]]dge'o/_/ltag ma ltar snar blugs pa'i gce'u gnyis mi rno ba [#]bya/_'di bya/_gong ma ltar snar blugs pa'i gce'u gnyis lcags sam zangs las bya/_sha rjen pa sman gyi phyir sha rjen bza'/_dge slong nad pa sman gzhan gyis mi 'tsho ste sman pa na re sha rjen zo [#]zhes bsgo na
[\[275b.3\]]zos kyang nyes med/_de za mi phod na thabs so/_/nad pa sha rjen za mi nus na thabs 'og ma nas 'byung ba ltar bya/_mig snam bus dgab/_sha rjen mig gis mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir sha ma 'ongs pa'i mdun du mig snam bus g.yogs [#]mi ldang ba'i phyir bsung [#]zhim po dang bsres te'o/_/sha rjen zos pa
[\[275b.4\]]slar skyugs par dogs [#]pa'i phyir spod bsung zhim po dang bsres te bza'o/_/'bags pa phyung ste yid du 'ong ba'i bza' ba dang bca' ba mdun du bzhag ste dgogs/_ltag ma ltar sha rjen zos zin nas phyis mi skyugs [#]pa dang /_mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mig g.yogs pa ma
[\[275b.5\]]shus pa'i mdun du kha ra dang la du bsung [#]zhim po bkram la [#]mig g.yogs pa snam bu bshu/_'di las gzhan pa'i phyir 'di ni [#]sbom po'o/_/bdag dang mi na sman pas kyang phan par ma bsgo bar sha rjen zos na dbyen gyi sbom po'o/_/mi'i sha ni thams cad du'o/_/mi'i sha ni dge slong
[\[275b.6\]]na'ang rung mi na [#]na'ang rung sman pas bsgo'ang rung zar [#]mi gnang ngo /_/zos na dbyen gyi sbom po'o/_/phyir byas pas shes na mi bza'/_bdag gi phyir pha rol gyi phyugs zhig bsad de sha byin te shes bzhin du zos na [#]na'ang rung mi na [#]na'ang rung nyes med/_stag gi god [#]la ma yin/_seng ge ma
[\[275b.7\]]gtogs pa stag la sogs pas phyugs sam gcan gzan gyis zos pa'i lhag ma yang bza' bar re ba'i sems yod pa bdag gis blangs na nyes byas ba lang dang rta dang klu dag ma yin/_'di rnams ming gis smos pa'i sha zos na nyes byas/_rmig pa gcig pa'i dang /_wa [#]dang spre'u
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]dang /_shing rta dang bya rog dang so bya dang khyung dang 'ol ba dang 'ug pa dang de las gzhan yang rol za ba'i bya ba ka dang dza [#]tu ka dang /_sbal pa dang srin bu 'ga' 'dus pa ka dag go/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi sha zos na nyes byas/_'di bcad
[\[276a.2\]]pa'i sha ma yin nam zhes byin len brim [#]pa la dri/_sha zhig gzhan gyis byin nam nyo'am 'drim na ltag ma ming gis smos pa 'di [#]rnams kyi sha ma yin nam zhes dris te [#]yin na mi bza' ba dang /_lug dang ra'i sha ni bzar mi [#]rung /_du ma na dang po pas de dri/_ltag ma ltar 'drim na 'dri
[\[276a.3\]]ba ni gnas brtan gyis bya[#]/_phrin drung na pas so/_/gnas brtan gyis brjed na drung na su 'dug pas kyang dri/_ba glang [#]dang mi'i 'o ma mi btung /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi 'o ma dge slong mi na bas mi btung /_nad pa ni sman pas phan par bsgo na 'thung [#]du dbang ngo /_/ma smad
[\[276a.4\]]pa ni pags pa'i rma la glan pas na blugs pa ni [#]mig byug pa ste mi bza' rnams kyis so/_/ltag tu sha bzar mi rung ba'i rnams dang 'o ma rnam gnyis zos na nyes byas su 'gyur gyi mi bza' bar 'bras sam sna la phan pa'i phyir glan pa dang srab [#]cing 'dug pa la sogs pa lus kyi phyir logs
[\[276a.5\]]su spyad pa ni nyes med do/_/nad pas chang ngam [#]yungs mar ram mar dang bsres pa btung /_dge slong nad pa la phan par bya ba'i phyir mar ram yungs mar gyi nang du chang nyung zad cig blugs te 'thungs kyang nyes med/_nyes med pa [#]ni chang ma yin pa na'o/_/ltag ma ltar mar dang
[\[276a.6\]]bsres pa'i chang yang kha dog kyang chang mi [#]'dra ro dang bsung [#]yang chang mi 'dra na btung du rung ngo /_/bskol bas 'byor to/_/chang zangs gang tsam bskol nas phyed tsam du gdu bas bsung [#]mi bro ro dang kha dog kyang chang mi 'dra na [#]'thung du rung /_'di sar bcug pa la nas brngos pas
[\[276a.7\]]blugs te tshar gyur na'o/_/chang bum gang tsam sa'i [#]'og tu bcug la yos tshig par brngos [#]te chang gi nang du blugs te byibs te bzhag na tshar 'gyur te kha dog kyang chang mi 'dra ro'ang chang mi bro na nyes med/_rgun chang bskol na ra ro bar mi 'gyur/_rgun chang bskol te 'thungs
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bas ra'ang mi ro la bsung [#]chang mi bro na 'thungs kyang nyes med/_so sor ma byas na yod pa ma yin no/_/rgun 'bru [#]dang bu ram shing dang til lta bu dge slong grogs kyis reg pa byin len ma byas pa zos na ltung bar 'gyur nas de rnams kyi khu ba btsir ba dge slong grogs kyis byin
[\[276b.2\]]len ma byas par reg pa 'thungs pa ni nyes byas so/_/bag chags par gyur na yod pa'o/_/smod [#]dam chu kha zas [#]kyis 'bags pa zhig las zas btsos te zos pa rnams kyis [#]nyes byas su 'gyur/_gzhan gyis 'bags par mi shes na gzhan la ni nyes byas med kyi sus shes bzhin
[\[276b.3\]]du byin pa de la kun gyi nyes byas/_chang la bsres [#]pa 'bral ba'i [#]phyir chang gi bsung [#]gis spags pa'i rtsa ba dang sdong po dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang sman skam po'i phye ma'i chus so/_/dge slong chang dad che ba la chang dang 'bral ba'i phyir ming gis smos pa 'di rnams
[\[276b.4\]]smod [#]du bcug ste glum gyi rlangs pa las gtugs te de [#]chu dang bsres te ro skyur tsam cung zad chang bro ba 'thungs kyang nyes med do/_/chang gi snod la spyad pa'i gnas la spags[#]/_gong ma'i phye ma rnams ras dkar po'i thum por byas la chang rlangs pa la sbyang /_ma reg par
[\[276b.5\]]bsrungs [#]te de bas na bri ba brgyal bzhi nas so/_/gong ma ltar chang la sbyangs pa [#]ni chang la ma reg par chang gi spang ma kha nas phris [#]te byas kyang rung chang gzhon [#]nu nam mas yar rgal ba zhig med na gdod sbyang /_de bzhin du ro dang 'bral [#]bar byed pa dang dus ma yin pa'i skom la zas
[\[276b.6\]]kyang ngo /_/me tog dang 'bras bu la la ltag ma ltar phye ma [#]bya ba ni ro kha ba dang mngar ba las [#]mi bya'i nyug pa dang skyur pa las bya/_'di 'dra bar btung ba tshe gcig pa dang zhag bdun pa la bya'i 'phral du btung ba mi [#]la bya ste kha zas kyis 'bags na ltung ba'i phyir ma 'bags par bya/_
[\[276b.7\]]mdzes par na dge/_/kha ba dang mngar ba'ang ro mi zhim pas mi mdzes pa ma yin rnam pa cig [#]tu rnyog ma dang skyo ma lta bu yod na [#]mdzes pa'i phyir ras kyis btsags la gtsang mar byas te btung /_de bas na ras ma dkar pos thum po bya/_ltag ma ltar gtsang sbra dang [#]dang bar bya ba ni
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ras dkar po'i nang du ltag ma'i sdong po dang me tog dang lo ma bcug la btsir na dang ba dang gtsang sbrar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ltar bya'o/_/nad pas kyang chang rtswa'i [#]tor to'ang mi btung ngo /_/nad pa dang min pas kyang rung te [#]chang nyid ni chung ngu dang [#]rtswa mchog tsam yang
[\[277a.2\]]'thung du mi gnang ngo /_/dge bsnyen dang thams cad kyang sbyin/_dge slong rnam bzhi dang dge bsnyen man chad khyim pa su la yang rung chang [#]blud na nyes byas/_dge slong rnam bzhis kyang gzhan la chang blud na nyes byas/_dge bsnyen man chad kyis gzhan [#]la chang blud na bsod
[\[277a.3\]]nams ma yin pa sdig pa skye'o/_/gso ba'i phyir ma gtogs pa ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ste lhag ma thams cad do/_/phas pham pa bzhi dang chang lta bu ni srog la bab kyang mi btung zhing mi dral lo/_/ltag tu rme ba [#]can gyi sha mi bza' ba dang mi dang rta'i 'o ma mi
[\[277a.4\]]'thung ba dang chang mar dang bsres pa dang bskol ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyis mi 'tsho na dben par 'thungs kyang nyes med do/_/btsang [#]dang sgog skya dang rgya sgog kyang mi bza'/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams mi bza' zos na nyes byas so/_/nad pas ni dben par ro/_/ltag ma
[\[277a.5\]]lta bu'i sgog pa rnams nad pas ni cho ga la phan pa'i phyir mtshams kyi phyi rol du dben par bza'/_za ba dang de'i 'og tu btsang [#]ni zhag bdun dge slong gis sgog pa btsang [#]zos nas zhag bdun pa song ste gtsug lag khang du 'jug_/sgog skya ni zhag gsum/_sgog [#]skya zhag tu zos
[\[277a.6\]]na rung zos nas zhag gsum zos te gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug go/_/rgya sgog ni zhag gcig las gtsug lag khang du mi spyad/_dge slong gis [#]dben par rgya sgog ni ltag ma bas ro chung ba'i phyir zhag gcig bsangs [#]te gtsug lag khang du 'gro/_mal stan [#]la
[\[277a.7\]]mi spyad/_ltag tu sgog pa rim pa gsum la zhag tu bsangs pa bzhin du [#]dge 'dun gyi mal stan la zhag gcig gi rim pa bzhin mi spyad/_bshang sar mi 'jug_/ltag ma'i zhag grangs [#]rim pa bzhin du dge 'dun gyi bshang sar [#]mi 'jug_/gzags par ma yin/_ltag [#]ma'i
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]zhag rim pa [#]bzhin gcin gci ba'i sar kyang mi 'jug_/dge 'dun gyi nang du mi 'jug_/ltag ma'i sgog pa rnams zos te zhag grangs ma tshang bar dge 'dun gyi nang du mi 'gro/_mchod rten gyi mtshams su ma yin/_sgog pa zos te zhag grangs ma tshangs par [#]mchod rten la
[\[277b.2\]]phyag 'tshal du mi 'gro/_/de'i tshad ni 'dom mo/_/bdag dang pa'i shas che ste mchod rten la phyag mi 'tshal du mi rung na mchod rten dang bar 'dom gang tsam gyis [#]bcad la bskor/_khyim pa la chos mi bshad/_sgog pa zos pa'i zhag grangs ma tshang par khyim pa la chos mi bshad/_
[\[277b.3\]#]dad pa'i dge bsnyen phyir mi nur ba la bshad kyang nyes med/_grong du mi 'gro/_/sgog pa zos pa'i zhag grangs ma tshang bar grong dang khyim dang [#]khyim du mi 'gro/_/'gro ba mang po'i phyogs su ma yin sgog pa zos te zhag ma tshang bar dge 'dun 'du ba'i sa'am mi mang po 'du ba'i sar mi
[\[277b.4\]]'gro[# ]/mthar khrus so/_/sgog pa zos te zhag grangs tshang na khrus bya/_gos la bsung [#]ba bsal/_bdag sgog pa za ba'i tshe gos la reg pa rnams med par byas te thabs 'og nas 'chad/_bkru ba dang bdugs so/_/gong ma ltar gos [#]sgog pas reg pa ni bkrus la sgog
[\[277b.5\]]pa'i ro med par bya ba'i phyir pog gam spos kyis bdug[# ]/rdzing bu tshun chad la [#]lo nyes pa'o/_/'og nas mdo rdzing bu zhes [#]byung ba yan tshad lo nyes pa'i tshe dbang ba la 'chad de[#]/_phyi rol bzhin du btso [#]gnas pa la yang [#]bsngos te brtags na'o[#]/_/lo nyes kyi tshe mtshams kyi nang du
[\[277b.6\]]btsos pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang du zhag gcig lon pa'i zas dang dge slong gis btsos pa dang byin len [#]ma byas pa dang /_dge slong gis [#]tshang mang nas blangs te gud du za ba dang phyi dro 'bras bu rgun 'bru la sogs pa dang /_shing tog pu ka re la sogs pa phyi dro yang yang [#]za ba dang /_
[\[277b.7\]]bdag gis btsos pa dang phyi dro rgun dang 'bras bu pa [#]ka re la sogs pa 'di brgyad kyang phyi dro lo nyes pa'i tshe bzar dbang ngo /_/bsngo'o/_/lo nyes pa'i tshe mtshams kyi nang du tshang mang dang sris 'tshod [#]bsngor rung ngo /_/lo nyes ma byung ba'i tshe bsngor mi dbang ngo zhes ti [#]ka las 'chad
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]do/_/lo nyes pa ma byung yang sngags kyis [#]gdab cing bsngor rung ngo zhes 'dul ba 'dzin pas bshad do[#]/_/shing drung dang ba lang gi gnas dang mur 'dug gi gnas dang rgyal po'i grong gi [#]dngos po dang dge slong ma'i dbyar mo thang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi khyim sa [#]
[\[278a.2\]]dang sgo phubs [#]dang khyams dang [#]bsro gang gi gnas su yang [#]ma yin no/_/mi [#]dge slong gi tshang mang dang sris mdzod [#]ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gnas su lo nyes pa dang ma nyes pa 'dra ste bsngor mi dbang /_bla gab med pa dang mi'i gnas dang mchod rten gyi gnas dang /_khyim gyi
[\[278a.3\]]gnas su yang ngo zhes gzhan las so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gnas su tshang mang [#]dang sris mdzod byar mi rung ngo zhes 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig gis bshad/_bsgrub pa dang btso ba der mi bya/_ltag tu shing drung dang zhes bya ba man chad gzhan las so zhes bya ba yan
[\[278a.4\]]chad mi gnas su tshang mang dang sris [#]mdzod bsngo ba ma gtogs kyi snod spyad gzhag pa dang kha zas btso ba'ang gnas der mi bya'o/_/btso ba bzlas pa mi bya ba yang ngo /_/ltag tu ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gnas su kha zas btsos [#]zin pa zhig slar btso ba'am ma tshos pa btso ba'i
[\[278a.5\]]gnas kyang der mi bya/_de la dus bzhi ste/_tshang mang dang sris mdzod brtags na rung ba'i gnas bzhi [#]yod de 'og nas 'chad pa yin no/_/thog ma'i pha gu 'jog pa na'o/_/thog ma gtsug [#]lag khang rtsig cing rmang 'ding ba na tshang mang dang sris [#]mdzod du bsngos na'ang rung /_steng du
[\[278a.6\]]las sar pa dang bcas pa na'o/_/khang pa brtsigs te gzhag [#]kun zin la skyang nul lam ri mo tsam ma [#]zin par bsngos na'ang rung ngo /_/gzhan gyi dus dge slong gi gnas ma bral ba'o/_/gtsug lag khang zin te dge slong nang du lhags nas zla ba dang zhag tu lon kyang rung ste/_gtsug
[\[278a.7\]]lag khang dang dge slong gcig kyang zhag [#]tu ma bral na bsngos na [#]rung ngo /_/gnas su ma gyur pa ni 'di dag med pa las dge slong dag byin na'o/_/dge slong gis gtsug lag khang yong ma btang ste stong par 'gyur ba las dge slong kha cig gud nas lhags [#]te zhag ma lon par tshang
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]mang dang sris mdzod bsngos kyang rung rnam pa gcig tu gtsug lag khang gi nang gi dge slong thams cad mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang [#]ste skya rengs byung nas slar gtsug lag khang de'i nang du zhag ma lon par gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bsngos na tshang mang dang sris mdzod du rung ngo /_/
[\[278b.2\]]bya ba gzhan brtsams pa dang zhi ba dag la de'o/_/gtsug lag khang stong [#]par bor la dge slong gud nas lhags [#]pas khang bu 'god pa dang chu lta ba la sogs pa'i las ci'ang mi bya bar thog mar tshang mang dang sris mdzod bsngo'o/_/thams cad dge 'dun gyi las so/_/ltag
[\[278b.3\]]tu gnas bzhir [#]bsngor gnang pa gang zag gi 'og nas 'chad de/_'di ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis kyi las kyis bsngo/_thog ma ni gang zag gi las kyang ngo /_/bsngo ba rnam bzhi ltag tu bshad pa la rmang btsugs pa dang cung zad ma [#]zin pa'i tshe dang
[\[278b.4\]]gnyis ni gang zag gcig gis bsngos kyang rung ngo /_/las sar pas so/_/ltag tu gang zag gis bsngo'o zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang slong ba'i las byed pa'i dge slong gis bsngo ba la bya'o/_/thog ma 'ba' zhig gis so/_/ltag tu las sar pa bas bya zhes bya ba ni dge
[\[278b.5\]]slong de nyid kyis bya ba la bya'i gzhan gyis [#]bsngor mi rung ngo /_/ltag ma'i gang zag gis bsngo ba ni dge 'dun gyi spyir bsngo'o zhes khar brjod do/_/gnyis po la dge slong mang po [#]dgongs te'o/_/ltag tu gang zag gcig gis thog ma'i gnas gnyis bsngo ba'i tshe gan na dge slong
[\[278b.6\]]man chad yod na btsan [#]pa dgongs shig gnas 'di ni dge 'dun gyi tshang mang du 'gyur ro zhes smras pas kyang bsngos par chud do/_/gang na dge 'dun du tshang pa [#]ni gsol ba dang zhu bas bsngo'o/_/mtshams gcig ni gtsug lag khang zin nas nang [#]dge slong lhags pa zhag dang zla ba du
[\[278b.7\]]lon kyang rung ste dge slong gcig dang yang ma bral na dge 'dun 'dus nas gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis tshang mang sris mdzod bsngor rung /_ci tsam na 'ongs te gnas pa de tsam dang mnyam par brtags pa bzhi [#]pa'i gnas zhes tshig gis brjod cing smra/_gtsug lag
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]khang stong par bor ba la dge slong gud nas lhags pas tshang mang dang sris mdzod bsngo ba dang mtshams gcig gi [#]dge slong thams cad ra ba'i phyi rol du skya rengs byung ba la gtsug lag khang du lhags te bsngo ba dang de gnyis ni gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis kyi las
[\[279a.2\]]brjod la/_dge slong thams cad kyis gnas 'dir bya'o zhes brjod do/_/'di du ma la gcig pus gtsug lag khang gi bya ba byas kyang mi mdzes pa ma yin no/_/mtshams chen po gcig gi nang nas [#]gtsug lag khang mang zhig gi dge 'dun gnas gcig tu 'dus te gtsug
[\[279a.3\]]lag khang gcig gi tshang mang dang sris mdzod gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis bsngos na gtsug lag khang gzhan thams cad kyi tshang mang sris mdzod kyang brtags par 'gyur ro[#]/_/tha dad du gyur pa la 'dis bdug par bshad/_mtshams chen po gcig gi nang na gtsug lag
[\[279a.4\]]khang mang zhig 'dug pa'i dge slong gcig tu 'dus te/_ltag ma ltar tshang mang bsngos [#]na kha zas mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa dang btsos pa gnyis kyang mtshams chen po gcig gi nang gi gtsug lag khang thams cad kyi'ang dbang ngo /_/'di gnyis ni mu ge'i tshe ma yin kyang
[\[279a.5\]]dbang ngo /_/'di man chad nas 'byung ba kha [#]gcig ni mu ge'i tshe'ang dbang ngo /_/dge slong gis btsos pa dang /_lo nyes nas mu ge'i tshe tshang mang brtags kyang rung ma brtags kyang rung bdag gis btsos kyang rung grogs kyis btsos kyang rung bzar dbang ngo /_/blang ba'i [#]byin
[\[279a.6\]]len spyad/_dge slong gis sngar kha zas reg pa phyis byin len byas te zos na nyes med do/_/nang par gyi zas kyang ngo /_/mu ge'i tshe yang yang zos kyang nyes med do/_/thug pa ni thams cad du'o/_/thug pa ni nyes kyang rung ma nyes kyang rung yang yang mi chud de 'thung du dbang ngo /_/byin
[\[279a.7\]]blangs nas spangs dang blangs [#]pa yang ngo /_/bsod snyoms blangs te bdag gis ci chog tsam zhig [#]long shig spangs te lhag [#]ma mi za bar bsam [#]pa de slar blangs te zos kyang nyes med za ba'i tshe langs te yang 'dug nas zos kyang nyes med do/_/de lhag ma blangs par ldang ba yang ngo /_/
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]zan bza' bar sa la 'dug ste zos na de chog go zhes [#]byas te slar gtong [#]ba las yang slar 'on [#]cig ces byas te zos kyang rung langs te [#]yang slar 'dug na [#]zos kyang nyes med do/_/mu ge'i tshe mgron du song ba'i lhag ma zos kyang dbang ste nyes med do/_/'di bsag go/_/lo nyes
[\[279b.2\]]pa'i tshe bdag la yon bdag gis zas mang zhig mdun du bzhag ste byin na ci yog tsam zos kyang /_lhag [#]ma yang khyi'u [#]dbang ngo /_/shing gi [#]dus pa der gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste rgun 'bru dang bal po se'u dang /_kha rdzur dang star ga dang 'ba' sta ma dang be'u 'bru dang thang shing dang 'ba'
[\[279b.3\]]'bru dang sin tsi ti ka dag go/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lo nyes pa'i tshe snga dro yang yang zar rung ngo zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_phyi dro yang bzar rung ngo zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_rdzing bu yang ngo /_/ltag tu rdzing bu yan chad lo nyes kyi tshe bzar rung ngo zhes zer ba ni 'di yan chad do/_/
[\[279b.4\]]der gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste pad+mo'i rtsa ba dang 'dzer [#]bu dang 'be ta dang ut+pa la'i rtsa ba dang pad+mo'i sa bon no/_/lo nyes kyi tshe rdzing bu'i nang nas skyes pa 'di rnams kyang bzar rung ngo [#]/_/sman gyi dngos po'o/_/phran tshegs la sogs pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgyal po'am rgyal po'i
[\[279b.5\]]ched du khas mi blang [#]/_rgyal po shi'am med de 'bangs [#]pa la na re dge slong khyod kyis rgyal po'am rgyal tshab bam blon po chen po gyis shig ces zer na'ang khas [#]mi blang /_dge 'dun gyi phyir grong blang /_dge 'dun la grong khyer dang khor yug dang [#]khang khyim 'bul na blang /_zhing yang ngo /_/
[\[279b.6\]]dge 'dun la zhing phul na'ang blang ngo /_/de yal bar mi dor/_ltag tu grong dang zhing byin pa lta bu rmo brko dang zhal ta bya/_'di'i cha sbyin/_bdag gis zhing rmo mi nus na thun shas su btang /_cha blang shing thun shas [#]su btang ba slar mi ster na blang /_byed pas gtsug lag khang du bskur[#]/_
[\[279b.7\]]khyim pa la thun shas su btang ba dge slong nyid kyi khur du mi bskur [#]gyi khyim pa skyed du bzhug[# ]/bdag gi thog mar ro/_/dge slong dang khyim pa gnyis thun shas bgos na dge 'dun dbang ba sngar khyim pa skyed du gzhug [#]go/_/phyis byas na char pa 'ong gis dogs pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]bsrung [#]ba'i phyir dge slong bsko zhing gi [#]shas dang grong gi dpya blang ba'i tshe dge slong dpya ba gcig gzhug_/skye ba dang 'god pa dang gnyis ka dang gang yang rung bar mi mngon na mi bslang [#]/_klus dgon par gtsug lag khang sprul pa drug sdes klan ka
[\[280a.2\]]btsal ba las bcas/_gzhan du na [#]dran pa shes bzhin [#]mdun du byas te der 'jug go/_/ltag ma lta bu ma yin rgyu ga las 'ongs pa'ang shes las [#]zad par 'gyur ba'ang shes na rgyu lhag chad ci yod pa brtsis kyang nyes med/_dge 'dun gyi phyir g.yog blang /_yon bdag
[\[280a.3\]]dad pas dge 'dun la yon du g.yog phul na blangs [#]kyang nyes med/_gang nas sgras gtsug lag khang du [#]yong ba der khang pa brtsig [#]par bya/_gtsug lag khang gi rkyen du yon bdag dad pas grong [#]phul ba'am rtse rgod lta bu gtsug lag khang gi 'dab ca co dang sgra mi thos
[\[280a.4\]]pa tsam gyi tshong du gnas khang byas la gzhag_/de ste las byed na zas byin pa bya/_rtse rgod dang lha bran dge 'dun gyi las byed na zas dang gos dge 'dun gyis sbyin/_ba lang dang ma he dang ra lug dang bal glang dang rta [#]dang rnga mo dang bong bu dang 'bru rjen pa dang snod dag kyang ngo /_/ming gis
[\[280a.5\]]smos pa 'di rnams dge 'dun la phul na blangs kyang nyes med/_'di mchod rten la ma brtags pa [#]ma yin/_grong dang zhing dang rdzas la sogs pa mchod rten la yon du phul na [#]blangs kyang nyes med/_kha gzar bcang /_zas bza' ba'i tshe kha gzar [#]bcangs kyang nyes med/_tshwa khug
[\[280a.6\]]kyang ngo /_/tshwa khug bcangs kyang nyes med 'di dag dang phyi bzhin du btung ba'i phor [#]du las gzhan pa'i khar [#]ba'i snod gang zag gis mi bcang /_gang zag gis khar [#]ba'i kha gzar dang khar [#]ba'i tshwa khug dang chu lta [#]ba dang rnangs pa'i [#]bzhin du chus 'phul ba'i snod 'di rnams [#]bzhi
[\[280a.7\]]las gzhan gang zag gis mi bcang /_kun dga' ba bcang /_gtsug lag khang gi ra ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog rnyed na bcang /_ma rnyed na gla bya ba yin/[ #]mtshungs pa'i byis pa bsrung ba'i phyir 'bul na blang khyim pa rtag par bu shi bas phyis bu gcig bdog ste shi nas dge slong
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]gi g.yog tu phul na dge slong gis [#]blangs la gtsug lag khang du gzhag_/bu mo na dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du gzhag_/de'i mtshan ma mgul bar [#]gos gdags pa yin no/_/'dreg [#]gis mi khyer bar bya ba'i phyir dge slong gis chos gos kyi [#]tshal bu mgul du gdags/_
[\[280b.2\]]rked par yang ngo /_/chos gos kyi tshal bu rked par btags [#]kyang rung ngo /_/snying rje'i sems kyis bsrung /_byis pa bdag gi gan du bzhag pa de phyis g.yog [#]tu bya ba'am 'di bcangs kyang bya dga' mang zhig byin du re ba'i phyir ni mi bsrung gi phongs te skyabs tshol ba'i phyir snying rjes
[\[280b.3\]]brtsi bar bya'o/_/de'i gnyen gyis phul na blang /_byis pa bzhag pa de'i pha ma'am [#]gnyen gyis spyan gzigs sam gos shig dge slong de la phul na blangs kyang nyes med/_mthar rngan [#]pa yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar byis pa bzhag pa phyis ma [#]shi ste sos nas de'i phyir pha mas dad de nor
[\[280b.4\]]dang rdzas byin na len du gnang ngo /_/nges drin shes par yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar byis pa gsos pa de nyid kyis khyod kyi yin no zhes zer zhing nor 'bul na len du dbang ngo /_/rngan pa mi blang /_dge slong gis byis pa gsos te ma shi ba rngan pa byin zhes mi bya/_'bras bu la sogs pa bdag
[\[280b.5\]]gir bya/_yon [#]bdag gis shing tog la sogs pa dge 'dun dang gang zag la 'bul na sus phul kyang len du dbang /_mar dang til dang sbrang rtsi dang bu ram gyi [#]rdza ma yang ngo /_/[#]ming gis [#]smos pa 'di rnams rdza ma bkang ste dge 'dun dang gang zag gang la phul kyang
[\[280b.6\]]len du dbang ngo /_/de'i snod kyang ngo /_/ltag ma rnams kyi snod rdza ma la sogs pa phul kyang len du dbang ngo /_/de'i gzhi bzhag_/rdza ma'i zhabs su lcug skor gyi gzhi gzhag bshang gci dang chang gi [#]snod dag mi spyad/_rdza ma la sogs pa'i snod bshang gcis reg pa'am chang gis reg pa [#]yon du phul kyang mi
[\[280b.7\]]blang /_bdag cag yod na'ang spang /_btso ba dang bsreg pa dge 'dun gyi phyir bsrung ba [#]bya/_kha zas btso ba dang khur ba la sogs pa bsreg cing btso ba yang dge 'dun gyi phyir dge slong gis 'di bsreg [#]'di tshos zhes byas kyang btsos par mi chud/_mkhan po byi shu tus ni kha zas 'tshed
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pa'i tshe dge slong tho ngan gcig spyan du gzhag ces bshad/_zas 'ongs kyi bar du thel gyis ma bzhag par 'jug cing mi spyod/_bsod snyoms blang ba'i tshe zas mi [#]'ongs par lhung bzed lag pa'i mthil du bzhag cing mi bslang zas g.yogs [#]pa bcang /_lhung
[\[281a.2\]]bzed kha bcad pa'i ras bcangs kyang nyes med/_khar [#]ba'i snod dang gzhi 'di dag spyi'i ma yin par ma dogs shig_/lag tu khar [#]ba'i snod rnam bzhi las gang zag spyod du [#]mi gnang ba bzhin du dge slong ma'ang 'chang du mi gnang /_nad pa mo zhwa bcang ba ma brtags
[\[281a.3\]]par ma yin no/_/dge slong ma na ba'i tshe zhwa ji lta bu [#]rung bcang du gnang /_'khar gsil gyi sgra ma byung bar zas kyi phyir grong du mi 'jug grong du bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe 'khar gsil gyi sgra ma phyung bar zan mi blang /_de bcang /_mkhar [#]gsil bcang /_rigs su 'jug pa shes
[\[281a.4\]]par nan tan bya/_grong du slong ba'i tshe lam srang gya gyu mang du 'dug na thog ma'i lam srang mi nor bar bsam zhing /_phyi shu [#]tus ni grong mang du yod na rim gyis [#]bsod snyoms bslang [#]zhes bshad mngon mtshan bya ba'i phyir zas dor ba la sogs pas so/_/grong du 'jug pa'i tshe dge slong nges
[\[281a.5\]]rgyus mi shes te lam nor gyis dogs na su'i gtsug lag khang ga las gar 'dug pa yid la mtshan mar bzung ba dang phye la sogs par mdo mdor ga las 'ongs par gtor/_phyi shu [#]tas ni grong stug po la [#]zas lan gnyis pa blangs kyis dogs pa'i phyir mtshan ma gdab pa la bshad/_
[\[281a.6\]]chos kyi tshong pas 'tsho bar mi brtag [#]chos bshad pa'i gla mi blang ba dang mi 'di la chos bshad na zas dang sman dang gos la sogs pa byin par re ba'i phyir/_de'i phyir chos mi bshad chu ma grub na zho khu dag gis rkang pa bkru/_chu dkon pa'i sar chu med de khyim pas chur khu zhig byin na
[\[281a.7\]]de'ang brtags te rkang pa bkru'o/_/rtswa'i [#]thum po la 'dug kyang rung dge slong stan med na rtswa'i thum po la 'dug kyang nyes med do/_/dben par bla gab med pas bzhag_/lhag [#]ma ltar rtswa stan la nub mo nyal ba nang par langs nas rtswa stan de bsdus te dben par bzhag_/spungs te yang ngo /_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]dge slong mang na rtswa stan mang du spung /_rnam [#]gcig tu ltag ma ltar nyal ba las langs na spungs te bzhag kyang nyes med/_zin nas dor[#]/_nub mo [#]zhag lon nas rtswa stan de bskur [#]ba ma yin gyi dor ro/_/phal che na du mar bya'o/_/dge slong phal cher 'dus na gral rim du mar byas kyang rung
[\[281b.2\]]ste 'og nas 'chad do/_/lnga brgya par yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar nyis stong sum stong zhig yod na lnga brgya lnga brgyar [#]phreng ba bya/_rgan rims so so [#]nas bsog_/dge slong mang pos [#]'dus na rgan po rnams gral logs shig tu bya/_gzhon nu'ang logs shig tu gral byas la rgan
[\[281b.3\]]gzhon gyi [#]zas kyang so sor gzhag_/'drim pa [#]ni mi bzhod par zhal ta bsko/_dge slong gcig 'drim pa bzhod dam mi bzhod pa'i spyan du bzhag_/thog mar [#]zas la gtogs pas bza' tho ngan dang spyan phyis las 'brel pa'i phyir zan dge 'dun pas sngar zos kyang nyes med/_rgan
[\[281b.4\]]rims su 'khod pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i phyir du ba mang na dge slong dag bsko/_dge slong rgan po dang gzhon nu dang dge slong zhig [#]'dug na 'drim pa la mnyam pa'i phyir so sor bkang du bcug la zhal ta ba mang du bskos/_so sor 'drim gnyis sam gsum bor nas 'dir dge slong ma ci bder
[\[281b.5\]]'khod do[#]/_/dge slong ma tshar gcig tu bkang na ltag tu stan rim pa gnyis gsum bor la 'dug par bya'o/_/bza' ba'i gnas su sgra bskyungs te 'deng ngo /_/zas bza' ba'i tshe grong dang gtsug lag khang 'dra ste ca co med par sgra bskyungs te 'dug_/rab tu bsdams pa'i tshul
[\[281b.6\]]gyis so/_/zan za ba'i tshe lus dang ngag dang yid bsdams te bza'/_mdzes par ro/_/zas za ba'i spyod lam bzhir mdzes par bya/_de bzhin du 'khod do[#]/_/stan la 'dug pa'i tshe gong ma rnams bzhugs la 'dug go/_/bza' ba [#]rkang pas mi brdzi/_kha zas kyi bag la rkang pas mi brdzi/_
[\[281b.7\]]lhung bzed kyi gzhi [#]rkang pas mi brdzi lhung bzed kyi gzhi [#]sho ma'am gzhong pa la sogs pa yang rkang pas mi brdzi/_sems mi g.yeng bar dran pa mngon par bzhag ste bsod snyoms blang [#]/_zas byin len byed pa'i tshe sems yan [#]man du mi gtong [#]bar bsam pa'i rgyud bzhin du blang mi 'thor
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]bar lus kyi tshad du'o/_/kha zas blang ba'i tshe snod las yan [#]man du mi 'thor bar [#]bya ba dang bdag 'grangs [#]pa tsam du blang ngo /_/'di dag ni [#]mi bsre/_zan za ba'i tshe phye dang 'bras bu mi bsre rnam pa [#]gcig tu grogs kyi [#]zan skal dang mi bsre bar blang /_mi dkrug_/
[\[282a.2\]]bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe 'o ma dang tshod ma dkrugs shing [#]mi sdug par mi bya/_zan za ba'i tshe yang mi sdug par mi bya/_rab tu dgab[#]/_bdag zan za ba'i tshe dben par bza'/_rnam pa gcig tu grogs kyi zan len pa g.yog [#]byas te bskur/_dus las 'das [#]par mi dkri[#]/_grogs
[\[282a.3\]]kyis zas len du bcol ba dus ma 'das par blang zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_nad pa dang nad g.yog dang dkor ba dang phas 'ongs pa dang tshus 'ongs pa 'di rnams ni tshang mang nas dus las sngar len cing bzar [#]yang dbang ngo /_/gang las spyan drangs pa las [#]de las gzhan rnyed de bdag
[\[282a.4\]]gir bya ba [#]mi rigs pa med do/_/yon bdag gis sngar thug pa'am tshod ma la [#]spyan drangs pa la phyis la du'am zhim dgu zhig sbyar te gsol kyang [#]bzar dbang ngo /_/nyes med pa ni bdag gis zas za ba [#]las gzhan las [#]blangs na'o/_/bdag gis zas nar [#]ma zhig za zhing 'dug pa
[\[282a.5\]]la yon bdag gam/_grogs po'am dge slong ngam zhig gis spyan gzigs sam [#]zas shig byin na de dang bcas te zos na nyes med do/_/der chud pa bzhin du gzhan gyis spyan drangs te 'dug pa las des gnang nas gzhan gyis byin na'o/_/yon bdag gcig gis dge 'dun spyir
[\[282a.6\]]spyan drangs pa las yon bdag de'i gnas na zan bza' ba'i tshe sbyin bdag gzhan zhig gis spyan gzigs sna 'ga' zhig dge 'dun la 'drim zhes zer na sngar spyan drangs pa'i yon bdag gis brims [#]shig ces zer na brim [#]kyang nyes med/_'drim du mi rung ngo zhes zer na mi brim[#]/_sgra'i
[\[282a.7\]]sbyor bar bsams pa'i don gyis [#]tshul te grags pa'i ma yin no/_/[#]yon bdag dad pa la la zhig gis dge slong la sangs rgyas khyod la yon 'bul lo zhes zer ba'i tshe yid la bdag dga' ba dang 'tshe bar ma [#]bsams na yon blangs kyang nyes med/_blangs te mi btang /_yon la sogs
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]pa byin no cog la dgongs sam mi dgongs pa sngar brtags te blangs gis [#]blangs zin nas slar mi sbyin no/_/lta ba dang /_dge slong gis dge bar lta ba las yon blangs te log pa la lta ba la byin na bdag la gnyer du 'gyur ba'i phyir nyes byas/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa las blangs
[\[282b.2\]]te/_dge slong gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa las yon blangs te phas pham pa la sogs te [#]tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa la byin na bu lon du 'gyur ba'i steng du nyes byas/_gzhan rim [#]bzhin du byin pa dang /_mdo ltag ma'i rim pa ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang [#]dge slong dge bar [#]
[\[282b.3\]]lta ba las yon blangs te tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa dang [#]log par lta ba la byin na dad pa'i yon bdag gi bsod nams su mi 'gyur bas dge slong la bu lon du 'gyur ba'i [#]steng du nyes byas zhes bshad do/_/kham la sogs pa chung ngu bya ba las lhag par blangs te zos na dad pas byin
[\[282b.4\]]pa chud gsan pa'o/_/yon bdag dad pa la la zhig gis [#]dge slong mgron du bos te kha zas la sogs pa sna mi nyung ba zhig 'drim na bdag 'grangs [#]pa tsam gyi tshong blang gi ma 'ong par [#]blangs nas lhag rol la sogs par byas na yon bdag gi zas chud zos pa'i nyes byas zhes bshad/_
[\[282b.5\]]brgya la chog pa tsam du spags te blangs pa las ma 'grangs [#]na phyis bsnan te [#]zos pa ni nyes med do/_/pha dang ma dang nad pa dang rab tu byung bar 'dod pa dang /_sbrum pa [#]dang /_'dul bar 'dod pa [#]dang /_zas la reg pa dang /_khyim pa yang 'ongs na de las bgo bar bya/_dge slong gis
[\[282b.6\]]dad pa'i yon bdag las bsod snyoms su blangs te ma dad pa dang tshul khrims log par lta ba la zan [#]byin na bu lon du gyur pa'i steng du nyes byas pa yin na bdag gis bsod snyoms ran par blangs pa las ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la bgos te byin pa ni nyes med do/_/kham gyi
[\[282b.7\]]changs [#]pa bzhag_/dge slong zan za ba'i tshe zan gyi changs [#]pa gcig sngar bcad la gzhag_/bza' ba ni mi bsngo/_/mdo ltag ma ltar zan gyi changs [#]pa bzhag pa de 'di sbyin no zhes gcig la mi [#]bsngo phyugs kyang sbyin mdo ltag ma ltar zan gyi changs [#]pa bzhag pa de mdun du mi dang
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]phyugs su phrad pa la sbyin/_bza' ba ma zin pa'i phyir gzhag pa las mi sbyin/_dge slong gzhan la zan zhig sbyin na zan khar ma bcug pa'am 'grangs [#]pa'i 'og tu sbyin gyi bdag za bzhin du gzhan la mi sbyin/_spyan drangs te dad pas byin pa ma yin/_yon
[\[283a.2\]]bdag dad pa la la zhig gis spyan gzigs dang zas la sogs pa dge slong khyod 'ba' zhig zo [#]shig ces zer ba'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig gis bza' bar khas blangs pa la'ang grogs po la sogs pa gzhan la mi sbyin/_lhung bzed kyi gnas kyi [#]zas kyi lhag ma dag la ci bde
[\[283a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/bdag zas zos pa'i lhag ma la ci bder zo shig ces byas te 'gro_/gnas pa dag gtor ma sbyin bdag zas za ba'i tshe lha khang bsrung ba'i lha srin la sogs pa la gtor ma byin[#]/_de'i rtog pa'i rjes su snga dro la sogs pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang
[\[283a.4\]]gi 'khor du gtor ma gtang [#]ba'i ni kha cig snga dro kha cig phyi dro sbyin pa yod pas snga dro dang phyi dro mi nor bar dus [#]dus su sbyin/_rtog pa tha dad tha dad du'o/_/gtsug lag khang gi srung [#]ma'i lha la khyim pas mchod pa yod de khyim pas snga dro dang phyi dro mchod pa yod pa'i dus bzhin
[\[283a.5\]]du mchod cing gtor ma sbyin/_gcig chur ma gyur pa'i gnas kyi a mra [#]mi bza'/_shing tog a mra [#]ma smin par mi bza' de bzhin du [#]ku shu dang /_kham bu dang rgun 'bru la sogs pa'ang ma [#]smin par mi bza'/_rtsa ba dang sdong po dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang bca' ba
[\[283a.6\]]'bras chan dang sna tshogs dang phye dang sha dang khu [#]ba dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar sar dang nya sha dang sha skam dag la [#]brtags pa ma yin/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni brtags pa yin te zos shing 'thungs kyang nyes med de rnam pa [#]'di bco lnga la thog ma lnga ni bca' ba'o/_/
[\[283a.7\]]bar ma lnga ni bza' ba'o/_/tha ma rnams ni btung ba yin/_so ma dang yungs kar gyi rtsa ba dang sdong po dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i thug pa mi 'thung [#]bar ma dogs shig_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las thug par byas pa zhig dge slong gis 'thungs kyang brtags
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa ste nyes med/_rta'i phyir khu bas so/_/bdag gi lus gso ba dang brtas [#]par bya ba'i phyir 'o ma dang sha khu [#]lta bu 'thungs kyang nyes med/_chus kyang ngo /_/bdag gi nyams [#]brtas par bya ba'i phyir khu ba dang 'o ma la sogs pa med na phye dang chur sbyar ba'i zan dang thug pa btung rkyal par
[\[283b.2\]]bcug pa ma brtags pa ma yin/_rkyal pa'i nang du kha zas la sogs pa bcug pa zhig dge slong gis zos kyang ma brtags pa ma yin te nyes med/_snod du zas bza' ba dang brtag [#]pa'o/_/zangs dang khar [#]ba la sogs pa'i snod spyad kyi nang du zas za ba'i tshe sman snod snyam du bsams
[\[283b.3\]]te zos kyang nyes med/_shing gi yang ngo /_/shing[#] rdo lta bu zhig las phor deb tu byas pa bsre/_rdo yang ngo /_/bsre bskus pa dang ma bskus pa 'dra ste dge slong gis spyad cing bcangs kyang nyes med/_zas spyad pa yang ngo /_/rdo la sogs pa'i phor deb kyi nang du zan zos la zos pa'i 'og tu
[\[283b.4\]]dag par bkrus na phyis kyang de'i nang du bzar rung /_bkru ba ni gnas pa'i gtogs pa'o/_/mdo ltag ma ltar rdo dang shing las byas pa'i snod spyad du gtogs pa [#]rnams mkhan po nyid kyis mi bkru ba'i mkhan po zan za ba'i snga rol du gnas 'cha' ba dang /_dge sbyong la sogs pas
[\[283b.5\]]dag par bkrus te mdun du gzhag_/zos nas kyang ngo /_/mkhan po zas zos pa'i 'og tu gnas 'cha' ba la sogs pas dag par bkrus te gnas su gzhag_/pha rol po dang lhan cig tu snod gcig tu mi bza'/_khyim pa la sogs pa mang zhing mi dben pa'i sar dge slong grogs dang
[\[283b.6\]]gzhong pa gcig gi nang du zan mi bza'/_lam du snod [#]med na bza'/_lam du zhugs te snod kyis [#]phongs na gzhong pa gcig gi nang du mi gnyis bzar rung /_dge slong dang ngo /_/mdo ltag ma ltar gnyis snod gcig gi nang du bzar rung ba'ang dge slong dang bzar rung gi dge sbyong
[\[283b.7\]]dang bzar [#]mi rung ngo /_/gzhan gyi lag bteg nas bdag gis gzhug_/mdo ltag ma ltar snod gcig gi nang du za ba'i tshe lag pa 'dom par 'gyur ba'i phyir pha rol gyi lag pa gteg [#]nas bdag gis gzhug_/dge sbyong dang lhan cig tu'ang gzhan bzhin du mi rung /_
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]snod med kyang dge sbyong dang lhan cig mi bza'i spags te sbyin/_zan gud du mi grub na byin len ma zhig par byas te lhan cig zos kyang nyes med/_brtag pa bsgongs [#]te sbyin/_lam du zhugs pa'i tshe mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir g.yog la sogs pa la zan zos
[\[284a.2\]]shig [#]par bsgo'o zhes byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_dge sbyong zas gud du sbyin na mi 'brul bar sbyin zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_gnyen bsam pas gsol na/_thams cad du'ang dben pa'i sa phyogs su'o/_/gnyen zhig gis [#]nga dang lhan cig mi bza' mi rung zhes dus kyis btsus [#]te
[\[284a.3\]]gsol na [#]sus kyang mi mthong bar dben pa'i phyogs su bza'/_byin len ma zhig pa dang yang byin len ma blangs pa dang ma 'dres par bsrung [#]/_mdo ltag ma ltar khyim pa la [#]gnyen nam dge sbyong dang lhan cig tu snod gcig tu bza' ba'i tshe bdag gi lag pa g.yon pas sle'u'am gzhong pa'i
[\[284a.4\]]mthe ma [#]ma shor bar gzung [#]la lag pa g.yas byin len byas te bza'/_lham dang bcas te mi bza'/_zan za ba'i tshe lham mi bgo'o/_/nad pas mnan/_nad pas ni lham phud la zan za ba'i tshe sa grang mo la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir lham rkang pa'i 'og tu mnan te bza'/_
[\[284a.5\]]sgren mo'am gos gcig par ma yin sgren mo'am khyed rengs su byas te zan mi bza'/_nad pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/nad pa ni khyed rengs ma dang sgren mor zos kyang nyes med do/_/g.yog gis 'di dben par bya/_mdo ltag ma ltar nad pa sgren mo [#]za ba'i tshe nad g.yog gis sbra'am gur lta
[\[284a.6\]]bu phub ste sus kyang mi mthong bar bya/_nus na rngul gzan la gnas/_nad pa mi nus na rngul gzan tsam gyon te zas zos kyang nyes med/_phyogs dben par ro/_/mdo ltag ma ltar rngul gzan tsam gyon kyang mi nus na nad g.yog gis dben par bzhag ste zan sbyin/_za ba'i phyir 'dug
[\[284a.7\]]pa la 'di dang 'o na byin len [#]zhes 'drim pa la mi bsgo/_mi na bar zan za ba'i tshe zas 'di dang 'di 'dod ces 'drim pa la bsgo zhing mi bslang [#]/_ltung ba med [#]na nad pa dang 'byor pa ste/_nad pas ni zas gang 'dod pa bslangs kyang nyes med do/_/'di lta ste mi gzhan pa la bcos pa dang /_
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]nad pa rlung nad che ba dang grang pa'i nad la kha [#]zas drod bag slong ba'ang nyes med/_me drag pa la gzen pa po'o/_/tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa la kha zas grang bag bslangs pa'ang [#]nyes med/_nad pa'i 'du shes su bdag nad pa dang /_zas bza' ba sman du 'du shes par gzhag_/zas [#]za ba'i
[\[284b.2\]]tshe bdag ni nad pa yin zan [#]ni sman yin par bsams te bza'/_dran pa yang ngo /_/zas za ba'i tshe bsams pa'i rgyud ma brjed par byas te za ba dang thu thu hu hu la sogs pa byas sam ma byas dran par bya skyes pa dang 'dra ba dang /_zas bza' ba'i tshe mi gtsang ba las skyes par bsams te mi
[\[284b.3\]]chags par bza'/_'bras dang kha zas la sogs pa srin bu dang skra [#]dang mi lpags 'dra bar bsams te mi chags par bsam[#]/_gyur pa dang /_kha zas zos nas sme ba dang mi gtsang bar gyur par bsams te mi chags par bza'/_dgra dang /_zas kyi phyir gcig la gcig gsod pa
[\[284b.4\]]dang gnod par byed pas dgra dang 'dra bar bsam/_zag pa dang /_zas 'di zos nas slad rol che chung lta bur zag ste 'gro bas mi rtag pa dang btsog par bsams te bza'/_rkyen dag gis [#]cho ga dang /_kha zas 'di ni mi dang phyugs la sogs pas nyon mongs par brtsal zhing rmos [#]pa las skyes pa
[\[284b.5\]]yin pas mi chags pa dang mi gtsang bar bsams te bza'/_brtsal [#]ba dang /_las dang nyon mongs pa spyad de zas rnyed pa yin pas dka' [#]ba lta bur bsams te bza'/_dbang gzhan la lus pa dang /_zas za ba'i tshe yon bdag rgyal po lta bu zhig gis byed na'ang yon bdag dga' na
[\[284b.6\]]ni ster/_mi dga' na ni mi ster/[# ]bram ze dang khyim pa lta bu zhig la slong ba'i tshe'ang dga' na ni ster/_mi dga' na ni mi ster bas dbang gzhan la lus par bsams te bza'/_nad pa'i dang bcas pa dang /_zas za ba'i tshe kha zas sman du 'gyur ba dang /_sman du mi 'gyur ba gnyis
[\[284b.7\]]bsres te zos na'ang nad du 'gyur [#]kha zas snga ma ma zhu bar phyi ma zos na'ang nad du 'gyur/_phyi dro zas zos na'ang nad du 'gyur ba yin te zas 'di zos nas nad du 'gyur ba yin no snyam du bsams te bza'/_so sor 'gro ba rnams la mngon par gzhag pa mi mthun par ro/_/zas zos
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pa'i las bzhi cha gcig ni bdag gi [#]khong na [#]srin bu 'dug pas zos bzhi cha gcig ni khong gi mes gdungs bzhi cha gcig ni ngan skyug tu [#]byung /_bzhi cha gcig ni btsag tu gyur te zas za ba'i tshe 'di ltar rnam bzhir gyur pa [#]so sor bsams [#]te ma zos na nyes byas/_
[\[285a.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste'o/_/byin len byed pa'i tshe'ang grong du smos pa rnams mi gtsang ba dang mi rtag par bsams te blang /_ma 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis so/_/zan za ba'i tshe sems ma 'khrugs pa dang mi g.yengs par [#]bya ste bza'/_shes bzhin pa dang /_zas za ba'i tshe
[\[285a.3\]]mang po bslab pa'i nang nas 'byung ba las 'gal lam ma 'gal dran par bya ba dang 'grangs pa [#]las lhag par mi blang /_sgra bskyungs [#]te'o/_/zan za ba'i klag chor [#]dang gad mo mi bya bar bza'/_'di mi bya/_rkang lag dang phor snod la sogs pa zas za ba'i tshe mi brdab/_thug pa sgra mi
[\[285a.4\]]bslang [#]/_thug pa 'thung pa'i tshe hub sgra mi bya/_bkrum bkrum ste ma yin/_zan za ba'i tshe kha zas skam po zhig 'ongs na sgra bkrum bkrum mi zer bar bza'/_sgra byed pa chu la sogs pas spangs te'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar kha zas skam po zhig 'ongs na sgrar mi 'gyur bar spangs te bza'/_
[\[285a.5\]]bza' ba'i phyir bsil na ma yin no/_/rol mo la sogs pa byed bzhin du zas mi za ste sdod cig ces bya/_bshad pa byed pa na ma yin/_dge 'dun mang po zas zos zin pa'i 'og tu gnas brtan gyis sbyin pa'i bshags pa byed pa'i tshe zan mi bza'/_de thos na'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar
[\[285a.6\]]gnas brtan gyis sbyin pa'i 'chags pa byed pa thos bzhin [#]du zan mi bza'/_ma thos par zos pa ni nyes med do/_/dus 'das na tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsum du'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar gnas brtan tshigs bcad klog pa'i tshe tshigs bcad zin zin du bsdang na gdugs
[\[285a.7\]]tshod mi thub pa tsam gyi [#]tshod na sh+lo ka [#]gnyis gsum tsam bklag [#]pa'i 'og tu zan zos pa nyes med/_zos na zhal nas gsungs pa brjod [#]do/_/dge slong su'ang rung ste zan zos zin nas tshigs bcad gcig bya/_spyan drangs te zos na sbyin pa'i bshags pa dang chos bshad pa
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]dag bya/_gud du mgron du bos te zan zos zin pa'i 'og tu sbyin bdag mdun du bzhag ste tshigs bcad dang chos bshad dag bya/_thams cad zos par shes nas so/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar gnas brtan gyi [#]tshigs bcad dang chos bshad pa ni zas zos zin nas bya/_blta ste'o/_/sU
[\[285b.2\]]tra ltag ma ltar gnas brtan gyis sbyin pa'i bshags pa bya ba'i tshe thams cad zan zos zin nam ma zin brtags la zin na bya/_du ma'i dang pos so/_/dge slong mang zhig 'khod kyang tshigs bcad dang chos bshad pa ni gral dpon gyis bya/_mi nus na gzhan nus pa la bcol/_sU tra
[\[285b.3\]]ltag ma ltar tshigs bcad dang chos bshad la sogs pa gral dpon gyis [#]mi nus na 'og ma la bcol kyang nyes med/_de ste ma byas par 'gro'am rkyen gcig gis ni [#]dge slong las g.yog sbyin/_dge 'dun mgron [#]du bos pa las zan zos kyi 'og tu tshigs [#]bcad dbyar mi slebs
[\[285b.4\]]par rkyen gcig gis 'dod na gral dpon tshigs bcad byed pa'i g.yog bcang /_bcu tsam bskos te 'dod ces byi dza ya bar mas bshad/_gral dpon gyis tshig [#]sbyar du mi rings te/_chos 'chad pa dang tshigs bcad byed pa bsgo [#]te 'gro zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_mthar na
[\[285b.5\]]bzhi'o/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar gral dpon gyis sbyin pa'i bshags pa byed pa'i g.yog dge slong bca' bcu tsam bzhag tu med na dge slong bzhi man chad bzhag byin pas kyang rkyen gcig gis na zhus te'o[#]/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar gnas brtan tshigs bcad byed pa g.yog tu bskos
[\[285b.6\]]pa rnams kyang rkyen gcig byung ste rings na dge 'dun gzhes [#]shig ces zhus te rkyen sar [#]tshigs bcad byas te 'dong [#]/_sbyin pa'i bshags par dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo'i ming dbyung /_sbyin pa'i bshags pa byed pa'i sbyin bdag la smon lam btab pa'i 'og tu dga' bo dang
[\[285b.7\]]bsnyen dga' bo'i ming nas phyung ste tshe ring ba [#]dang bde bar shog shig ces dge 'dun gyis smon lam gdab/_mid pa gnyis te dus ma yin par byung na thog ma'i gnyis gsum por la kha bkrus te mid do/_/phyugs la mid pa gnyis yod de zas [#]dang chu la sogs pa mid pa'ang tha
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]dad par zas la sogs pa sngar zos nas mtshan mo slar ldang ngo [#]/_/dge slong la la zhig phyugs bzhin du kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu skyug cing slar ldang na lan gnyis gsum phyir bor te kha bkru'o/_/de phyin chad [#]mi dor slar mid do/_/'di kha zas ma yin pa ni
[\[286a.2\]]ma yin no/_/skyug bu [#]lta bu'i 'drog [#]la kha zas byung na slar mid kyi phyir dor te [#]kha bkru/_ltar [#]mid na nyes byas/_de bas na dus ma yin par skyugs [#]pa dang langs nas ni gzhan gyis kyang bkru'o/_/sU [#]tra gong ma ltar skyug bu'i 'drog [#]la kha zas 'byung ba dang res 'ga' na ba'i phyir
[\[286a.3\]]skyugs pa byung ba'i 'og tu slar mid na dus [#]ma yin pa'i zas su 'gyur bas thams cad phyir bor la kha bkru/_ma bcas pa'i phyogs su mchil ma mi dor/_mchil ma dor ba'i gnas su byas pa ma yin pa gtsug lag khang la sogs pas bzang ngo cog tu mchil ma mi dor/_gtar
[\[286a.4\]]gtar po ma yin/_sa thang bu bzang po gtar [#]gtar por phyags par lud pa mi dor/_de'i sgra yang gnas brtan gyi mdun du mi bya/_lud pa'i sgra la sogs pa gnas brtan dang bla ma'i mdun du mi bya/_bza' ba ma yin/_zan za ba'i tshe grogs po la sogs pa skyug bro ba'i phyir lud
[\[286a.5\]]pa'i sgra mi bya/_yang yang du ni lhag ma la'ang [#]ma yin/_gnas brtan gyi 'og ma'i mdun du lan 'ga' ni ma gtogs te lan mang du lud pa'i sgra mi bya zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_dge slong grogs po'i mdun du zas mi za ba'i tshe'ang lud pa'i sgra la sogs pa 'dod 'dod du mi bya zhes byi dza
[\[286a.6\]]ya bar mas bshad/_mi nus na gzhan du 'gro'o/_/lud pa dang mchil ma la sogs pa 'dod 'dod [#]'ongs te de dgag tu mi btub na gnas dben par song ste sa mi gtsang bar mchil ma dor/_gzhan la mi bde bar mi bya/_lud pa 'dor ba ni gzhan la chags pa dang gzhan la mi
[\[286a.7\]]mdzes par mi dor/_sngur cing mi nyal/_grogs bsam gtan byed pa la gnod pa'i phyir sngur bzhin du mi nyal/_bcag gam gzhan du 'gro/_/ltag ma ltar sngur pa 'byung ba ni gan rkyal du nyal na sngur pa 'byung ste glos nyal na sngur ba mi 'byung ste de ltar sngur pa byung na grogs la
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]mi gnod pa'i phyir 'chag tu 'gro/_/de'i snod 'og ba lang [#]gi rmig pa lta bu'am gzhi dang bcas pa'o/_/nad pa gud du 'gro mi nus na mchil ma dor ba'i gzhi ba lang gi rmig pa lta bu'i chol zangs bcang /_'di nye bar gzhag_/chol zangs nad pa'i gam du gzhag_/'dir
[\[286b.2\]]gding ba sbyin te sa tshig pa'am bye [#]ma'am thal bas so/_/chol zangs kyi nang du bye ma'am thal ba bting ste bzhag pa'i sting du mchil ma dor/_sbrang ma dag spangs par [#]thabs kyis so/_/chol zangs kyi nang du sbrang ma mi 'du bar bya ba'i phyir [#]sbrang yab bcangs la bskrad/_dri nga ba
[\[286b.3\]]med pa'i phyir dang srog chags su mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dus dus su bkru bskam[#]/_ltag ma lta bu chol zangs mchil [#]ma'i dri mi zhim pa dang srin bur 'gyur ba'i dus dus su bkru zhing bskam/_de'i dus kyi phyir gzhan gzhag_/ltag ma ltar bkru zhing skam pa'i tshe 'theb gzhan gcig [#]
[\[286b.4\]]byas te gzhag_/mi brel ba'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi grwa [#]bzhir ka ba'i drung du mchil ma'i snod gzhag_/gtsug lag khang na dge 'dun gyi spyir grwa [#]bzhir mchil ma'i snod re re gzhag na dge sbyong yan chad gnas brtan man chad mchil ma dor bar bya/_chol zangs kyi gzhi'ang gzhag bye
[\[286b.5\]]mas gding ba'ang ltag ma dang 'dra/_sgra dang bcas pa'i rlung gi las mi bya/_mi mang po 'dus pa'i nang du phyen sgra chen po mi gtong [#]/_shing drung du bshang ba dang gci ba ma yin/_shing gang yang rung shing drung du bshang gci mi bya/_thang la des mtshams med pa ni ma gtogs/_thang rtswa [#]dang
[\[286b.6\]]shing leb she dag gis yog pa zhig yin na dben par bshangs kyang nyes med/_tsher ma can yang ngo /_/shing tsher ma can gyi drung mi su'ang mi gnas pas der bshangs kyang nyes med/_phyi sa kung ba [#]bya/_gtsug lag khang gi [#]'khor du bshang gci [#]bya/_de ste gtsug lag khang gi ni [#]nub byang
[\[286b.7\]]gi [#]ngos su'o/_/ltag ma ltar phyi sa kung gis bya ba ni gtsug lag khang gi sgo shar phyogs su lta na nub dang byang gi bar du bya/_'khyil pa'am [#]gzar bar ro/_/bshang ba nyid gzhi bzang po la byas la phyir phyung ba wa gnyis kyi kha sbyar sbu bu [#]yod par byas pa nas ma[#]dor ro/_/'og tu tsher
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ma can gyi shing bskyed/_bshang gci bor ba'i 'khor du [#]sems can mi 'ong ba'i phyir tsher ma can gyi shing bskyed/_bu gu dang nye ba'i steng du shing lham gzhag_/bshang ba'i bu gu'i khar 'dug pa'i tshe rkang pa la mi 'bags pa'i phyir shing lham re re gzhag_/ril
[\[287a.2\]]ba spyi blugs [#]kyi gnas bya/_phyis kung gi 'khor du bkru ba'i phyir rol po gzhag pa'i sa bya[#]/_sgo'i mda' yab bya/_bshang ba'i sgo phye nas [#]phas mi snang bar bya ba'i mda' yab bya/_sgo'i re bzhi [#]sbyin/_phyi sa khung gi khang bu la sgo'i re bzhi [#]bya/_sgo leb dang yang mig kyang ngo /_/phyis khung gi sgor
[\[287a.3\]]sgo leb gzhug cing yang mig gdags/_'jug par 'dod na sgras so/_/'ongs par mi 'jug_/thos na der zhugs pas kyang ngo [#]/_/phyi logs nas 'ongs pas sgra [#]byas na nang na 'dug pas yod par [#]go bar bya ba'i phyir sgra yang [#]bya/_gos rab tu bzung ste shes bzhin du 'jug_/bshang gci gos
[\[287a.4\]]la mi reg pa dang se gol gyi sgra bya bar dran pa mngon par gzhag_/dbyung du 'jug_/phyis byed pa'i tshe pha rol gyi khar ma reg par dbus su dor/_dal gyis bshang sa'i lham la ma reg par bya/_bshang sa'i kha na shing lham [#]'dug pa la mi reg par bya/_ma 'ongs pa mi bsdad/_bshang
[\[287a.5\]]gci mi bro bar nan gyis btsir [#]ba mi bya ba dang mi bro bar bshang gci sar mi 'jug_/bshang gci sar mi 'jug par 'dong sgra bya/_'ongs par mi 'jug_/'ongs par mi [#]dgag_/bshang gci [#]'ongs pa la mi dgag par bya/_de dang 'brel ba'i dgos pa las gzhan pa de dang nye bar mi gzhag_/
[\[287a.6\]]bshang gci bya ba'i sar bshang ba mi byed par 'grengs te mi 'dug pa dang bshang gci bkru ba las gzhan der bkru bshal mi bya/_nyin gcig [#]bzhin du gtsug lag khang skyong gis bkru/_bshang gci sa'i kha dang 'khor gtsug lag khang skyong gis rtag par bkru/_sa dang lo ma
[\[287a.7\]]gzhag pa yang ngo /_/rkub phyi ba dang bkru ba'i sa dang lo ma yang gtsug lag khang skyong gis rtag par gzhag go/_/phyogs ma yin par gci bar mi bya/_bshang gci'i sar byas pa ma gtogs par bab [#]bab tu mi bya/_du mar ma yin/_bshang gci grangs mang [#]du mi bya/_ltung bas
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]dong brko/_bshang gci dor ba'i sar dong brko/_gzag pa'i khang bu bya/_gcin gci ba'i gnas kyi sa logs shig tu [#]byas kyang rung /_'di ngos la'o/_/ltag ma'i sa bya ba ni bshang ba'i ngos la bya/_gzugs por ro/_/ltag ma ltar chab khung du bya ba yang gzugs por bya/_wa sbyin/_
[\[287b.2\]]ltag ma ltar gzugs por bya ba ni wa gzugs/_gzhan dang mnyam par ro/_/lhag ma ltar [#]phyis khung chen por 'gro bar la gos la mi reg par [#]sgo dang yang mig la mi reg par [#]bzhin gci ba'i khung bu la yang de bzhin du bya/_tshad pa'i nad kyis ni [#]khri'u bu gu can bya'o/_/dge
[\[287b.3\]]slong nad pa yin nam [#]'gro mi nus na khri'u'i [#]dbus su bu gu btod [#]la tshad pa gzag par bya/_khri thag bsdu/_ltag ma ltar gzag pa'i khri thag dbus brtags pa yin na mi reg par bya ba'i phyir thag bu bsdu/_mi grub na bcad/_khri lta bu yin na dbus gang du dgos par kho ra khor
[\[287b.4\]]yug tu drangs te gdod/_de ste [#]na 'khor du lo ma'i phung po sbyin/_khri'u bu gu can gyi steng du nad pa nyal ba rkub na na bal bu'am [#]shing lo 'jam po pha logs tshu logs su gzhag_/sa ma rung bar gyur pa bsrung /_khri'u [#]dbus nas bshang [#]gci ba'i 'og gi gzhi [#]mi rung bar mi [#]bya ba'i
[\[287b.5\]]phyir thabs 'og nas 'chad/_de bas na 'og tu gyo mos so/_/ltag ma ltar sa mi rung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir khri'u'i bu gu'i [#]khar gyo mo bzhag ste bshang gci der btang /_bar du mtho na mi dge/_/'og tu gyo mo bzhag [#]pa khri pa dang mi rig par gzhag_/dus dus su dri mi nga ba phyir
[\[287b.6\]]bkru bskam yungs mar tsha bas byug_/gyo mo dri [#]mi zhim par 'gyur ba'i phyir bkru zhing skam [#]pa dang yungs mar gyis byug_/de'i dus kyi phyir gzhan gzhag_/ltag ma bkru zhing bskam pa'i [#]'theb cig gzhag_/ma grub na gzhi leb ma gzhag_/ltag ma ltar gyo mo ba ma [#]rnyed na
[\[287b.7\]]shing lo mi zag pa bzang po gzhag_/bshangs nas de'i phyir phyi[#]/_na'ang rung mi na'ang rung bshangs nas rkub phyi/_rnon po'am rtsa thum gyis ma yin ltag ma ltar rkub phyi ba rdo'am shing rnon po'am rtsa rtsub pos mi phyi/_ras ma dang leb ma dang lo ma'i phung po dang shing dag gis der dge/
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyis na 'jam zhing dge'o/_/gnyis su su [#]dag gis bkru/_ltag ma ltar rkub phyis pa'i 'og tu sa lan gnyis dang chu lan gnyis kyis bkru/_sngar so sor gzhag pa'i sa des phyis bkru bshang bar 'gro ba nas phud sdar byas la bshangs
[\[288a.2\]]pa'i 'og tu lag pa dag par bkru ba'i sa spungs te gzhag_/dal gyis bag [(]kyis bag [#]kyis [,]gis bag gis [)]zer mas shing lham ma [#]rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i [#]phyir sar ro/_/rkub 'khru ba'i tshe shing lham la ma reg ma 'bags par dal gyis [#]bkru/_g.yon pa la bdun gyis so/_/lag pa g.yon pa g.yas
[\[288a.3\]]pas sa lan bdun blugs shing bkru/_gnyis ka la yang bdun gyis so/_/lag pa gnyis ka la yang sa phung bdun gyis bkru/_lag ngar [#]bkru/_ltag ma ltar lag pa gnyis kar bkrus nas chung zad cig gis lag ngar man chad dag par bkru/_yang sas lag pa gnyis pa'o/_/
[\[288a.4\]]drung mo bkrus nas yang sa phung gcig gis lag pa gnyis ka bkru/_gzhan gyis ril ba spyi blugs [#]la'o/_/de nas sa phung gcig gis ril ba spyi blugs [#]dag par bkru/_rkang pa bkru/_bshang gci byas nas lag pa bkrus pa'i 'og tu rkang pa yang bkru/_nyes med pa ni za gu ste tha
[\[288a.5\]]mar phyis mtshams te 'dug kyang ngo /_/sman rgod 'thungs pa'am rtag par tshad pa zag pa la lan cig phyis la [#]phyis sman gyi rjes chad nas chu dron gyis tshul bzhin dag par bkru/_de las gzhan gyi [#]chu yod na ma bkrus par mi 'dug_/nad pa ma gtogs pa mi na bar bshangs pa'i
[\[288a.6\]]'og tu ma bkrus par stan la mi 'dug pa dang bshangs te chu med pa'i yul du ma bkrus kyang nyes med/_chu dang phrad na khrus shig_/sman gyi dngos po ste phran tshegs la sogs par chud pa'o/_/sman gyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//'di man chad ni las kyi [#]dngos po la [#]'chad de/_cho ga las
[\[288a.7\]]'gal ba'i las mi skye'o/_/dge slong gi [#]las brgya rtsa gcig las kha cig ni gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las gcig gis bya/_kha cig ni gnyis kyis [#]bya/_kha cig ni gsum gyis bya kha cig ni bzhis bya ste [#]'dul ba las byung ba bzhin du ma byas na las su mi rung /_mi snyan pa thos na ma yin tshul
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]nas byung ba [#]dang /_tshul du 'jug pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa la sogs pa bya ba'i tshe khyim pa dang dge sbyong gis thos nas las su rung ste dge 'dun thams cad nyes byas so/_/mi chags par mi bya/_las brgya rtsa gcig gi [#]las gang bya ba'ang rung [#]mkhan po shes pa la ma dris par
[\[288b.2\]]las byas na las su yang mi rung la dge 'dun yang nyes byas so/_/gsol ba dang /_las brgya rtsa gcig las gsol ba'i las gcig dang gnyis dang gsum gyis las bya ba dang /_klog pa dang /_zhu ba lan gcig gam lan gnyis sam lan gsum dang /_so sor thar pa
[\[288b.3\]]'chad pa dang /_zla ba phyed cing so sor [#]thar pa 'chad pa'i tshe seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste 'chad pa dang /_dbyung ba de'o/_/tshul nas byung ba la sogs pa de [#]ltag tu cho ga bzhin du ma byas na las mi skye [#]zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams so/_/chos ma yin par mi bya/_gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa
[\[288b.4\]]dang tshar bcad cing brgyad pa la sogs te las gang bya'ang rung thog tu ma bab par byas na las su yang mi rung la dge 'dun yang nyes byas so/_/tha dad du ma yin/_mtshams [#]gcig gi nang na las su bya'o cog dge slong na'ang rung dad pa ma blangs par las su byas na las [#]su'ang mi rung
[\[288b.5\]]la dge 'dun kyang nyes byas so/_/mang po ma yin/_dge sbyong yang rung dge slong yang rung ste gsum man chad lhan cig 'byung du rung gi bzhi yan chad rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi rung ba bskrad pa dang brgyad pa yang bzhi yan chad la mi bya/_dge 'dun du ma gyur pas ma
[\[288b.6\]]yin/_dge 'dun bzhi yan chad du ma tshang [#]bas las brgya rtsa gcig las gang byas kyang [#]las su mi rung /_dge 'dun gyi las bya zhes bya ba ma gtogs pa ni gang zag gis byas kyang rung /_dbyung ba ni nyi shu la sogs pa [#]dge 'dun gyis so/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byung ba ni dge slong
[\[288b.7\]]nyi shu yan chad ma 'dus na byung bar mi chud do/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par [#]ni bcu la sogs pa'o/_/[#]bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni dge slong bcu yan chad 'dus te bya'o/_/mtha' 'khob tu mi 'grub na lnga pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o/_/ltag tu yul gyi dbus su zhes bsngos
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]pa de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob tu brtsis [#]te mtha' 'khob der dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa gcig dang lnga yan chad kyis byar rung ste de yang gzhan med na'o/_/ltag ma ni bzhi la sogs pa'o/_/ltag ma'i las gnyis ma gtogs pa ni gzhan dge slong bzhi yan
[\[289a.2\]]chad 'dus pas byar rung ngo /_/dge slong ma'i las dang ni tha dad do/_/dge slong ma'i las bya ba ni dge slong dang mi mthun te 'og nas 'chad/_'byung ba na'ang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis so/_/dge slong ma tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun sde gnyis 'tshogs te byung ngo /_/gso sbyong la [#]
[\[289a.3\]]'du ba 'byor nas des so/_/dge slong ma'i gso sbyong dge slong gis gnang la dge slong ma'ang dge 'dun du tshang na gso sbyong byar rung ngo /_/dad pa dang /_gso sbyin rnyeg par de dang [#]bsgrub/_gnas brtan man [#]chad la bdag cag [#]gso sbyong bgyi zhes gsol nas dge 'dun gyis dad pa byin
[\[289a.4\]]na gso sbyong byar rung /_ma byin na mi rung /_de la gtogs pa gnyis te/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun la dge slong ma dad pa len pa ni dge slong [#]gnyis 'dus te blangs kyang rung ngo /_/'di nus pa dag gis so/_/ltag ma ltar dad pa [#]len pa'i dge slong ma chos shes pa dang tshig gsal ba dag
[\[289a.5\]]gis blang ngo /_/med na gcig gis kyang ngo /_/ltag ma lta bu'i dge slong ma mkhas pa gnyis med na mkhas pa gcig dang mi mkhas pa gcig dang gnyis kyis blang du rung ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi [#]dge slong la bsgo/_gso [#]sbyong gi tshe dge slong ma dge 'dun la dad pa gsol du 'ongs pa [#]dad
[\[289a.6\]]pa sbyin pa'i phyir dge 'dun gyis dge slong gcig las su bskos te gnas brtan man chad las dad pa blangs la sgor bsdad/_sgo phugs [#]su de gnas/_ltag ma ltar dad pa [#]blangs nas dge slong ma'ang de len du 'ong pa'i phyir 'chag cing bsdad [#]de dge slong ma 'ongs [#]na dad pa byin gyi [#]song shig ces
[\[289a.7\]]bsgo/_dad pa sbyin pa'i dge slong dang [#]sgo gang na gnas pa 'bros na [#]dge slong mas ma 'bros [#]par btsun pa tshur spyon zhes bya/_des kyang 'di la'o/_/dge slong ma ltag ma ltar 'bros pa tshur shog ces bya'o/_/mi 'bros/_ltag ma [#]ltar dge slong pha dang dge slong ma gnyis ka mi 'bros/_gang bros
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]par [#]nyes byas/_mi shes na dad pa ming [#]rus dri/_dad pa sbyin pa'i dge slong dang dad pa len pa'i dge slong ma gnyis gcig la gcig ngo mi shes na su'i slob ma dang [#]ming dri/_gcig tu na dge slong dad pa byin pa'i dge slong gang yin pa gzhan la dri/_mgu bar bya ba dang dbyung [#]ba la
[\[289b.2\]]gnyis 'dus te'o/_/dge slong ma dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma byung ba zla ba phyed mgu ba bya ba dang dbyung ba dge 'dun sde gnyis las 'byung [#]ngo /_/bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba yang ngo /_/dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba yang dge 'dun sde gnyis las rdzogs par bya/_'dir de dag
[\[289b.3\]]bcu gnyis te'o/_/yul gyi dbus su dge slong ma bcu gnyis yan chad dge 'dun du brtsis te des dge 'dun gyi las bya'o/_/sdom pa gnyis dang sngon du bcas pa dang /_dge slong ma tshangs pa sbyin pa dang dge slong ma'i sdom pa [#]sbyin pa gnyis kyang yul gyi dbus su dge slong ma bcu
[\[289b.4\]]gnyis las nyung bas mi sbyin [#]no/_/tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi gnas dang /_dge slong ma'i gnas brtan [#]la gnas 'cha' ba dang rab tu 'byung ba yang dge 'dun gyis ma gnang bar mi rung ba yin te dge 'dun gyi grangs ni dge slong ma bcu gnyis yan chad la bya'o/_/sdom pa sbyin pa dge
[\[289b.5\]]'dun gyi mtha'o/_/dge slong ma'i gnas brtan lo gnyis kyi [#]bar du bcad de slob ma dbyung du gnang ba'ang dge slong ma'i [#]dge 'dun bcu gnyis yan chad kyis gnang na gdod dbyung bar bya'o/_/brtag pa ni [#]las byed pas ma nus la[#]/_dge slong gis chig byas pa de thos na'o/_/ltag
[\[289b.6\]]ma dge slong mas las byas pa'i rnams dge slong ma cho ga mkhas pa med de/_las byed mi nus na dge slong mkhas pa gcig la gsol te dge slong gis [#]las byas kyang rung ngo /_/kha rog tu 'dug ces pa yan chad do/_/ltag tu dge slong ma'i las bya ba dge slong gis las [#]byas
[\[289b.7\]]zin pa'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis bzod na ma smra bar 'dug shig ces byas pa tsam gyis kyang las su chud de rung ngo /_/'khor du ma 'dug na ma rdzogs pa'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa lta bu las byed pa'i tshe dge slong gcig gis dad pa sbyin te bzhis [#]las byas na ni [#]las su mi
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]rung ngo /_/gang byed pa ni ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]las bya ba gsum bkod la gcig gis byas na'ang mi rung ngo /_/gcig tu dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nyi shus dbyung dgos pa la dge slong bcu dgu dang lhag ma byung ba dang nyi shu yod kyang las su mi rung ngo [#]/_/de bas na dad
[\[290a.2\]]pa kun gtsang ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa med do/_/dge slong bzhis las byed pa'i rigs pa la dge slong gcig gis dad pa byin te khyed gsum gyis [#]gyis shig ces bsgo ba'ang [#]mi rung la[#]/_lhag ma nyi shu dbyung ba la gcig gis dad pa byin la bcu dgu [#]las gyis shig ces byas kyang las su
[\[290a.3\]]mi rung ngo /_/'di mi blang /_dge slong lhag ma byung ba nyi shur tshang ste [#]dge slong gud na gnyis gsum zhig yod na de'i dad pa len pa nyi shu'i nang mi gtong [#]/_nyi shu las lhag na gcig gar las dbyung bar mi bsgo/_tshul nas byung ba'i dge slong bzhi yod na gcig las byed par mi
[\[290a.4\]]bsgo/_dge 'dun du ma tshang [#]na las su mi rung ngo /_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhig pa dang mtshams med pa byas pa dang /_sdig pa lta ba dang /_sa gzhan du gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa dag gis ma yin no/_/ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi grangs su ma tshang pa la ming gis
[\[290a.5\]]smos pa 'di rnams kyi [#]dge 'dun gyi [#]grangs su mi bsnan to/_/'khrul pa dang bcas pa yang ngo /_/tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas dge 'dun gyi grangs ma tshang bar bsnan kyang dge 'dun gyi grangs su mi chud de sU [#]tra 'og ma las 'chad do/_/sdom par byed pas kyang ngo /_/ltag [#]ma
[\[290a.6\]]man chad nyes byas yan chad gcig yod na dge 'dun gyi grangs su bsnan du mi rung yid la nyes pa zhig byas pa'ang rung /_bsngos pas na tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/ltag ma ltar nyes pa byung ba ci nyes pa dmigs nas grogs la mthol [#]te dpang btsugs na dge 'dun gyi [#]grangs su chud do/_/
[\[290a.7\]]gcig tu ltung ba spyir bsngo na'ang rung /_nus na ma yin/_ltag [#]ma man chad yid kyi nyes byas yan chad la lhag ma dang spangs pa [#]gnyis ni btags [#]pa byas pas chog_/ltung ba man chad ni 'phral du mthol te gdod dge 'dun gral du 'jug go/_/de'i tshe nub pa 'ba' zhig gi [#]ltung ba
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]dang so sor mthol ba dang nyes byas pa dang /_'phral du mthol du rung ba ni dgu bcu ltung ba dang /_so sor mthol ba dang nyes byas pa dang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams 'phral du mthol du rung ngo /_/slar bya ba blangs yod na bshags pa tsam gyi [#]phyir ro/_/nyes byas yan chad mthol ba ni
[\[290b.2\]]bdag gi [#]nyes byas 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa'i dge slong mthol tshangs byas te gtsang mar gyur pa'i dge slong la mthol du rung ngo /_/ci ltar 'du shes pa'i byung ba'i nan tan bya'o/_/dge slong gcig la las bya ba'i tshe pham [#]pa 'byung bar shes sam dogs na phyir phyung ste btang /_lhag ma
[\[290b.3\]]zhig byung na mthol lam ma mthol dris te ma mthol na [#]mthol du bcug ste dge 'dun nang du gzhug_/rig [#]pa ni bya ba du ma gcig pus ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba dang [#]/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa las pham pa byung na'ang bskrad
