[\[290b.4\]]pa'i rigs so/_/lhag ma zhig byung na'ang mthol du bcug te [#]dge 'dun nang du gzhug pa'i rigs so/_/ltung ba man chad kyi mthol tshangs byed du bcug[# ]/de dag gis [#]mi bya/_dge slong [#]dang khyim pa dang chad pa bcad pa dge 'dun gyi grangs su mi gzhug lhag ma byed pa'i tshe'ang bshad/_
[\[290b.5\]]dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma'i chad pa dang mgu ba byed pa'i tshe so sor thar pa 'chad pa'i tshe dge slong gzhan kha thon mi shes na 'chad pa de kha thon byed du bcug kyang nyes med/_'di las gzhan du 'di thos par [#]bya/_las brgya rtsa gcig las so sor thar pa 'chad pa dang [#]'byung ba gnyis
[\[290b.6\]]ni pham pa byung ba dang chad pas bcad pa dang so sor gnas pa dang bskrad pa dang 'di bzhis mnyan du rung ngo /_/ma spangs pa dang /_rigs sun pa dang dge 'dun la thal mo rgol ba [#]dang dge 'dun lhag ma ltag [#]tu byed cing chad pa byed du mi btub pa khyim bdag chos slob pa la thal mo rgol [#]
[\[290b.7\]]cing bsod nams med ces zer dang 'di bzhin [#]phyin chad mi byed ces zer na las brgya rtsa gcig nyan rung ngo /_/ma log pa [#]ma gtogs te'o/_/ltag ma ltar chad pas bcad pa chad pa byed du ma btub ste song ba ni ma gtogs/_spangs kyang bdag gis las la'o/_/ltag ma ltar
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]spangs ba rnam bzhi bzod pa gsol/_phyin chad mi bgyid ces khas blangs nas de rnams dgrol zhing blangs pa'i [#]las bya ba'i nang du chud pa'i nyid kyang nang du gzhug go/_/nang du dri ba'i phyir gsol ba la sogs pa ste bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba na yang ngo /_/
[\[291a.2\]]dge slong [#]bdag bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe ni las de'i nang du 'jug tu rung ngo /_/mngon sum du ba ni mig lam du bzhag la bsnyen pa chud par bya ba de bya bas sgrub/_dge sbyong [#]zhig nyes pa byas kyang bar du mi gcod do zhes zer ba de dge 'dun mthong tsam du mig rgyang du bzhag ste las
[\[291a.3\]]pa'i dge slong gcig gis khyod mtshan ma btang ngam ma [#]btang lan gsum du bskos te mtshan ma btang na ni legs/_de ste yang mtshan ma ma [#]btang na gdod bskrad do/_/mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ni gtsug lag khang dang /_dge slong dang dge sbyong chos log pa la bltas [#]na de'i khyim
[\[291a.4\]]du dge 'dun 'og khrims bcas te mi 'dong ba ni mi de mdun du gzhag ste mi bya'i lkog tu bya'o/_/dge slong smyon pa dge 'dun gyi [#]dad pa byin na las bya ba'i tshe dad pa ma blangs kyang rung /_dad pa ni smyon pas ma thos par bya/_phyag mi bya ba dang dge slong dge slong ma'i
[\[291a.5\]]khyim du rtag tu 'gro ba ma song shig par lan gsum du bsgos te ma btub na bskrad pa la dge slong mas phyag mi bya bar bya ba yang ma thos par bya/_gtam mi bya ba dang /_dge slong dang dge sbyong dge 'dun la 'thab [#]mo rgol ba de dang gtam mi bya bar dam bca' ba yang de ma
[\[291a.6\]]thos par lkog tu bya/_mi spyad pa'i sdom pa'o/_/ltag [#]ma lta bu'i dge slong dang mi smra ba ni zas dang chos gnyis mi spyad de zas mi spyad pa ni gral gcig la mi 'dug_/chos mi spyad pa ni tshul du 'jug pa dang gso [#]sbyin dang so sor [#]thar pa 'chad pa nang du mi gzhug_/
[\[291a.7\]]de'i phyir ma gsol bar klog par mi bya/_gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las bya ba gsol ba dang zhu ba gcig byas la gcig ma byas na las su mi rung ste gnyis ka bya dgos so/_/de'i mtshams su chud la kha bskang ba rigs na lus sam dad pas 'khod par
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]ma zhugs na'o/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las gnyis sam gsum gyis las bya ba gang yang rung ste ltag tu smos pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa rnams ni ma gtogs te tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong mtshams kyi nang na 'dug la dad pa ma blangs dge 'dun nang
[\[291b.2\]]du'ang mi 'dus/_mtshams kyi [#]phyi rol du yang ma song bar dge 'dun gyi [#]las byas na las su mi rung ngo /_/log par brjod na yang ngo /_/dge slong gis bskrad pa rnams bdun gang yang rung ste bskrad pa'i tshe yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong dang dge sbyong zhig na re bskrad pa'i
[\[291b.3\]]mi rigs zhes zer na mi btsan gyi [#]yon tan dang ldan pas bskrad pa'i mi rigs zhes [#]zer na las su mi rung ngo /_/gang gis las pa de las gzhan du na'o/_/ltag ma ltar bskrad pa'i las byed pa'i tshe bskrad de btang ba'i dge slong de nyid na re nga bskrad pa [#]mi rigs zhes zer
[\[291b.4\]]ba ni mi btsan gyi yon tan dang ldan pa [#]ni bskrad du mi rung zhes zer ba'i [#]tshig btsan te mi bskrad do/_/de ste log [#]pa dang /_dbyar tsha ba'i tshe me bus pa ni log [#]pa'o/_/dgun grang ba'i tshe me bus pa ni ma log [#]pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'og ma'i rnams kyang rigs mi rigs su
[\[291b.5\]]bya'o/_/chos dang /[ #]bskrad par mi rigs pa ni mi bskrad/_spyod lam ma 'khrul ba ni[#]/_dge 'dun las byed pa'i nang nas dge slong gcig lus mi g.yo bar khas bskrad par [#]mi rigs so zhes zer na de'i tshig ltar bya'am [#]mi bya ba ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/rang bzhin
[\[291b.6\]]du gnas pa/_ltag ma'i skad du smra ba'i dge slong de'i rang gis dul zhing zhi ba'i las smras na de'i tshig ltar bya/_tshig la rub pa ste/_ltag ma'i [#]skad du smra ba'i dge slong de tshig kyal [#]ba can nam phra ma can nyan pa ma yin gyi sngon chad smras pa'ang tshig las mi 'gal
[\[291b.7\]]ba yin na de'i tshig ltar bya/_mngon par mi shes pa dang /_dge slong ltag ma skad du zer ba de ci'ang mi shes pa zhig zer na de'i tshig ltar mi bya'i sde snod gsum shes pa'i tshig ltar bya'o/_/khon [#]chen ma gtogs te tha dad pa'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par bskrad
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]pa'i las gang bya'ang rung ste dge slong gcig na re las [#]'di ltar byar mi rung ngo zhes zer na de'i tshig ltar byas te las su mi rung ngo /_/brdzun du smra bas bshams pa'i tshig [#]bshams pa mi rung ba'i tshig go/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar tshig la rub pa ni de'i
[\[292a.2\]]tshig ltar mnyan/_brdzun dang ltag chod dang phra ma zer ba lta bu ni tshig la mi rub pa'o/_/phra ma dang tshig kyal [#]pa dang ngag rtsub po yang ngo /_/de skad zer ba rnams [#]kyang tshig la mi rub [#]ste/_'di skad zer ba'i mi [#]de'i tshig ni mi mnyan de [#]las su rung ngo /_/rang bzhin du mi gnas
[\[292a.3\]]pa ni 'di dang gzhan du mi bya ba byed pa ma byas pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma man chad nyes byas yan chad la mi srung [#]zhing yal bar gtong ba zhig na re las 'di byar mi rung zhes zer ba'ang las su rung ste de'i tshig mi btsan no/_/spyod lam las 'khrul ba ni 'gro ba'i sems brtan [#]
[\[292a.4\]]te de btang na'o/_/dge 'dun 'dus te bskrad pa la sogs pa'i las shig byed na dge slong gcig ltag ma ltar sa la 'dug ste bskrad pa'i rigs so [#]zhes zer ba ni btsan gyi/_khros [#]te langs nas bskrad pa'i mi rigs so zhes zer ba [#]ni dge slong de tshul khrims dang ldan
[\[292a.5\]]du zin kyang de'i tshig mi btsan gyi bskrad pa'i las su rung ngo /_/'grengs [#]ste de'i lus ma g.yos par zer na de'i tshig btsan no/_/lta ba dge 'dun la bshags/_gso sbyong dang tshul nas [#]'jug pa la sogs pa dge slong gcig na re las 'di byed pa la kho bo [#]ma
[\[292a.6\]]'dus so zhes zer na las cho ga bzhin du byas pa la zer na nyes med byi shu [#]tas ni chos log pa lta [#]nas slar yang dge 'dun la bshags zhes bshad/_gzhan la ma yin ltag ma ltar las byed pa'i spyir ni mi zer gyi gang zag gcig la zer na nyes byas/_byi shu [#]tas
[\[292a.7\]]ni log pa la bltas [#]gang zag la bshags pa ma yin zhes bshad/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la ma yin/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi las byed pa la ma rangs zhes zer ba dge sbyong dang khyim pa la byas na nyes byas/_bskrad par mi rigs pa la ma yin/_ltag tu dge 'dun gyi las
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bya ba'i tshe dge 'dun gyi grangs su mi chud pa'i rnams la ltag ma skad du dge 'dun gyi las byed pa la ma rangs so zhes smra [#]na'ang nyes byas/_lhag ma med pa ma [#]yin/_phas pham pa byung ba la ltag [#]ma skad du brjod na'ang nyes byas/_bskos pa phyung ste rab tu [#]dge ba dang rab tu mang ba byed
[\[292b.2\]]pa bsko/_gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa [#]gang yang rung ste las byed par ma gus sam las byed mi nus na nus pa mkhas pa las snga ma phyung ste de bsko[#]/_dus dang yang dang yang ngam gzhan gcad [#]par mi bya/_lhag [#]ma ltar gtsug lag khang skyong gi [#]lta bu nus
[\[292b.3\]]pa zhig na lo gnyis gsum tsam zhig tu gyis shig par mi bsko'i ci nus par gyis shig ces bya/_las nus pa zhig na khyod kyis yang byar mi rung ngo zhes dus bsnur zhing nan gyis mi gnan[#]/_gzhan du nam dgos pa na [#]spangs pa sbyin/_gtsug lag khang skyong lta bu zhig
[\[292b.4\]]las nus pa yod na de na re kho bo gzhan las ci'ang mi bsgo [#]zhing g.yog dang khang bu sbyin na las rtag tu bya'o zhes zer na g.yog dang khang bu sbyin no/_/bskos pa med na tshul shing bzung zhing bsko/_/dge slong yon bdag gis [#]yon byin te nor 'god pa'i tshe rtag par 'god [#]
[\[292b.5\]]pa'i las pa de med na nor so sor mnyam du bgo ste dge slong du yod pa'i ming bris la mdung byas te so sor bgo/_/gang bskang du mi rigs pa tshul shing 'brim pa la [#]yang ngo /_/ltag tu mdung sbyin [#]pa dge sbyong dang tshul khrims las 'gal ba'i rnams las ma gtogs
[\[292b.6\]]par dge slong tshul [#]khrims dang ldan pa gcig gis g.yog sbyin no/_/mi rigs pas tshul shing 'brim pa dbyen du mi skye/_dge 'dun sde gcig las kha cig chos log [#]pa la bltas [#]na/_dge slong gcig gis tshul shing khyer te khyed su log [#]pa la phyogs pa
[\[292b.7\]]ni tshul shing 'di long shig ces bsgo na tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas tshul shing blangs kyang mi chud tshul dang ldan pas tshul shing blangs na dbyen du 'gyur ro/_/las kyi [#]dngos po'o/_/las bskang mi bskang gi dngos po ste rdzogs so//_//
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]lhag par blags pa ma [#]byas pa ma yin no/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las dus bya dgos pa las grangs las lhag par brjod pa ni nyes med do/_/bri na ma byas pa'o/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las grangs dus bya ba'i rig pa nas [#]grangs der ma tshang bar [#]las byas na las su
[\[293a.2\]]mi rung ngo /_/byed pa ni song na ma rdzogs pa'i le'u dkrugs pa'o/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las bya ba'i phyir [#]rigs pa las gsol ba gnyis pa [#]dang zhu ba gcig las byas te/_gsol ba gcig byed pa'i tshe gral nas dge 'dun kha cig langs nas [#]dong na las su mi rung ngo /_/rdzogs
[\[293a.3\]]kyang de'i las kyi dge 'dun gyi tshad du 'dug pa ma [#]lus na'o/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i las byed pa sngar dge 'dun grangs tshang zhing 'dug pa las gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis byas te/_las mjug ma rdzogs par gral nas kha cig dad pa byin te/_song na phyi ma
[\[293a.4\]]dge 'dun du ma tshang na las su mi rung ngo /_/lus na ma yin/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dbyung ba ltar [#]dge 'dun nyi shu rtsa [#]zhig 'dus te/_'dug pa las las kyi mgo brtsams te ma zin par gral na nyi shu ni [#]lus dong ba rnams kyis dad pa ma sbyin [#]na'ang las su mi rung /_chur bsnan nas de ste yang bya bar
[\[293a.5\]]'dod na dge 'dun la tshig gis zhu ba ni yang btsun pa dag bstan [#]dang gsol ba bgyi'o zhes so/_/ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byung ba la dge 'dun [#]nyi shu 'dus nas las kyi mgo brtsams te/_dge slong gnyis sam gsum langs te/_dad nas phyi mas las byas na las su mi rung ste/_
[\[293a.6\]]sgor song ba'i dge slong gnyis slar 'ongs na gcig 'di skad du [#]brjod de las [#]slar bya'o/_/btsun pa'i rnams bdag cag gis las bya ba [#]ni las su ma rung ste [#]da gdod slar bgyi'o zhes byos shig_/spangs pa'i [#]phyir bsgo ba ma rung par bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang de'i rjes su phyogs pa
[\[293a.7\]]dang rigs sun pa dang ngag dka' ba dang /_bar du gcod pa la bar du mi gcod ces zer ba'i dge slong dang dge sbyong gnyis dang dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i dge slong su la nan das bsdus pa la de ltar ma byed ces bsgo ba dang /_dge slong ma chos dang 'dul ba la sogs pa 'bul lo zhes
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]lkog nas [#]'khyal ba'ang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis de skad ma zer zhes bsgo ba dang /_de'i rang bzhin tshol ba dang /_dge slong la la zhig ltung ba byung ste lnga las gang byung gtol med de/_the tshom za na gang byung rtog tu gzhug pa'i phyir zla ba 'ga' bzhag pa dang /_slob pa dang /_dge
[\[293b.2\]]slong ngam dge slong [#]ma'i sdom pa sbyin pa dang /[# ]dge slong gis mi tshangs par spyod pa las dga' bar ma tshor te mdo bzhin dge 'dun gyi [#]gam du mthol te slob pa sbyin pa dang /_'du ba dang /_dge 'dun dge mi dge sde gnyis su gyur pa las slar sdum pa dang /_de'i gso sbyong dang /_gso
[\[293b.3\]]sbyong gi tshe seng ge'i khri dang chag chag dang phyag dar byed pa'i dge slong bsgo [#]ba dang /_mur 'dug bcangs pa [#]dang /_mur 'dug rab tu bcangs pa dang [#]'byung bar 'ongs pa'i tshe/_mur 'dug gi chos smad nas ma dad par gyur pa zla ba 'ga' [#]dge 'dun gyi 'khor du bzhag cing brtag pa dang /_
[\[293b.4\]]de las gzhan pa dang mgu bar byed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma byas nas zhag drug tu mgu ba byed du gzhug pa dang [#]mgu bar byed pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun gyi lhag [#]ma byung nas chad pa dang mgu ba byed du gzhug pa dang /_rtsa ba nas brtsams [#]pa dang /_lhag ma bcabs pa'i chad pa byed du
[\[293b.5\]]gzhug pa dang bcabs [#]pa'i chad pa byed pa'i tshe/_khu ba byung nas rtsa ba'i chad pa byed du gzhug pa dang /_rtsa ba'i chad pa byed pa'i tshe khu ba phyung nas yang rtsa ba'i chad pa byed du gzhug pa dang /[# ]dran pa dang /_drab bya ma l+ya pud tra la ma tri [#]bu mi nas bskur ba'i tshe drab bya ma l+ya pud tras [#]mi
[\[293b.6\]]dran no zhes gsol ba la tshangs pa sbyin pa dang /_mi glen pa las [#]'dul ba sbyin pa dang /_dge slong smyon par gyur pa la [#]phyis smyo ba byang ste/_dge 'dun gyi nang du gzhug pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe dang /_mtshams dgrol
[\[293b.7\]]ba dang /_mtshams la sogs pa dgrol ba dang /_smad pa'i las dang /_dge slong las bskrad pa rnam bdun [#]po lta bu zhig byung ste bskrad pa las mtshams ma btang bar gyur pa dang sman[#] pa dang /_dbyung ba las [#]tshig gsum mo/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dge slong nyi shus dbyung ba dang /
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]spangs pa'i [#]phyir zhes zer ba nas tshig gsum po [#]zhes pa'i bar du spyir 'chad pa dge 'dun gyis las 'di rnams lta bu gang bya'ang rung ste sngar zhu ba gsum gsol ba gcig dang bzhis byas pa'i 'og tu bya'o/_/btang ba ma gtogs te bdag gi [#]phyir sngags bya ba
[\[294a.2\]]rnams kyang ngo /_/dge slong gi chos gos gsum dang dge slong ma'i chos gos lnga dang gos lhag dang tshul gyi tshe zhag bdun pa'i sngags dang tshul nas 'byung [#]'jug la sogs pa ste [#]bdag gi phyir bsngo ba thams cad sngags lan gsum bzlas te gdab po/_/bdag zan zos zin nas sems
[\[294a.3\]]kyis btang ba la phyis spyan gzigs lta bu zhig 'ongs te bza' dgos na lhag ma byas te bza' ba ni sngags lan cig btab pas 'tshal to/_/gang zag pha rol po'i phyir ba yang ngo /_/gso sbyin bya ba dang tshul nas 'byung 'jug dge 'dun mang [#]ma 'dus pa dad pa blangs nas slar 'bul ba
[\[294a.4\]]ni tshig lan cig gis 'tshal/_gang zag la 'bul ba [#]na tshig lan gsum bzlas te smra mdun [#]du tsog tsog por 'dug pa las te btang ba yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar dad pa 'bul ba dge 'dun la na [#]'grengs te 'bul gang zag la 'bul na gnyis ka tsog tsog por 'dug ste/_tshig lan gsum
[\[294a.5\]]bzlas te dbul/_zhu ba yang ngo /_/khyim pa zhig rab tu byung ba'i tshe/_gsol ba byed cing las pa'i dge slong dang rab tu byung ba gnyis ka tsog tsog por 'dug pa [#]la gsol ba dang zhu ba dang bar chad dri ba bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa na gsang ste ston pa'i ma gtogs par phag gu'i [#]steng
[\[294a.6\]]du rting pas so/_/dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe phag gu'i [#]steng du rkang pa gnyis kyi rting pas mnan la khrims dbog go/_/dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar bar chad dri ba ni phag gu'i [#]steng du rting pa ma bzhag kyang nyes med do/_/bud med kyi na bar tshangs can la sogs pa'o/_/dge slong ma
[\[294a.7\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe dang tshangs pa'i sdom pa nod pa'i tshe phag gu'i [#]steng du mi 'dug par shing bal can gyi stan stug po byas te 'dug la khrims dbog go/_/rang dbang dang [#]dge 'dun gyi [#]rgan pos so/_/chad pa dang rtsa ba'i chad pa dang mgu ba dang 'byin pa'i tshe gnas brtan gcig gi mdun
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]du tsog tsog por 'dug la gsol ba bya/_gzhan gyi phyir na 'grengs te btung la'o/_/ltag ma ltar gsol ba byed pa dang [#]/_bdag nyid kyis kha thon mi shes na dge slong shes pa gcig gis kha ton [#]smras te bdag 'grengs te spyi bo btud nas gsol ba bya'o/_/gsang ste ston pas lam
[\[294b.2\]]gyi mdun du gcig go/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe lkog tu bar chad dge slong gcig gis dris nas dge 'dun nang du 'dug [#]la gtsang na ci zhig mchi zhes bya ba ni [#]dge 'dun nang du 'dug la smra ba ma yin gyi dge 'dun gyi 'dab tu 'grengs te bar chad gtsang zhes smra'o/_/rdzas bsngo [#]ba yang ngo /_/
[\[294b.3\]]lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byad bcu gsum dang gser dngul la sogs pa dang [#]sman dang 'di thams cad kyang 'grengs te sngags gdab bo/_/de bzhin du rtog [#]pa'o/_/gos lhag thams cad kyang 'grengs te sngags gdab bo/_/de blangs te de ltar ro/_/lhag ma'i bsngo ba dang brtag [#]pa
[\[294b.4\]]gnyis ka yang dge slong gnyi ka tha ma yang [#]re nas bzung ste gdab/_lhung bzed dang sman lag pa g.yon par bzhag la lag pa g.yas pas bkab ste'o/_/lhung bzed dang sman zhag bdun pa dang tshe gcig pa thun pa lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la [#]g.yas pas bkab ste/_dge
[\[294b.5\]]slong pha log pos kyang de ltar byas te lag pa gnyis rim du sbyar te sngags gdab po/_/mi gzung ba ni mdun [#]du gzhag ste/_rin po che gser dngul la sogs pa reg tu mi rung ba'i rnams dge slong gnyis 'grengs pa'i bar du gzhag ste lag pa gnyis thur du brkyang [#]ste sngags gdab po/_/las
[\[294b.6\]]ni 'dug ste'o/_/las brgya rtsa gcig dge 'dun gyis [#]bya'ang rung gang zag gis bya'ang rung 'dug [#]ste'o/_/de ltar ma byas na las su mi rung ngo /_/dge 'dun dang gcig la yang ma gnas na dge slong gang zag la bsko/_/las brgya rtsa gcig tu ma gtogs par las gzhan byos shig par
[\[294b.7\]]bka' stsal pa dge 'dun nam gang zag 'dis gyis shig par gsang bar ma byung ba'i rnams ni gang zag gi [#]las bya'o/_/skye ba ni mi nye yang gos yid brtag pa dang btang ba dang bsngos pa yang ngo /_/dge slong gcig dgon pa'am dben pa na 'dug ste/_grogs med na bsngo ba dang brtags [#]
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]pa dang chos gos sngags dbyung ba bdag gcig pus rung ngo /_/chos gos gud na 'dug pa zhig sngags dbyung ba yang bdag gcig pus rung ngo /_/bsngo ba dang brtag pa gnyis gud na bzhag la bdag 'di 'dug pas sngags gdab tu mi rung ngo /_/snga ma ma btang ba ma
[\[295a.2\]]yin/_chos gos gsum dang gding ba snga ma ma phyung bar phyi ma gdab tu mi rung ste snga ma phyung la phyi ma sngags gdab po/_/gcig pu bsngo na ngag gis smras/_dge slong gcig pu dgon pa'am dben pa na 'dug ste/_chos gos sngags kyis gdab pa sngar yid la bdag gcig po [#]
[\[295a.3\]]grogs med par [#]dben pa na 'dug go snyam bsams [#]te de'i 'og tu sngags gdab [#]pa'i tshig khar brjod do/_/de thog mar bsam [#]pa bskyed/_sngags gdab pa'i tshe bdag pas rgan kyang rung gzhon kyang rung de la bsti stang gi tshul du bdag gi chos gos kyi tshags bcos te gus par byas la
[\[295a.4\]]gdab po/_/dge slong dang 'grogs[#]na bla gab phrag pa ya gcig tu byas te'o/_/tshul nas 'byung 'jug dang brtag pa dang bsngo ba la sogs pa'i sngags grogs gcig dang gnyis 'dug la sngags gdab pa'i tshe bdag [#]pas na rgan pa zhig yin na phrag pa g.yas pa phyung la gus pa'i tshul du
[\[295a.5\]]las bya'o/_/der rigs pa la phyag 'tshal te bdag gi don sngags ni [#]tshig gsum [#]na'o/_/ltag ma ltar bsti stang bya ba [#]ni gus par phyag 'tshal la bdag gis [#]bsngo ba dang brtag pa la sogs pa tshig lan gsum du bzlas te bya'o/_/gsang ste ston pa [#]na yang ngo /_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i
[\[295a.6\]]tshe lkog tu bar chad dri ba ni thog mar phyag 'tshal du bcug la de nas bar chad dri ba dang bar chad dris nas dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal la bar chad gtsang ngo zhes brjod/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phyir 'khod pa dag la sbyar ma dang bcas kyang ngo /_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe mkhan por gsol
[\[295a.7\]]ba'i 'og tu chos gos gsum bskon la [#]dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal du gzhug go/_/thog mar gsum/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de dge 'dun thams cad [#]phyag lan gsum 'tshal du gzhug go/_/de'i phyir thal mo sbyar te zhag zhu ba yang /_tshul nas
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]'byung 'jug dang [#]gso sbyin byas pa'i [#]tshe/_gso sbyin bya tshur shog ces tshig drag tu mi bya bar bdag pas rgan na tshig dal ba dang 'jam pas bgyis/_spyon zhes bya/_de ste gang zag dag gi [#]phyir gsol ba'i tshig na mthar thabs de lta bu shes so/_/bdag gis sngon sngags btab zin nas drung na
[\[295b.2\]]'dug pa'i [#]dge slong gis au [#]pa yi ka zhes lan gsum du bya'o/_/de'i [#]rjes su drung na pos dge'o zhes so/_/dge slong gos bdag pos ni drung na 'dug pas au [#]pa yi ka zhes smras pa'i rjes las du zhes lan gsum du brjod do/_/rang dbang can zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'jigs pas 'gro
[\[295b.3\]]ba med par byas pa dran par nus la [#]bsgo ste spro bas [#]so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang mi ldan pa las gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las bsgo/_las su bskos [#]pa'i tshe mi de la sngar dad dam ma dad dris te bsgo/_/byas zin nas brjod/_dge 'dun gyi las gsol ba dang zhu ba las [#]bya'o/_/
[\[295b.4\]]cog byas zin pa'i rjes la dge slong las pas las de ltar bgyis nas dge 'dun so so nas cang mi gsung [#]na bdag gis las [#]dad par 'dzin to zhes smra/_mtshams bcad pa bzhin du mchod par nan tan du bya/_mtshams bcad pa gang tshun chad bcad pa'i phyi rol du 'dug ste/_mtshams
[\[295b.5\]]bcad pa'i las byas na mi rung ste/_mtshams kyi [#]nang du 'dug la bya'o/_/de bzhin du gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa [#]yang mtshams kyi nang du 'dug la bya'o/_/'dug par byed pas 'dug par bsgo ste gaN+Di brdungs pa dang dris smros shig bsgo/_/tshul nas 'byung 'jug dang gso
[\[295b.6\]]sbyin pa'i tshe chag chag dang dkyil 'khor dang stan gding [#]ba'i dge slong gcig bsko/_'du ba'i phyir gaN+Di [#]brdungs na [#]dge slong gcig cig na re gaN+Di brdungs pa [#]ci bya zhes dris na las ci byed pa de la bstan/_de'i phyir [#]des stan gding /_dge 'dun gyis las su bskos pa'i dge slong [#]des dge
[\[295b.7\]]'dun gar 'du bar stan gding ngo /_/bskos pa [#]de dgos pa'i phyir 'di'o/_/gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa rnams ci nas [#]su dge 'dun mgu bar bya/_thams cad du rgan rims so/_/bshos [#]gsol ba dang yon 'god pa dang gral du bkod pa dang phyag 'tshal ba la sogs
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]ste ci'ang rung ste [#]gnas brtan gyi rim [#]pa bzhin du bya/_blang pa dad pas blang /_ltag ma ltar rgan rims su gnas dang [#]rgan po kha cig na re rgan po mi 'dod de 'dis [#]chog ces zer na ci dgar bya'o/_/las gdon mi za ba'i sba ba'o/_/bsgo ba ma byas par las mang [#]ba
[\[296a.2\]]mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang [#]rjes su phyogs pa dang rigs [#]sun pa dang ngag dka' ba dang yang dag par gshegs pa la skur pa btab pa ni chad pa 'di [#]dang gsol ba ma byas par dge 'dun gyi las bya ba'i nang du 'gror mi dbang ngo /_/gso sbyong dang dbyung ba ma gtogs so/_/ltag ma
[\[296a.3\]]lta bu dge slong las gzhan la ni mtshams ma btang [#]na mi rung gi gso sbyong dang tshul nas 'byung ba gnyis ni brtags te [#]dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug tu rung ngo /_/mtshams gzhan du 'dug [#]pa ni gang du yang yan lag ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyis las bya ba'i tshe langs te nam mkha' la 'phags
[\[296a.4\]]sam mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ngam par yur bas chod na phyi na 'dug pa'i dge slong dge 'dun grangs su tshang [#]na las su rung dge 'dun du ma tshang na las su mi rung /_zhan pa ni der 'gro zhing bcas te song na'o/_/lhag ma 'byung ba'i dge slong nyi shus dbyung dgos pa las [#]dge slong gcig gam
[\[296a.5\]]gnyis nam mkha' la 'phags sam yur ba'i pha rol du brgal [#]nas phyi na grangs mi tshang na las su mi rung /_gnyis su 'dug pa ni tshu logs su rkang pa [#]gcig pha logs su rkang pa gcig na'o/_/yur ba gcig gi pha rol tshu rol na dge 'dun sde gnyis las byed de/_dge slong grangs su gcig
[\[296a.6\]]gis ma [#]tshang na dge slong gcig rkang pa yur ba'i pha rol du bzhag nas [#]rkang pa ya gcig mtshams kyi nang du phyin na dge 'dun grangs su chud do/_/thams cad du mnan [#]na kun du nan pa'o/_/mtshams bzhi'i nang du bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i las byed pa la bzhi ka'i nang du dge 'dun grangs su
[\[296a.7\]]gcig ma tshang na mtshams de bzhi mdor khri'am shing leb kyis mnan pa'i steng du dge slong gcig 'dug na bzhi ka'i grangs tshang par [#]'gyur ro/_/de ltar du mar tshul du zhugs te'o/_/ltag ma ltar bzhi mdor dge slong gcig 'dug te [#]tshul du zhugs pa'i gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]byas na gtsug lag khang de bzhi ka'i [#]dge 'dun tshul du zhugs par chud do/_/mal stan du ma blangs pa'i [#]rigs/_/ltag [#]ma lta bu gsol ba dang /_/zhu ba'i las byas pa'i dge slong de ni gtsug lag khang bzhi'i khang pa dang mal stan gyi shas kyang dbang ngo /_/de gang du dga' bar gnas/_ltag ma
[\[296b.2\]]ltar khang pa dang mal stan mang du bdog ste/_kun spyad mi nus na bdag gar dga' bar 'dug la spyod cig_/rgyal ba'i 'grel [#]bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas mtshams kyi nang na bzhugs te/_dge 'dun gyis byed pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas la dad pa ma blangs kyang las su rung ngo /_/mi bskong [#]
[\[296b.3\]]ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dbyung ba lta bu dge slong nyi shu dgos pa bcu dgu yod de gcig gi grangs sangs rgyas spyan drangs kyang dge 'dun gyi [#]grangs su ma gtogs pa las su mi rung ngo /_/las bya ba la las ma yin pas mi skye'o[#]/_/las brgya rtsa gcig lta bu bya ba gsol ba dang zhu ba'i rim pa
[\[296b.4\]]bzhin du ma byas na gcig kyang las su mi rung ngo /_/kha cig gi skabs su ni rung gi dge 'dun dang mkhan po la nyes byas zhes zer ba yang de bzhin gzung ngo /_/gang gis mang du byas pa ni byas pa bzhin no/_/gsol ba gcig dang zhu ba gcig las bya ba'i tshe/_gsol ba [#]zin zhu ba'i tshig
[\[296b.5\]]gsum gnyis brjod de sum cha ma rdzogs kyang las su mi [#]rung ngo /_/ltag na med pa'o[#]/_/gsol ba gcig dang zhu ba gsum gyi las bya ba'i tshe/_gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las gnyis ni 'das gcig gi sum gnyis ni 'das sum cha ma 'das kyang las su rung ngo /_/mtshan mas brjod na chad pa ma
[\[296b.6\]]yin/_dge 'dun gyi mtshams bcad pa rdo 'di las thug [#]ces sngar ma brjod par gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas kyang byas par mi chud do/_/chad pa las tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas so/_/dge slong lhag ma zhig byung ste/_ltag [#]ma'i las byed pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun tshul nas 'byung 'jug
[\[296b.7\]]dang gso sbyong bya ba'i tshe las byed mi nus na chad pa pa de las byas kyang las su chud do/_/dge slong ma lhag ma byung ba yang las gzhan kun ni byar rung gis tshangs pa'i sdom pa'i las byar mi rung ngo /_/smyon pa bshad na yang ngo /_/gso sbyin bya ba'i tshe dge 'dun gyi nang na so sor thar pa kha
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]thon du sus kyang mi thon na dge slong smyon pa kha thon du [#]shes pas bklags [#]kyang nyes med/_gsol ba dang zhib [#]tu byed pa'i nan tan no/_/chad pa dang spangs pa dang lhag [#]ma byas pa la sogs pa ltag tu dge 'dun gyi kha bskang du mi chud pa'i rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi dbyen pa'i dge 'dun
[\[297a.2\]]ma langs pa'i khar bskang [#]kyang dbyen byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/yan lag ma yin pa ni mtshan ma tha dad na'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis las bya ba'i dge 'dun gyi grangs ma tshang pa dge slong mas kha bskang du mi rung ngo /_/dge slong ma'ang de bzhin du [#]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed
[\[297a.3\]]pa la grangs ma tshang pa'o/_/snod dge slong mas byas na grogs su mi chud do/_/trog trog [#]pos na gang yang ma yin/_ku re dang rtsed mos dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas na dbyen du mi chud pa ni bdag gis dbyen byas kyang mi byed par shes bzhin du byas pa las sbom po ste 'og nas kyang 'chad/_
[\[297a.4\]]mi skye ba'i bsam pas 'byed pa dang spangs na sbom po'o/_/ltag ma ltar rtsed mo dang ku res dbyen byas na dbyen gyi sbom po'o/_/dge 'dun 'dus te gang zag gcig chos bzhin du nyes pa byung ste/_/spangs pa'i rigs pa'i las gang zag gis bskrad na sbom por 'gyur ro/_/nyes byas pa ni
[\[297a.5\]]dge 'dun du ma gyur na'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dge slong brgyad las bzhir phye ba ni dbyen du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bdun bdag dang brgyad 'dug pa la phye ba ni gnyis kar dge 'dun du ma tshang bas phye yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/so sor gnas pa las gzhan dag grangs su bskang
[\[297a.6\]]par mi rigs pas grangs bskang na gsol ba'i brjod pa ma yin no/_/dge slong de ba dat+ta'i [#]sde lta bu log pa la phyogs pas las brgya rtsa gcig lta bu bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang lhag ma dbyung ba [#]la sogs pa dge 'dun gyi grangs su ma tshang pa las pham par 'gyur ba'am[#]/_mtshams med byas
[\[297a.7\]]pa'am so sor gnas pa'am chad pas bcad pa lta bu nyams pas kha ma [#]bskangs kyang las su mi rung ngo /_/rig [#]pa yang bdag gi dge 'dun gyis myong ba ma grub par na yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dbyung ba lta bu dge slong nyi shus dbyung ba'i rigs pa las nyi shus chang yang las byed pa'i tshe
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]gral na [#]yur te gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las [#]ma thos na dge 'dun gyi grangs ma tshang ba dang 'dra ste las su mi rung ngo /_/grub pa ni gsol ba thos na'o/_/lhag ma dbyung ba la gnyid [#]log pas gsol ba ni thos zhu ba bya ba'i tshe ma thos kyang grangs su chud de las su rung ngo /_/skal pa yod pa
[\[297b.2\]]gzugs brnyan [#]gyi pho nyas rab tu phyung ba yang cho ga ma yin pa ma yin no/_/bud med ni ma na zhes bya ba snga ma'i bsod nams kyis dgra bcom par 'gyur ba zhig khyim pa'i gnas na 'dug ste/_mkhan po las lung mnos te pho nyas khrims phog kyang rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du yon tan yod
[\[297b.3\]]na deng sang yang pho nyas dbog tu rung ngo /_/phyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i bar du yang ngo /_/ltag [#]ma lta bur rgyun du 'jug pa'am [#]dgra bcom par 'phral du 'gyur ba de lta bu yon tan dang ldan pa pho nyas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i khrims phog kyang 'chags so/_/khas ma blangs na byin pa ma yin
[\[297b.4\]]no/_/rab tu byung ba'i tshe bdag [#]rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas rab tu 'byung bar brtsams pa las nga [#]rab tu 'byung dus 'dod de [#]zhes zer na khrims mi 'chags kyis skrod de thong shig_/'dis gsol ba dang zhig go/_/ltag ma ltar khrims nod du ma btub ste song pa phyis slar rab
[\[297b.5\]]tu mi 'byung du mi rung zhes gsol du 'ongs na snga ma'i las ni zhig gi gdod las byas [#]te dpog tu rung ngo /_/bsko bas bsgo ba thog mar ni cho ga'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang rjes su phyogs pa dang rigs sun pa dang ngag dka' ba lta bu khyod kyis mtshan ma de thong ma shig ces sngar ma bsgo bar lhag
[\[297b.6\]]ma [#]byas pa nyes kyis bskrad do zhes gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas pa ni las su mi chud do/_/spangs pa'am 'di bzhin du'o/_/yang dag par gshegs pas gsungs pa bar du mi gcod do zhes zer ba la sogs pa dang lhag [#]ma ltar ma zer zhes lan gsum du ma bsgo bar bskrad pa'i las
[\[297b.7\]]su mi chud do/_/dgongs gcig pa la sogs pa'i tshig gzhan gyis na dgongs pa las gtso bor ro/_/gos dang gser dngul dang tshul nas 'byung 'jug dang gso sbyin la sogs pa [#]chung ngu na mkhan po la zhu ba yan chad kyang ngo /_/dgongs shig btsun pa'am tshe dang ldan pa zhes smra ba'i tshe/_
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]dge slong de sems logs shig tu bsams [#]na sngags gdab pa la sogs pa ci byas kyang las su mi rung ngo /_/don gyi le'u rigs pa [#]la bzlog kyang mi skye ba ma yin no/_/dge slong du bsnyen par ma [#]rdzogs pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun la dgongs shig btsun pa'i [#]dge
[\[298a.2\]]'dun mkhan po 'di las [#]dge sbyong [#]ming 'di bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol lo zhes bya ba'i rigs pa las ltag ma'i tshig mgo mjug bzlog ste snga phyir smras kyang las su ni rung ngo /_/'khrul [#]bar mi bya/_ltag ma ltar tshig mgo mjug bsnor na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mtshan gzhan la
[\[298a.3\]]gnas te yang na yin no/_/dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe bab pa'i dge slong dgongs shig btsun pa'i [#]dge 'dun mkhan po [#]'di la dge slong [#]ma 'di bsnyen par rdzogs so zhes bya ba'i rigs pa las mkhan po 'di la rab tu rdzogs zhes byas te ming nor kyang las su rung ngo /_/dge slong
[\[298a.4\]]dang dge slong ma las las [#]gzhan du byas kyang ma yin/_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/_dge slong gi ming las drangs te gdag [#]pa'i rigs pa las dge slong ma'i ming las drangs te btags kyang las su rung ngo /_/dge slong ma la'ang dge slong gi ming las drangs te btags kyang rung
[\[298a.5\]]ngo /_/las kyi dngos po ste dris pa la sogs par chud do[#]/_/las kyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//'di man chad chad pas bcad pa'i las kyi dngos po la 'chad de/_ma zhi ba'i mtshan ma shes nas bskul bas dam bcar bcug nas mngon sum du smad las bya ba sbyin/_dge slong zhig
[\[298a.6\]]rtag par lhag ma man chad nyes byas yan chad gcig rtag tu byed cing mi mthol bar 'dug pa dang rtag par thab mo rgol ba gtong du ma btub na mi de dge 'dun gyi mdun du bkug la dge slong gcig rgol du bcug ste khyod 'di nyes so zhes brgal nas nyes pa'i dmigs ci la btub pa [#]bzhin du chad pas bcad
[\[298a.7\]]do/_/shes pa tsam gyis 'du ba ma yin [#]par ro/_/ltag ma ltar bdag gis nyes pa byas te dge 'dun gyis tshur shog shig par bsgo nas nyes pas gnod de [#]'ong du ma btub na ci ltar nyes pa zhig bzhin du mngon sum du ma 'ongs kyang chad pas bcad do/_/yan lag ma yin pa ni gnod pa ni med
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]par dam bcas pa'o/_/dge slong gcig gi la nyes pa yod par dge 'dun gyis shes te khyed 'di nyes so zhes bsgo ba ci'ang mi smra bar kha btsums te 'dug pa mi brtsan [#]gyis ci nyes pa dge 'dun mkhyen pa bzhin du chad pas bcad do[#]/_/skabs ma byas pa yang ste/_mi rigs pas ltag ma ltar dge
[\[298b.2\]]slong gis lhag ma man chad nyes byas yan chad cig byas te dge 'dun gyi nang du bkug nas dge slong gcig rgol [#]du bcug ste khyed la skabs dbye ba zhig byas na dbyer ma btub na chad pa dge 'dun mkhyen pa bzhin gcod do/_/bskul ba bdag ma langs pa na bsgo zhing bslang /_ltag ma ltar
[\[298b.3\]]dge 'dun gyis nang du dge slong nyes pa la rgol te [#]bcug pa'i dge slong ni 'khon [#]med pa dang [#]zhe sdang dang gti mug med pa dang kho [#]nyid dad na gdod bskos te rgol du gzhug_/'di man chad chad [#]pa rnams bdun gyis bcad pa las slar chags pa'i cho ga la 'chad rnyog pa dang dge 'dun la tshig
[\[298b.4\]]ngan pa zer zhing rnyog pa btang ba dang /_gshe ba dang /_khros nas tshig ngan pa zer ba btang ba dang /_dam bcas [#]dag dang /_nga la sus bskrad pa gcig cing [#]brdeg go zhes sems pa btung ba dang /_rnyog pa dang zhes pa nas dam bca' ba dag dang zhes pa'i bar du spyir spangs pa rnams
[\[298b.5\]]bdun gang yang rung ste/_mtshan ma 'di rnams lta bu yang mi bya bar sems kyis btab nas slar 'chag tu song na 'chag tu gzhug [#]go/_/dge 'dun gyi dad dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi spyir yon bdag gis yon phul ba dang gtsug lag khang nyid kyi [#]rkyen las lo dus rtag [#]par nor rdzas
[\[298b.6\]]'bul ba la dge 'dun gyis mi thos shing yod med par [#]gyur cig par sems pa dang /_gnas med par sems pa dge slong gi gnas dang gtsug lag khang yang zhig ste med par dga' ba dang dge 'dun gyi dang zhes pa nas sems pa'i bar du spyir rnam pa bdun gang gis spangs kyang rung 'di ltar
[\[298b.7\]]sems pa'i sems btang nas 'chags su 'ong na bzod par bya'o/_/sems de lta bur ma btang na mthol zhing 'chags su 'ongs kyang mi gnang ngo /_/rgyal po'i grong dang /_rgyal po'i phyag rgya khyer te nan thur gyis slar shog shig ces zer ba dang /_yul dpon dang /_zhang blon dbang
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]chen po la mthu btsal ba/_gnyen dang /_gnyen rigs pa bzlog [#]ste mthur byas pa dang /_gang zag la brten pa [#]gnas brtan nam dge slong mthu che ba la mthu btsal ba dang rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes zer ba nas brten pa zhes bya ba'i bar du spyir ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi [#]mthus
[\[299a.2\]]gtsug lag khang du mi gzhag tu mi rung zhes zer zhing mthu dang bcas te 'ongs kyang chos bzhin du mtshan ma ma btang na gtsug lag khang du mi [#]gzhag_/dge 'dun la mi brten [#]pa btang ba dang /_ltag ma ltar spangs te btang ba lkog na ni dge 'dun 'dir ma zad kyis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gar
[\[299a.3\]]dga' bar 'gro'o zhes zer zhing dge 'dun gyi nang du ni [#]bdag bzod pa gsol na thugs rje cir gzigs she [#]na mi gnang ngo /_/yan lag gcig mi byed pa na khyim pa dang /_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i dge slong lkog na khyim pa'i tshul du gos dkar po gyon zhing chos gos 'dor la
[\[299a.4\]]dge 'dun gyi [#]nang du snga ma'i nongs pa bzod par gsol te bdag dbyung du ci gnang zhes zer kyang bzod par mi bya ste yan lag gcig_/mur 'dug gi rgyal mtshan 'chad pa dang /_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i dge slong lkog na mur 'dug gi tshul du lus la thal bas byugs [#]pa dang ral
[\[299a.5\]]pa thogs pa la sogs pa byed cing dge 'dun gyi drung du bdag snga ma'i nyes pa bzod par gsol na thugs rjes cir gzigs zhes zer kyang mi gnang ngo /_/yan lag gcig_/mur 'dug dang bsten pa dang /_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i dge slong lkog na mur [#]'dug dang lhan cig
[\[299a.6\]]tu 'khod cing mur 'dug [#]gi chos la bltas [#]pa las dge 'dun gyi drung du bdag gi snga ma'i nongs pa bzod par gsol zhes zer kyang mi gnang /_chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang /_gong ma ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos bor la mur 'dug gi chos spyod pas na chos ma yin pa spyod ces bya ste/_mur 'dug dang
[\[299a.7\]]bsten pa [#]'di gnyis la yan lag gcig_/dge slong gi bslab [#]pa la mi slob pa dang /_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i dge slong spang pa'i [#]gnas na dus gsum [#]dge ba mi [#]spyod pa dang /_chu brtag [#]pa la sogs tshul khrims phra mo la nan tan mi bsrung [#]zhing dge 'dun gyi drung du bdag gi nongs pa
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bzod par gsol cing gnang zhes gsol kyang mi gnang ste yan lag gcig_/rnying zhing ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i dge slong spangs pa'i 'og tu snga ma'i nyes pa gnod bskur nas lus la bu spu 'greng zhing rdul byung ba tsam gyi tshong du dge 'dun la gsol ba dang skyo ba dang /_ltag ma lta
[\[299b.2\]]bu dge slong spangs pa'i 'og tu rab tu [#]'gyod cing mi dga' nas grogs po mdza' ba la phe'ur [#]yang bcol/_dge 'dun thams cad kyi zhabs las bzung ste gus rab tu gsol ba dang /_dge 'dun la ngan par bsten pa dang /_ltag ma ltar spangs pa'i dge slong dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i
[\[299b.3\]]'og tu rab tu mi dga' zhing 'gyod de dge 'dun thams cad kyi drung du 'gre ldog cing sems thag pa nas gsol ba dang /_'byung bar 'jug pa dang /_ltag ma ltar spangs pa'i [#]dge slong rje mo'am [#]dbang chen pos mgo la sla [#]tsa gzhag pa tsam du mi dga' zhing 'dor 'dod pa bzhin du mtshan
[\[299b.4\]]ma gang byas pa'ang de bzhin du 'dor 'dod cing gsol ba [#]dang /_mnyam par ston pa dang [#]/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i dge slong snga ma'i nyes pa btang la phyin chad yon tan dang ldan pa'i ci ltar byed pa bzhin du bgyid do zhes yi dam bcas shing khar yang brjod cing gsol ba dang /_
[\[299b.5\]]mtshan ma btang ste gsol ba nas bzod par bya'o/_/spang ba [#]rnam bdun sUtra rnyog ma [#]zhes pa man chad slob ces bya ba yan chad mtshan ma rnam pa brgyad btang la bzod pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba yan chad rnying zhing skyo ba man chad rnams ltar bzod pa gsol na spangs pa las slar bzod [#]par gsol ba gnang bar bya'o/_/
[\[299b.6\]]spang pa [#]rnam bdun ni 'og nas 'chad/_las sbyin pa dang /_dbyung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba dang /_gtang [#]ba dang gnang ba yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams bdag 'di ltar bgyid na dge 'dun gyis [#]gnang bar thugs rje cir gzigs zhes gsol du 'ong ba ni [#]gdod
[\[299b.7\]]gnang bar bya'i dge 'dun gyis 'di ltar [#]byar mi rung zhes bya ste byed du mi gzhug [#]go_/thab mo byed pa las kyis spyod/_/dge slong gcig gam gnyis kyang rung ste/_dge slong rnams la rtag par thab mo rgol ba de thong shig ces lan gnyis lan gsum du thab mo thong shig ces bsgo ste ma
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]btub na dge 'dun rnams kyis tshig gis spyod [#]ste/_gsol ba dang zhu ba dang [#]bzhi'i las kyis bskrad do/_/spangs pa gcig dge 'dun gyis ltag [#]ma'i ltung ba'i phyir phyir [#]la ma mthol na smad/_dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma snga ma 'byung la mthol te yang byed cing mthol ba lta bu ni mi [#]
[\[300a.2\]]smad kyi lhag ma [#]mang du byas kyang mi mthol bar 'dug la mthol cig ces bsgo na'ang mi mthol ba ni sU [#]tra ltag ma ltar spyod de [#]dben par gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las kyis bskrad do/_/spang ba gcig rigs sun pa bskrad ka shwa ka dang su ga ras lta bu dge 'dun gyi rigs sun par byed pa'ang gsol ba dang
[\[300a.3\]]zhu ba bzhi'i las kyis bskrad do/_/de'i phyir du ba dang skabs mi ster cing mi byed na yang ngo [#]/_/ltag ma ltar rigs sun par byas te khyed nyes so zhes rgol [#]ba'i tshe skabs dbyer kyang mi btub/_dge 'dun nang 'dur kyang ma btub na gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las kyis [#]'dug pa'i gnas nas bskrad de
[\[300a.4\]]btang ngo /_/de ma mthong ngo zhes bsnyon kyang ngo /_/lhag ma ltar rigs sun par byas pa dge slong dang khyim pas kyang shes bzhin du rigs sun pa mthol cig ces bsgo na ngan [#]rigs sun pa ma byas zhes bsnyon cing 'chags su mi btub na bskrad [#]de btang ngo /_/rigs sun pa mthol cig spang [#]
[\[300a.5\]]zhes bya ba man chad 'di yan chad gsum spang ba gcig khyim pa la zug zer na [#]brtul na'o/_/khyim pa la thab mo rgol ba dang tshig ngan pa spyod/_de lta bu ma smra shig ces bsgo ste ma nyan na zas tsam byin la gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du mtshan ma ma btang gi bar du gzhag go_/de bzod par bya ba
[\[300a.6\]]'di'i las kyi gnas su bzod par bya'o/_/ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du spangs te gzhag pa dang slan chad mi bgyid do zhes gsol na ltag [#]ma sU tra ring po'i rtsis mgo bzhin du mtshan ma btang [#]la gsol ba btab pa'i steng du khyim pa su la kha ngan byas pa de la bzod par gsol
[\[300a.7\]]nas gdod gnang [#]bar bya'o/_/khyim pa la bzod par bya zhes zer ba'i sU tra ltag ma dang 'di gnyis las spang ba [#]gcig_/ltung ba shes pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis shes kyang mi mthol bar 'dug pa dang /_ma [#]bshags pa dang /_ltag ma man chad nyes byas 'chags su mi btub pa
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]dang sdom pa'i [#]bshags pa ma yin pa dang /_lhag ma man chad so sor mthol [#]ba yan chad nyes byas shig lus ngag gis byas pa ni lhag ma dang 'dra bar bya'i 'di ni nyes byas tsam yan chad gcig [#]sems kyis log par bsams pa ni ltag ma ltar chad pa mi bcad do/_/ma mthong ngo zhes bsnyon pa dang
[\[300b.2\]]ltag ma ltar lhag ma dang nyes byas yan chad byas pa dge 'dun gyis shes te mthol cig ces bsgo na nyes byas par yang ma mthong yid la'ang mi dran zhes zer zhing bsnyon na de'ang spang bar bya'o/_/ltung ba shes pa man chad 'di yan chad la spang ba gcig_/bshags pa la nan tan bya bar mi 'dod
[\[300b.3\]]pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag [#]ma man chad nyes byas yan chad gcig byas pa [#]bzhin du mthol tshangs byed du mi btub cing than [#]cing 'dug pa yang spang bar bya'o/_/'di la spang ba gcig_/sdig pa la bltas [#]pa'am btang ba yang spang /_/yang dag par gshegs [#]pa la skur ba 'debs shing
[\[300b.4\]]nyes pa byas kyang bar chad du mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba dngos ni ltung ba yin na ltung bas mi chog gi mtshan ma btang na de yang spang bar bya'o/_/ltag tu sU tra thab mo byed pa la las kyis spyo zhes bya ba man chad sU tra 'di yan chad spang ba bdun [#]yod de 'di rnams ni spang ba [#]ste gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du
[\[300b.5\]]gzhag go/_/'di la'ang [#]spang ba gcig_/'di nyid [#]ltung ba shogs shig pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar spang ba rnam bdun gang spang [#]yang rung ste/_thog [#]ma spang ba'i tshe dge 'dun gyis khyod nam dul bar gyur na 'dir mthol du shogs shog [#]ces bsgo ste btang ngo /_/dge 'dun 'di dag gis khyod kyi sel
[\[300b.6\]]nus so brjod do/_/ltag ma ltar spangs te btang ba slar mthol ba'i tshe dang po dge 'dun gang zag gi gnas na [#]'dug pa'i tshe nyes pa byas pa slar mthol ba'ang dge 'dun de nyid la mthol zhing bzod par gsol ltung ba mi bcang ltung ba sde lnga las gang yang rung ste byung na mi bcab par mthol lo/_/
[\[300b.7\]]chung ngu na ming nas kyang brjod do/_/lhag ma bcu gsum las gang byas kyang rung ste ming nas ma phyung bas yang nga lhag ma zhig yod de zhes brjod na'ang dpang btsugs pa'i tshul de bsngos par chud do/_/ci ltar lci [#]ba bzhin du nyes byas pa dag go/_/nyes byas yan chad ltung ba zhig byung na [#]yang 'di
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]nyes so zhes ming nas ma smos kyang nyes byas dang ltung ba spyi'i ming nas smos te pha logs la [#]brjod na'ang bsngos par chud do/_/rang bzhin du gnas pa la'o[#]/_/ltag ma ltar bsngo ba ni [#]dge slong phas pham pa ma byung ba gcig la bsngo'o/_/gzhan du ni mi lta ba la'o/_/dge
[\[301a.2\]]slong log par bltas [#]pa dang yang dag par bltas [#]pa gnyis so so'i sde la dpang btsugs shing bsngo/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar dbang gzugs pa ni khyim pa dang dge sbyong la ma yin gyi dge slong gcig la bsngo zhing dpang gzugs so/_/mtshan mtshungs pa la'o/_/
[\[301a.3\]]dge slong pho'ang pho la bsngo/_mo'ang mo la bsngo/_'di nyid du 'di bzhin du phyi ma dang bcas pa la'o/_/dge sbyong ni dge slong la mthol lo/_/dge slob ma dang dge sbyong ma ni dge slong ma la mthol lo/_/ltag [#]ma lta bu rang bzhin tha dad ma yin pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang
[\[301a.4\]]mtshan [#]mtshungs pa la mthol lo/_/'di yi chos pa lan 'di byas pa'o/_/dge slong grogs med na dge slong ma la bsngo/_dge slong ma la grogs med na pho la bsngo/_dge sbyong dang dge sbyong ma dang 'di rnams la bsngor ni [#]rung ste nyes byas re re yod do/_/mtshams gzhan du 'dug pa la
[\[301a.5\]]yang ngo /_/dge slong grogs la bsngo ba grogs nam mkha' la 'dug gam mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa la bdag mtshams kyi nang ngam sa la 'dug pas bsngo na [#]bsngos par ni chud kyi nyes byas so/_/bsgo ba las skyes pa dge 'dun thams cad la'o/_/rigs sun pa dang dge 'dun dbyen la
[\[301a.6\]]sogs pa bzhi lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo ste ma btub nas lhag mar 'gyur ba [#]ni nyi shu la mthol ba yin/_lan cig gam lan gnyis bsgo te lhag [#]mar gyur pa ni dge 'dun la mthol te [#]grangs ni 'og nas 'chad[#]/_smre sngags 'don pa'i na tshogs pa de'i gnas su'o/_/bzhi so sor
[\[301a.7\]]mthol pa gang byung yang rung ste/_mtshams gcig gi dge slong gud du song ba ni ma gtogs [#]kyi mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun thams cad la mthol/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo smad pa'i dngos po byung bar mi mthun pa ste/_smre sngags 'don pa mkhyen pa [#]bgyi'o zhes so/_/ltag ma ltar mthol
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]ba ni tshig 'di skad ces byas te mthol [#]lo/_/dge 'dun re re'i mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug la bdag gi nyes pa byas pa'i dngos po ci yin pa ming nas phyung ste 'di yin no zhes mi dga' zhing 'gyod pa'i tshul lta bus mthol lo/_/'di sngags lta bur ma yin no/_/sngags ni [#]lan gsum du gdab pa
[\[301b.2\]]yin na/_'di yang sngags gdab pa ni ma yin gyi ltag ma ltar brjod pa'i tshig dge slong gcig gi drung du thal mo sbyar te gus par tsog tsog por 'dug ste lan gsum mthol bas tshangs so/_/yid kyi ba lang [#]de bsdam par bya'o/_/yid kyis rku ba dang mi tshangs pa la sogs pa nyes pa zhig bya bar
[\[301b.3\]]bsams pa'i 'og tu yid kyis 'gyod de phyin chad mi bya bar bsams na gzhan la mthol mi dgos te byang bar 'gyur/_gzhan ni 'di dang bcas te bshags/_lus kyis nyes byas pa ni yid kyis mthol bas mi byang gi dge slong pha rol po'i gcig la mthol dgos so/_/gcig la'o/_/ltag
[\[301b.4\]]ma ltar mthol ba ni [#]dge slong gcig la mthol bas tshangs so/_/gzhan la mi lta ba de la'o/_/dge slong chos dang chos ma yin pa la bltas pa ni so so'i sde la mthol lo/_/kha na ma tho ba can med pa'o/_/mthol ba'i rnams dge slong gtsang ma la mthol lo/_/sde yang ngo /_/lhag ma
[\[301b.5\]]man chad nyes byas yan chad nyes pa ci byung ba sde snol du mthol lo/_/med na ltung bas so/_/dge 'dun khyer cig thams cad la ltung ba yod pa lta bu las bskos pa'i ltung ba yod pa lta bu sde [#]gcig kyang mthol du rung ngo /_/sngon du spangs shing bral na spangs pa'i 'o/_/chos gos gsum spangs pa'i ltung ba byung na gsum ka [#]
[\[301b.6\]]spangs te zhag gcig chos gos yang [#]med par 'dug la phyi de nyid gdod mthol tshangs byas te [#]bsngo'o/_/gos lhag spangs par [#]gyur pa zhag gcig spangs te phyi de nyid mthol tshangs byas nas gdod slar blang ngo /_/lhag ma'i sbom po lci ba ni dge 'dun thams cad las te lnga pa [#]la sogs
[\[301b.7\]]pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i sbom po lci ba zhig byung na dge 'dun lnga yan chad la mthol ba ni/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du dge 'dun spyan drangs te de la mthol lo/_/ma lus pa byung na mang po la ste ma chad pa'o/_/phas pham pa'i sbom po ni mtshams gcig gi nang nas [#]dge slong mang po
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]zhig 'dug na dge 'dun thams cad la mthol lo/_/gtsug lag khang de na dge slong nyung ste drug [#]tu ma tshang na [#]drug las nyung ba la mthol du mi gnang gi [#]gud du spyan drangs [#]la mtshams kyi nang du mthol cig_/'di yang ba na bzhi la sogs pa'o/_/lhag ma'i sbom po yang [#]ba dge
[\[302a.2\]]slong bzhi yan chad la mthol/_pham pa'i sbom po'i yang ba dge slong lnga yan chad la mthol lo/_/byas pa bzhin du 'di las rtsol ba [#]las rkyen gyis ma grub kyang las so/_/dge slong gcig gis [#]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i khu ba byas nas 'khor der mthol du ni bdag ngo tsha ste bdag dang mdza'
[\[302a.3\]]ba gcig [#]la bsngos te yul gzhan du dge slong nyi shu las mthol [#]du song song ba las ma mthol bar lam du shi'ang mthol ba'i sems dang chas te song song bas lhag ma'i sdig byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes byas pa [#]bzhin du ni glen pas byas pa dang shes pa'i ltung ba dang dran pa des na'o/_/dge slong
[\[302a.4\]]smyon pa gcig gis phas pham pa dang lhag ma la sogs pa zhig byas nas de'i 'og tu smyon pa sangs nas snga ma nyes byas pa dran kyang [#]mi dran pa'i tshe byas pas pham pa la sogs par mi 'gyur gyi nyes byas kyi mthol [#]bas tshangs so/_/ming dang rus ltung bar ldan pas brjod/_lhag ma'am ltung ba
[\[302a.5\]]zhig nyes byas nas mthol ba'i tshe/_ltag [#]ma zhig nyes na'ang lhag ma zhig nyes byas [#]so zhes byas la lhag ma'i nang nas [#]gang nyes pa'ang ming nas [#]dbyung ngo /_/ltung ba yang de dang 'dra bar bya/_'di srid du bcabs [#]pa dang ma bcabs pa dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang ngo /_/bdag gis
[\[302a.6\]]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byas te mthol ba'i tshe/_ltag [#]ma ltar gang nyes pa'i ming dang rus dang 'di srid du bcabs so zhes mthol/_/dbyung bas 'di las slong bar byed do/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhig byas na dge slong nyi shus phyung na tshangs par [#]'gyur ro/_/mgu bar bya ba nyi ma drug tu dpyad [#]de dge
[\[302a.7\]]'dun las blang [#]na'o/_/lhag ma ltar lhag ma byas pa bcabs pa'i chad pa'ang byas nas nyi ma drug tu dge 'dun la bdag mgu ba bgyid cing mchis so zhes gsol te zhag drug mgu bar byas nas gsol te dbyung bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma'i zla ba phyed do/_/dge slong mas lhag ma byas pa'i mgu ba
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dge 'dun sde gnyis zla ba phyed kyi bar du bya'o/_/lci ba'i chos las 'das na 'di spyod par bya'o/_/dge slong mas lci ba'i chos brgyad las gang yang rung ste nyes par gyur na dge 'dun sde gnyis la zla ba phyed kyi bar du chad pa bya'o/_/nyes pa bcabs pa med na de skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byas
[\[302b.2\]]te ci srid du bcabs pa [#]chad pa ma byas na zhag drug mgu ba byas kyang dbyung ba mi rung ngo /_/chad pas de med par mi [#]'gyur ro/_/ltag ma ltar bcabs pa'i chad pa phyas [#]na gdod dbyung bar rung ngo /_/dus de snyed du dge 'dun las blangs te'o/_/lhag ma byas te ci srid du bcabs pa'i zhag
[\[302b.3\]]'di snyed cig bcabs so zhes dge 'dun la [#]gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis bcad par gyis shig par bka' stsal nas gdod ci srid du bcabs pa'i chad pa bya'o/_/de byed pa las de lta bu dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byung na blangs shing byas pa las [#]zhig ste de bas na rtsa ba nas brtsams te sbyin/_
[\[302b.4\]]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhig byas nas chad pa dang mgu ba gang yang rung /[ #]dge 'dun las lung mnos te chad pa [#]byed pa'i tshe yang lhag ma zhig byas na las snga ma byas pa yang zhig dge 'dun las lung mnos pa yang mi brtsan gyi [#]da gdod lung yang gdod gnod pa [#]chad pa yang gdod mgo
[\[302b.5\]]brtsams te bya'o/_/'jug pa bzhin du brtsams pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa dad pa'i sems kyis mgu bar byed pa bzhin du chad pa slar mgo brtsams pa le lo ma byas pa ma yin gyi [#]snga ma dang 'dra bas dad pa bya'o/_/de bas na ma skyes pa de de na thog ma so sor bslang [#]pa
[\[302b.6\]]yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhig byas te mthol nas chad pa dang mgu ba byas nas byung [#]ba'i 'og tu phyis 'dul ba las thos nas snga ma'i chad pa dang mgu ba dang /_phyung ba tshul bzhin du ma byas par tshor na snga ma'i las mi rung gi [#]da gdod bya dgos so[#]/_/de las gzhan pa yang bya'o/_/ltag [#]
[\[302b.7\]]ma'i chad pa bya ba sngon lan cig kyang byas zin pas da yag yug tsam byas pas chog pa tsam du bsams [#]te byar mi rung gi [#]sngon ji ltar byas pa bzhin du nan tan bya'o/_/de bas na de'i phyir yang gnas pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma zhig byas te chad pa dang mgu ba byed pa las las ma zin par yang
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]lhag ma gnyis gsum zhig rim par byas na nang gi tha ma nas byas pa de nas mgo bzung ste las kun gdod bya'o/_/de bcabs pa lhag ma de'i dus chud par bya/_lhag ma zhig byas nas chad pa byed pa'i tshe yang lhag ma zhig byas nas zhag bcu tsam bcabs te bzhag
[\[303a.2\]]nas yang lhag ma zhig byas nas mthol na bar du zhag bcu tsam bcabs pas bsnan te chad pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/'di dag las kyis sbyin chad pa dang rtsa ba'i chad pa dang mgu ba dang rtsa ba'i mgu ba dang yang rtsa ba'i mgu ba dge 'dun gyis gyis shig par khas [#]bsgo ba tsam gyis mi chog gi [#]gsol pa dang
[\[303a.3\]]zhu ba bzhis byed du gzhug go/_/dbyung ba yang ngo /_/dge slong nyi shus chad [#]pa dang mgu ba byas te dbyung ba'i tshe'ang gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhis bya'o/_/'dir spyod pa yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma'i khu ba zhig dbyung [#]ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs te lhag ma gang byas kyang rung yon bdag dad
[\[303a.4\]]pa'i yon blangs shing las 'di ltar byed pa nyes so zhes spyo/_gsol ba dang klog pa dang po'i bar du'o/_/ltag ma ltar spyo ba ni las pa'i dge slong gcig gis gsol ba gcig byas la de'i 'og tu spyo bar bya'o/_/rtswa bting ba bzhin du bsnyil[#]/_dge slong lhag ma byas pa de dge 'dun
[\[303a.5\]]gyi [#]spyan sngar kha bub du bsnyil [#]la spyo ba dang dbyung ba gnyis ka las pa'i dge slong gis bya'o/_/de ltar las pas bsgo nas dge 'dun la bzod dam mi bzod zhus te dge 'dun gis bzod na bdag gis kyang de bzhin 'dzin to zhes bya/_bsngags pa yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar bsnyal ba las
[\[303a.6\]]bslangs nas khyod kyis mthol ba dang chad pa byas pa ma bcabs par mthol ba shin tu dge da khyod gtsang mar gyur to zhes zhib tu bsngags/_brjod pa byas ma thag tu'o/_/ltag ma ltar yon tan bsngags [#]pa gong du spyo [#]ba rnams zin nas de ma thag tu bslangs la bsngags so/_/phyir bya ba'i
[\[303a.7\]]dngos po'o/_/tshul khrims log ma ni dbyung /[ #]dge slong ma phas pham pa byung na gtsug lag khang nas bskrad do/_/de dge 'dun dbang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar pham pa bskrad pa ni gang zag gis bskrad par mi gnang gi dge 'dun gyis bskrad do/_/de dag gis de la mi g.yel bar bya/
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]dge slong phas pham pa byung bar shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis ma bskrad na dge 'dun thams cad nyes byas su 'gyur te gzhan yang gud nas [#]nyes byas yan chad [#]yod do/_/ma rung bar gyur pa bzod par ro/_/dge slong dang dge sbyong zhig nyes pa byas kyang sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa la bar du gcod par
[\[303b.2\]]mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de bskrad de btang nas phyis ngo mtshar 'gyod de lus kyi spu langs par mi dga' ste phye 'khrud de gsol [#]du 'ongs na bzod par bya'o/_/smad pa ma bsgos [#]na smad pa bzod pa mi skye ltag tu bshad pa smad pa mi [#]bskos na smad pa bzod pa mi skye/_ltag tu bshad pa smad pa rnam [#]bdun
[\[303b.3\]]gyis bskrad pa slar mtshan ma btang ste lus spu langs pa tsam du dad de gsol du 'ong ba [#]dge 'dun thams cad kyis bzod de/_dge slong gcig gis mi bzod ces byas na gzhan gyis bzod kyang bzod par mi chud do/_/sun pa de'i gnas su mi gzhag par bya[#]/_dge slong rigs sun pa byas
[\[303b.4\]]nas gang du byas pa'i yul nas bskrad de btang ngo /_/spang ba [#]thams cad dang mi gnas mi bza' spangs pa rnam pa bdun la sogs pa'i dge slong gang yang rung ste de dang lhan cig gso sbyin la sogs pa'i las dang zas la sogs pa lhan cig mi spyad do/_/de 'du shes pa las bcabs so/_/ltag
[\[303b.5\]]ma ltar spangs par shes bzhin du de dang lhan cig tu las dang bza' ba byas na nyes byas te mi shes pa ni nyes med do/_/de dag chos ma yin pa'i skyabs phye [#]ba'i de dag dang ngo /_/dge slong sde gnyis su chad de chos la lta ba'i dge slong chos ma yin pa la lta ba dang las [#]lhan cig byas sam bza' ba la
[\[303b.6\]]sogs pa thabs cig [#]tu byas na nyes byas so/_/gzhan du ma yin/_chos ma yin pa la lta ba'i dge slong [#]chos ma yin pa la lta ba dang las lhan [#]cig byas sam bza' ba la sogs pa thabs cig tu byas na [#]nyes byas so/_/[#]gzhan du ma yin/_chos ma yin pa la lta ba'i dge slong chos la lta
[\[303b.7\]]ba'i gan du 'ongs te las byas pa dang bza' ba lhan cig byas kyang nyes med do/_/smad pa gzhan 'di la ma yin/_spangs pa rnam pa bdun spangs pa la 'thab mo byed pa dang lhan cig ma mi mthol ba dang rigs sun pa dang khyim pa la zug zer zhing spyo ba bzhi ni dge 'dun nam dge slong dang bza' zhing
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]spyod du rung ngo /_/bsnyon pa dang bshags su mi btub ba dang sdig pa la lta ba gsum dang ni 'grogs shing bza' mi rung ngo /_/'di mdza' ba la gnas par bya/_spangs pa bdun las dge 'dun las grogs su rung ba bzhi [#]phyi rol du mi bskrad par mkhan po'am mdza' bo gcig
[\[304a.2\]]dang gcig dang gnas 'char [#]gzhug go/_/mnyam [#]pa med pa smad pa byed pa dang zhig ste bskrad pa'i snod dag spang zhing dor/_phas pham pa dang spang ba [#]bdun gang gang [#]rung ste/_gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa'i tshe 'gror mi btub na gos dang yo byad thams cad ra ba'i phyi rol tu phyung ste dor/_nan
[\[304a.3\]]gyis bskrad/_bskrad de 'gror mi btub na dge 'dun gyis rkang lag bzhi nas g.yangs te yang [#]sgor gzhug_/'dug na bcang /_bskrad pa'i tshe ka ba la 'jus pa ka ba yang bcad de bskrad do/_/rang bzhin mi ltung ba de nas dbyung /_sgo'i re bzhi [#]lta bu'am gcad [#]du mi rung ba lta bu zhig la [#]'jus
[\[304a.4\]]na/_sa la phyung ste bskrad de btang /_dge 'dun gyis de bcos ltag ma ltar bskrad pas 'jus te sgo dang ka ba la sogs pa phyung ba yang slar btsig [#]cing bcos byed du gzhug ltag ma ltar bcos pa dge 'dun gyis mi nus na yon bdag gcig [#]yod na bcos su gzhug_/ma grub na gtsug
[\[304a.5\]]lag khang gi [#]yis so/_/ltag ma ltar yon bdag gis kyang chos ma nus dkon [#]mchog gsum gyi dkor las phyung ste bcos/_'thab [#]mo byed pa bskrad pa mi gzung /_dge slong dang dge sbyong rtag tu 'thab mo byed de [#]bskrad par chad pa la dge slong 'gas mi bskrad du ci gnang zhes mi [#]gsol bar
[\[304a.6\]]bskrad do/_/thab mo las ma log cing ma zhi na [#]nan tan la [#]spang /_dge slong zhig 'thab mo zhig rgol te ma byed ces byas na bka' [#]bzhin du 'tshal zhes khas blangs la phyis [#]kyang rtag par byed na bskrad de gtong [#]ngo /_/chad par byed na zhi bar [#]bya bas so/_/dge slong gnyis shig chos la [#]rtag par
[\[304a.7\]]lta ba'i mu lta bu la rtsod de dbul na zhal ce [#]bas bcad kyang nyan du mi btub cing rtsod pa gnyis ka bskrad do/_/gnas pa la gnas kyis nan tan du'o/_/nye gnas kyis nyes pa zhig byung ste/_dge 'dun gyis chad pas gcad [#]na mkhan pos chad pa myur du gyis la mthol tshangs gyis shig ces bsgo/_
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]'thab [#]mo'i mtshan ma 'bul ba'ang [#]spang ngo /_/dge slong gnyis shig 'thab pa la dge slong mngon par non ni mi byed bags kyis 'thab tu 'dzud [#]na 'dzud pa'i dge slong de'ang bskrad do/_/dge slong ma dang 'khri shing gnas pa yang spang ngo /_/dge slong zhig dge slong ma'i khyim du rtag par 'gro zhing
[\[304b.2\]]gnas pa de ltar ma byed ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo ste ma btang na bskrad do/_/bskrad pa de la phyag bya bar ni mi rigs par dge slong mas bya/_ltag ma ltar dge slong ma'i gnas su rtag par 'gro ba'i dge slong bskrad pa de la dge slong mas phyag mi bya/_/smad pa'i mtshan ma gzhan la de'i
[\[304b.3\]]phyir bas bsam [#]na gzhan byas kyang skye'o[#]/_/smad pa rnam pa [#]bdun la ltag ma'i smad [#]pa'i gzhi kha cig smad pa'i las bya ba'i tshe las pa'i dge slong gis smad pa dang bskrad do zhes zer ba'i ming nor kyang las su rung ngo /_/gzhan du ni mi skye'o/_/ltag ma ltar ming [#]nor mi shes na ni rung gi shes bzhin
[\[304b.4\]]du las byas na mi rung ngo /_/gzhan du ni mi skye'o/_/ltag ma ltar ming nor mi shes na [#]zhig go/_/spangs pa [#]rnam bdun las spang pa rnam bzhi [#]gang yang rung ste/_de gcig gis 'thab mo zhig byas te chad pas bcad pas [#]las de'i tshe rigs sun pa zhig byas na snga ma'i las btang /_las phyi ma'i
[\[304b.5\]]las byas/_gdod mgo nas byed du gzhug go/_/spangs pa [#]la mi skye/_spangs pa rnams [#]bdun las bskrad pa rnam gsum gyis bcad de chad pa byed pa'i tshe phyi ma spangs pa [#]gcig yang byas na ltag [#]ma'i chad pa ltar 'byung ba ma yin gyi chad pa gnyis ka byed du gzhug go/_/sbom por ni
[\[304b.6\]]grags pa dang /_bsod nams chen po dang mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang /_thos pa dang skyabs dang 'khor mang pa'o[#]/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu dang ldan pa dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas bskrad na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ro/_/khyim pa ni dpe
[\[304b.7\]]ste dge slong la sogs pa lnga la bzung yang spang ngo /_/ltag tu khyim pa la [#]zer na bskrad [#]do zhes 'byung ba bzhin du dge slong rnam lnga la zur zer zhing 'thab mo rgol ba'ang lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo ste ma btub na bskrad do/_/smad pa can gyis mi spang ba ma yin/_smod pa sna tshogs kyi
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]dge slong rnams la smod na yang bskrad do/_/smad pa'i las la spyi'i ma yin par ma dogs shig dge slong gis smad pa dang bskrad pa bzhin du dge slong mas kyang dge slong la de bzhin du bya'o/_/rab tu byung ste bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa de dag la'ang 'di dag bya'o/_
[\[305a.2\]]ltag tu dge slong dang dge slong ma [#]nyes na spang ba rnam pa bdun gyis spangs pa [#]bzhin du dge sbyong dang dge slong ma dang dge sbyong ma nyes na'ang spang ba rnam bdun bzhin du bskrad do/_/khyim pa la ma yin/_spang ba rnam bdun lta ba rtse rgod dang g.yog la ni mi bskrad do/_/dge slong pha la phas pham pa
[\[305a.3\]]byung bar skur cing smod dang sdig pa la lhung bzed dbub/_khyim pa dge slong ma nyes pa la phas pham par skur ba dang dmod [#]mo zer ba dang phyar ka 'debs pa la sogs pa zhig zer na mi de'i khyim du zan mi bslang ngo /_/chos su bya bas so/_/ltag ma ltar lhung bzed kha dbub pa ni lhung bzed nyid
[\[305a.4\]]khas dbub pa la ni ma yin gyi zan mi bslang pa [#]la bya'o/_/gsol bas so/_/lhung bzed phul ba'i khyim du zan mi bslang ba ni gsol pa gcig gis bya'o/_/lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa'i khyim du mi 'gro ba'o/_/lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa'i khyim du dam bcas pa rnams mi 'gro stan la [#]mi spyad/_
[\[305a.5\]]lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa'i khyim du nor te phyin nas stan la 'dug ces zer kyang mi 'dug_/yon bcas pa la ma yin/_lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa'i khyim pa des sngon gtsug lag khang du khyim dang mal stan dang [#]ra ba dang skyed shing lta bu zhig yon du phul na'ang mi bza'o[#]/_/bsod snyoms mi
[\[305a.6\]]blang /_lhung bzed phul pa'i bsod snyoms shig gang [#]bar gtsug lag khang du khyer te 'ongs kyang mi blang /_chos mi bshad/_lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa la chos [#]mi bshad/_gang gi phyir las bya ba der gtogs par phub pa'o/_/lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa ni dge 'dun gang 'dus pa des
[\[305a.7\]]mi blang gi dge slong gzhan ni ma gtogs so/_/'di dag gi phyogs ma yin pa'i grong dang spangs pa tshun chad la mi skye'o/_/dge 'dun chos dang chos ma yin pa la phyogs pa las chos la lta bas lhung bzed khas phub [#]na chos ma yin pa la lta ba mtshams gcig na 'dug kyang bslang du
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]rung ngo /_/'di la 'gas bsgo/_ltag ma ltar lhung bzed khas phub [#]pa'i dge bsnyen [#]la dge 'dun gyi nang nas kho dang mdza' ba gcig dge 'dun tshig skad du mi bya bar bzod pa gsol cig ces gdams kyang nyes [#]med/_bzod par byas nas gsol bas dag na/_lhung bzed khas phub [#]
[\[305b.2\]]pa'i dge bsnyen des nos so zhes khas len cing chad pas chad pa la 'tshal lo/_/bzod pa gsol na dge 'dun 'dus te gsol ba'i las byas nas phyin chad de'i khyim du bslang par bya'o/_/bcabs pa'i sems ma bskyed na tha ma'i tshun chad ldang ngo /_/dge slong gcig gis pham pa byas
[\[305b.3\]]te mi tshangs pa'i pham pa byas ma thag tu 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol du 'ongs pa de la tshul khrims 'chags so/_/de ltar 'chags pa ni rab tu ngo tsha zhing 'gyod pa'i shas che ba'i phyir ro/_/bslab pa spyad pas so/_/ltag ma ltar tshul khrims 'chags [#]pa de bslab pa [#]dge 'dun
[\[305b.4\]]gyis byin nas bslab pa bzhin du ni sbyangs na tshul khrims skye'o/_/de 'thob pa'i [#]dge 'dun las so/_/ltag ma ltar bslab [#]pa thob pa ni dge 'dun gyis byin nas gdod [#]'thob bo/_/las kyis sbyin/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis sbyin pa'ang gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las kyis
[\[305b.5\]]sbyin no/_/nam [#]'tsho'i bar du/_ltag ma ltar slob ma [#]sbyin zhes bya ba ni lo gcig gnyis shig sbyin pa ma yin gyi tshe gcig tu sbyin pa la bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bas ngo tsha ba [#]dang ldan pa gcig gi [#]mdun na 'dug go/_/mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma lta bu dang 'dzin pa dang
[\[305b.6\]]grangs pa la yang ngo /_/dge slong sde snod gsum gang yang rung shes pa gcig gis dge 'dun gyis lhag ma byas te rab tu ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis phyin chad mi bya bar yi dam bcas na gang zag gcig la mthol bas tshangs so/_/bsam pas ltung ba dang ldang gi chad pas ma yin no/_/dge
[\[305b.7\]]'dun gyis lhag ma byas nas zhag drug mgu ba byas [#]pa'i tshe rab tu ngo tsha ba [#]dang ldan zhing gnod ba bzhin du mthol na tshangs par 'gyur ro/_/'dir ltung ba'i sde'i ming dang byung ba'i dus so/_/sU tra ltag ma ltar mdo sde'am 'dul ba 'dzin pas lhag ma byas nas gang zag gcig la mthol
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]ba'i tshe lhag ma gang nyes pa'i ming nas dbyung ngo /_/phyir bya ba'i dngos po gtogs so/_/'di man chad dus dang dus ma yin pa dang bsdus pa'i dngos po la 'chad do/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhes mi shes la/_brjed nas bcabs [#]pa'i sems ma bzhag cing /_byas sam ma [#]
[\[306a.2\]]yin nam/_ci ltar ram ci 'dra bar dran par ma nus pa dang /_dge slong 'ga' zhig gis dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma byas pa las bcab par ni ma bsams kyi dngos po brjod dam nor te lus pa las [#]phyis mthol na bcabs pa'i chad par ni mi 'gyur gyi/_mgu ba'i chad pa zhag drug bya bar
[\[306a.3\]]zad/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par ram spang bar [#]gyur na bcabs pa mi ldang ngo /_/dge sbyong dang spangs pa lta ba [#]zhig gis dge 'dun gyis lhag [#]ma byas nas bcabs pa las phyis mthol na bcabs [#]pa'i chad pa ni gnyis ka la'ang nyes [#]med de spangs pas ni zhag drug mgu ba bya[#]/_dge sbyong ni
[\[306a.4\]]nyes byas su zad/_smyos pa'i 'du shes nyams na [#]ltung ba yang ste phas pham pa'i yan chad kyang ngo /_/dge slong rang bzhin nyams te smos pa'i tshe/_phas pham pa la sogs pa ltung ba sde lnga gang byas kyang nyes med[#]/_ma bcabs na yang ngo /_/sngon sangs rgyas kyis khrims ma bcas pa'i
[\[306a.5\]]tshe ltung ba sde [#]gang byas kyang nyes med/_mi shes pa ni ma yin no/_/dge sbyong 'ga' zhig khrims mi shes kyi [#]nyes pa byas kyang bla grang snyam te byas pa ni mi brtsan kyi [#]gang byas dngos po bzhin du sbyar zhing mthol lo/_/mngon par ma dad pa yang ngo /_/so sor thar pa'i nang nas ltung ba sde lnga byung ba
[\[306a.6\]]las dang de sha chang la sogs pa zos kyang nyes med ces zer ba de mi brtsan [#]te ltung ba gang byas pa mthol du gzhug go/_/mngon pa [#]mi shes par 'du shes na yang ngo /_/dge slong grogs kyis ltung ba sde [#]lnga lta bu ma byed cig ces bstan na khyod bdag kyang mi srung [#]na nga la bstan ci [#]dgos zhes zer na
[\[306a.7\]]de skad zer ba mi brtsan [#]te ltung ba gang byas pa bzhin du mthol du gzhug [#]go/_/sa gzhan du gnas pa ni tshun chad kyang ngo /_/spangs pa [#]rnam bdun gyi nang nas dang po bzhi dang lhag ma'i chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa dang rtsa ba'i mgu bar byed pa dang /_tshe gcig gi bar du slob pa byin pa rnams na re
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]nged sa gzhan na gnas kyis dge 'dun gyis lhag ma byas pa bcabs kyang nyes med ces zer ba mi brtsan [#]gyi bcabs pa'i chad pa dang mgu ba tshul bzhin du byed du gzhug [#]go/_/dge 'dun gyis lhag ma yid gnyis kyis bcabs na shes pa bzhin no/_/'ga' zhig gis dge 'dun gyis lhag ma byas
[\[306b.2\]]pa'i 'og tu lhag ma'am sbom po gang yin mi shes te the tshom za na'ang the tshom za ba mi brtsan [#]te gang nyes pa'i dngos po mthol du gzhug_/gang gis sngar bcabs pa'i mi [#]ldang bar spyod pa yang med do/_/ltag [#]ma'i mdo ring po las dge 'dun [#]gyis lhag ma byas par mi shes pa dang spangs
[\[306b.3\]]pa dang /_dge sbyong gsum la bcabs pa'i chad pa med pa ni ming smos su zad pa [#]de bcabs pa'i chad pa med bzhin du bcabs pa'i chad pa byed du'ang ma gzhug cig_/nyes byas pa ni spyod pa la nan tan byed cing spangs na'o/_/dge 'dun gyis lhag ma'i chad pas bcad de chad pa spyod pa'i
[\[306b.4\]]tshe/_rgyal po'am blon po'i dbang gis chad pa byed pa'i bar chad du gyur pa ni ma gtogs kyi chad pa zhag bzhi lnga byas pa'i 'og tu zhag gcig gnyis bsnan [#]te mi bya'o zhes zer ba'i tshe nyes byas gcig_/de'i sde las [#]spyod na'ang der ro/_/dge 'dun gyis lhag ma bya bar sems pa'i
[\[306b.5\]]tshe nyes byas gcig_/'grub pa las ma [#]byas na'o/_/lhag ma byas nas pha rol la mthol nas chad pa gor mi byed par phyis bya'o zhes zer ba'i [#]nyes byas gcig_/spyod pa med pa'i gnas las phyir 'ongs na de'i gnas so/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma'i chad pas bcad de zhag ma
[\[306b.6\]]'khor bar khyim par babs pa las phyis dge slong du zhugs na'ang snga ma'i chad pa'i chad pa bya/_dngos po sbyang ba'i [#]lhag ma bsgrub/_mdo gong ma ltar dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma'i chad pas bcad pa las khyim par babs pa las phyis dge slong du zhugs na lhag ma'i [#]chad pa dang mgu ba dang
[\[306b.7\]]dbyung ba rnams la nan tan du bsgrub cing bya/_bcabs pa'i dus chad par mi shes na nyung du mi 'gyur ba la gnas so/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma byas nas zhag du bcabs pa mi shes na zhag bco lnga tsam glengs [#]te bya/_spyad par bya ba gtsang ma'i 'og kyang ngo /_/mdo gong ma ltar dge
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]'dun gyis [#]lhag ma byas nas zhag grangs shes na zhag du bcabs pa bzhin du chad pa bya/_mi shes na lhag ma byas pa'i snga rol nas mgo bzung ste grangs la klag [#]ste bya/_zla ba bzhis gtsang ma'i [#]mthar ro zhes so/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma zhig byas nas bcabs pa ste
[\[307a.2\]]bcabs pa nyid zla ba gnyis gsum du lon gtol med na zla ba phyed dang bzhi tsam byas te bklag_/bcabs pa tshad med pa'o zhes so/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma byas nas bcabs pa'i zhag grangs dang 'di man chad bcabs so zhes pa'i tshad yod na de bzhin [#]bya zhag grangs dang bcabs pa'i tshad
[\[307a.3\]]med na steng ma ltar bklags te bya/_bsams te khu ba phyung ba blangs la [#]tshad med pa zhes so/_/khu ba'i dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma byung ngam ma byung gtol med de yid gnyis dang the tshom du gyur te ma mthol ba las bcabs pa'i zhag grangs nor bar bklags te bya ba bzhin du ngag dka' ba'i dge 'dun
[\[307a.4\]]gyi lhag ma yan chad kyang thabs 'di dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/ci srid du bsams pa de srid du song ba 'dir nan tan du bya'o/_/mi gcig gis [#]dge 'dun gyi lhag ma gsum cig car byas na chad pa dang mgu ba bya ba so sor byar [#]kyang rung cig car byar [#]kyang ste/_ci ltar cig car bya ba ni 'og nas
[\[307a.5\]]'chad/_chad par mi shes na tshad med pa zhes bya ba la gnas te'o/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma lta bu gcig [#]byas pa'i 'og tu gcig byung ste du byas pa'i grangs dang tshad gtol med na chad pa mgu [#]bar cig car bya/_tshad yod la mang na mang po zhes so/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma lta bu mang zhig
[\[307a.6\]]cig car bya ste lhag ma gang byas pa dang zhag grangs shes na bdag gis lhag ma 'di snyed cig byas so zhes mthol te mgu ba dang chad pa byas te 'og nas 'chad do/_/dus lhag pa'i'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma mang zhig cig car byas pa las bcabs pa'i zhag grangs dang
[\[307a.7\]]gang gang byung ba dran na gang sngar byung ba'i tshangs pa dang mgu ba byas na gzhan gyi [#]chad pa dang mgu ba byas na tshangs/_ming la sogs pas so/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma mang zhig cig car byas pa las dge 'dun gyi drung du mthol ba'i tshe byas nas ci srid lon pa dang gang gang byas pa brjod/_
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]lci ba dang mi bzad [#]pa'i bsam pas byas pa la sogs pas so/_/mdo gong ma ltar dge 'dun gyi drung du mthol ba ni thams cad mthol ba [#]mi dgos [#]kyi lhag ma'i nang na lci zhing sdig che ba bzhi gcig [#]mthol bas chog_/spyod pa na sngon bzhin byung ba dang phyir bya ba 'dod pa skyes na so sor sbyin gcig
[\[307b.2\]]tu spyad/_dge slong gcig gis dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byas nas bcabs pa'i chad pa zla ba gcig byed pa'i tshe zla ba phyed 'khor ba'i 'og tu yang dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma zhig byas na snga ma'i chad pa dang lhan cig byar mi rung gi snga ma'i zhag spangs [#]la phub la gdod mgo nas gsol ba dang zhu ba'i [#]
[\[307b.3\]]las kyis chad pa byed du gzhug go/_/'di dang bcabs pa'i mgu bar bya ba 'grub pa med do/_/dge slong gcig cig [#]gis dge 'dun gyi lhag ma byas nas zhag drug mgu ba byed pa'i tshe yang yang lhag ma zhig byas nas zhag gnyis gsum bcabs na bcabs pa'i chad pa gud du bya mi
[\[307b.4\]]dgos kyi mgu ba'i chad pa snga ma spangs la phub la gdod bya'o/_/dus dang dus ma yin pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po'o/_/'di man chad dus dang dus ma yin pa'i kun du ltung ba'i phran tshegs su gtogs pa la bshad/_nyin gcig gis mtha' ma yin pa'i chad na bcabs pa mi skye'o[#]/_/
[\[307b.5\]]lhag ma byas nas zhag gcig gi skya rengs tshun chad ni bcabs par mi chud kyi zhag gcig gis [#]'das nas ma mthol bar bcabs par 'gyur ro/_/smrar yan lag med la de'i sems med na bcabs pa'o/_/lhag ma byas nas mthol du dge slong grogs med cing bdag gi sems la
[\[307b.6\]]bcabs par ma bsams na ma mthol kyang bcabs par mi 'gyur ro/_/med pa bzhin du mi 'gro ba dang song ba'i dbang gis na'o/_/lhag ma byas nas bdag 'khor du mthol du dge slong grogs med de rgyang grags gcig gnyis phan chad gcig na dge slong 'dug la gcig la mthol du 'gror
[\[307b.7\]]lam du chus chod de/_'brug [#]gam mi rgod dam stag gzig lta bu'i rkyen gyis ma thar la/_bdag gi sems la bcabs [#]pa'i sems med na ma mthol kyang nyes med do/_/de'i don gyi dbang gis byas na yang ngo /_/lhag mar gyur pa'i 'og na nye 'khor du mthol du ni dge slong med rgyang
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]grags gnyis gsum tsam gyi dge slong 'dug pa la nam phrad pa na mthol bar bsams te sems la bcabs pa'i sems med [#]na le lo byas te myur du ma mthol kyang bcabs par mi 'gyur/_don med par nyes byas pa'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar lhag ma byas pa las
[\[308a.2\]]gud na dge slong yang yod lam na 'jigs pa'i rkyen yang med bzhin [#]du le lo byas te myur du ma mthol na nyes byas/_mtha' tshun chad na yang ngo /_/lhag ma byas nas bcabs pa'i [#]sems med de zhag gcig gi skya rengs ma byung tshun chad du ma mthol ba'i tshe'ang nyes byas so/_/bcabs
[\[308a.3\]]pa'i sems ma btang na de'i sems so/_/lhag mar gyur pa la bcabs par bsams te dge slong yod bzhin du ma mthol na zhag gcig gi skya rengs byung nas bcabs pa'i sems kyang drung na dge slong 'khod pa la ma mthol na skya rengs byung na bcabs par 'gyur[#]/_nyes med pa ni
[\[308a.4\]]phas pham pa'i ltung ba'i phyir ma byas na'o/_/phas pham pa [#]lta bus phyis pham pa dang ltung ba la sogs pa sde lnga gang byas kyang lhag ma dang ltung ba so so'i chad pa dang mthol ba bya mi dgos kyi nyes byas mthol bas chog_/dper na ta [#]la'i mgo bcad na lo ma med mod kyang sbom po yod bzhin du
[\[308a.5\]]phas pham pa [#]yang khyim pa dang mi 'dra bar ltung ba sde lnga gang byas kyang nyes byas zhes bshad do/_/dus dang dus ma yin pa dang bsdus pa'i dngos po ste dris pa'i'o//_//'di man chad dus dang dus ma yin pa'i gnas tha dad pa'i dngos po la 'chad de/_chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa spyod pa
[\[308a.6\]]dag gis/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa'i dge slong btsun pa zhig la dge slong chad pa byed pa 'og ma zhig gis mdo 'di las ming gis smos pa ltar bdag la byed na dga' bar yang mi bsams la byed du'ang mi gzhug_/rjes dang phyag dang phyir ldang ba dang thal mo sbyor ba dang
[\[308a.7\]]bsu ba'i las rnams rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong las bdag gir mi bya/_'di dag gis mi bya ba la gzhan gyis kyang [#]de la der gtogs so/_/mdo gong ma ltar chad pa dang mgu ba byed pa la chad pa med pa'i dge slong gis kyang phyag dang bkur sti la sogs pa mi [#]bya zhig_/gom pa
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]dben [#]pa las gzhan du 'di dang lhan cig tu mi bcag chad pa dang lhan cig tu mnyam par 'grogs te bcag pa'am chad pa pa sngar btang ste mi bcag_/stan dma' ba la [#]mi 'dug_/chad pa bstan mthon po la bzhag ste chad pa med pa stan dma' ba la mi 'dug_/grong na 'gro
[\[308b.2\]]na dge sbyong phyi ma'i rang bzhin las kyang ngo /_/chad pa pa gnas brtan [#]kyang rung ste grong du 'gro ba'i tshe chad pa med pa gral dma' ba'ang sngar [#]'gro/_/g.yogs pa gcig tu nyal ba mi brtag[# ]/dge sbyong dang lhan cig tu zhag gnyis nyal du mi dbang ba bzhin du chad pa pa dang nub gcig khyim du nyal
[\[308b.3\]]na nyes byas/_rab tu dbyung ba dang rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang gnas sbyin pa dang /_dge sbyong gi phyir gzhag pa mi bya/_chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa'i dge slong gis las 'di rnams mi 'dug cing mi bya'o/_/gsol ba dang klog pa la'ang khas mi blang /_chad pa dang mgu bar byed pas
[\[308b.4\]]gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las mi bya/_dge 'dun gyis kyang mi bsgo/_/las bya ba dang dge slong ma la bshad pa dang dge 'dun gyi yid brtan [#]par bsgos na yang ngo /_/chad pa pa dang mgu bar byed pas las 'di rnams mi bya/_sngon bsgos pa'i las kyang mi bya/_chad pa pa dang mgu ba byed
[\[308b.5\]]pa'i dge slong sngon gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa'ang mi bya/_dge slong ma la mi bshad pa yang ngo /_/chad pa pa'i dge slong gis sngon lnga phrugs [#]dang ldan te dge slong ma la 'chad [#]par bskos pa'ang mi bshad/_gso sbyong gi so sor thar pa 'chad pa bzhin yod na'ang bshad pa mi bya/[ #]
[\[308b.6\]]so sor thar pa 'chad cing gso sbyong byed pa'i tshe/_gzhan shes pa yod na chad pa pas so sor thar pa mi klag[# ]/dge slong gi 'khrug pa mi gleng /_dge slong grogs la lhag ma man chad kyi nyes [#]byas shig yod na'ang sngar skabs dbye bar ma gsol bar mi bcos mi brgal/_chad pa
[\[308b.7\]]pa'i dge slong gis dge slong gtsang ma'i nyes pa mi bcos zhes byi shu tas bshad/_dge 'dun gyis [#]ma spangs pa la'o/_/spangs pa rnam [#]bdun gyi chad pas bcad pa lta bu la chad pa pas nyes pa bcos pa ni nyes med/_tshig dang bcas pa phur pa dang bcas pa dag mi bya/_chad pa pa'i
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]dge slong gis dge slong gtsang ma la ming gis smos pa 'di rnams skad du mi bya/_bstan par gso sbyong dang dbyung ba dang zhu ba klog [#]pa'i mi gzhag_/chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dge slong gtsang ma la ming gis smos pa 'di rnams skad du mi bya/_'dis 'du bar mi bya/[# ]
[\[309a.2\]]chad pa'i dge slong dang spangs pa rnams bdun gyi [#]dge slong gnyis lhan cig tu mi 'du[#]/_gang byas pa'i phyir chad pa spang /_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis snga ma'i nyes pa 'gyod de phyin chad mi bya bar yi dam bca'/_gzhan nyes pa dag kyang ngo /_/lhag ma'i chad pa byed pa'i tshe phyin chad
[\[309a.3\]]nyes byas dang ltung ba yan chad kyang mi bya'o zhes yi dam bca' [#]zhing nan tan du bsrung /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la nyes pa mi bya/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dge slong gtsang ma la nyes pa mi bya zhing yid la'ang ngan sems mi bskyed/_dka' ba'i don med par ma gyur cig ces yid la bya/_
[\[309a.4\]]lhag ma'i [#]chad pa byed pa'i tshe chad pa 'di nam byung ba dang thabs ci ltar byas na dge 'dun 'byung snyam du rtag par yid la bsam zhing nan tan bya/_nang par langs nas sgo dbye/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis nang par langs nas sgo la sogs pa dbye/_me mar snod dbyung [#]/_chad pa pa'i dge slong
[\[309a.5\]]gis nub mo gtsug lag khang du me mar bus la dge 'dun slad rol che chung du gshegs pa'i lam du'ang bud/_gtsug lag khang gi chag chag dang /_/phyag dar dang rab tu [#]gzhon nu'i lci ba'i byug pa sbyin/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gi nang du ming gis smos pa 'di
[\[309a.6\]]rnams bya/_bshang gci'i gnas bkru/_/chad pa pas bya dus dang 'byor ba'i phyi ba dang sa dang chu gzhag_/chad pa pa'i dge slong gis bshang gci'i sar dus dus su bkru ba'i chu dang phyi ba'i sa la sogs pa gzhag_/dgun grang ba'i tshe chu dron gzhag dbyar tsha [#]ba'i tshe chu grang gzhag wa bkru/_
[\[309a.7\]]chad pa [#]pa'i dge slong gis wa la bshang gcis 'bags pa thams cad [#]bkru/_/stan gding /_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis [#]stan gding ba ni dge 'dun bshos gsol ba dang chos gsan pa'i gdan dus su gding /_dus shes par bya ste phog [#]dang de'i snod gzhag chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dus
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]dus su dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du phyag bzhes pa'i phyir me tog dang pog spos la sogs pa bsog_/de ste nus [#]na ston pa'i yon tan brjod na yang ngo /_/chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du phyag bzhes nas bskor ba'i tshe pog thogs te dang por song la sangs rgyas la stot+t+ra [#]
[\[309b.2\]]bklag_/de ste ma yin na chad pa la bsko/_/chad pa pa stot+t+ra [#]mi shes na rogs po mdza' bo la gsol ba btab ste stot+t+ra klag [#]tu gzhug tshogs nas gaN+DI [#]brdung /_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis bshos la sogs pa tshogs nas gaN+DI brdung [#]/_de ste tshe cha na dge slong la bslab/_chad pa pa'i dge slong
[\[309b.3\]]gis nyi ma tsha ba'i tshe dge 'dun bshos gsol ba la bsil yab kyis g.yab bo/_/thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa'i tha mar de'o/_/chad pa pa'i gral ni khrims rdzogs pa thams cad kyi mjug tshe lus [#]thams cad kyi steng du 'dug [#]go_/bza' ba byas nas mal stan g.yogs [#]par sba/_chad pa
[\[309b.4\]]pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun bshos gsol zin nas dge 'dun gyi gdan la sogs pa sprugs te bltab la mal stan gyi khang bu'am/_gnas dben par gzhag_/lhung bzed kyi gzhi dor/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis gdan brtul nas lhung bzed kyi gzhi rtswa [#]dang sa la bral brul lus
