[\[309b.5\]]pa thams cad phyags te dor/_dus shes par byas te mchod rten phyags[#]/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dus dus su mchod rten thams cad phyags shing phyi bdar bya[#]/_rab tu gzhon nu'i lci ba'i [#]byug pa sbyin/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun 'du ba'i sar gtsug lag khang du ba lang gi
[\[309b.6\]]lci bas byug_/'du ba'i dus su gding ba nas yon tan gyi bar du chud pa'o/_/chad pa pa'i dge slong gis nub mo dge 'dun 'du ba'i sar gdan bting la dge brtag [#]bya/_de ste nus na zhag brjod/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dge brtag [#]byas pa'i 'og tu zhag grangs 'di snyed 'das so
[\[309b.7\]]zhes dge 'dun la brjod/_mi nus na dge slong gzhan bsko[#]/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dge brtag [#]bya/_mi nus na gzhan su nus pa la bcol te gsol/_chad pa pa'i [#]dge slong dag gis [#]rkang pa nub mo bkru/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis dgun dang dbyar la sogs pa'i
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]dus bzhin du chu grang dror [#]sbyar te dge 'dun gyi rkang pa bkru/_dus dang 'byor pa'i chus so/_/bsku ba yang ngo /_/chad pa pa'i dge slong gis [#]dge slong dag gi [#]rkang pa bkrus nas snun [#]gyis bsku/_mi 'dod na snum dbul/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis ltag ma ltar chad pa pa'i dge
[\[310a.2\]]slong gi [#]rkang pa bkru zhing snum gyis bskus[#]/_btub na phyi de nyin [#]zas bzang po dang khur ba dbul gtsug lag khang gi mtha' 'khob tu 'os/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis chad pa byed pa'i tshe/_gtsug lag khang gi nang nas [#]gnas khang ngan pa gcig tu gzhag_/rigs pa ni rnyed pa thams cad
[\[310a.3\]]la'o/_/dad pa'i bram ze'am yon bdag gcig gis dge 'dun gyi spyir yon phul ba la chad pa pa'i dge slong yang phal dang 'dra ba'i yon skal sbyin/_dge ba'i phyogs bya/_dge slong chad pa pas [#]chad pa byed pa'i tshe dus gsum du bdag gi [#]dge ba rgyun mi chad par bya/_de bzhin du 'dir
[\[310a.4\]]de'i rang bzhin tshol ba dang slob pa sbyin pa'o/_/mi tshangs par spyod na tshe gcig tu slob pa byin [#]pa'i dge slong dang ltung ba sde lnga las gang byung gtol med de the tshom zos nas rang bzhin [#]tshol du bcug pa'i dge slong gnyis kyi [#]steng du smos pa'i chad pa pas bya'o zhes bya ba thams cad bya'o/_/bshad pa
[\[310a.5\]]ni ma yin no/_/tshe gcig tu slob pa byin pa dang rang bzhin tshol du bcug pa'i dge slong gnyis kyis so sor thar pa 'chad pa'i tshe dge slong gtsang ma la kha thon shes pa med kyang so sor thar pa mi bshad/_snga ma ni bshags pas rang bzhin du chud do[#]/_/ltung ba sde lnga las gang byas gtol med de
[\[310a.6\]]the tshom zos nas rang bzhin tshol du bcug pa'i dge slong ni nam dran nas dge slong la mthol na gtsang mar 'gyur ro/_/phyi ma ni dgra bcom par na'o/_/dge slong gi [#]tshangs par spyad nas tshe gcig tu slob pa byin pa ni nam dgra bcom par gyur na gtsang mar chud/_sgo dbye tshun chad gtsug lag
[\[310a.7\]]khang pa la sogs par yang byas pa bzhin du spyad pa'o/_/lhag ma'i chad pa dang mgu ba [#]byed pa'i zhag grangs kho nar dbyung du dge 'dun nyi shur ma tshang ngam tshang yang yan lag dang ma ldan na dge 'dun nyi shur tshang gi bar du bsdang /_de ltar sdod pa'i tshe dge 'dun tshang tshang gi bar du chad pa dang
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]mgu ba rgyun mi chad [#]par bya ba'ang ma yin bar du bcad de yod btang ba'ang ma yin gyi dge 'dun nyi shur tshang [#]tshang gi bar du las 'di rnams bya'o/_/bsdus pa'i dngos 'dris pa'i 'og gi [#]mdo chad pa dang zhes zer ba man chad 'og ma'i mdo dka' ba'i don med par ma gyur cig ces byas te'o zhes 'byung
[\[310b.2\]]ba [#]yan chad kyi chad pa'i las thams cad bya de man chad kyi chad pa'i las ni bya mi dgos/_de ltar chad pa byed pa'i tshe/_gtsug lag khang gi nang na gang ngan pa gcig tu bzhugs te dge 'dun spyir yon phul ba'i skal yang sbyin no/_/de bzhin du spyod pa dang smad pa dang bskrad pa dang brtal ba dang
[\[310b.3\]]spangs pa dag kyang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi spang ba [#]rnam bdun gyis chad pa'i dge slong spangs [#]pa'i gnas nas [#]'dug pa'i tshe chad pa dang las bya ba'am mi bya ba'i skabs dang gnas ni mdo ltag ma bzhin du byas te dge 'dun yon phul ba'i yon skal la ni mi dbang sngon spangs pa'i chad pa ma byung ba'i tshe
[\[310b.4\]]spyir yon phul ba las spang ba'i [#]'og tu dgos [#]pa'i skal ba ni dbang ste blangs kyang nyes med la dge 'dun gyis [#]sbyin/_bshad pa ni ma yin no/_/so sor thar pa'i tshe dge slong gtsang ma la kha thon shes pa med kyang mdo gong ma ltar spang ba [#]rnam bdun gyis [#]chad pas bcad pa'i dge slong gis mi klag_/
[\[310b.5\]]spangs pa [#]'di dag gis spangs[#]/_spang ba rnam bdun gyis chad pas bcad pa'i dge slong gtsang ma dang lhan cig mi 'khod cing gtam mi bya ba dang kha zas mi spyad/_mi rigs pa [#]ni de'i phyir rnyed pa la'o/_/spang ba rnams [#]bdun gyi [#]chad pas bcad pa'i dge slong mtshan ma [#]btang gi bar du dge
[\[310b.6\]]'dun spyir yon phul bas shas mi sbyin ma spangs pa'i snga rol gyi yon ni dbang ngo /_/bye ba bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dge ba dang mi dge ba sde gnyis su gyur pa la phan tshun gtam dang kha [#]zas mi spyad pa bzhin du sdang [#]ba rnam bdun gyis [#]chad pas bcad [#]pa la'ang kha zas la sogs pa mi spyad pa dang mi dge
[\[310b.7\]]ba bzhin du blta/_de bzhin du bye ba la chos ma yin pa'i skyabs so/_/dge slong dge mi dge rnam pa [#]gnyis su gyur pa'i tshe/_dge slong gcig cig[#] lus dge ba'i nang na 'dug la sems mi dge ba'i nang du phyogs par dge 'dun gyis shes na [#]dge 'dun gyis [#]steng du mgu ba byas la dbyung du dge
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]'dun ma tshang na dge 'dun du tshang gi bar du chad pa bya ba dang mi bya ba'i skabs bya ba bzhin du 'dir kyang de bzhin bya/_mi skye ba ni rang bzhin du mi gnas pa la ste chad pa dang mgu bar bya ba dang bslab pa spyod pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]lhag ma'i chad pa dang mgu ba byed pa dang tshe gcig tu
[\[311a.2\]]slob ma [#]byin pa gsum gyis gtsang ma'i dge slong gnyis gsum zhig la chad pa dang mgu ba byas par mi chud/_dge 'dun na[#]ma yin pa la yang ngo /_/mdo gong ma ltar chad pas bcad pa'i dge slong gis gtsang ma'i dge 'dun du ma tshang ba la chad pa dang mgu ba [#]byas kyang tshangs par mi chud do/_/de'i
[\[311a.3\]]gnas su zhugs pa las chad na yang ngo /_/mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun nyi shu zhig 'khod pa las grangs bcad de so sor bsngos nas 'di la bya [#]'di la mi bya zhes byas te chad pa byas na chad pa byas par mi chud do/_/mangs zhes mi spang chad pa pa'i dge slong gis thog ma chad pa byung ba'i gnas na
[\[311a.4\]]dge 'dun du longs pa yod bzhin du 'di la mi bya'i gung du dge 'dun nyung ngu la chad pa bya'o zhes zer te song nas chad pa byas pa ni las su mi rung la nyes byas/_gnas brtan dang so sor thar pa dang bcas [#]par nan tan bya/_chad pa pa'i dge slong gis thog [#]ma chad pa byung ba'i gnas na dge 'dun yon
[\[311a.5\]]tan dang mi ldan zhing gnas brtan dang so sor thar pa 'chad pa med na gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi dge 'dun la chad pa byas kyang nyes med[#]/_gang du dar [#]gsum la sogs pa thams cad du gtogs pa spyod pas der [#]spyad/_chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa dang tshe gcig tu slob pa byin pa gsum gyis
[\[311a.6\]]dge 'dun la chad pa byar mi rung gi chad pa pa nyid dge 'dun du langs [#]pas chad pa byas na byas par mi chud do/_/thog ma las gzhan du skya rengs 'byung bar mi bya/_chad pa byed pa'i tshe [#]rkyen byung ba la sngags kyis bsngos te 'gro ba ni ma gtogs chad pa'i zhag grangs ma 'khor gyi bar du mtshams
[\[311a.7\]]kyi phyi rol du zhag gcig [#]skya rengs 'byung bar mi gnas/_bya ba 'das pa dge 'dun 'khor ba la brjod/_chad pa dang mgu ba byed pa'i tshe nub mo dge 'dun 'dus pa la bdag gi zhag grangs snga ma 'di snyed cig ni 'das 'di snyed cig ni phyi na lus zhes gsol zhing brjod/_nyin re zhing bya ba ni de steng ring
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]du mi spyad pa yang ma yin no/_/chad pa pa dang mgu bar byed pa'i tshe zhag grangs nyung na snga ma ltar nyin re bzhin brjod pa yin na chad pa zla ba gnyis gsum gyis bcad [#]na nyi ma gsum zhing dge 'dun la zhag 'di nyid [#]cig 'das so zhes gsol zhing brjod/_'dir gsum mam bzhi'o/_/chad pa pa [#]la
[\[311b.2\]]gsum bzhi zhig byed pa'i tshe'ang nyi ma gsum zhing dge 'dun la zhag 'di snyed cig 'das so zhes gsol zhing brjod/_dge sbyong dang khyim pa 'khod na mi gsol/_don 'di byed pa des zur [#]mi bya/_chad pa byed pa'i tshe dge slong gtsang ma pas ngo tsha ba dang smad par bya/_de ste 'thab mo byed
[\[311b.3\]]par 'ongs par thos te 'jigs na dge 'dun nam [#]gang zag gi [#]gnas su btang [#]/_chad pa pa'i dge slong chad pa byed pa'i tshe gud nas dge slong 'thab mo pa [#]zhig 'ong bar thos na dge 'dun nam gang zag gi drung du 'thab mo pa slar mchis kyi bar du bdag gi chad pa btang [#]ngo zhes gsol te sngon gyi
[\[311b.4\]]gral gar [#]bab par 'dug la/_phyis [#]'thab mo pa song nas sngon zhag ji snyed byas pa'i mjug nas bzung ste bya bdag gis dge 'dun la ni lan gsum du bzlas[#]/_'jigs pa dang bral nas de nyid du blangs/_mdo gong ma ltar 'thab mo pa song nas chad pa pa'i mjug nas bzung [#]ste bya/_
[\[311b.5\]]bdag gis dge 'dun la ni lan [#]gsum du bzlas/_'jigs pa dang bral nas de nyid du blangs/_mdo gong ma ltar 'thab mo pa [#]song nas chad pa pa'i mjug [#]sngon gyi zhag grangs nas bzung ste bya ba'ang dge 'dun la bdag gis lhan cig gsol te byin/_chad pa pa ma [#]song gi bar du mi bya/_
[\[311b.6\]]gzhan la gnas pa'i dngos po'o/_/'di man chad gnas pa tha dad pa'i dris pa'i dngos po la 'chad de[#]/_de'i nyin zhag gi chad pa ni rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan cig tu g.yogs pa gcig tu [#]chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa spyod pa dang lhan cig tu nyal na'o/_/chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa'i tshe
[\[311b.7\]]dge slong gtsang ma dang lhan cig tu nyal na zhag tu nyal ba chad pa dang mgu bar byed pa'i zhag grangs la ma gtogs te 'byung ngo /_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du yang ngo /_/chad pa pa chad pa byed pa'i tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba nyid kyang zhag grangs su mi chud pa'i steng du chad pa snga ma byas pa'i zhag
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]grangs la'ang phyi rol du song ba dbri'o/_/ma brjod na yang ngo /_/chad pa zla [#]ba gcig gis bcad de byed pa'i tshe zhag gsum zhing dge 'dun la zhag 'di snyed cig [#]brjod pa las [#]de zhag bzhi [#]nyin par brjod pa ni nyes med de bzhi las 'das na chad pa snga ma byas pa'i zhag grangs las
[\[312a.2\]]zhag bzhi dbri'o[#]/_/bsnyen pa pa [#]de'i mtshams ni mi nye na mi skye/_mdo gong ma ltar dge 'dun la brjod pa ni mtshams kyi phyi rol du brjod na zhag gsum zhing brjod kyang chad pa snga ma byas pa'i zhag grangs las zhag gsum dbri'o/_/nyes med pa ni de'i nyin par ldog na mtshams gzhan du
[\[312a.3\]]song na yang ngo /_/chad pas bcad pa de chad pa byed pa'i tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ste zhag ma lon par slar 'ongs pa ni nyes med/_chad pa dang lhan cig tu g.yogs ma gcig tu chad pa pa mi nyal/_chad pa pa mang zhig 'khod de lhan cig nyal na nyes byas su 'gyur bas gnas tha dad du
[\[312a.4\]]'khod/_mur 'dug gi chad pa la gnas pa dang der lhan cig tu na 'dir nyes med do[#]/_/mur 'dug rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe sems brtags [#]pa'i phyir zla ba gcig dge 'dun gyi 'khor du gzhag pa dang /_lhan cig nyal ba nyes med do [#]zhes byi shu [#]tas bshad/_mur 'dug sems brtag [#]
[\[312a.5\]]pa'i phyir za [#]ba gcig tu gzhag pa'ang lhan cig tu nyal na nyes med do zhes byi dza yas bshad/_sa gzhan du gnas pa spyad pa dngos te dris pa'o/_/'di man chad 'dul ba'i dngos po la 'chad de/_ma grags pa ni rtsa ba ma yin no/_/dge slong zhig gis [#]ltung ba sde lnga las gang yang rung ste byung na
[\[312a.6\]]dogs [#]pa ni mi btsan gyi/_mthong ba dang thos pas brgal ba dang gleng ba ni nyes med/_mi skye ba ni dbyung ba'i smra ba [#]zin nas dbyung ba bzhag pa'o/_/dge slong tshul nas dbyung [#]ba'i tshe tshul nas ma byung bar dge slong yon tan dang ldan pa zhig na re khyod tshul nas ma 'byung shig ces zer na mi
[\[312a.7\]]'byung byung zin pa'i 'og tu de skad zer ba mi brtsan[#]/_de bzhin du nad pa la byed na yang ngo /_/dge slong tshul nas byung ba'i tshe nad pa zhig na re khyod dang bcad pa yod kyis re zhig [#]tshul nas ma 'byung shig ces zer ba las byung ba ni nyes med do/_/pho nyas kyang ngo /_/nad pa'i bang chen gyis
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]ma 'byung shig ces zer ba'ang mi brtsan [#]te 'byung /_nad pa la yang ngo /_/nad pa tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe min pa zhig gis khyod skad cig tshul nas ma byung shig [#]ces zer na mi [#]bsdad par byung yang nyes med/_khas [#]mi blang /_mdo gong ma ltar tshul nas 'byin pa'i che nad pa dang pho nya lta bu zhig na
[\[312b.2\]]re tshul nas ma byung bar sdod cig ces zer ba'i tshe khas mi [#]blang bar 'byung ngo zhes bya/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod sdod cig khyod nad pa ste sbyor ba mi bzod kyis zhes so/_/dge slong tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe nad pa zhig na re tshul nas ma byung bar sdod cig ces zer zhing rgol zhing 'ong ba la tshe dang ldan pa khyod
[\[312b.3\]]nad pa yin te dbang po nyams shing rgol ni mi nus kyis re zhig sdod [#]cig ces bsgo ste dge 'dun gyis dge slong tshul nas [#]dbyung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa nad [#]pa'i pho nya 'di rgol [#]mi rung ngo zhes slar bsgo/_dge slong tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe nad pa'i pho nya zhig 'ongs te re zhig ma 'byung shig ces pa
[\[312b.4\]]la dge 'dun gyis 'di skad du bsgo/_nad pa nyid dbang po [#]nyams pas rgol [#]ba la sogs pa'i tshig mi brtsan gyi [#]sdod cig ces de la bsgo ste dge slong tshul nas dbyung ngo /_/byas pa'am byed pa'i rang bzhin ma chud par gleng [#]pa yang ngo /_/tshul khrims mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig gis dge
[\[312b.5\]]slong gtsang ma la phas pham pa bzhis skur ba lta bu ni mi brtsan [#]gyi skur ba ni gang skur pa'i nyes pa dang sbyar/_lhag ma yang dus ma yin par mi 'jug_/ltung ba sde lnga lta bu zhig gis pha rol la rgol ba'i tshe'ang [#]las byed pa dang 'brel pa'i [#]skabs su mi brgal gyi dal ba'i skabs su brgal/_
[\[312b.6\]]dran pa dang shes bzhin pa gzhag par ma yin/_tshul nas 'byung ba dang thos pa [#]dang mthong ba lta bus rgol ba'i tshe brgal na nyes sam ma nyes pa dang /_bdag gis mthong ba las lhag par bskur tam ma bskur bar [#]bsams te brgal/_gcig tu ma chad par ma yin/_steng ma ltar rgol ba'i
[\[312b.7\]]tshe'ang dge sbyong dang khyim pa'i drung du mi brgal gyi dben par brgal/_skabs ma phye bar ma yin/_mdo gong ma ltar rgol ba'i tshe skabs ma phye bar mi brgal/_byung na der ro/_/tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe na dge slong so so nas thams cad kyis skabs phye zin nas skabs ma phye bar brgal
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]kyang nyes med mi dran na dran par bya/_ltag ma ltar skabs phye ba'i 'og tu dge slong la brgal te pha rol gyi nyes pa [#]mi dran na dran rtags kyis brgal/_'di mi byed la tshig dang bcas pa 'dir bya/_pha rol la rgol ba'i tshe skabs dbyer gsol te skabs 'byed du mi [#]btub na tshig
[\[313a.2\]]dang bcas pa byas te 'og nas 'chad/_tshe dang ldan pa tshig dang bcas pa bya'o/_/steng ma ltar skabs dbyer rung ma btub na kho bo cag gnyis mi brtsan [#]gyi steng du gud du 'gror mi rung gis gnas 'di na khyed skad cig 'dug ces bya/_khyod gnas nas nga la ma dris par 'gro bar ma byed cig_/
[\[313a.3\]]ltag ma [#]ltar skabs 'byed du ma btub na ngas khyod la rgol ba yod kyis nga la ma dris kyi bar du khyod gud du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo/_/tshe dang ldan pa brtags pa'i tshig yod de zhes so/_/ltag ma ltar skabs 'byed du ma btub na brtags pa'i tshig khyod la rgol ba yod kyi nga la ma dris kyi bar du gud du
[\[313a.4\]]ma 'gro shig ces bsgo/_/de ltar yang dul bar ma gyur na mi bshad/_gong ma ltar byas kyang ma dul te skabs 'byed du ma btub na chos la sogs pa bdag la dri ba'i rnams kyang mi bshad/_smra ba la sogs pas kyang 'di la zlog_/skabs 'byed du ma btub pa'i dge slong de dag la gtam
[\[313a.5\]]zer na lan mi blan[#]/_lam srang ngam grong bar na 'dug na byol [#]te 'gro/_'on kyang na [#]gso sbyong gzhag thabs ltag ma ltar byas te'ang ma dul zhing skabs mi 'byed [#]na de dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong ma byed cig ces dge 'dun thams cad la bsgo/_/'on kyang na [#]dbyung ba la'o/_/thabs ltag ma ltar
[\[313a.6\]]byas te mgu zhing skabs 'byed [#]na de dang lhan cig tu tshul nas ma 'byung zhig ces dge 'dun thams cad la bsgo zhing tshul nas kyang mi dbyung /_/'jog pa gzhag [#]pas de dang lhan cig tu byas na'ang bshags pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar rgol ba dang skabs 'byed du ma btub pa gnyis nang 'dus
[\[313a.7\]]ste[#]/_gso sbyong dang tshul nas 'byung ba gnyis lhan cig gcig tu byas nas [#]dge 'dun la ma gsol kyang bzod pa'ang bya/_tshul nas 'byung ba dang gso sbyong kyang lhan cig byar rung /_de ste skabs phye nas mi 'jam na phur pa [#]dang bcas pa bya/_ltag ma ltar nyes byung ba la rgol bas
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]skabs 'byed par gsol te/_skabs dbye ba'i 'og tu tshig mi 'jam zhing slar gshe na phur pa dang bcas pa'i tshig byas te phur pas [#]bcas pa'i tshig ni 'og nas 'chad/_'dir rab [#]gnas che ge mo zhig tu'am dngos po zhig kho bo gang du 'dod par smra'o zhes nas ltung ba brjod de nyes pa bstan pas
[\[313b.2\]]spangs pa'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar skabs phye ba'i 'og tu tshig mi 'jam [#]par zer na gnas dang dus 'di'am gzhan gyi gnas dang gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa'i tshe'am shing drung dang khyim drung du phrad pa'i tshe ltung ba'am nyes pa byas pa'i ming nas byung [#]ste brjod pa 'dis brgal lo/_/las byas te
[\[313b.3\]]kho'i drung nas spangs te 'gro'o[#]/_/tshul khrims dang lta ba dang spyod pa dang 'tsho ba bzhin pa ni de [#]dag thams cad la gleng ba la sogs pa bya ba rtsa ba dang bcas pa la skye'o/_/pha rol rnam pa 'di rnams 'di lta bu zhig spyod cing byed pa la brgal ba ni nyes med de rgol du dbang /_rtsa ba
[\[313b.4\]]ngan pas [#]mi bya/_pha rol la rgol ba'i tshe 'ol phyir mthong ba dogs [#]pas mi brgal gyi yid ches par mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gtan tshigs yod na brgal/_'dir dngos bden yang rkyen ma yin no/_/pha rol la nyes pa yod bden du zin kyang /_bdag gis legs par ma
[\[313b.5\]]mthong na mi brgal/_brgal kyang mi brtsan [#]te ltung ba sde lnga gang la brgal ba'i nyes par gyur te mthong ba la 'chad/_pha rol gyi nyes pa yang dag kyang bdag gis mang po snyam du bsam zhing [#]mi dogs par dang pha rol gyi [#]nyes pa yang dag ste mi tshig slob pa'i tshig la bdag gis yid ma
[\[313b.6\]]ches bzhin du rgol ba mi brtsan [#]te rgol ba'i mi de ltung ba gang la brgal ba'i nyes pa dang sbyar/_bdag gis mngon du mthong ba dang dge bsnyen dad pas mgrin par ral kyu 'os kyang chos mi gtong ba [#]lta bu dang /_pha rol sngon ngan pa gsum lta bu las brgal ba ni dngos po ma nyes kyang rgol ba brtsan [#]te
[\[313b.7\]]gang gis brgal ba bzhin du sbyar/_byed pa'i mtshan ma dang gzhan gyi tshig dang bdag gis thos pa rnam gsum gyis [#]'di ltar thos na'o/_/pha rol mi tshangs par spyod par mdo 'di ltar brtags par bdag gis thos te brgal ba ni nyes med de [#]rgol ba bzhin du sbyar/_yid ma ches pa ni
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]rtsa ba ma yin no/_/pha rol dngos po nyes pa bden kyang bdag gis yid ma ches na mi brgal/[ #]'dul ba'i dngos po'o//_//du mas shes na glengs pa la sogs par 'dod pas so/_/dge slong pho mo gang yang rung ste/_dge 'dun gyi [#]lhag ma man chad nyes byas yan chad
[\[314a.2\]]gcig byung [#]na tshul nas 'byung ba dang [#]gso sbyong gi tshe'ang dge slong dang dge slong ma bzhi lnga man chad gcig gis khyod la brgal ba zhig gis tshul nas kyang ma 'byung [#]zhig ces gso sbyong kyang ma byed cig ces bsgo na rgol du gnang ngo /_/tshul gyi snga logs sam tshul gyi phyi logs su brgal ba ni mi gnang
[\[314a.3\]]ngo /_/mi dbyung ba de mi gzhag_/mdo gong ma ltar brgal ba de tshul nas dbyung [#]ba'i nyin par kho na la brgal to/_/gso sbyong ma yin par de ma yin/_gso sbyong gi tshe'ang gso sbyong gi nyin par brgal to/_/byed pa na'am byas nas 'jog pa bud med du gyur tam gzhan skyes pa la bzhag na
[\[314a.4\]]yang gzhag pa ma yin no/_/ltag ma ltar brgal ba ni dge slong phas ni dge slong ma la brgal zhing tshul dang gso sbyong nas mi dbyung bar rung /_dge slong mas rgol du mi gnang /_rgal ba'i dge slong nyid mtshan gyur te bud med kyi [#]mtshan thob na rgol du mi gnang /_rang bzhin stor bas ma yin/_
[\[314a.5\]]dge slong rang bzhin stor te smyos sam mi dran pa zhig pha rol la rgol zhing tshul nas dbyung ba dang gso sbyong gi tshe rgol zhing khyed tshul dang gso sbyong byed du mi gnang gi [#]'dug shig ces zer du mi gnang /_tshul khrims med pa dang /_dge slong gi [#]khrims rtsa ba bzhi las gang yang rung gi [#]chags pas yon tan
[\[314a.6\]]dang ldan pa dang tshul dang gso sbyong gi tshe brgal kyang mi brtsan [#]te tshul dang gso sbyong [#]bya zhing dbyung bar bya/_gcig pus ma yin log pa la lta ba'i dge slong gis yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge slong la brgal na'ang mi brtsan [#]te ltung ba bzhin 'di dag la ma yin/_dge slong smyon pa'am mi dran pa zhig
[\[314a.7\]]la gtsang ma'i dge slong gis [#]tshul dang gso sbyong gi tshe mi dbyung bar brgal kyang mi brtsan [#]te tshul dang gso sbyong nas dbyung /_gdul [#]ba'i dngos po ste dris pa'i'o//_//dge 'dun 'byed pa tha dad par [#]byed nus pa la mi 'dod bzhin du mi gleng /_dge slong tshul khrims dang mi
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]ldan pa zhig sde snod gsum shes shing 'khor dang rags pa zhig la nyes pa'i dmigs yod de bdag gis brgal kyang kho mi dga' ba [#]la phyes sha khon du 'gyur ba tsam gyis chod na ma brgal kyang nyes med/_glengs pa la mthar mi bya/_dge slong kha dman pa zhig la nyes pa'i dmigs yod de pha rol
[\[314b.2\]]'khor dang rags pa zhig gis brgal na gnod bkur zhing khas blangs te bzod [#]par gsol ma nyes na'ang tshig drag pos mi bya bar 'di ltar bdag gis ma nyes [#]so zhes dal gyis bshags/_gang du mi 'phrod pa de dang lhan cig tu mnan par mi gnas/_dge slong 'khon [#]yod pa zhig dang gnas
[\[314b.3\]]gcig na'ang lhan cig mi 'khod/_lam du'ang mi 'grogs/_gnas [#]gnas sa gcig na'ang mi gnas/_kho gnas gnas pa'i sa der yang mi 'gro/_/gzhan du na stan gnyis gsum spangs te'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar 'khon [#]yod pa'i dge slong de dang mchod ston nam gral gcig tu
[\[314b.4\]]gnas par gyur na bar du stan gnyis gsum tsam spogs te khyed cig_/gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin no/_/'khon [#]byung ba'i dge slong pha rol mi srun pa'i dge slong ni na rgan yon tan can gyi dge slong ni gzhon na gzhon nus kyang stan gnyis gsum spogs te zhog shig_/des gtsug lag khang
[\[314b.5\]]bkol te sbyin/_lhag ma'i dge slong 'khon [#]yod pa gnyis gtsug lag khang 'god pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun gyis kyang khang bu 'dab chags su mi sbyin par lho byang shar nub [#]gnas so sor spags te gzhag_/blangs pa yang ngo /_/lhag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis khang bu lhan cig byin na'ang
[\[314b.6\]]bdag cag gnyis kyis lhan cig tu mi 'khod/_chos dang 'dul ba 'di dag las te chos ma yin pa la chags par shes nas [#]dge 'dun 'du ba med do/_/dge slong gnyis shig lta ba so sor dmigs te gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dang tshul la dmigs/_gcig ni log [#]pa la dmigs te de
[\[314b.7\]]gnyis [#]rtsod pa las gzhan zhig gis bsdums te mi dge ba la phyogs pa slar sangs rgyas kyi chos la phyogs te gnyis dum [#]na ni nyes med/_de ste ma dum bar de gnyis ka'ang so so nas dge slong bzhi bzhi [#]lnga lngar so sor nos byas te bzhi [#]la dge slong gcig kyang med na dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas par
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]chud de lhag mar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de dang gzhan du ste las spyad pa mi skye phan tshun du mi brel to/_/ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi dbyen du gyur pa phyi mtshams gcig gi [#]nang na 'khod na phan tshun du gcig la gcig dad pas ma dris kyang dge mi dge so sor
[\[315a.2\]]bltas shing tshul nas 'byung ba dang gso sbyong gi tshe las byas pa'ang gtsang sbrar chud de las 'grub bo/_/'thab mo la gnas pa de dang de'i [#(]rgyen [,]rkyen[)]por 'di'i chos pas phyag mi bya/_ltag ma'i dge mi dge'i dge slong sde gnyis su chad pa de la mi dge ba'i dge slong de la dge ba la phyogs pa'i dge
[\[315a.3\]]slong sde lngas phyag mi bya/_mi ldang /_stan la spyan mi drong [#]/_gtam dang /_gtam kun dang [#]/_mgu bar byed pa dang /_rtog pa dang lta ba dang 'di dag mi bya log pa la bltas pa'i dge slong la sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta ba'i dge slong sde lngas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams mi bya/_mal stan ngan
[\[315a.4\]]pa byin te lag brda bya/_log pa la bltas pa'i dge slong de yon tan dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas nub [#]mo mal stan mi sbyin pa ma yin te [#]rdol ba'am ngan pa tshig gis mi sbyin par lag brdas sbyin/_tshig gis gzhan thos par ro zhes gzhan dag go/_/ltag ma ltar log pa la bltas
[\[315a.5\]]pa'i dge slong stan mi smra bar lag brdas sbyin no zhes 'dul ba'i gzhung las 'chad de ltag ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i tshig ste stan sbyin pa mi dge ba'i dge slong thos par byas te sbyin zhes bshad/_gtsug lag khang mtha' 'khob las so/_/log pa la bltas pa'i dge slong nub mo
[\[315a.6\]]gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na spangs pa'i dge slong bzhin du khang pa mtha' 'khob ngan pa sbyin/_bdag kyang rgan po'o [#]zhes smras na khyod kyang dge sbyong shAkya'i bu na'o zhes bdag la 'cha' 'am/_ci ltar khyod kyis [#]'di lta bur gyur pa'i 'di lta bu'i gtam ste/_khyod kyi ston pa snying rje can gyis 'di
[\[315a.7\]]gnang gi 'di yang mi dbang ngo zhes gzhan la smra'o/_/log par bltas shing dge 'dun dbyen du 'jug pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs na gtsang ma'i dge slong gis bkur [#]sti la sogs pa mi bya zhing phyag mi 'tshal ba dang mal stan ngan pa sbyin/_brgya la log par bltas pa'i dge slong rgan pa zhig ste
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]nga la ci'i phyir bkur sti mi bya ba dang mal stan ngan pa [#]sbyin zhes zer na dge slong gtsang ma pas mdo 'di la ming gis smos pa skad du dge slong rogs po gcig la brgyad pa skad du smra ste zur gyis log par bltas pa brgyad do/_/dge slong mas stan dor ba [#]mi dbri/_log pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs na dge slong
[\[315b.2\]]mas phyag mi bya bar stan las ldang /_dge slong gis bsod snyoms sbyin log pa'i dge slong la dge bsnyen rnams kyis mchod ston bya zhing spyan drangs [#]bsod snyoms la 'ongs na zan sbyin/_bshags pa byas pa de'ang 'dus pa'i rnyed pa med par 'du ba'i mi ldang /_log par bltas pa'i dge
[\[315b.3\]]slong slar sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta zhing yon tan can [#]gyi dge slong la bshags so zhes zer na kha zer ba tsam gyis gnang ba mi bya'i gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyi [#]thabs 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bya/_gso sbyong ma yin par rang bzhin du gnas pa mi 'thob/_log par bltas pa'i dge slong sngon
[\[315b.4\]]gyi [#]mtshan ma bor nas gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas de 'khon 'chags [#]shing gsol na gso sbyong lan cig byas nas gdod yid ches te gnang bar bya'o/_/byin na [#]de bya/_log pa la bltas pa'i dge slong 'chags shing gsol na dge 'dun gyis kyang gso sbyong lan cig bya/_de las kyis
[\[315b.5\]]so/_/gso sbyong byin [#]pa'i tshe na gsol ba gsum zhu ba dang bzhi'i las kyis log pa la bltas pa'i dge slong gnang ba sbyin no/_/snga ma yang ngo /_/thog ma dge 'dun 'du ba'i tshe na'ang gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis 'dus te gdod log pa la bltas pa'i dge slong dgug_/brtags pa ni [#]'du
[\[315b.6\]]ba dang /_bkra shis pa'i phyir dang gnod pa'i gso sbyong ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ni dus la ma bab kyang gso sbyong bya/_de'i steng du bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i gso sbyong gis bsnan te spyir lnga bya'o/_/der de'i mtshan ma nyid dus so/_/ltag ma'i gso sbyong gi [#]rnam pa de nyid kyis dus la
[\[315b.7\]]bab par dmigs/_dmigs su phebs par bya ba'i de [#]rnams ltag 'og bsnor [#]cing mi bya/_las tha dad pa'i dngos po'o//_//chos ma yin pa smra ba dang mtshams kyi nang du so sor ni tha dad pa ste dbye ba'i sems kyis las byas [#]na'o/_/mtshams gcig gi[#] nang na 'khod pa'i dge 'dun
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]las bzhi yan chad dge 'dun du langs pa [#]zhig gis log pa la bltas te las brgya rtsa gcig po so sor tha dad du bya ste gcig_/gcig dad pa ma dris na tshig gis ma 'thab kyang [#]dbyen du chud de lhag mar mi 'gyur/_der bdag gir las kyis na skye'o/_/mdo gong ma
[\[316a.2\]]ltar dge 'dun dge mi dge sde gnyis su chad pa gcig la gcig dad pa ma dris kyang dge 'dun gyi las su rung ngo /_/bdag gi phyogs su ma yin par na ma yin no/_/dge mi dge mtshams gcig gi nang na dge 'dun dge mi dge sde gnyis su chad pa las mi dge ba bskrad kyang rung dag
[\[316a.3\]]pas mi dge ba bskrad kyang rung [#]bskrad par ni mi 'gyur gyi skrod skrod pa nyes med/_dge 'dun gyi chos su smra bas byas na byas pa'o/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dge 'dun mtshams gcig gi nang na 'khod pa las dge ba'i dge 'dun gyis mtshams bcing ba dang bkrol [#]ba ni mi dge ba'i dge
[\[316a.4\]]slong la'ang bcing ba dang bkrol [#]bar chud do/_/mi dge ba'i dge slong gis mtshams bcing ba drang bkrol [#]ba ni kho bdag gi las su rung gi dge ba'i dge slong gis mtshams bcing ba [#]dang bkrol bar mi chud de las su mi rung ngo /_/de ste de na bar ma yod na dge slong ma la bshad/_dge 'dun dge
[\[316a.5\]]mi dge sde gnyis su gyur pa la dge slong ma la chos 'chad par bskos pa de dag dge mi dge gang du'ang ma bltas na da bsko [#]mi dgos kyi [#]sngon bzhin du shod cig yid kyis mi dge ba la bltas [#]la sngon bskos pa mi brtsan [#]te 'chad du mi dbang ngo /_/chos kyi 'di skyabs btang na brel pa'o/_/dge mi dge
[\[316a.6\]]ba'i dge slong gnyis su chad pa las dge slong gcig cig gang du'ang ma bltas la dge 'dun gyi las byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba la bltas [#]pa'i dge slong gis dge slong de las ma dris na las su mi rung /_mi dge ba'i dge slong gis ma dris kyang nyes med/_'jug pas na de bzhin du zhig pa'o/_/
[\[316a.7\]]ltag ma'i dge slong dge mi dge gang du'ang ma bltas pa de phyis dge mi dge gcig la bltas [#]na bar ma zhes [#]ming de zhig ste med do/_/de mi bya/_bar ma'i dge slong de dge mi dge rnam [#]gnyis bsdu bar dgos pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis bstod pa yin te/_dge slong de gang la'ang mi 'jug_/
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]dge slong ma'i dge 'dun phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas na gzhag_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mo zhig 'thab ste [#]dbyen du 'gyur ba tsam gyis chod [#]na yang de gnyis kas gso sbyong dad las so sor mi bya bar gcig tu bya'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing dge slong pa'i [#]dge 'dun las dad pa dris
[\[316b.2\]]shing so sor thar pa [#]'chad pa'i dge slong dang /_gsol ba'ang [#]de gnyis ka spyis [#]bya'o/_/gcig la gcig dad pa ma dris na las su mi rung ngo /_/de ltar byed nas ma yin/_ltag ma'i dge slong ma'i dge 'dun so sor bya bar [#]gyur na bsdum zhing gdul ba'i phyir dge slong pha'i dge 'dun gyis kyang
[\[316b.3\]]gnyis ka la dad pa ma byin/_gsol na 'du bar bsgo/_/ltag ma'i dge slong ma bye ba [#]dge 'dun la dad pa gsol du 'ongs na dge 'dun gyis dad pa ma byin par sngon[#] du srid mod kyang gnyis ma 'thab par mtshan ma 'or la chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du 'gyur na gdod sbyin no zhes gyis shig_/
[\[316b.4\]]dbyar gyi chos smra ba'i sgyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang gi grong rkyen [#]gyi nor dbyar tshul na 'khod pa'i tshe/_dge slong dge [#]mi dge rnam [#]gnyis su bltas pa las rkyen gyi nor de rnams ni dge ba la phyogs pa dbang ngo /_/gnyis ka 'dus pa'i dge 'dun la bgo bar rigs pa ma phye bar byin na
[\[316b.5\]]yang ngo /_/yon bdag dad pa zhig gis dge mi dge [#]dge 'dun gnyis kyi spyir yon zhig phul nas [#]dge ba la lta ba'i dge 'dun dbang gi mi dge ba [#]mi dbang ngo /_/de ste dge 'dun gyi tshad du ni de dag la'o/_/dge mi dge'i dge 'dun yon bdag zhig gis gud du spyan drangs te yon zhig phul na mi
[\[316b.6\]]dge ba la bltas [#]pa'i dge slong grangs mang ste dge ba la [#]bltas pa'i dge 'dun grangs nyung yang yon dbang ngo /_/de ste nyung la de [#]dag dor na gang gi thu bar byin pa'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar grangs mang nyung du 'khod pa las yon bdag gis yon spar spar du bgos te byin na de bzhin du so sor dbang
[\[316b.7\]]ngo /_/gnyis kyi spyir byin na mi dge ba'i dge 'dun du langs [#]la dge ba'i dge 'dun du ma langs [#]na phyed mar bgo/_/de ste gnyis kar na gnyis kas so/_/yon bdag gis dge mi dge'i dge 'dun gyi [#]mdun du nor ram yon spungs na dge ba'i dbang /_mi dge ba'i dge 'dun gyi mdun du spungs
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]na mi dge ba dbang /_gang zag gi [#]char te dge 'dun gyi ma yin no/_/dge ba'i dge slong ni dge 'dun du ma langs [#]mi dge ba'i dge slong ni dge 'dun du langs [#]pa zhig la de gnyis spyi la yon bdag gis yon zhig phul na thams cad ci thob pa gang zag re re'i [#]thad du
[\[317a.2\]]so sor gos [#]shig_/las byas pa'i dngos po ste/_dris pa dang man bkar chud pa'o//_//'di man chad 'khor lo'i dbyen la 'chad de/_chos las tha dad du 'gyur ba ni gsol ba'am tshul shing len pa ste/_de'i phyir gyis na dge 'dun gyi dbyen [#]no/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen
[\[317a.3\]]du gyur pa ni rjes su phyogs pa bzhi bdag dang lnga pha rol kyang dge 'dun du langs pa las 'gyur te dbyen gyi dge slong des sangs rgyas kyi [#]tshul khrims las tshul khrims lngas nga la lhag ste khyed su dag [#]gi rjes su phyogs pa tshul [#]shing 'di long shig ces te/_tshul shing blangs dang log pa la bltas
[\[317a.4\]]pa des gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis rjes su phyogs pa rnams bsdus/_de log pa la bltas pa la [#]dang dge ba la phyogs pa'i dge 'dun gyis kyang khyed de ltar dbyen ma byed cig ces gsol ba gsum dang zhu ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ste ma btub na de dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang dbyen du 'gyur
[\[317a.5\]]ro/_/'di mi skye ba ni dge 'dun gyi tshad du cha med pa dang dbye bar byed pa na [#]gzhan dang mtshams kyi nang gi dge 'dun gyi tshad du med na'o/_/mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun las dge ba la bltas pa'i dge 'dun bzhi mi dge ba bltas pa yang rjes su [#]phyogs pa bzhi bdag dang lnga ste/_dge
[\[317a.6\]]'dun 'khod 'khod pa las gcig tu sngar bltas pa las dbyen du 'gyur ro/_/mi dge ba'i dge slong yang grogs po gsum bdag dang bzhi ni dbyen du mi 'gyur/_dge ba bltas pa dge 'dun du ma tshang na'ang dbyen du mi 'gyur/_byed pa ni bye bar ma yin no/_/dge mi dge so sor
[\[317a.7\]]bltas pa las dge ba'ang bzhi mi dge ba'ang bzhi de'i steng du mi dge ba las bltas pa bdag gis bsnan te dgu tshang na dbyen du 'gyur ro/_/chos dang chos ma yin pa de'i rang bzhin gyis gdon mi za bar na mtshams med pa'o/_/dge slong su'ang rung sngon de ba dat+tas dbyen [#]byas pa'i tshe/_
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]de ba dat+tas dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed nus sam mi nus zhes dge slong kha cig gis gsol na bka' stsal pa sngon ngas kyang de ba dat+tas [#]dbyen byas te lag pod chags pa'i steng du grogs kyang dge 'dun du langs pas dbyen bya nus su [#]zhes byung ba dang de ba dat+tas [#]na re sangs rgyas de skad gsungs pa la bltas
[\[317b.2\]]na ngas dbyen nus kyi [#]tshul khrims lhag pa lnga bzung ngo zhes bya ba las bcas te de ltar byas na mtshams med par 'gyur/_chos su 'du shes na'ang 'byed par ro/_/de ba dat+ta skad du thams cad stong par mya ngan las bzlas te btang ba skyid pa gcig yod de phas gnyis na khams gsum gyi chos
[\[317b.3\]]byed pa skyid kyis nga logs su khams gsum gyi [#]chos la phyogs shig ces dbyen byas na dbyen du 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo bye ba'i dngos po'o//_//'di man chad rtsod pa'i dngos po la 'chad de/_bzhi 'khrug pa'i phyir dge 'dun ni don rnam pa [#]bzhi'i phyir 'khrug ste 'og nas 'chad/_don la de
[\[317b.4\]]ltar bzlog [#]pa dang spangs pa ltung ba dang bcas pa [#]las la 'du ba [#]mi sbyin pa'o/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bur gcig gi non [#]gcig gis byas te dge slong bzhi bzhi lnga lngar so sor 'chad [#]de de las rtsod pa byung ba dang /_thog ma'i mtshan ma gcig tu chad par byed pa zhi bar bya/_rtsod pa rnam pa bzhi
[\[317b.5\]]la gdul ba rnam pa bdun gyis gdul te thog ma'i don las bzlog ces zer ba la mngon pas gdul bar lobs [#]pa la mngon par sbyin zhes zer ba de 'bul te sde [#]snod gang mang du thos pa dang yon tan dang ldan zhing gang chos 'chad pa de'i yus su bya'o/_/gzhan ni 'og nas 'chad/_mtshan ma gnyis pa ni
[\[317b.6\]]'di dang dag pa sbyin pa'o/_/dang 'og gi spangs pa [#]ni mngon pa dang dran pa dang mi blun pa gsum gyis gdul bar byed de zhib tu 'og nas 'chad/_mtshan ma gsum ni phyir bya bas dbyung bar bsko ba byin pas so/_/ltung ba dang bcas pa la zhes zer ba la 'chad de mang dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'dul bar byed
[\[317b.7\]]de zhib tu 'og nas 'chad/_mtha' ni sbyin du gzhug pas so/_/las la 'du ba ni [#]sbyin zhes zer ba la 'chad de/_rtswa [#]gding ba dam bca' ba'i 'dul ba dang /_kho bdag dge 'dun gyi mdun du bshags shing 'dul [#]bar byed de zhib tu 'og nas 'chad/_smra ba bdag gis ma nus na dge ba [#]dkar
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]gcag[# ]/thog ma'i don la rtsod pa ni don gang yin gang ma yin pa mkhas pa gcig gis gzu bo byas dkar gcag[# ]/dge slong gis so/_/ltag ma ltar gzu po dang dkar gcog pa ni dge sbyong dang khyim pas mi bya'i dge slong mkhas pas gzu po bya zhing dkar gcag[# ]/
[\[318a.2\]]de mngon par 'dod pa la'o/_/ltag ma'i dge slong gzu bo byed de rtsod [#]pa'i dge slong gnyis gcig [#]dge slong gzu po de la dad pa gcig [#]ma dad pa ma yin gyi gnyis ka dang na gzu po dang dkar gcog [#]pa bya/_de dag go/_/kho gnyis ka gzu bo la dad na gzu bor bya/_gcig yan chad la'o/_/gzu
[\[318a.3\]]po ni kho dag gnyis ka dang na gcig yan chad gcig gis kyang tshig de ste mang na nyi shu tsam gyis byar yang rung ngo /_/bar mas spro bar bya/_ltag ma'i gzu bos kyang de gnyis bsdum par ma nus na dge 'dun gyis dge slong gcig la dad pa dris la gzu bor bskos te de'ang gsol ba dang zhu ba'i
[\[318a.4\]]las kyis [#]bya/_dge 'dun gyis de rtag tu bsgo/_/ltag ma'i gzu bo de dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis dge slong de la dad pa dris te nam 'thab mo zhi ba'i bar du gzu bor bsgo/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba [#]gnyis kyis bsgo/_/'thab mor mi 'jug pa las [#]bsgo/_/ltag ma ltar gzu
[\[318a.5\]]bor gzhug pa'i dge slong de kho bdag nyid 'thab rtsod can nam pha rol 'thab [#]pa la dga' zhing 'chug pa de la ni mi bsgo'i dge 'dun thams cad kyang mdun [#]du dga' ba'i dge slong de la bsgo'o/_/ngo tsha ba dang slob pa 'dod pa de [#]las so/_/ltag ma gzu bo'i dge slong de tshul khrims la gnas shing gzhan gyis
[\[318a.6\]]kyang khrel gyis dogs kho bdag kyang ngo tsha zhes de lta bu las bsgo ste zhib tu 'og nas 'chad/_'dul ba gdon mi za ba dang /_mkhas pa dang /_'das pa'i spyod pa la sbyong ba yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu dang ldan na rtsod pa'i dge slong gi gzu bo dang dkar gcog [#]par dge 'dun gyis
[\[318a.7\]]bsko mi bzlogs [#]pa las so/_/ltag ma'i gzu por nor bo dang gnyen dor byed cing ngo bzlog [#]mi phod pa las ni bsgo'i/_brtan cing mi 'gyur te rdo rje dang 'dra ba las bsgo/_brtan cing brtsams [#]pa mi 'khrug [#]pa las so/_/brtan cing khong rtsod pa'i tshe na'ang sems 'khrugs pa phyis kyang sha 'khon [#]
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]gyis mi 'jigs shing ngo bzlog phod pa las bsgo/_'thab mor mi 'jug pa las bsgo'o [#]zhes bya ba'i mdo man chad kyi mdo de'i nang nas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang ldan pa las gzu por [#]dge 'dun gyis bsgo/_snyoms pa las so/_/snyoms shing 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum
[\[318b.2\]]dang mi ldan pa las bsgo[#]/_bsgo ba las so/_/khong gnyis kyi tshig lan tshig gis khong du chud pa las bsgo/_/phyir bsgo nus pa las so/_/'thab pa'i dge slong de gnyis la na thebs par bsgo nus pa las bsgo/_mdzangs [#]pa las so/_/'thab pa la gnyis la bsgo ba'i tshe tshig 'bru
[\[318b.3\]]thams cad bsam mi dgos par smra [#]nus pas bsgo/_des zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun la dor/_ltag ma ltar gzu bor bsgo ba'i dge slong des 'thab mo pa zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun gyi thad du song ste dgongs shig 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bdag gis ni rdo ma thogs kyi mdzad du gsol
[\[318b.4\]]ces bya ba dge 'dun la phul cig_/de dag gis ma nus pa bsgo/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun la slar phul te lo gcig gnyis kyi bar du dge 'dun gyis 'dul ba'i thabs kyis zhi bar gyis shig des kyang ma nus na yang gzu po la [#]bsgo ste zhib [#]tu 'og nas 'chad/_dge 'dun gyis [#]tshad las
[\[318b.5\]]mi nyung ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gdul [#]bar ma nus na ltag tu bshad pa'i dge slong des [#]kyang yon tan dang mthu che ba bzhi yan chad dge 'dun du langs [#]pa las gzu bor bsgo/_bdag gis te bskos te [#]mi nus na nus pa la'o/_/ltag ma'i dge slong bzhi pos kyang gdul bar [#]ma nus na de bas kyang
[\[318b.6\]]mkhas shing mthu che ba'i dge slong [#]de bzhi la dbul/_bla ma ma byas mi nus na gang nas blangs pa der gzhag_/da gzod [#]kyi bzhi po des kyang gdul bar ma nus na snga ma'i dge slong bzhi po la slar gtod cing [#]/_des kyang ma nus na thog ma'i dge 'dun la rim [#]pas phyir gtad/_dge 'dun
[\[318b.7\]]gyis kyang ma nus na dang po dge slong gzu bor bskos pa de la gtad/_des kyang ma nus na thog ma bsko ba'i [#]dge 'dun la phyir dbul/_phyir 'ongs na rtsa ba'i dge 'dun gyis phyir sbyong bar [#]sngo bar bsko[#]/_thabs ltag ma ltar rim [#]pas btul te ma thul na dge 'dun gyis dge slong gi nang
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]nas gsum bzhi zhig bskos te de dang sbrogs [#]la mtshams tha dad pa'i gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang du gdul bar chol cig_/de [#]gnas brtan dang bcas pa so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gzhan du gzhug_/mtsham [#]tha dad pa'i gtsug lag khang gzhan du bcol
[\[319a.2\]]ba yang gtsug lag khang de na gnas brtan yon tan dang ldan pa dang zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa rtag tu klog pa'i dge 'dun de lta bu'i gtsug lag khang du gtad cing bcol/_gyur pa thog mar bsgos te zla ba gsum gyi [#]dus su sbyin/_gtsug lag khang gzhan du bcol ba'i tshe/_tshul skyel
[\[319a.3\]]ba'i dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun bzhi [#]pa la thog ma nas ji ltar rtsod cing dge slong dang dge 'dun gyi rim par ltag tu smos pa bzhin du mthar chags kyis btul kyang ma thul to zhes gtam rgyus [#]kyis thog mar smos pa la da'ang [#]khyed kyis zla ba gnyis gsum gyi bar du thul la brgya la ma thul na slar yi ge
[\[319a.4\]]spring shig ces bsgo/_des 'di'o/_/pha logs so/_/[#]gtsug lag khang du [#]dge 'dun des kyang ma thul na dang po skyel du 'ongs pa'i dge slong de rnams la slar yi ge spring shig slar phul na de mdo sde 'dzin pa dang [#]'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma lta bu 'dzin pa la'o/_/de ltar yi ge btang nas thog ma
[\[319a.5\]]skyel skyel ba'i dge slong de dag la phyir gtad na slar dge 'dun gang du khrid de ma 'ong bar [#]gtsug lag khang gang na mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma lta bu'i dge slong gang na yod pa der khrid de thog ma'i gtam rgyus [#]nas shod de yang der chos shig[# ]/zla ba drug tu'o/_/ltag ma ltar bcol ba zla
[\[319a.6\]]ba drug gi bar du khyod kyis thul la ma thul na slar yang yi ge thong shig bsgo shig_/des gnas brtan grags pa la'o/_/lhag ma zla ba drug tu btul te ma thul na slar bskyal ba las dge slong bang chen pa de rnams kyis kyang gang na gnas brtan mchog tu grags pa de lta bu la thog ma'i
[\[319a.7\]]gtam rgyus nas shod de bcol cig_/mtha' med par ro/_/ltag ma'i gnas brtan de [#]ni dus 'di tsam gyi bar du gdul zhes bya ba ni ma yin gyi nam gdul [#]ba'i tshad kyis bzung [#]ngo /_/des 'di'i gang yang bdag gir bya ba yang spang gnas brtan grags pa des 'thab [#]mo pa gnyis
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]gdul ba'i tshe 'thab mo pa'i dge slong gis yon nam spyan gzigs phul na gnas brtan des mi blang /_go 'dun dang so shing yan chad do/_/ltag ma ltar spyan gzigs mi blang bar ma zad kyi ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyang mi blang /_stan gcig la 'dug pa dang 'chags gcig tu [#]'chag pa dang
[\[319b.2\]]gtam dang gtam kun kyang ngo /_/gnas brtan des 'thob pa'i dge slong dang gral dang [#]stan gcig pa dang 'chag [#]pa'i sa dang gtam dang gtam rgyud dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'di rnams lta bu mi bya/_bsnyen na 'di skad smra'o/_/ltag ma ltar yon dang spyan gzigs ma bslangs [#]pa dang
[\[319b.3\]]'thab pa'i dge slong na re ci nyes te spyan gzigs kyang mi len gtam yang mi zer zhes smra na gnas brtan gyis 'og nas 'byung ba skad du bya/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod mi rnyed cing ma rnyed la ngan pa rnyed de bzang po ma rnyed do/_/gang khyod rab tu bshad pa chos [#]'dul ba la rab tu 'byung na 'thab mo skye ba dang smyon
[\[319b.4\]]thabs skye ba la spyod dam dgra byed rtsod par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'thab [#]mo ma byed/_smyon thabs ma byed/_dgrar ma byed ma rtsod [#]'thab pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med do/_/gcig rgyal gcig phas pham mo/_/brgyugs pa las gnyis ka mi rgyal te gcig rgyal gcig phas pham mo zhes
[\[319b.5\]]so/_/gnas brtan gyis 'thab mo pa sde gnyis la 'thab cing rtsod pa nyes pa'i tshul du [#]gcig rgyal gcig pham mo zhes zer ba'i mdo yan chad kyi tshig gis bsgo ba la bya/_mang po'i blo ltar bca'o zhes bsgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan no/_/ltag ma ltar gnas brtan [#]gyis lo mang zhig gi bar du
[\[319b.6\]]sbyangs kyang zhal che ma cod [#]na dang po'i dge 'dun la phul/_dge 'dun gyis 'thab mo pa la bsgo ba khyed kyis zhal ce [#]dge 'dun grangs mang brgyal bar gcod do zhes bsgo ste 'og nas 'chad/_chos gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyi tshul gdon mi za bar ma yin no/_/dge 'dun gyis 'thab mo pa la [#]'di
[\[319b.7\]]skad kyang bsgo[#]/_/skabs 'dir tshul khrims dang mi ldan na [#]mi brtsi'i chos kyi gzhung las byung ba bzhin zhal ce gcad do [#]zhes bsgo/_/brgal ba dang rgol ba chud pa'i phyir te der chud pas gdon mi za ba'o/_/'thab mo pa gnyis tshus phar brgal ba dang tshus phar rgol ba dang gnyis la dge 'dun
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]gyis zhal ce [#]gdon mi za bar bcad de gtod par [#]bya'o/_/rgol ba dang phyir rgol bas drag por gzung zhing rab tu zhen la de dag nus pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du dogs na 'di la gnas par bya 'thab mo rgol ba [#]gnyis phas rgol ba dang tshur [#]rgol ba gnyis sems la [#]rab tu bzung ste
[\[320a.2\]]mi gtong [#]bar nan tan byed na dge 'dun gyis zhal ce [#]myur du ma bcad na dge 'dun phal mo che sde gnyis so sor chad pas yun ring na [#]dbyen du 'gyur gyis dogs pa'i phyir zhal ce [#]myur du bcad pa dang bsdum par bya/_sdom pa byed pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/sems la nyes par bsam pa ni [#]yid la
[\[320a.3\]]'gyod pas tshangs kyi lus dang ngag gi nyes byas pa ni mthol dgos so/_/gnas brtan gyis mthar kun du nyon mongs na'o/_/dge 'dun gang mang ba brtsan [#]par zhal ces gcad pa ni [#]thog mar dkar gcag [#]ces bya ba man chad gnas brtan chen pos yun ring du [#]sbyangs zhes bya ba'i bar du nyon
[\[320a.4\]]mongs shing ma btul bar dge 'dun mang ba rgyal lo bar zhal ce mi gcad [#]do/_/rtsa ba'i dge 'dun la'o/_/ltag ma ltar dge 'dun mang ba rgyal lo bar zhal ce gcad [#]pa ni dang po nyid dul [#]bar bsgo ba'i dge 'dun zhes zhal ce gcad [#]do/_/tshul shing 'dzin pas 'di bsam [#]pa gzung bar
[\[320a.5\]]bya/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun mang nyung du grangs gzung ba'i phyir tshul shing rnam pa gnyis bshams pa [#]la dge ba'i tshul shing blangs pa mang na dge ba la phyogs pa rgyal bar bya/_chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing mang du blangs na de rgyal bar bya'o zhes dge 'dun gyis de ltar bshams nas brtsis mgo 'og ma
[\[320a.6\]]ltar bya'o/_/tshul shing 'drim pa bsgo[#]/_dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis kyi las kyis dge 'dun gyi nang nas dge slong las tshul shing 'drim pa [#]cig bsko/_/tshul shing des gzhag pa rnam pa gnyis su'o/_/tshul shing 'drim pa des tshul shing rnam gnyis 'og nas 'byung ba
[\[320a.7\]]bzhin du sta gon byas te gzhag_/[#]mi 'khyor ba dang mi sgung ba [#]dang kha dog bzang po bsung [#]zhim po shin du 'jam pa chos kyi tshul shing ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams mthun pa ni dge ba la phyogs pa ni [#]tshul shing ngo /_/gzhan la [#]bzlog la'o/_/tshul shing sgrub [#]'khyor ba kha dog mi bzad
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]pa bsung [#]mi zhim pa rtsub pa [#]la sogs pa ni mi dge ba la phyogs pa'i tshul shing ngo /_/'du ba'i phyir dge 'dun la zhu/_tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong gis sang tshul shing 'drim pa'i phyir dge 'dun thams cad 'du [#]bar mdzod cig ces zhu ba'i las bya/_thams cad 'du [#]bar mdzod cig_/bdag gis
[\[320b.2\]]tshul shing brim mo zhes so/_/dge mi dge la phyogs pa'i dge 'dun thams cad sang nang par sngar gshegs zhes bdag gis [#]tshul shing brim mo zhes bsgo [#]shig_/de ste de ltar chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lhag par 'grub par shes na dad pa byin yang 'dus par mi brim/_phyi de nang par tshul shing
[\[320b.3\]]'drim pa'i dge ba la phyogs pa'i dge slong ni dad pa'am tshig byin len de 'dus pa ni nyung mi dge ba la phyogs pa'i dge slong ni mang na thabs bya ste/_dge ba'i dge 'dun mang du nam tshogs [#]kyi bar du phyir bshol/_tshul shing 'drim pa'i tshe chos kyi tshul shing lag pa g.yas su blangs pa la gzhan
[\[320b.4\]]g.yon du blangs te brim tshul shing brim pa'i tshe brim pa'i dge slong des chos la lta ba'i tshul shing bzang po ni [#]lag pa g.yas kyis [#]blangs la mi dge ba la phyogs pa'i tshul shing ngan pa lag pa g.yon par gzhag ste dge 'dun la brim/_sbas la sngon du bstan te nye bar [#]zhus te gnas brtan 'di ni chos
[\[320b.5\]]kyi tshul shing ste/_mi sgu mi 'khyog mi sgur [#]kha dog bzang po bsung zhim par [#]shin tu 'jam gyis lang [#]shig ces so/_/tshul shing 'drim pa'i tshe tshul shing ngan pa ni nad pa ni [#]snod kyi nang du bcug ste kha g.yogs la tshul shing bzang po sngar byung [#]la gnas brtan dag la nye bar bstan te ming gis smos
[\[320b.6\]]pa 'di skad du tshul shing gi yon tan bsngags te brim par bya'o/_/gzhan slong na tshig gnyis kyi bar du mi sbyin/_tshul shing brim [#]pa'i tshe gnas brtan de tshul shing ngan pa slong na 'drim [#]pa'i dge slong gis gnas brtan de la [#]khyod lta bu'i gnas brtan sde snod gsum thul cing yon tan dang ldan pa
[\[320b.7\]]tshul shing 'di blangs pa [#]rigs mod ces de skad lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo ste/_de ste'ang ma btub na tshul shing ngan pa sbyin/_ji ltar chos 'byung bar de bzhin du shes te/_brim pa btsums te'am [#]bsten te'o/_/tshul shing 'drim pa'i tshe tshul shing brim [#]pa'i dge slong gis ci nas kyang tshul shing bzang po
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]ni blangs shing tshul shing [#]ngan pa ni mi 'dod pa na thabs ci yod pa [#]sbyar te tshul shing spas [#]na legs sam ma byung legs pa'i thabs kyang 'phral la bltas shing [#]ci nas [#]tshul shing bzang po len par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan pos chos kyi tshul shing blangs slob dpon dang
[\[321a.2\]]mkhan po gcig pa dang 'thams [#]pa dang brtan pa dang bshes dran pa dang yid du 'ong bas kyang na khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing long shig_/gnas brtan la brim pa'i [#]'og tu 'og ma gzhon nu rnams la tshul shing 'drim pa'i tshe mod la ming gis smos pa 'di skad kyi tshig dge slong gzhon nu de'i
[\[321a.3\]]rna drung du tshul shing 'drim pas bshubs te [#]thams cad kyis kyang blangs pa'i [#]rigs so zhes gyis la len du chug shig_/khyod kyis de dag mi dga' bar ma gyur par zhes ngag gis rna drung du bzlas te'o/_/ltag ma ltar khyod kyi mkhan po dang slob dpon mdza' bo la sogs pa thams cad kyis tshul
[\[321a.4\]]shing blangs zin na da [#]khyod kyis ma blangs pa dang mi de rnams dang yang khyod chos kyi [#]bya bar 'ong ste ma legs kyis tshul shing long shig ces rna drung du bshubs [#]la gyis shig_/chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing mi [#]blang /_tshul shing brim [#]pa'i tshe tshul shing len pas kyang tshul shing ngan pa blangs na [#]nyes byas
[\[321a.5\]]te de ni spyi'i khrims so/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma lta bu 'dzin pa la ma dris par ma yin/_tshul shing len pa'i tshe ming gis smos pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i dge slong la ma dris kyi bar du dge slong gzhan gyis kyang tshul shing blang ma [#]brtags par blangs na nyes byas/_bye bar
[\[321a.6\]]'dod pas ma yin/_tshul shing blang ba'i tshe chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngan pa blangs te yid la dge 'dun dbyen bya'o snyam [#]bsams te blangs na nyes byas te de bas na mi blang /_chos ma yin pas rgyal ba ma [#]yin/_tshul shing len pa'i tshe chos ma yin pa la phyogs pa de rgyal bar bya snyam ste yid
[\[321a.7\]]la bsams te blangs na nyes byas/_'dir 'gyur bar shes na ma yin tshul shing len pa'i tshe chos ma yin pa la phyogs pa rgyal bar shes na tshul shing ngan pa mi blang /_mnyam na nyan thos chen po'i phyir tshul shing gzhag_/tshul shing brims te dge mi dge gnyis tshul shing mnyam na nyan thos kyi [#]
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]gnas brtan chen por brim na'o[#]/_/lag ka zhes bya ba'i skal bar bzhag ste dge ba'i phyogs pa'i tshul shing du brtsis te dge ba la phyogs pa la [#]rgyal bar bya/_chos ma yin par 'di lta bu [#]zhi bar gyur na mi skye'o/_/ltag ma ltar gnas brtan gyi tshul shing gis bsnan [#]kyang mi dge ba la [#]phyogs pa'i tshul
[\[321b.2\]]shing mang na de las slar mi skyo bar bzod par gsol te nyes par khas blangs na des ni dum bar 'gyur ro/_/thog mar gzu bor bskos pa man chad 'di yan chad ni mngon par gdul bar 'os pa lta bu las mngon par gdul ba sbyin zhes zer ba la 'chad de rtsod pa bzhi'i dang po'o/_/kha na ma tho ba med
[\[321b.3\]]pa las brgal [#]na gtsang ma sbyin/_dge slong phas pham pa med pa la brgal na ma nyes pa'i yus [#]gtsang ma sbyin te dper dra ba [#]bya ma l+ya bud tra [#]bu mi ka spun gnyis kyis [#]brgal ba lta bu ste zhib tu 'og nas 'chad/_de'i brgal [#]ba bzhi ste dngos po med pa dang /_nan tan gzhan gyi dbang gis
[\[321b.4\]]dang /_mthol ba la ma bltas pa dang /_smyon pas byas/_rnam pa 'di bzhi la so sor thar pa'i nang nas dran pa'i 'dul bas sbyin pa dang /_mi blun pa'i 'dul [#]bas sbyin pa gnyis 'chad pa de'o 'og nas 'byung /_dang po gsum la dran pa'i 'dul ba sbyin/_mdo ltag ma'i ming gis smos pa
[\[321b.5\]]bzhi la dang po gsum la dran pa'i 'dul bas 'dul[#]/_tha ma la mi slen [#]pas so/_/ltag [#]ma smyos pas bya'o zhes bya ba la mi glen pa'i 'dul bas [#]sbyin te sngon smyos te mi dran pa'i tshe nyes byas pa ngan par gyur na mi dran na phyin chad dge ba sdom du gzhug[# ]/ltung ba dang bcas pa las 'khrug pa
[\[321b.6\]]gsum byung ste/_gyur pa med pa dang gyur pa [#]dang /_de la rnam pa gnyis te/_phyogs pa dang dge 'dun thams cad pa'o/_/phyogs pa dang pha rol gyi phyogs 'chos pas so/_/thog [#]ma la phyir 'chos pa [#]khas len par byed pas so/_/gnyis la ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bas so/_/gsum pa
[\[321b.7\]]la rtswa bting [#]bas so/_/'dir mang po'i phyir dge 'dun la gshegs pa ma yin pa gcig gis bcos so/_/ltag ma ltar sems 'dul zhing zhi zin nas lhag ma'i nyes pa zhig yin na lhag pa'i chos bzhin du mthol/_spang ba'i ltung ba nyes pa byung na de'i cho ga bzhin mthol/_ltung ba dang nyes pa
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]dang so sor mthol ba zhig nyes par gyur na phyig gshud [#]du yod pa'i ming nas phyung la ming 'dis 'di lta bu zhig nyes so zhes dge slong gcig gis thams cad kyi [#]nyes pa dang ming nas phyung la [#]mthol na thams cad tshangs par 'gyur ro/_/du ma lhan cig na yang ngo /_/ltag ma
[\[322a.2\]]ltar dge slong gcig gis spyir mthol kyang rung so sor [#]thams cad kyi ming dang ltung ba'i ming dang [#]zhib tu bshad de/_dge slong gcig gis mthol bas gtsang mar gyur pa ni rtswa bting [#]bas 'dul ba'i skabs 'di 'dra bas mthol du rung ngo /_/gang gis 'di ltar brjod de shes pa snang bas so/_/ltag
[\[322a.3\]]ma ltar rtswa bting [#]ba'i nyes pa mthol ba nyes pa khas blangs pa'i phyogs kyi dge 'dun tsog tsog por 'dug la mnyes [#]pa'i dge 'dun rnams bde bar 'dug pa'i mdun du [#]nyes pa'i nang gi [#]dge slong gis thams cad kyi nyes pa lung ma nos te gtsang ma'i dge slong la mthol ba'i tshe/_thog ma bdag
[\[322a.4\]]nyid kyi [#]ltung ba sde bzhi ci nyes pa mthol la de'i 'og tu dge 'dun phal gyi ci dang ci nyes pa mthol bar dge slong de smra'o/_/phyogs gzhan dang mnyam du na'o/_/ltag ma ltar mthol ba chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis ka pha zad tshu zad du gral mnyam par 'dug la/_ltag ma ltar las bya ba ni
[\[322a.5\]]las brgya rtsa gcig las gang yin pa des bya'o[#]/_/dam ma bcas pa dang brdzun du na mthol bar mi skye'o[#]/_/ltung ba sde bzhi'i spyi'i mthol ba ste gang yang rung mthol ba'i tshe/_ltung ba'i ming dang dngos po gang nyes pa 'dis nyes so zhes mthol/_gang nyes byas pa thams cad mi dran na kho bo
[\[322a.6\]]nongs pa mchis so zhes spyir mi dril bar phas pham pa'i yan lag las ci nyes pa dang nyes byas yan chad yan lag dang yan mdzer ci mchis pa mthol lo zhes brjod do/_/brgal ba bcas par na yang [#]brtags pa'o/_/ltung ba sde lnga las gang yang rung dge slong gis dge slong gcig yan chad dge
[\[322a.7\]]'dun thams cad la'ang nyes na rgol du gnang ngo /_/de bzhin du de ltar brgal ba yang ngo /_/ltag ma'i tshig bzlog ste gang zag gcig la dge slong gcig yan chad dge 'dun gyis brgal na'ang nyes med de rung ngo /_/'dir grangs kyi bye brag ni ma chad do/_/mdo [#]ltag ma gnyis nyes pa la phan
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]tshun du rgol ba'i dge slong grangs su chad pa med de nyes na dus brgal kyang rung ngo /_/lus dang ngag bsdams pa dang /_sde snod shes pa dang phyin ci log tu mi ston pa dang /_chos kyis 'dul ba dang /_de dag gis bzlog pa dge 'dun gyi [#]dbus su bsam [#]pa dang gsum du ldan na rgol ba la bkur
[\[322b.2\]]sti bya/_dge slong gcig gis ltung ba sde [#]lnga la bdag sdol [#]na skabs dbyer gsol zhes bya ste/_pha rol gyis skabs phye na ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang ldan pa'i dge slong gis brgal na de'i tshig brtsan [#]par bya'o/_/tshul khrims log pa dang phyin ci log tu smra na mthar bya/_phas pham pa [#]
[\[322b.3\]]byung ba dang chos log pa bltas te yang dag pa'i chos ni ma yin zhing ngan gyi 'jig rten gyi chos rku ba dang phyogs la sogs pa la dga' skyid do zhes zer ba gnyis shig ltung ba sde lnga las skabs phye shig brgal lo zhes zer na de la skabs mi dbye bar tshig gis spyos la bskrad de btang ngo /_/de ni bdag
[\[322b.4\]]cag dang sde mi mthun pa'i phyir ro/_/bsgo ba ma chud cing sde snod 'dzin pa 'di lta bu'i tshul ma yin no/_/ltag ma ltar sde snod gsum tshig shes te don ma chung na lus dang ngag gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang phyin ci log tu mi ston kyang ste pha log la brgal kyang dge slong de'i tshig mi brtsan no/_/
[\[322b.5\]]bsams [#]pa rigs pa'i phyir de la bsgo[#]/_/ltag ma sde snod gsum tshig shes te [#]don mi shes shing ltag ma lus dang ngag gi khrims dang ldan zhing phyin ci log tu mi ston pa de lta bu zhig rgol du 'ongs na skabs kyang mi dbye/_bskrad de mi btang bar tshig gzhan gyis brjod de lan mi sbyin par gzhag go/_/
[\[322b.6\]]gnas dang rtag tu lus dang ngag phyin ci log ma yin pa dang /_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa la bya/_mi gnas pa'o/_/ltag ma bzhin mi gnas pa ste gnas pa dang mi [#]gnas pa nyid ni 'og nas gnyer gsod do/_/gnas ni dus dang yul dang spyod lam dang nan tan no/_/rgol ba'i dge
[\[322b.7\]]slong ltag [#]ma'i yon tan dang ldan pas dge slong nyes pa la brgal nas bden nam brdzun pa dge slong rgol ba dkar gcag [#]pa'i phyir dge 'dun gyis dge slong gnyis snga phyir btang ste ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ltar don rtags [#]dang mthun na rgol ba de'i tshig brtsan [#]par bya'o/_/rgol ba pa mi skye ba ni
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]gnas dag gud du bskyod pa dang rtog pa dang rtogs [#]pa byung ba'o/_/mi gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dus dang yul dang spyod lam dang nan tan bzhi ltar dge 'dun gyis lkog tu lan cig gam gnyis dris te [#]dge slong yon tan dang ldan pas brgal ba'i tshig dang gal te yul dang dus la
[\[323a.2\]]sogs pa mi mthun par gyur na yon tan ldan pas brgal kyang de'i tshig mi brtsan [#]no/_/zhe sdang gi phyir brgal na ni ltag ma kun dang ldan kyang rgol du mi gnang ngo /_/khas blangs rgol bzad pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge slong gis nyes so zhes khas blangs na ci nyes pa'i dngos po
[\[323a.3\]]mthol na tshangs par 'gyur ro/_/bden pa mthong ba dang yon tan gyis rab tu mchog ste gzhan smra na brtag par byas te khyim mi na yang ngo /_/dge slong la khyim pa gcig dang /_dge slong gcig dang gnyis kyis brgal te khyim pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'am lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
[\[323a.4\]]pa zhig yin/_dge slong ni tha mal pa zhig yin na khyim pa des brgal ba'i tshig brtsan [#]par bya'o/_/dge slong gnyis shig rgol na gang yon tan dang ldan pa dang gang 'bras bu thob pa brtsan [#]par bya'o/_/gzhan dang lhan cig tu gtug_/dge slong gcig gis gcig la brgal na mi [#]des nyes
[\[323a.5\]]pa'i gan na gzhan su yod ces zer na dge 'dun gyis gan na 'dug pa'i mi de la lkog tu pho nya gcig gis dres te rgol ba gnyis mthun na de bzhin du gcad [#]do/_/the tshom byung na shes pa ma yin no/_/rgun chu 'thungs pa [#]la gcig gis kun chang 'thungs so zhes brgal na dngos po rgun chu yin pas
[\[323a.6\]]brgal ba mi brtsan [#]gyis 'thungs pa'i tshig brtsan [#]no/_/khas blangs pa bzhin du 'di gdon mi za bar ro/_/dge slong zhig nyes par gyur te nyes par bdag gis shes nas mthol nas tshangs so[#]/_/ma rtogs pa ni ma chud pa'o/_/dge slong zhig gis ltung ba sde lnga las gang rung ba nyes pa gcig
[\[323a.7\]]byas te mthol cig ces bsgo na ngas ma byas zhes zer zhing mthol du mi btub pa dang gcig tu nyes pa byas sam zhes dris na byas zhes ni khas blangs la gang byas zhes dris na ma shes zhes [#]zer na spang bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun la khas blangs nas mi shes na btsal ba bsgo zhing bzung /_dge slong zhig gis
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]nyes par ni dran te khas blangs/_dngos po gang byas pa mi dran na dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las kyis nam dran gyi bar du sems su gzhug[# ]/de'i rang bzhin tshol ba de la phan pas na de'i rang bzhin tshol ba'o/_/mdo gong ma ltar gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis dran par sems
[\[323b.2\]]su bcug la de'i rang bzhin tshol zhes bya ba ni ltag ma mi dran/_nam dran gyi bar du tshol du gzhug pa la bya'o/_/smad pa'i las kyi gzugs la [#]'di las glags [#]ces bya'o/_/ltag ma ltar nyes pa byas pa dran gyi bar du [#]'dul ba 'dzin pa kha cig na re gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las kyis nam [#]dran gyi bar du
[\[323b.3\]]chad pas bcad de spangs pa [#]bdun dang 'di dang brgyad du bya'o zhes bshad do/_/de mdo sde dang 'gal bas mi bzang ba'i phyir ro/_/lhag ma'i mkhan po [#]tshig ni mi bzang ngo /_/ji ltar mi bzang zhe na mdo'i mdo las 'byung ba spang ba rnam pa bdun las med pas na bskrad kyang mi bskrad[#]/_chad pas kyang mi
[\[323b.4\]]bcad do zhes sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i mdo las 'byung bas na 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i tshig mi bzang ngo /_/zhi ba bas na dgar ba'o zhes [#]mi 'dod do/_/zhi ba zhes bya ba rtag tu rang bzhin tshol ba [#]la 'chad de bdun shin tu zhi ba'i nang du bgrang gi spang ba bdun gyi nang du 'di dang brgyad du mi brtsi'o/_/'di spang
[\[323b.5\]]par brtsis na bdun shin tu zhib pa drug tu 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i tshig mi brtsan [#]gyi mdo'i gzhung brtsan no/_/spyo ba la sogs pa yang 'di lta ste ma bcas pas so/_/spyo ba zhes bya ba ni spang ba rnam bdun te/_spang ba rnam bdun las brgyad med kyis brgyad du yang mi bya/_drug tu yang mi
[\[323b.6\]]dbri bar bdun so na gzhag go/_/'di shes bzhin du mi shes so zhes par [#]chud na ma mthong ba grags pa skyes [#]par 'gyur ro/_/zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi bsgrims [#]par mi bya/_rtag tu rtsod pa rnam bzhi la zhi ba rnam bdun gyis tshul bzhin du zhi bar ma byas na dge 'dun thams cad dbyen gyi sbom por 'gyur
[\[323b.7\]]ro/_/'thab mo'i dngos po'o/_/'di yan chad 'thab mo'i dngos po'o//_//'di man chad 'thab mo'i dngos po dris pa la 'chad/_byas pa'i 'thab mo ni zhi ba thams cad la 'jug go/_/spang ba spang ba rnam bzhi'i mjug [#]las la 'du ba mi sbyin zhes bya ba de la shin tu zhi bar bdun kas 'dul
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]lo/_/bskang bar mi rigs pa dge 'dun gyis spyod pa la 'khor ba ma yin no/_/rtag tu las brgya rtsa gcig nang du mi chud pa las phas pham pa byung ba [#]dang bskrad pa dang dge sbyong khyim pa la sogs pa mi chud pa bzhin du dge 'dun 'thab [#]pa'i gzu bo'ang de rnams kyis kyang mi
[\[324a.2\]]rung ngo /_/rab tu rtogs pas gzhan gyi [#]la gtogs so/_/dge sbyong [#]ma dang dge slob ma zhig 'thab mo byung na dge slong mas gdul lo/_/dge sbyong pha 'thab mo byung ba ni dge slong gis zhi bar bya'o/_/rigs pa ni skyes pas [#]bud med kyi la'o/_/dge slong ma nang rtsod par gyur pa la dge slong gis zhi
[\[324a.3\]]bar byas pa ni nyes pa [#]med do/_/dge slong 'khrugs [#]pa la dge slong mas zhi bar byed du mi dbang ngo /_/zhi ba [#]ni 'tsho ba'am rab tu rdzogs pa las 'phos na'o/_/dge slong sde gnyis su rtsod pa kun zhi bar gyur tam[#]/_khyim par babs na kun zhi bar gyur to/_/phyogs gzhan du spang ba rnyed [#]pa'o/_/
[\[324a.4\]]dge slong gis gzhan la brgal ba las chos ma yin pa la phyogs te song na des kyang zhi bar 'gyur/_phas pham pa'am khyim pa zhig tu babs na'ang zhi bar gyur to/_/gzhan du song ba dang nang yun [#]ring pos btab na yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar rgol ba'i dge slong yul las ring po [#]zhig du song na'ang
[\[324a.5\]]'thab [#]mo zhi bar 'gyur/_nad yun ring [#]po zhig gis [#]btab na'ang zhi bar 'gyur/_rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba las so/_/dge slong gnyis shig rtsod cing 'dug 'dug pa las rtsod pa'i 'phro las shi'am khyem par babs te lam ring por babs [#]na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'thab mo'i [#]dngos po ste
[\[324a.6\]]dris pa'i 'o/_/'thab mo'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//'di man chad mal stan gyi dngos po la 'chad de/_so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i mchog las rab tu byung bas phyag bya/_dge slong rnam lnga dang dge bsnyen [#]pha dang dge bsnyen [#]ma dang dus khrims pa dang brgyad rim pa bzhin du gong ma
[\[324a.7\]]la phyag bya/_mnyam na rgan pa la bya'o[#]/_/dge slong sde lnga nang gang rgan pa la phyag bya/_mtshan gzhan [#]la ma yin/_dge slong gis dge slong ma la phyag mi bya/_dge sbyong [#]gis kyang mi bya/_skyes pa mi dma' ba la bud med kyis [#]phyag bya/_dge slong khrims rdzogs pa la dge slong ma
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]dgra bcom zhing lo brgya lon kyang phyag bya/_sa gzhan la gnas pa dang zhig pa dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_chos ma yin pa'i skyabs so sor gnas pa dang /_mtshams med pa byas pa dang /_nyal ba dang ting nge 'dzin ma [#]rnyed pa dang /_brel pa dang /_gzhan la sems pa dang /_rgyab kyis
[\[324b.2\]]phyogs pa dang /_gzhan gyi grong na 'dug pa dang /_zan la 'dug pa ma gtogs so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la [#]dge slong pha dang dge slong mas phyag mi bya/_dge slong gis kyang 'di rnams khrims nyams pa la phyag mi bya/_khyim pas rab tu byung ba la'o/_/dge slong sde lnga la khyim
[\[324b.3\]]pas phyag bya/_sangs rgyas la thams cad kyis so/_/sangs rgyas la byang chub sems pa [#]man chad lha ma srin dang sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya/_gtsug lag khang bya/_gang zag dang dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang rab tu [#]brtsigs kyang nyes med de thabs 'og nas 'chad/_ngos
[\[324b.4\]]gcig gi [#]dbus su dri gtsang khang bya/_gtsug lag khang gru bzhir byas pa'i dbus kyi ngos la dris [#]gtsang khang bya/_de dang mngon sum du sgo phubs so/_/gtsug lag khang gar lta bar phyi sgo der gdod do/_/gru bzhir na dge_/gtsug lag khang gru bzhir brtsigs na dge bas rigs so/_/
[\[324b.5\]]ngos gsum pa yang ngo /_/rkun po med cing mi 'jigs pa'i gnas su gtsug lag [#]khang ngos gsum du brtsigs la ngos gcig ma brtsigs kyang rung blang /_gtsug lag khang lhag ma gnyis yon du phul na blang /_gtsug lag khang du gnas/_dgon par gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyis
[\[324b.6\]]kyang bde bar bsngags na de na gnas pa la the tshom za ba yod de gnas kyang nyes med do/_/gzhan dge 'dun gyi dngos po la dge 'dun gyi phyir ram gang zag dge slong gi phyir na dngos po gnas par bya/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi 'khor na'ang gtsug lag khang brtsig [#]pa'i sa yangs pa
[\[324b.7\]]zhig yod de dge slong zhig dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig [#]ces zer kyang rung gang zag bdag 'dug na ci gnang zhes gsol na sbyin no/_/des te [#]sbyin bdag yod na des gnang na'o/_/ltag ma ltar sa sbyin pa yon bdag yod na yon bdag la dris te sbyin/_yon bdag med na dge 'dun gyis
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]sbyin/_grong khyer gyi nang ngam phyi rol du ngal bso ba'i gnas brtags pa'o/_/grong gi 'dab dang lam gyi mdo dang gtsug lag khang gi 'dab tu dge slong gis mi phal mo che yan man du 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir bsil khang brtsigs kyang nyes med do/_/bdag gi khron pa 'dod chags kyi
[\[325a.2\]]rkyen spang ba'i phyir bsgribs pa'i rtsig [#]pa bya/_gtsug lag khang gi [#]'dab na khron [#]pa yod de dge slong dang khyim [#]pa gnyis ka chu der chu na 'dod chags spang bar bya ba'i phyir khron pa skyed du so phag gis brtsigs te dge slong dang khyim [#]pa chu chu cha gcig la gcig mi mthong bar bya/_bud med chu slong [#]na snyim
[\[325a.3\]]pa bkang zhing blangs te de'i rgyun chad med [#]par ma yin/_bud med chu slong na bum pas kha lugs su mi blud par snyim pa bkang ste 'thung du gzhug go/_/thog ma dge slong bzang po zhig gis [#]bud med la chu kha lugs su [#]blud de bud med lto chus gang ste shi ba las bcas/_dbyar gyi nang gi rnyed pa'i tshe
[\[325a.4\]]'ongs pa la rigs gtsug lag khang gcig na rkyen grong dang zhing mang zhig yod de [#]dge slong su 'ongs pa gtsug lag khang de'i rkyen gyi shas dbang ba las dge 'dun thams cad dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe/_dge slong zhig gud nas 'ongs te zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tshun chad slebs na dbyar tshul gyi
[\[325a.5\]]shas kyang dbang ngo /_/rnyed pa [#]ma spyad pa [#]las su ma yin/_gtsug lag khang na gsol chang la sogs pa 'god pa la shas mi 'dod [#]pa'i dge slong zhig yod na rab tu dge ba yin gyi [#]gang zag bcu gnyis kyis las su'ang mi bsko/_/thog ma mi rnyed pa la zas sbyin/_dge slong zhig gud nas 'ongs te
[\[325a.6\]]tshul gyi tshe zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tshun chad ma slebs na tshul gyi yon skal ni sbyin zas ni mi sbyin gzhan thob la mi 'jug_/ltag ma ltar gud nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis tshul du zhugs pa la bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ma slebs [#]na yon dbang ngo zhes 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis mi mnod [#]do/_/nyes med pa ni de'i phyir ma
[\[325a.7\]]song bar gtsug lag khang gzhan du gdugs tshod bab ste zos na'o/_/gtsug lag khang gcig tu 'gro ba'i tshe khyim zan za bas [#]'gro'o zhes bsams te song na nyes byas/_las kyi phyir song song ba las 'phral la g.yar drangs te song ba ni nyes med/_mu ge'i tshe bdag gis ma blangs [#]par na yang
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]ngo /_/mu ge byung ba'i tshe bdag gi zan nar ma ngan gyi gzhan gyi mchod ston byed na bdag gis ma blangs par mchod ston la song ba ni nyes med do/_/dge slong gi tshod las lhag ma blangs na yang ngo /_/mu ge'i [#]mgron du bos na phyin chad zas mi rnyed pa'i phyir bdag phul gang zhig rtag par za ba yin na de'i
[\[325b.2\]]tshe na ni phul bzhi lnga ci chud du zos kyang nyes med do/_/gtsug lag khang yal bar mi bya/_dge slong pho smos kyis gtsug lag khang zhig ral zhig byung na bcos par bya/_sbyin bdag las [#]bcos pa'i phyir spro bar bya/_ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang bcos pa'i rgyu yon bdag dad pa la chos bshad de
[\[325b.3\]]bslang [#]/_ma grub na dge 'dun gyis [#]las ci nus su bsko/_/yon bdag la bslangs te ma rnyed na dge 'dun gyi dkor las [#]phyung ste bcos/_bdag gis bcos na yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang bcos pa lha bran dang rtse rgod med na dge slong nyid kyis bcos/_rnyed pa len pas gtsug lag khang
[\[325b.4\]]byug_/tshul nas byung ste yon 'god pa la sogs pa 'dod che chung ste ma blangs pa ni ma bcos kyang nyes med de bas yon shas blangs pa rnams kyis ni gtsug lag khang ral na bcos/_dad pa'i rnyed [#]pa gtsug lag khang gir ma yin/_gtsug lag khang rkyen ni ma yin gyi yon bdag dad pa zhig
[\[325b.5\]]gis bdag la nor rdzas byin pa las dge slong kha cig na re khyod kyang yon blangs pa yin gyi [#]chos shig ces zer na mi des ni dge 'dun nang na [#]yon blangs pa ma [#]yin pas ma bcos kyang nyes med do/_/sgo bcad [#]de gtsug lag khang nas 'gro/_/dge slong yan mang du 'gro na gnas khang gi sgo lcags bcug
[\[325b.6\]]la dam gzhag [#]byas te 'gro/_/gnas khang nyid kyi sgo lcags med na phyi sgo lcags gzhug_/srung [#]ma bzhag ste'o/_/dge slong thams cad mchod ston la spyan drangs pa lta bur 'dod na dge slong gcig srung [#]mar gzhag_/med na zan sbyin/_srung [#]ma'i dge slong dge 'dun gyis zas gzhag[# ]/_
[\[325b.7\]]gtsug lag khang na zas kyi rgyu med na bus pa gcig sngar khrid de zan ma nos la bskur/_bskur [#]ba'i dbang med dam bar ma chad par mi dbye/_yul na chom po ba mang zhing khyim rtag par bcom [#]par gyur na de'i tshe/_mtshan mo sgo phye zhes zer zhing 'ong [#]yang ma brtags [#]par sgo mi dbye'o/_/steng
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]du 'dzegs te lta'am khyed rims kyis ma btang ngam zhes pa'i ming gis smrar gzhug go zhes 'di ni [#]thabs so/_/mtshan mo dge slong gi skad du zer zhing sgo phye zhes zer na khang pa steng du 'dzegs te/_khyed su yin gang nas 'ongs zhes smras te nga dge slong yin no zhes zer na khyod
[\[326a.2\]]rims nad ches bya ba ni sngon rkun po zhig gis dge slong nan la bor nas sgo 'byed du bcug pa las bcas te de phyin chad dge slong [#]'og khrims bcas pa phyin chad rkun po zhig gis nan la bor te sgo 'byed du bcug [#]na nga rims na'o zhes man ngag gi tshig bya/_gnas dang ming dang pha dang ma la sogs pa mngon
[\[326a.3\]]par shes te'o/_/khyim pa [#]zhig sgo phye zhes 'bod du 'ongs na rkun po yin nam ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir yul dang ming dang pha ma la sogs pa'i dan [#]rtags dris te thog tu phebs na sgo dbye/_mngon par ma shes te 'jigs na mi dbye/_ltag ma skad du mngon rtags dris te rtags la ma bab
[\[326a.4\]]'jigs na sgo mi dbye/_dgon pa pas [#]khyi bcang dgon pa pas 'jigs pa'i phyir khyi bcang yang [#]nyes med/_des nang par langs nas gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gyi bar blta/_dgon pa la [#]gnas pa'i dge slong gis nang par langs nas gtsug lag khang dag [#]gi bar na khyi'i gcin rtug
[\[326a.5\]]yod dam med blta de ste bshang ba byas na dor/_ltag ma ltar bltas te bshang gci byas na dor/_gcis [#]na drud de sder mos drud na bsnyams [#]khyis gcis na sas drud de bsnyams[#]/_de dag gi [#]gnas su dkyil 'khor bya/_ltag ma ltar khyis gcis pa dang bshang ba [#]gnyis la ba lang gi rnyi bas dkyil
[\[326a.6\]]'khor bya/_lhung bzed kyi lhag ma 'di sbyin/_dge slong zas zos pa'i lhag ma khyi la sbyin/_mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang gi mtshams kyi phyi rol du'o/_/ltag ma ltar khyi la zas sbyin pa ni gtsug lag khang gi mtshams kyi phyi rol tu sbyin/_spyod lam ci 'dod par bstan pa sbyin/_slob
[\[326a.7\]]mas mkhan po la kha ton lta bu nos nas slar 'bul zhing nod pa ni spyod lam bzhi gang spyod kyang rung ste mnod du rung ngo /_/khams mnyam pa'am zhes 'dri zhing thog mar phyag 'tshal te gsar bus blangs pa'i [#]phyir spyod lam bya/_ltag ma ltar mkhan po la kha ton 'bul zhing nod pa'i slob mas phyag
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]byas la bsnyun gsol nas gus pa'i tshul du bsti stang byas te na zhes zer na ci na [#]ba'i cho ga bya/_min na [#]kha ton 'bul zhing mnod/_thal mo sbyar te'o/_/kha ton nod pa'i tshe thal mo sbyar te gus pa'i tshul du mnod[#]/_/lus dang sems btud de'o/_/kha ton nod cing 'bul ba'i tshe lus btud de gus
[\[326b.2\]]par mnod/_drang pos so/_/kha ton nod pa'i tshe mdun nas drang por mnod/_'chag na gom bor [#]te bcag cing ngo /_/mkhan po 'chag na 'gro bzhin kha ton nod cing dbul lo/_/langs na 'grengs te'o[#]/_/mkhan po 'grengs te 'dug na bdag kyang 'grengs te mnod/_'dug gam 'phres
[\[326b.3\]]na 'dug ste'o/_/mkhan po 'dug gam 'phres na bdag gis kyang 'dug ste mnod cing dbul/_stan dma' ba las so/_/mkhan po las kha ton nod pa'i tshe bdag stan dma' ba la 'dug ste mnod/_gzhon nu na smras so/_/slob ma gzhon nu zhig thug [#]thub tu stan la 'dug tu mi dbang gi 'dug
[\[326b.4\]]shig ces bsgo na 'dug_/ma smras na tsog tsog por ro/_/mkhan pos stan la 'dug shig par ma bsgo na sa [#]la tsog tsog por [#]'dug go/_/mang du len na dris te'o/_/slob ma kha ton grangs mang mo zhig nod de ring du tsog tsog por 'dug mi nus na mkhan po la stan la 'dug go zhes [#]dris te 'dug_/thos
[\[326b.5\]]pa'i spyod yul spangs te kha ton no/_/kha ton slob pa mkhan pos mi [#]thos pa'i lam tsam na 'dug ste bslab/_mig lam du gnas te'o/_/kha ton slob pa mkhan po rna ba mi na ba tsam du mig lam du snang bar byas te [#]'dug_/cha mnos nas phyogs cig [#]tu song ste bsgrub/_mkhan po las cha ma nod de [#]
[\[326b.6\]]lang long med pa'i sar 'dug ste bsam gtan bya/_rab tu bton rab tu mtshan mar byas te the tshom med par byas te cha mnos pas [#]yang ngo /_/kha don ni slob pa thags thogs med par shes par bya ba dang le'u gang las gar thug pa yid la mtshan mar bzung [#]ba dang phyis [#]kyang mi brjed [#]par byas la phyi
[\[326b.7\]]ma'ang kha ton mnod/_gtsug lag khang dang zas skom [#]dang thug pa dang bca' ba [#]dang 'bras bu 'god pa bsko[#]/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams 'god pa'i dge slong gsol ba dang zhu ba gnyis kyi las kyis bsko dam pa ma yin pa tsam yang ngo /_/kha zas la sogs pa mi za [#]ba zhig 'god na'ang ltag ma ltar [#]
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]byas te dge slong bsko lhag ma nyi ma gzhan la brim zhes so/_/yon bdag gis dge 'dun la mchod ston byas te kha zas lhag ma zhig 'bul na yang bza' ba'i phyir sdud pa'i dge slong gcig bsko/_snod sbed pa yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi snod spyad brnyar sbyin pa dang sdud pa'i dge slong
[\[327a.2\]]gcig bsko/_dbyar gyi ras chen gyi [#]yang ngo /_/dge 'dun spyir dbyar gyi ras chen mang zhig yod na lo phyi ma la dgos pa'i phyir dge slong gcig las su bsko/_drub pa'i yang ngo /_/drub pa gding ba pa'i srung [#]ma gcig bsko/_gos kyi yang ngo /_/yon bdag dang bas dge 'dun yon mang zhig
[\[327a.3\]]phul na srung [#]ma gcig bsko/_'gyed pa'i yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi gos [#]'gyed pa'i dge slong gcig bsko/_/rdzas srung ba'i [#]mngag gzhug pa yang ngo /_/mngag gzhug pa la sogs pa bsko ba'i sar bu rgan po gcig dang gtsug lag khang skyong [#]gcig bsko/_snod srung [#]ba yang ngo /_/dge
[\[327a.4\]]'dun gyi snod srung ba'i [#]dge slong gcig bsko/_/'di'i las ni 'drim [#]zhing zos na sbed pa'o/_/lhag ma'i snod srung ba'i dge slong gis khar gzhong g.yog sa [#]phog la zas zos zin nas bkrus [#]te slar drub/_chu srung yang ngo /_/chu 'chags pa'i spyad dang grang [#]ba dang dro ba la sogs pa'i zhal ta
[\[327a.5\]]ba gcig bsko/_mdzes pa srung [#]ba yang ngo /_/mdzes pa bsrung [#]ba'i dge slong gcig bskos te 'og nas 'chad/_des brtag cing thog mar se gol gyi sgra bya ba dang rab tu byung ba dbyibs ngan pa dang ston [#]pa la dbyibs su bsko ba'o/_/mdzes pa srung ba yang [#]'di yin te/_dge slong gsar bu dang
[\[327a.6\]]dge sbyong la sogs pa spyod lam bzhi ngan cing gos kyi tshags ma legs pa la 'di ltar legs par gyis shig ces bsgo[#]/_'di lta ste/_zas kyi tshe sgra bskyungs pa [#]dang rab tu bsdam pa dang rab tu g.yogs pa dang sgra bskyungs te mchod rten la phyag bya ba dang ci ltar rgan rims su bya'o/_/mdzes pa srung
[\[327a.7\]]bas [#]zas za ba'i tshe sgra bskyungs shig par bsgo ba dang /_lus mgo bsgyur ba dang /_lag brkyang [#]mi bya ba dang sham thabs pus mo mi 'da' ba dang gos rnyil bar mi bsgo ba dang kha zas za ba'i tshe yang byin dang ma byin 'on cig ces mi bya ba dang dus gsum du mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe sgra bskyungs la gral rims
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]bzhin du bsgo/_khyams srung pa yang ngo /_/khyams srung ba'i dge slong gcig bsko [#]ste 'og nas 'chad/_des thog mar zas la smyag [#]ma blangs te bya rog dang bye'u dang phug [#]ron la sogs pa za ba'i tshe bskrad lhag ma'i khyams srung [#]zhes bya ba dge 'dun las sngar zan zos la dge 'dun bshos gsol ba'i
[\[327b.2\]]tshe bya la sogs pa gan du mi 'ong par [#]bskrad cing bsrung /_mal stan srung [#]ba yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi mal stan bgo ba bsrung ba dang /_zla [#]ba phyed phyed tsam zhing res kyis bsgo [#]zhing bsrung ba'i dge slong gcig bsko/_/byi bo'i mal stan srung [#]ba'o/_/dge slong lam du zhugs na shing [#]drung lta bur
[\[327b.3\]]gnas brtan dang gsar bu [#]rgan po gzhag par bskos pa'i dge slong gcig bsko/_brtags pa'i mchod [#]rten du 'jig rten 'jug pa srung pa yang ngo /_/dge slong 'dus te nya dang sha la sogs pa bza' ba'i tshe khyim [#]pas mthong na kha na ma tho ba zer ba'i phyir dge slong gcig [#]sgo srung du gzhug[# ]/mal
[\[327b.4\]]stan gyi dngos po'o/_/'di yan chad mal stan [#]gyi dngos po la 'chad//_//'di man chad mal stan gyi dngos po phran tshegs pa 'chad/_mun par phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas su phyag dang bcas pa'i tshig dbyung /_mtshan mo dge 'dun gyi gan du phyin na mun par phyag byas na nyes byas su 'gyur
[\[327b.5\]]ba'i thal mo sbyar te btud la phyag 'tshal zhes tshig brjod/_gzhan du song ste mtshams su phyin na phyag mi bya/_dge slong zhig bdag gi [#]gtsug lag khang nas gud du song ste slar gnas su 'ongs na bdag pas rgan pa thams cad la phyag byas pa bzhin pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag gis so/_/ltag ma ltar dge
[\[327b.6\]]slong mang ste re re nas phyag 'tshal mi nus na gus [#]pa'i tshul du spyir phyag bya/_'khon byung ba la phyag mi bya/_bdag dang 'khon yod pa'i dge slong la phyag mi bya/_phyag byas na a rog [#]gya mi bya bar mi bya/_bdag dang gzhon pa dang khyim pa phyag 'tshal na a rog [#]gya bya/_phyag bya ba 'das pa la'ang
[\[327b.7\]]phyag mi bya bar mi bya/_shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten nam bdag gi mkhan po tshe 'das pa la'ang ming nas brjod de phyag bya/_'bags [#]pa la phyag mi bya ste 'og nas 'chad/_'bags pas ma yin no/_/gcig 'bags pa la gcig ma 'bags
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]pas phyag mi bya/_'di yis bdag gis mi bya/_bdag pas na rgan pa 'bags pa la gzhon nu ma 'bags pas phyag mi bya ste/_byas kyang rgan pos dga' bar mi bsam 'bags pa las kyang ngo /_/gnas brtan lta bu ma 'bags pa zhig gis phyag 'tshal na'ang dga' bar
[\[328a.2\]]mi bsam 'bags pa rnam [#]gnyis te za ba'i ni so shing [#]yan chad do/_/'bags pa zhes bya ba ni rnam gnyis te bdag thog mar zas zos nas so shing zos kyi bar du bdag kyang phar phyag mi bya/_phas kyang phyag 'tshal du mi gzhug_/mi gtsang ba [#]ni de'i sa 'chos pa yan chad do/_/'bags pa
[\[328a.3\]]gcig ni bshang gci che chung rnams [#]gnyis kyi bkru bshal ma byas kyi bar du phar kyang phyag mi bya/_tshur kyang phyag 'tshal du mi gzhug_/'bags pa dang 'dra ba ni 'dir sgren mo dang gos gcig pa'o/_/'bags pa dang 'dra ba ni khyed rengs lta bur 'dug pa la phar kyang phyag mi 'tshal/_de lta bu tshur
[\[328a.4\]]kyang phyag 'tshal du mi gzhug_/phyag ni rnam gnyis te 'khor lngas dang /_byin pa mnan pa dang yang ngo /_/phyag la rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni lus [#]sa la gtugs phyag 'tshal ba gcig ni pha rol gyi rkang pa nas bzung ste [#]phyag bya ba ste/_'di gnyis ni phyag tu gtogs[#]/_sbrid pa byung na sos zhes
[\[328a.5\]]mi bya tshe'i mtha' ba dang khyim pa ma gtogs te'o/_/khyim pa sbrid pa byung ba dang dge slong rgan po nad pa la sos zhes byas kyang nyes med/_gsar bu [#]la a rog [#]gya bya/_bdag pas gzhon pa'i dge slong dang dge sbyong sbrid pa byung na a rog [#]gya bya/_rgan pa la phyag bya/_bdag pas rgan pa
[\[328a.6\]]sbrid pa byung na phyag bya/_sbrid pa byung na'o/_/gzhon nu sbrid pa byung na rgan po la phyag bya/_yang dag par gshegs pa la ming dang [#]rus dang tshe dang ldan pa zhes mi bod/_yang dag par gshegs pa la ming gis smos pa 'di rnams skad du mi bya/_nye ba'i tshig med par ming dang dus nas
