[\[328a.7\]]mi bod/_/sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas zhes zer ba'i tshig 'ba' zhig mi bya'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes zer ba lta bu'i tshig gnyis bya/_rgan rabs la'ang ma yin/_bdag pas rgan pa la ban de [#]zhes bya ba dang de'i ming dang gnyis thabs cig tu brjod/_mthun pa ni gnas
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]brtan dang tshe dang ldan pa ni nye ba'i tshig go_/gnas brtan la btsun pa zhes bya ste 'og min nas bod/_'og ma la tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ste ming nas bod/_de ltar ma byas na nyes byas/_snga ma las ma yin/_sangs rgyas 'das pa la tshe dang ldan pa dang btsun pa'i sangs rgyas zhes mi bod/_'ong
[\[328b.2\]]pa [#]dang 'gro ba 'grub [#]pa'i dngos po las sar pa ba [#]gtsug lag khang du gzhag_/dge slong gis [#]dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig [#]na dgon pa dang dben par mi brtsig [#]gi mi mang po 'du zhing phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas su brtsig[# ]/tshal dang rtsing [#]bu dang bcag pa yang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar
[\[328b.3\]]gtsug lag khang brtsig pa ni tshal chu bzang po dang /_me tog bzang po dang 'chag pa spang bar bya/_nye mtshams kyang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang gcong rong dang gad khar mi brtsig par bde bar brtsig_/lang long dang sgra dang skad dang dbyangs nyung bar ro/_/mi mang po 'du ba'i sar gtsug lag
[\[328b.4\]]khang brtsig pa dang /_spangs [#]shing dben pa glu gar dang ca co nyung ba'i sar brtsig_/sbyin bdag gis [#]gnang na gtsug lag khang bya ba'i phyir gyi dngos pos de bya ba'i de'i snod du bya/_gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i sta zor dang gzhor spyan nyon nyes sam ma nyes zhes dris te ma nyes zhes zer na'o/_/de
[\[328b.5\]]gzhag pa'i phyir khung bu sbyin/_ltag ma'i gzhong spyad mi 'khyams [#]pa'i phyir khang bu gnyis brtsigs te spyad der brub/_der mkho [#]ba yungs mar la sogs pa ran par nyo/_/las mi rnams kyi rkang lag bsku ba dang 'breng ba dang shing rta'i mig bsku ba'i mar nyos te gzhag_/ci ltar tho ngan pa de ltar las [#]
[\[328b.6\]]sar pa'i zas so/_/gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i zhal ta ba'i dge slong dge 'dun dang zan [#]thang mnyam par tho ngan gyis bsnyams shing [#]sbyin/_gtsug lag khang med na de'i gnas 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang du'o/_/gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i dge slong las kyis brel te dge 'dun nang du ma
[\[328b.7\]]'ongs na dge 'dun gyis [#]zan thang bzhin du ga la 'dug par bskyal [#]te sbyin/_thob na blangs[#]/_las pa'i dge slong las che ba'i phyir dge 'dun dang yon bdag gis pha la zan blangs te byin kyang brtags pa'o/_/gtsug lag khang gi mtha' ni rim lnga'o/_/dge slong gis gtsug lag khang rtsig [#]na snyi
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]ba'i phyir rim pa lnga rtsig [#]las mi brtsig [#]go/_/dge slong ma'i ni rim gsum mo/_/dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang rim gsum las [#]mi brtsig_/dri gtsang khang dang sgo phubs mi gnyis kyis lhag par ro/_/dri gtsang khang dang sgo phubs ni bsil ba'i phyir bdun brtsegs su'ang
[\[329a.2\]]brtsig tu rung ngo /_/lci sto [#]mi thub na gzhag pa ni nyes med do/_/gtsug lag khang rim [#]zhig brtsigs te ka ba dag gis mi thub na [(]brtsag [,]brtsig [)#]ma dang po gzhig [#]kyang nyes med do/_/brtsams [#]la che bar ram chung bar bcags [#]pa yang ngo /_/yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang zhig dang po chung ngur brtsigs
[\[329a.3\]]pa las phyis dad pa skyes te de bshigs te [#]cher byas kyang rung ngo [#]/_/chen po zhig brtsams pa las rgyu zad de phyis bskyungs te brtsigs kyang nyes med do/_/che ba'i phyir na mchod rten dang gzugs kyang ngo /_/lce te'am sku ba'i [#]gzugs thog ma chung ngur brtsig [#]par brtsams pa las de las cher bskyed pa'i
[\[329a.4\]]phyir bshigs te cher brtsigs kyang nyes med do/_/zhig ste 'drang [#]ba'i phyir na zin [#]kyang ngo /_/mchod rten rnying [#]pa zhig de tsam gyi tshod nam [#]de bas che bar [#]bya ba'i phyir bshigs te [#]byas kyang nyes med/_phyogs bcos pa'i phyir kyang ngo /_/mchod rten nam gzugs phyogs gcig ral lam zhig
[\[329a.5\]]pa de nyi tshe bshigs [#]la slar bcos kyang nyes med/_gdugs la sogs pa dbab pa yang ngo /_/lce ti'i [#]'phang lo rnying pa slar phab la [#]sar pa btsugs [#]kyang nyes med do/_/bshigs pa'i sdig kyang nyes med/_gzhan gzugs pa'i phyir na yang ngo /_/lce ti'i [#]gdugs dang srog shing dang 'phang lo
[\[329a.6\]]ma legs [#]pa slar phab la legs pa btsugs [#]kyang nyes med do[#]/_/de'i phyir ba nye bar ma bzhag par mi dbab/_ltag ma ltar mchod rten nam gzugs bshigs [#]pa ni yo byad thams cad sogs la gzhig gis ma [#]sogs par bshigs te [#]phyed ral du mi bsdu bar mi dor/_skyes pa'i rabs
[\[329a.7\]]la sogs pa bris pa [#]dang sangs rgyas kyi tshig bris pa yang ngo /_/mdzangs [#]blun gyi rgyud [#]bris pa dang zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig rtsig [#]pa'i ngos la bris pa dang slar de bzhin du brtsig cing bcos/_ri gang bcag [#]pa 'bogs par bya ba'i phyir kyang ngo /_/ri mo dang skyong nul gos pa zhig yod na gang du bgos
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]pa der ri mo dang skyong nul bzang du bya/_bya ba brtsams te ma byas pa lhag ma gzhan gyis so/_/dge slong ma yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang phyed tsam brtsigs nas ma zin par bor ba la dge slong gis zin par brtsigs kyang nyes med/[# ]de ste dge 'dun gyi phyir na phyed langs pa las bslab pa sbyin/_
[\[329b.2\]]dge 'dun gyi phyir yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang phyed tsam zhig brtsigs pa las dge slong gis grogs byas te zin par brtsigs kyang nyes med do/_/de sbyin pa'i dus ni de ste dgun na phyi dro'o/_/ltag ma ltar yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang brtsigs [#]pa dge slong gis btang ba ni dgun grang [#]
[\[329b.3\]]na phyi dro gtang /_dpyid tsha na snga dro'o/_/[#]dpyid tsha na snga dro gtang [#]ngo /_/zas kyi bya ba'i dus ma lus par ro/_/gtsug lag khang slong ba'i dge slong bsod snyoms pa yin pa zhig dus las sngar bsod snyoms la 'gro/_/gtsug lag khang [#]zhig na dus pas sngar bza'/_sta gon ma byas par bsod
[\[329b.4\]]snyoms la mi 'jug_/gtsug lag khang brtsigs [#]pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms la [#]'jug pa'i tshe/_rdul [#]dang 'ji ba med par byas te 'gro/_/rkang pa dang lag pa bkrus pa ni de'i mtha'o/_/ltag ma ltar bkru ba [#]lus kun bkru ma nus na rkang lag [#]bzhi bkru/_nang bar zas sar pas bskul/_
[\[329b.5\]]gtsug lag khang brtsigs [#]pa'i dge slong gis yon bdag la dge slong gsar bus las byed pa [#]rnams bkres kyis nang par g.yar sus sbyin no zhes bsgo[#]/_/phyi dro rkang lag gi bsku ba dang skom kyang ngo /_/yon bdag la las byed pa'i dge slong rnams la rkang lag la mar la sogs pas bsku ba'i
[\[329b.6\]]rigs so zhes bya/_khang bu dag gi sgo bya/_gtsug lag khang brtsigs na khang bur sgo bya/_sgo leb sbyin/_sgo la sgo leb sbyin lag gzungs yang mig dang pags pa'i dum bu'o/_/sgo leb la nang nas drang pa dang phyir gcad [#]pa'i lag gzungs dang yang mig dang sgo dbye ba [#]krig krig mi ze [#]bar ko
[\[329b.7\]]pas dkri/_skar khung gdod/_khang bu la skar khur gdod de[#]/_dbus su'o/_/skar khung rtsig [#]pa'i dbus su gdod/_/phyi rub cing nang yangs pa rgya mtsho mching rnams [#]lta bur ro/_/skar khung gi thabs 'di 'dra bar byas na snang yel che/_shar bu sbyin/_skar khung la shar bu sbyin/_
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]sgo leb dang zung dang rgyab gtan dang sked gtan dang[#]ra rkang gi dbyung [#]pa bcang /_sgo la [#]sgo leb dang sgo mi gyes [#]pa'i lcags kyi zung dang sgo la rgyab gtan [#]la sogs pa ming gis smos pa 'di rnams sbyin/_btsem [#]pa'i gsor kyang ngo /_/skar khung char bu can du byas la [#]nang du mi shor
[\[330a.2\]]bar bya ba'i phyir srad bu'i dra ba bre/_khang bu'i mdun du khyams bya/_khang bu brtsigs pa ni mdun du khyams su bya/_pha gu [#]bdun nam brgyad gding ba sbyin/_sgo skyes mtho ste khang bu dang khyams dma' ba mnyam par bya ba'i phyir gzhi pha gu gding /_de'i steng shing leb ka gtan du gding /_gtsug
[\[330a.3\]]lag khang gi ka ba'i gzhi thog thag tu gzhi shing bzang po gcig bzhag la de'i steng du ka ba gzugs/_de'i ka ba phreng [#]du'o/_/ltag ma'i ka ba'i phreng [#]du gzugs/de dag la ka zhu'o[#]/_/ka ba de rnams la ku zhu [#]sbyin/_de dag la gdung bre/_ka ba dang ka zhu [#]btsugs pa la gdung bre/_de dag
[\[330a.4\]]la phyam mo/_/de'i 'og tu phyam bre[#]/_de dag la spang leb bo/_/phyam gyi steng spang leb gzhib[#]/_de ltar pha gu gding /_spang leb kyi steng du pha gu gding /_de dag la so phag gi phye ma'o/_/pha gu'i steng du so phag bkrum pa bdal/_mi ltung ba'i phyir be ti ka bya/_mi ltung bar bya ba'i
[\[330a.5\]]phyir sgo dang khyams kyi mdun du mda' yab bya/_de mi g.yo ba'i phyir de la 'brel ba [#]bya/_ltag ma'i mda' yab mi g.yo bar shing gis sprel/_lcags kyi gzer bus de dag la sprel[#]/_de'i mdor mi 'khrul par lcags gzer gyis gdab/_'dzeg pa'i phyir thang ma skas bya/_rim kang steng
[\[330a.6\]]ma la 'dzeg pa'i phyir thang ma skas bya [#]'og ma ni rdo las 'og ma'i skas ni rdo las [#]bya/_bar ma ni kham [#]pa las/_bar ma'i skas ni kham pa las [#]bya/_steng ma [#]shing las rigs [#]gsum gyi dang po'i skas ni shing las bya/_skas la 'dzeg_/ltag ma lta bu'i skas med na shing la thag pas [#]bres pa'i
[\[330a.7\]]skas la 'dzeg_/shing dang smyig ma dang thag pa'i yang ngo /_/lhag [#]ma'i skas kyi rgyu ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams la bya/_rdzab tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ma thangs [#]kyi gzhi dang sgo khang du pha gu gding /_sgo khang dang khyams la sogs pa rdzab tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhi so phag gis gding /_de'i steng du
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]so phag gi [#]phye mas gding /_ltag ma'i so phag gi srubs [#]su so phag bkrum pa'i phyes bdal/_de la mdo yang ngo /_/steng ma'i so phag gi steng du rdo thal gyis skyong [#]nul thogs/_med na rkang pa'i skyabs kyi phyir shing leb kyang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar 'dam rdzab kyi sar so phag gis ma bting na ga las
[\[330b.2\]]gar 'gro ba'i sar shing leb gding /_bar bar du pha gu yang ngo /_/shing leb gding du med na so phag gis gom pa re rer gzhag_/mchod rten kyang de bzhin no/_/mchod rten bskor [#]ba na 'dam rdzab yod na ltag ma'i rim pa ltar gang 'byor pa gding ngo /_/der 'dom tsam byas na byas pa'o/_/
[\[330b.3\]]mchod rten gyi drung du shing dang so phag gzhag pa 'dom gang tsam nas mi nye bar gzhag_/seng ge'i stan gru bzhi po bya/_bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i tshe chos [#]'chad pa'i khri 'og tu seng ge [#]'dug tu rung bar steng gru bzhi por bya/_rkang pa seng ge gdong du bya/_ltag ma'i khri 'dug pa'i gzhi rkang pa seng
[\[330b.4\]]ge bzhi'i gzugs bya'o/_/spro [#]ba'i tshe gzung [#]ba'i phyir gzhi [#]char bu yang lcags kyi yang mig gdags/_seng ge'i khri yan man spo [#]ba'i phyir grwa bzhir lcags kyi yang mig btags te bskur [#]du rung bar bya/_gshur [#]bu gdags/_khri'i steng gi gzhi snam bu sor bzhi tsam gyis [#]dra bar bre/_bar tshangs
[\[330b.5\]]can gding /_de'i steng du shing bal can gyi stan gding /_steng du gnam yol/_khri steng na chos 'chad pa la steng du gnam yol bya/_sbyar ba yang ngo /_/grwa bzhir 'phan [#]gdags/_thang ma skas byas te mi bskyod na thag bu [#]las so/_/seng ge'i khri mi bskyod par gnas gcig na gzhan so phag
[\[330b.6\]]las thang ma skas bya/_spos shing las [#]so/_/yan man spong [#]dgos na shing skam 'dom gang tsam pa bya/_mi 'grub skas kyang ngo /_/skas thang ma skas ma 'byor na shing la bres pa'i skas bya/_rkang pa'i khre'u [#]yang ngo /_/seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i tshe rkang pa gzhag pa'i khri'u gcig gzhag_/mchod [#]
[\[330b.7\]]seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i mdun du me tog dang /_pog spos dgram/_lo ma'i phung po [#]steng du gding /_ltag ma ltar me tog la sogs pa mchod pa med na shing lo sngon po dgram/_rtswa [#]thum kyang ngo /_/rkang pa gzhag pa'i khri'u med na khri'u skyin pa rtswa [#]thum gzhag_/rkang pa 'phyang ba'i phyir ro/_/_
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]ltag ma ltar rtswa thum ma bzhag na rkang pa 'phyang ste nang du 'gyur ro/_/der rdos kyang 'grub bo/_rtswa thum med na so phog gam rdos kyang ngo /_/bya rog dang bye'u dang phug ron dag zan za ba [#]la mi 'tshe ba'i phyir dra [#]ba sbyin/_khyams na dge 'dun pa shos gsol ba la ming gis smos pa'i
[\[331a.2\]]bya rnams mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir dra bas bre/_de rnam pa bzhi ste/_dra ba'i gzhi rnam bzhi ste 'og nas 'chad/_mo la dzo [#]dang bal ba za dang sha na shing bal gyis zhes so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las dra ba'i rgyu bya/_gru bzhir yang mig gdags/_khyams kyi grwa dra ba gdags pa'i yang
[\[331a.3\]]mig bya/_de la bcing /_dra ba yang mig la gdags/_shing gi ni rgas shing 'drul bas de'i phyir lcags kyi'o/_/dra ba gdags pa'i [#]mig shing las [#]byas na snyi ba'i phyir lcags las [#]bya/_de'i phyogs gcig tu bu gu bya/_dra ba'i phyogs gcig tu sgo gdod/_zos nas 'jug pa'i phyir
[\[331a.4\]]ro/_/dge 'dun bshos gsol nas zan brul la phug [#]ron la sogs pa thar gzhug [#]pa'i phyir sgo dbye/_gdug tshod [#]kyi tshe de dgag[# ]/bshos gsol ba'i tshe bya mi 'ong ba'i phyir dra ba'i sgo gcad[#]/_khyams su char pa mi 'bab par leb leb pos dgab ka ba'i [#]bar du bya'o/_/khyams su dge
[\[331a.5\]]'dun bshos gsol ba'i tshe rdzi char mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir [#]phyam dang ka ba'i bar nas spang leb kyis g.yogs[#]/_snang ba'i [#]phyir phyogs su btang /_ltag ma ltar g.yogs pa mun pa gnag na mdo mdor bu ga gdod/_de med [#]na ki ta ka'am re ldes so/_/spang leb kyis [#]g.yog tu med na dpar [#]ram re
[\[331a.6\]]ldes g.yogs[#]/_dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi'i tha mar dbyung /_dbyar [#]zla ba bzhi 'das nas dpar dang re lde [#]slar dpog_/bkad sa zlum po [#]bya/_dge 'dun gyi bkad [#]sa zlum por bya/_gnas grang ba'i phyi logs [#]rtsig pa sbyin/bkad sa grang ba'i phyir rgyab [#]thog thag tu rtsig pas bskor ka ba phreng du'o/_/mdun
[\[331a.7\]]thog thag tu ka ba phreng bar gzugs skar khung gdod/_dge slong gnyis gsum tsam 'dug pa'i mdo mdor skar khung gdod/_stan [#]gyi yang thog dang de'i 'og tu mu mnyam par bya/_ltag mar skar khung gdod [#]pa ha cang mi mtho bar stan gor tshad tsam nas yan chad du gzugs/_dra ba can dang
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]sgo leb gzhug[# ]/skar khung de la sgo leb dang dra bas bre/_bza' ba'i dang me'i dang 'du ba'i dang 'chag [#]pa'i gnas bya/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gnas khang bya/_glo phyogs zhar bar g.yogs [#]pa bya/_dge slong gtsug lag khang ma zin gyi bar du rtsig [#]pa la bcar la steng rtsas g.yogs
[\[331b.2\]]pa'i khyim byas la der gnas/_sa phug kyang brtags pa'o/_/phug na gnas kyang nyes med/_ba gam kyang ngo /_/rtsig pa'i glo la ba gam 'dra bar byas te steng g.yogs pa'i khung bur [#]gnas kyang nyes med/_khyams bzhin du deng pe ri ka'ang [#]chud do/_/rtsig [#]pa'i bu gur shing bcug la [#]shing
[\[331b.3\]]gi steng du shing leb kyis bres [#]te shing leb kyi mdo dang ka ba gnyis su mi ltung ba'i phyir lcags kyi gzer bus gdab[#]/_ra bas bskor ba rab tu byung ba'i kun dga' yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang gi khor yug tu ra ba brtsigs na'ang nyes med/_rtsig pa la stor khung gdod pa yang ngo /_/ra ba la chu [#]'gro zhing
[\[331b.4\]]mi 'khyil ba'i phyir mdo mdor stor [#]khung gdod do/_/sab mo dang 'obs kyis kyang ngo /_/ra bas gtsug lag khang bskor ba bzhin du [#]sab mo dang 'obs kyis bskor kyang rung ngo /_/gang zag la gtsug lag khang 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/ltag tu gtsug lag khang brtsig [#]pa'i rnams lta bur
[\[331b.5\]]yon bdag gcig gis thams cad brtsigs te dge slong gcig la yon du phul ba'ang len du [#]dbang ngo /_/thams cad sngon po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma mngon sum pa'i phyir mal khang gi rtsig pa sngon po la sogs pa sna bzhir bya/_dge slong bsam gtan byed pa la la ser po la dmigs [#]la la
[\[331b.6\]]dkar po la dmigs la la dmar po la dmigs la la sngon po la dmigs pas bdag gis nyal [#]khang ngos bzhir tshon sna bzhis bskus la dge slong mtshan ma gang la dmigs pa de la bsam gtan byed cing bsgom/_rab tu byung ba'i kun dga' [#]bris pa'am brtags pa'o/_/ra ba dang khyams la
[\[331b.7\]]sogs pa'ang ri mo [#]'drir gnang ba'o/_/sgor gnod sbyin bris te lag na rdo rje la sogs pa thogs pa'o/_/dge slong so so'i khyim [#]bu'i sgo g.yas g.yon du gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bris la lag na rdo rje'am mtshon cha thogs pa bris/_sgo khang du 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyud lnga bya/_gtsug lag khang
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]sgo'i khang du lam rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bris/_ltag tu lha dang mi'o/_/lam rgyud lnga la steng du lha dang mi bri/_'og tu ngan song gsum bri/_gling bzhi yang ngo /_/ltag tu mi'i khams bri bar gling bzhi'ang der bri/_rdzas [#]shing skye ba'i sems
[\[332a.2\]]can 'khor lo chu chun bzhin du 'khor zhing skye ba yang ngo /_/'khor lo rgyud lnga bris pa'i 'khor yug tu rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis skye zhing 'khor ba'i rgyud bri[#]/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dbus su phug ron dang sbrul dang phag lta bur ro/_/'khor lo dbus su 'di gsum gyi gzugs bris te
[\[332a.3\]]phug ron ni 'dod chags/_sbrul ni zhe sdang phag ni gti mug go_/glen [#]pas snga ma dag mid pa lta bur ro/_/ltag ma ltar bris pa la phag gis phug ron dang sbrul gnyis med pa ltar byas kha [#]gzhag_/rkyen du 'tshogs te byung ba'i yan lag kho ra khor yug tu'o/_/ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar
[\[332a.4\]]du 'khor ba'i rgyud yi ger bris/_de dag thams cad [#]mi rtag pas mid pa lta bu'o/_/gnod sbyin lta bu'i gzugs shig bris la de [#]khams gsum dang lam rgyud drug thams cad mid pa [#]lta bur bya/_ya rol du sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dkar po mngon par ston
[\[332a.5\]]par ro/_/'khor lo'i ltag tu sangs rgyas kyi gzugs shig bris la de'i g.yas phyogs su dkyil 'khor la ston pa dang 'dra ba bris te su 'khor ba las [#]'da' bar 'dod na 'phags pa'i lam brgyad sbyangs na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam 'dir 'gro'o zhes bstan pa 'dra bar bri[#]/_tshigs su bcad [#]
[\[332a.6\]]pa tshol cig ces pa [#]dang gnyis 'og tu'o/_/sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i drung na mar so sor thar pa'i smad dra la/_rtsa [#]khyim pa la glang gis sa/_/[#]zhes bya ba'i logs gnyis bris [#]te gzhag der 'chad pa gzhag_/de rnams 'chad pa'i dge slong gcig bskos te rtag par gzhag_/de'i 'khor du
[\[332a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul chen po dang bdud btul ba dag go_/'khor lo'i 'khor du sangs rgyas du shi ta nas babs nas rdzu 'phrul chen po byung ste bdud btul [#]ba bri'o/_/khyams su skye ba'i rgyud do/_/khyams kyi ngos la mdzangs [#]blun gyi rgyud zhib tu bri/_dri gtsang khang [#]gi sgo khar gnod sbyin phreng ba thogs
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]pa'o/_/dri gtsang khang gi sgo g.yas g.yon du [#]gnod sbyin lag [#]na me tog gi phreng ba thogs te mchod pa 'dra bar bri/_'du ba gnas brtan phreng [#]du'o/_/dge 'dun bshos gsol ba'i bkad sar gnas brtan kauN+Di n+ya [#]dang shA ri'i bu la sogs pa [#]phreng bar bris te gzhag_/mdzod kyi sgor lag
[\[332b.2\]]na dbyu gu thogs [#]pa'i gnod sbyin no/_/mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du [#]gnod sbyin gyi lag na rin po che sngon po 'bar ba 'dra ba thogs pa bri/_mchod rten gyi bkad sar lag na zas thogs pa'o/_/rtag par mchod ston bya ba'i sgo g.yas g.yon du [#]lag na kha zas sna tshogs thogs shing 'drim pa
[\[332b.3\]]'dra ba bri/_khrus khang du myu gu dang bum pa dang /_me bud pa'i grul bum [#]bri/_khrus khang gi sgo g.yas g.yon du [#]rin po che'i myu gu thogs pa dang chu bum pa dang chu bsros pa 'dra ba byas la grul bum me 'bud pa 'dra ba bya/_me [#]khang du 'byin pa la sogs pa byed pa dang [#]me 'bud pa'i grul bum gyi bu dang sbyin bdag
[\[332b.4\]]me mar thogs pa dang lha'i pho nya yang ngo /_/bsro gang [#]gi g.yas g.yon du gtsub [#]ma las me 'byin pa dang 'dra bar ming gis smos pa 'di rnams [#]'dra ba bri ba dang lha'i pho nya zhes bya ba ni mi gcig [#]btson du bzung la gshin rje'i mdun du zhal ce gcod [#]pa 'dra ba bri/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan [#]bum pa lag
[\[332b.5\]]na thogs pa'i klu dang klu'i bu mo chu 'drim pa drung [#]tshang ngu'o/_/drung tshang gi sgo g.yas g.yon du [#]chu 'drim pa dang chu skyed [#]pa lta bu bri/_nad pa la brtags pa'i khang pa yang dag par gshegs pa nad g.yog mdzad par ro/_/sman khang gi sgor nad pa khri la nyal ba 'dra bar bris la sangs rgyas kyis nad
[\[332b.6\]]g.yog byed pa 'dra bar bri/_bshang [#]gci'i khang bur dur khrod dang mi thod do/_/bshang [#]gci'i khung bu'i nang gi ngos la dur khrod na mi phal mo che shing [#]zhig keng rus khrod par bris la bshang gci'i tshe'ang de bltas [#]na mi gtsang bar bsgom/_bla gab med pa ma [#]yin pa'i gtsug lag khang du me du ba
[\[332b.7\]]can mi bya ba [#]mi gtsang ba yang ngo /_/gtsug lag khang steng g.yogs par me mi bud bus na nyes byas/_steng [#]ma g.yogs par bus pa ni nyes med/_gtar btang ba la thams cad do/_/me 'bud pa'i gzhi ngo mtshar lta bur bzang po zhig yin nas ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bla gab med kyang me 'bud
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]du mi gnang ngo /_/de'i phyir zhugs thab bca'/_ltag ma ltar [#]sa bzang po la grang ba'i rkyen gyis me 'bud du mi rung na lcags kyi zhugs ling gi steng du me bud/_bsdu ba'i phyir lcags kyi la yu ba can bya'o/_/me bsdu ba'i phyir lcags kyi thal phyags yu ba can bcang /_
[\[333a.2\]]nus pa'am shing gis kyang de'i don du 'grub bo/_/lcags kyi thal phyags med na shing leb dang rus pas me bsdur rung ngo /_/gtsug lag khang skyong gis gtsug lag khang nyin re bzhin phyags[#]/_gtsug lag khang skyong gis nyin re bzhin gtsug lag khang phyags [#]pa dang chag chag dang dkyil
[\[333a.3\]]'khor bya/_mi nus spyad pa'i tshe'i phyogs su'o/_/gtsug lag khang skyong gis ltag ma ltar thams cad byi dor byed mi nus na chos 'chad pa dang 'du ba dang bshos gsol ba'i sa nyi tshe bya/_lhag [#]ma ni brgyad dam bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i [#]tshe dge 'dun thams cad gaN+DI [#]brdungs pa la chos kyi gtam mam
[\[333a.4\]]bsrings pa mi [#]smra bas so/_/gtsug lag khang skyong gis ltag ma ltar nyi tshe byas te thams cad byed ma nus na bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i tshe dge 'dun thams cad 'dus nas phyag dang chag chag dang dkyil 'khor bya/_de ltar bya ba'i tshe gtam 'khyal pa dang 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs mi bya bar don la
[\[333a.5\]]dmigs shing las bya/_chos 'phel ba'i tshe chag chag dang shin tu 'jam po'i ba lang gi lci ba'i skyong nul bya yon bdag gtsug lag khang du mchod ston byed pa'am mang po 'dus shing chos 'chad pa'am/_dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bdun la sangs rgyas yum gyi lhums nas bltams te mngon par
[\[333a.6\]]byang chub pa dang dus 'di rnams kyi tshe gtsug lag khang byi dor bya/_mjug [#]tu bkru'am/_ltag ma ltar las [#]byas nas lus la rdul chags pa bkru/_rkang lag bkru/_lus bkru ma nus na rkang lag bkrus pas [#]chog_/lus chus brlan te phyi [#]lus dang gdong la chus btab ste thal [#]mo'am ras mas
[\[333a.7\]]phyi snum 'thob par bya/_ltag ma ltar chag chag dang las byed pa'i tshe dge 'dun thams cad bshos bzang por bya/_dkon mchog gi phyir phyung zhing phyags pa dang /_dri gtsang khang dang gzugs dang mchod rten gyi srog gi grib ma la zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bklags te rgal[#]/_dkon
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]mchog gsum gyi phyir chag chag dang maN+Dal la sogs pa byed pa'i tshe ming gis smos pa 'di rnams [#]grib ma la 'gong ste mi 'gror mi [#]rung na zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad klags [#]te 'gro/_/mal stan yang de dag gi nyin mo brtags shing gnas pas bcos/_ltag [#]ma'i mchod [#]ston bya ba dang sangs
[\[333b.2\]]rgyas bltams [#]pa'i nyi ma la mal [#]stan bskam pa dang sprug pa dang ral zhing chad pa la sogs pa bcos/_gdab cing byug pa dang shin tu 'jam pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i skyong nul gnas pa'i dngos por bya/_bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i tshe dge slong gang zag gis gnas khang yang ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang
[\[333b.3\]]phyag dar dang chag chag bya/_mal stan brtul par sprug[# ]/dge slong gang zag gi mal [#]stan la rdul chags na sprug_/[#]de ste shin tu na bkru/_ltag ma ltar sprugs te yang rdul ma song zhing dri ma yod na bkru/_chag chag btab pa'i steng du phyags te de dag gding /_sa phyags [#]te chag chag
[\[333b.4\]]byas te stan [#]bting la der nyal bar bya/_gzhi ma sprugs [#]pa rdul can la ma yin/_re lde lta bu la rdul yod pa na re lde'i steng na rdul yod na [#]rdul ma sprugs par stan mi gding /_gding ba la sogs gcig sprug [#]par bsko/_/bdag gi [#]mal stan la rdul yod na ras yug gcig gis rdul sprug_/
[\[333b.5\]]ngan pas so/_/ltag ma ltar rdul sprug pa ni ras [#]ngan pa las bya/_de bcos/_ras ngan pa der ral na btsem/_mi nus na [#]bshad de shing bu la bcings te sprug_/btsems te [#]yang spyad du ma btub na shad shad por dras te shing la bcings te sprug_/de lta bur yang mi rung na lci ba dang 'jib bsres
[\[333b.6\]]te ka ba'am rtsig pa gas par byugs[#]/_ltag ma ltar byas te rnyings te spyad du mi rung na yon bdag dad pas byin pa yon bdag bskyed pa'i phyir 'jib dang bsres te gtsug lag khang rdol bar glan/_byin pa'i bsod nams ring du spel ba'i phyir ro/_/ltag ma ltar 'jib dang bsres te skyong [#]nul bya ba
[\[333b.7\]]ser sna'i phyir bya ba ma yin gyi yon bdag gi yon ring du spel ba'i phyir bya/_sgo khang du'am khyams su mal bca' bar [#]mi bya/_sgo gang du dge slong langs pa'i phyir nyal ba'am/_mal stan der mi gzhag sgra ngan pa zer ba'i rkyen du brgyad dang bcu bzhi la khyams su'o/_/dge slong gis mal stan kun btsongs te
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]zos so zhes 'phya ba'i phyir bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i nyin par khyams su phyung ste bskam pa dang sprug pa dang thabs kyis khyim pa la bstan/_dge slong [#]khri dang khri'u bcang /_dge 'dun dang [#]gang zag gis khri dang [#]khri'u bcangs kyang nyes med/_tar tar [#]ba ma rung bar mi bya [#]ba'i phyir rkang pa'i
[\[334a.2\]]'og tu zlum por gcad [#]par bya ba'am/_phub ma'i thug bu'i steng du gzhag gam dar dkri/_gtsug lag khang gi sa gzhi bzang po la 'gog pa'i mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i phyir khri'u dang rkang bzhi la sogs pa rtsibs mi [#]rno ba dang phub ma'i steng du gzhag gam zhabs ra das dkris las mi snad par
[\[334a.3\]]bya/_dge 'dun ma yin pas khri'u rkang pa bris pa bdag gir bya zhing mi spyad/_dge slong gsum gsum [#]man chad gang zag la yon bdag gis khri dang khri'u rkang pa mda' tshon gyis bris pa yon du phul na len du mi gnang [#]ngo /_/dge 'dun ni dbang ngo /_/dge 'dun khri bzang po dang rgyab rten dang
[\[334a.4\]]bcas pa'ang ma yin khri mthon po dang khri rgyab rten rang 'khrugs su 'dug pa bzang po gang zag la yon bdag gis byin na [#]len du mi dbang ngo /_/'chang sha [#]me mar gyi shing yang ma yin gang zag gis khri dang me mar gyi shing dang lcags ka mang po mi bcang /_yal ka du ma [#]po zhes gzhan las so/_/gang
[\[334a.5\]]zag gis [#]me mar gyi snod yang 'chang du mi gnang [#]ba ni ma yin gyi kha cig pa bcang du dbang ngo /_chongs shig [#]par/_bar tshangs can dang sngags [#]khab gru bzhi/_dge 'dun nam gang zag gi mal stan gyi gzhi dang stan gong [#]bu'i bar shing bal gyis btsangs pa bcangs kyang nyes med/_bzhi dang
[\[334a.6\]]gnyis pa rim gnyis su byas te bsten/_ltag ma'i stan gru bzhi zheng du khru dor byas la srid gnyis su blta ba gru bzhir 'gyur gyis de ltar bya/_shing bal gyis dgang /_stan gru bzhi'i nang shing bal gang yang rung bas dgang /_mal [#]stan ma brtags par nyal ba [#]ma yin/_nub mo nyal kar
[\[334a.7\]]mal bya ba'i gzhi sems can yod dam med brtags pa dang phyi rol che chung lta bur zar [#]ba las phyir [#]log na stan gyi steng ci yod brtags la nyal/_dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par yang ma yin nub mo nyal ba'i tshe seng ge nyal stabs bzhin du byas la sang yang sngar ldang ngo snyam du bsams te nyal/_gzhan
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]dang lhan cig tu khri'am bting ba gcig gam gzhan la yang ma yin no/_/dge slong nang khri dang stan la sogs pa'i steng du mthang sbyar te mi nyal brtags pa ni med la khrel can na gding ba so sor bting na bar du gtur bu dang /_lhung bzed kyi snod bzhag la dran pa nye bar gzhag ste'o/_/[#]dge slong [#]yan man
[\[334b.2\]]du yul rgyu ba la gos kyis [#]brel bar gyur na lhan cig tu nyal du rung ste/_gcig la gcig mi reg cing khrel ba'i tshul du byas la gding ba so sor bting [#]ste lus gnyis mi phrad par bya ba'i phyir bar du gtur bu'am lhung bzed kyi snod lta bus 'chad de gnyid ring du mi log [#]pa dang mi reg pa'i tshul du sems dran
[\[334b.3\]]pa nye bar gzhag ste nyal/_gsum yan chad 'du zhing khri la 'dzeg [#]par spyad pa ma [#]yin/_khri la dge slong gsum las mang du lhan cig mi 'dug 'chag pa'i phyir ro/_/khri'u ring po la gnyis las ma yin/_khri'u phra mo ring po la mi gnyis las mang du mi 'dug_/tha mal pa la du ma ma yin/_
[\[334b.4\]]khri'u chung ngu gru bzhi la mi gcig las lhag par mi 'dug par lo gsum pa dang de dang lhan cig tu stan la ma yin/_dge slong nang lo ma lon pa dang lo gsum lon pa man chad ni stan gcig la 'dug tu rung ngo /_/bar du lo gsum gyis chod na gnas brtan man chad gang yang stan gcig la 'dug tu rung
[\[334b.5\]]ngo /_/lo bzhi lon na lhan cig tu 'dug tu mi rung ngo /_/grong bar du mkhan po dang yang stan med na dran pa bzhag ste spyad/_dge slong rgan gzhon 'dres par grong du song ba la yon bdag stan la gcig las ma bting na mkhan po man chad gang yang rung ste stan la 'dug tu rung ngo /_/khang bu'ang khyim
[\[334b.6\]]pa dang ma yin/_/gtsug lag khang yang rung grong yang [#]rung khyim pa dang stan gcig tu mi 'dug_/rab tu ma rdzogs pa dang ma yin no/_/dge slong dang stan gcig tu mi 'dug_/ma ning dang za ma dang ma bsad pa la sogs pa [#]dang mur 'dug dang [#]mur 'dug tu 'jug pa dang /_rkun [#]gnas dang
[\[334b.7\]]so sor gnas pa dang /_mi gnas pa dang ma yin/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang stan gcig la mi 'dug_/slob pa mi byin pa dang ma yin/_tshe [#]gcig gi bar du slob pa byin pa na'ang stan gcig la mi 'dug dri'u rngog [#]thams cad dang [#]rab tu rdzogs pa dang dge 'dun 'dus pa las gzhan du
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]na [#]stan no/_/dge 'dun mang du 'dus pa'i tshe dri'u rngog lta bu stan[#]/_'dra ba mang zhig bting na de'i tshe ni [#]gnas brtan lo brgya man chad de [#]ring khrims rdzogs yan chad stan gcig la 'dug kyang nyes med dge slong dang ni mi dbang /[ #]stegs bu ni ma yin no/_/sa stegs sam shing
[\[335a.2\]]leb bam rdo'i steng na ni khyim pa dang lhan cig tu rung ngo /_/dog cing glo bur byung na lhung [#]ba med/_bcu bzhi'am bco lnga'i tshe'am stan med de gcig gi [#]steng du gcig 'dug pa tsam du dog na de'i tshe dge sbyong [#]dang lhan cig tu 'dug tu'ang rung /_mal stan sbed na gnyis las gcig las khri'am khri'u
[\[335a.3\]]'o/_/mal stan zhig gnas [#]gcig nas gnag tu khri dang bcas te spos na khri yang ste mi bskur bar [#]gcig gis gos bsdus la gcig gis khri'u bskur [#]ro/_/gzhan gyis bar tshangs can la sogs pa'o/_/'di dge 'dun gyi na snying mi bar mi drang mi brtse bar mi drang mi bshal[#]/_ltag ma
[\[335a.4\]]'dra bar dge 'dun gyi mal stan bskya na sgo la mi shong du mi gnang bar drag shul mi bya bar bag yod par dal gyis ma [#]ral bar bya zhing bskya/_ji ltar de du ba dang dri ma dang rdul gyis reg par 'gyur ba de ltar ma yin/_dge 'dun gyi mal stan du ba dang dri ma dang rdul la sogs pas ma reg par nan bya/_
[\[335a.5\]]'di [#]mi gtsang ba'i khang [#]bu dang [#]nye bar spyad par mi bya/_dge 'dun mel stan bshang gcis lta bur mi [#]bskur mi spyad der mi gzhag_/ma rung bar byas te dor bar mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi mal stan zhig ste med kyang rung dor ro snyam mi bsam/_bsrad skam [#]sprug rdol bar lhan par sbyin/_dge 'dun gyi
[\[335a.6\]]mal stan ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ltar nan tan byed cing rim gro bya ba/_gse [#]na shur bus so/_/mal stan gas na slar btsem [#]ste thad ka thad kar [#]sra bar snam bus gzungs bya/_dbus zad mtha' dbus su bya/_stan spyad spyad de dbus rdol na skyed du 'chad de dbus gnyis tha mar btang la tha ma
[\[335a.7\]]gnyis dbus [#]su btang na [#]sra par 'gyur/_rigs na btso[#]/_/gos dri ma khyer ram kha dog yal na slar bkrus te btso[#]/_/slar btsos par mi nus na me mar gyi snying por bskos te/_dkon mchog gi sbyor ba'am gang zag gi sbyin pa dag la yang ngo /_/dge 'dun la dad pa'i yon bdag gis mal stan sbyin
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]pa spyad spyad de rnyings [#]nas spyad du mi rung bar gyur na ste/_dkon mchog gsum gyi spyan sngar me mar du bud gang zag chos klag pa'i mer mar [#]du byas kyang nyes med/_der yang mi mkho [#]na 'ji ba dang rtsig pa'am ka ba'am sgo'am dkon mchog gi la bskus te 'di de lta bu'i nan tan gyis so/_/ltag ma ltar me mar
[\[335b.2\]]gyi [#]rgyur kyang mi rung na ba lang gi lci ba dang bsres te rtsig [#]pa dang /_sgo la sogs pa ral zhig bu ga yod par glan/_dgos nas bcangs pas so/_/ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyis mal stan btso [#]zhing bcos pa la sogs pa dang tha ma rtsig pa la glan pa'i bar du bya ba ni mal [#]stan su spyod [#]spyod pa'i gang zag
[\[335b.3\]]gis bya/_ltag ma dge 'dun gaN+DI [#]brdungs la 'dus te'o/_/ltag ma ltar ma dgos [#]shing spyi la 'dug pa las rul tam ma rul bar gyur na dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te ba lang gi lci ba dang sbyar la ltag ma ltar bya/_dge 'dun gyis brkus [#]pa mthong ste mi zlogs [#]par mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi nor
[\[335b.4\]]rdzas ci'ang rung ste rkun pos khyer ram [#]phyugs zhig zhing las bza' bar gyur na dge slong gis mthong bas skod [#]cig_/bsngags na dge 'dun gyi la g.yel bar mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi nor rdzas la rkun po zhig 'ongs te nor rkun bdag dang dge 'dun gyi 'dra mi stor bar nan tan bya/_gnas su
[\[335b.5\]]ma phyin par khyer bas spyad par bya/_ltag ma ltar dge 'dun gyi mal stan dang rdzas rkun pos khyer ba las [#]bdag gis ma btang ste/_bdag gis gtsug lag khang gzhan du khyer ba'i tshe lam na spyad pa las nyes med do/_/bdag gi [#]gnas su bskur [#]bar mi 'grub kyi bar du gnas gzhan du
[\[335b.6\]]spyad [#]par spyod cig_/ltag ma ltar mal stan la sogs pa gtsug lag khang gzhan [#]du khyer ba bdag gcig [#]gtsug lag khang rkun pos [#]ma zhi ba'i bar du mal stan de la spyad kyang nyes med/_gnas gzhan gyi zas dang yo byad dang rnyed pa [#]gnas gzhan du spyad par mi bya/_bdag gtsug
[\[335b.7\]]lag khang gcig gi rkyen la gtogs pa de nas zas dang /_gos dang mal stan blangs la gnas gzhan du khyer te mi spyad do/_/de la de ltar mi sbyin/_ltag [#]ma ltar gtsug lag khang gzhan du khyer ba las [#]dge 'dun gyis mi rku/_khyer na 'bul du gzhug_/ltag ma ltar dge 'dun
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]gyis bsgo ste'ang ma btub ste khyer na ji tsam khyer ba skyin pa dgug_/med na sbyin [#]pas so/_/ltag ma ltar slar 'bul du gzhug [#]pa kho na la nor yod med dbul du mi bdog na mthong [#]ngam nas dge 'dun thog ma sus zas byin pa la'ang 'bul du gzhug_/kha na ma tho ba med
[\[336a.2\]]ba na bdag gi gtsug lag khang gi dge 'dun gyi skal pa mi dgos [#]pa rtswa'am shing spyad kyang ngo /_/dge slong gcig gam gnyis sam gang yang rung bas bdag 'tsho ba thams cad dge 'dun dang lhan cig dbang ba las dge 'dun la mi dgos pa'i rtswa [#]dang shing tsam gang gis spyad pa [#]ni nyes med do/_/
[\[336a.3\]]gzhan thug [#]thub ci'ang byar mi rung ngo /_/ji ltar rgyud du ma bskos bar 'khor zhing spyod pa ji ltar rgan rims kyis [#]ma yin no/_/dge 'dun spyi'i zangs dang rdza ma dang sta re dang ste'u la sogs pa [#]yo byad ci'ang rung ste/_dge slong gcig spyod cing 'dug pa la nga rgan gyis tshur 'ong gcig [#]ces mi bya/_
[\[336a.4\]]lhan cig tu bslang [#]na ni de ltar ro/_/dge 'dun la sman brdungs [#]pa'am zangs la tshon btso ba la gnyis ka tshon btso ba yin na'ang las lhan cig bya/_gnyis ka sman gyi las byed na'ang thabs shig bdun [#]las so sor byed na rgan rims su'o/_/des brtsams pa la 'bral bar mi bya/_zangs sam
[\[336a.5\]]gtun [#]lta bu dge slong gcig [#]spyod par rtsom zhing 'dug pa la khyod kyi rdzas 'or la spyad pa la 'on cig ces mi bya/_rkang pa chus brlan te 'khru ba der ro/_/chol zangs su rkang pa [#]'khru ba'i tshe gnas brtan zhig na re chol zangs 'on cig ces zer na rkang pa chus ma gsher na sbyin/_gsher [#]na rkang pa
[\[336a.6\]]bkrus te sbyin/_khang bur ni zhugs na der ro/_/phyi rol gyi khang bu dang dge slong gzhon nu sngar 'gro bar brtsams pa la rgad po phyis 'ongs te [#]nga 'gro stod ces mi bya/_chog bu pa ni 'dug pa las mi bslang [#]/_khang bu'i nang na dge slong bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa la khyod langs [#]te phyir song zhes
[\[336a.7\]]mi bya/_'dir ci ltar rgan rims su ma yin/_bsam gtan byed pa'i gnas su rgan gzhon gang yang rung gang snga snga bab bab tu 'dug kyang nyes med do[#]/_/zas dang las brtsam pa la [#]dge slong gis ma yin/_dge slong gzhon nu stan [#]mthon po la 'dug ste zas bza' bar brtsams [#]pa las dge
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]slong rgan po phyis brtsams te khyod langs [#]nga 'dug ces mi bya/_gral ma yin par mi [#]'dug_/gral thabs [#]las gong du'ang mi 'dug 'og tu'ang mi 'dug par bdag [#]bdag gi gral du 'dug go_/bya ba byas la 'dod pa yod na 'khor zhing spyad pa bcang bar mi bya/_dge slong gis zangs la sogs pa'i [#]
[\[336b.2\]]snod gcig dge 'dun spyi'i la bdag gis gos lta bu bcos zin na [#]rtag par mi gzhag gis [#]su dgos pa la sbyin no/_/skabs kyi mtshan gyi don du de'i stan bting ba la byas pa [#]ma byas pa'o/_/dge slong gis [#]gos shig lan cig tshon du bcug [#]ste/_bskam du bcug la phyis yang tshon [#]du gzhug dgos na
[\[336b.3\]]phyi ma ma zin gyi bar du shing gzhong lta bu'i gzhi gzhan gyis mi bskur[#]/_de'i tshe gos sam rked chings [#]kyis de bsngo bar bya/_ltag ma ltar lhan cig tshon [#]du bcug nas bdag don cig [#]la skad cig gud du 'gro na gzhan gyis mi khyer ba'i ska rags sam gos shig gzhong kung du gzhag_/dgos pa
[\[336b.4\]]yon [#]la thabs gzhan yod na dge 'dun gyi dpag [#]cing mi spyad/_ltag ma ltar gos la sogs pa 'tshed pa bdag la'ang zangs shig bdog na dge 'dun sbyi'i zangs gzhan mi spyod do/_/dal na bdag gi don bsras te dge [#]'dun gyi spyad kyang nyes med/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ni de lta bu'i tshul las don
[\[336b.5\]]yod de phrogs na'o/_/dge slong zhig la bdag la'ang zangs shig bdog la dge 'dun gyi zangs dang gnyis ka spyad de las zin nas slar mi ster na dge slong gis phrogs te spyad kyang nyes med/_dge 'dun gyis gtun bu dang bcas te bcang /_dge 'dun gyis sman btags [#]pa'i gtun bu bcangs kyang nyes med/_
[\[336b.6\]]skra 'breg pa'i [#]lag cha yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyis skra dang sen mo 'breg pa'i spyad [#]bcangs kyang nyes med/_khug mar bcug la [#]rtsig par gzhag_/ltag ma'i spu gri rnams khug [#]ma lta bur bcug ste rtsig pa'i gseb lta bu mi stor bar gzhag_/ste'u dang sta [#]re dang gsor bu la sogs pa'i lag cha
[\[336b.7\]]yang ngo /_/ming gis [#]smos pa 'di rnams dge 'dun gyis bcangs kyang nyes med/_dge slong gis rnyed na kham [#]pa'i las la sogs pa de dag sbyin/_dge 'dun la [#]gang zag khang [#]pa'i snod rnyed na gang rnyed [#]pa gtan sbyin/_dge slong mas mching bu'i snod mi bcang /_dge slong mas 'di bcang du mi gnang [#]/_
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]thams cad kyis til gyi snod bcang /_dge slong sde lngas til gyi snod bcangs kyang rung /_srang brgyad nas bzhi'o/_/til gyi snod lcid srang [#]brgyad man chad bzhi yan chad las bya/_lcags kyi snod kyang ngo /_/lcags kyi snod spyad kyi nang du chu bsro ba dang tshod ma btso ba la
[\[337a.2\]]sogs pa byar rung /_de'i lcags sgyed kyang ngo /_/dge slong dang dge slong mas lcags sgyed bcangs kyang nyes med/_kham pa'i rgya thabs [#]kyang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar chu bsro ba dang kha zas btso ba'i gang zag gis rgya thab [#]kyang rung /_/gnang ba thob na khar [#]ba'o/_/dge slong ber ka khyer du mi gnang [#]ngo /_/
[\[337a.3\]]dra ba'ang kha dog gcig pa'o/_/lhung bzed kyi snod kyi dra ba kha dog gcig pa las bya/_de dag sbyin/_ber ka dang dra ba dang dge 'dun gyis dad pa sbyin/_rgas pa dang na ba la'o/_/ltag ma ltar sbyin pa ni rgan pa dang nad pa las sbyin no[#]/_/'grub na 'di dag tshig [#]gcig gis sbyin/_ltag ma ltar dge
[\[337a.4\]]'dun gyi dad pa sbyin pa na gsol ba dang [#]zhu ba gcig gis sbyin no/_/dge slong gnyis so sor sbyin na [#]gsol ba dang zhu ba gcig gis byar rung ngo /_/'khar [#]ba sgra can [#]bcangs te sbrul la sogs pa [#]bskrad pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong mtshan mo phyi nang du 'jug pa la sbrul la [#]sogs pas rkang pa la zin par
[\[337a.5\]]dogs pa'i phyir smyug ma'am lcags lta bu sgra can gyis gsil [#]zhing 'gro/_khar [#]pa'i rtsa ba [#]gas na phor ka [#]gdab/_ber ka'i zhabs gas na lcags kyi phor ka gdab/_ya rol du na gce 'us dkri'i/_khar [#]pa'i mgo ma gas kyang rung lcags sam zangs kyis dkri/_gdugs bcang ste re lde mkhan
[\[337a.6\]]gyi la'am lo ma'i la'o[#]/_/re lde'am lo ma [#]gdugs byas te bcangs kyang nyes med/_lus kyi tshad du yu ba'o/_/gdugs kyi yu ba lus kyi tshad du byas kyang rung gdugs nyid kyi zheng tshad du bya/'di dang grong gi dbus su mi 'gro/_gdugs gyon bzhin du [#]grong dbus su mi 'gro/_lam gyi dbang
[\[337a.7\]]gis ni [#]grol phab ste'o/_/grong gi bar du lam byung ste mi 'gror mi rung na mgo la mi g.yogs [#]par phab ste 'gro/_/bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe char pa bab na'o/_/bsod snyoms byed pa'i tshe char pa bab na gdugs thogs te song yang nyes med/_yu ba la chags pa ni ma brtags pa ma yin [#]
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]pa'o/_/ber ka dang gdugs kyi yu ba la zas chags na ma brtags kyis bkrus [#]shig chad na khyim du gzhag_/bsod snyoms byed pa'i tshe char pa chad na gdugs khyim pa la bcol te 'gro/_/ldog na bskur[#]/_bsod snyoms bslangs te phyir log na [#]blangs te 'go [#]ja mkhan dang stu 'tshong ma [#]dang chang 'tshong
[\[337b.2\]]pa dang [#]rgyal po'i rigs dang /_phyag dar ba'i khyim du mi spyad/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi khyim du mi bslang [#]/_mi gtsang ba'i khang bu dang nye bar mi gnas/_bshang gci'i sar bshang [#]gci mi bro bar mi 'jug_/rin po cher gyur pa'i gos dang dgon par mi gnas/_dgon pa la dge slong gnas
[\[337b.3\]]na gos za 'ug dang btsos bcos [#]dang dar la sogs pa bzang po mi bgo[# ]/rkun pos gsod [#]du 'ong ngo /_/na me ru'i phye mas la ba la btab na srog chags mi skye'o/_/na me ru'i phye ma zhes bya ba'i shing tog [#]btags pa'i phyes gos la btab na srin mi za/_shing kun kyang ngo /_/shing kun gos la btab na srin [#]
[\[337b.4\]]mi za ni ma pa dang ba sha ka'i lo ma yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi phye ma gos la btab na'ang srin mi za/_de'i ngos su de rab tu bab [#]na'o/_/ltag la ni ma pa la sogs pa'i phye mas gos kyi rim par btab ste gzhag na srin mi za/_de'i phyir bskam pa yang ngo /_/srin mi za ba'i
[\[337b.5\]]phyir skabs su bskam zhing sprug_/phyogs dang lam dang res dang nyi ma dang skar ma dgon pa pas mkhas par [#]bya/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dge slong dgon pa pas shes par bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_rkun po tshar bcad de drir 'ongs na bstan dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/rtag chu dang me bsag_/dge
[\[337b.6\]]slong dgon pa pas 'gron po dang rkun po'i [#]phyir me dang chu rtag par gzhag_/phye dang ras ma dang sbrang rtsi dang mar ci nus kyis bcang /_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dge slong dgon pa pas rkun po gtser 'ong ba'i phyir sta gon byas te gzhag pa ni mi gtse ba'i phyir ro/_/zas kyi lhag ma 'byung na yang ngo /_/zas
[\[337b.7\]]kyi lhag ma yod na ni ltag ma ltar gzhan med na [#]der zad/_dge slong ma dgon par mi gnas/_dge slong ma 'jigs pa'i phyir dgon par mi gnas/_dbyar mo thang gi grong [#]dbus su bya/_dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang dgon pa'am dbyen [#]par mi bya bar grong dbus su bya/_de dag sgo chen por mi 'dug_/
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang sgo che chung gnyis 'dug na sgo chung ngu nas yar byung mar [#]byung mi bya/_snang bar ma yin/_dge slong mas skar khung [#]nas mi blta/_lam gyi bzhi mdor ma yin/_lam gyi mngon sum du dge slong mas [#]'greng zhing mi 'dug_/ma gyon pa can du ma yin/_
[\[338a.2\]]dge slong ma bdag gi khyim na gos thams cad phud de gcer bur mi 'dug_/der rngul gzan yang gyon[#]/_yul tsha na khang pa'i nang na smad g.yogs dang nu gab gcig gyon du gnang ngo /_/khyim pa'i drung du phrag pa ma g.yogs [#]par ma yin/_khyim pa dang dge bsnyen gyi drung du dge slong mas
[\[338a.3\]]phrag pa phyung [#]ste mi spyad/_skyil mo [#]krung gi gnas su de dag gi skyil mo krung phyed do/_/dge slong ma bsam gtan byed na skyil mo krung phyed du bya/_'dzag byed kyi sgor srin bu mi zhugs par gos la sogs pa sbyin/_dge slong ma bsam gtan byed na mo mtshan du ras mas [#]g.yogs la
[\[338a.4\]]rkang pa gcig gi rting pas [#]glan rkang pa gcig brkyangs [#]te bya/_dge slong gis dge slong ma gtsug lag khang du mi 'jug par mi bzlogs[#]/_dge slong ma zhig dge slong la kha zer zhing 'ongs na dge slong ma zhig gtsug lag khang du gnang ngo /_/mi smra ba dang mi bshad pa dang gso sbyong dang 'byung ba gzhag pas de
[\[338a.5\]]dag 'dul[#]/_ltag ma ltar dge slong ma ma dul zhing kha zer gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa [#]la ming gis smos pa 'di rnams 'dra bar tshar gcad [#]par bya/_ma gnang bar [#]de dag gis dge slong gi gtsug lag khang du mi 'jug_/dge slong ma zhig dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du [#]'ongs na sgo brdab pa'am gtsug
[\[338a.6\]]lag khang du mchis na nongs sam ma nongs zhes ma dris par gtsug lag khang du mi 'jug_/de ste kho na bzhig na'o zhes gnang bar bya/_ltag ma ltar gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa la dge slong khyod dge slong ma 'khon med dam zhes dris te 'khon [#]med ces zer na nang du 'ong du gnang ngo /_/dri bas ma [#]'khon par
[\[338a.7\]]chad par shes nas so/_/dge slong 'khon [#]med par shes na dri mi dgos par gtang ngo /_/rgyab gtan dang gtan bu dang thung nga [#]dang lde mig can dang gzer [#]gtan gyis gtsug lag khang bsdam par bsgo[#]/_dge slong pho mo'i gtsug lag khang gi sgo chen po'i ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gtan pas bsdam/_phye ma red
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]gtsug lag khang skyong gis brtags te sgo gcad[#]/_nyi ma nub na sgo bcad la gra grar rkun po yod par [#]dogs pa'i sa kun btsal[#]/_'jigs pa dang bcas na mel tshe pas mel tshe bya/_gtsug lag khang na dge slong 'jigs par gyur na mel tshe bya/_der gyur nas nyal zhing ting nge 'dzin
[\[338b.2\]]dang bcas pa mi bya/_ltag ma ltar mel tshe bskos pa'i dge slong mel tshe byed pa'i bsam gtan dang nyal du mi dbang /_cho ga 'di dag byas nas gtsug lag khang skyong la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dri/_gtsug lag khang gi gnas brtan gyis gtsug lag khang skyong la lhag [#]
[\[338b.3\]]ma'i las rnams ltar byas sam ma byas dri/_gtsug lag khang nas 'on te ma bcings par stor na gtsug lag khang skyong gis du [#]nyes pa de snyed kyi cha sbyin/_gtsug lag khang phyi sgo gtsug lag khang skyong gis gtan [#]pa rnam lngas bsdams pa las nang nas nor zhig stor na gtsug
[\[338b.4\]]lag khang skyong la skyin [#]pa mi 'bab[#]/_gtan pa gsum bcug na skyin [#]pa lnga gnyis bab ste/_de bzhin du rim bzhin du [#]bya'o/_/lcags kyu dang tha ram bcang [#]/_gang zag gi [#]gnas khang la tha ram [#]dang lcags kyu ni [#]rdzas mi stor ba'i phyir bcang /_sgo bcing ba yod pa'am bcings
[\[338b.5\]]kyi bar du mi 'gro/_/gtsug lag khang skyong gis sgo lcags dang gtan pa ma bcug par 'phyan du mi 'gro/_gnas stong par zhugs na 'dir chag chag la sogs pa bya/_dge slong zhig gud nas 'ongs te gtsug lag khang bur 'dug na khang bu phyag dar dang chag chag byas
[\[338b.6\]]pa [#]gnas so/_/snod dag so so'i gnas so/_/khang bu de na dge 'dun gyi spyad [#]sngon yod na ma snad [#]par gzhag_/de byug par rigs na yang ngo /_/lhag ma dge 'dun gyi spyad rnams bkru ba dang dus dus su bskam par bya/_de ste rtog pa byed pa yod na rtswa sngon po la bye'u [#]
[\[338b.7\]]gzhug_/dge sbyong ngam khyim pa yod na gtsug lag khang mchod rten gyi [#]'khor na rtswa sngon po yod pa thog tu gzhug_/de ste 'di khyim gyi 'ongs na 'di la chos kyi gtam dang gzhan phod pa'i chos bya/_dge slong gung nas gtsug lag khang du phyin te khyim pa 'phrad [#]du dga' ste gan du 'ongs
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]na chos bshad pa dang kha zas ci bdog pas mgu bar bya/_shing bskyed pa ma brtags pa ma brtags pa ma yin no/_/gtsug lag khang gi 'khor du dge slong gis skyed shing skyed du gnang ngo /_/'di bskyed nas mi bsrung bar mi bya/_ltag ma ltar shing
[\[339a.2\]]bskyed nas yal bar mi dor bar bsrung /_ma bsrungs na nyes byas[#]/_nam me tog gi bar du shing la'o/_/me tog gi shing zhig yin nam me tog chags pa'i bar du bsrung /_gzhan na 'bras bu'i bar du'o/_/shing de 'bras bu skye ba yin na 'bras bu chags kyi bar du
[\[339a.3\]]bsrung /_ring na lo lngar ro/_/ltag ma'i shing gnyis grib ma la bskyed de 'bras bu dang /_me tog ma byung na lo lnga tshun chad du bsrung /_bdag bzhin pa ni dge slong gzhan la bcol na'o/_/bdag gud du 'gro bar 'gyur na grogs dge slong zhig na re ngas bsrung
[\[339a.4\]]ngo zhes zer na bcol te song yang nyes med/_rkang pa bkru ba dang so shing bza' ba dang lhung bzed bkru ba dang /_khrus dag gi glud[#]/_skyed shing de dag la [#]so shing bza' ba dang rkang pa bkru ba dang lhung bzed bkru ba skye [#]shing gi rtsa ba'i drung du bkrus na shing skye ba la phan no/_/de la
[\[339a.5\]]snying pos [#]khyim grang ba dgag pa'i phyir bya/_skye [#]shing de grang par gyur na kho ra khor yug tu rtsig pas brtsigs te dro bar bya/_'di srung ba'i [#]phyir skar khung gdod/_ltag ma ltar rtsig [#]pas bskor ba mdo mdor bu gu gdod[#]/_g.yogs ma sbyin shing de grang ba'i dus na steng
[\[339a.6\]]nas sab mos g.yogs[#]/_dpyid bsil ba'i phyir bshu/_ltag ma ltar g.yogs pa dpyid dro ba'i tshe slar bshu/_sngon gyi dbyar mi rul ba'i phyir ba yang ngo /_/rtag tu skyed shing la rtsig pas [#]bskor ba'i dus la slar gzhi[#]/_chu khung gdod/_ltag [#]ma'i khang bu
[\[339a.7\]]ma bshig pa'i tshe chu 'dzag [#]pa'i chu khur gdod/_rtsa ba'i rgyud la g.yel bar mi bya/_skyed [#]shing gi rtsa ba dang gsher dang la phug la sogs pa'i mi gu la mi g.yel bar bsrung /_'khor so sor bgos te bcos/_shing skyed shing mang du bskyed de dge slong gcig
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]gi lag gis mi khyab na dge slong ma mang nyung la bskos [#]te bskyed du gzhug[# ]/la la so shing za ba dang la la kha 'khru ba dang la la rkang pa de la sogs pa ste rgyun du ma yin/_ltag ma ltar shing bskyed na bdag gi [#]dge ba btang la shing 'ba' zhig bskyed pa ma yin gyi shing drung la
[\[339b.2\]]lar so shing bza' zhing rkang lag bkru ba'i chu blugs[#]/_la las lhung bzed bkru ba'i chu blugs[#]/_me tog dang 'bras bu bsrung ba'i phyir dge slong la bsgo/_ltag ma ltar skyed [#]shing bskyed de dpyid me tog skyes pa dang ston 'bras bu chags par gyur [#]na dge 'dun gyis dge slong gcig
[\[339b.3\]]srung mar bsko[#]/_zas kyi dus kyi phyir gzhan [#]gyis so/_/ltag ma ltar bsrungs pa'i [#]dge slong zan za ba'i tshe dge 'dun gyis dge slong gzhan cig bskos te brje/_thog ma nyid du zos te der 'gro/_rjed [#]ma'i dge 'dun phal pas kyang sngar zan bza'/_srung [#]ma'i
[\[339b.4\]]dge slong ni [#]dge slong phal dang thabs shig [#]tu bza'/_klog tu 'jug pa g.yogs [#]mang du byed pa dang mi phod pa [#]la snying rje bar bya/_mkhan po la slob ma mang du bdog na mkhan po la gang bsti stang che ba'i dge slong dang myur du mi ldog cing shes rab chung ba la mkhan pos [#]snying
[\[339b.5\]]nas bslab [#]bo/_/dge slong ma de'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang de cha nod pa la klog las snying rje bya/_dge slong ma dge slong pha bas shes rab chung bas so sor thar pa la sogs pa kha don dang [#]mang du slob mi nus/_gyi na mi gtong [#]bar snying rje'i phyir yun ring du bslab bo/_/spring [#]yig
[\[339b.6\]]bri/_d+harma dang spring yig brir gnang /_dran par mi nus na gzung ba'i phyir 'dul ba yang ngo /_/chos 'chad pa nyan pa las khong du mi chud na rjed byang la bris te [#]bslabs kyang nyes med/_'bri mi 'bri'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang gang zag gis 'drir ni mi
[\[339b.7\]]gnang gi kha thon du slob [#]shig_/dge 'dun gyis ni 'drir gnang ngo /_/de bzhin du 'dis [#]so sor thar pa yang ngo /_/so sor thar pa yang gang zag gis [#]yi ge la mi bri bar kha don du mi [#]bslab bo/_/de dang 'dra ba yang ngo /_/phi [#]bang ka la sogs pa gzhan kyang mi bri bar kha
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]thon bya/_gang zag dag kyang ngo /_/gang zag gi gos kyi mtha' dang rgya la ming rus mi bri[#]/_mtshan mar byed pa ni nyes med do/_/gos kyi mtha' ma la snag tsa'i tig ti dang mtshan ma btab pa nyes med/_dge 'dun gyi [#]mal stan la mi bri/_dge 'dun gyi mal
[\[340a.2\]]stan la [#]dge 'dun gyi mal stan no zhes yi ger mi [#]bri/_che ge mo zhig gi gtsug lag khang steng bsod nams su'o zhes so/_/yon bdag sus brtsigs pa'i gtsug lag khang la g.yam [#]po la sogs pa mal stan yon du phul na de'i mtha' mar gtsug lag khang 'di'i yon bdag ming 'di
[\[340a.3\]]zhes bya bas phul ba'o zhes bya ba[#]/_gos la yang ngo /_/dge 'dun gyi na bza' la'ang ltag ma skad du ming bri/_gzhan yang 'di lta bu'i tshul la'o/_/gtsug lag khang du grong dang zhing dang gnas rta la sogs pa yon du phul ba dpang rgya bris te bzhag_/sangs rgyas kyi tshig srid [#]
[\[340a.4\]]pa'i le'u dang rims dang der gyur cig par mi klog_/sangs rgyas kyi chos klog pa'i tshe mur 'dug gi chos klog pa 'dra ba skad ring du ngar ngar mi bya/_sangs rgyas kyi tshig la brtson par gzhan la ston nus na phyi rol gyi gtsug lag [#]blang /_bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos mkhas par shes la

[\[340a.6\]]dus ni nyin gcig la gsum du bgos pa'i nyi [#]ma'i gung la bslab bo/_/nub mo yang ngo /_/nub mo bde na mtshan rangs sangs rgyas chos bya/_na zhing mi bde ba [#]mtshan mo'i gu [#]gtar ka la sogs pa slob/_phan pa'i sngags na gzung ngo /_/ltag ma ltar nyin gcig mtshan gcig

[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]phan na sngags bya/_'di la dkon mchog gsum la phyag bya ba'i gnas su brjod/_sngags bya ba'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal la bdag gi lhar [#]gzung /_de'i mtshan [#]nas phyung ste phyag bya/_lha gzhan la phyag mi bya/_dkon mchog gsum ma gtogs [#]par mur
[\[340b.2\]]'dug gi lha la phyag mi bya/_mi mchod de bkur sti mi bya ba ma [#]yin no/_/mur 'dug gi lha la me tog la sogs pas kyang [#]mi mchod/_de la ngan du'ang mi brjod/_zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa [#]klog pa na mngon [#]sum du 'dug la se gol gyi sgras [#]chad par bya
[\[340b.3\]]ba dang /_de'i gnas su phyin na snying rje bya/_mur 'dug gi lha'i drung du [#]phyin na snying rje zhing phan par bya ba'i phyir zhal nas [#]gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bklag[# ]/bzo la nan tan mi bya ste bslab bam de'i snod gzhag pa mang ste/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams mi bslab mi
[\[340b.4\]]bcang pha rol po'ang mi bslab/_ma gtogs pa ni btang spyad kyi snod dang khab ral dang ras phyis so/_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams bcangs kyang nyes med do[#]/_/dge bas gsol ba dang mtha' gcig cing bsod nams kyi sems kyis bya ste rngan pa'i ma yin no/_/nad pa la
[\[340b.5\]]gtar ga'am [#]sman dpyad kyis gson snying rje'i phyir phan par bya ba'i [#]kha zas dang dang gla'i phyir mi gso/_bkru [#]sman byin te gzhan du mi 'gro/_sman rgod nad pa la blud de[#]/_ldud pa ldud pa gud du mi 'gro/_/de lta bu'i rkyen gcig gis 'gro na shin tu'ang 'khru zhing gnod pa la sogs
[\[340b.6\]]pa'i cho ga bstan te'o/_/ltag [#]ma ltar sman blud na sman blud pa'i dge slong gud du mi 'gror mi rung na sman gyi cho ga ci ltar bya ba zhib tu bstan [#]te gud du [#]'gro/_'dreg mkhan gyi bya ba byas te mtshan mtshungs pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang rab tu dben pa'i phyogs su'o/_/skra
[\[340b.7\]]'dreg na dge slong dang dge sbyong yang na breg dge slong ma dang [#]dge sbyong ma'ang breg go_/ltag ma ltar breg pa ni dben pa'i phyogs su breg go_/khri'i yan lag chag [#]na bcos/_khri'i rkang pa chag na dge slong shing mkhan shes na lkog dben par bcos/_dkon mchog gi phyir
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]phreng ba sbrel/_dkon mchog gsum la [#]mchod pa'i phyir me tog [#]phreng ba lkog dben [#]par brgyus kyang nyes med ri mo yang dkon mchog mchod pa'i tshe sems can 'dra ba ma yin pa bri/_maN+Dal lta bu [#]dkon mchog la mchod pa'i phyir bri na sems can gyi gzugs mi bri/_
[\[341a.2\]]bris na nyes byas/_de bzhin pa ni de'i phyir 'dri ba'o/_/ltag ma ltar sems can gyi gzugs bris pa lta mi smos kyi sems can gyi gzugs bri bar bsams [#]te ri mo zhig shur zhes bris pa la'ang nyes byas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa [#]shi na lus la mchod pa bya/_dge slong zhig shi na
[\[341a.3\]]grogs kyis bkrus la tsan dan [#]dang gur kum [#]la sogs pas mchod pa bya/_dge slong ma'ang de bzhin no/_/'on te ma [#]na srog chags med na bsreg_/ltag ma ltar shi ba'i ro la rma la sogs pa'i ro la srin bu med na ro [#]bsreg_/gdon mi za bar brtag pas so/_/[#]ltag ma ltar bsreg pa yang
[\[341a.4\]]dag par srin bu med par rtogs na gdod bsreg_/brkos te'am chu bor bskur/_ltag ma ltar srin bu yod dam rlung dang char pa'i rkyen gyis bsreg ma nus na sa'i 'og gam gtsang [#]por dor/_mi rigs na sab sub tu bzhag[# ]/sa 'og tu gzhug [#]gam chur bskyur [#]ma nus na lung khung du dor/_mgo byang
[\[341a.5\]]phyogs su ste glo g.yas pas bsnyal/_ro dor [#]ba'i tshe thabs 'di ltar gzhag_/rtsa ba'i [#]thum po sngas su gzhug_/sngas su rtswa thum gzhug_/rtswa'am lo mas g.yogs[#]/_steng nas rtswa'am lo mas g.yogs[#]/_chos mnyan pa dang sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bya/_ro bskyal nas mi rtag pa'i chos dang zhal nas
[\[341a.6\]]gsungs pa'i tshig [#]bzhi'i le'u gcig bklag_/reg pa'i [#]gos dang bcas te bkru/_ro 'dzin 'dzin pa'i gos dang lus thams cad bkru/_gzhan lag pa dang rkang pa bkru/_ro la ma reg pa rnams rkang lag bzhi dang gdong bkru/_mchod rten la phyag byas te 'jug_/ro bskyal te slar log nas [#]mchod rten la phyag
[\[341a.7\]]'tshal te bdag gi gnas khang du 'jug_/mchod rten rnam gnyis te 'khor dang bcas pa dang dka' thub lta bu'o/_/mchod rten rnam gnyis la gcig ni ci ste srog shing 'phang lo med pa'o/_/gcig ni ci ste ngos bzhir khang bu bzhi byas te sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gzhug [#]par bya/_rigs pa ni 'dir rab tu 'byung
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]ba'o/_/dge slong dge sbyong shi ba'i rus bu mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug tu rigs so/_/de ste dge na'o/_/ltag ma ltar mchod rten du gzhug [#]pa tshul khrims dang yon tan dang ldan pa la bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi [#]thams cad lta bur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni sgar sgur [#]dang 'bar 'bur med par bya/_bang rim bzhi dang
[\[341b.2\]]rta babs [#]dang sgo nga dang [#]spyi spubs dang srog shing dang gdugs bcu gsum dang char pa dred pa de ni 'dra ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad 'di ltar brtsigs te sa las bang rim bzhi brtsig_/de'i steng du rta babs [#]bya/_de'i steng du bum pa bya de'i steng du shing gru bzhi pa bya/_de'i steng du srog shing gzugs/_srog shing
[\[341b.3\]]la 'phang lo bcu gsum gdags/_de'i steng du gdugs gdags/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ni char dred pa ma gtogs so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten kyang gzhan ni snga ma 'dra ba gdugs 'ba' zhig mi thob bo/_/nyan thos kyi ni 'bras bu'i snyed pa [#]du ste gcig par ro/_/nyan thos kyi dge slong rgyun du zhugs
[\[341b.4\]]pa zhig shi na'ang bang rim ni ltag ma dang 'dra ba 'phang lo ni gnyis bya/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ni 'phang lo gsum bya/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i ni bzhi bya/_dgra bcom pa'i ni lnga bya/_yang dag par gshegs pa'i drung du de'i yul na de ste 'das pa'i de'i phyogs su gang du de'i des g.yog byas pa ltar gnas [#]gyur to/_/
[\[341b.5\]]yang dag par gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nyan thos kyi mchod rten brtsig na mdun du maud gal dang shA ri'i bu'i brtsig_/a nan rgyab tu brtsig_/kA sh+ya [#]drung du brtsig [#]glo g.yas g.yon su dgra bcom [#]phal gyi mchod rten brtsig_/'dir ji ltar rgan rim [#]su mi bya bar ma yin/_ltag ma ltar mchod rten
[\[341b.6\]]brtsig pa sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu dgra bcom pa gang rgan pa'i rim pa bzhin bya/_ma rabs kyi ni byi byi bor ro/_/dge slong rnam lnga'i mchod rten ni srog shing 'phang lo med par zlum por [#]bya/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga'i phyi rol du bya/_ltag ma ltar dge slong gi mchod rten phyi rol du bya/_bsrings pa'i mchod
[\[341b.7\]]rten la mchod pa'i rigs dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs na nya [#]dus su rtag tu mchod cing byi dor dang skabs skabs su mchod ston bya/_nyan thos pa'i mchod rten la phul ba'i shas tshangs pa [#]mtshungs par spyod pa la'o/_/nyan thos kyi mchod rten la mchod pa'i [#]yon bdag dad
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]pas nor zhig yon du phul na 'khor nye ba'i dge slong gis bgos kyang nyes med/_mu tig gsungs par bya/_nyan thos kyi dge slong gi mchod rten la mu tig yon du phul na zhib tu btags la rdo thal dang bsres te bsku[#]/_sil snyan dang dung ni sangs rgyas la dbul/_nyan
[\[342a.2\]]thos kyi mchod rten la ming gis smos pa 'di yon du phul la sangs rgyas kyi [#]mchod rten la phul te rtag tu mchod/_zhig ral ba bcos pa'i phyir 'di gzhag par bya/_nyan thos kyi mchod rten la nor rdzas yon du phul ba las dge slong gcig gi [#]shas mchod rten bcos pa'i phyir [#]gzhag_/mchod
[\[342a.3\]]par bcos [#]pa yang ngo /_/gdugs dang 'phan [#]zhig yon du phul [#]na mi bgo bar chos [#]pa'i phyir spyi la gzhag_/sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten lcags las [#]byas pa'ang chos so/_/mchod rten 'di ltar byas kyang nyes med/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_shel gyi gdang [#]bu dang sen mo'i mchod
[\[342a.4\]]rten na yang ngo /_/ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi rgyu las mchod rten byas kyang nyes med/_dbu dang sen mo bzhugs pa'i mchod rten byas kyang nyes med/_'di'i 'khor bya/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang mchod rten bya na 'khor dang bcas par bya ste 'og nas 'chad/_gnas bden gyi gnas na gnas
[\[342a.5\]]pa la sogs pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin par zhes so/_/ltag ma ltar 'khor bri ba [#]ni sangs rgyas gnas bden nas babs nas mtha' mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du 'khor dang zhabs [#]'bring dang 'jam dpal dang byams pa la sogs pa sku gzugs kyi g.yas g.yon [#]dang dri gtsang khang gi
[\[342a.6\]]ngos la ri mor zhib tu bri/_skyang nul sbyin mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang la skyang nul bya/_dkar por ro/_/skyang nul ni dkar por bya/_me mar 'dzin par bya/_mchod rten gyi mdun du me mar mi shi ba'i skyabs kha yed gcig byas te me mar der bsreg_/shing thags [#]kyis bskor ba yang ngo /_/mchod rten kho ra
[\[342a.7\]]khor yug tu shing thags kyis [#]bskor/_sgo skyes bsgreng /_gtsug lag khang gi sgor rdo rings bsgreng /_rgyal mtshan sbyin/_mchod rten la rgyal mtshan gzugs te rgyal mtshan 'og ma rnams so/_/'di rnams bzhi ste seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang klu'i rgyal mtshan dang glang po'i [#]rgyal
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]mtshan zhes so/_/rgyal mtshan la rnam bzhi ste/_mchod rten gyi gra bzhir shing bzhi bsgreng la gcig gi [#]steng du seng ge gzhag_/gcig gi steng du chu srin gzhag_/gcig gi steng du klu gzhag_/gcig gi steng du [#]ba lang gzhag_/dri gtsang phreng [#]ba bya/_mchod rten gyi ngos khor yug tu khang bu byas la
[\[342b.2\]]khang bu'i nang du sku gzugs bzhag_/sgo skyes bsgreng /_khung [#]bu de rnams la phreng ba bya/_phyir bya/_mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang byas nas phyi [#]ras bskor/_shing thags [#]kyis 'di bskor/_rtsig pa ma 'byor na shing thags [#]kyis bskor/_ka ba btsag [#]gis byug_/gtsug lag khang gi ka ba btsag [#]gis
[\[342b.3\]]byug rtsig pa rgya skyegs kyis bri/_gtsug lag khang rtsig [#]pa'i ngos rgya skyegs kyis bri/_spos [#]kyis dbang bskur ba sbyin/_gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten la spos sna tshogs pa [#]bsregs pa gtor/_yungs mar dang yungs dang [#]tsan dan dang gur kum gyi chag chag kyang ngo /_/tse ti la yungs mar gyis byugs
[\[342b.4\]]la de'i [#]steng du yungs [#]gis ser por bsku/_ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyis bsku zhing chag chag bya/_tsher [#]mi gzugs/_mchod rten la tsher [#]ma'am thur ma dang gzer mi gdab/_ba glang gi so phreng ba gdags pa'i phyir sbyin/_tse ti la me tog gi phreng ba gdags pa'i phur bu bya/_bslang ba'i tshe na steng
[\[342b.5\]]dbug par ma yin/_ltag ma ltar phur pa gzugs pa ni mchod rten bslang ba'i tshe phur bu gdab pa'i [#]bu gu gdod/_steng du me mar mi sbyin/_tse ti bum pa'i steng du me mar mi gzhag par ngos kyi khang bur gzhag_/khyim pas mchod pa'i phyir gzeg_/khyim pas gdugs dang me tog gis mchod du 'ongs
[\[342b.6\]]te brgyan kyang nyes med/_med na dge sbyong las rkang pa spos chus bkrus te'o/_/khyim pa med [#]dge slong gis ming gis smos pa 'di rnams ltar bya/_de ste'ang 'di med na spos kyis dril ba'am gos kyis dkris [#]te ston pa'i 'du shes mngon par byas te don mngon par dran par bsams te'o/_/ltag
[\[342b.7\]]ma ltar dge sbyong gis rkang pa [#]bkrur chu med na spos kyis rkang pa dril ba'am rkang pa gos kyis dkris te bdag gi [#]mkhan po yin no bar 'du shes gzhag ste/_steng nas slar babs kyi bar du bla ma la mchod pa'o snyam du bsam pa rgyun du gzhag_/de dag kyang na dge slong gis de ltar [#]de bzhin du'o/_/
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]ltag ma ltar khyim pa dang [#]dge sbyong gis ltag ma ltar bya/_de'i phyir thag bu bre/_mchod rten la 'dzeg pa'i tshe 'phang lo'i drung du thag pas gdags [#]te 'dzeg pa'i lag pas 'jus te 'dzegs [#]pa dang gdugs gsol ba'i tshe'ang thag pa brgyangs te gdags/_rin po che'i
[\[343a.2\]]phreng ba sbyin/_mchod rten la rin po [#]sna bdun gsol na rigs so/_/snying po g.yogs pa [#]ma rung bar 'gyur ba dgag [#]pa'i phyir g.yogs[#]/_mchod rten la khung [#]bu sgo bzhir btod la steng g.yogs par byas kyang nyes med/_mun pa mi gnag [#]pa'i phyir sgo gtod/_mchod rten gyi khang bu mun pa
[\[343a.3\]]mi gnag [#]par bya ba'i phyir ngos bzhir sgo bya/_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs bya/_sku gzugs dang mchod rten rin po che sna bdun nam gdugs la bris pa'am skud ris [#]kyis bris pa gang yang rung /_'di mchod pa gzhag_/mchod rten la lo dus su rtag par mchod par bya ste 'og ma rnams/_skyes
[\[343a.4\]]pa dang /_cod pan dang gtsug tor dang byang chub pa'i gtsug tor dang byang chub pa'i mchod ston bdag gis ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi dus gsum rtag par mchod rten dang sku gzugs mchod par bya/_grong khyer 'jug par 'dir bya ba yong [#]ngo /_/khang bu rtseg [#]ma'i gan du mchod rten
[\[343a.5\]]gzhag la yul bskor [#]bar bya/_dge slong gis bskur ba [#]brtags pa'o/_/ltag ma ltar yul bskor [#]ba dge slong bzhis me khang yang [#]nyes med/_'di'i tshe gsar bus so/_/ltag ma ltar bskur [#]ba dge slong gzhon nus bskur ro/_/sde lngas 'khor sbyin/_yul bskor ba'i tshe dge slong sde lngas mchod cing
[\[343a.6\]]'khor bya'o/_/yon rgan rims kyis [#]blang ngo /_/ltag ma ltar yul bskor [#]ba'i tshe mchod rten la yon phul na mi khyams par bya ba'i phyir [#]dge slong rgan pos blang /_gsil dkrol ba dang gzhan yang dge ba'i bkur sti chen pos so/_/khung bu rtseg [#]mas yul bskor [#]ba'i tshe dang gling dang sil dkrol ba
[\[343a.7\]]sna tshang bar dkrol zhing mchod/_kha na ma tho ba med pa ni dkrol ba'i phyir kyai [#]skyes bu ston pa la mchod pa gyis shig ces brjod pa'o/_/khang bu rtseg [#]ma dang yul [#]bskor ba'i tshe dud pa la sogs pa la rnga rdung zhing mchod cig ces bsgo'ang 'di'i tshe ni nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/grong dang tshong dus dang bzhi'i
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]dang mngon sum dag tu sang ngam gnangs sangs rgyas gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes 'gro [#]ba la bris pa la ba lang [#]gi steng du bzhon te rgyal mtshan dang gdugs kyis bskor ba [#]bslabs so/_/yul bskor ba'i zhag gnyis gsum gyi mdun du grong mi thams cad la grong bar phyag dar dang chag chag dang
[\[343b.2\]]mchod pa gyis shig ces dge slong ngam khyim pas ba lang la bzhon pa [#]thams cad du rgyas par bsgo/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bya ba chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa las [#]byas kyang nyes med/_'di la rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor dang shing thags kyis [#]
[\[343b.3\]]bskor ba dang lcags kyi ka ba yang ngo /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la [#]ming gis smos pa 'di rnams bya/_de la ba dan bcing [#]/_ltag ma lta bu'i lcags kyi ka ba kho ra yug tu bskor ba la ba dan gdags/_'khor bya/_byang chub kyi [#]gzugs kyis yul bskor ba yang ltag ma sangs rgyas kyi [#]
[\[343b.4\]]gzugs bskor ba ltar bya/_lhab lhub kyis brgyan te ma gtogs pa ni zhabs kyi [#]rgyan dang snyan cha'o/_/byang chub kyi gzugs la za 'og [#]la sogs pa'i na bza' dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te bskor/_zhabs la gdu bu gdags pa dang snyan cha dang gnyis kyis ni mi brgyan/_spos kyi yan
[\[343b.5\]]lag sbyin pa sbyin/_byang chub kyi gzugs la tsan dan dang gur kum [#]dang spos [#]zhim pos bsku/_khyogs dang shing rtas drang /_byang chub kyi gzugs khyogs sam shing rta gang gis drangs kyang rung /_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan der bsgreng /_byang chub kyi yul bskor ba'i tshe bus
[\[343b.6\]]pa gzhon nu'i lag na ming gis [#]smos pa 'di bskur la bskor/_me tog gis gong bu la gsol/_dbu la me tog gi phreng bas brgyan/_yon lhung ba yang ngo /_/me tog dang pog spos lta bu gzugs kyi steng du gtor kyang nyes med/_gnas brtan gyis bsrung /_shing rta la phreng
[\[343b.7\]]ba'i sgrom bya/_shing rta'i mdun du bre 'du bar gru bzhir byas la de'i nang du me tog sna tshogs gzhag la gtor/_bsung gi [#]sgom yang gzhag_/shing rta'i mdun gyi steng du bag phye [#]zhim po'i bsung [#]gis bkang la gzhag_/phreng ba gsol/_khyim pas phreng ba 'bul
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]na sku gzugs la gdags 'di'i mchod pa bzhin te sil dkrol zhi la 'gro ba 'dong nas brgyan gsil [#]yul bskor pa zin nas rnga la sogs pa dang rgyan thams cad gcod/_nub mo'o/_/ltag ma ltar rgyan dpog pa ni [#]nub mo dpog_/rab tu byung ba'i
[\[344a.2\]]gnas su mchod pa bcas pa chos so/_/gtsug lag khang du khyim pa dge slong zhig gis zhing ngam grong zhig phul te dus dus su rtag par yul bskor ba gyis shig ces gzhag pa [#]de bzhin [#]mi chad par yul bskor ba'i rgyu dang yon zan du bya'o/_/ma brtags pa dang rten cing
[\[344a.3\]]brtags pa spong na ma brtags pa'i bcu bsdus pa'o/_/byi [#]na ya'i mgo nas 'di'i bar du thams cad kyang [#]zhal nas gsungs pa ste rung ngam mi rung ba dang gnang mi gnang bar bshad pa'o/_/ltag tu bshad pa dang /_'og nas 'byung ba rigs pa ni bya/_mi rigs
[\[344a.4\]]pa ni thams cad btang ste/_'dir ma bris mod kyang nyal te gcin mi gci ba [#]la sogs pa ma brtags pa yin pas mi bya'o/_/ma brtags pa spyad pas 'bras bu dge bar 'gyur na bya'o/_/dge slong zhig tshe rabs stong gi bar du mtho ris na 'dug 'dug pa las [#]byig
[\[344a.5\]]gshur zhugs pa las khang pa bzang po la sogs pa sbyar [#]nas de'i nang du bsam gtan byas nas de'i dgra bcom par gyur pa lta bu ste mi dge ba spyad pa las dge bar 'gyur na bya'o/_/phyi ma dang snyen [#]cing snga ma spong na brtags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa nyes
[\[344a.6\]]byas tsam gyi [#]tshod kyang mi gnang zhes 'byung /_yul gyi rnam pa [#]sbyar te/_sems can gyi mig 'gag par [#]'gyur na nyes byas [#]tsam btang la sems can gyi yid bzhin du bde bar byas kyang nyes pa med do/_/mal stan gyi dngos po ste/_phran tshegs su
[\[344a.7\]]gtogs pa'o/_/rdzogs so//_//
